40001001	Jech jaich nin bij nin weje pakliltsik na Jesukristo, xu kidhtalb kal na Dabid ani na Abraham.
40001002	Na Abraham in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Isk. Na Isk in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Jakob. Na Jakob in koy in chakmiltsik ani jn ti b in bij ta Jud.
40001003	Nin tta na Fares ani na Sara jaich na Jud ani nin nna jaich na Tamar. Na Fares in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Esrom ani na Esrom in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Aram.
40001004	Na Aram in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Aminadab, na Aminadab in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Nsn ani na Nsn in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Salmn.
40001005	Nin tta na Bs jaich na Salmn ani nin nna jaich na Rb. Nin tta na Obed jaich na Bs ani nin nna jaich na Rut. Na Obed in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Isa.
40001006	Na Isa in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Dabid ani jech na Dabid jaich na kwajay ti pulek takix. An pulek takix Dabid kal nin tomtalwiik na Uras in koytsik in chakmil xin bij ta Salomn.
40001007	Na Salomn in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Roboam, na Roboam in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Abas ani na Abas in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Asa.
40001008	Na Asa in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Josafat, na Josafat in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Joram ani na Joram in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Usas.
40001009	Na Usas in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Jotam, na Jotam in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Akas ani na Akas in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Esekas.
40001010	Na Esekas in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Manass, na Manass in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Amn ani na Amn in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Josas.
40001011	Na Josas in koy in chakmiltsik ani jn ti b jaich na Jekonas. Jech tmun tam ti an israelitatsik jn ti wiknl ban chabl xi Babilonia.
40001012	Ms tayl, tam ti tmnkich jech, na Jekonas in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Salatiel ani na Salatiel in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Sorobabel.
40001013	Na Sorobabel in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Abiud, na Abiud in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Eliakim ani na Eliakim in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Asor.
40001014	Na Asor in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Sadok, na Sadok in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Akim ani na Akim in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Eliud.
40001015	Na Eliud in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Eleasar, na Eleasar in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Matn ani na Matn in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Jakob.
40001016	Na Jakob in koy in chakmil xin bij ta Jos. Jech na Jos, jaich nin tomkl na Mara ani ba jech na Mara, taja ti wachin na Jess xu bijyb ti Kristo.
40001017	Wachin lajuch i kidhtalbtsik, tujey ba na Abraham asta ba na Dabid. Lajuch jeye i kidhtalbtsik wachin xi tujey ba na Dabid asta tam ti an israelitatsik jn Babilonia ti wiknl. Ani lajuch jeye i kidhtalbtsik wachin xi tujey tam ti an israelitatsik jn Babilonia ti wiknl asta ti wachin ti chakam na Kristo.
40001018	Ench ti wachin ti chakam na Jesukristo: Na Mara, nin nna, kwajat konodh abal ka tomkin kal na Jos ani tam ti yabl kwajattsik junax, jilkon kodh na Mara kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
40001019	Na Jos, nin tomkl na Mara, jaich jun i lujat inik, por yab in lena kin xalka max anchan ti kwajat na Mara, tokot in lena kin jila chinatki.
40001020	Lejat kwajat in chalpayal jech, in chuu ba watsib jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb ani utsan kl ench: —Jos, xi kidhtalb kal na Dabid, ka bachu na Mara ta tomtal ani yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, pos an chakam xi neech kin wachiy, kal an Tokat Ejattalb tu dhabalb.
40001021	Na Mara neech kin wachiy jun i chakam ani neech ka bijiy ta Jess. Anchan ti neech ka bijyat abal neech kin loo an atiklbtsik kal an walastalb xin kooltsik.
40001022	Ejtal jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an Okxlb ench kal nin tiltsxil:
40001023	An tsidhan neech ka jilkon kodh ani neech kin wachiy jun i chakam. Jech an chakam neech ka bijyat Emanuel.  An bijlb Emanuel in l kin ulu: Na Dios kwajat kal waw.
40001024	Tam ti na Jos ejech, anchan tin taja xan ti utsan kal nin tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb ani yab in jila na Mara.
40001025	Por yab junkun kal na Mara asta tam ti na Mara in koy an chakam ani in kwajbantsi tin bij Jess.
40002001	Na Jess wachin ban bitsow xin bij Beln xu taknal ban chabl xi Judea, tam ti na Erodes kwajat ti pulek takix ba jachan an chabl. Tam ti jachan i kij, ulich ban bitsow Jerusaln chb x i chalpadh iniktsik xi tl in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts
40002002	ani konoxintsik ench: —Jn ti kwajat nin pulek takxal an judotsik xi wachin ti chakam? Pos i chumal nin til in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts ani u tsinek tech abal ki kakna.
40002003	Tam tin chobna jech an pulek takix Erodes, jilkon tajat ti chalpax ani ejtal jeye an atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln.
40002004	Kanyattsik tm kal an pulek takix ejtal an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani in konoytsik jn ti neech ka wachin ti chakam an Kristo.
40002005	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Ban bitsow xin bij Beln xu taknal ban chabl xi Judea; pos an tiltsix ench tin jilmal dhutsadh:
40002006	Maske Beln jaich jun i chakam bitsow xi kwajat ban chabl xi Judea, plek ti kwajat, kom taja ti neech ka wachin jun i oklek, xi neech kin beletna an atiklbtsik xi Israel.
40002007	Na Erodes in kaniy tm chinatki an chalpadh iniktsik ani in konoy xowki jun bl ti xalkank na t.
40002008	In abatsik tm Beln ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik taja ani ka alimay i tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta jachan an chakam. Tam ka elatsik an chakam, ti kin ltsi abal kin kale neye ku kakna.
40002009	Tam ti okon ti usnaltsik jech kal an pulek takix, kalchtsik tm. Na t xin chumaltsik in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts, ta ti neech okox ani tam tin bajaw xon ti kwajat an chakam, kubey.
40002010	Tam ti an chalpadh iniktsik in chuu kubey na t, kulbtsik tajat.
40002011	Tam ti ochichtsik ban at, in chuu an chakam junax kal na Mara. Jech na Mara jaich nin nna an chakam. An chalpadh iniktsik tudhlan tm ani in kakna an chakam. In japiy tm an balixtalb xin tsidhltsik ani in chejwaliy ti oro, ti ikob ani ti mirra.
40002012	Por ltsintsik kal jun i watsib ke yab yejat ka witsiytsik xon ti kwajat na Erodes, jaxtm ti witsiytsik bin chablil, pl bl.
40002013	Tayl, tam ti kalnekich an chalpadh iniktsik, na Jos in chuu ba jun i watsib jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb ani utsan kl ench: —Ki chakay ani ki jlch abal Ejipto. Ka jna an chakam junax kal nin nna ani ki kwajay taja asta tam nan tu utsa ki witsiy. Pos na Erodes neech kin aliy an chakam abal kin chemdha.
40002014	Tam ti na Jos ejech, jachan an akal jlch abal Ejipto. In jna an chakam junax kal nin nna.
40002015	Taja ti kwajaytsik asta ti chemech na Erodes. Jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal ench an Okxlb kal nin tiltsxil: “U utsa ka kale Ejipto nu Chakmil.”
40002016	Tam ti na Erodes in chuu abal kambiyat kal an chalpadh iniktsik, chakuy tajat ani in abna ka chemdh ejtal an tsitsik kwitl xi t ti wachink asta xin koolich chabtsik i tamub. In abna ka chemdh an tsitsik kwitl xu kwajl Beln ani xu kwajltsik taja kunat. Jech in taja anchan kom in koolich kunat chb i tamub ti watenek an chalpadh iniktsik.
40002017	Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin jilmal dhutsadh ench an tiltsix Jeremas:
40002018	Achatm ban bitsow Ram i mmlbtsik ti uknal ani ti tepinal; jaich nin at kidhtaltsik na Rakel xi kwajat in ukintsal nin chakmiltsik ani yab in lenatsik ka kijidhmdh, kom chemdhantsidh tin chakmiltsik.
40002019	Por tam ti chemnekich na Erodes, taja Ejipto, na Jos in chuu ba jun i watsib jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb ani utsan kl ench:
40002020	—Ki chakay ani ki kale ban chabl xi Israel. Ka jna an chakam junax kal nin nna abal chemnekichtsik xin lwiik kin chemdha an chakam.
40002021	Chakay tm na Jos ani in jna an chakam kl nin nna ban chabl xi Israel.
40002022	Por tam ti na Jos in acha abal na Arkelao jaich na kwajat ti takix Judea in kuxyal nin tta Erodes, jikey ani yab in lena ka kale taja. Ani kom ltsinkich kal jun i watsib xon ti yejat ka kale, kale ban chabl xi Galilea.
40002023	Tam ti ulich taja, kale ti kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Nasaret. Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an tiltsixtsik, ke na Jess neech ka bijyat ti nasareno.
40003001	Tam ti jachan i kij na Juan xu pujax ulich Judea ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Tujey ti tiltsix
40003002	ani in ulal ench: —Ka jilaichtsik ta walablom, pos exomich ti kunel xowki nechich ti takix na Dios.
40003003	Jech na Juan jaich an inik xin tilmal an tiltsix Isaas tam tin ulu ench: Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: “Ka tojojontschtsik tin blil an Ajtiklb; ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa; abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb!”
40003004	Na Juan u xeketlinal kal i xeketlb xi tajadh kal nin xil an konl xu bijyb kameyo ani in wikl nin tsukul kal i t. Nin kapwl, jaich an pichich ani an alte chiik.
40003005	Yn i atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln, ejtaltsik xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Judea ani ejtal xu kwajltsik kunat ban walja Jordn, u uleltsik abal kin acha xowa in ulal na Juan.
40003006	Tam kin lnaichtsik nin walab, u pujybtsik kal na Juan ban walja Jordn.
40003007	Por tam ti na Juan in chuu ke yn i fariseotsik ani i saduseotsik u ulel abal ka pujyat, utsantsik ench kal na Juan: —Tattsik a junwal jelti an chan! Jita ti oktsmaltsik ka chinkontsi an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi exomich ti kunel?
40003008	Ki kwajchtsik alwa abal ka xalkan ke tsubax lejtal ta jilaichtsik ta walablom.
40003009	Yab ka chalpaytsik ke i alwa inik tin tamt na Dios abalki i kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham; pos tu utsltsik ke asta ba jech an tujubtsik na Dios neech kin ejto kin wachindha in kidhtaltsik a Abraham.
40003010	Anchan jelt xan ti jun i inik in kwajll jun i te xi yab xata ti alwa ani in tsikl, anchan jeye ti neech kin taja na Dios kunat i kij kal an atiklbtsik xi Jaj kin chuu ke yab alwa inik.
40003011	Nan tu pujyaltsik kal i ja jelti jun i exl abal a jilaichtsik ta walablom; por xi ta tl tayl, neech ti ki pujaytsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal i kamal. Jaj ms in kool i awiltalb ke nan, nan nibal ela in tomnl ku tntsi tin pajab.
40003012	Anchan xan ti jun i inik in jutsyal an trigo abal kin tapa ban wilte ani in tsiktsal an tin jokom, anchan jeye ti neech ka tajtsin an atiklbtsik kal xi ta tl tayl. Neech kin jna walki xi Jaj in dhabal ani neech kin petna xi yab Jaj in dhabal ban kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
40003013	Ulich tm na Jess ban walja Jordn xon ti kwajat na Juan abal ka pujyat, na Jess tl Galilea.
40003014	Yabwiik u lenb ka pujyat na Jess kal na Juan, tokot u usnal ench: —Nan nin tomnl kin pujyat kal Tat, ani Tat a l tu pujay nan?
40003015	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Xo ka tajaich anchan; pos yejat ki taja ejtal xowa in l na Dios. In tokch tm na Juan.
40003016	Tam ti pujadhich na Jess, kale ban ja. Tmki jachan, jakpin an walki ani in chuu na Jess nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios ti pal jelti jun i kuku ani buxkan tin b Jaj.
40003017	Achatm tm jun i kwintalb walki, xu kw in ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat ani in kulbl tajat kal Jaj.
40004001	Jn tm na Jess kal an Tokat Ejattalb ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh abal ka taktamiyat kal an lej atax.
40004002	Taja ti kwajay yab u kapul chab inik a kts ani chab inik i akal ani tayl, kaay.
40004003	Utey tm an lej atax ba na Jess abal kin taktamiy ani in utsa ench: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka utsa jachan an tujubtsik ka wenkon ti kapnl.
40004004	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab tokotki kal i kapnl ti ejat an inik, ejat jeye kal ejtal xowa na Dios in ulal.”
40004005	Jn tm na Jess kal an lej atax ban tokat bitsow Jerusaln, kadhb bin b an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios
40004006	ani utsan ench: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka petna tab abal chaat; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Na Dios neech kin aba nin tokat abatwlejiltsik abal ti ki beletna. Neech ti ki bachu abal yab ka chaaw na akan kal ni jun i tujub.
40004007	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —In ulal jeye ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “Yab ka taktamiy an Okxlb na Diosil.”
40004008	Jn tm jun kal an lej atax ba jun i tekat chn, xalkantsat ejtal an ti pakdha bitsow xi tech ti kayl xi kwajat taknl kal an pakdha takix ani nin publ jachan an pakdha bitsow
40004009	ani utsan ench: —Neech tu pidha ejtal jech, max ki tudhlan abal ti kin kakna.
40004010	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Lej atax, ki kalch, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil ani Jajki ka tjontsal.”
40004011	Jilanich tm na Jess kal an lej atax ani ulich i tokat abatwletsik abal ka tjontsat kl na Jess.
40004012	Tam ti na Jess in acha abal na Juan balidh ban wikaxte, witsiy ban chabl xi Galilea.
40004013	Por yab kwajay Nasaret, kale ti kwajl Kapernam, jun i bitsow xi kwajat bin wl i pujal, ban chabl xon ti kwajinektsik na Sabuln ani na Neftal.
40004014	Jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsix Isaas ench:
40004015	Chabl xon ti kwajinektsik na Sabuln ani na Neftal, xi kwajat in lujtal ban pujal, in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts kal an walja Jordn, Galilea, xon tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo.
40004016	An atiklbtsik xi kwajat jelti max ban jikwaxtalb, in chuutsik jun i pulek tajaxtalb ani an atiklbtsik xi kwajat jelti max in kunkmich tajat an cheml, tajbayattsik kal jun i tajaxtalb.
40004017	Asta tam ti tm ti tujey na Jess ti tiltsix ani in ulal ench: —Ka jilaichtsik ta walablom, pos exomich ti kunel xowki nechich ti takix na Dios.
40004018	Tam ti na Jess neech ti belal waltsik an pujal xi Galilea, in chuu chb i iniktsik xin kidhbkitsik; jn jaich na Simn, xi bijyat jeye ta Pedro ani na jn a Andrs. Jech an iniktsik, kwajat in petnl nin jixb an tool ban pujal, kom jajtsik u jixom tool.
40004019	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin wwnatsik ani neech tu oktsitsik xan ti neech ka aliy an atiklbtsik xi neech ti kin bela.
40004020	Tmki jachan tin jilatsik nin jixb an tool ani kaletsik kal na Jess.
40004021	Ms asta tuwa w ani, na Jess in chuu jun chb i iniktsik xi anl jeye in kidhbkitsik. Jechtsik jaich na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo xi kwajattsik ba jun i tan kal nin tta ti lejkix tin jixb an tool. Kanyattsik kal na Jess
40004022	ani tmki jachan tin jilatsik an tan. In jilatsik jeye nin tta ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
40004023	Na Jess xeech in lonyal putl an chabl xi Galilea ani u kubl ti oktsix ban bitsowtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. In till an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios ani in jeldhl an atiklbtsik kal xowakichki i yawlch.
40004024	Chobn xanty in tajl na Jess kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Siria ani tsidhantsat ejtal xi kwajattsik kal i yajtsiktalb, xu yaultsik, xin kooltsik i chukuxtalb, xi kwajattsik ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik, xu wipipltsik ani xi yabtsik in ejtowal ka yoyon. Ani jeldhtsik kal na Jess.
40004025	Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn na Jess, wwn kal xu kwajltsik Galilea, kal xu kwajltsik ban bitsowtsik xi Dekpolis, xi Jerusaln, kal xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Judea ani kal xu kwajltsik jeye in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts kal an walja Jordn.
40005001	Tam ti na Jess in chuu ejtal an atiklbtsik, kadhiy ba chn ani buxkan. Junkun tm nin exbaliltsik malill xon ti Jaj kwajat
40005002	ani tujey ti oktsinaltsik ench kal na Jess:
40005003	—Kijidh abal xin chalpayaltsik ke in yntsal na Dios, pos neech ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
40005004	Kijidh abal xu uknaltsik, pos neech ka kijidhmdhtsik kal na Dios.
40005005	Kijidh abal xin chakltsik tinb, pos neech kin bachutsik an chabl xi usnktsik neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
40005006	Kijidh abal xita xin lenltsik kin taja xowa lujat, pos neech ka tolmiyattsik kal na Dios abal kin taja.
40005007	Kijidh abal xita xin yajnantsaltsik nin at kidhtal, pos neech jeye ka yajnantsattsik kal na Dios.
40005008	Kijidh abal xita xin kooltsik tokat nin ejattal, pos neechtsik kin chuu na Dios.
40005009	Kijidh abal xita xin ayaltsik an kijidhtalb, pos neech ka bijyattsik ti chakmlb kal na Dios.
40005010	Kijidh abal xita xu atnaltsik kal tin kwenta abal in tajltsik xowa lujat, pos neech ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
40005011	Kijidh abal tattsik, tam ki odhbijyattsik, ki atantsik ani ki utsantsik xowakich xi yab alwa maske yab tsubax kal Nanki tu kwenta.
40005012	Ki kulb ani ki kijidhmtsik abal neech ka bachutsik jun i chejwalixtalb plek t walki, pos anchan jeye ti tajtsink an tiltsixtsik xi kwajinek ms okox ke tattsik.
40005013	Tattsik ni kwajat jelti an atem abal an atiklbtsik. Max an atem ka xawm, jant ti neech ka yn? Yabich xata ti alwa, tokot abal ka wakl ani ka kchkn kal an atiklbtsik.
40005014	Tattsik ni kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal an atiklbtsik. Jun i bitsow xi kwajat ba chn, yab neech kin ejto ka chinkon.
40005015	Yab u letkoyb jun i tajbaxtalb abal ka paxkiyat kal jun i kajn, u letkoyb abal ka kwajb tekat abal kin tajbay ejtal xi kwajattsik ban at.
40005016	Anchan xan tu tajbax an tajbaxtalb, anchan teye ti ka xalka xowa alwa a tajl abal kin chuu an atiklbtsik ani anchan kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki.
40005017	Yab ka chalpaytsik ke Nan in tsinek ku wkoy nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss o xowa in jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsixtsik; yab in tsinek abal ku wkoy, in tsinek abal ku taja xan tin ulal.
40005018	Pos tsubax tu utsltsik, ke lejat kwajat an chabl ani an walki, yab neech ka wkontsat ni jun xata jech an takixtalb. Kool ka tjan okox ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh.
40005019	Jaxtm, xita kin chikat taja xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an takixtalb, maske jaich jun xata xi ms chipl ani anchan kin oktsi an atiklbtsik, chaat tajat in y neech ka kwajay xon tu takix na Dios. Por xita kin taja xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb ani jaich kin oktsixna, ultalb neech ka kwajay xon tu takix na Dios.
40005020	Pos tu utsltsik, ke max yab ka taja ms an chplb abal ka taja xowa in l na Dios k an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an fariseotsik, yab neech ka ejto ki kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
40005021	A achmaltsik ke an weje pakltsik usnk ench: “Yab ki chemdhaxin, pos xita ka chemdhaxin yejat ka ljundh kal an awiltalb.”
40005022	Pos Nan tu utsltsik ke xita kin chakuntsi nin at kidhb, yejat ka ljundh kal an awiltalbtsik. Xita kin odhbijiy nin at kidhb, yejat ka ljundh kal an Junkulom Awiltalb ani xita kin bijiy nin at kidhb ti atax inik, in tomnlich ka kale ban kibeltalb.
40005023	Jaxtm, max nechich ka kwajbantsi ti pikbantsixtalb na Dios ani taja ka chalpay ke yab i kwajat alwa kal na at kidhb,
40005024	ka jila an pikbantsixtalb tin tamt xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb ani ki kale okox ta lejkinal kal na at kidhb. Tam i lejkinkich, ki witsch tm ani ka kwajbaich an pikbantsixtalb.
40005025	Max jun xita ti ki utsbiy ani ti ki jna ban awiltalb, ki lejkintsik ti bl kal jaj abal yab ti ki jna ban ljundhom; pos max ti ki jna ban ljundhom, an ljundhom neech ti ki pidhna ban belkol wikaxte ani an belkol wikaxte neech ti ki baliy ban wikaxte.
40005026	Tsubax tu utsl, ke yab neech ki kale taja asta ka jalbiy ejtal xowa a jnl.
40005027	An weje pakltsik usnk jeye ench: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal.”
40005028	Por Nan tu utsltsik ke xita kin ltendha jun i mmlb, walbinich kal i uxmbetalb tin ejattal abal in ltendhl jachan an mmlb.
40005029	Max na ejt wal ti walbindhl, ka jixa ani ka petna; pos ms alwa ka kibdha jun peje a tul k ki petn kal ejtal na tul ban kibeltalb.
40005030	Ani max na ejt kubak ti walbindhl, ka muchiy ani ka petna; pos ms alwa ka kibdha jun peje na tul k ki petn kal ejtal na tul ban kibeltalb.
40005031	Usnktsik jeye an weje pakltsik ench: “Xita ka jlxin kal nin tomtal, yejat kin pidha nin tomtal jun i w xon tin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti neech ka jlxin.”
40005032	Por Nan tu utsltsik ke max jun i inik kin jila nin tomtal ani yab abal u junkunal kal keet, in tajlich tm ka wenkon ti junkux inik uxum; ani xu tomkinal kal jun i jiladh mmlb, u walbinalich jeye kal i uxmbetalb.
40005033	A achmaltsik jeye usnk ench an weje pakltsik: “Kool ka taja xowa a lej tsubkantsmal an Okxlb.”
40005034	Por Nan tu utsltsik ke yab yejat ka yna ni jun xata abal ka lej tsubka xata. Yab ka yna an walki abal ka lej tsubka jun xata, kom jaich jelti nin tokat kwajtal na Dios;
40005035	nibal kal an chabl, kom jelti max taja in kubl nin akan na Dios. Nibal ka lej tsubka xata kal an bitsow Jerusaln, kom jaich nin bitswil an yejche Pulek takix.
40005036	Yab jeye ka lej tsubka xata kal tat tab, pos yab neech ka ejto ka dhaknibdha o ka tunuybdha ni jun a xil.
40005037	Tam yejat ka tokoy jun xata, tokot ka ulu “ani” max ani, o “yaba” max yaba. Pos max ka puntsiy jech, an lej ataxich ti tajl ka taja anchan.
40005038	A achmaltsik jeye usnk ench an weje pakltsik: “Xan ti ki tajtsin anlki teye ti ka tajtsi.”
40005039	Por Nan tu utsltsik: Yab ka tomnatsik an inik xi atax, tokot ka tajatsik ench: max jun xita ti ki pikiy ba jun a chab, ka pidha jeye ti ki piktsi xi jun pake.
40005040	Max jun xita ti ki pjey abal in l ti ki kntsi ta xekt, ka pidha jeye kin jna na wt.
40005041	Max ki tajtsin ti chplb ka jna jun i kitlb jun kilmetro, ka jntsi chab kilmetro.
40005042	Max jun xita ti ki kontsi jun xata, ka pidha ani max ki kontsin xata matidh, ka pidhna.
40005043	A achmaltsik jeye usnk ench an weje pakltsik: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik por ka pojka xi ti atl.”
40005044	Por Nan tu utsltsik: Ka kanidha xi ti atltsik, ka lbtaja xi ti odhbijyaltsik, ka tajtsi xowa alwa xi ti atltsik ani ka kontsintsi xi ti atltsik ani ti atax tajtsaltsik.
40005045	Max ka tajatsik anchan, i chakmlbichtsik tm kal na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki; pos Jaj in tajbayal kal na kts an iniktsik xi alwa ani xi atax; ani in uldhantsal an ti b xi lujattsik ani xi yab lujattsik.
40005046	Max tokot a kanidhl xi ti kanidhltsik, Janty neech ka ta max anchan a tajltsik? Asta an bachkul jalbixtalb in tajltsik jeye anchan.
40005047	Max tokot a chapndhl na at kidhbtsik, janty exom a tajltsik watats? Pos asta xi yabtsik in exll na Dios in tajl anchan.
40005048	Ka lujkutsik tab, anchan xan ti na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki lujat Ja tajat.
40006001	Yab tokotki ka tajl xowa lujat tin tamt an atiklbtsik abalki ki chutat. Pos max ka taja anchan, na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki yab neech ti ki pidha ni jun i chejwalixtalb.
40006002	Jaxtm, tam ka pidhna i tolmixtalb, yab ka tila, jelt xan tin tajl an kambixtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani ban bl. Jech tin tajltsik anchan, jaich abal in l ka tilan alwa kal an atiklbtsik; por tsubax tu utsltsik, ke kal jachan in bachwalichtsik nin chejwalb.
40006003	Por tam tat ka pidhna i tolmixtalb, yab ka tiltsi nibal na jab; chinatki ti ka taja
40006004	ani na Tta Dios, xin chutal xowa a tajl chinatki, neech ti ki pidha an ta chejwalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
40006005	Tam ki lan, yab ka tajatsik jelt xan tin tajl an kambixtsik, xin kulbetnl ti l kubat ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani ban bl abal ka chutat kal an atiklbtsik. Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke kal jech, in bachwalich nin chejwalb.
40006006	Por tam tat ki lan, ki ochkan ba na altjil, ka mapuy an wileb ani ka lantsi na Tta Dios xi kwajat yab tejwa. Max anchan ka taja, na Tta xin chutal xowa a tajl chinatki, neech ti ki pidha an ta chejwalb.
40006007	Tam ki lan, yab ka wtskkliy jaychki jaychki xowa a ulal, jelt xan tin tajl xi yabtsik in exll na Dios abal in chalpayaltsik ke anchan neech ka axtsin kal na Dios.
40006008	Yabtsik ka taja xan ti jajtsik in tajl, pos na Tta Dios in chobich xanty a yntsaltsik, maske yabl a kontsmal.
40006009	Jaxtm, ench ki lantsik: Tta, xi kwajat walki, Tat i tokat tajat.
40006010	Ti ku takch weye. Ka tjan tech ban chabl xowa Tat a l, jelt xan tu tjnal t walki.
40006011	Ti ku pidha xo an ti kapnl xi yntsal tsudhey ka tsudhey.
40006012	Ti ku pakwlantsi an ti walab, jelt xan ti waw i pakwlantsal xita tu waltsal.
40006013	Yab ka walka ku taktamiyat, tokot ti ku beletna abal yab ku t kal an lej atax. Pos Tat ni takix, Tat na kool an chplb ani Tat ka koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
40006014	Jaxtm, max tattsik ka pakwlantsi xi ti waltsmal, na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki neech jeye ti ki pakwlantsi an ta walastalbiltsik.
40006015	Por max yab ka pakwlantsitsik xi ti waltsmal, na Tta Dios yab jeye neech ti ki pakwlantsi an ta walastalbiltsik.
40006016	Tam ki klin, yab ka tajatsik jelt xan tin tajl an kambixtsik. Jajtsik in kwajbl tepidh nin wal abal ka chutat kal an atiklbtsik ke exom ti kl. Tsubax tu utsltsik ke kal jech in bachwalichtsik nin chejwalb.
40006017	Por tat, tam ki klin, ka midhiy na wal ani ki tsitsbaxin,
40006018	abal yab ki chutat kal an atiklbtsik ke exom ta kl. Tokot ki chutat kal na Tta Dios xi kwajat yab tejwa ani Jaj, xin chutal xowa a tajl chinatki, neech ti ki pidha an ta chejwalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
40006019	Yab ka junku xata xi kajbidh in jalbl tech ti chabl. Pos xowa ka junku tech ti chabl u taklinal, u kachel ani u kwyb.
40006020	Ms alwa ka junku t walki xowa kajbidh in jalbl. Taja yab u taklinal, yab u kachel, nibal u kwyb.
40006021	Pos xon ti ka koytsik xowa xi kajbidh in jalbl, taja jeye neech ka kwajay na ejattal.
40006022	Na wal in junwal jelti nin tajbaxtal na tul. Jaxtm, max na wal alwa, putl na tul neech ka kwajay jelti max ban tajaxtalb.
40006023	Por max na wal yab alwa, ejtal na tul neech ka kwajay jelti max ban jikwaxtalb. Ani max an tajaxtalb xa kool ka wenkon ti jikwaxtalb, tunuy tajat neech ka xalkan jachan an jikwaxtalb!
40006024	Yab xita neech kin ejto kin tjontsi chb in ajtik, pos neech kin kanidha xi jn ani neech kin pojka xi jn, o neech kin tjontsi alwa xi jn ani xi jn yaba. Yab neech ka ejto ka tjontsi na Dios ani an tumnladhtalb.
40006025	Tu utsltsik: Yab ki kwajay ta chalpax kal tin kwenta xanty neech ka kapu o xanty neech ka ucha, nibal ki kwajay ta chalpax kal tin kwenta na kudhkmil. Awxe yab ms in jalbl na ejattal ke an kapnl ani na tul, ms ke na kudhkmil?
40006026	Ka tela an chichintsik xi xeech ti jumuml; yabtsik u m, yabtsik in junkuwal i kapnl, nibal in tapltsik i kapnl ba wilte; por blki u kapundhbtsik kal na Dios xi kwajat walki. Awxe yab ms a jalbltsik k an chichintsik?
40006027	Ani jita xi tattsik, max ka kwajay tajat ti chalpax kal jun xata neech kin ejto kin nakedha tinb ela chejel metro ms?
40006028	Jantki ta kwajltsik ta chalpax kal tin kwenta na kudhkmil? Ka telatsik xan tu pakel an wich xi waach ban alelb, yab u tojnaltsik nibal u dhutselix.
40006029	Por tu utsltsik ke nibal an pulek takix Salomn, kal ejtal nin tumnladhtal, yab kudhkumlink labidh jelti an wichtsik.
40006030	Max na Dios in labidhmdhl anchan an chojltsik, xi xo kwajat ban alelb ani kalm neech ka tsikan, awxe yab ms neech ti tolmiy tattsik, atiklbtsik xi yab i lej belom?
40006031	Jaxtm, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax ani ka ulutsik ench: “Janty neech ki kapu? O janty neech ki ucha? O jantokl neech ku kudhkumlin?”
40006032	Pos an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll na Dios tokot in ayaltsik ejtal jech; por na Tta Dios xi kwajat t walki, in chob ke a yntsaltsik ejtal jech.
40006033	Jaxtm, ka aliytsik okox xan ti ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani ka tajatsik xowa Jaj in l ani ejtal jech xowa a yntsaltsik neech ki pidhan.
40006034	Pos yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal tin kwenta xan ti neech ka watnatsik kalm, pos kalm neech jeye ka wachin xantokl ti ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax. Tsudhey ka tsudhey u wachinal xantokl ti ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax.
40007001	Yabtsik ka walbiy xi keet abal yab teye ki walbiyattsik kal na Dios.
40007002	Pos anchan xan ti ka walbiytsik xi keet, anchan teye ti neech ki walbiyattsik kal na Dios ani xowa ka tajtsi xi keettsik, jaychki teye neech ki tajtsintsik kal na Dios.
40007003	Jantki ta teltsal an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal ani yab a chutal an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal?
40007004	Janti neech ka ejto ka utsa na at kidhb: “ti kin walka tu jixtsi an ti elits xa kool ba na wal”, max tat ms plek an elits a kool ba na wal?
40007005	Kambix!, ka jixa okox an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal ani anchan neech tm ka ejto ka chuu alwa abal ka jixtsi an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal.
40007006	Yab ka pidha xowa tokat an atax iniktsik xin junwal jelti an piko, abal yab telab, t ka witsiy ani ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa jelti tam u katux an piko. Ani yab ka pidha xowa kajbidh in jalbl an atax iniktsik xin junwal jelti an olom, abal yab t kin kchkna.
40007007	Ka konoytsik xowa a yntsal ani neech ki pidhan kal na Dios; ka aliytsik ani neech ka ela; ka teneytsik an wileb ani neech ki japtsin.
40007008	Pos xita in konyal xowa in yntsal, in bachwal; xita in ayal, in ell ani xin tenyal an wileb, u japtsinal.
40007009	Awxe waach jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal, ke max ka kontsin ti pan kal in chakmil neech kin pidha jun i tujub?
40007010	O max ka kontsin jun i tool, kin pidha jun i chan?
40007011	Pos max tattsik, xi yabtsik i alwa inik, a witl ka pidha xowa alwa na chakmiltsik, na Tta Dios xi kwajat walki, ms Ja neech kin pidha xowa alwa xita kl ti ka kontsin.
40007012	Jaxtm, ejtal xowa a l ka chuu ki tajtsin kal an atiklbtsik, jaich teye ka tajtsi jajtsik, pos jech jaich xowa in ulal ka tajan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani xowa in dhutsmal jeye an tiltsixtsik.
40007013	Ki ochichtsik ban wileb xi xuyat. An wileb ani an bl xu jnax ban kibeltalb, chikwat ani wejat ani yn u ocheltsik taja;
40007014	por an wileb ani an bl xu jnax ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xuyat ja ani w tajat xin elltsik.
40007015	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal an kambix tiltsixtsik. Jajtsik u ulel xon ta kwajattsik jelti max i alwa iniktsik. Por alkidh tin itsch i atax iniktsik.
40007016	Tattsik neech ka exla kal xowaki in tajltsik; pos yab u pitnal i uba ba kdh, nibal u pitnal i igo ba badhuts.
40007017	Anchan jeye, ejtal an tetsik xi alwa, alwa in wall in kyal ani an tetsik xi yab alwa, yab alwa in wall in kyal.
40007018	An te xi alwa, yab neech kin ejto kin koy in wall xi yab alwa ani an te xi yab alwa, yab jeye neech kin koy in wall xi alwa.
40007019	Ejtal an tetsik xi yab in kyal in wall alwa, u kwajlb ani u tsiknal ban kamal.
40007020	Jaxtm, tattsik neech ka exla an te kal nin wallki.
40007021	Yab ejtalki xi tin utsltsik, “Ajtik, Ajtik”, neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, tokot xin tajltsik xowa in l nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
40007022	Tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, yn neech ti kin utsatsik ench: “Ajtik, Ajtik, waw i tilmal kal ta bij nin kwintal na Dios, kal tin awiltal na bij i kldhmal i atax ejattalbtsik ani i tajmal yn i labidh labandhaxtalb.”
40007023	Por neech ku utsatsik tm ench: “Yab jayki tu exlmaltsik; ki wixkintsik tech kal Nan, atiklbtsik xa tajl xowa yab alwa.”
40007024	Jaxtm, xita tin axtsal ani in tajl xowa u ulal, in junwal jelti jun i inik xi chalpadh xin kuba nin kim ba tujub.
40007025	Ulich an b, waun an ik, owtsikm an walja ani bawtsin tin akan jachan an at, por kom ba tujub ti kubat, yab kwajlan.
40007026	Por xita tin axtsal ani yab in tajl xowa u ulal, in junwal jelti jun i inik xi yab chalpadh xin kuba nin kim ba kidhib.
40007027	Ulich an b, waun an ik, owtsikm an walja ani bawtsin tin akan jachan an at ani kom ba kidhib ti kubat, julp an at ani pakudh ejtal ti jilkon.
40007028	Tam ti okon ti kw na Jess, an atiklbtsik laban tajat xin achatsik xan tu oktsix na Jess.
40007029	Pos na Jess u oktsix kal yantam i awiltalb ani yab jelti an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
40008001	Tam ti na Jess paay ban chn, kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn.
40008002	Utukn tm kal jun i inik xu yaul kal an kwajat atax tt, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, max a l, neech ka ejto ti kin jeldha kal jech an yawlch xu kool.
40008003	Takan tm kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —U l ani xo i jelch. Tokot tin ulu jech, tmki ti wkon an kwajat atax tt.
40008004	Ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka tiltsi xowa tu tajtsi, tokot ki kale, ki utey tin tamt an ple ani ka kwajba an pikbantsixtalb xan tin ulmal na Moiss abal ejtal kin chobna ke i jelch kal an yawlch xa kool.
40008005	Tam ti na Jess ochich ban bitsow xi Kapernam, utukn kal jun i oklek soldado romano ani pakabdh.
40008006	Ench ti utsan: —Ajtik, nu tojnlil ta kwachat tu kim, yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani u yajlom tajat.
40008007	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Neech kin kale abal ku jeldha.
40008008	Tkoyat ench kal an oklek soldado: —Ajtik, yab in tomnl ki ochich tu kim; tokot ka ulu abal ka jeley nu tojnlil ani neech ka jeley.
40008009	Pos nan in taknlki neye tin kwajat kal nu oklkiltsik, por u kool neye i soldadotsik xi nan u takyal. Tam ku utsa jun i soldado ka kale, u kalel, tam ku utsa keet ka tsch, u tsiil ani tam ku utsa nu tojnlil kin taja jun xata, in tajl.
40008010	Tam ti na Jess in acha jech, laban tajat ani in utsatsik ench xi kl ti wewkmte: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke putl ban chabl xi Israel yab u elmal ni jun xita xu belom jelt xan tu belom jech an inik.
40008011	Nan tu utsltsik abal yn neech ka tschtsik xon tu kalel na kts ani xon tu ochel na kts ani neech ka buxkantsik kal na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob xon tu takix na Dios.
40008012	Waach an israelitatsik xin chalpayal abal neech ka kwajay xon tu takix na Dios abalki u kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham, por neech ka kldhtsik elb ban jikwaxtalb. Taja neech ti uknaltsik ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
40008013	Utsan tm ench an oklek soldadotsik kal na Jess: —Ki kalch ani ka tjan xan ta bell. Ani tmki jachan i ora ti jeley nin tojnlil.
40008014	Na Jess kale bin kim na Pedro ani in chuu nin mm na Pedro kwachat bin waytal abal u kakl.
40008015	Taktsin tm tin kubak kal na Jess ani wkon an kaklch; chakay tm an mmlb ani tujey ti tjontsb na Jess junax kal nin exbaliltsik.
40008016	Tam ti jikwchinich, jntsin na Jess yn i atiklbtsik xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani kal nin kwintalki, in kldha ejtal an atax ejattalbtsik ani in jeldha jeye ejtal an yaultsik.
40008017	Jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an tiltsix Isaas, tam tin ulu ench: “Jaj in kitna ejtal an yawlch xi kool ani in jna an yajtsiktalb xi kool.”
40008018	Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wilidh, in ulu ka watb jun pake ja.
40008019	Utukn tm na Jess kal jun i oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani utsan ench: —Oktsix, u l tu wwna xntikichki ki kale.
40008020	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Na wx in kool nin kim ani an chichintsik in kool nin pkw; por Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab u kool xon ti kin koych.
40008021	Utsan jeye ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik: —Ajtik, neech okox ku aytsi ka chemech nu tta ani tam u jolymich, tm neech tu wwna.
40008022	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin wwnaich, jila ka jolyat an chemlomtsik kal xi yabtsik u belom.
40008023	Ochich tm na Jess ban tan ani wwn kal nin exbaliltsik.
40008024	Jun jiktowl ti tujey ti wawnal i chapik ik ban pujal ani mlkin an ja ke asta in luychiyalich an tan. Por na Jess kwajat ti wayal.
40008025	Kale tm ti bakyb kal nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench: —Ajtik, ti ku loo! Exomich tu lupnal!
40008026	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Jantki ta jikl, atiklbtsik xi w tajat ta belom? Chakay tm na Jess, in kwiya an ik ani an pujal ani tmki ti jilkon chamamadh.
40008027	An iniktsik laban tajat ani in ulutsik ench: —Jitam inik awil xi jech, ke asta kal an ik ani an pujal tu exbantsb?
40008028	Tam ti na Jess ulich jun pake ja, ban chabl xi Gadara, utukn kal chb i iniktsik xi kale ban jlimtalb. Chablam jech an iniktsik kwajat ochadhtsik kal i atax ejattalbtsik ani watatsich tajat ti ataxtsik ke nibalich xita in ejtowal ka watey ba jachan an bl.
40008029	Ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Janty a l kal waw, Jess, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios? I tsinek abal ti ku yajlombdha maske yabl in bajmal xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb?
40008030	Taja kunat ta ti xeech yn i olomtsik ti kapupl
40008031	ani an atax ejattalbtsik in pakabdha ench na Jess: —Max ti ku kldha, ti ku walka ku ochich n ban olomtsik.
40008032	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalchtsik. Kale tm an atax ejattalbtsik ban iniktsik ani ochich ban olomtsik. Tmki jachan, ejtal an olomtsik in petna tinb ba jun i chn, kwajlan ban pujal ani taja ti lupuntsik.
40008033	An belkol olomtsik, jikeytsik tajat ani jlch. Tam ti ulichtsik ban bitsow, in tilatsik ejtal jech ani xanty tmun kal an iniktsik xi ochadhtsik kal an atax ejattalbtsik.
40008034	Tam ti an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow in acha jech, kaletsik ejtal xon ti kwajat na Jess ani tam ti chutat na Jess, pakabdh abal yabich ms ka xechin ba jachan an chabl.
40009001	Balin tm na Jess ban tan, watey jun jun pake ja ani ulich bin bitswil.
40009002	Jntsin taja kwachat ba jun i chayte jun i inik xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon. Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal u belnal kal jajtsik, in utsa ench an yaul: —Paylomlb, yab ka jila tab; na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat.
40009003	Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, taltsik an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in chalpaytsik ench: “Jech in tajlich jelti max Jaj u Dios.”
40009004	Kom na Jess in chob xanty kwajat in chalpayaltsik, in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ti yab tajat alwa i chalab a kooltsik?
40009005	Pos jowa ms yab tojlb ku ulu: “Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat”, o ku ulu: “Ki chakay ani ki beley”?
40009006	Pos alwaich, neech tu xalkantsitsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb tech ti chabl abal ku pakwlantsi xi walbidhtsik. In utsa tm ench an inik xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon: —Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki kalch ta kim.
40009007	Chakay tm an inik xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani kalch tm tin kim.
40009008	Tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu jech, labantsik ani in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios abal in pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb an iniktsik.
40009009	Tam ti na Jess kale taja, in chuu jun i inik xin bij ta Mateo buxl xon tin bachwal an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma ani in utsa ench: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Chakay tm na Mateo ani in wwna na Jess.
40009010	Jun i kij, tam ti na Jess kwajat ti kapul tin kim na Mateo, ulich yn i bachkul jalbixtalb ani i walablomtsik. Jech an iniktsik buxkan jeye ti kapultsik ban mesa xon ti kwajat ti kapul na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik.
40009011	Tam ti an fariseotsik in chuu jech, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik na Jess: —Jantki tu kapul na Oktsxal kal an bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal an walablomtsik?
40009012	Tam ti na Jess in acha jech, in utsatsik ench: —Xi kwajattsik alwa ani yab u yaul, yab in yntsal i illix, por xu yaul, in yntsal.
40009013	Ki kalchtsik ani ka exbaytsik xanty in l kin ulu jech an Tokat Dhuslab: “Nan u l ka koytsik i yajnantsixtalb ani yabich u l ka pikba i chemdhats konltsik.” Pos Nan yab in tsinek ku aliy xi xeechtsik lujat, in tsinek ku aliy xi walbidhtsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom.
40009014	Utukn tm na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik na Juan xu Pujax ani konyat ench: —Jantki ti waw ani an fariseotsik jeye u kl tajat ani na exbaliltsik yab u kl?
40009015	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Awxe yejat ka kwajaytsik tepidh xi kanidhtsik ba jun i tomkixtalb, tam an tomkinl inik kwajat kal jajtsik? Yaba! Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam ka wixkintsattsik an ti tomkinl inik ani nechich jeye tm ti kltsik.
40009016	Yab xita in patskuyal jun i kej xeketlb kal jun peje i t kudhkum; pos an t kudhkum, u muchel ani in michl ms an kej kudhkum.
40009017	Nibal u balyb an t yajtsik uxnl ba kej t balixtalb; pos max ka tajan anchan, an t balixtalb u michkanal ani an yajtsik uxnl neech ka waklan. Jaxtm ti yejat ka balyat an t yajtsik uxnl ban t t balixtalb abal chablam yab ka kibchon.
40009018	Lejat kwajat ti usnaltsik kal na Jess ejtal jech, ulich jun in oklkil an judotsik, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Nu tsidhnil tall ti chemech, por max Tat ki tsch ani ka taka, neech ka ejech.
40009019	Chakay na Jess ani kale kal jachan an inik junax kal nin exbaliltsik.
40009020	Tam ti na Jess neech ti bl, utukn kal jun i mmlb xin nedhlich lajuchb i tamub ti yaul kal i lakmtalb, utey tin kx na Jess ani in taktsi tin wl nin kudhkmil.
40009021	In taja anchan abal in chalpayal ench: “Max u ejtowalak ku taktsi tin kudhkmil, neech kin jeley.”
40009022	Por na Jess chawkin, in chuu an mmlb ani in utsa ench: —Mmlb, yab ka jila tab; i jeley abal i belmch. Ani tmki jachan, jilkon jelnek an mmlb.
40009023	Tam ti na Jess ulich bin kim an oklek inik ani in chuu tojojodhich an tneltsik abal an jlmch ani an atiklbtsik chapik u uknaltsik,
40009024	in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik elb, an tsidhan yab chemnek, u wayalki ti kwajat. Tam ti achan in ulu jech, labdhn kal an atiklbtsik,
40009025	por in utsa ka kaletsik elb. Ochich tm na Jess, in tyna an tsidhan bin kubak ani chakay an tsidhan.
40009026	Jech xowa in taja na Jess, chobn putlki ba jachan an chabl.
40009027	Tam ti na Jess kale taja, wwn kal chb i jokoltsik, xi dhjaxintsik chapik ench: —Tat xi kuxlab kal na Dabid, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
40009028	Tam ti na Jess ochich ban at, utukn kal an jokoltsik ani Jaj in konoy ench: —A belltsikxe ke neech ku ejto ku taja xowa tin kontsaltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —I bell, Ajtik.
40009029	Taktsintsik tm an tin wal kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Pos ka tjan xan ta belltsik.
40009030	Chuxinichtsik tm, por utsantsik tajat ench kal na Jess: —Yab ka tilatsik jech abal yab kin chobna ni jun xita.
40009031	Por tokot ti kaletsik taja, in tila putl ba jachan an chabl xanty tajtsintsik kal na Jess.
40009032	Tam ti kalch an jokoltsik, uldhantsat na Jess jun i m xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalb.
40009033	Tam ti na Jess in kldha an atax ejattalb, an m kwinich tm. An atiklbtsik u labnal tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Yab jayki i chumal tech Israel jun xata jelti jech.
40009034	Por an fariseotsik in ulal ench: —Jech an inik in kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin awiltal in oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik.
40009035	Na Jess xeech in lonyal putl an bitsowtsik ani an kwentsaltsik ani u oktsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xi waach taja. In till an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, in jeldhl ejtalki kal xowakich i yawlch ani kal xowakichki jeye i yajtsiktalb.
40009036	Tam tin chuu yn an atiklbtsik, in kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb abal in chutal ke walbadhtsik ti kwajat ani kwajat jelti borregotsik xi yab in kool xita kl ti ka beletn.
40009037	In utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke anchan jelti tam labenek tajat nin wall an tayablb, anchan jeye ti waach tajat xita neech ti kin bela. Por anchan jelti tam w tajat an tojnaltsik waach abal kin junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb, anchan jeye w tajat waach xita kin tiltsi an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik.
40009038	Anchan jelt xan ti an dhabal tayablb in abl i tojnaltsik abal kin junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb, anchan ti ka kontsitsik na Dios kin aba xita kin tiltsi an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik.
40010001	In kaniy tm na Jess xi lajuchb nin abatwlejiltsik ani in pidha ti awiltalb abal kin kldha i atax ejattalbtsik, abal kin jeldha ejtalki kal xowakichki i yawlch ani kal xowakichki jeye i yajtsiktalb.
40010002	Jech jaich nin bij xi lajuchb an abatwletsik: na Simn, xi bijyat jeye ta Pedro ani nin kidhb Andrs; na Jakobo ani nin kidhb Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo.
40010003	Na Felipe, na Bartolom, na Toms ani na Mateo xin bachwal an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma; na Jakobo nin chakmil na Alfeo ani na Lebeo, xu bijyb jeye Tadeo.
40010004	Na Simn, xu taknal ban junkuntalb xu bijyb kananista ani na Judas Iskariote, xi tayl kl ti pidhn na Jess abal ka chemdh.
40010005	Na Jess in aba jech lajuchb, kal jech an punkuntsixtalb: —Yab ki kaletsik ban chabl xon tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo, nibal ki ochich ban bitsowtsik xi Samaria.
40010006	Ki kaletsik okox ban yejche bitsow Israel abal ka aliy xi yabtsik u belom.
40010007	Xon ti ki watey, ka tilltsik abal exomich ti kunel xowki na Dios neech kin takch an atiklbtsik.
40010008	Ka jeldha an yaultsik, ka ejdha an chemlomtsik, ka jeldhatsik xin kool an kwajat atax tt ani ka kldha an atax ejattalbtsik. Kom aniki ta bachmaltsik jech an awiltalb, aniki jeye ti ka tajatsik xowakich an alwatalb.
40010009	Ki kaletsik mapats, yab ka jnatsik i tumn
40010010	nibal i morrl. Yab ka jnatsik yn a xekt nibal yn a pajab, tokot xa kwajbm, nibal ka jnatsik a kwayab; pos an tojnal in tomnl ka kapundh xon tu tjontsix.
40010011	Tam ki ulichtsik ba jun i bitsow o ba jun i kwentsal, ka aliytsik jun xita xi alwa inik ani taja ki kwajaytsik bin kim asta kin bajaw xowki ti ki kaletsik taja.
40010012	Tam ki ochichtsik ba jachan an kimdh, ki chapndhaxintsik ench: “Ki kwajaytsik kijidh.”
40010013	Max an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an at in tomnl kin bachutsik jech an chapndhomtalb, neech ka kwajaytsik kijidh, por max yab in tomnltsik kin bachu, yab neech ka kwajaytsik kijidh.
40010014	Max yab ki bachwattsik nibal ki len ki axtsintsik, ki kaletsik tm ba jachan an at o ba jachan an bitsow ani ka tiniytsik an pojodh xi palenek ba na akan.
40010015	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu jachan an bitsow k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek ban chabl xi Sodoma ani Gomorra.
40010016	Ka achatsik! Tu abl ka tilatsik an alwa tilab xon ti waach i atiklbtsik xi atax. Jelti max exom u abl i borregotsik xon ti waach i padhumtsik. Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta jelt xan tin tajl an chan por ka chakatsik tajat tab jelt xan tin tajl an kukutsik.
40010017	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta, pos neech ki pidhntsik ban awiltalb kal an atiklbtsik xi atax ani neech ki lekbayattsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
40010018	Ani asta neech ki jntsik tin tamt i pakdha awiltalb ani tin tamt i pakdha takix kal Nanki tu kwenta. Anchan neech tm ka ejtotsik ti kin tila tin tamt an awiltalbtsik ani tin tamt xi yabtsik u judo.
40010019	Por tam ki pidhntsik ban awiltalb, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal tin kwenta xanty neech ka ulutsik o xan ti neech ki tkontsik; pos tam kin bajch xowki neech ta ljundhbtsik kal an awiltalb, na Dios neech ti ki ltsi xan ti yejat ki tkontsik.
40010020	Pos yab tattsik neech ta kw, neech ti kw nin Tokat Ejattal na Tta Dios.
40010021	An iniktsik neech kin pidhna nin kidhb abal ka chemdh ani an ttalbtsik neech kin pidhna nin chakmil abal ka chemdh. An chakmlbtsik neech kin tomna nin tta ani nin nna ani neech kin taja abal ka chemdhtsik.
40010022	Neech ki atantsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom kal Nanki tu kwenta; por xita kin kuxuy ejtal jech, neech ka lowat.
40010023	Tam ki atantsik ba jun i bitsow, ki kaletsik pl; pos tsubax tu utsltsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin tsch jun tam tattsik yabl a lonymal ejtal in bitswil an israelitatsik.
40010024	Ni jun i exbal ms u awil ke nin oktsxal ani ni jun i tjontsix ms uluts ke nin ajtik.
40010025	Abal an exbal, lejatich jeye max in bajch jelti nin oktsxal ani an tjontsix jelti nin ajtik. Max Nan, xin kwajat jelti max tin ttatsik, in bijyb tin lej atax, jan ti neech ki bijyat tattsik xi kwajat jelti max tu chakmiltsik?
40010026	Jaxtm, yab yejat ka jikna an atiklbtsik. Pos yab waach ni jun xata xi yab neech ka chutat, nibal waach xata chinat xi yab neech ka chobn tayl.
40010027	Xowa tu utsltsik xon ti yab tejwa, ka ulutsik xon ti tejwa ani xowa tu utsltsik chinat, ka ulutsik xon ti yn kin achatsik.
40010028	Yab ka jikna an chemdhaxtsik, pos tokot in ejtowal ti ki chemdhantsi an ta tul ani yab in ejtowal ti ki chemdhantsi an ta ejattal. Ka jiknatsik na Dios xin ejtowal ti ki chemdhantsi an ta ejattal ani ti ki petnantsi an ta tul ban kibeltalb.
40010029	Yabxe u nujwb chb i chichintsik kal w i tumn? Por ni jn xi jachan an chichintsik yab neech ka kwajlan max na Tta Dios yab anchan tin l.
40010030	Pos asta na xil xa kooltsik ba na k ajidh ti kwajat.
40010031	Pos yabtsik p ka jikna ni jun xita, tattsik ms yn a jalbl k yantam i chichintsik.
40010032	Xita yab kin tidhena ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, Nan yab neye neech ku tidhena ku tila tin tamt nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
40010033	Por xita kin tidhena ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, neech neye ku tidhena ku tila tin tamt nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
40010034	Yab ka chalpaytsik ke Nan in tsinek tech ti kayl abal ku tsidha i kijidhtalb; pos yab anchan, in tsinek abal ku tsidha i pjxtalb.
40010035	In tsinek abal ku pjxlindha an kwitl kal nin tta, an tsidhan kal nin nna ani an albe kal nin mm.
40010036	Ani anchan, xi kwajattsik ba jun i at, jajkitsik neech ti pjx.
40010037	Xita in kanidhl ms nin tta o nin nna ke Nan, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay kal Nan; xita in kanidhl ms nin chakmiltsik ke Nan, yab jeye neech kin ejto ka kwajay kal Nan
40010038	ani xita ti kin wwna por in chejnl ka chemdh, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay kal Nan.
40010039	Xita in l kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha; por xita kin kibdha nin xechintal kal Nan tu kwenta, neech kin loo.
40010040	Xita ti ki bachutsik, Nan tin bachwal ani xita ti kin bachu Nan, in bachwalich xi tin abmal.
40010041	Xita kin bachu jun i tiltsix abal in chob ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech kin bachu i chejwalixtalb jelti xi neech kin bachu jun i tiltsix; xita kin bachu jun i lujat inik abal in chob ke i lujat inik, neech kin bachu i chejwalixtalb jelti xi neech kin bachu jun i lujat inik.
40010042	Ani xita kin pidha jun tu ti chamay ja jn ti b xi jechtsik abal in chob ke Nan u exbalil, neech jeye kin bachu nin chejwalb.
40011001	Tam ti na Jess okon kin takiy xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik, kale ban kwentsaltsik xi kwajat ba jachan an chabl abal kin oktsitsik ani kin tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab.
40011002	Tam ti na Juan xi balidh ban wikaxte in acha xowa in tajl na Kristo, in aba in exbaliltsik abal ka kale kin chuu na Jess
40011003	ani kin konoy ench: —Tatichxe kwa xi bijidh neech ka tsch o yejat ki aytsi keet?
40011004	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ki kaletsik ani ka ltsi na Juan xowa exomtsik a chutal ani a achl.
40011005	Ka ltsi abal an jokoltsik u chuxinal, an kwechetsik u jell, xin kooltsik an kwajat atax tt u jell, xi yabtsik u ochox u ochxinal, an chemlomtsik u ejdhb ti t ani an chojontltsik u tiltsinal an ti alwa tilab.
40011006	Kijidh tajat abal xita ti kin bela ani yab kin jila ti kin bela.
40011007	Tam ti nin exbaliltsik na Juan kalch, na Jess tujey kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Juan, ench tin utsatsik: —Janty i kaletsik ka chuu ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh? Jun i pakb xi kwajat ti wawyb kal i ik?
40011008	Max yaba, janty i kaletsik ka chuu? Jun i inik xi xeketlidh kal i alwa kudhkum? Tattsik a chob ke xu xeketlinaltsik kal i alwa kudhkum u kwajltsik bin kim i pakdha takix.
40011009	Max yab anchan, janty i kaletsik ka chuu? Jun i tiltsix? Jaich, ani jaich jun xita xi ms plek k jun i tiltsix.
40011010	Na Juan jaich xu tilnal ench kal an Tokat Dhuslab: Neech ku okxiy nu abatwlejil abal ti ki tojojontsi an ti bl.
40011011	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajinekich asta xo, yab jayki wachink jun xita ms ultalb k na Juan xu pujax; por tu utsltsik, xi ms chaat in y xon tu takix na Dios, ms ja ultalb k na Juan xu pujax.
40011012	Asta ti tsch na Juan xu pujax abal kin tila an alwa tilab ani asta xo, waach xin tajltsik an chplb abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani jaich jajtsik xi neech ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
40011013	Ejtal an tiltsixtsik ani nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in lnmal xowa na Dios neech kin taja asta ti tsch na Juan
40011014	ani max tattsik a l ka bela, na Juan jaich an tiltsix Elas xi bijidh neech ka tsch.
40011015	Xin kooltsik in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay.
40011016	Jantokl neech ku ejto ku junbay an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij? In junwal jelti an chakamtsik xu buxkanal ti ubt chejel bitsow ani in dhjayal nin at ubttsik ench:
40011017	“I jutsuy an chl ani yab i bixmchtsik; i ajatna i tepidh ajatlb ani yab i ukintsik.”
40011018	Pos tsch na Juan, xi yab u kapul nibal u uchal ani a ulutsik ke in kool i atax ejattalb.
40011019	Tayl in tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, xin kapul ani in uchal ani a ulutsik abal in kapma ani in uchal tajat, ke u jab i walablomtsik ani xin bachwaltsik i jalbixtalb. Por nin chalpadhtal na Dios u xalkanal kal xowa in tajl jun xita xu dhabalb kal Jaj.
40011020	Tujey tm kin kwiya na Jess an atiklbtsik xon tin tajmal ms yn an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik, abal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja, yab in jilmaltsik ti walablom. In ulu ench:
40011021	—Chojontl a chubl, atiklbtsik xi kwajl Korasn! Chojontl a chubl, atiklbtsik xi kwajl Betsayda! Abal max an labidh labandhaxtalb xi tjnk ba tattsik, tjnkak ban bitsowtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn, an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja, owenekichak tin jalkuymaltsik nin chalab, in kwajbmalichaktsik nin kodhow kudhkmil ani buxkankichaktsik ba kwixix abal kin xalka ke in jilmalichtsik ti walablom.
40011022	Jaxtm tu utsltsik ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ms plek an yajtsiktalb neech ka bachutsik k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn.
40011023	Ani tattsik xi kwajl Kapernam, a chalpayalxe ke neech ki tekb asta walki? Yaba! Neech ki petntsik asta ban kibeltalb. Abal max an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xi tjnk ba tattsik, tjnkak ban bitsow xi Sodoma, an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek ba jachan an bitsow, blak jeye ta kwajattsik.
40011024	Jaxtm tu utsltsik ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ms plek an yajtsiktalb neech ka bachutsik k an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek ban bitsow xi Sodoma.
40011025	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Jess in ulu ench: —Tta, xa takyal an walki ani an chabl, tu kaknl abal a xalkantsmal xin chakltsik tinb xowa yab a xalkantsmal xi chalpadhtsik ani u witomtsik.
40011026	Tta, anchan ta taja, kom anchan ta lena.
40011027	Nu Tta tin pidhmalich ejtal xowa waach. Yab xita kl tu exlb an Chakmlb, tokot kal an Ttalb ani yab xita in exll an Ttalb, tokot u exlb kal an Chakmlb ani xita an Chakmlb in l kin pidha kin exla.
40011028	Ki uteytsik kal Nan, ejtal tattsik xi kwajat i walbidh ani neech tu wixkintsi an ta walab; jelti jun xita xu wkontsb tin kitl abal ka koych.
40011029	Ki kwajaytsik teye jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat. Ka tajatsik xowa a chutal u tajl ani ka chaka tab jelt xan ti Nan u chakl tub. Max ka tajatsik anchan, neech tm ka kwajch alwa na ejattal.
40011030	Pos xowa Nan tu utsltsik ka taja, yab tojlb ani yab altsik.
40012001	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Jess neech ti belal tin ktsjil an koyxnich xon ti tayadh i trigo. Nin exbaliltsik kaay ani tujeytsik kin puu an trigo ani kin kapu.
40012002	Tam ti an fariseotsik in chuu jachan, in utsatsik ench na Jess: —Na exbaliltsik exom in tajl i tojlb xi yab alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil i koyxnich.
40012003	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe a ajymal xanty in taja jun i kij na Dabid tam ti jaj ani nin juniktsik kaay?
40012004	Ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in kapu an pan xi pikbantsidh na Dios. Jech an pan yab in tomnl kin kapu na Dabid nibal nin juniktsik, tokot in tomnl kin kapu an pletsik.
40012005	O yab a ajymaltsik bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, ke an pletsik xi kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, yab u koyoltsik tam in ktsjil an koyxnich ani yab walats xowa in tajltsik?
40012006	Pos tu utsltsik ke tech kwajat jun xita ms plek k an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
40012007	Tattsik yab a exbaymal xanty in l kin ulu jech an Tokat Dhuslab: “Yabich u l ka chemdhatsik i konl abal ti kin pikbantsi, u l ki kndhxintsik.” Max a exbayalaktsik, yabich neech ka walbiytsik ni jun xita xi yab in tajmal ni jun xata yab alwa.
40012008	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb abal ku ulu xowa alwa ka tajan tin ktsjil an koyxnich.
40012009	Kale tm na Jess taja ani kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
40012010	Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xin kool jun in kubak teytemadh ani kom u lenb ka eltsin jun xata xantokl ti ka walbiyat na Jess, konyat ench: —Alwaxe ka jeldh jun i yaul tin ktsjil i koyxnich?
40012011	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Jita xi tattsik a kidhtal, max in kool jun i borrego ani ka balkin ba jun i cholax chabl tin ktsjil an koyxnich, yab neech ka kale kin jixa?
40012012	Pos ms yn in jalbl jun i inik k jun i borrego. Jaxtm, tu utsltsik ke alwa ka tajan xowa alwa tin ktsjil an koyxnich.
40012013	Utsan tm ench an inik kal na Jess: —Ka lujku na kubak. Ani tam tin lujku nin kubak, jeley, jilkon alwa jelti na jn nin kubak.
40012014	Kale tm an fariseotsik ani tujey kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
40012015	Tam ti na Jess in chobna jech, kale ani kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn. Na Jess in jeldhl ejtalki an yaultsik,
40012016	ani in utsltsik abal yab kin tilatsik xitam j jeye Jaj.
40012017	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an tiltsix Isaas tam tin ulu ench:
40012018	Jech jaich nu tjontsixil, xi Nan u takwymal, xi Nan u kanidhl ani in kulbl tajat kal Jaj. Neech ku kwajba nu Tokat Ejattal ba Jaj ani neech kin tiltsi ejtal an atiklbtsik ke neech ku ljundhatsik.
40012019	Yab neech ti pjx, nibal neech ti tilom kawidh, nibal neech ka axtsin tin kwintal kal ni jun xita ban bltsik.
40012020	Yab neech kin peja nibal ela jun i maidh pakb, nibal neech kin tepdha an kamal xi xowy tajat exom ti letkonal, asta tam kin bajch an kij xowki Jaj neech ti takix in lujtalki.
40012021	Ani ejtal an atiklbtsik neech kin kwajba nin aytsixtal ba Jaj.
40012022	Jntsin tm na Jess jun i jokol inik ani m xi kwajat teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb. Jeldh kal na Jess ani an inik kwin ani chuxin.
40012023	Ejtal an atiklbtsik laban ani in ulutsik ench: —Awxe jaich jech nin kuxtal na Dabid?
40012024	Por tam ti an fariseotsik in acha jech, in ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik in kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin awiltalki an lej atax, nin oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik.
40012025	Kom na Jess in chob xanty na kwajat ti chalpantsb, in utsatsik ench: —Max jun i bitsow ka kxin kwene ti kwene ani ka pjxin jajkitsik, neech ka okon. Ani max jun i kwentsal o jun i kimdh ka kxin, yab neech ka kwajay owat.
40012026	Anchan jeye, max an lej atax kin kldhl tinb xi kwajat bin ejattal jun i inik, exomich tm in kel tinb; max kin taja anchan, jan ti neech kin ejto ka kwajay owat ti takix?
40012027	Tattsik a ulal ke Nan u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin awiltal an lej atax; pos max anchanak, jita kl tu pidhnal ti awiltalb xi tattsik ti wwnl abal kin kldha an atax ejattalbtsik? Jaxtm, jajtsik ti xalkantsal abal i ukpinktsik ta kwajat.
40012028	Por Nan u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin chp nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios ani jech, in l kin ulu ke xan tu takix na Dios ulnekich xon ta kwajattsik.
40012029	Pos, jan ti neech kin ejto jun xita ka ochich bin kim jun i likat inik ani kin kntsi xowa in kool, max yab kin wika okox? Tokot neech kin ejto kin kntsi xowa in kool, max kin wika okox.
40012030	Xita yab junax kal Nan, tin atl. Ani xita yab tin tolmiyal ku utu an atiklbtsik ba na Dios, jachan, jaich xin tajl abal an atiklbtsik yab ka utey ba na Dios.
40012031	Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ke an iniktsik neech ka pakwlantsat xowakichki i walastalb kin taja ani xowakichki i odhbijixtalb kin ulu; por max kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab neech ka pakwlantsat.
40012032	Xita tin odhbijiy Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ka pakwlantsat; por xita kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab jayki neech ka pakwlantsat, neech ka jilkon walbidh malill i kij.
40012033	Max an te alwa, alwa in wall in kyal ani max an te yab alwa, yab alwa in wall in kyal. Pos an te, kal in wallki tu exlb.
40012034	Tattsik a junwal jelti an chan. Janti neech ka ejto ka ulutsik xowa alwa, max tattsik yab i alwa? Pos na wi in ulal xowa waach ta ejattal.
40012035	An alwa inik, in ulal xowa alwa, kom alwa xowa waach tin ejattal ani an atax inik, in ulal xowa atax, kom atax xowa waach tin ejattal.
40012036	Por tu utsltsik, ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ejtaltsik neech ka ljundh kal tin kwenta an ani tilab xin ulmaltsik.
40012037	Pos kal xowaki in ulmal kl ti neech ka chutat max walbidh o yaba.
40012038	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal taltsik i fariseotsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss: —Oktsix, i l ki chuu ka taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal ti exl.
40012039	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —An atiklbtsik xi atax ani u walablom, in konyal jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal ti exl; por yab neech ka pidhan ms ti exl, tokot xan ti tmun kal an tiltsix Jons.
40012040	Pos anchan xan ti na Jons kwajay x a kts ani x i akal alkidh bin tsukul an yejche tool, anchan neye Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin kwajay x a kts ani x i akal alkidh ban chabl.
40012041	Tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Nnibe, neech ka ejechtsik ti t ani neech kin walbiy an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij. Pos an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Nnibe, in jilatsik ti walablom tam ti tiltsin an tin kwintal na Dios kal na Jons. Ani xo tech kwajat jun xita ms plek k na Jons.
40012042	Tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, an pulek takix mmlb xi all, neech ka ejech ti t ani neech kin walbiy an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij. Pos jech an mmlb tsch w chabl abal kin axtsi tin chalpadhtal na Salomn. Ani xo tech kwajat jun xita ms plek k na Salomn.
40012043	Tam jun i atax ejattalb ka kale ba jun i inik, u xechinal ban waynek chabltsik in ayal xon ti ka koych; ani max yab kin ela, in chalpayal ench:
40012044	“Neech kin witsiy ban inik xon tin kalnek.” Tam ka witsiy, in ell jachan an inik jelti jun i at xi yab kwajtsidh, kwetodh ani lejkikidh.
40012045	Neech tm jun ka kale ani neech kin iki bk i atax ejattalbtsik xi ms atax k jaj ani ejtal neech ka ochichtsik ti kwajl ba jachan an inik. Jachan an inik neech tm ka jilkon ms kibenek k tam ti kwajatwiik. Anchan jeye neech ka tmun kal jech an atiklbtsik xi atax.
40012046	Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess kal an atiklbtsik, tam ti ulich nin nna ani nin kidhbtsik abal in ltsik ti tiloll kal na Jess. Kom elb ti jilkontsik,
40012047	kale ti ltsinal na Jess kal jun xita ani utsan ench: —Na nna ani na kidhbtsik n kwajat elb ani in ltsik ti tiloll kal Tat.
40012048	Por Jaj in tkoy ench xi kl ti kalnek ti usnal: —Jitam j nu nna ani jitam j nu kidhbtsik?
40012049	In tstsbiy tm nin exbaliltsik ani in ulu ench: —Jechtsik jaich xi kwajattsik jelti nu nna ani nu kidhbtsik.
40012050	Pos xita in tajl xowa in l nu Tta xi kwajat walki, jachan, jaich nu kidhb, nu ixm ani nu nna.
40013001	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Jess kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kale ti buxkanal bin wl an pujal.
40013002	Kom yn i atiklbtsik junkun xon ti kwajat, ochich na Jess ba jun i tan ani buxkan. Ani ejtal an atiklbtsik jilkon bin waltsik an ja.
40013003	In oktsitsik tm yn xata kal i junbaxtalbki. Ench tin utsatsik: —Jun i inik kale ti bkul iyalb,
40013004	tam ti neech an ti bkul iyalb, taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ba bl, ulich an chichintsik ani in kapu an iyalb.
40013005	Taltsik kwajlan ba tujublom, xon ti yab lej waach i lukuk ani jachan an iyalbtsik jikat ti ixkan abal an chabl yab lej owtsik.
40013006	Por tam ti yajb an kakal, tsikan ani kom yab ibidh, wayey.
40013007	Taltsik kwajlan ba kdhlom, pakey an kdhtsik ani paxkiyat an tayablb.
40013008	Por w an iyalb, kwajlan ban chabl xi alwa ani labey tajat; taltsik, kal jn tokot i itsixlek, in koy bo inik i itsixlek. Taltsik ox inik i itsixlek ani taltsik jun inik lju i itsixlek.
40013009	Max a kooltsik a ochoxtal alwa, ka exbaytsik!
40013010	Utukn tm na Jess kal an exbaltsik ani konyat ench: —Jantki ta tawnl an atiklbtsik kal i junbaxtalbki?
40013011	Tkoyattsik ench: —Tattsik, ti pidhl na Dios ka chobna xowa in kool yab tejwa kal tin kwenta xan ti Jaj tu takix; por jajtsik yab u pidhnal kin chobna.
40013012	Xita xin bachmalich an alwa tilab, neech ka pidhan kin chobna ms; por xita xi yab in bachmal, neech ka wixkintsat xowa in chalpayal in kool w.
40013013	Jaxtm tu tawnltsik kal i junbaxtalbki; pos jajtsik in chutal, por u jilkonaltsik jelti max yab xata in chumal; in achltsik, por yabtsik xata in exbayal, jelti max yab xata in achltsik.
40013014	Anchan, u tmnalich kal jajtsik jelt xan tin ulmal an tiltsix Isaas ench: Neech ka achatsik, por yab neech ka exbay; neech ka chuutsik, por jelti max yab a chutal.
40013015	Abal nin itsch jech an atiklbtsik in chapikmdhmal tajat, wetsik tajat tin achltsik kal nin ochoxtal. Ani mututsik tin kool nin wal; abal yab ka chuxintsik kal nin wal, ani yab ka ochxintsik kal nin ochoxtal, nibal kin exbaytsik kal nin itsch, ani nibal ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku jeldha.
40013016	Por kijidh abal tattsik, abal i chuuxtsik ani i ochoxtsik.
40013017	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke yn i tiltsix ani i alwa iniktsik in lenmal kin chuu xowa tattsik a chutal, por yab in chumaltsik; in lenmaltsik kin acha xowa tattsik a achl, por yab in achmal.
40013018	Pos ka achatsik xanty in l kin ulu an junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta an m inik.
40013019	Taltsik an atiklbtsik in achl an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, por kom yabtsik in exbayal, u ulel an lej atax ani u wkontsb an ti tsubaxtalb xin bachmal tin itsch. Jech an atiklbtsik in junwal jelti an iyalbtsik xi kwajlan ban bl.
40013020	Taltsik an atiklbtsik, tam kin acha an tsubaxtalb in bachwal kal yantam i kulbtalb, por tam ka taktamiyat o ka atan kal tin kwenta jech an tsubaxtalb, in jilltsik jech an tsubaxtalb.
40013021	Jech an atiklbtsik in junwal jelti an iyalb xi kwajlan ban tujublom, kom yab owtsik nin ibl tin kool, yab u owel. Pos tam kin acha i yajtsiktalb o ka atan kal tin kwenta abal in belmal nin kwintal na Dios, in jilltsik kin bela.
40013022	Taltsik an atiklbtsik in achl an tsubaxtalb, por u chalpaxtsik tajat kal tin kwenta xowa waach ban kayl, u kambiybtsik kal an tumn ani yabtsik u walkanal kin taja kl xowa alwa. Jech an atiklbtsik in junwal jelti an iyalb xi kwajlan ban kdhlom, u paxkiyb kal an kdh ani yab u walkanal ka walin.
40013023	Taltsik an atiklbtsik xin achl an tsubaxtalb, in exbayal ani in tajltsik tajat xowa alwa, in junwal jelti an iyalb xi kwajlan ban alwa chabl ani labey tajat. Taltsik in junwal jelti an itsixlek xin koy bo inik i itsixlek, taltsik jelti xin koy ox inik lju ani taltsik jelti xin koy jun inik lju.
40013024	Tiltsintsik jeye kal na Jess jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Xan tu takix na Dios, in junwal jelti jun i inik xin taya i alwa iyalb bin ale;
40013025	por tam ti ejtalich u wayaltsik, ulich jun xita xi kl tu atnal an dhabal ani taytsin ti atax chojl xon tin taymal an trigo ani tam tin taymalich, kale.
40013026	Tam ti pakey an trigo ani tuunich, xalkan jeye an atax chojl.
40013027	Kaletsik tm an tojnaltsik kin utsa ench an dhabal: “Ajtik, max i alwa iyalb a taymal ba na ale, jn p tm ti tsinek an atax chojl?”
40013028	Utsantsik ench kal an dhabal: “Jun xita xi tin atl in tajmal jech.” Konyat tm ench kal an tojnaltsik: “A lxe ku kale ki puu an atax chojl?”
40013029	Por utsantsik ench: “Yaba, pos max ka puu an atax chojl, neech jeye ka pun an trigo.
40013030	Jila ka pakey chablamki asta kin bajaw xowki ti neech ki junku an trigo; tam neech ki junkch an trigo, neech ku utsa ench an tojnaltsik: Ka junku okox an atax chojl ani ka kwajba ti wiketsik abal ka tsikan; por an trigo ka junku abal ka tap ban wilte.”
40013031	Tiltsintsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun in itsch i mostasa xi jun i inik in tayl bin ale.
40013032	Jech jaich an iyalb xi ms chipl k xi keet an iyalbtsik, por tam ka ixkan ani ka pubey, u pubel tajat k xi keet an tayablbtsik ani u kwenal tajat. U ulel an chichintsik ani in tajl taja nin pkw.
40013033	Tiltsintsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye xi jun i mmlb in xukyal kal ox lejab i cheedh trigo ani in jilbdhl ejtal an xokadh cheedh trigo.
40013034	Na Jess in tiltsi ejtal jech an atiklbtsik kal i junbaxtalbki, yab in tila xata xi yab kal i junbaxtalb.
40013035	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal ench an tiltsix: Neech tin kw kal i junbaxtalbki, neech ku tila xata xowa kwajinek chinat asta tam ti na Dios in tajm an kayl.
40013036	Tam ti na Jess in utsaich an atiklbtsik abal ka kalch, Jaj ochich alt. Utukn tm kal nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench: —Ti ku wiltsi an ti junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta an atax chojl xi tayan ban alelb.
40013037	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Xita nin tayl an alwa iyalb, jaich Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40013038	An alelb, jaich an kayl; an alwa iyalb, jaich an atiklbtsik xin walkl tinb ka takyat kal na Dios ani an atax chojl, jaich an atiklbtsik xu dhabalb kal an lej atax.
40013039	Xita nin taya an atax chojl, jaich an lej atax. Xowki ti neech ka junkuwat an trigo, jaich an pakwenib; ani an junkuxtsik, jaich an tokat abatwletsik.
40013040	Anchan jelt xan tu junkuwb an atax chojl ani u petnb ban kamal abal ka taay, anchan jeye neech ka tmun tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
40013041	Xi Nanich xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku aba nu tokat abatwlejiltsik kin junku xi kwajattsik xon ti Nan in takix, xu walbindhaxtsik ani xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
40013042	Neech ka petntsik ban kamal, neech ti uknaltsik ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
40013043	Jachan i kij, xi kwajatichtsik alwa kal na Dios, neech ka kwajaytsik xon tu takix an Ttalb; neech ka xalkantsik chaxixl, jelti nin chaxixltal na kts. Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin acha xowa u ulal.
40013044	Xan tu takix na Dios, in junwal jelti tumn xi jolidh ba jun i alelb, xi jun i inik in ell ani in chinl jun tyki; ani kulbenek kal jech tin kwenta, u kalel kin nuju ejtal xowa in kool ani in chayal jachan an chabl.
40013045	Anl jeye, xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i chaum inik xi xeech in ayal i perlatsik xi alwa tajat.
40013046	Tam tin ela jun i perla xi kajbidh tajat in jalbl, kale kin nuju ejtal xowa in kool ani in chaay jachan an perla xi kajbidh tajat in jalbl.
40013047	Anl jeye, xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun in jixb i tool xu petnb ban pujal ani in yakwl xowakich i tooltsik.
40013048	Tam ka ykwanich yn an tooltsik, an jixom tooltsik in kldhl walte nin jixb an tool. Taja u buxkanaltsik ti tkul an ti tool, xi alwa in balyal ban toknaltsik ani xi yab alwa in petnl.
40013049	Anchan jeye neech ka tmun tam kin bajaw an pakwenib; neech ka kale an tokat abatwletsik kin takuy an atiklbtsik xi atax ani xi alwa.
40013050	Xi ataxtsik neech ka petn ban kamal, taja neech ti uknaltsik ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
40013051	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —A exbayaltsikxe ejtal jech? Jajtsik tkon ench: —I exbayal, Ajtik.
40013052	Utsantsik tm ench: —Tam jun i oktsix xin exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kin exla jeye xan tu takix na Dios, in junwal jelti jun xita xin kool xata kajbidh in jalbl.
40013053	Tam ti na Jess in okoy kin tila jech an junbaxtalbtsik, kale.
40013054	Ulich bin chablil ani in tuju ti oktsix ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Ejtal xin achltsik xan tu oktsix, u labnal ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jn tin witmal jech an inik ejtal jech xowa in oktsixnl? Jan tin ejtowal kin taja jech an labidh labandhaxtalb?
40013055	Pos jech jaich nin chakmil an dhakm ani nin nna jaich na Mara. In kidhb na Jakobo, na Jos, na Simn ani na Judas
40013056	ani nin ixmtsik tech jeye u kwajl xon ti waw u kwajl. Pos, jn p tm tin witmal ejtal jech?
40013057	Jaxtm ti yab len ka tajan ti kij. Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Putlki tu kaknb jun i tiltsix, tokotki bin chablil ani kal xu kwajltsik bin kim ti yab u kaknb.
40013058	Ani yab in taja yn i labidh labandhaxtalb taja, kom yab u belnal kal jajtsik.
40014001	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Erodes, xi kwajat ti takix Galilea, in acha u tilnal na Jess
40014002	ani in utsatsik ench xi ttsik ti kwajat kal jaj: —Jachan jaich xna na Juan xu pujax, xi ejnek ti t. Jaxtm tin kool an chplb kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik.
40014003	Jech na Erodes in ulmal ka yakwan na Juan ani ka balyat wikadh ban wikaxte. In taja anchan kal tin kwentaki na Erodas, nin tomtal nin kidhb Felipe.
40014004	Na Juan in utsmal ench na Erodes: —Yab alwa ki junkun kal nin tomtal na kidhb.
40014005	Na Erodes in l kin chemdha na Juan, por in jiknl an atiklbtsik abal ejtal in chobtsik ke na Juan kal a Dios ti abadh ti tiltsix.
40014006	Por tam ti na Erodes in ajbna nin tambil, nin tsidhnil na Erodas bixmch tin tamt an ajblomtsik ani in kulbetna tajat na Erodes
40014007	ke in utsa tsubax tajat ke neech kin pidha xowa ka kontsin.
40014008	Utsan tm an tsidhan kal nin nna abal kin utsa ench na Erodes: —Ti kin pidha ba jun i talab nin k na Juan xu pujax.
40014009	Tam ti an pulek takix Erodes in acha jech, tepin; por kom in lej tsubax ulmal ani axnk kal an ajblomtsik, in ulu abal ka pidhan xowa in konyal.
40014010	In ulu ka kotsin tin k na Juan ban wikaxte
40014011	ani tm ti tsidh ba jun i talab. Pidhanich tm an tsidhan ani an tsidhan in pidha nin nna.
40014012	Ulich tm nin exbaliltsik na Juan ani in jnatsik kin joliy nin putll nin tul na Juan ani tayl kaletsik kin ltsi na Jess.
40014013	Tam ti na Jess in chobna jech, balin kwetm ba jun i tan ani kale ba jun i chabl xon ti yab xita waach. Por an atiklbtsik in chobna abal kale na Jess ani kaletsik jeye belal abal kin wwna.
40014014	Tam ti na Jess kale ban tan, in chuu abal yn an atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat, in kontsitsik ti yajnantsixtalb ani in jeldha xu yaultsik.
40014015	Tam ti exomich ti jikwchinal, utey an exbaltsik ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Dhamlich ani tech yab xita u kwajl. Ka utsa an atiklbtsik ka kalch abal ka kale ban kwentsaltsik kin chaay i kapnl.
40014016	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab yejat ka kaletsik; tattsik ka kapundha.
40014017	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Yab i kool tech yn i kapnl, tokot b i pan ani chb i tool.
40014018	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka tsidha tech.
40014019	In utsa tm an atiklbtsik ka buxkan ban tm. In tyna xi b an pan ani xi chb an tool, in tela walki, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios. In peja tm an pan ani in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani jajtsik in pidhaich tm an atiklbtsik.
40014020	Ejtal kapchtsik asta ajw ani tayl in tsutsiytsik lajuchb i toknal kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon.
40014021	Bo mil iniktsik xna xi kapch, yab ajidh i mmlbtsik nibal i chakamtsik.
40014022	Tayl, na Jess in utsa nin exbaliltsik ka balin ban tan abal ka okxinichtsik ka watey ban pujal ani ka kale jun pake, lejat Jaj kwajat in chapndhl an atiklbtsik.
40014023	Tam ti okon kin chapndha an atiklbtsik, na Jess kadhiy ba jun i chn abal ti l kwetm. Tam ti jikwchinich, na Jess taja ti kwajat kwetm,
40014024	lejat an tan junax chejel pujalich ti neech. U lanyb an tan kal an mlk ja abal tin tamt tu wawyb kal an ik.
40014025	Tam ti dhajaw akalich, utukntsik kal na Jess. Por na Jess tl belal ebtsik an ja.
40014026	Tam ti chutat kal an exbaltsik ti belal ebtsik an ja, jikeytsik ani kal an jkib, dhjantsik kawidh ench: —I labax!
40014027	Por tawntsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Ka likedhatsik tab; Nan, yab ki jikeytsik!
40014028	Tkoyat tm kal na Pedro ani utsan ench: —Ajtik, max Tat lejtal, ti kin utsa neye kin beley ebtsik an ja ani kin ulich asta xon ta kwajat.
40014029	Ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jalaich. Paay tm ban tan na Pedro ani in tuju ti belal ebtsik an ja abal ka kale xon ti kwajat na Jess.
40014030	Por tam tin acha abal chapik u wawnal an ik, jikey; ani kom tujey ti luychinal, dhjan kawidh ench: —Ajtik, ti kin loo!
40014031	Tmki jachan, tyn bin kubak kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —W tajat ta belom! Jantki ta jila tin bela?
40014032	Tam ti kadhchtsik ban tan, kublan ti wawnal an ik.
40014033	Tam tin chuutsik jech xi ttsik ti kwajat ban tan, uteytsik tin tamt na Jess ani in kaknatsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios.
40014034	Tam tin watnaichtsik an pujal, ulich ban chabl xi Jenesaret.
40014035	Tam ti exl na Jess kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajltsik taja, tilan ba putlki jachan an chabl ani tsidhantsat ejtal an ti yaultsik xon ti Jaj kwajat.
40014036	U pakabdhb abal kin walka ka taktsin tin waltsik nin kudhkmil ani ejtal xita kl tu taknal, u jelltsik.
40015001	Utukn tm na Jess kal taltsik i fariseotsik ani i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jechtsik tl ban bitsow Jerusaln ani konoxintsik ench:
40015002	—Jantki na exbaliltsik ti yabich in tajl xowa u jiltsidh ki taja kal ni weje paklil? Pos yabtsik in takl okox nin kubak tam neech ti kapultsik.
40015003	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ani jantki teye ta chikat tajtsaltsik tin takixtal na Dios, abal a ntsal ka taja xowa i jiltsidh ka taja kal na weje pakliltsik?
40015004	Pos na Dios in ulmal ench: “Ka kakna na tta ani na nna” ani “Xita kin odhbijiy nin tta ani nin nna, yejat ka chemdh.”
40015005	Por tattsik a ulal ke jun xita awil kin utsa ench nin tta o nin nna: “Yabich neech ku ejto tu tolmiy, pos ejtal xowa u kool u pikbantsmalich a Dios”;
40015006	ani ke xita kin ulu anchan, yabich yejat kin tolmiy nin tta o nin nna. Anchan, a tajlichtsik jelti max yab xata in jalbl nin takixtal na Dios abal a ntsal ka taja xowa i jiltsidh ka taja kal na weje pakliltsik.
40015007	Kambixtsik! Tsubax tajat tin ulu an tiltsix Isaas kal tattsik ta kwenta, tam tin dhutsa ench:
40015008	Jech an atiklbtsik kal in wiki tin kaknltsik, por nin ejattal w tajat ti kwajat kal Nan.
40015009	Yab xata in jalbl xan tin kaknltsik, pos tokot in oktsixnltsik in takixtal i iniktsik.
40015010	In kaniy tm an atiklbtsik ka utey xon ti Jaj kwajat ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka achatsik ani ka exbaytsik:
40015011	Yab u chnal nin ejattal an inik kal xowa in kapal. U chnal kal xowa in ulal.
40015012	Utukn tm na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench: —A chobxe ke an fariseotsik chakuy tam tin achatsik xowa a ulu?
40015013	Por Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Xowakich an tayablb xi yab Jaj in taymal nu Tta xi kwajat walki, neech ka puwat asta bin ibl.
40015014	Jila kwajat, pos in junwal i jokoltsik xi kwajat in lotoknl in at jokol. Ani max jun i jokol kin lotokna in at jokol, chablam ti b neech ka kwajlan ban jl.
40015015	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Ti ku wiltsi jech an ti junbaxtalb.
40015016	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Yabtsik teye a exbayal?
40015017	Yabxe a chobtsik ke ejtal xowa i kapal u kalel ba ni tsukul ani tayl neech ki wakla alte?
40015018	Por xowa i ulal, ba ni itsch tu tsiil ani max ki ulu xowa yab alwa, kl tu chotsinal an ti ejattal.
40015019	Pos ba ni itsch tu kalel an atax chalab, an chmdhxtalb, an kwtalb, an kmbxtalb ani an odhbjxtalb. Tyki jeye tu tsiil an chalab xu junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal ani xu xechinaltsik yab exbadh.
40015020	Ejtal jech kl tu chotsinal tin ejattal an inik; por max ka kapch yab takadh nin kubak, yab u chotsinal kl tin ejattal.
40015021	Na Jess kale taja ani kale ban chabl xi Tiro ani Sidn.
40015022	Ani jun i mmlb xi Kann xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl, utey ba na Jess ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Ajtik, xi kuxlab kal na Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye! Nu tsidhnil ochadh kal jun i atax ejattalb ani exom tajat ti yajlombdhb.
40015023	Por yab tkoyat nw kal na Jess. Utukn tm na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ani pakabdh ench: —Ka utsa ka kalch, pos n tl tu wewkm ani kawidh u tawnax.
40015024	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Na Dios tin abmal abal tokot ku aliy an atiklbtsik xi Israel xi xeechtsik kibchonk.
40015025	Por an mmlb utey, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Ajtik, ti kin tolmiy neye!
40015026	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab alwa ki kntsi ti kapnl an chakamtsik ani ki pidha an pikotsik.
40015027	Por an mmlb in ulu ench: —Tsubax kejle xowa a ulal Ajtik, por asta an pikotsik in kapal in mumats an kapnl xu kwajlanal tin l nin mesajil nin ajtiktsik.
40015028	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, tin bell tajat! Ka tjan jelt xan ta l. Ani tmki jachan ti jilkon jelnek nin tsidhnil.
40015029	Watey na Jess taja ani kale tin waltsik an pujal xi Galilea; kadhiy ba jun i chn ani buxkan taja.
40015030	Yn i atiklbtsik ulich xon ti Jaj kwajat ani in tsidhltsik i kwechetsik, i jokoltsik, i mtsik, i mochotsik ani yn ms keet i yaultsik. Kwajbtsik tin tamt na Jess ani Jaj in jeldhatsik.
40015031	An atiklbtsik u labnal tam tin chuu ke an m kwin, xi mochotsik u jell, xu kwechetsik u belal ani xu jokoltsik u chuxinal. Ani in kaknatsik nin Diosil an israelitatsik.
40015032	Na Jess in kaniy tm nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —U yajnantsal tajat jech an atiklbtsik, abal in koolich x a kts ti kwajl tech kal Nan ani yab in kooltsik xanty kin kapu. Yab u l ku abatsik tin kim u kal abal yab t ka palmtsik ti bl.
40015033	Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Por, jn neech ki ela i kapnl abal ejtal jech an atiklbtsik, tech xon ti yab xita u kwajl?
40015034	Konyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Jy i pan a kooltsik? Ani jajtsik in ulu ench: —I kool bk i pan ani chb x i tsitsik tool.
40015035	In utsa tm ka buxkan chabl an atiklbtsik,
40015036	in tyna xi bk an pan ani an tooltsik ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios. Tayl in peja, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani an exbaltsik in pidha an atiklbtsik.
40015037	Ejtal kapchtsik asta ajw. Ani tayl in tsutsiytsik bk i toknal kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon.
40015038	Che mil iniktsik xna xi kapch ani yab ajidh i mmlbtsik nibal i chakamtsik.
