40015039	Tayl, na Jess in abaich tm ka kale an atiklbtsik. Na Jess balin ban tan ani kale ban chabl xi Magdala.
40016001	Kale ti chutb na Jess kal i fariseotsik ani kal i saduseotsik, ani abal ka walbindh, kontsin kin taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal kin xalka ke tsubax lejtal kal a Dios ti abadh.
40016002	Por na Jess tkon ench: —Tam dhamlich, a ulaltsik: “Alwa i kij neech ka kwajay, abal chakni tajat an walki”;
40016003	ani tam dhajaw a ulaltsik: “Xo yab alwa i kij neech ka kwajay, abal chakni tajat an walki ani tokwidh.” Kambixtsik! A witltsik ka exbantsi an exl xin kwajbl an walki, por yab a witltsik ka exbay ke xowa u tajl, u tajl kal tin chp na Dios.
40016004	Jech an atiklbtsik xi atax ani u walablom, in konyal jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal ti exl; por yab neech ka pidhan ti exl, tokot xowa tmun kal an tiltsix Jons. Jilntsik tm ani kale na Jess.
40016005	An exbaltsik watey jun pake pujal, por in uktsmaltsik kin jna i pan.
40016006	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka achatsik; ka koytsik i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik ani kal nin oktsixtal an saduseotsik, xin junwal jelti i jilbdhaxtalb koye.
40016007	Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti tsx jajkitsik ench: —Jech tin ulal abal yab i tsidha an pan.
40016008	Achantsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Jantki ti w tajat tin bell? Jantki ta ulaltsik ke yab a kool i pan?
40016009	Yabxe bl a exbaymtsik, nibal a chalpayaltsik tam tu kapundha bo mil i iniktsik kal xi b an pan? Ani jy i toknaltsik a tsutsiy kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon?
40016010	Nibal a chalpayal xi bk an pan xu kapundha kl che mil i iniktsik? Ani jy i toknaltsik a tsutsiy kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon?
40016011	Jantki ti yabtsik a exbayal ke yab in kwajat u till i pan, tam tu utsatsik abal ka koy i kwenta kal nin jilbdhaxtalb koyjil an fariseotsik ani an saduseotsik?
40016012	In exbchtsik tm ke yab usnktsik kal na Jess kin koy i kwenta kal an jilbdhaxtalb xu ynb abal ka tajan an pan, usnktsik kin koy i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik ani an saduseotsik.
40016013	Tam ti na Jess ulich Sesarea, an bitsow xu taknal Filipo, in konoy ench nin exbaliltsik: —Jita tin ulal an atiklbtsik ke Nan neye xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik?
40016014	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Juntsik in ulal ke Tat i Juan xu pujax, keettsik in ulal ke i Elas xi xechink ti tiltsix ti weje ani taltsik in ulal ke i Jeremas o jun i keet tiltsix.
40016015	Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ani tattsik, jita ta ulaltsik ke Nan neye?
40016016	Tkoyat tm ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Tat i Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios xi ejat.
40016017	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Kijidh tajat abal tat, Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, pos jech yab i ltsink kal jun i inik, i ltsidh kal nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
40016018	Ani Nan tu utsl ke tat i Pedro, xin l kin ulu tujub, ani ba jech an tujub ti neech ku kwajba xi neech ti kin belatsik ani yab neech ka ejtowat ka t kal an cheml.
40016019	Nan neech tu pidha ti awiltalb abal ka chobna xan ti neech kin ejto ka kwajay jun xita taknl kal na Dios. Xita ka pakwlantsi tech ti kayl, neech jeye ka pakwlantsat t walki ani xita yab ka pakwlantsi tech ti kayl, yab jeye neech ka pakwlantsat t walki.
40016020	Utsantsik tm an exbaltsik kal na Jess abal yab xita kin ltsi max Jajich nu Kristo.
40016021	Asta tam ti tm, na Jess in tuju kin wiltsi nin exbaliltsik ke Jaj kool ka kale Jerusaln ani ke neech tajat ka atax tajtsin kal nin oklkil an judotsik, an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. In utsatsik jeye ke Jaj neech ka chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech ka ejech ti t.
40016022	Jn tm plki kal na Pedro ani tujey ti kwiynal ench: —Ajtik, ke na Dios yab kin walka ka tamu anchan! Ke yab jayki ka tmun jech!
40016023	Por chawkin na Jess ani utsan ench na Pedro: —Ki wixkin tech lej atax! Tat tin tojliyalki, pos yab a chalpayal xan ti na Dios tin chalpayal, tokot a chalpayal xan tin chalpayal an iniktsik.
40016024	Utsan tm ench an exbaliltsik kal na Jess: —Max jun xita in l ti kin wwna, yejat kin uktsi tinb ani tin wwna por yab kin ajay tinb maske ka chemdh.
40016025	Pos ejtal xita in l kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha; por xita kin kibdha nin xechintal kal Nanki tu kwenta, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
40016026	Pos, jant ti alwa max jun xita kin bajaw kin koy ejtal xowa waach ban kayl ani kin kibdha nin ejattal ba kibeltalb? O janty neech kin ejto kin pidhna an inik abal kin loo nin ejattal?
40016027	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin tsch kal ejtal nin labidh tokt nu Tta ani kal nin tokat abatwlejiltsik ani tm neech ku pidha an atiklbtsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal tin kwentaki xowa in tajmal.
40016028	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke waach taltsik xi xo tech jeye kwajat, ke yab neech ka chemech asta kin chuutsik okox kin tsch tin takix Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40017001	Akak a kts ms tayl, na Jess in kaniy na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan nin kidhb na Jakobo ani kale jajkitsik ba jun i tekat chn.
40017002	Taja, na Jess in jalkuy tinb tin tamt nin exbaliltsik xi kalnek kal Jaj. Nin wal chaxkin jelti na kts ani nin kudhkmil dhaknib jelti an tajaxtalb.
40017003	Tmki jachan, in chuutsik jeye na Moiss ani na Elas, ti tiloll kal na Jess.
40017004	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Max Tat a l, neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas.
40017005	Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti kw, dhabyattsik kal jun i chaxixl tokow ani ban tokow achatm jun i kwintalb, xu kw in ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat ani in kulbl tajat kal Jaj. Ka axtsitsik xowa Jaj in ulal.
40017006	Tam tin achatsik jech, an exbaltsik tudhlan kututsik asta chabl ani jikeytsik tajat.
40017007	Utey tm na Jess xon ti kwajattsik, takan ani utsantsik ench: —Ki chakaytsik ani yab ki jikey.
40017008	Tam ti chakaytsik ani in tela, yab ms xita in chuu, tokot na Jess kwetm.
40017009	Tam ti exomich ti paltsik ban chn, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka tiltsi xowa a chuutsik, asta tam kin chemdh Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik ani in ejnekich ti t.
40017010	Konyat tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Jantki p tm an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss tin ulaltsik ke kool ka tsch okox na Elas?
40017011	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ke na Elas neech ka tsch okox ani neech kin lejkiy ejtal.
40017012	Por Nan tu utsltsik ke na Elas tsinekich, por yab exl, tokot tajtsin xowa ka len. Anchan neye ti neech kin tajtsin Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40017013	In exbch tm an exbaltsik ke na Jess kwajat in till na Juan xu pujax.
40017014	Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik, utukn na Jess kal jun i inik, tudhlan tin tamt ani utsan ench:
40017015	—Ajtik, ka kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb nu chakmil; pos ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani in achl tajat i yajtsiktalb; ynlich kwajlank ba kamal ani ba ja.
40017016	U tsidhantsm na exbaliltsik, por yab in ejtmal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb.
40017017	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belom ani i walablomtsik tajat! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech an kwitl.
40017018	In kwiya tm na Jess an atax ejattalb, kale ani tmki jachan jilkon jelnek an kwitl.
40017019	Tayl an exbaltsik in kaniy tm plki na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jantki waw ti yab i ejto ki kldha an atax ejattalb?
40017020	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Pos tattsik w tajat ta belom. Tsubax tu utsltsik max i belomak ela w, jelt in publ jun in itsch i mostasa, neech ka ejto ka utsatsik jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tech ani ki kale pl” ani an chn neech ka kale. Ejtal neech ka ejto ka tajatsik max i belomak.
40017021	Por jelti jech an atax ejattalb tokot neech ka ejtotsik ka kldha max ki lan ani ki klin.
40017022	Tam ti kwajattsik Galilea, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Nanich xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walablom iniktsik
40017023	ani neech kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t. Tam tin achatsik jech xowa utsan, tepintsik tajat.
40017024	Tam ti na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik ulich ban bitsow xi Kapernam, utukn na Pedro kal xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb kal tin kwenta an at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani konyat ench: —Yabxe Ja in pidhnl na Oktsxal an jalbixtalb abal an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios?
40017025	Tkon ench na Pedro: —In pidhnl. Tam ti na Pedro ochich alt, tsusbl ti utsan ench kal na Jess: —Janta chutal, Simn? An oklektsik xi tech ti kayl jita nin kontsaltsik an ti jalbixtalb nin at kidhtaltsik o xi pltsik?
40017026	Tkoyat ench kal na Pedro: —Xi pltsik. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tm, yab yejat ka jalbixin xi techtsik.
40017027	Por abal yab ki itixbdhatsik, ki kale ban pujal, ka petna nin jixb an tool ani ka yakwa an jidhtal tool xi ka palkan. Ka chatsi tin wi ani taja neech ka ela jun i patl tumn, ka jixtsi ani ka jna abal ka jalbiy xi tat a lujyal ani xi Nan neye.
40018001	Tam ti jachan i kij, utey an exbaltsik ba na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jita j na ms ultalb xon tu takix na Dios?
40018002	In kaniy tm na Jess jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik
40018003	ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max yabtsik ka jalkuy tab ani yabtsik ka junu jelti an chakamtsik, yab neech ka ejto ki kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
40018004	Jaxtm, xita na ms ultalb xon tu takix na Dios, jaich xin chakl tinb ani in junwal jelti jech an chakam.
40018005	Ani xita in bachwal jun i chakam jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal.
40018006	Xita kin walbindha jn ti b jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik, ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin.
40018007	Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal waach tajat xantokl ti ka walbindh! Echeki neech ka wachin xantokl ti ka walbindh, por chojontl in chubl xita ka walbindhaxin!
40018008	Jaxtm, max na kubak o na akan ti walbindhl, ka kotoy ani ka petna w; pos ms alwa ki ochich mocho o kweche ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab kal chablam na kubak o chablam na akan ki petn ban kibeltalb.
40018009	Ani max na wal ti walbindhl, ka jixa ani ka petna w; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot na wal ani yab kal chablam na wal ki petn ban kibeltalb.
40018010	Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka pojkatsik ni jun xita xi tin bellichtsik. Pos tu utsltsik ke nin tokat abatwlejiltsik t walki echeki kwajat tin tamt nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
40018011	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tsinek ku loo xi kibchonkichtsikwiik ti kwajat.
40018012	Jan ta chutaltsik? Max jun i inik in kool bo inik i borregotsik ani kin kibdha jn, yabxe neech kin jila xi che inik lajubelju abal ka kale ban chnlom kin aliy xi kibchonk?
40018013	Ani max kin ela, tu utsltsik tsubax ke ms neech ka kulb kal tin kwenta jachan xi kibchonk k kal tin kwenta xi che inik lajubelju xi yab kibchonk.
40018014	Anchan jeye, na Tta xi kwajat walki, yab in l kin chuu ka kibchon ni jun xita.
40018015	Max na at kidhb ti tajtsi jun xata yab alwa, ki kale abal ki tilololch tatkitsik. Max ti ki axtsi xowa ka utsa, neech tm kin exbay ke yab alwa xowa in taja.
40018016	Por max yab ti ki axtsi, ka kaniy tm jn o chb i belomtsik abal ka tawn jeye kal chb o x i belomtsik.
40018017	Max yab jeye kin axtsi xi jechtsik, ka ulu tm tin tamt an kidhblbtsik; ani max yab jeye kin axtsi an kidhblbtsik, ka kchtsik tm jelti jun i pl inik o jelti jun i bachkul jalbixtalb xi yab in exll a Dios.
40018018	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita ka pakwlantsitsik tech ti kayl, neech jeye ka pakwlantsat t walki ani xita yab ka pakwlantsitsik tech ti kayl, yab jeye neech ka pakwlantsat t walki.
40018019	Tu utsltsik jeye, ke max chb xi tattsik a kidhtal xi kwajat tech ti kayl kin tajatsik i kw abal kin kontsi jun xata nu Tta xi kwajat walki, neech ka pidhantsik.
40018020	Abal xon ti ka junkun chb o x kal Nan tu bij, taja neye in kwajat kal jajtsik.
40018021	Utukn tm na Jess kal na Pedro ani konyat ench: —Ajtik, jyl kool ku pakwlantsi nu at kidhb max tin waltsi? Asta bkl?
40018022	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab neech tu utsa ke tokot bkl, yejat ka pakwlantsi echeki.
40018023	Jaxtm, xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i pulek takix xin lena kin taja i kwenta kal nin tojnliltsik.
40018024	Tam ti tm in tujwal kin taja an kwenta, uldhantsat jun xita xu jntsinal kl yn i tumn.
40018025	Kom jachan an tjontsix yab in kool xan ti kin jalbiy, an pulek takix in ulu abal ka nujwat jachan an tjontsix kl nin tomtal, nin chakmiltsik ani ejtal xowa in kool abal ka jalbin nin jntsixtal.
40018026	Tudhlan jachan an tjontsix tin tamt an pulek takix ani in pakabdha ench: “Ajtik, ti kin aytsintsi neye ani neech tu jalbintsi ejtal xowa tu jntsal.”
40018027	Kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal nin ajtik, pakwlantsat an tin jntsixtal ani walk.
40018028	Por tam ti kale jachan an tjontsix, in ela jun in at tjontsix, xu jntsinal kl w i tumn. In yakwa bin nk ani in tuju kin kuchdha, in utsa ench: “Tin witsbantsi xi tin jntsal!”
40018029	Tudhlan tm nin at tojnal tin tamt ani pakabdh ench: “Tin aytsintsi neye ani neech tu jalbintsi ejtal xowa tu jntsal.”
40018030	Por jaj yab in lena kin aytsintsi, kale kin ulu ka balyat ban wikaxte asta kin jalbiy ejtal xu jntsinal.
40018031	Tam tin chuu nin at tojnaltsik xowa tmun, tepintsik tajat ani kaletsik kin tiltsi an ajtiklb ejtal xowa tmun.
40018032	In abna tm an ajtiklb ka kanyat an tojnal xi yab pakwlantsixin ani in utsa ench: “Atax tjontsix! Nan tu pakwlantsi ejtal ta jntsixtal, abal tin pakabdha.
40018033	Yabxe yejat ka pakwlantsiwiik teye na at tojnal, jelt xan ti nan tu pakwlantsi?”
40018034	An ajtiklb chakuy tajat ani in ulu ka atax tajtsin an tojnal xi yab pakwlantsixin asta kin jalbiy ejtal xowa in jnl.
40018035	&Anchan jeye neech kin taja kal tattsik nu Tta xi kwajat walki, max yab ka pakwlantsitsik na at kidhbtsik kal ejtal na ejattal.
40019001	Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu ejtal jech, kale Galilea ani kale ban chabl xi Judea xi kwajat tin ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn.
40019002	Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn ani in jeldha taja an yaultsik.
40019003	Utukn tm na Jess kal chb x i fariseotsik ani abal ka taktamiyat, konyat ench: —Alwaxe kin jila jun xita nin tomtal kal xowakichki tin kwenta?
40019004	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke tam ti tujeyki, na Dios in taja jun i inik ani jun i mmlb?
40019005	In ulu jeye ench: “Jaxtm, an inik neech kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay junax kal nin tomtal ani xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
40019006	Yabich chb ti neech ka jin, jn tokot. Jaxtm, an inik yab yejat kin kxliy xowa in jnkxliymal na Dios.
40019007	Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jantki p tm na Moiss tin ulu ka pidhan an tomiklb mmlb jun i w xon tin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti neech ka jilan?
40019008	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —In ulu ka tajan anchan, kom tattsik watats ta tanchu; jaxtm tin ulu ke awil ka jilatsik na tomtal, por tam ti tujeyki yab anchan ti tujenek.
40019009	Nan tu utsltsik ke xin jilltsik nin tomtal ani yab abal u junkunal kal keet ani ka tomkin kal keet i mmlb, u walbinalich kal i uxmbetalb; ani xita ka tomkin kal jun i jiladh mmlb, u walbinalich jeye kal i uxmbetalb.
40019010	Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Max anchan u tmnal, ms alwa abal an inik yab ka tomkin.
40019011	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab ejtalki neech kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm, tokotki xi bijtsidh kal na Dios ke anchan neech ka kwajay.
40019012	Yn waach xantki tin kwenta ti yab neech kin ejto ka tomkin an iniktsik: taltsik u wachinal abal yab ka tomkin, taltsik yab in ejtowal ka tomkin abal tajtsidh jun xata kal an iniktsik ani taltsik yab u tomkinal abal in l kin tjontsi na Dios ani ka kwajay taknl kal Jaj. Xita in ejtowal ka kwajay kwetm, ka kwajay kwetm.
40019013	Utuntsat tm na Jess chb x ti chakamtsik abal kin kwajba nin kubak ban chakamtsik ani ka lan kal jajtsik tin kwenta; por an exbaltsik tujey kin kwiya xita nin utwal an chakamtsik.
40019014	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka walkatsik ti kin utukna an chakamtsik ani yab ka tamkuytsik; pos xita kin walka tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, jelt xan tin walkl tinb ka takyat jun i chakam, jachan jaich xi neech kin ejtotsik ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
40019015	In kwajba tm nin kubak ban chakamtsik ani tayl kale pl.
40019016	Kale ti chutb na Jess kal jun i kwitl ani konyat ench: —Alwa Oktsix, jantom alwatalb yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
40019017	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios. Por max a l ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, ka taja xowa in ulal an takixtalb.
40019018	Konyat ench kal an kwitl: —Jowa takixtalb? Ani tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita,
40019019	ka kakna na tta ani na nna ani ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.
40019020	Utsan ench kal an kwitl: —Ejtal jech u tajl asta tin chipl, janty ms yejat ku taja?
40019021	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Max a l lejtal ki xechin lujat, ki kale ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik, anchan neech ka koy t walki xowa xin jalbl; ki tsch tm ani ti kin wwna.
40019022	Tam ti an kwitl in acha jech, u tepinal tajat ti kale, abal jaj yn xata in kool.
40019023	Utsan tm ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyat kal a Dios jun i tumnladh inik.
40019024	Tu utsltsik jeye, ke ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xin bij kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
40019025	Tam ti an exbaltsik in acha jech, labantsik tajat ani knxin jajkitsik ench: —Pos jita p tm neech kin ejto ka loey?
40019026	Teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, por an iniktsik, yaba. Tokot na Dios in ejtowal kin loo xitakichki.
40019027	Konyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat, janty p weye neech ki koy?
40019028	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam kin bajaw an kij tam ejtal ka tmdhjich, tam Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kin buxkan bu tokat kwajtal, tattsik xi tin wwnmal, neech ki buxkantsik teye ba lajuchb i tokat kwajtalb. Neech ki buxkantsik abal ka ljundha nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
40019029	Ani ejtal xin jilmaltsik in kim, o in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in tta o in nna, in tomtal, in chakmiltsik o in chabliltsik, kal Nanki tu kwenta, neech ka pidhantsik ms yn kal na Dios ani neech jeye kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
40019030	Por yn xi xo kwajattsik ultalb, neech ka jilkon tayl ani yn xi xo kwajat tayl, neech ka kwajaytsik ultalb.
40020001	Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i dhabal tjomtalb xi kale dhajawe ti lim tojnaltsik abal ka kale ti tojnal xon tin kool tayadh i uba.
40020002	In ela an tojnaltsik ani utsan neech ka tolmiyat. In utsa neech kin jalbiytsik jun i denario ta kts ani in aba ti tojnaltsik xon tin kool tayadh an uba.
40020003	Tayl, tam ti beljujich xna i dhajaw, kale jun, in ela keet xi yabtsik xata in tojnl
40020004	ani in utsatsik ench: “Ki kaletsik teye ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba ani neech tu pidhatsik xowa in tomnl ka ta.” Ani kaletsik.
40020005	An dhabal tojlb kale jun tam ti chejelich a kts ani tam ti xich i wkal ani anlki tin taja.
40020006	Tam ti bich i wkal, kale jun ani in ela keet xi ta ti kwajattsik yab xata in tajl ani in utsatsik ench: “Jantki ta kwajattsik tech putl a kts yab xata a tojnl?”
40020007	Tkoyat ench: “Techki u kwajat kom yab xita tu kanymal tu tojnal.” Utsantsik tm ench: “Ki kaletsik teye ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba ani neech tu pidhatsik xowa in tomnl ka ta.”
40020008	Tam ti jikwchinich, an dhabal alelb in utsa ench an oklek tojnal: “Ka kaniy an tojnaltsik ani ka jalbiy, okox ka jalbiy xi taylichtsik ti ochenek ti tojnal ani taylich ka jalbiy xi okoxtsik ti ochenek.”
40020009	Ulichtsik tm xi ochenektsik ti tojnal bich i wkal ani kidhat jeye pidhantsik juntsik i denario.
40020010	Tayl, tam tin bajchtsik jeye kin bachutsik nin jalbl xi okoxtsik ti ochenek ti tojnal, in chalpay ke ms yandha neech ka pidhantsik; por tokot jeye juntsik i denario pidhan.
40020011	Tam tin bachutsik, tujeytsik ti itixbl
40020012	ani in utsatsik ench an dhabal tojlb: “Jechtsik xi ulich taylich, tokot tjontsik jun i ora ani anlki jeye ta jalbiytsik jelti waw, xu tjnk ani i kuxymal nin yjtsk an kakal putl a kts.”
40020013	Por an dhabal tojlb tkon ani in utsa ench jn ti b xi kwajat an ti kw: “Jab, yab exom tu tajtsal ni jun xata yab alwa. Yabxe tu utsa abal jn tokot i denario neech tu jalbiy ta kts?
40020014	Ka bachu na jalbl ani ki kalch. Por nan u l ku pidha anlki jeye xan tu pidha tat jech xi ochich taylich an ti tojnal.
40020015	Awxe yab alwa ku taja xowa nan u l kal xowa u kool? O i chakl abal a chutal ke nan in alwa inik?”
40020016	Pos anchan p, xi xo kwajat ultalbtsik, neech ka jilkon tayl ani xi xo kwajat tayl, neech ka kwajaytsik ultalb. Pos yn tajat xi kanidhtsik, por w tajat xi takudhtsik.
40020017	Tam ti na Jess nechich abal Jerusaln, in kaniy plki xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench:
40020018	—A chutaltsik ke u nechich Jerusaln ani taja, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban oklek pletsik ani ban oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin ulutsik abal kin chemdh
40020019	ani neech kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik abal kin labdhn kal jajtsik, neech kin lekbayat ani neech kin chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te; por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
40020020	Utey tm ba Jess nin nna na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo junax kal jajtsik ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess abal kin kontsi jun i alwatalb.
40020021	Konyat ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l? In ulu ench an nnalb: —Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ta takixich, tu kontsal ke jn ti b nu chakmil ka buxkan ta ejt ani xi jn ta kwatab.
40020022	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik yab a chob xanty a konyal. Neechxe ka ejto ka watnatsik an yajtsiktalb xi neech ku watna ani an cheml jeye? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Neech ki ejto.
40020023	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ani kejle. Tattsik neech ka watnatsik jech an yajtsiktalb ani an cheml jeye; por kal tin kwenta xita neech ka buxkan tu ejt ani tu kwatab, yab Nan neech ku ulu, tokot neech ka buxkantsik xitam j na takudhtsik kal nu Tta.
40020024	Tam tin achatsik jech xi lju an exbaltsik, in chakuntsitsik xi jech chb an kidhblbtsik.
40020025	Kanyattsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Anchan xan ta chobichtsik, an pakdha takix u takix jelti ajtiklbtsik ani xi ms ultalbtsik, u chapik takixtsik tajat.
40020026	Por tattsik yab yejat ka taja anchan. Xita in l ka kwajay ms plek kal tattsik, yejat kin tjontsi ejtalki
40020027	ani xita in l ka kwajay ms ultalb kal tattsik, yejat kin tjontsi ejtalki.
40020028	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal kin tjontsat, in tsinek tin tjontsix ani ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal ku jalbiy an loeltalb xi yn neech kin bachutsik.
40020029	Tam ti exomichtsik ti kalel ban bitsow xi Jerik, kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn na Jess.
40020030	T ti buxutsik wal bl chb i jokoltsik ani tam tin achatsik ke na Jess exom ti watel taja, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Ajtik, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
40020031	Kwiyantsik kal an atiklbtsik abal ka chamkan, por jajtsik ms kawidh ti dhjaxintsik: —Ajtik, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
40020032	Kubey tm na Jess, in kaniy an jokoltsik ani in konoytsik ench: —Janty a l tu tajtsitsik?
40020033	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Ajtik, ti ku chuxindha weye.
40020034	Kontsattsik tm ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Jess ani taktsintsik an tin wal. Tmki ti chuxin an jokoltsik ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
40021001	Tam ti kunatichtsik ti kwajat Jerusaln ani ulichtsik ban kwentsal xin bij Betfaj, xi kwajat kunat ban chn xin bij Olibos, na Jess in aba chb nin exbaliltsik
40021002	ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat tametlb. Taja neech ka ela wikats jun i uxum burru ani taja jeye kwajat in tm. Ka wila ani ti kin tsidhantsi.
40021003	Ani max ki tawn kal jun xita, ka utsatsik abal an Ajtiklb in yntsal, por jikat neech kin witsba.
40021004	Jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an tiltsix, tam tin dhutsa ench:
40021005	Ka utsa an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Sin: “Ka tela, nich tl na Pulek Takxal, xin chakl tajat tinb, punat ba jun i burru, ba jun i burru, in tm jun i konl xu kitandhb.”
40021006	Kale tm an exbaltsik ani in taja jelt xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess.
40021007	In tsidhatsik an uxum burru kl nin tm, in tatlabiy kal nin kudhkmiltsik ani puney na Jess.
40021008	Ani yn an atiklbtsik xi taja ti neech, in nukltsik nin kudhkmil ban bl xon ti neech ka watey na Jess ani keettsik in pejl in kwel an te ani in umltsik ban bl.
40021009	An atiklbtsik xi neech okox ani xi tltsik jeye kuxlek, in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ajtik, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Okxlb t walki, ti ku loch xo!
40021010	Tam ti na Jess ochich Jerusaln, ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja, xakwan ani yn konoxintsik ench: —Jitam j jeye jech an inik?
40021011	Ani an atiklbtsik in ulaltsik ench: —Jech jaich an tiltsix Jess, xu kwajl Nasaret, an bitsow xu taknal Galilea.
40021012	Tayl ochich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in kldha elb ejtaltsik xi ta ti kwajat taja ti njultsik ani ti chaumtsik. In ketpantsi tin mesajil xi ta ti kwajattsik taja in jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik. In ketpantsi jeye tin laktmil an njul kukutsik
40021013	ani in utsatsik ench: —Ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh neech ka yn”; por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.
40021014	Taja ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utukn na Jess kal chb x i jokoltsik ani i kwechetsik ani Jaj in jeldhatsik.
40021015	Por tam ti an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb in chuu an labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess ani in achatsik jeye ke an chakamtsik kawidh in ulaltsik ench ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios: “Kin bachu an labidh tokattalb xu kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid!”, chakuytsik
40021016	ani in utsatsik ench na Jess: —A achlxe xanty in ulal xi jech kwajattsik? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —U achl. Yabxe a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab xan tin ulal kal jech tin kwenta? In ulal ench: A tajmal ke xi tsitsik ani an chakamtsik xi bl u tsutsul kin ajatna alwa i ajatlb.
40021017	Jilanichtsik tm kal na Jess. Kale tm na Jess ba jachan an bitsow, kale ban kwentsal xi Betania ani taja tin watna an akal.
40021018	Tam ti dhajaw, tam ti nechich jun ban bitsow, na Jess in acha u kal.
40021019	In chuu jun akanlek i igo bin wl an bl, utey taja, por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall, tokot in xekl. Utsan tm kal na Jess jachan nin akan an igo: —Yab jayki neech ki witsiy ta walim! Ani tmki ti wayey jachan nin akan an igo.
40021020	Tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, labantsik tajat ani in konoytsik ench na Jess: —Jantki ti jikat tajat ti wayey nin akan an igo?
40021021	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, max i belomtsik ani yab ka jlkkliytsik na chalab, yab tokotki neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa a chuu u tajtsi nin akan an igo, neech jeye ka ejtotsik ka utsa jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tech ani ka petna tab ban pujal” ani anchan neech ka tjan.
40021022	Ejtal xowa ka kontsitsik na Dios, max ka belatsik ke neech ti pidha, neech ka bachutsik.
40021023	Tam ti ulich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ochich ani oktsixin taja. Lejat kwajat ti oktsix, utukn kal an oklek pletsik, kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani konyat ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech? Jita ti pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb?
40021024	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Neech tu konoytsik jun xata; max tin tkoytsik, neech tm tu utsatsik neye kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.
40021025	Jita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pjal? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik? Tujeytsik tm ti kwlx jajkitsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Max ki ulu ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech tu tkoy ench: Jantki p tm ti yab a beltsitsik?
40021026	Ani max ki ulu ke kal i iniktsik, neech ku tajtsin xata yab alwa kal an iniktsik; pos ejtal in belltsik ke na Juan kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
40021027	Jaxtm tin utsatsik ench na Jess: —Yab i chob. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.
40021028	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik kal jech xowa neech tu tiltsitsik? Jun i inik in kool chb in chakmiltsik ani in utsa ench jn ti b: “Chakam, ki kale xo ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba.”
40021029	Tkon ench an chakmlb: “Yab u l!” Por tayl in jalkuy nin chalab ani kale an ti tojnal.
40021030	Tayl, kale an ttalb kin chuu xi jn ani in utsa jeye anlki ani jech an chakmlb tkon ench: “Neech.” Por yab kale.
40021031	Jowa j xi jech chb in taja xowa in l an ttalb? In ulutsik ench: —Xi jidhtal. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb ani an junkux inik uxumtsik, okox neech kin walkatsik tinb ka takyat kal na Dios k tattsik.
40021032	Pos na Juan xu pujax tsch ti oktsitsik xan ti yejat ki kwajaytsik ani yabtsik a beltsi; por xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb ani an junkux inik uxumtsik in beltsitsik ja. Por tattsik, maske a chumal jech, yab a jilatsik ta walablom abal ka beltsitsik xowa in ulu.
40021033	Ka achatsik jeye jech keet an junbaxtalb: Jun i dhabal chabl in taya yn i akanlek i uba ani in mapuy; in taja jun i balixtalb abal kin watiy taja an uba ani jun i pnchy abal kin beletna taja an ubalom. Tayl in matintsi jachan an ti alelb keet i tojnaltsik ani jaj kale w ti belal.
40021034	Tam tin bajaw xowki neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba chb x in tojnliltsik abal kin kontsi jachan an tojnaltsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu an dhabal alelb.
40021035	Por an mat chabltsik in yakwa nin tojnliltsik an dhabal alelb, jn in chaaw, jn in chemdha ani jn in tujbay.
40021036	An dhabal alelb in aba jun ms yn i tojnaltsik k tam tin jidhtal; por ejtaltsik yab bachwat alwa kal an mat alelb.
40021037	Tin okontal in aba nin chakmil, kom in chalpay ench: “Neech xna kin kaknantsat tu chakmil.”
40021038	Por tam tin chuutsik an chakmlb, an mat alelb tsxintsik ench: “Jech jaich xi neech ti dhabal tayl, wana ki chemdha abal waw ki dhabalna an alelb.”
40021039	Jaxtm tin yakwatsik, in kldha elb alelb ani in chemdha.
40021040	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos tam ka tsch an dhabal alelb, janty neech ka tajtsintsik jachan an mat alelb?
40021041	Utsantsik ench: —Neech kin chemdha jachan an atax mat alelb ani neech kin matintsi keet i tojnaltsik jachan an ti alelb, xi ka pidhan kl xowa jaj in lujyal kin bachu tam kin bajaw xowki neech ti pitnal an uba.
40021042	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench?: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb. Jech in tajmal an Okxlb ani waw i chutal jelti jun i pulek labandhaxtalb.
40021043	Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ke yab neech ki kyattsik taknl kal na Dios; tokot neech ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios, xita kin taja xowa in l na Dios.
40021044	Xita ka kwajlan ba jech an tujub neech ka mukan ani xita ka tuchiyat kl, neech ka jilan jelti pojodh.
40021045	Tam ti an oklek pletsik ani an fariseotsik in acha an junbaxtalb xin ulu na Jess, in exbaytsik ke jajtsik kwajat ti tilnal.
40021046	In lenatsik tm kin yakwa, por in jiknltsik an atiklb, kom an atiklbtsik in bell ke na Jess kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
40022001	In ntsi tm jun ti kw na Jess kal i junbaxtalbki ani in utsatsik ench:
40022002	—Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i tomkixtalb xi jun i pulek takix in taja abal nin chakmil.
40022003	In aba nin tojnliltsik abal kin kaniy xi kwajatichtsik kanidh, por jechtsik yab in lena ka kale.
40022004	In aba jun keet nin tojnliltsik ani in utsa ench: “Ka utsa xi kwajatichtsik kanidh abal tojojodhich u kool an kapnl. Ka utsa abal chemdhatsich an bkatsik, an konltsik xi kosdha ani ejtalich kwajat tojojodh; ka utsa abal ka tschichtsik.”
40022005	Por xi kanidhtsik yab in taja ti kij. Jn kale bin ale, jn kale xon tin tajl nin limtal
40022006	ani xi keettsik, in yakwa nin tojnliltsik an pulek takix, in atax tajtsitsik ani in chemdha.
40022007	Tam ti an pulek takix in acha jech, chakuy tajat ani in aba nin soldadojiltsik kin chemdha jachan an chemdhax iniktsik ani abal kin tsiktsi tin bitswil.
40022008	Tayl in utsa ench nin tojnliltsik: “Ejtalich kwajat tojojodh abal an tomkixtalb, por jachan xi kanidhtsik yab xna in tomnl ka tsch.
40022009	Pos ki kaletsik p xon tu xaymanal an bl ani ka kaniy ban tomkixtalb ejtalki xita ka elatsik.”
40022010	Kale tm an tjontsixtsik ban bl ani in junku ejtal xin elatsik, xi alwa iniktsik ani xi atax iniktsik. Anchan ti tsutsich an alt kal an atiklbtsik.
40022011	Ochich tm an pulek takix kin chuu xi kanidhtsik ani in chuu jun i inik xi ta jeye ti kwajat, por yab xeketlidh jelt xan tu xeketlinal jun xita xu kalel ba jun i tomkixtalb.
40022012	Ani in utsa ench: “Jab, jan ta ochenek tech ani yab i xeketlidh jelt xan tu xeketlinal jun xita xu kalel ba jun i tomkixtalb?” Por yab tajat xata in ulu.
40022013	An pulek takix in utsa tm ench xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: “Ka wika bin akan ani bin kubak ani ka kldha elb ban jikwaxtalb, xon ti neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.”
40022014	Pos yn tajat xi kanidhtsik, por w tajat xi takudhtsik.
40022015	Kale tm an fariseotsik ani in taja i kw abal kin aliy xan ti kin uwatsik kin taja kin ulu jun xata yab alwa na Jess ani anchan kin ejto kin lna.
40022016	Jaxtm tin aba chb x nin kidhtaltsik junax kal nin kidhtaltsik jeye na Erodes ani utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, i chob abal tsubax xowa a ulal ani a oktsixnl in lujtalki xan tu takix na Dios ani yab a dhl ti kwenta xanty in ulal an iniktsik, pos yab a tell an iniktsik eblidhki.
40022017	Pos ti ku utsa: Alwaxe ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano o yaba?
40022018	Por na Jess in chuu abal kwajatki ti taktamiyb ani in utsatsik ench: —Kambixtsik, jantki tin taktamiyaltsik?
40022019	Ti kin ltsi jun i patl tumn xi kl tu tajnal an jalbixtalb. Pidhan tm jun i denario.
40022020	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jita in wal ani in bij xi jech kwajat chilbadh?
40022021	Tkoyat ench: —An lej pulek takix romano. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu.
40022022	Tam tin achatsik jech, labantsik tajat. Jilan tm na Jess ani kaletsik.
40022023	Jaychki jachan a kts, kale ti lnb na Jess kal chb x i saduseotsik. Jech an saduseotsik, in ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t; jaxtm ti konyat ench na Jess:
40022024	—Oktsix, na Moiss in ulu ke max jun i tomkidh inik ka chemech ani yab kin jila i chakamtsik, nin kidhb yejat ka tomkin kal jachan an chemtsidh mmlb abal kin koy i chakamtsik jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemech.
40022025	Pos alwaich, kal waw twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. Xi jidhtal tomkin ani chemech. Kom yab in jila in chakmiltsik, in jiltsi an tin tomtal nin chabtal kidhb.
40022026	Anchan jeye ti tmun kal xin chabtal, kal xin oxtal ani anchan ti tmun kal xi bk an kwitltsik.
40022027	Ms tayl chemech jeye an mmlb.
40022028	Tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik, Kal jowa j xi bk an kwitltsik ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb, abal ejtal an kwitltsik in tomiknmal?
40022029	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat, abal yab a exlltsik an Tokat Dhuslab nibal nin chp na Dios.
40022030	Pos tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik, yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin, pos neech ka kwajaytsik jelti nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios xi kwajattsik walki.
40022031	Por kal tin kwenta max u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik, yabxe a ajymaltsik xan ti na Dios tin ulu, tam tin ulu ench?:
40022032	“Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.” Na Dios yab in Diosil i chemlomtsik, in Diosil xi kwajattsik ejat.
40022033	Tam ti an atiklbtsik in acha jech, labantsik tajat xan tin acha u oktsix na Jess.
40022034	Tam ti an fariseotsik in chobna abal na Jess tknk in lujtalki ani an saduseotsik yab in ela xan ti ka tkon, junkun an fariseotsik
40022035	ani jn ti b xin will nin takixtal na Dios, in lena kin taktamiy. Jaxtm tin konoy ench:
40022036	—Oktsix, jowa j an takixtalb xi ms uluts xi kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss?
40022037	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —“Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal na itsch, kal ejtal na ejattal ani kal ejtal na chalab.”
40022038	Jech jaich an takixtalb xi ms uluts ani xi ms ultalb.
40022039	Nin chabtal, in junwal jeye jelti xin jidhtal: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
40022040	Jech chb an takixtalb jaich nin tujtal ejtal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani xin jilm dhutsadh an tiltsixtsik.
40022041	Lejat an fariseotsik bl ta ti kwajat junini,
40022042	konyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik kal tin kwenta an Kristo? Kal jita kl tu chakmlb? Tkoyat ench: —Kal an pulek takix Dabid.
40022043	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki p tm na Dabid, ti ijtsiyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb kin bijiy tin Ajtik? Abal na Dabid in ulu ench:
40022044	An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.”
40022045	Pos max an pulek takix Dabid in bijiy tin Ajtik an Kristo, jantki p tm ta ulaltsik ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal na Dabid?
40022046	Ani kal ni jun xita ti ejtowat ka tkoyat ani asta tam ti tm, jikeytsik ani ni jun xita ms konoxin xata.
40023001	Utsan tm ench an atiklbtsik ani an exbaltsik kal na Jess:
40023002	—An fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kooltsik i awiltalb abal kin wila nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
40023003	Jaxtm, ka exbantsitsik ani ka taja ejtal xowa kin ulutsik; por yab ka wwna xowa in tajltsik, pos jajtsik in oktsixnl jun xata ani keet xowa in tajl.
40023004	Pos in oktsixnltsik xata xi tojlb tajat ani in utsl an atiklbtsik kin taja; por jajtsik yab in tajl nibal ela w, jelt tam jun xita in tajl jun i kitlb altsik ani in kityal xi keettsik, por jajtsik nibal ela in l kin taka.
40023005	Ejtal xowa in tajltsik, in tajl abal ka chutat kal an atiklbtsik. Pos in kulbetnltsik kin chata bin pkib ani bin okb wetsik an Tokat Dhuslab, dhutsadh ba juntsik peje i kudhkum. In kwajbltsik in kudhkmil kal ms nakdha in dhutsell k xi keet an atiklbtsik.
40023006	Xon tu tajnal i kapxnich, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan xon ti ms ultalb ani ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan ban kwajtalb xi ultalb.
40023007	In kulbetnltsik ka chapndh ti bl kal an atiklbtsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb ani ka bijyat ti oktsixtsik.
40023008	Por tattsik yab yejat ka lena ke an atiklbtsik ti bijiy ta oktsix, pos jn tokot i Oktsix a kooltsik, jaich an Kristo. Ani ejtal tattsik a kidhbkitsik.
40023009	Yab ka bijiy ta tta ni jun xita xi tech ti chabl, pos jn tokot a Tta a kooltsik, xi kwajat walki.
40023010	Nibal yejat ka walkatsik ki bijyat ta oklek, pos jn tokot i oklek waach, jaich an Kristo.
40023011	Xita in tjontsal xi keet, jaich xi ms ultalb kal tattsik.
40023012	Pos xita kin teka tinb, neech ka chak ani xita kin chaka tinb, neech ka tekb.
40023013	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Abal yab a walkl xi keettsik ka kwajch taknl kal na Dios. Pos nibal tattsik yab a l ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani nibal a walkl xi keettsik ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
40023014	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Abal a kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani tayl, abal ki utsan ke i alwa iniktsik, a tajltsik i nakdha lb. Jaxtm ti ms plek an yajtsiktalb neech ka bachutsik.
40023015	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a lonyal i chabl ani i pujal abal ka oktsi jun xita na belomtal ani tam ki beltsinich kal jun xita, a tajlich ke jachan an inik ka kale ms ban kibeltalb k tattsik.
40023016	Chojontl a chubl, jokol junkiltsik! xa ulaltsik ench: “Max jun xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, yab xata; por max kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an oro xi kwajat taja, yejat tm kin taja xowa in ulu.”
40023017	I kwajattsik jelti max i jokol ani yab i chalpadh! Pos jowa ms uluts: an oro, o an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xin tokwal an oro?
40023018	Ani a ulaltsik jeye ench: “Max jun xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, yab xata; por max kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pikbaxtalb xi taja kwajat, yejat tm kin taja xowa in ulu.”
40023019	I kwajattsik jelti max i jokol ani yab i chalpadh! Pos jowa ms uluts: an pikbaxtalb, o xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb xin tokwal an pikbaxtalb?
40023020	Pos xita in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, yab tokotki kwajat in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, klich jeye xowa kwajat taja.
40023021	Xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, yab tokotki kwajat in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij an at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in lej tsubklich jeye kal na Dios xi kwajat taja.
40023022	Anl jeye, xin lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij an walki, in lej tsubklich jeye kal tin bij nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani kal na Dios jeye, kom taja u buxkanal.
40023023	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a pidhl na Dios xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal an menta, an ans ani an komino, por yabtsik a tajl ti kij an takixtalb xi ms uluts, ke jaich an lujattalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani ka belatsik na Dios. Jech jaich yejat ka tajatsik, por yab ka jila ka pidha xowa in lujyal na Dios.
40023024	Tattsik, jokol junkiltsik, a tajltsik xowa xi yab lej uluts, por yab a tajltsik xowa xi ms uluts. In junwal jelti max a dhikltsik an chichim abal yab ka kutu, por jelti max a kutwaltsik an konl xin bij kameyo!
40023025	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a junwal jelti an baso ani an talab xi eblidhki ti takadh, abal alkidh ta itsch tokot a chalpmtsik an kwlch ani ka taja xowa yab lujat.
40023026	Fariseotsik, tattsik a junwal jelti max i jokol, okox ka taktsi alkidh na basojil, na talbil ani tokatich jeye tm neech ka jilkon xi eblidh.
40023027	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Pos a junwaltsik jelti an jlimtalb xi mukudh ani labidh u xalkanal eblidhki, por alkidh tsutsat kal in beklk i chemlomtsik ani kal xowakichki i ataxtalb.
40023028	Anchantsik teye, eblidh, jelti max i lujat iniktsik, por alkidh ta itsch tokot a chalpmtsik i kambixtalb ani i walastalb.
40023029	Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a lejkintsal xon ti jolidh an tiltsixtsik ani a dhibyal nin chilbil an lujat iniktsik,
40023030	ani a ulaltsik ench: “Max techak tu kwajat tam ti xechink ni weje pakliltsik, yabak i tolmiymal kin chemdha an tiltsixtsik.”
40023031	Kal jech, a ulalichtsik abal a kidhtal xin chemdhmal an tiltsixtsik.
40023032	Pos ka okchtsik ka taja xowa in tujmal na weje pakliltsik!
40023033	Tattsik a kidhtal jelti an chan! Yab neech ka ejto ka jekatsik abal yab ki kale ban kibeltalb.
40023034	Jaxtm, Nan neech tu abtsi ti tiltsixtsik, ti chalpadhtsik ani ti oktsixtsik. Por tattsik neech ka chemdha, taltsik neech ka pajkiytsik ba peltsidh te, taltsik neech ka chaawtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani neech ka kajnatsik bitsow ti bitsow.
40023035	Jaxtm, tattsik i walbidh kal nin chemtal ejtal an lujat iniktsik xi chemdhats, asta tam ti chemdh na Abel an lujat inik asta na Sakaras nin chakmil na Berekas, xi tattsik a chemdha tamchejlidh ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb.
40023036	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech an walastalb neech kin kitna an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij.
40023037	Atiklbtsik xi kwajl Jerusaln, xa chemdhl an tiltsixtsik ani a tujbayal nin abatwlejiltsik na Dios xi abtsinal! Ynlich tajat u lenmal tu junkutsik, jelt xan ti jun i pkwlam kwita in junkuwal nin tsitsik tm tin l in sutsts, por yab a lena!
40023038	Pos ka achatsik, an at xon ta kaknltsik na Dios, neech ka jilkon walbadh;
40023039	pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik asta kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka ulu ench: “Lbtajadh ti kwajat xi tl tin bij an Okxlb.”
40024001	Kale na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tam ti nechich, utukn kal nin exbaliltsik ani tujey ti ltsinal xan ti kubadh an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
40024002	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Xo a chutaltsik ejtal jech, por tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx. Ejtal neech ka julp.
40024003	Kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos ani tam ti na Jess taja ti buxl, kale ti usnal chinatki ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Ti ku utsa, jowki neech ka tmun jech? Jantom exl neech ki chuu tam i tlich ani tam u kunelich an pakwenib?
40024004	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ti ki kambiytsik ni jun xita.
40024005	Pos yn neech ka tsch ti kambixtsik ani neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo ani yn neech kin kambiy.
40024006	Neech ka achatsik ke exom i pjxtalb ani ke tich jun neech ka tujey, por yab ki jikeytsik. Pos anchan kool ka tmun, por yabl jaich an pakwenib.
40024007	Pos jun i kidhtalb neech ti pjx kal keet i kidhtalb ani jun i bitsow neech ti pjx kal keet i bitsow; neech ka wachin i kanab, i yawlchtsik ani neech ka lwkin an chabl putlki.
40024008	Por ejtal jech jaich nin tujtal an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tmun. Jelti an chukuxtalb xin achl jun i mmlb tam nechich kin wachiy i chakam.
40024009	Neech tm ki pidhntsik abal ki atax tajtsin, neech ki chemdhtsik ani neech ki atantsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik kal Nanki tu kwenta.
40024010	Tam jachan i kij, yn neech kin jilatsik ti belom, neech ka chkxintsik ani neech ka pdhnxintsik jn ani jn ban awiltalb.
40024011	Neech ka wachin yn i kambix tiltsixtsik, xi neech kin ulu ke kal a Dios ti abadh ti tiltsix ani yn i atiklbtsik neech kin kambiy.
40024012	Ani kal tin kwenta abal neech tajat ka wachin xowa yab alwa, yn neech kin jilatsik ti kndhx.
40024013	Por xita kin kuxuy ejtal jech, neech ka lowat.
40024014	Ani jech an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, neech ka tilan putlki an kayl abal ka exl kal ejtalki an kidhtalbtsik; ani tm neech ka ulchich an pakwenib.
40024015	Xita kin ajay jech, kin exbay: Tam ka chuutsik an kakadh ataxtalb xin tilmal an tiltsix Daniel kwajatich xon tu kaknb na Dios,
40024016	tm, xi kwajattsik ban chabl xi Judea, ki kaletsik ta chinkonal ban chnlom.
40024017	Xi kwajattsik tin b nin kim, yab ka paaytsik abal ka ochich kin iki jun xata alt;
40024018	ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiy abal kin iki nin wt.
40024019	Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi ka elan kodh jachan i kij o u tsutsdhom!
40024020	Ka kontsaltsik na Dios abal yab ka tmun jech tam chamay nibal tam in ktsjil i koyxnich;
40024021	pos jachan i kij, neech ka wachin jun i kakadh yajtsiktalb xi yab jayki wachink asta ti tujenek an kayl, nibal ms neech ka wachin jayki anchan.
40024022	Max na Dios yab kin wmdha jachan an pulek yajtsiktalb, yab xita neech ka loey; por kal tin kwenta in knl xi Jaj in takwymal, neech kin wmdha jachan an kij.
40024023	Tam jachan i kij, max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo”, o “ka tela, n kwajat”, yab ka beltsi.
40024024	Pos neech ka wachin i kambixtsik xi neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo, o ke jajich xi abadh ti tiltsix kal a Dios. Neech kin taja i pakdha exl ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb abal kin kambiy an atiklbtsik ani neech kin lena kin kambiytsik max kin ejto asta xi takudhichtsik kal na Dios.
40024025	Exomichtsik tu utsl ejtal xowa neech ka tmun.
40024026	Jaxtm, max ki utsantsik ench: “Ka telatsik, n kwajat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh”, yab ki kaletsik ka chuu; o max ki utsantsik: “Ka telatsik, j kwajat alt”, yab ka belatsik.
40024027	Pos anchan jelt xan tu lamkil an ly asta xon tu kalel na kts ani asta xon tu ochel, anchan neye ti neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40024028	Xon ti kwajat an chemlom, taja neech ka junkun an tottsik.
40024029	Tmki tam ka watch jech an yajtsiktalb, na kts neech ka jikwchin, na ch yab neech ka tajkan, na ttsik neech ka kwajlan ani asta an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki neech ka yoywat.
40024030	Neech tm ka xalkan walki nu exlil Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik. Ejtal an kidhtalbtsik xi yab u belom xi kwajattsik ban kayl, neech ka ukintsik tam tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tl ban tokow xi walki kal ejtal nu chp ani nu labidh tokt.
40024031	Neech ku aba nu tokat abatwlejiltsik abal kal jun i chapik jutsuxtalb i korneta kin junku xu takwymaltsik putlki, asta jun pake jun pake an kayl.
40024032	Ka exbaytsik xowa oktsixtalb in pidhnl an junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta in akan an igo: Tam dhlamich nin kweltsik ani exom ti kalel nin xekl, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
40024033	Anchan jeye, tam ka chuutsik ejtal jech, ka chobnatsik abal Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kunatich i kij neech kin tsch.
40024034	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun tam yabl chemnek na kidhtaltsik xi jech i kij.
40024035	An chabl ani an walki neech ka taley, por ejtal xowa u ulu, anchan neech ka tmun.
40024036	Por kal tin kwenta xowki jun bl ti neech kin tsch, yab xita in chob, nibal an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat walki, nibal nin Chakmil na Dios. Tokot in chob na Dios an Ttalb.
40024037	Anchan xan ti tmun tam ti xechin na No, anchan jeye ti neech ka tmun tam kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40024038	Jachan i kij, tam ti yabl tujenek an chapik bal kij, an atiklbtsik in ntsal ti kapul ani ti uchal, ti tomkinaltsik ani ti pidhnax tin chakmiltsik abal ka tomkin, asta tam tin bajaw xowki na No ti ochichich ban tan at;
40024039	ani yab in exbaytsik asta tam ti ulchich an chapik b ani chemechtsik ejtal. Anchan jeye ti neech ka tmun tam kin tsch jun Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40024040	Tam jachan i kij, chb i iniktsik xi kwajat ti tojnal junax bin ale, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
40024041	Chb i mmlbtsik xi kwajat ti cheel junax, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
40024042	Yabtsik p ki kwajay ukpipidh kom yab a chobtsik xowki ti neech kin tsch jun.
40024043	Por ka chobnatsik jech, ke max jun i dhabal at in chob xowki jun bl ti neech ka ulich an kw, yab neech ka wayich ani yab neech kin walka ka ochich an kw tin kim abal ka kwyat.
40024044	Jaxtm, yab ki kwajaytsik teye ukpipidh, pos tam yabtsik a tlm, neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40024045	Jitam j an alwa tjontsix xin tajl xowa ka utsan, xu jilnal kal nin ajtik punkudh abal kin kapundha xan ti yejat ejtal xi kwajat bin kim an ajtiklb?
40024046	Kijidh abal an tjontsix xi ka elan kal nin ajtik tam ka witsiy, in tajl xowa jilnk kin taja.
40024047	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka kwajb kal nin ajtik abal kin beletna ejtal xowa in kool an ajtiklb.
40024048	Por max jachan an tjontsix jaich jun i atax inik ani kin chalpay ke nin ajtik yab neech ka witsiy jikat,
40024049	ka tujey kin atax tajtsitsik xi keet nin at tojnaltsik, ka kwajch ti kapul ani ti uchal kal an uchltsik,
40024050	tam ka witsiy nin ajtik tam yab xata in tlm, nibal in chob max neech ka witsch,
40024051	neech ka pidhan jun i yajtsiktalb plek kal nin ajtik ani neech ka kwajb abal kin tamu jelt xan ti neech kin tamu an kambixtsik. Taja neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
40025001	Xan tu takix na Dios, in junwal jelti lju i tsidhantsik xin tyna i tajbaxtalbtsik xu joltsinal ti gs ani kaletsik kin bachu an tomkinl inik.
40025002	B xi jajtsik chalpadh tajat ani xi b yaba.
40025003	Xi yabtsik chalpadh, tam tin jna nin tajbaxtalbiltsik, yab in jnatsik i gs abal kin baltsi ti t tam kin tala;
40025004	por xi chalpadhtsik, in jnmaltsik i boteya tsutsat kal i gs, yab tokotki xi baltsidh nin tajbaxtalbiltsik.
40025005	Kom an tomkinl inik owch ani yab u ulel, tujey ti onkal wayal ejtal an tsidhantsik ani tayl wayichtsik.
40025006	Tam ti chejel akalich xna, achatm in kawidh kwintal jun xita xin ulu kawidh ench: “Nich tl an tomkinl inik, ki kaletsik ka bachu!”
40025007	Ejtal jachan an tsidhantsik chakay abal kin tojojoy nin tajbaxtalbiltsik.
40025008	Utsan tm ench an tsidhantsik xi chalpadh kal xi yabtsik chalpadh: “ti ku pidha weye w an ti gs abal exomich ti tepel ni tajbaxtalbil.”
40025009	Por tkon ench an tsidhantsik xi chalpadh: “Yaba, xib yab tm neech ka kidhey abal waw nibal abal tattsik. Ms alwa ki kale ka chaaytsik xon tu nujnal ani ka chaay abal tattsik.”
40025010	Por lejat xi b an tsidhantsik kalnek ti chaum an ti gs, ulich an tomkinl inik. An tsidhantsik xi ta ti kwajat tojojodhtsik, ochichtsik ja junax kal an tomkinl inik ban tomkixtalb ani tayl mapyat an wileb.
40025011	Tayl ulich xi b an tsidhantsik ani in ulutsik ench: “Ajtik, ajtik, ti ku japtsi!”
40025012	Por tkoyattsik ench: “Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab tu exll.”
40025013	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabtsik p ki kwajay i ukpipidh, pos yabtsik a chob xowki jun bl ti neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
40025014	Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i inik, xi tam ti nechich ka kalch pl bitsow, in kaniy nin tojnliltsik ani in pidhatsik ti tumn kin tjondha.
40025015	Jn ti b in pidha bo mil i patl tumn, jn chab mil ani xi jn in pidha mil i patl tumn; pidhan juntsik ti b xantiki ti chutat neech kin ejto kin tjondha ani tayl, kale tm w ti belal.
40025016	An tjontsix xin bachu bo mil i patl tumn, in taja i limtalb kal an tumn ani in ta anlki in yanl.
40025017	An tjontsix xi jiltsin chab mil, anlki jeye tin taja ani in ta jeye chab mil ms.
40025018	Por xi pidhan tokot mil kal nin ajtik, kale kin cholka i chabl ani in tapa taja an tumn.
40025019	Ms tayl, witsiy nin ajtik jachan an tjontsixtsik ani tujey kin taja i kwenta kal jajtsik.
40025020	Ulich okox xin bachmal bo mil i patl tumn, in pidha nin ajtik bl bo mil ani in utsa ench: “Ajtik, bo mil i patl tumn tin pidha ani j kwajat bo mil ms xu ta kl.”
40025021	Utsan ench kal nin ajtik: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix ani i lujat; kom a tjondha alwa xowa w tu pidha, neech tu pidha ms. Ki ochich ani ki kulb kal nan.”
40025022	Tayl ulich jeye an tjontsix xin bachm chab mil i patl tumn ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, tin pidha chab mil i patl tumn ani j kwajat chab mil ms xu ta kl.”
40025023	Utsan ench kal nin ajtik: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix ani i lujat; kom a tjondha alwa xowa w tu pidha, neech tu pidha ms. Ki ochich ani ki kulb kal nan.”
40025024	Por tam ti ulich an tjontsix xin bachmal mil i patl tumn, in utsa ench nin ajtik: “Ajtik, nan u chob abal tat kidhat tajat a konyal, ke i kjol xon ti yab i mmadh ani a junkuwal nin wall an tayablb xon ti yab a bukmal i iyalb.
40025025	Jaxtm tu jikna, in kale ani u joliy na tumnal al chabl. Por j kwajat xi tin pidhmal.”
40025026	Tkoyat ench kal nin ajtik: “Atax tojnal ani be, max a chobich abal in kjol xon ti yab in mmadh ani u junkuwal nin wall an tayablb xon ti yab u bukmal i iyalb,
40025027	jantki ti yab a kwajba nu tumnal xon tu tjondhb abal tam kin witsiy, ku bachu nu tumnal klich xowa in tmal?”
40025028	Utsan tm ench kal an ajtiklb xi ta ti kwajattsik: “Ka kntsi xin kool mil an patl tumn ani ka pidha xin kool lju i mil.
40025029	Pos xita xin kool, neech ka pidhan ani neech kin koy ms yn; por xi yab in kool, neech ka kntsin asta xowa in chalpayal in kool.
40025030	Ani jech an tjontsix xi yab xata ti alwa, ka kldha elb ban jikwaxtalb, xon ti neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
40025031	Tam Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik kin tsch kal ejtal nu labidh tokt ani kal ejtal nu tokat abatwlejiltsik, tm neech kin buxkan bu labidh tokat kwajtalbil abal tin takix.
40025032	Ejtal an atiklbtsik neech ka junkun tu tamt ani tm neech ku takuytsik, jelt xan ti an belkol borrego in kwajbl pl an borregotsik ani pl jeye an chibotsik.
40025033	Neech kin kwajba an borregotsik tin ejt ani an chibotsik tin kwatab.
40025034	An Pulek Takix neech tm kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik tin ejt: “Jalaichtsik, xi lbtajadhichtsik kal nu Tta ani ka bachchtsik xon ti neech ta takix, xi bijtsidhich neech ka takiy asta tam ti tujeyki an kayl.
40025035	Pos in kaay ani tin kapundhatsik; in tsikey ani tin pidhatsik ti ja; in xechin jelti pl inik ani tin koydhatsik.
40025036	U yntsi u kudhkmil ani tin pidhatsik; in yawlch ani tin lnatsik; in wikan ani i kaletsik ti kin lna.”
40025037	Xi lujattsik neech tm kin ulutsik ench: “Ajtik, jowki ta kainek ani tu kapundhmal? O jowki ta tsikenek ani tu pidhmal ti ja?
40025038	Jowki ta xechink jelti pl inik ani tu koydhmal? O a yntsmal a kudhkmil ani tu pidhmal?
40025039	Jowki ta yawlmadh o i wiknk ani u kalnek tu lna?”
40025040	Ani neech ka tkoyattsik ench kal an Pulek Takix: “Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa a tajtsi jn nu at kidhbtsik, maske yab lej ultalb, Nan tin tajtsmaltsik.”
40025041	An Pulek Takix neech jeye tm kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik tin kwatab: “Ki wixkintsik tech kal Nan, atiklbtsik xi atax; ki kalchtsik ban kamal xi yab jayki u tepel xi kwajat tojojodh abal an lej atax ani abal nin tjontsixiltsik.
40025042	Pos in kaay ani yab tin kapundhatsik; in tsikey ani yabtsik tin pidha ti ja;
40025043	in xechin jelti pl inik ani yabtsik tin koydha. U yntsi u kudhkmil ani yabtsik tin pidha; in yawlch ani in wikan ani yabtsik i kale tin lna.”
40025044	Neech tm kin ulutsik jeye ench: “Ajtik, jowki ta xechink ta kal, ta tsikl, jelti pl inik, a yntsal a kudhkmil, ta yaul, o ta wiknl ani yab tu tolmiymal?”
40025045	Ani neech ka tkoyattsik ench kal an Pulek Takix: “Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa yab a tajtsi ni jun xita, maske jaich xi yab lej ultalb, yab jeye tin tajtsmaltsik Nan.”
40025046	Jechtsik neech ban yajtsiktalb ani xi lujattsik neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
40026001	Tam ti na Jess in okoy kin ulu ejtal jech, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik:
40026002	—Jelt xan ta chobichtsik, t chb a kts neech kin bajch in ajb an paskwa; ani Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn abal kin chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
40026003	Jachan i kij, an oklek pletsik, an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani nin oklkil an judotsik, junkuntsik bin elbil nin kim na Kayfs, nin oklkil an pletsik.
40026004	Taja, in tajatsik i kw abal kin chalpay xan ti kin uwa kin yakwa na Jess kal i kambixtalb ani kin chemdha.
40026005	Por in ulaltsik ench: —Yab ki yakwa tam exom an ajib abal yab ka kwajaytsik ti pjx an atiklb.
40026006	Na Jess kwajat Betania, bin kim na Simn xin kymal an kwajat atax tt;
40026007	ani utukn kal jun i mmlb xin tsidhl jun i frasko xi tajadh kal i alabastro tsutsat kal i niwiytalb xi kajbidh. Tam ti na Jess kwajat ban mesa, joltsin an ti niwiytalb bin k kal an mmlb.
40026008	Tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, chakuytsik ani in ulu ench: —Jantki ti odhn jech an niwiytalb?
40026009	Ka nujwatwiik kajbidh jech an niwiytalb abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik.
40026010	Achantsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Jantki ta itixbdhltsik jech an mmlb? Jech xowa tin tajtsi, alwa tajat.
40026011	Pos an chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik, por Nan yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
40026012	Xowa in taja jech an mmlb, tam tin joltsi an ti niwiytalb bu tul, jaich abal ti kin tojojontsi an tu tul abal ka kwajch tojojodh tam ka jolyat.
40026013	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xntikichki ka tilan jech an alwa tilab ba putlki an kayl, neech jeye ka tilan xowa in taja jech an mmlb abal ka chalpayat.
40026014	Jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, xu bijyb ta Judas Iskariote, kale ti kw kal an oklek pletsik
40026015	ani in utsatsik ench: —Jy i patl tumn neech ti kin pidhatsik max tu pidhatsik an ta Jess? Utsan tm kal an oklek pletsik abal neech ka pidhan jun inik lju i patl tumn xi tajadh kal i plata.
40026016	Ani asta tam ti tm, na Judas in tuju kin aliy xan ti kin pidhna na Jess.
40026017	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an ajib tam u kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, an exbaltsik utey ba na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jn ta l ki tojojoy an kapnl abal ka kapu an wiyadh borrego tin kwenta an paskwa?
40026018	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ki kaletsik ban bitsow bin kim jun i inik ani ka utsatsik ench: “An Oktsix in ulu ench: Exomich in bajwal an ora xowki neech kin chemdh ani ba na kim neech ku kapu an kapnl kal tin kwenta an paskwa junax kal nu exbaliltsik.”
40026019	An exbaltsik in taja xan ti utsantsik kal na Jess ani in tojojoytsik an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
40026020	Tam ti jikwchin, na Jess buxkan ti kapul ban mesa junax kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik;
40026021	ani lejat kwajat ti kapultsik, in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jn ti b xi tattsik neech ti kin pidhna ban atiklbtsik xi tin atl.
40026022	Tepintsik tm tajat ani tujey ti konoxtsik juntsik ti juntsik ench: —Ajtik, awxe nan?
40026023	Tkon na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Xita xi kwajat ti kapul junax kal Nan ban talab, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna.
40026024	Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna ejtal xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab kal Nan tu kwenta; por chojontl in chubl an inik xi ti kin pidhna! Msakwiik alwa abal jaj max yabak wachink ti chakam.
40026025	Kwin tm na Judas, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn ani in ulu ench: —Oktsix, nanxe? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tat.
40026026	Lejat kwajattsik ti kapul, na Jess in tyna an pan ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios. In peja tm an pan, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in ulu ench: —Ka bachutsik ani ka kapu, jech jaich nu tul.
40026027	Tayl in tyna jun i lejab baltsidh kal i yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka uchatsik ejtal ta b jech an yajtsik uxnl,
40026028	pos jech, jaich nu xichl xi neech kin jalblna an t lejkintalb. Jaich xi neech ku wakla tam kin chemdh abal yn xita tin alwabl ani abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik.
40026029	Pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta kin bajaw xowki neech ku ucha kal tattsik an t yajtsik uxnl xon tu takix nu Tta.
40026030	Tam ti okonich ti ajattsik, kaletsik ban chn xu bijyb Olibos.
40026031	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ejtal tattsik neech ti kin jilatsik jech i akal; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Neech ku chemdha an belkol borregotsik ani neech ka bukey an borregotsik.”
40026032	Por tam kin ejech ti t, neech kin okxin kin kale Galilea ani tattsik tayl.
40026033	Tkoyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Maske ejtal ti ki jila, nan yaba.
40026034	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke jech i akal, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, xl neech ka ulu ke yab tin exll.
40026035	Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Maske kin utsan ke neech kin chemdh junax kal Tat, yab neech ku ulu ke yab tu exll. Ani ejtal an exbaltsik anlki tin ulu.
40026036	Ulich tm na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Jetseman ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki buxkantsik tech, lejat Nan in neech n tin l.
40026037	In jna na Pedro ani chablam nin chakmiltsik na Sebedeo ani tujey kin acha jun i pulek tepintalb tin itsch.
40026038	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —U achl tu ejattal jun i pulek tepintalb xi neech ku chmay. Ki jilkontsik tech ani yab ki wayichtsik.
40026039	Kale tm na Jess lej w t ani, tudhlan kutl asta chabl, lan ani in utsa ench na Dios: —Tta, max Tat a l ka chuu yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka ejto ti kin wixkintsi; por yab ka tjan xan ti Nan u l, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
40026040	Witsiy tm xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela. In utsa tm ench na Pedro: —Yabtsik a ejto ka kuxuy ki kwajay ejat kal Nan ela jun i ora?
40026041	Yabtsik ki wayich ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax. Tsubax kejle ke na ejattal in l ka lan, por na tul yab likat.
40026042	Kale jun tin chabtal, lan ani in ulu ench: —Tta, max kool ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
40026043	Witsiy tm tin chabtal xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani u wayaltsik jun tin ela, kom u mtnalichtsik tajat nin wal kal an akal.
40026044	In jilatsik tm, kale jun ti l tin oxtal ani anlki jun ti lan.
40026045	Witsiy tm tin oxtal xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Xo awilich ka ntsitsik ta wayal ani ta koyol. In bajch an ora xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walablomtsik.
40026046	Ki chakchtsik ani wanch; nich tl xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
40026047	Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess tam ti ulich na Judas, xi jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik. Kal jaj, ta ti tl yn i atiklbtsik teykodh kal i machttsik ani i te. Abnktsik kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani kal in oklkil an judotsik.
40026048	Na Judas, xi neech an ti pidhnax, in utsmalichtsik xowa exl neech kin taja, ench tin utsmaltsik: —Xi ku chuchbay, jaich ka yakwatsik.
40026049	Utey tm ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Janta uwats, Oktsix! Ani in chuchbay.
40026050	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jab, jantki ta tsinek? Uteytsik tm, in yakwa na Jess ani in jna ti wiknl.
40026051	Por jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat kal na Jess, in jixna nin machtil ani in patntsi tin xuchun jun in tojnlil an oklek pletsik.
40026052	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka tapa an macht. Pos ejtal xu pjxtsik kal i macht, kal i macht jeye ti neech ka chemdh.
40026053	Yab a chob ke Nan neech ku ejto ku kontsi nu Tta ani Jaj neech ti kin abtsi xoki lajuchb i pakdha kwene i tokat abatwletsik abal ti kin loo?
40026054	Por max ku taja anchan, jan ti neech ka tmun xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke anchan yejat ka tmun?
40026055	Tmki jachan, utsan ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i macht ani kal i te abal ti kin yakwa, jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun in kw? Tsudhey ka tsudhey in buxkank kal tattsik tin oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani yab jayki tin yakwmaltsik.
40026056	Por ejtal jech exom ti tmnal abal ka tjan xan tin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab. Tmki jachan, ejtal an exbaltsik in jiloloy kwetm na Jess ani kaletsik ti chinkonal.
40026057	Xin tajatsik ti ykwal, in jna na Jess ba na Kaifs, nin oklkil an pletsik. Taja, junkunk an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb ani nin oklkil an judotsik.
40026058	Por na Pedro w wwnaxin asta bin elbil nin oklkiltsik an pletsik. Ochich taja ani buxkan kal an belkoltsik abal in l kin chuu xan ti neech ka kale ti oknal jech.
40026059	Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, nin oklkil an judotsik ani ejtal an Junkulom Awiltalb, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa kin ani walbiy na Jess abal kin ejtotsik kin ulu ka chemdh.
40026060	Por yab in elatsik xan ti kin ani walbiy, maske yn i kambix lnaxtsik ulich. Por tayl ulich chb i kambix lnaxtsik,
40026061	xin ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik in ulm ench: “Neech ku ejto ku paku jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ku kuba ti t ti x a kts.”
40026062	Chakay tm an oklek ple ani in konoy ench na Jess: —Janty a ulal kal jech tin kwenta? Janty in y xi jech i kwajat ta usnal?
40026063	Por na Jess yab tkon. Utsan tm ench kal an oklek pletsik: —Kal tin bij na Dios xi ejat, tu kontsal abal ti ku utsa max tatich lejtal ni Kristo xi Chakmlb kal na Dios.
40026064	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan. Ani tu utsltsik jeye, ke asta xo neech tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, buxl tin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja. Ani neech jeye ti kin chuutsik tam in tl ban tokow xi walki.
40026065	Kom chakuy tajat an oklek pletsik, in michna nin xekt xin kwajbm ani in ulu ench: —Jech an inik in odhbijyalich na Dios kal xowa in ulal; yabich ms i yntsal ni jun i lnax. Tattsik a acha xan tin odhbijiy na Dios kal xowa in ulu,
40026066	janty xo a chalpayaltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Walbidh ti kwajat ani yejat ka chemdh.
40026067	Tubkayat tm bin wal ani chawat. Taltsik in pikiy bin wal
40026068	ani in utsltsik ench: —Kom Tat i Kristo, ti ku utsa xita ti chaaw!
40026069	Tam ti jachan, lejat na Pedro buxl bin elbil an at, utukn kal jun i mmlb xu tjontsix taja ani utsan kl ench: —Tat junax teye ta xeech kal na Jess, xi Galilea u kwajl.
40026070	Por na Pedro in ulu ke yab ani tin tamt ejtal xi ta ti kwajattsik, ench tin ulu: —Yab u chob xanty a till.
40026071	Tam ti na Pedro nechich ban wileb, chutat jun kal keet i mmlb ani an mmlb, in utsa ench xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Jech an inik junax jeye ti xeech kal na Jess, xi Nasaret u kwajl.
40026072	Por in ulu jun na Pedro ke yab ani, in lej tsubax ulu ench: —Yab u exll jachan an inik.
40026073	Ms tayl, utukn na Pedro kal xi ttsik ti kwajat ani utsan ench: —Tsubax lejtal, tat a kidhtal teye nin exbaliltsik na Jess, pos anlki teye i kw jelti jajtsik.
40026074	Tujey tm na Pedro kin lej tsubax ulu ench: —Yab u exll jachan an inik. Ani tmki jachan, dhjan jun i pekel.
40026075	In chalpna tm na Pedro xanty ti usnk kal na Jess: “Tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.” Na Pedro kale elb ani ukin tajat kal i tepintalb.
40027001	Tam ti tsudhey, ejtal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik, in taja i kw xan ti kin uwatsik abal kin chemdha na Jess.
40027002	In jnatsik wikadh na Jess ani in pidhna ba na Ponsio Pilato, xi jaich an pulek awiltalb.
40027003	Tam ti na Judas xin taja ti pidhnax an ta Jess abal ka chemdh, in chuu abal walbiyatich na Jess, in acha abal yab alwa xowa in taja, in jalkuy nin chalab ani kale kin witsbantsi xi jun inik lju an tumn an oklek pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik.
40027004	In utsatsik ench: —Nan u wala abal u pidhna ka chemdh jun i inik xi yab walbidh. Por tkoyat ench kal jajtsik: —Waw yab i kwenta xanty a taja. Tatich teye.
40027005	In petna tm na Judas an tumn ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, kale ani in pala tinb.
40027006	Nin oklkil an pletsik in pena an tumn ani in ulutsik ench: —Yab alwa ki baliy jech an tumn xon tu tapb an pikbantsixtalb, kom in jalbl in chemtal jun i inik.
40027007	In tajatsik tm i kw abal kin chaay kal jachan an tumn jun i chabl xu bijyb tin Chablil i tojom pats, xon ti ka jolyat an pl iniktsik.
40027008	Jaxtm ti bijyat jachan an chabl asta xo, tin “Chablil i Xich.”
40027009	Ani anchan, tmunich xan tin ulmal ench an tiltsix Jeremas: In bachutsik xi jun inik lju an patl tumn xi tajadh kal i plata, nin jalbl an inik xi an israelitatsik in kwajbantsi,
40027010	ani kl tin chaaytsik an chabl xu bijyb tin Chablil i tojom pats, jelt xan tin utsan kal an Okxlb.
40027011	Na Jess jn tin tamt an pulek awiltalb ani konyat ench kal an pulek awiltalb: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan.
40027012	Ani tam ti nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik kwajat in walbiyal na Jess, Jaj yab u tknal.
40027013	Utsan tm ench kal na Pilato: —Yabxe a achl ejtal xowa exom ta usnal?
40027014	Por na Jess yab kuchun, jaxtm ti labandhjich tokot an pulek awiltalb ani yabich in chob xanty kin chalpay.
40027015	Pos alwaich, tam exomich an ajib, an pulek awiltalb in walkl jun i wiknl, xi ka kontsin kal an atiklbtsik.
40027016	Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat jun i wiknl xi exlmte tajat xu bijyb ta Barrabs;
40027017	ani tam ti an atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat junkunk, konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Jita a l ka chuutsik ku walka: na Barrabs o na Jess xu bijyb ti Kristo?
40027018	Na Pilato in ulu anchan, kom in chob ke na Jess pidhnats abal u atnal.
40027019	Lejat na Pilato buxl xon tu ljundhom, abn ti usnal ench kal nin tomtal: “Yab ka tajtsi xata jachan an lujat inik, pos ti akal u koy jun i kakadh watsib kal Jaj tin kwenta.”
40027020	Por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik, in pidhkwliy an atiklbtsik abal kin konoy ka walkantsat ta Barrabs ani ka chemdh na Jess.
40027021	Tawntsik jun kal an pulek awiltalb ani konyattsik ench: —Jita a l ka chuutsik ku walka xi jech chb? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Barrabs.
40027022	Konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty ku tajtsi na Jess, xu bijyb ti Kristo? Ejtal tkontsik ench: —Ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
40027023	Utsantsik tm ench kal an pulek awiltalb: —Pos, jantom walastalb in tajm? Por jajtsik in ulu jun kawidh ench: —Ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
40027024	Tam tin chuu na Pilato abal yab xata neech kin exbay, tokot exomich in pjxlindhl ms an atiklbtsik, in abna ka iktsin ti ja, in taka nin kubak tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani in ulu ench: —Nan yab u l kin walbin kal nin chemtal jech an lujat inik, tattsik a chob xanty a tajl.
40027025	Ani ejtal an atiklbtsik tkon ench: —Waw ani ni chakmiltsik ku jilkon u walbidh kal nin chemtal!
40027026	Na Pilato in walka tm na Barrabs, in abna ka lekbayat na Jess ani in pidhnaich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
40027027	Tayl, nin soldadojiltsik an pulek awiltalb in jnatsik na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb, in junku ejtal an soldadotsik ani wiliyat na Jess kal jech an soldadotsik.
40027028	Kotsin tm tin kudhkmil ani xeketliyat kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn.

40027030	Tubkayat jeye, u kntsinal an ti te ani u toxyb kl bin k.
40027031	Tam ti okon ti labdhnb, wkontsatich tm an ti chak kudhkum, kwajbantsat xi Jaj in kudhkmil ani jnjich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
40027032	Tam tu kalelichtsik, elan jun i inik xu kwajl Sirene, xu bijyb ta Simn ani tajtsin ti chplb abal kin kitnantsi an ti peltsidh te xin nedhl na Jess.
40027033	Ulichtsik tm ba jun i chabl xu bijyb Glgota. Ti tnek kw, Glgota, in l kin ulu: “In chablil in beklk in k i chemlom inik.”

40027036	Buxkantsik tm taja abal kin beletna.

40027038	Pajkiyat jeye kal na Jess chb i kwtsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.

40027040	ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat, xa ulal ke neech ka paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ti x a kts neech ka kuba ti t, ka loo xo tab. Max Tatich lejtal ni Chakmlb kal na Dios, ki paay xo ban peltsidh te.
40027041	Anchan jeye tu labdhnb kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kal an fariseotsik, kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani u tsxtsik ench:
40027042	—In lom keet, por xo yab in ejto kin loo tinb. Max Jajich lejtal nin Pulek Takxal an Israelitatsik, ka paay xo ban peltsidh te abal ki belaich.

40027044	An kwtsik xi ta ti kwajattsik pajkidh junax kal Jaj, u odhbijixtsik jeye.

40027047	Taltsik xi taja ti kwajat, in acha jech ani in ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik kwajat in tawnl an tiltsix Elas.
40027048	Tmki jachan, jn ti b xi ta ti kwajattsik, kale adhik kin iki jun i kwinim ani in axdha ba jiliy jaytsik uxnl. In kwajba bin tsm jun i te ani in utuntsi na Jess abal kin juchu.

40027055	T jeye ti kwajat i mmlbtsik ti w telom, xin juniknmaltsik na Jess asta Galilea ani in tjontsmaltsik.

40027059	Na Jos in bachu nin tul na Jess, in boliy kal jun i alabl kudhkum
40027060	ani in kwajba ba jun i t jlimtalb, xi jaj in ulmal ka cholkantsat ba jun i tujub chn. Tam tin paxkiymich an jlimtalb kal jun i yejche tujub, kalch tm.

40027063	ani in utsatsik ench: —Paylomlb, i chalpaymal ke jachan an kambix inik in ulmal tam ti bl ejat, ke neech ka ejech tin xlb a kts.
40027064	Jaxtm, i konyal abal ka abna ka beletn jachan an jlimtalb asta ka watey xi x a kts. Yab telab ka kale nin exbaliltsik akal, kin kweytsik nin tul na Jess ani tayl kin utsa an atiklbtsik ench: “Ejech ti t.” Max ka tmun anchan, jachan an kambixtalb ms tm plek k xi okox.

40028001	Tam ti watch in ktsjil an koyxnich ani exomich ti tsudhl tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, na Mara Magdalena ani na jn na Mara, kaletsik kin lna xon ti jolidh na Jess.
40028002	Jun jiktowl ti tujey ti lwk an chabl. Jaich abal jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb painek walki ani in wkoy an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb. Tayl, buxkan ban tujub.

40028006	Yab waach tech, pos ejnek ti t, jelt xan tin ulmal. Jala ka chuutsik xon ti kwajbantsidh an tin tul.
40028007	Ki kaletsik jikat ani ka utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: “Jaj chemech por ejech ti t, okxinkich Galilea ani taja neech ka chuutsik.” Jech jaich xowa kool tu utsatsik.
40028008	Kale tm an mmlbtsik jikatki ban jlimtalb, u jikltsik por u kulbl; ani kaletsik jikat kin ltsi an exbaltsik.

40028012	Jech an oklektsik, kale ti kw kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani tam tin chalpaymichtsik xanty neech kin taja, in pidhatsik tm yn ti tumn an soldadotsik
40028013	ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka ulutsik ke tam ti akal, lejat i kwajat ta wayaltsik, nin exbaliltsik na Jess ulich ani in kweytsik nin tul na Jess.

40028019	Jaxtm, ki kaletsik putlki an kayl ani ka oktsi an atiklbtsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik; ka pujaytsik tin bij an Ttalb, an Chakmlb ani an Tokat Ejattalb.

41001001	Ench ti kwajat dhutsadh xan ti tujey an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xowa in taja na Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios.
41001002	An tiltsix Isaas in jilm dhutsadh xowa na Dios in utsa nin Chakmil. Ench tin jila dhutsadh: Neech ku aba nu abatwlejil abal ka okxin xon ti neech ki ulich. Jaj neech ti ki tojojontsi an ti bl.
41001003	Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: Ka tojojontschtsik tin blil an Ajtiklb. “Ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa; abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.”
41001004	Anchan ti tmun tam ti ulich na Juan ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. In pujyal taja an atiklbtsik ani in utsl abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom. In utsl ka pujanichtsik abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik kal na Dios.
41001005	Ejtal xu kwajltsik ban bitsow Jerusaln ani xu kwajltsik jeye ban kwentsaltsik xu taknal ban chabl xi Judea, u kaleltsik kin axtsi xowa in ulal na Juan. Tam kin lujutsik nin walastalbil, u pujybichtsik tm kal na Juan ban walja Jordn.
41001006	Na Juan u xeketlinal kal i xeketlb xi tajadh kal in xil an konl xu bijyb kameyo ani in wikl nin tsukul kal i t. Nin kapwl, jaich an pichich ani an alte chiik.
41001007	Jaj u tiltsix ench: —Wich u kibel ka ulich jun i inik xin kool ms i awiltalb k nan. Nan yab xata u y nibal abal kin kutpan ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.
41001008	Nan tu pujymaltsik kal i ja, por Jaj neech ti ki pujaytsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb.

41001014	Tayl, tam ti balidhich na Juan ban wikaxte, na Jess kale Galilea. In tila taja an alwa tilab xin ulal xan tu takix na Dios.

41001016	Jun i kij neech ti belal na Jess tin waltsik an pujal xi Galilea ani in chuu na Simn junax kal nin kidhb Andrs, xi kwajat in petnltsik nin jixb an tool ban ja, kom jajtsik u jixom tool.
41001017	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Tattsik i jixom tool, por xo neech tu oktsi xan ti ka aliy an atiklbtsik xi neech ti kin bela.

41001020	In kaniytsik jeye abal ka junikn kl. In jilatsik tm nin tta Sebedeo ban tan kal an tojnaltsik ani kaletsik kal na Jess.
41001021	Kaletsik tm ban bitsow Kapernam ani tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Jess ochich ti oktsix ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
