41001023	T jeye ti kwajat alt xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, jun i inik xi ochadh kal jun i atax ejattalb ani dhjaxin kawidh ench:
41001024	—Janty a l kal waw, Jess xi Nasaret? I tsinekxe abal ti ku kibdha? Nan tu exll ani u chob ke Tat i Tokat Chakmlb kal na Dios.
41001025	Kwiyan tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Ki chamkan ani ki kale ba jech an inik!
41001026	An atax ejattalb in wipipindha chapik an inik, dhjan kawidh ani tmki ti kale ba jachan an inik.
41001027	Ejtal an atiklbtsik laban tajat ani u tsxtsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu jech xowa tmun? Jantom t oktsixtalb xin oktsixnl? Abal Jaj in kool i awiltalb kin utsa ka kale an atax ejattalb ani u axtsinal!
41001028	Ejtal xowa in taja na Jess, jikatki ti chobn kal ejtal xu kwajltsik ban pulek chabl xi Galilea.
41001029	Tam ti kalchtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, na Jess kale bin kim na Simn ani na Andrs, junikn kal na Jakobo ani na Juan.
41001030	Nin mm na Simn ta ti kwachat abal u kakl ani utsan na Jess, ke an mmlb u yaul.
41001031	Ochich tm xon ti kwajat an yaul, in tyna bin kubak ani in dhaya. Tsusbl ti wkon an kaklch. Tayl, kapundh na Jess kal an mmlb ani an junkiltsik jeye.
41001032	Tam ti ochenekich na kts ani jikwchinkich, jntsin xon ti kwajat na Jess ejtal an ti yaultsik ani ejtal jeye xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik.
41001033	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow, junkun tin tamt in wilbil an at.
41001034	Jeldh kal na Jess yn i yaultsik kal xowakich i yawlchtsik xin kool ani kldhantsat jeye yn ti atax ejattalb xi kl ti ochadhtsik. Na Jess u exlb kal an atax ejattalbtsik, jaxtm na Jess yab in walka kin ulutsik xitam j jeye Jaj.
41001035	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, bl tajat jikwax ti chakay na Jess. Kale ban bitsow ani kale ti l walte xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
41001036	Tayl, na Simn kl nin juniktsik kale kin aliy na Jess putlki.
41001037	Tam tin ela na Jess, in utsatsik ench: —Ejtaltsik exom ti ayal.
41001038	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Wana ki lna an pl kwentsaltsik xi utat abal ku tiltsitsik jeye an ti alwa tilab, pos jaich tin tsinek tech ti kayl.
41001039	Anchan ti xechin na Jess ti tiltsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb putlki Galilea ani ti kldhantsix an ti atax ejattalbtsik.
41001040	Utukn tm na Jess kal jun i inik xu yaul kal an kwajat atax tt, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Max a l, neech ka ejto ti kin jeldha kal jeche an yawlch xu kool.
41001041	Na Jess in yajnantsi an yaul, in taka ani in utsa ench: —U l ani xo i jelch.
41001042	Tmki ti wkon ejtal an kwajat atax tt ani jilkon jelnek an inik.
41001043	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka ltsi xowa tu tajtsi. Tokot ki kale xon ti kwajat nin pleil an israelitatsik abal ki chutat ani ka kwajbantsi na Dios an ti pikbantsixtalb jelt xan tin ulmal na Moiss abal kin chobna ejtaltsik ke i jelch.
41001045	Por tam ti kalch an inik, in tuju kin tiltsi xitakich xowa tajtsin kal na Jess. Putlki tin tila. Jaxtm na Jess yabich in ejto ka xechin tametlb ba ni jun i bitsow. U jilkonal xon ti yab kwajtsidh, por blki u utuknb kal an atiklbtsik xi tl putlki.
41002001	Tayl, tam ti watenekich chb x a kts, witsiy jun na Jess ban bitsow xi Kapernam. Tam ti chobn abal ta ti kwajat ban at xon tu kubl,
41002002	jikatki ti junkun yn i atiklbtsik ke nibalich ejtidh tin tamt in wilbil an at ani Jaj in tiltsaltsik tin kwintal na Dios.
41002003	Ulich tm i iniktsik xin tsidhl jun i yaul inik xi yab in ejtowal ti belal. Kitmte tu tsidhb bin chaytil kal ch ti b.
41002004	In lwiik kin dhatsik alt xon ti kwajat na Jess, por yab in ejtotsik abal ta ti kwajat yn i atiklbtsik. Xowa in tajatsik tm, kadhiytsik tin b an at ani in wixkintsi w tin jujl. Taja tin dha ani tin paba an yaul kal nin chaytil asta xon ti kwajat na Jess.
41002005	Tam ti na Jess in chuu xanty in tajatsik, in chobna abal u belnal kal jajtsik; jaxtm tin utsa ench an inik: —Jab, na walastalbil pakwlantsidh ti kwajat.
41002006	T jeye ti buxutsik chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xin chalpayaltsik ench:
41002007	“Jantki tu kw yab alwa jech an inik? Abal u kw jelti max u Dios. Tokot a Dios in ejtowal ti pakwlantsix an ti walastalb.”
41002008	Por na Jess in chobna xanty u chalpantsb kal an oktsixtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin chalpantsal anchan?
41002009	Jowa ms yab tojlb ku utsa an yaul: “Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat”, o ku utsa: “Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley”?
41002010	Pos neech tu xalkantsitsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb tech ti chabl abal ku pakwlantsi i walastalbtsik. Utsan tm ench an yaul kal na Jess:
41002011	—Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki kalch ta kim.
41002012	Chakay tm an inik, in dhaya nin chaytil ani kalch tm tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik. Ejtal xi tajatsik ti kwajat, laban tajat, in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij na Dios ani in ulaltsik ench: —Yab jayki i chumal jun xata jelti jech.
41002013	Tayl, witsiy jun na Jess bin waltsik an pujal ani tam ti an atiklbtsik utey xon ti Jaj kwajat, in oktsitsik.
41002014	Tam ti exomich ti watel ban bl, in chuu jun i inik buxl xon tu bachwb an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma. An bachkul tumn in bij ta Leb, nin kwitlil na Alfeo. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Chakay tm na Leb ani in wwna.
41002015	Tayl, na Jess kwajat ti kapul bin kim na Leb junax kal nin exbaliltsik, kal yn i bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal an walablomtsik kom yn xita kl ti wwnadh.
41002016	Por an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani an fariseotsik, tam tin chuu ti kapul na Jess junax kal an walablomtsik ani kal an bachkul jalbixtalb, in konoy ench an exbaltsik: —Jantki tu kapul na Oktsxal kal an bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal an walablomtsik?
41002017	Tam ti na Jess in acha xowa in ulutsik, in utsatsik ench: —Xu yaul, jaich nin yntsal an illix; xi yab u yaul, yab in yntsal. Anchan jeye, an walablomtsik jaich xita tin yntsal. Jaxtm, Nan yab in tsinek ku aliy xi xeechtsik lujat, in tsinek ku aliy xi walbidhtsik abal ki jilaichtsik ti walablom.
41002018	Jun i kij, tam ti nin exbaliltsik na Juan klin ani nin exbaliltsik jeye an fariseotsik, ulich chb x i atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess abal ka konyat ench: —Jantki tu kl an fariseotsik, nin exbaliltsik jeye na Juan ani na exbaliltsik yaba?
41002019	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Awxe neech kin ejto ka klintsik xi kanidh ba jun i tomkixtalb tam bl kwajat an tomkinl inik kal jajtsik? Yaba!
41002020	Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam an tomkinl inik neech ka wixkintsat ani nechich jeye tm ka klintsik.
41002021	Yab xita in patskuyal i kej xeketlb kal jun peje i t kudhkum; pos an t kudhkum, u muchel ani in michl ms an kej kudhkum.
41002022	Nibal u balyb an t yajtsik uxnl ban kej t balixtalb; pos max ka tajan anchan, an t yajtsik uxnl in michl an kej t balixtalb, neech tm ka waklan an yajtsik uxnl ani an t balixtalb u kibchonal. Jaxtm ti yejat ka balyat an t yajtsik uxnl ban t t balixtalb abal chablam yab ka kibchon.
41002023	Jun i sbado, xi jaich nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Jess xeech ba jun i alelb xon ti tayadh i trigo ani nin exbaliltsik in tuju kin puu an trigo abal kin kapu.
41002024	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an fariseotsik: —Ka tela, jantki tin tajl i tojlb na exbaliltsik xi yab alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil i koyxnich?
41002025	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik xowa in taja na Dabid junax kal nin juniktsik tam ti bl ejat na Abiatar, nin oklkil an pletsik? Kaaytsik tajat ani yab in kool xata kin kapu.
41002026	Jaxtm ti ochich na Dabid ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in kapu an pan xi pikbantsidh na Dios maske yab jaj in bijtsl kin kapu. Tokot in bijtsl kin kapu an pletsik. Na Dabid yab u ple, por in kapu jachan an pan ani in pidha jeye nin juniktsik.
41002027	Utsantsik jeye ench: —Na Dios in jila nin ktsjil an koyxnich abal tin alwabl an iniktsik ani yab abal kin koy jelti jun i tojlixtalb.
41002028	Jaxtm, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb abal ku ulu xowa alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
41003001	Tayl, ochich jun na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i inik xi mulkank in kubak.
41003002	T jeye ti kwajat i atiklbtsik ti kwchix abal u lenb ka chutat max na Jess kin jeldha an yaul tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos max kin jeldha, in chalpayaltsik tm kin lna.
41003003	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ki kubey n junax chejel.
41003004	Utsan tm ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Janty alwa ki taja tam in ktsjil an koyxnich? Ki taja xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa? Alwaxe ki jeldha an yaultsik o ki walba ka chemech? Por yabtsik in ela xan ti ka tkon.
41003005	Na Jess chakuy ani tepin tam tin teloloy xi ta ti bukl abal yabtsik tajat in l kin exbay. In utsa tm ench an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ka lujku na kubak. In lujku tm ani jeley.
41003006	Kaletsik tm an fariseotsik ani kale ti junkunal kal in kidhtal na Erodes abal kin chalpaytsik junax xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
41003007	Por na Jess kale bin wl an pujal junax kal nin exbaliltsik ani wwn kal yn i atiklbtsik xi tl Galilea.
41003008	Tam ti chobn ke na Jess in tajl an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb, ulich tm xon ti Jaj kwajat yn i atiklbtsik xi tl Judea ani xi tl Jerusaln, xi tl Idumea, xi tl tin ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn ani xi tl jeye ban chabl xi Tiro ani Sidn.
41003009	Jaxtm na Jess tin utsa nin exbaliltsik abal kin koy tojojodhich jun i tan xon ti ka balin max ka nichokn kal tin kwenta nin yanl an atiklbtsik.
41003010	Kom ynich xita in jeldhmal, ejtal an yaultsik tokot u nxkxtsik abal in l ka utey kin taka na Jess.
41003011	T jeye ti kwajat xi ochadhtsik kal i atax ejattalbtsik. Tam ka chutat na Jess kal jajtsik, u tudhlanal tin tamt na Jess ani u dhajnal tilomtsik chapik ench: —Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios!
41003012	Por utsantsik abal yab kin ulu xitam j jeye na Jess.
41003013	Tayl, kadhiy na Jess ba jun i chn ani in kaniytsik xita Jaj in lena abal ka junikn kl. Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti Jaj kwajat,
41003014	in takuy tm lajuchb i iniktsik abal ka xechin kal Jaj ani abal kin abatsik kin tila an alwa tilab.
41003015	In pidhatsik ti awiltalb abal kin jeldha i yaultsik ani kin kldha i atax ejattalbtsik.
41003016	J kwajat nin bij xi lajuchb in takuy: Jn u Simn xin bijiy jeye ta Pedro,
41003017	na Jakobo kl nin kidhb Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo. Jech chb in bijiy jeye ta Boanerjes. Jech an bijlb in l kin ulu, in chakmiltsik i junkil b.
41003018	Na Andrs, na Felipe, na Bartolom, na Mateo, na Toms ani na Jakobo, xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo. Na Tadeo ani na Simn; jech na Simn jaich xu taknal kal an junkunl xu bijyb kananista.
41003019	Takwyat jeye na Judas Iskariote, xi tayl pidhnaxin an ta Jess abal ka chemdh.
41003020	Junkun jun yn i atiklbtsik ke asta nibalich u jolkanal ti kapul na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik.
41003021	Tam tin chobnatsik jech nin at kidhtal na Jess, kale ti iktb abal in chalpayaltsik max olmank na Jess.
41003022	Ulich jeye an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios, xi tltsik Jerusaln ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik kwajat teykmte kal an lej atax, nin oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik ani kal tin chp an lej atax tin kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik.
41003023	Jaxtm tin kaniy na Jess ka utey xon ti Jaj kwajat xin ulutsik anchan. In wiltsitsik tm chb x ti kw abal kin exbay an tsubaxtalb, in utsatsik ench: —Janti neech kin ejto an lej atax kin kldha tinb xi kwajat bin itsch an iniktsik?
41003024	Max an atiklbtsik xu taknal ba jun i bitsow ka kxin kwene ti kwene ani ka pjxin kal in at kidhtal, jachan an bitsow neech ka taley.
41003025	Anl jeye, max xu kwajltsik ba jun i at ka pjxintsik, neech ka kxin.
41003026	Max an lej atax ka kwajay ti pjx kal in at atax, yabich neech kin ejto ti oklek. Neech ka okon nin awiltal.
41003027	Ni jun xita neech kin ejto ka ochich bin kim jun i likat inik ani kin kntsi xowa in kool max yab kin wika okox. Tokot neech kin ejto kin kntsi xowa in kool max kin wika okox.
41003028	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke na Dios neech kin pakwlantsi ejtal tin walab an iniktsik ani an atax odhbijixtalb jeye xu usnal.
41003029	Por xita kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab jayki neech ka pakwlantsat kal na Dios; neech ka jilkon walbidh malill i kij.
41003030	Anchan tin ulu na Jess kom u usnal ke Jaj in kool jun i atax ejattalb.
41003031	Ulich tm nin nna ani nin kidhbtsik na Jess, in abna ka kantsin an ta Jess ani jajtsik jilkon elb.
41003032	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal xi ta ti buxutsik wilill xon ti Jaj kwajat: —Na nna ani na kidhbtsik ta kwajat n elb ani ti ayal.
41003033	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A exlltsikxe xita j nu nna ani nu kidhbtsik?
41003034	In tela tm xi ta ti buxutsik wilill ani in ulu ench: —Jechtsik jaich xi kwajattsik jelti nu nna ani jelti nu kidhbtsik.
41003035	Pos xita in tajl xowa in l na Dios, jachan jaich nu kidhb, nu ixm ani nu nna.
41004001	Jun i kij, na Jess tujey jun ti oktsix bin wl an pujal, junkun yn i atiklbtsik xon ti Jaj kwajat ani wiliyat. Jaxtm ti balin na Jess ba jun i tan xi kwajat ban pujal ani buxkan, an atiklbtsik jilkon tin wl an pujal.
41004002	In oktsitsik tm yn xata, por kal i junbaxtalbki. Tam ti exomich in oktsal, in utsatsik ench:
41004003	—Ka achatsik jech an junbaxtalb xi neech tu tiltsi: Jun i kij, kale jun i inik ti bkul iyalb bin ale.
41004004	Tam ti exomich in bukwal an iyalb, taltsik kwajlan ban bl, ulich an chichintsik ani in kapu.
41004005	Taltsik an iyalb, kwajlan ban tujublom xon ti yab lej owtsik an lukuk ani jikat ti ixkan.
41004006	Por tam ti yajb an kakal, batey ani kom yab owtsik tin kool nin ibl, wayey.
41004007	Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban kdhlom, pakey an kdhtsik ani in paxkiy an tayablb ani yab xata in koy.
41004008	Por taltsik an iyalb kwajlan xon ti alwa an chabl, ixkan, pakey ani labey tajat. Taltsik, kal jn tokot an iyalb xi tayan, in koy jun inik lju itsixlek; taltsik, ox inik ani taltsik, bo inik.
41004009	In utsatsik tm ench xi ta ti kwajattsik: —Xita in kool nin ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
41004010	Tayl, tam ti jilkonich kwetm na Jess, konyat kal xi ta ti kwajattsik jeye kunat junax kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik xanty in l kin ulu jachan an junbaxtalb xin ulu.
41004011	Utsantsik ench: —Tattsik, ti pidhl na Dios ka chobna xowa in kool yab tejwa kal tin kwenta xan ti Jaj tu takix. Por xi yabtsik tin bell, tokot u oktsaltsik kal i junbaxtalb.
41004012	Abal anchan, maske in chutaltsik, por jyki max yab in chutal; in achltsik, por yab in exbayal. Anchan yab neech ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku pakwlantsi tin walastalbiltsik.
41004013	Utsantsik jeye ench: —Yab a exbayaltsik jech an junbaxtalb? Pos max yab a exbayaltsik, jan ti neech ka ejto ka exbaytsik xi ms an junbaxtalb?
41004014	An inik xu bkul iyalb, in junwal jelti xin till nin kwintal na Dios.
41004015	Xowa u tmnal kal taltsik an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban bl. Tam in achmalich, u utuknb kal an lej atax ani u tajnal kin uktsi xowa in achmal.
41004016	Xowa u tmnal kal xi keet an atiklbtsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan xon ti yab lej waach an lukuk. In achl nin kwintal na Dios ani in bachwal kal i kulbtalb.
41004017	Por eb itschki, jaxtm ti yab u owel an kulbtalb; pos tam kin tamu jun xata yajtsik o ka atantsik abal in bachmal nin kwintal na Dios, in jilltsik kin bela.
41004018	Xowa u tmnal kal xi keettsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban kdhlom. In achltsik nin kwintal na Dios,
41004019	por u chalpaxtsik tajat kal xowa in ltsik kin taja ani u kambiybtsik kal an tumn abal in chalpayaltsik ke an tumn u kijidhmdhom. In ltsik jeye tajat kin koy ejtal xowa waach. Jaxtm, max jaich tokot in chalpmtsik echeki, in uktsal nin kwintal na Dios ani yab u tjnal ni jun xata alwa ba jajtsik.
41004020	Por xowa u tmnal kal xi keettsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban chabl xi alwa. Tam in achltsik nin kwintal na Dios, in bachwal ani in belltsik kal yantam in ejattal. Jechtsik in junwal jelti an tayablb xi labey tajat. Taltsik, kal jn tokot an iyalb xi tayan, in pidhna jun inik lju itsixlek, taltsik in pidhna ox inik itsixlek ani xi taltsik, in pidhna bo inik.
41004021	Utsantsik jeye ench: —Awxe u letkoyb jun i tajbaxtalb abal ka paxkiyat kal jun i kajn o abal ka kwajb bin l i waytalb? Yaba! An tajbaxtalb u letkoyb ani u kwajbb tekat abal ka tajbaxin alwa.
41004022	Pos yab waach ni jun xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalk tayl, nibal waach ni jun xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn.
41004023	Max a kooltsik a ochoxtal alwa, ka exbaytsik xowa u ulal.
41004024	Utsantsik jeye: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal xowa exom a achl. Max w i chplb ka tajatsik abal ka exbay, w jeye neech ki pidhantsik ka exbay kal na Dios. Por max yn i chplb ka tajatsik, yn jeye neech ki pidhantsik ani ms tajat neech ki pidhan ka exbaytsik kal na Dios.
41004025	Xin exbayaltsik, neech ka tolmiyat ms kal na Dios abal kin exbay; ani xi yab in lej exbayal, neech ka tajan kin uktsitsik kal na Dios xowa w in exbaymal.
41004026	In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i inik xi kale ti m bin ale.
41004027	Tam mmadhich, neech tm ka kalch ti wayal ani tam ka tsudhey neech ka chakay. Ani anchanki, tsudhl u tajkanal u watel an kij. Lejat an iyalb u ixkanal ani u pubel, por jaj yab in chob xan ti.
41004028	An chabl jaich nin ixkandhl an tayablb ani in pubedhl. Okox u xeknal, u wixnal ani tayl u walim.
41004029	Tam kin bajch nin yjnk an tayablb, an dhabal neech tm kin junkuntsch an tin wall abal in bajmalich an kij ka junkuwat.
41004030	In ntsi ti kw ani in ulu jeye ench: —Neech jeye tu tiltsitsik keet ti junbaxtalb abal tu ltsi xan tu takix na Dios.
41004031	In junwal jelt in itsch an mostasa. Jech, jaich an iyalb xi ms tsitsik xu taynal tech ti kayl,
41004032	por tam tayadhich, u ixkanal ani u pubel ms k xi keet an tayablbtsik. In kyal tajat pakdha in kwel, in kyal tajat i chalam ani an chichintsik in tajl taja nin pkw.
41004033	Anchan ti oktsintsik an ti tsubaxtalb kal na Jess. Yn i junbaxtalb tiltsintsik jelti jech abal ka oktsintsik xantiki kin ejtotsik kin exbay.
41004034	Tokot kal i junbaxtalbki tin oktsaltsik, por nin exbaliltsik, in wiltsal ejtal xowa in l kin ulu an junbaxtalb tam kwajatichtsik kwetm.
41004035	Tam ti dhamch jachan a kts, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Wana ku watey jun pake pujal.
41004036	In jila tm an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat bin wl an pujal ani kaletsik kal an tan xon ti kwajat balidh. T jeye ti kwajat i atiklbtsik ba keet i tantsik ani kale jeye kin junikna na Jess.
41004037	Jun jiktowle ti tujey ti wawnal jun i chapik ik ani in mlkindha an ja. Ochich an ja ban tan ke asta wich tajat ka tsutsich an tan kal an ja.
41004038	Na Jess kwajat ti wayal ba jun i latsiklb tin kx an tan. Bakyat tm kal nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench: —Oktsix! Yabxe a dhl ti kwenta max ku lupun?
41004039	Chakay tm na Jess in kwiya an ik ani in utsa ench an pujal: —Ki chamkan! Yabich ki kuchun! Tmki ti kublan ti wawnal an ik ani jilkon chamamadh tajat.
41004040	Utsan tm ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Jantki ta jikltsik ani jantki ti yabtsik tin bell?
41004041	Jikeytsik tajat ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom awiltalb in kool jech an inik abal u axtsinal tam kin tawna an ik ani an pujal?
41005001	Ulichtsik tm jun pake pujal ban chabl xin bij Gadara.
41005002	Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel ban tan, ulich jun i inik xi kwajat ochadh kal i atax ejattalb. Jaj tl xon tu jolyb an chemlomtsik
41005003	abal tajaich u kwajl; kom watats ti olmankich, yabich u ejtowb ka yakwan, nibal ka wikan kal i patl.
41005004	Yantalich wiktsidh tin akan ani tin kubak kal i patl, por tyidh in tapyal ani in muwal an patl. Kal ni jun xita tu ejtowb ka t.
41005005	Akal i kij u xechinal ti dhajnal ban chnlom, ban jlimtalb ani in chojbdhl tinb kal i tujub.
41005006	Tam ti w chutat na Jess, jlch an inik abal kin utukna ani tudhlan tin tamt.
41005007	Ani kawidh ti utsan ench na Jess: —Jess, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xi plek tajat, janty a l kal nan? Tu kontsal kal tin bij na Dios abal yab ti kin lej watpintsi an ti yajtsiktalb.
41005008	Anchan tin ulu abal kwajatich ti usnal ench kal na Jess: —Atax ejattalb, ki kale ba jech an inik!
41005009	Konyat tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Jan ta bij? Jaj tkon ench: —Nan u bij Lejin, kom yn tajat tu b.
41005010	Pakabdh tajat na Jess kal jn ti b an atax ejattalb abal yab ka abantsik pl chabl ti kwajl.
41005011	Kom ta ti xeech taja utat ban chn yn i olom ti kapupl,
41005012	pakabdh na Jess kal ejtal an atax ejattalbtsik ench: —Ti ku walka ku ochich ban olomtsik xi n xeech.
41005013	Tokontsat tm kal na Jess xowa in konoytsik, kale tm an atax ejattalbtsik ban inik ani ochich ban olomtsik. Chab mil xna in yanl an olomtsik, bololl ti kale adhik ban chn, in petna tinb ban pujal ani taja ti lupuntsik.
41005014	jlchtsik tm an belkol olomtsik, kale ban bitsow ani bin waltsik an bitsow abal kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik xanty tmun. An atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow kaletsik tm kin chuu xanty tmnk.
41005015	Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, chutat an inik xi teykmtewiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik, buxlichki, xeketlidhich ani juntam anikijich. Jikey an atiklbtsik xi ulich ti telom.
41005016	Xin chuutsik xanty tmun kal an inik xi kwajatwiik teykmte kal an atax ejattalbtsik ani xanty jeye tmun kal an olomtsik, jaich kl ti tiltsin an atiklbtsik xi ulich.
41005017	Tujey tm ti pakabdhb na Jess kal an atiklbtsik abal ka kalch ba jachan an chabl.

41005019	Por na Jess yab in lena, tokot in utsa ench: —Ki kalch ta kim xon ti kwajat na jabtsik, ka tiltsi ejtal xanty ti tajtsmal an Okxlb ani xan ti kontsmal ti yajnantsixtalb.
41005020	Kale an inik ani tujey tm kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba xi lju an bitsowtsik xu taknal Dekpolis an ti pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xowa tajtsin kal na Jess. Tam tin achatsik xowa tiltsin, labantsik tajat.
41005021	Ochich tm na Jess ban tan ani tam ti ulich jun jun pake pujal, yn i atiklbtsik junkun wilill xon ti kwajat na Jess.
41005022	Ulich jun i inik xin bij ta Jairo xu oklek jeye ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Tam ti chutat na Jess, tudhlan na Jairo tin tamt
41005023	ani pakabdh ench: —Nu tsidhnil exomich ti chemel, jala ka puntsi an ta kubak bin tul abal ka jeley ani yab ka chemech.
41005024	Kale tm na Jess kal na Jairo ani yn kale ti juniknax. Kal nin yanl an atiklbtsik, u nichoknbich tajat na Jess.
41005025	T jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb xin kidhbaymalich lajuchb i tamub ti yaul kal i lakmtalb ani yab u jell.
41005026	In watnmalich tajat yajtsik kal yn i illixtsik, in pakmalich ejtal nin tumnal ti illnal, por yab u elbml; ms tokot yawlchich.
41005027	An mmlb in achmal an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess ani in chalpayal ench: “Max ku ejto ku taktsi tin kudhkmil, neech kin jeley.” Jaxtm ti utey tin yanl an atiklbtsik xi ta ti tl, in utukna na Jess tin kx ani in taktsi tin kudhkmil.
41005029	Tmki ti kublan ti yaul ani in chobna abal jelch.
41005030	Na Jess in acha abal jeley jun xita kal an chplb xin kool, chawkin ani konoxin ench: —Jita tin taktsi tu kudhkmil?
41005031	Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —A tellich p j kwajat yn i atiklbtsik ti kichkm, ani bl a konyal xita ti taka?
41005032	Por na Jess in teloloy putl abal kin chuu xitam j na takxink.
41005033	Utey tm an mmlb ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess u wipipl kal i jkib abal in chob xanty tmnk kal jaj. An mmlb in utsa ejtal na Jess kal tin kwenta xowa in tajm.
41005034	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, i jeley abal i belmch. Awil ki kalch tsububudh a itsch, i jelch kal an yawlch xa koolwiik.
41005035	Tam ti na Jess bl kwajat ti tilom, ulich chb x i iniktsik xi tl tin kim na Jairo ani utsan ench: —Na tsidhnil chemech, yabich ka tojliy an Oktsix.
41005036	Na Jess in acha xowa ulwat ani in utsa ench na Jairo: —Yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, ka bela tokot abal Nan neech ku ejto tu tolmiy.
41005037	Kale tm na Jess kal na Jairo ani tokot in walka ka junikn kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan, nin kidhb na Jakobo.
41005038	Tam ti ulich bin kim jachan an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in acha abal kbalich tajat an ukil ani an dhajal abal chemech an tsidhan.
41005039	Ochich tm na Jess ban alt ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta uknaltsik ani ta dhajnaltsik? An tsidhan yab chemnek, u wayalki ti kwajat.
41005040	Jajtsik in labdhnaki tokot na Jess. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess abal ka kale ejtal elb, ochich ban alt xon ti kwajat an tsidhan junkmte kal an ttalb, an nnalb ani xi kalnek an ti junkiltsik.

41005042	Tmki ti chakay ani beley jachan an tsidhan xin kool lajuchb i tamub ani ejtaltsik xin chuu jech, labantsik tajat.
41005043	Por utsantsik tajat kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xowa in taja ani utsan kin pidha ti kapul an tsidhan.
41006001	Kale tm taja na Jess junkmte kal nin exbaliltsik ani kale ban bitsow xon ti pubenek.
41006002	Tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kwajay ti oktsix. Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti axtsin xowa in ulu ani labantsik tajat. U tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jn ti kalnek kin exbna jech xowa in oktsixnl? In ulutsik jeye: Jantom witomtalb xi jech pidhnk ani jan tin tajl an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik?
41006003	In ulutsik jeye ench: Yabxe jaich an dhakm, nin chakmil na Mara, nin kidhb na Jakobo, na Jos, na Judas ani na Simn? Yabxe tech jeye u kwajl nin ixmtsik? Jaxtm tu pojkb ani yab u beltsinal xowa in oktsixnl.
41006004	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Putlki tu kaknb jun i tiltsix, tokotki bin chablil, kal nin kidhtaltsik ani kal xu kwajltsik bin kim ti yab u kaknb.
41006005	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab in ejto na Jess kin taja ni jun i labidh labandhaxtalb taja bin bitswil. Tokot in kwajba nin kubak bin b in k chb x i yaultsik ani in jeldha.
41006006	Laban tajat na Jess abal yab beltsin kal jajtsik. Kale tm taja, kale kin loniy an kwentsaltsik xi taja utat ani in oktsitsik.
41006007	In junku tm xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani in pidha ti awiltalb kin kldhantsi ti atax ejattalb xita kwajat teykmte kl. In aba chabtsik ti chabtsik abal kin taja xowa utsan, por tam ti yabl kalnektsik, utsantsik abal yab kin jna xata abal an bl; yab kin jna i morrl, nibal i kapnl, nibal i tumn, tokot kin jna jun in kwayab.
41006009	Utsantsik ke tokot kin jna nin pajab xin pajbm ani nin kudhkmil xin kwajbm, yab kin jnatsik chb.
41006010	Utsantsik jeye ench: —Xowakich an kimdh xon ti ki bachwat, ki kwajay taja asta kin bajaw xowki neech ki kale ba jachan an bitsow.
41006011	Max ki ulich ba jun i bitsow xon ti yab ki bachwat ani yab ti ki axtsitsik, ki kale, ka tiniy an pojodh xi palenek ba na akan jelti jun i exl abal kin chobnatsik ke yab alwa xan ti tajtsitsik ani ki kaletsik tm pl bitsow. Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, an atiklbtsik xi yab ti bachu xu kwajltsik ba jachan an bitsow, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Sodoma ani xi Gomorra.
41006012	Kale tm nin exbaliltsik an ti tiltsix ani in utsl an atiklbtsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani ka utchtsik ba na Dios.
41006013	Yn tajat xin kldhantsitsik ti atax ejattalb xi kwajattsik teykmte kl. Yn jeye i yaultsik in majuy kal i asyte ani jeley.
41006014	An pulek takix Erodes in acha xowa in tajl na Jess kom putlki tu tilnal ejtal xowa in tajl. Jaxtm tin ulu ench: —Jech jaich xna na Juan xu Pujax, xi chemdh ani xo ejnekich ti t; jaxtm tin kool an awiltalb abal kin taja an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik.
41006015	Xi keettsik in ulal ench: —Jaich an tiltsix xin bij Elas. Taltsik in ulal: —Jaich jun i tiltsix jelti an weje tiltsixtsik.
41006016	Tam ti na Erodes in acha xowa in ulal an atiklbtsik, in ulu tm ench: —Jech jaich na Juan xu Pujax, xi nan u abna ka kotsin tin k ani xo ejnekich ti t.
41006017	Xowa tmnk jaich jech: na Erodes in abnmal ka balyat ban wikaxte na Juan xu Pujax wikadh kal i patl kal tin kwentaki na Erodas. Jech na Erodas, kwajat tomkidh kal na Felipe, nin kidhb na Erodes, por na Erodes junkun kal jech an mmlb ani in taja tin tomtal.
41006018	Jaxtm ti utsan ench na Erodes kal na Juan: —Yab tajat alwa abal a tajmal ta tomtal na atml.
41006019	Na Erodas in atl tajat na Juan ani in l kin chemdha, por yab in ejtowal
41006020	abal na Erodes in chob alwa ke na Juan, jaich jun i lujat inik ani tokat, jaxtm tin jiknl. Jaxtm ti yab in walkl ka chemdh na Juan kal na Erodas. Maske na Erodes yab in lej exbantsal alwa xowa in ulal na Juan, u jilkonal tajat ti chalpax tam in axtsal an tin takixtal kal yantam i kulbtalb.
41006021	Por na Erodas in ela an kij abal ka chemdh na Juan, tam ti na Erodes in ajbna nin tambil ani tajtsin jun i pulek kapxnich an pakdha awiltalb, an pakdha oklek soldadotsik ani ejtal an ultalb tjodhtsik xi Galilea.
41006022	Tam ti exomich an kapch, ochich nin tsidhnil na Erodas ani bixmch. Na Erodes ani ejtal xi kanidhtsik, watats tin kulbetna xan ti bixmch an tsidhan, jaxtm na Erodes tin utsa ench an tsidhan: —Ti kin kontsi xowa ka lena ani neech tu pidha.
41006023	Ani in utsa lej tsubax ench: —Neech tu pidha xowa ti kin kontsi, maske ti kin kontsi asta junax chejel an chabl xu takyal.
41006024	Kale tm an tsidhan kin konoy nin nna ani in utsa ench: —Janty ku kontsi? Utsan ench kal nin nna: —Ka kontsi tin k na Juan xu Pujax.
41006025	Witsiy tm dhubatki an tsidhan xon ti kwajat an pulek takix ani in utsa ench: —U l ti kin pidha xoich balidh ba jun i talab nin k na Juan xu Pujax.
41006026	An pulek takix watats ti tepin tam tin acha xowa kontsin, por kom yab in lena ka jilkon tidhetl tin tamt an ajblomtsik, kool in taja xowa kontsin.
41006027	An pulek takix in aba jun i soldado abal ka tsidhantsat tmki tin k na Juan. Kale tm jachan an soldado ban wikaxte ani in kotsi tin k na Juan.

41006029	Tam ti nin exbaliltsik na Juan in chobna xanty in tammal na Juan, kale kin dhaytsi tin putll nin tul ani in jnaichtsik tm abal kin joliy.
41006030	Ms tayl, witsiy an abatwletsik xon ti kwajat na Jess ani in tiltsitsik xowa in tajmaltsik ani xowa in oktsixnmal.

41006046	Tam tin tala abmich ka kaletsik, kadhiy ba jun i chn ti l.

41006049	Por tam ti chutat ti belal bin b an ja, an exbaltsik in chalpay max i labax ani dhjantsik.

41007001	Utukn tm na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xi tltsik Jerusaln.
41007002	Jajtsik in chuu ke taltsik nin exbalil na Jess u kapul yab takadh nin kubak, jaxtm ti kawyattsik abal yab in takatsik nin kubak xan ti yejat kin taja.
41007003	(Pos an fariseotsik ani ejtal xi ms an judotsik, in wewkmtsal tin takixtal nin weje pakliltsik, yabtsik u kapul max yab kin taka okox nin kubak ynl.
41007004	Tam ka witsiytsik ti chaum, max yabtsik in takm nin kubak xan ti yejat kin taja, yabtsik u kapul ani yn ms xata xowa in ujnmaltsik in tajl. Anl jeye, in takltsik an balixtalb, an patl balixtalb ani an koytalb xon tu jedhkanal tam u kapul.)
41007005	Konyat tm ench na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios: —Jantki na exbaliltsik ti yab in ntsal kin wwnantsi tin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik abal u kapultsik yab takadh nin kubak?
41007006	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Kambixtsik! Tsubax tajat tin ulu an tiltsix Isaas kal tattsik ta kwenta, tam tin dhutsa ench: Jech an atiklbtsik kal in wiki tin kaknl, por nin ejattal w tajat ti kwajat kal Nan.
41007007	Yab xata in jalbl xan tin kaknltsik, pos tokot in oktsixnltsik in takixtal i iniktsik.
41007008	Tattsik yab a tajl ti kij nin takixtal na Dios abal tokot a wwnl xowa in tajl an iniktsik. A takltsik an balixtalb xa ynltsik ka uxna ani yn ms xata a tajltsik jelti jech.
41007009	In ntsi ti kw na Jess ani in utsatsik jeye ench: —Yab a tajltsik ti kij nin takixtal na Dios abal a ntsaltsik tokot ka wwnatsik xowa in tajl an iniktsik.
41007010	Pos na Moiss in ulu ench: “Ka kakna na tta ani na nna”, ani “Xita kin odhbijiy nin tta o nin nna, yejat ka chemdh.”
41007011	Por tattsik a ulal ke jun xita awil kin utsa ench nin tta o nin nna: “Yabich neech ku ejto tu tolmiy, pos ejtal xowa u kool u pikbantsmalich a Dios.”
41007012	Ani max jun xita kin utsa anchan nin pakliltsik, a ulaltsik ke yabich tm yejat kin tolmiy.
41007013	Anchan, a tajlichtsik jelti max yab xata in jalbl nin takixtal na Dios abal tokot a tajltsik xowa i jiltsink kal na weje pakliltsik. Jaich tokot a oktsixnl ka tajan ani jech yab in takixtal a Dios. Ani yn ms xata a tajl jelti jech.
41007014	In kaniy tm jun na Jess ka utey an atiklbtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka achatsik alwa xowa neech tu utsa ani ka exbaytsik.
41007015	An inik yab u chnal nin itsch kal xowa in kapal, u chnal kal xowa yab alwa in chalpayal tin itsch ani kin taja.
41007016	Max a kooltsik na ochoxtal alwa, ka exbaytsik xowa u ulal.
41007017	Tayl, tam ti na Jess in jilaich an atiklbtsik ani ochich ban at, utsan tm kal nin exbaliltsik kin wila an junbaxtalb xin ulu.
41007018	Utsantsik ench: —Yabxe teye a exbaymaltsik? Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni jun xita yab u chnal nin itsch kal xowa in kapal?
41007019	An kapnl yab u ochel bin itsch an inik, u kalel bin tsukul ani tayl neech kin wakla alte. Anchan tin ulu na Jess abal kin xalka ke xowakich an kapnl yab tu chotsal an ti itsch.
41007020	In ulu jeye ench: —U chnal nin itsch an inik kal xowa in chalpayal yab alwa ani kin taja.
41007021	Pos xowa kwajat alkidh bin itsch an iniktsik, jaich kl tu tajnal kin koy an atax chalab. Kal jachan an atax chalab, kl tu tajnal ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal. Waach jeye xi yab u tomkinal, u ani junkunalki. Waach xu chemdhax,
41007022	xu kw, xi chene, xin tajtsal ti ataxtalb xi keet, xu kambix, xin jill tinb ka xn kal xowakich i ataxtalb, xin tell kal i chkub xowa in kool keet, xu tilom yab exbadh, xin tekl tinb ani xi yab lujat in chalab.
41007023	Ejtal jech xowa yab alwa, u tujl bin itsch an iniktsik ani tam kin taja, u jilkonalich tm choodh nin itsch kal an walastalb.
41007024	Kale tm taja na Jess ani kale ban chabl xi Tiro ani Sidn. Tam ti ulich taja, ochich ba jun i at abal yab in l ka chobn max taja ti kwajat, por yab in ejto ka chinkon.
41007025	Abal jun i mmlb xin kool jun in tsidhnil ochadh kal i atax ejattalb in chobna ke ta ti kwajat taja, tsch ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess.
41007026	Jech an mmlb yab u israelita, jaj Sirofenisia in chablil. Pakabdh na Jess kal an mmlb abal ka kldhantsat an ti atax ejattalb xi kl ti ochadh nin tsidhnil.
41007027	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ka walka okox ka kapch an chakamtsik, pos yab alwa ki kntsi ti kapnl an chakamtsik ani ki pidha an pikotsik.
41007028	Tkon ench an mmlb: —Ajtik, tsubax xowa a ulal. Xi tl pl bitsow jelti nan u usnal kal tattsik abal i junwal jelti an piko, por asta an pikotsik xi kwajat tin l an mesa, in kapal xowa u kwajlanal muax tam exom ti kapul an chakamtsik.
41007029	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Alwa tajat xan ta tkon; jaxtm, awil ki kalch, pos an atax ejattalb kalnekich ba na tsidhnil.
41007030	Tam ti an mmlb witsiy tin kim, in ela nin tsidhnil kwachlkijich bin waytal abal an atax ejattalb, kalnekich.
41007031	Kale na Jess ban bitsow xi Tiro, watey Sidn, bin chabliltsik jeye xi lju an bitsowtsik xin bij Dekpolis ani ulich ban pujal xi Galilea.
41007032	Uldhantsat taja jun i inik xi yab u ochox ani yab in ejtowal ti kw alwa ani pakabdh kin kwajba nin kubak ban inik.
41007033	Na Jess in jna plki xon ti yab waach an atiklbtsik ani in xaptsi tin tstsbixtal bin xuchuntsik, in tubkay nin kubak ani in taktsi kl tin lekb.
41007034	In tela tm walki, dhutsutsun asta tin itsch ani in utsa ench an inik: —Efata! —Jech an kw in l kin ulu: Ki jakpin!
41007035	Tmki jachan ti ochxin an inik ani in ejtch ti kw alwa.
41007036	Utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab kin tiltsi ni jun xita xowa in taja, por yabtsik in taja ti kij, ms tokot in tilltsik.
41007037	Xin achltsik, u labnaltsik tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Ejtal xowa in tajl, alwa tajat; asta xi yab u ochox in ochxindhl ani an mtsik in kwindhl.
41008001	Tam ti jachan i kij, junkunk yn i atiklbtsik ani tam ti yabich in kooltsik xata kin kapu, na Jess in kaniy ka utey nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench:
41008002	—U yajnantsal tajat jech an atiklbtsik abal kwajinekich x a kts kal Nan ani xo yabich in kool xata kin kaputsik.
41008003	Max ku abaich ka kaletsik tin kim anchan yab kapmadh, neech ka palmtsik ti bl kal an kanab abal taltsik owdha tajat ti tl.
41008004	Tkoyat ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Por jn ti neech ki ela an kapnl abal ki kapundha tech xon ti yab xita u kwajl?
41008005	Konyattsik tm kal na Jess: —Jy i pan a kooltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Bk.
41008006	Utsan tm an atiklbtsik kal na Jess ka buxkan chabl. Na Jess in bachu tm xi bk an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja ani in pidha nin exbaliltsik abal kin pidha an atiklbtsik.
41008007	T jeye tin kool chb x i tsitsik tool ani anlki jeye tin taja jelt xan tin taja kal an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in pidha nin exbaliltsik abal kin pidha an atiklbtsik.
41008008	Ejtal kapchtsik asta ajw. Tayl, nin exbaliltsik in tsutsiy bk i toknal kal in pejmats an kapnl xi jilkon.
41008009	Wich xna che mil i atiklbtsik xi kapch. Tayl abanichtsik tm kal na Jess abal ka kalch.
41008010	Balin tm na Jess ban tan kal nin exbaliltsik ani kale ban chabl xin bij Dalmanuta.
41008011	Ulich tm an fariseotsik ani in tuju ti kwlx kal na Jess. Ani abal ka taktamiyat na Jess, u kontsinal kin taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal kin xalka ke tsubax lejtal kal a Dios ti abadh.
41008012	Dhutsutsun tm na Jess tin ejattal kal yantam i tepintalb ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin kontsaltsik ku taja i labidh labandhaxtalb? Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ni jun i labidh labandhaxtalb yab neech ku taja ta tamttsik.
41008013	In jilonatsik tm taja, balin ban tan ani watey kal nin exbaliltsik jun pake pujal.
41008014	Nin exbaliltsik na Jess yab in chalpay kin jnatsik i pan, jn tokot i pan ta tin kooltsik ban tan.
41008015	Takyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik ani kal nin oktsixtal na Erodes xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye.
41008016	Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti tsx jn ani jn ench: —Awxe tu utsl jech abal yab i tsidha an pan?
41008017	Na Jess in chobna xanty in ulaltsik, jaxtm tin utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta kwajat ta tsxtsik ke yab a tsidhm i pan? Yabxe tajat a exbayaltsik? Blxe tajat tojlb ka exbaytsik?
41008018	A kooltsik a wal ani a ochoxtal, por jyki max yabtsik i chuux nibal i ochox! Yabxe a tlmtsik?
41008019	Tam tu peja xi b an pan abal xi bo mil an atiklbtsik, jy i x a tsutsiytsik kal xi jilkon? Tkontsik ench: —Lajuchb.
41008020	Utsantsik jeye ench: —Ani tam tu muu jeye xi bk an pan abal xi che mil an atiklbtsik, jy i toknaltsik a tsutsiy kal xi jilkon? Tkontsik ench: —Bk.
41008021	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe bl a exbayaltsik?
41008022	Tayl, ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Betsayda, tsidhantsat na Jess jun i jokol kal chb x i atiklbtsik ani pakabdh kin taka jachan an jokol abal ka chuxin.
41008023	In lotokna tm an jokol ani in kldha ban kwentsal. In ijlintsi tin wal an jokol, in kwajbantsi tin kubak bin b nin wal an jokol ani in konoy max in chutalich xata.
41008024	An jokol chuxinich tm ani in ulu ench: —U chutal an iniktsik, por jyki i te, por u belaltsik.
41008025	In kwajba tm jun na Jess nin kubak bin b in wal an jokol, chuxinich tm alwa an inik ani jelnek alwa ti jilkon. Ejtalich tm in chutal alwa.
41008026	Abanich tm tin kim kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —Yab ki ochich ban kwentsal, nibal xita ka ltsi xi tajatsik xanty tu tajtsi.
41008027	Tayl, kale na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ban kwentsaltsik xi kwajat wilill Sesarea, an bitsow xu taknal Filipo. Tam ti neechtsik ti bl, in konoy ench nin exbaliltsik: —Kal an atiklbtsik, jita p tin usnal ke Nan neye?
41008028	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Taltsik in ulal ke Tat i Juan xu Pujax, taltsik in ulal ke i Elas xi xechink ti tiltsix ti weje ani xi keettsik in ulal ke Tat jaich jun ti b xi keet an tiltsixtsik.
41008029	Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ani tattsik, jita ta ulaltsik ke Nan neye? Tkoyat kal na Pedro ani utsan ench: —Tat i Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix.
41008030	Por utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab kin tiltsitsik jech ni jun xita.
41008031	Tujey tm ti ltsinaltsik kal na Jess xanty neech kin tamu Jaj. Utsantsik ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna yn xata yajtsik. Neech kin pojk kal an pakdha tjodh, kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
41008032	Ejtal jech tajax tajat ti utsantsik, jaxtm na Pedro tin jna plki na Jess ani in kwiya abal kwajat in chalpayal ke anchan neech ka tajtsin.
41008033	Por na Jess chawkin kin tela xi ms an exbaltsik ani in kwiya na Pedro ench: —Ki wixkin tech lej atax! Tat yab a chalpayal xan ti na Dios tin chalpayal, tokot a chalpayal xan tin chalpayal an iniktsik.
41008034	In kaniytsik tm na Jess ka utey an atiklbtsik ani nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ti kin wwna, yab kin ajay tinb ani yab kin dha ti kwenta maske ka chemdh.
41008035	Pos max jun xita in l kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha, por xita kin jila tinb ka chemdh kal Nanki tu kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, neech kin loo.
41008036	Jant ti alwa abal jun xita, max kin bajaw kin koy ejtal xowa waach ban kayl ani kin kibdha nin ejattal ban kibeltalb?
41008037	O janty neech kin ejto kin pidhna an inik abal kin loo nin ejattal?
41008038	Max jun xita kin tidhena tin tila ani kin tidhena jeye kin tila nu oktsixtal tin tamt an atiklbtsik xi atax ani u walablom xi xo waach, tm, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye kin tidheb kal jaj tam kin witsiy kal ejtal in pulek labidh tokt nu Tta ani in junkmte kal an tokat abatwletsik.
41009001	Utsantsik jeye ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke taltsik xi xo tech i kwajat, yab neech ki chemech asta ka chuutsik ti takix na Dios kal ejtal nin chp.
41009002	Akak a kts ms tayl, na Jess junax kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan, kadhiytsik ba jun i tekat chn. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajattsik, na Jess in jalkuy tinb.
41009003	Nin kudhkmil chaxkin ani dhaknib tajat jelti an chm; dhaknib tajat, ke ni jun i pakwtsix xi tech ti kayl yab neech kin ejto kin dhaknibdha jelt xan ti dhaknib nin kudhkmil na Jess.
41009004	An exbaltsik in chuu jeye na Elas ani na Moiss ti tiloll kal na Jess.
41009005	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Oktsix, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas.
41009006	Anchan ti kwajat ti kw abal jaj ani nin kidhtaltsik jikenektsik tajat ani na Pedro yab in chob xanty kwajat in ulal.
41009007	Chakan tm jun i tokow xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani dhabyattsik, achatm jun i kwintalb ban tokow ani xu kw, in ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat, ka exbantsitsik xowa Jaj in ulal.
41009008	Tmki, tam tin telatsik wilill, yab xita ms in chuu, tokot kwetm na Jess.
41009009	Tam ti exomichtsik ti pal ban chn, utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xowa in chumaltsik asta tam Jaj, xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik ka ejech ti t.
41009010	Anchan tin tajatsik xan ti utsan ani ni jun xita yab in tiltsitsik; por jajtsik echeki u knx xanty in l kin ulu tam ti kwajat in ulal ke neech ka ejech ti t.
41009011	In konoytsik tm ench na Jess: —Jantki tin ulal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ke yejat ka tsch okox na Elas?
41009012	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ke na Elas neech ka tsch okox ani neech kin lejkiy ti t ejtal xowa waach. In ulal jeye an Tokat Dhuslab ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna tajat yajtsik ani neech kin pojk.
41009013	Por tsubax tu utsltsik ke na Elas tsinekich ani tajtsin kal an iniktsik xan ti ka len, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ke neech kin tamu.
41009014	Tam ti witsiytsik xon ti kwajat xi ms an exbaltsik, in chuu yn i atiklbtsik wilill xon ti kwajattsik ani ta jeye ti kwajat ti kwlx kal jajtsik i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
41009015	Tam ti chutat na Jess, labantsik tajat ani kaletsik adhik ti chapndhom.
41009016	Konyattsik tm kal na Jess: —Janty i kwajat a kwlxnl kal jajtsik?
41009017	Tkon tm jn xi taja jeye ti kwajat: —Oktsix, j tu tsidhantsmal tu kwitlil abal kwajat teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb ani mbdhats.
41009018	Tam ka bajujuyat xontiki ti xeech, u wipipindhb, u dhopopl in ijil, u rechechl in kamab ani u jilkonal teytemadh. U utsmalich na exbaliltsik abal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb por yabtsik in ejtm.
41009019	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belomtsik! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech an kwitl.
41009020	Utuntsat tm ani tam ti chutat na Jess kal an atax ejattalb, wipipindh tm an kwitl. Kwajl chabl, tlkin ani u dhopopl in ijil bin wi.
41009021	Konyat tm an ttalb kal na Jess: —Jyich i kij in kool ti kwajat anchan? Tkon ench an ttalb: —Asta ti chipl.
41009022	Yantalich an atax ejattalb in tajm ka kwajlan ba kamal o ba ja abal kin chemdha. Ti ku yajnantsi weye ani ti ku tolmiy max ka ejto.
41009023	Utsan tm kal na Jess: —Jantki tin utsl max ka ejto? Ejtal u tjnal max jn u belom lejtal.
41009024	In ulu tm kawidh ench an ttalb: —In belomich, por ti kin tolmiy neye abal kin belmch ms.
41009025	Tam tin chuu na Jess ke exom tajat ti junkunal an atiklbtsik, in kwiya an atax ejattalb ench: —Atax ejattalb, xa kool jech an kwitl u m ani yab u ochox, tu utsl ki kale ba jaj ani yab ki witsiy ka ocha.
41009026	An atax ejattalb in taja ka dhjan an kwitl, in wipipindha chapik ti t ani kalch tm ba jachan an kwitl. An kwitl jilkon kwachl jelti max chemnek. Jaxtm ti yn in ulutsik ke chemchich.
41009027	Por na Jess in tyna an kwitl bin kubak ani in tolmiy ka chakay.
41009028	Tayl, tam ti kwajatichtsik kwetm ba jun i at, konyat ench na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik: —Jantki waw ti yab i ejto ki kldha an atax ejattalb?
41009029	Tkoyattsik ench: —Jech an atax ejattalb ani xi ms nin kidhtaltsik tokot u kalel tam jn ka lan ani ka klin.
41009030	Tam ti kaletsik taja, wateytsik Galilea. Na Jess yab in lena ka chobn kal ni jun xita xon ti kwajat,
41009031	abal Jaj kwajat in oktsal nin exbaliltsik ani in utsltsik ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walbidh iniktsik abal kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
41009032	An exbaltsik yab in exbay xanty kwajattsik ti usnal ani in jiknltsik kin konoy ka wiltsin.
41009033	Ulichtsik tm ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam ani tam ti kwajatich ban at, na Jess in konoy ench nin exbaliltsik: —Janty i kwajaytsik ta tsxtsik ti bl?
41009034	Por yab tkontsik, kom kwajinektsik ti kwlx abal in l kin chobna xita j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik.
41009035	Buxkan tm na Jess, in kaniy ka utey xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ka kwajay ms ultalb, yejat tajat kin chaka tinb ani kin tjontsi ejtalkitsik.
41009036	In yakwana tm jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik, in mulukna ani in utsatsik ench:
41009037	—Max jun xita kin bachu ani kin beletna jun i chakam kwitl jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal ani xita ti kin bachu Nan, yab Nanki tin bachwal, in bachwalich jeye na Dios xi tin abmal.
41009038	Utsan tm ench kal na Juan: —Oktsix, i chuu jun i inik xin kldhl i atax ejattalb kal tin awiltal na bij, por i taxkantsi abal jaj yab xeech kal waw.
41009039	Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Yab ka taxkantsitsik, pos xita in tajl i labidh labandhaxtalb kal tin awiltal nu bij, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu tayl ke Nan yab in alwa inik.
41009040	Pos xita yab tu atl, junax kal waw.
41009041	Xitakich ti ki pidha jun tu ti ja ka ucha kal Nan tu kwenta abal i junax kal Nan, tu utsltsik tsubax ke neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb kal na Dios.
41009042	Tu utsltsik jeye, xita kin walbindha jn ti b jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik, yn an yajtsiktalb neech ka pidhan. Ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin.
41009043	Max na kubak ti walbindhl, ka muchiy; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot a kubak ani yab kal chablam na kubak ki petn ban kibeltalb xon ti an kamal yab jayki u tepel.
41009044	Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech jeye ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
41009045	Max na akan ti walbindhl, ka muchiy; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot a akan ani yab kal chablam na akan ki petn ban kibeltalb xon ti an kamal yab jayki u tepel.
41009046	Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
41009047	Max na wal ti walbindhl, ka jixa; pos ms alwa ki ochich xon tu takix na Dios kal jn tokot a wal ani yab kal chablam na wal ki petn ban kibeltalb.
41009048	Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
41009049	Ejtal xita kin bela na Dios neech ka tokwattsik kal an yajtsiktalb, jelt in yjtsk an kamal. Pos anchan jeye, nin tul an konl xu pikbantsb na Dios, okox u chapniyb abal ka tokwat.
41009050	An atem alwa, por max ka xawm, ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin chapmdha. Ki kwajaytsik echeki jelti an atem ani ki kwajaytsik kijidh jn ani jn.
41010001	Kale tm na Jess ban bitsow xi Kapernam ani kale ban chabl xi Judea ani ban chabl xi kwajat jun jekat walja Jordn. Junkun jun taja xon ti kwajat na Jess yn i atiklbtsik ani Jaj in oktsitsik jelt xan tin ujnmal in tajl.
41010002	Utukn tm na Jess kal taltsik i fariseotsik abal ka konyat max in tomnl ka jlxin xi tomkidhtsik. Anchan ti konyat na Jess abal ka ejtowat ka walbindh max yab ka tkon alwa.
41010003	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty in takixnmal na Moiss ba nin dhuslbil?
41010004	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Moiss in takixnmal ba nin dhuslbil ke an inik awil kin jila nin tomtal max kin pidha jun i w xin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti neech kin jila ani awilich tm kin jila.
41010005	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Na Moiss in jila dhutsadh jachan an takixtalb abal i tanchutsik tajat ani yab a l ka exbaytsik.
41010006	Por tam ti tujeyki, tam ti na Dios in taja ejtal xowa waach, “in taja an inik ani an mmlb”.
41010007	“Jaxtm, tam jun i inik ka tomkin, kool kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay kal nin tomtal.
41010008	Xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
41010009	Jaxtm, xowa na Dios in jnkxliymal, yab yejat kin kxliy an inik.
41010010	Tayl, tam ti kwajatichtsik ban at, an exbaltsik in konoy jun na Jess kal jech tin kwenta.
41010011	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Max jun i inik kin jila nin tomtal ani ka tomkin kal keet i mmlb, u jilkonal walbidh kal i uxmbetalb ani kal jech, in waltsalich nin jidhtal tomtal.
41010012	Ani max jun i mmlb kin jila nin tomkl ani ka tomkin kal i keet inik, an mmlb u wenkonalich jeye tm ti junkux inik.
41010013	Utuntsat tm na Jess chb x ti chakamtsik abal kin lbtaja, por an exbaltsik tujey kin kwiya xin utwal an chakamtsik.
41010014	Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti kwiyax nin exbaliltsik, chakuy ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka walka ka utey an chakamtsik xon tin kwajat, yab ka tamkuytsik, pos xita in jilltsik tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, in junwal jelti jech an chakamtsik.
41010015	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita yab kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jelti jun i chakam, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal a Dios.
41010016	In mulukna tm an chakamtsik, in punu nin kubak bin b in k an chakamtsik ani in lbtaja.
41010017	Tam ti na Jess in ntsch an bl, utey adhik jun i inik, tudhlan tin tamt ani utsan ench: —Alwa Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto neye ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
41010018	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios.
41010019	A exllich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita, yab ki kambixin ani ka kakna na tta ani na nna.”
41010020	Tkon tm ench an inik: —Oktsix, ejtal jachan an takixtalb u tajl asta tin chipl.
41010021	In teloloy tm na Jess jachan an inik, in kontsi ti kanidhaxtalb ani in utsa ench: —Tokot u kibel jun xata ka taja: ki kale ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka chejwaliy an chojontltsik an ti tumn. Anchan, neech tm ka koy t walki jun xata xi yn tajat in jalbl ani wana tm ta exbal kal Nan.
41010022	Tam ti an inik in acha jech, tepin tajat ani kale, kom tumnladh tajat.
41010023	In tela tm wilill na Jess ani in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jun i tumnladh inik!
41010024	Labantsik tajat an exbaltsik kal xowa in acha in ulu na Jess, por utsantsik jun ench: —Chakamtsik, tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyattsik kal na Dios xin kyaltsik tin belomtal an tumn!
41010025	Ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xu bijyb kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
41010026	An exbaltsik ms laban tajat ani u knxtsik ench: —Pos max anchan jita neech kin ejto ka loey?
41010027	Telantsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, por an iniktsik, yaba. Tokot na Dios in ejtowal kin loo xitakichki.
41010028	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat.
41010029	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin jila in kim, in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in tta, in nna, in tomtal, in chakmiltsik o in chablil kal Nanki tu kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab,
41010030	neech kin bachu ba jech an kayl bo inik ms in yanl xowa in jilmal: in kimtsik, in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in nnatsik, in chakmiltsik ani in chabliltsik, maske neech ka atan, por tayl neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
41010031	Por tam na Dios kin taja an ljundhaxtalb, yn xita xo kwajat ms ultalb, neech ka jilkon ms tayl ani yn xita xo kwajat ms tayl, neech ka kwajay ms ultalb.
41010032	Tam ti nechichtsik ti bl abal ka kale Jerusaln, na Jess okox ti neech ani an exbaltsik kuxlek. An exbaltsik labnk tajat ani u jikltsik. Plm tm jun na Jess kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani tujey jun kin utsatsik xowa Jaj neech kin tamu.
41010033	In utsatsik ench: —A chutaltsik ke u nechich abal Jerusaln, xon ti Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban oklek pletsik ani ban oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jajtsik neech kin ulu abal kin chemdh ani neech tm kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik.
41010034	Neech ti kin labdhnatsik, neech ti kin kwadha, neech ti kin tubkay ani neech ti kin chemdha; por tin xlb a kts, neech kin ejech ti t.
41010035	Uteytsik tm ba na Jess, na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo ani in utsatsik ench: —Oktsix, i l ti ku tajtsi jun i alwatalb.
41010036	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l tu tajtsitsik?
41010037	Jajtsik in ulu ench: —Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ta takix kal na pulek labidh tokt, i l weye ku buxkan kal Tat, jn ta ejt ani jn ta kwatab.
41010038	Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Yab a chobtsik xanty a konyal. Neechxe ka ejto ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb xi Nan neech ku kuxuy? Ani neechxe ka ejto ka watnatsik an cheml xi jelti Nan neech ku watna?
41010039	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Neech ki ejto. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Neech kejle ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb xi Nan neech ku kuxuy ani neech jeye ka ejto ka watnatsik an cheml jelti xi neech ku watna.
41010040	Por yab u kool an awiltalb abal tu utsatsik xitam j neech ka buxkan tu ejt ani tu kwatab; tokot neech ka buxkantsik kal Nan xi takudh kal na Dios.
41010041	Tam tin achatsik xi lju an exbaltsik xowa kontsidh na Jess, in chakuntsitsik tajat xi chb an exbaltsik.
41010042	Por kanyattsik ka utey kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Jelt xan ta chobichtsik, xin takyal i bitsowtsik xi yab u israelitatsik u chapik takixtsik ani an pulek oklek, in tajl tinb ti pulek inik kal an atiklbtsik.
41010043	Por tattsik yab ka taja anchan xan ti jajtsik in tajl. Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal in l ka kwajay ultalb, yejat kin tjontsitsik xi ms.
41010044	Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal in l ti tjodh, yejat ka kwajay ti jolib kal ejtalkitsik.
41010045	Pos nibal Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal kin tjontsat, in tsinek abal tin tjontsix ani abal ku pidhna tub kin chemdh ani anchan yn kin ejto ka loeytsik.
41010046	Ulchichtsik tm Jerik. Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel ba jachan an bitsow junax kal nin exbaliltsik ani kal yn i atiklbtsik, in ela buxl wal bl jun i chojontl jokol xin konyal i tolmixtalb. Jech an jokol in bij ta Bartimeo ani u chakmlb kal na Timeo.
41010047	Tam tin acha abal exom ti watel na Jess xi Nasaret, tujey ti dhjax ani in ulu ench: —Jess, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
41010048	Yn kwiyxin abal ka chamkan, por jaj ms kawidh ti dhjaxin: —Jess xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
41010049	Kubey tm na Jess ani in abna ka kanyat an jokol. Kale tm ti usnal ench an jokol: —Yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, ki kubey, ti kanl.
41010050	In petna tm nin wt, kubey ani kale xon ti kwajat na Jess.
41010051	Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l tu tajtsi? An jokol tkon ench: —Oktsix, u l neye ti kin chuxindha.
41010052	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Awil ki kalch, i jeley abal i belmch. Tmki jachan ti chuxin an jokol ani in wwna na Jess xon ti neech.
41011001	Tam ti ulichtsik juntal xi chb an kwentsal xin bij Betfaj ani Betania kunatich Jerusaln xi kwajattsik tin tamt an chn Olibos, in okxiy na Jess chb nin exbaliltsik.
41011002	Utsantsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat tametlb ani tam ki ulichtsik taja neech ka elatsik wikadh jun i burru xi yabl pnadh jayki kal ni jun xita. Ka wilatsik ani ka tsidha tech.
41011003	Max ti ki konoy xantki ti exom a will an burru, ka utsa ench: “An Ajtiklb in yntsal ani tmeye kwa neech kin witsba.”
41011004	Kaletsik tm, in ela wikadh an burru elb ban bl kunat ba jun i wileb ani in wila.
41011005	Utsantsik ench kal xi tajatsik ti kwajat: —Janty a tajltsik? Jantki ta willtsik an burru?
41011006	Tkontsik jelt xan ti usnk kal na Jess ani walkjich tm kin jnatsik an burru.
41011007	In jntsitsik an ti burru na Jess, in tatlabiytsik kal nin kudhkmil ani puney na Jess.
41011008	Tin nakl an bl neech in nukltsik nin kudhkmil xon ti neech ka watey na Jess ani keettsik in pejl in kwel i tetsik ani in kwachbl tin nakl an bl.
41011009	Xi neechtsik okox ani xi palattsik kuxlek in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb!
41011010	Lbtajadh xi tl ti takix jelt xan ti takxink ni weje paklil Dabid! Okxlb t walki, ti ku loch xo!
41011011	Ochich na Jess ban bitsow Jerusaln ani kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Tam tin telmalich putl wilill ejtal xowa waach taja, kalch tm Betania kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, abal wklch.
41011012	Jun tsudhelom, tam ti kaletsik Betania, kaay na Jess.
41011013	In w chuu jun akanlek in xekedh akan i igo ani kale kin chuu max walidh; por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall, tokot in xekl, kom yabl in kijil ti walim.
41011014	In utsa tm ench na Jess jachan in akan an igo: —Yab jayki neech ki witsiy ta walim abal ki kaptsin an ta wall. Nin exbaliltsik in acha xan ti utsan in akan an igo.
41011015	Tam ti ulichtsik Jerusaln, na Jess kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in aja ka kale elb ejtal an njultsik ani an chaumtsik xi taja ti kwajattsik. In ketpantsi tin mesajil xin jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik ani nin njumtal jeye an njul kuku.
41011016	Ni jun xita yab in walka ka watey ti kititl kal in kitltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
41011017	In oktsi an atiklbtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Na Dios in ulal ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh, neech ka yn kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik”; por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.
41011018	Tam tin achatsik anchan an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tujeytsik kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess. Pos in chejnltsik kom ejtal an atiklbtsik labnk tajat kal xowa in oktsixnl na Jess.
41011019	Por tam ti jikwchinich, na Jess kale ba jachan an bitsow.
41011020	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, wateytsik dhajawe xon ti kwajat in akan an igo ani in chuu abal waynek asta bin ibl.
41011021	In chalpna tm na Pedro xanty usnk kal na Jess jachan in akan an igo ani in utsa ench na Jess: —Oktsix, ka tela, in akan an igo xa odhbijiy, waynek xo.
41011022	Tkon tm na Jess ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka belatsik na Dios.
41011023	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke xita kin utsa jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tachan ani ka petna tab ban pujal”, max tsubax lejtal tin bell na Dios ani yab kin jlkkliy nin chalab, neech ka tjan xan tin ulu.
41011024	Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ke xowakich ka kontsi na Dios kal i lb, ka bela ke Jaj ti pidhmalich xowa a kontsmal ani neech ka bachutsik.
41011025	Tam ki lantsik, max jun xita ti tajtsmal jun xata yab alwa, ka pakwlantsi; abal na Tta xi kwajat walki, ti ki pakwlantsi jeye an ta walastalbil.
41011026	Pos max yab ka pakwlantsi xi keettsik, na Tta xi kwajat walki yab jeye neech ti ki pakwlantsitsik.
41011027	Witsiy tm jun na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ban bitsow Jerusaln. Tam ti xechich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utukn kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik,
41011028	ani konyat ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech? Jita ti pidhmal ti awiltalb ka taja?
41011029	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Neech neye tu konoytsik jun xata, max ti kin tkoytsik, neech tm tu utsatsik neye kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl xowa u tajl.
41011030	Ti kin utsatsik, Jita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pujax? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik?
41011031	Tujeytsik tm ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Janty ki utsa? Max ki utsa ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech ti ku tkoy ench: “Jantki p tm ti yab a beltsitsik xowa in ulu?”
41011032	O awxe ki utsa ke kal i iniktsik ti abnk? Por tkxintsik jn ani jn abal yab xata kin utsa, pos in chejnl an atiklbtsik kom ejtal in bell ke na Juan kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
41011033	In utsatsik tm ench na Jess: —Yab i chob xita kl ti abnk. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Pos kom yabtsik tin utsa xita kl ti abnk, yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.
41012001	In tuju tm ti kw na Jess kal i junbaxtalbki ani in ulu ench: —Jun i inik in taya yn i akanlek i uba ani in mapuy. In taja jeye jun i pulek balixtalb abal kin baliy taja nin jall an uba ani in taja jeye jun i pnchy abal kin ejto kin beletna an tayablbtsik. In matintsixna tm an alelb abal ka tjomn kal keet ani jaj kale owl.
41012002	Tam tin bajch an kij xowki ti neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba tm jun in tojnlil abal kin konoy xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu an dhabal alelb.
41012003	Por yakwan kal an mat alelb, chawat ani mapats kubak ti witsiy.
41012004	In aba jun t in tojnlil ani jech tujbayat kal an mat alelb, chojbdh bin k ani odhbijyat jeye.
41012005	An dhabal alelb in aba jun bl jn ani xi jech chemdh. Tayl in aba yn ms keet, taltsik chawat ani xi taltsik chemdh.
41012006	Jilkonk bl nin junkax chakmil xin kanidhl tajat. Tin okontal in aba jeye abal in chalpay ench: “Neech xna kin kaknantsat tu chakmil.”
41012007	Por tam ti ulich an chakmlb, tsxintsik ench an mat alelb: “Jech jaich xi neech ti dhabal tayl; wana ki chemdha ani wawich tm neech ki dhabalna an alelb.”
41012008	Pos in yakwatsik tm, in chemdha ani in petna elb alelb.
41012009	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik neech kin taja an dhabal alelb? Yabxe neech ka tsch kin chemdha jachan an mat alelb ani kin matintsi keet an ti alelb?
41012010	Konyattsik jeye ench: —Awxe yab jayki a ajymaltsik an Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench?: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb.
41012011	Jech in tajmal an Okxlb ani waw i chutal jelti jun i pulek labandhaxtalb.
41012012	U lenbwiik ka yakwan na Jess kal taltsik xi ta ti kwajattsik abal in chob ke kal jajtsik tin kwenta ti tiltsin jachan an ti junbaxtalb kal na Jess. Por yab xata ti tajtsin na Jess ani kalchtsik tokot kom in chejnl an atiklbtsik.
41012013	Tayl, abtsin na Jess chb x ti fariseotsik junax kal in atiklbil na Erodes abal ka taktamiyat ani anchan ka tajan kin ulu jun xata yab alwa abal ka walbindh.
41012014	Tam ti ulichtsik, utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, waw i chob ke ejtal tsubax xowa a ulal. Tat yab a dhl ti kwenta xowa in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, pos yab i kwajat a eblidh tell an iniktsik xanty in wynltsik in y. A oktsixnl kal i tsubaxtalb nin takixtal na Dios. In tomnlxe ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an pulek takix romano, o yaba? Ki pidhaxe o yaba?
41012015	Por kom na Jess in chobich abal u kambixkitsik, in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin taktamiyaltsik? Ti kin tsidhantsi jun i patl tumn abal ku tela.
41012016	Tsidhantsat tm an ti tumn, tam tin telmich na Jess, in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Jita in wal xi jech kwajat chilbadh ban tumn ani jita in bij xi jech dhutsadh? Tkontsik ench: —An lej pulek takix romano.
41012017	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu. Labantsik tajat abal anchan ti tkoyattsik.
41012018	Tsch jeye ti chutb na Jess kal chb x i Saduseotsik, xin ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t ani utsan ench:
41012019	—Oktsix, na Moiss tu jiltsi dhutsadh ke max jun i tomkidh inik ka chemech ani kin jila nin tomtal ani yab in kymaltsik ni jun i chakam, nin kidhb kool ka tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb abal kin koy i chakamtsik jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemech.
41012020	Pos twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. An jidhtal kwitl tomkin, por chemech ani yab in jila ni jun i chakam.
41012021	In chabtal an kwitl tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb, por chemech jeye ani yab in jila ni jun i chakam. Anchan jeye ti tmun kal nin oxtal kidhb.
41012022	Ani anchan ti tmun kal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik. Tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb ani ni jn yab in jila in chakmil. Okontalb chemech jeye an mmlb.
41012023	Tam ka ejechtsik ti t, kal jowa an inik ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb abal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik in tomiknmal?
41012024	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat, por jaich abal yab a exlltsik an Tokat Dhuslab nibal nin chp na Dios.
41012025	Pos tam ka ejdh an chemlomtsik, neech ka kwajay jelti an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat walki; yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin.
41012026	Por kal tin kwenta an chemlomtsik xi neech ka ejech ti t, k yab jayki a ajymaltsik bin dhuslbil na Moiss xan ti tawn kal na Dios ban kidhadh te, xi kwajat ti tal? Ench ti utsan: “Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.”
41012027	Na Dios, in Diosil xi ejattsik, pos nin ejattal an chemlomtsik kwajat ejat. Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat kal tin kwenta an chemlomtsik.
41012028	Jun i oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss utey xon ti kwajattsik ani in acha xanty u kwlxnb. Kom in chobna ke na Jess tknk alwa, in konoy ench: —Jowa j an takixtalb xi ms uluts?
41012029	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —An takixtalb xi ms uluts jaich jech: “Ka acha, atiklbtsik xi Israel: an Okxlb jaich ni Diosil ani Jaj, jaich nu junkax Okxlb.
41012030	Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal na itsch, kal ejtal na ejattal, kal ejtal na chalab ani kal ejtal na chp.” Jech jaich an takixtalb xi ms uluts.
41012031	Nin chabtal, in junwal jeye jelti xin jidhtal: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.” Yab waach ni jun i takixtalb xi ms uluts k xi jechtsik.
41012032	Utsan tm ench kal an oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios: —Oktsix, alwa tajat ani tsubax xowa a ulu. Jn tokot a Dios waach ani yab waach ms keet.
41012033	Max i kaknl na Dios kal ejtal ni itsch, kal ejtal ni chalab, kal ejtal ni ejattal ani kal ejtal ni chp ani max i kanidhl jeye ejtal xi keettsik jelt xan ti kanidhl tib, jaich ms in jalbl tin tamt na Dios k tam ki chemdhl i konl abal ki pikbantsi na Dios tsikadh o tam ki pikbantsi xowakich.
41012034	Tam ti na Jess in acha abal tkon kal i tekat chalab, in utsa tm ench: —Wich tajat u kibel abal ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios. Yabich tm xata konyat ms kal ni jun xita.
41012035	Tam ti na Jess kwajat ti oktsix bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulu ench: —An oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ulaltsik ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
41012036	Pos max anchan, jantki p tm ti jaj jeye tajat na Dabid ijtsiyat kin ulu ench kal an Tokat Ejattalb?: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.”
41012037	Pos max jaj jeye tajat an pulek takix Dabid in ulu ke an Kristo jaich nin Ajtik, jantki p tm tu ulwb ke na Dabid, jaich in weje paklil an Kristo? Yn i atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat taja ani u ochwixtsik kal yantam i kulbxnich.
41012038	Tam ti na Jess bl kwajat in oktsal an atiklbtsik in utsatsik ench: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ka xechin kal in jochdha xekt ani ka chapndhtsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
41012039	Ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan ban koytalb xon tu buxkanaltsik xi ms uluts ani tam waach i kapxnich, in kulbetnltsik ka buxk ban koytalb xi ms alwa.
41012040	Jajtsik in kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani tayl, in tajltsik i nakdha lb abal kin makuxna ani abal ka utsantsik ke i lujdha iniktsik. Xin tajltsik anchan, neech kin bachu jun i yajtsiktalb ms plek.
41012041	Jun i kij, na Jess buxl tin tamt xon ti kwajat nin bl an tumn xu pikbantsb na Dios, in tell xan ti an atiklbtsik tin balyal an pikbantsixtalb ani yn i tumnladh iniktsik in balyal yandha i tumn.
41012042	Ulich jeye jun i chojontl chemtsidh mmlb ani in baliy chb i tsitsik tipax tumn xi yab yandha in jalbl.
41012043	Na Jess in kaniy tm nin exbaliltsik ka utey ani in utsatsik ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, an tumn xin pidhna jech an chojontl chemtsidh mmlb w tajat, por ms ja yn in jalbl tin tamt na Dios k xi ejtal an tumn xi keettsik in balymal bin bl an pikbantsixtalb.
41012044	Pos keettsik, tokot in pidhnl xowa yabich in yntsal; por an mmlb, kal in chojontltal, in pidhna ejtal xowa ta tin kool abal kin watna kl na kts.
41013001	Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utsan ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, ka tela an labidh tujubtsik xi kl ti tajadh an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an attsik xi jaych jeye in adhk!
41013002	Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xo a chutal jech an pakdha at, por yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx. Ejtal neech ka julp.
41013003	Kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos xi kwajat tin tamt an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Tam ti tajaich ti buxl na Jess, utey tm na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan ani na Andrs abal kin konoytsik chinatki ench:
41013004	—Ti ku utsa xowki neech ka tmun ejtal xowa a ulu ani ti ku utsa jeye xantom exl neech ki chuu abal ki chobna ke exomich ti kunel xowki neech ka tmun.
41013005	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka beletnatsik tab abal yab ki kambiyat kal ni jun xita,
41013006	pos neech ka tsch yn kin kambixna nu bij ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Nanich nin Kristo”. Ani yn neech ka kambiyat kal jech an kambixtsik.
41013007	Tam ka achatsik ke exom i pjxtalb tki tki ani u tilnal ke tich jun neech ka tujey, yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, pos anchan kool ka tmun, por yabl jaich an pakwenib.
41013008	Pos an pakdha bitsow neech ti pjx kal in at pakdha bitsow ani an pakdha oklek neech ti pjx kal in at pakdha oklek. Neech ka lwkin an chabl tki tki, neech ka wachin i kanab ani neech ti pjx an atiklbtsik. Por ejtal jech, jaich in tujtal an yajtsiktalb, jelti an yajal xin achl jun i mmlb tam nechich kin wachiy i chakam.
41013009	Ka beletnatsik tab, pos neech ki pidhn ban pakdha tjodh ani neech ki chawattsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Neech ki kinandhtsik ban pakdha awiltalb ani ban pakdha takix kal Nanki tu kwenta. Anchan, neech ka ejto ti kin tilatsik tin tamt jajtsik.
41013010	Ani neech ka tiltsin jech an ti alwa tilab ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl ani tm neech ka ulchich an pakwenib.
41013011	Tam ki yakwantsik ani ki jnjich abal ki pidhn ban awiltalbtsik, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal tin kwenta xowa neech ka ulu. Tam kin bajch an ora xowki neech ki kwin, neech ki pidhantsik xowa ka ulu. Pos yab tattsik neech ta kw, neech ti kw an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba na itsch.
41013012	Taltsik neech kin pidhna nin kidhbtsik abal ka chemdh ani an ttalbtsik neech jeye kin pidhna nin chakmiltsik abal ka chemdh. An chakmlbtsik neech kin tomna nin tta ani nin nna ani neech kin pidhna abal ka chemdhtsik.
41013013	Neech ki atantsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom kal Nanki tu kwenta, por xita kin kuxuy ejtal jech, neech ka lowat.
41013014	Xita kin ajay jech, kin exbay: Tam ka chuutsik an kakadh ataxtalb xin tilmal an tiltsix Daniel kwajatich xon tu kaknb na Dios, tm, xi kwajattsik ban chabl xi Judea, ki kaletsik ta chinkonal ban chnlom.
41013015	Xi kwajattsik tin b nin kim, yab ka paaytsik abal ka ochich kin iki jun xata alt.
41013016	Ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiy tin kim abal kin iki nin wt.
41013017	Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi ka elan kodh jachan i kij o u tsutsdhom!
41013018	Ka kontsaltsik na Dios abal yab ka tmun jech tam in kijil in chamy,
41013019	pos watats ti kakadh an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka wachin jachan i kij. Asta tin tajm na Dios an chabl ani an walki ani asta xo, yab jayki wachink ni jun i yajtsiktalb jelti xi neech ka wachin. Ani yab ms jayki neech ka wachin jun i yajtsiktalb anchan.
41013020	Max an Okxlb yab kin wmdha jachan an kij, yab xita neech ka loey; por kal tin kwentaki in knl xi Jaj in takwymal, neech kin wmdha jachan an kij.
41013021	Tam jachan i kij, max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo”, o “ka tela, n kwajat”, yab ka beltsi.
41013022	Pos neech ka wachin i kambixtsik xi neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo, o ke jajich xi abadh ti tiltsix kal na Dios. Neech kin taja i pakdha exl ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb abal kin kambiy an atiklbtsik ani neech kin lena kin kambiytsik asta xi takudhich kal na Dios.
41013023	Por yab ka uktsitsik ke ejtal jech tu okox utsmalich abal ki kwajaytsik tojojodh.
41013024	Tayl, tam ka watch jachan an yajtsiktalb, na kts neech ka jikwchin ani na ch yab neech ka tajkan;
41013025	neech ka kwajlan na ttsik ani ejtal an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki, neech ka yoywat.
41013026	Tmki jachan, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin chutat kal ejtalki, pos neech kin tsch ban tokow kal ejtal nu chp ani nu pulek labidh tokt.
41013027	Neech tm ku aba nu tokat abatwlejiltsik putlki an kayl ani putlki t walki abal kin junku xu takwymal.
41013028	Ka exbaytsik jech an junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta in akan an igo: Tam ka tujch ti kalel nin dhlam kweltsik ani ka tujch ti eblinal nin xekltsik, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
41013029	Anchan jeye, tam ka chuutsik exomich ti tmnal ejtal xowa tu utsmal, ka chobna abal wich u kibel kin tsch jun.
41013030	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun tam yabl chemnektsik xi kwajat ejat jech i kij.
41013031	Ejtal xi t kwajat walki ani xi kwajat jeye tech ban kayl, neech ka pakchun; por xowa Nan u ulal, yab ja neech ka watey yab ka tmun anchan.
41013032	Por kal tin kwenta na kts ani an ora xowki ti neech kin tsch jun, ni jun xita yab in chob, nibal an tokat abatwletsik xi t kwajat walki, nibal Nan xin Chakmlb kal na Dios, tokot in chob nu Tta.
41013033	Jaxtm tu utsltsik: Ka kokm i kwenta ani ki lantsik junini abal yab ki elan ukpidh, pos yab a chobtsik xowki neech kin witsiy jun.
41013034	In junwal jelti jun i inik xi neech owl bitsow. Tam ti yabl kalnek, in punkuntsi nin tojnliltsik abal ka beletnantsat tin kim; juntsik juntsik in pidha ti tojlb ani in takiy an belkol wileb kin chuchm alwa abal ka japtsin an ti wileb tam ka witsiy.
41013035	Nan u junwal jelti an dhabal at xi kale owl bitsow. Jaxtm tu utsltsik ka kokm i kwenta kom yab a chobtsik xowki neech kin witsiy, max dhamkulom, chejel akal, tam ka dhjan an pekel o tam tsudhenekich,
41013036	abal tam kin tsch jun jiktowle, yab tu ela i ukpidhtsik.
41013037	Xowa tu utsltsik yab tatkitsik tu utsl, ejtalki u utsltsik ench: Ka kokmtsik i kwenta.
41014001	Tam ti jachan, u kibel chb a kts abal ka ajbn an paskwa junax kal nin ajb an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, an ajib xin ajbnl an israelitatsik. An oklek pletsik junax kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin yakwa na Jess kal i kambixtalb ani kin chemdha.
41014002	Por in ulaltsik ench: —Yab ki taja tam exom an ajib abal yab ka kwajay ti pjx an atiklbtsik.
41014003	Tam ti na Jess kwajat ban bitsow xi Betania bin kim na Simn xin koolwiik an kwajat atax tt, lejat buxl ti kapul, ulich jun i mmlb xin tsidhl jun i frasko tajadh kal i alabastro. An frasko tsutsat kal i niwiytalb xi mapal j in niwy i wich xu bijyb ti nardo ani kajbidh tajat in jalbl. In pejkntsi tin nk an frasko ani in joltsi an ti niwiytalb bin k na Jess.
41014004	Taltsik xi ta ti kwajattsik, chakuytsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Jantki ti odhn jech an niwiytalb?
41014005	Ka nujwatwiik kal x i bo inik i denariotsik o ms abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik. Ani ulwat abal yab tajat alwa xowa in taja jachan an mmlb.
41014006	Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Jila kwajat, yab xata ka utsa. Jech xowa tin tajtsi, alwa tajat.
41014007	Pos an chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik ani neech ka ejto ka tolmiytsik tam ka lena, por Nan yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
41014008	Jaj tin tajtsi xowa in ejto, tin niwbdhantsmalich an tu tul abal ka kwajay tojojodhich tam kin jolyat.
41014009	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke putlki tin publ an kayl xntikichki ka tilan an alwa tilab, neech jeye ka tilan xowa in tajmal jech an mmlb abal ka chalpayat.
41014010	Na Judas Iskariote, jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, kale tm kin chuu an oklek pletsik ani in utsa abal jaj neech kin pidhna na Jess.
41014011	Tam tin achatsik, kulbtsik tajat ani utsan na Judas abal neech ka pidhan ti tumn. Na Judas in tuju tm kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin pidhna na Jess.
41014012	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an ajib tam u kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye ani tam u chemdhb jeye an borrego abal ka ajbn an paskwa, konyat ench na Jess kal an exbaltsik: —Jn ta l ku kale ki tojojoy abal ka kapu an wiyadh borrego kal tin kwenta an paskwa?
41014013	In aba tm chb xi ta ti xeech kal Jaj ani in utsa ench: —Ki kale ban bitsow, taja, neech ka elatsik jun i inik xin nedhl jun mul i ja ani ka wwna.
41014014	Ki ochichtsik xon ti jaj ka ochich ani ka utsa ench an dhabal at: “An oktsix in l kin chobna xon ti kwajat an alt xon ti neech kin kapu an wiyadh borrego junax kal nin exbaliltsik kal tin kwenta an paskwa.”
41014015	Neech tm ti ki ltsitsik jun i pulek alt tojojodhich alwa ba jun i pntsx at. Ka lejkiytsik tm taja an kapnl abal waw.
41014016	Kale tm an exbaltsik ani ulich ban bitsow Jerusaln. Anchan xan ti utsantsik, anchan tin ela ani in lejkchtsik tm an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
41014017	Tam ti aklch, ulich na Jess junax kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik
41014018	ani tam ti kwajatichtsik ti kapul ban mesa, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jn ti b xi tattsik, xi xo kwajat ti kapul kal Nan, neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
41014019	Tepintsik tm tajat ani tujey ti konyb ench na Jess kal xi lajuchb juntsik ti juntsik: —Awxe nan? Ani jn in ulu jeye ench: —Awxe nan?
41014020	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jn ti b xi tattsik lajuchb, xi exom in juwal an pan ba jaych an talab xon ti Nan u juwal, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
41014021	Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin chemdh jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, por chojontl in chubl an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna! Pos yajtsik tajat ti neech kin jalbiy, msakwiik alwa max yabak wachink.
41014022	Lejat kwajattsik ti kapul, na Jess in tyna an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani tam tin pejmalich, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka kaputsik, jech jaich nu tul.
