41014023	In tyna tm jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in watbantsi nin exbaliltsik ani ejtal in ucha wetsik wetsik.
41014024	In utsatsik ench: —Jech, jaich nu xichl xi neech kin jalblna an t lejkintalb xin lejkiymal na Dios. Jech nu xichl, jaich xi neech ku wakla ban peltsidh te abal tin alwabl yn i atiklbtsik.
41014025	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta tam ku ucha xi t an uxnl xon tu takix na Dios.
41014026	Tam ti okontsik kin ajtintsi na Dios, kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos.
41014027	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jech i akal ejtal tattsik neech ka jila ti kin bela kal tin kwenta xowa neech ku tamu, pos ench tin ulu na Dios ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Neech ku walka ka chemdh an belkol borregotsik ani an borregotsik neech ka bukey.”
41014028	Por tam kin ejech ti t, neech kin kale okox ban chabl Galilea ani tattsik tayl.
41014029	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Maske ejtal xi ms kin jila ti bela, nan yaba.
41014030	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke jech i akal, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel chbl, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
41014031	Por na Pedro in witsko jun ani in ulu ench: —Maske kin utsan ke neech kin chemdh junax kal Tat, yab neech ku ulu ke yab tu exll. Ani ejtaltsik anchan tin ulu.
41014032	Ulichtsik tm ba jun i chakam alelb xin bij Jetseman ani utsan ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Ki buxkankitsik tech, lejat Nan neech n ani tin l.
41014033	In jna na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan abal ka junikn kl ani tujey kin acha na Jess jun i tepintalb ani yajtsiktalb.
41014034	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —U achl tu ejattal ke neech ku chmay jech an tepintalb. Ki jilkontsik tech ani yab ki wayichtsik.
41014035	Kale tm na Jess lej w t ani, tudhlan kutl asta chabl ani in kontsi na Dios max in ejtowalak kin taja abal yab kin watna an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin tametna jachan i ora.
41014036	Ba nin lbil in ulu ench: —Tta, ejtal xowa a l u tjnal kal na awiltal ani kal na chp. Nan tu kontsal ti kin tolmintsi abal yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb xi tin aytsm; por yab ka tjan xowa Nan u l, ka tjan xowa Tat a l.
41014037	Witsiy tm xon ti kwajat xi x an exbaltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela. Utsan ench na Pedro: —Simn, a bell ta wayal? Yab a ejto ka kuxuy ni jun i ora yab ki wayich?
41014038	Yabtsik ki wayich ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax. Tsubax kejle, na ejattaltsik in l ki lan, por yab i tolmiybtsik kal na tul abal yab tajat likat.
41014039	Kale tm jun ani lan. Anlki ti lan jelt xan tin tajmal tin jidhtal.
41014040	Tam ti witsiy na Jess, u wayaltsik jun tin ela abal u mtnalichtsik tajat nin wal kal an akal ani yabtsik in ela xan ti ka tkon.
41014041	Kale jun ti l tin oxtsl ani tam ti witsiy xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik, in utsatsik ench: —A ntsaltsik ta wayal ani ta koyol? Lejatich! In bajmalich an ora xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhnjich abal kin chemdh kal an walablomtsik.
41014042	Ki chakchtsik ani wanch; nich tl xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
41014043	Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess tam ti ulich na Judas, jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik. Ulich junax kal yn i ykwaltsik, in teykmtsik i macht ani i te. Abnktsik kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik.
41014044	Na Judas, xi neech ti pidhnax, jayki tin utsmalich an ykwaltsik xanty neech kin taja abal kin exlatsik xitam j na Jess. Ench tin utsatsik: —An inik xi neech ku chuchbay, jaich xi tattsik a ayal. Ka yakwa ani ka jnatsik belkmte alwa.
41014045	Tam ti ulich, utey ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Oktsix, Oktsix! Ani in chuchbay.
41014046	Tmki ti yakwan na Jess kal an ykwaltsik.
41014047	Jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat kal na Jess in jixna nin machtil ani in patntsi tin xuchun nin tojnlil an oklek pletsik.
41014048	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess xi ulich an ti yakwaxtsik: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i macht ani kal i te abal ti kin yakwa jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun i kw?
41014049	Tsudhey ka tsudhey in kwajinek kal tattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios tin oktsix ani yab tin yakwmal. Por jech xowa exom tin tajtsaltsik, jaich abal ka tjan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.
41014050	Jilan tm kwetm na Jess ani kale ti chinkonal an exbaltsik.
41014051	T jeye ti neech wewkmte na Jess kal jun i kwitl inik ani tokot bolilidh kal jun i dhak kudhkum. Jech an kwitl inik, yakwan jeye kal an ykwaltsik xi kl ti yakwan na Jess,
41014052	por in jilchna an dhak kudhkum xi kl ti bolidh ani chilim ti jlch.
41014053	Jn tm na Jess bin kim an lej oklek pletsik ani junkun taja nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, nin oklkiltsik an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios.
41014054	Na Pedro wwnaxin wki ani ulich asta bin elbil in kim an lej oklek pletsik. Buxkan taja ti dhilal bin wl an kamal junax kal xin beletnltsik an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
41014055	Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an Junkulom Awiltalb in ayal jun xata abal kin ejto kin walbiy na Jess ani anchan ka pidhn abal ka chemdh, por yab eltsin ni jun in walab.
41014056	Kal yn ti kwajay ti jantsinal ti kw na Jess, por keetich keetich xowa in ulutsik.
41014057	Kubey tm taltsik ti lnax jaychki kal i januts kw ani in ulutsik ench:
41014058	—Waw i achm tin ulmal ench: “Nan neech ku paku jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xin kubm an iniktsik ani ti x a kts neech ku kuba jun t xi yab kubadh kal i iniktsik.”
41014059	Por nibal anchan yab in junu xowa in ulutsik xi jidhtal.
41014060	Kubey tm an lej oklek pletsik junax chejel xon ti kwajat xi ttsik ti junkunk ani konyat ench na Jess: —Jantki ti yab i tknal? Tsubaxxe xowa i kwajat ta usnal o yaba?
41014061	Por na Jess n w yab kuchun ani nibal xata in tkoy. Konyat tm jun ench kal nin lej oklkil an pletsik: —Tatxe ni Kristo, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xu kaknb?
41014062	Tkon ench na Jess: —Nan. Ani neech ti kin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, buxl tin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani tam kin tsch jun ban tokow.
41014063	An lej oklek pletsik in michna kal in chkub nin kudhkmil xin kwajbm abal anchan ti tkoyat kal na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Yabich ms i yntsal i lnax.
41014064	A achaichtsik xan tin chikat taja na Dios. Janty xo a ulaltsik ki tajtsi? Ejtal xi ta ti junkunk, jununl tin ulutsik abal walbidh tajat na Jess ani in tomnl ka chemdh.
41014065	Tujey tm ti tubkayb na Jess kal taltsik, ti putsuntsb tin wal, ti chawb kal i kubaklek ani u usnal ench: —Ka ulu xo xita ti chaaw! Ani pikyat jeye bin wal kal an belkol pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
41014066	Na Pedro kwajat chaat bin elbil an pulek at ani tmki jachan, ulich jun in tsidhan xu tojnal bin kim an lej oklek pletsik.
41014067	Tam ti chutat na Pedro ti dhilal, teloloyat alwa ani utsan ench: —Tat junax teye ta xeech kal na Jess xi Nasaret.
41014068	Por na Pedro in ulu ench: —Yab u exll, nibal u chob xanty a till. Kale elb xon tu oxnb ani dhjan tm jun i pekel.
41014069	Chab chutat jun kal an tsidhan ani tujey kin utsa ench xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Jech an inik jaich jeye in kidhtal na Jess.
41014070	Por jaj in witsko kin ulu ke yab ani. Tam ti ms lej jun w, utsan ench kal xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Tsubax lejtal, tat jaich teye jn ti b xi jajtsik, pos tat i Galileo ani anchan teye i kw jelti jajtsik.
41014071	Tujey tm kin ulu na Pedro abal kin tamu xata yab alwa max yab tsubax xowa in ulal ani in lej tsubax ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab u exll xitam inik xi kwajattsik a till.
41014072	Tmki jachan, dhjan an pekel tin chabtsl. In chalpna tm na Pedro xan ti usnk kal na Jess: “Tam yabl dhjnk an pekel tin chabtsl, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.” Ani ukikl ti kwajay kin chalpay xowa usnk kal na Jess.
41015001	Tam ti tsudhey, dhajawe tajat ti junkun nin oklkiltsik an pletsik kal nin oklkil an judotsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani kal an Junkulom Awiltalb. Tam tin chalpchtsik alwa xanty neech kin taja, in jnatsik tm wikadh na Jess ani in pidhna ba na Pilato.
41015002	Konyat ench na Jess kal na Pilato: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Tkon ench na Jess: —Tat a ulal abal anchan.
41015003	Kal yn xata ti walbiyat kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik.
41015004	Konyat tm jun kal na Pilato: —Yabxe neech ki tkon? Ka acha xan ti exom ti walbiyaltsik, in ulaltsik ke yn xata a tajmal.
41015005	Por nibal anchan yab tkon na Jess ani labandhjich tokot na Pilato.
41015006	Echeki tam u ajbnb an paskwa, na Pilato in walkl jun i wiknl xi ka kontsin kal an atiklbtsik.
41015007	Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti balidh ban wikaxte jun i inik xin bij ta Barrabs xi wiknk junax kal nin kidhtaltsik abal chemdhaxnktsik tam tin pjeym i awiltalbtsik.
41015008	Junkun tm an atiklbtsik abal kin kontsi na Pilato kin walka jun i wiknl jelt xan ti echeki in ujnmal in tajl.
41015009	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —A ltsikxe tu walkantsi an tin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
41015010	Konyattsik anchan kal na Pilato kom in chob alwa ke yab u lenb ka chutat na Jess kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani jaxtm ti pidhnats na Jess abal ka chemdh.
41015011	Por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, in nixokna an atiklbtsik kin konoy ka walk na Barrabs.
41015012	Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty a l ku tajtsi xa bijyaltsik tin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
41015013	Jajtsik tkon kawidh ani in ulutsik ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
41015014	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Jantom walastalb in tajm? Por jajtsik in ntsi kin ulu ms kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
41015015	Kom na Pilato in l ka jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik, in walka na Barrabs. In abna tm ka lekbayat ynl na Jess ani tayl in pidhnaich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
41015016	Jn tm na Jess kal an soldadotsik bin kuxtlil an at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani kanyat ka junkun taja ejtal xi keet an soldadotsik.
41015017	Xeketliyat tm na Jess kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani kwajbantsat bin k ti kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh.
41015018	Tujey tm ti labdhnb ench na Jess: —Ki kwajay kijidh, Pulek Takxal an judotsik!
41015019	U toxyb bin k kal jun i te, u tubkayb ani u tudhltsik tm tin tamt.
41015020	Tam ti okontsik kin ubtna ani kin labdhna, in wkontschtsik tm an ti chak kudhkum, kwajbantsat xi Jaj nin kudhkmil ani kaldhjich tm abal ka jn ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
41015021	Taman ti bl jun i inik xin bij Simn, xu taknal ban chabl Sirene, nin tta na Alejandro ani na Rufo. Jaj u witslich bin ale ani tam tu watelich taja, tajtsin ti chplb kal an soldadotsik abal kin kitnantsi an ti peltsidh te xin nedhl na Jess.
41015022	Jn tm na Jess ban chabl xu bijyb Glgota. Ti tnek kw, Glgota, in l kin ulu: “In chablil in beklk in k i chemlom inik.”
41015023	Pidhan na Jess ti yajtsik uxnl xukudh kal i tsaiktalb xu bijyb mirra, por yab in lena kin ucha.
41015024	Tam ti pajkiyatich ban peltsidh te, wlchxnantsat an tin kudhkmil na Jess kal an soldadotsik, por yab aniki, okox ubtintsik abal kin chuu xanty kin lujuy kin ta juntsik ti b.
41015025	Belju i dhajaw tam ti na Jess pajkiyat ban peltsidh te.
41015026	Kwajb bin k an peltsidh te jun i dhuslab xin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti chemdh. Ench ti kwajat dhutsadh: “Jech jaich nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
41015027	Pajkiyattsik jeye ba peltsidh te junax kal na Jess chb i kwtsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.
41015028	Anchan ti tmun abal ka tjan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “jin jeye jelti max i walablom, jelti xi chemechtsik junax kal Jaj.”
41015029	Odhbijyat kal xu wateltsik taja tin tamt, in wwkliyaltsik nin k ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat, xa ejtowal ka paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech ka kuba jun ti x a kts,
41015030	ka loo xo tab ani ki paay ban peltsidh te.
41015031	T jeye ti kwajat nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ti labdhnax ani u tsxtsik ench: —In lomal keettsik ani xo Jaj yab in ejtowal kin loo tinb.
41015032	Max ani lejtal Jajich nu Kristo, nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik, ka paay xo ban peltsidh te ani neech tm ki belaich. Xi ta ti kwajattsik tin wlm kejtsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te, u odhbijixtsik jeye.
41015033	Tam ti chejelich a kts, jikwchin tin publ an kayl ani in tjontsi asta x i wkal.
41015034	Tam ti xich i wkal, na Jess in ulu kawidh ench: —Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani? —jech an kw in l kin ulu: Dios tu Ajtik, Dios tu Ajtik, jantki tin walba?
41015035	Taltsik xi taja ti kwajat, in achatsik ani in ulu ench: —Ka acha, exom in kanl na Elas, an tiltsix xi xechink ti weje.
41015036	Jn ti b kale adhik kin axdha ban jiliy uxnl jun xata jelti kwinim, in wika bin tsm jun i te, in utuntsi bin wi na Jess abal kin juchu ani in ulu ench: —Yabich ms xata ki tajtsi, wana ki chuu max ka tsch na Elas kin paba ban peltsidh te.
41015037	Dhjan tm kawidh na Jess ani chemech.
41015038	Tmki jachan, an tolow kudhkum xi ta ti palat alt ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xlan asta tekat ani asta chaat.
41015039	An oklek soldado romano xi ta ti kubl tin tamt na Jess, tam tin chuu xan ti dhjan ani chemech, in ulu ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech an inik u Chakmlb kal na Dios.
41015040	T jeye ti kwajat i mmlbtsik ti w telom. J kwajat taltsik nin bij: na Salom, na Mara Magdalena ani na Mara xin kool chb in chakmil, jn in bij ta Jos ani xi tayl in bij ta Jakobo.
41015041	Jech an mmlbtsik, juniknadh ani tolmidh kl na Jess tam ti kwajay Galilea. Ta jeye ti kwajat ms keet i mmlbtsik xi juniknadh kl na Jess tam ti kale Jerusaln.
41015042	Tam ti exomich ti dhamul, tam an israelitatsik in tojojoyal xowa in yntsal abal in ktsjil an koyxnich,
41015043	ulich na Jos xu kwajl ban bitsow Arimatea. Jaj jaich jeye jun i ultalb kidhtalb kal an Junkulom Awiltalb. Jaj kwajat jeye in aytsm xowki na Dios neech ka tujch ti takix ani in kuba tinb ka ochich xon ti kwajat na Pilato abal kin kontsi tin tul na Jess kin joliy.
41015044	Na Pilato labandh abal in acha ke jayki ti chemnek na Jess. Jaxtm tin kaniy an oklek soldadotsik abal kin konoy max ani lejtal ti chemnekich.
41015045	Tam ti utsan kal an oklek soldadotsik abal ani, utsanich tm na Jos kal na Pilato abal awilich kin jna kin joliy.
41015046	In chaay tm na Jos jun i kudhkum, in paba nin tul na Jess ban peltsidh te ani in boliy kal an kudhkum. Kale tm kin kwajba ba jun i jlimtalb xi ta ti kwajat cholkadh bin akan jun i tujub chn ani tolill tin utu jun i yejche tujub abal kin paxkintsi kl tin wilbil an jlimtalb.
41015047	Na Mara Magdalena ani xi jn na Mara, nin nna na Jos, in chuutsik xon ti kwajbantsat tin tul na Jess.
41016001	Tam ti watch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Salom, na Mara Magdalena ani xi jn na Mara nin nna na Jakobo, in chaaytsik i niwiytalb abal ka kaletsik kin mawtsi kl tin tul na Jess.
41016002	Dhajawe tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, kaletsik ban jlimtalb ani tam ti ulich taja jayki ti eblinkich na kts.
41016003	Knxintsik ench: —Jita neech ti ku wixkintsi an ti tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb?
41016004	Por tam ti ulchichtsik, in chuu abal an yejche tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb jayki ti wixkintsidh.
41016005	Ochichtsik tm alt ani in chuu taja buxl tin ejttsik jun xita jelti kwitl inik. An kwitl inik xeketlidh kal jun i dhak jochat xeketlb ani jikey tajat an mmlbtsik.
41016006	Por utsan ench an mmlbtsik: —Yab ki jikeytsik, u chobich abal a ayaltsik na Jess xi Nasaret, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Jaj ejnekich ti t, yabich waach tech. Ka telati n xon ti kwajbadh.
41016007	Ki kalchtsik ani ka utsa nin exbaliltsik ani na Pedro: “Na Jess neech ka okxin ka kale Galilea ani tattsik tayl; taja neech ka chuutsik jelt xan ti utsmal.”
41016008	Kale tm adhik an mmlbtsik ban jlimtalb abal tokot u wipipltsik ani u jikl. Nibal xata in utsatsik ni jun xita abal u jikltsik tajat.
41016009	Tam ti na Jess ejech dhajawe tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, okox in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Mara Magdalena, xi kldhantsidh bk i atax ejattalb.
41016010	Na Mara kale tm ani in utsa xi xechinktsik junax kal na Jess ke jaj in chumal na Jess. Xi xechinktsik kal na Jess, elantsik ti uknal ani ti tepinal kal na Mara.
41016011	Tam tin acha ke na Jess ejnek ti t ani ke na Mara in chum, yab in belatsik.
41016012	Tayl, chutat na Jess kal chb nin exbaliltsik tam ti neech ti bl, por Jaj in jalkuymal tinb.
41016013	Tam tin exlaichtsik abal jaich na Jess, witsiytsik xon ti kwajat xi ms an exbaltsik ani in tiltsi ke in chumaltsik na Jess, por nibal jajtsik yab beltsin.
41016014	Ms tayl, na Jess in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal xi lajujn an exbaltsik tam ti buxutsik ti kapul. Kwiyantsik tm kal na Jess abal yabtsik tajat u belom ani yabtsik tajat in exbayal, kom yab in belatsik xowa tiltsin kal xin chumaltsik ke na Jess ejnek ti t.
41016015	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kaletsik putlki tin publ an kayl ani ka tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab ejtal an atiklbtsik.
41016016	Xita kin bela ani ka pujan, neech ka loey; por xita yab kin bela, neech ka kale ban kibeltalb.
41016017	Ejtal xita kin beltsi an tin kwintal na Dios, neech kin ejto kin taja jech an exltsik: Kal tin awiltal nu bij neech kin ejto kin kldhantsi ti atax ejattalbtsik xita kwajat teykmte kl, neech ti kwtsik kal i t kwintalb
41016018	ani max yab kin chuu ani kin tyna i chan o max kin ucha jun i itlab, yab xata neech kin tamu. Neech jeye kin kwajbatsik nin kubak ban yaultsik ani neech ka jeley jachan an yaultsik.
41016019	Tayl, tam ti okonich ti tawnbtsik, jnjich tm walki an Ajtiklb ani buxkan tin ejt na Dios.
41016020	Tam ti kalch an abatwletsik, xechin putlki kin tila an alwa tilab ani tolmiyattsik kal an Ajtiklb kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb abal ka chobn ke tsubax xowa in tilltsik. Anchan ka tjan.
42001001	Yn i atiklbtsik in dhutsmal kal tin kwenta ejtal xowa in taja an Ajtiklb tech ba ni chablil.
42001002	Anchan tin dhutsmaltsik jelt xan tu tiltsink kal xi chlmadhtsik asta tam ti tujey jech xowa tmnk ani tolmixnktsik abal ka tilan jech an alwa tilab.
42001003	Pulek chalpadh Tefilo, nan u alimay neye kal yantam i kaymtalb ejtal xowa tmnk asta tam ti tujeyki ani u chalpayal abal in tomnl tu dhutsuntsi ejtal xowa in taja an Ajtiklb anchan xan ti tmun.
42001004	Tu dhutsuntsal jech abal ka exla alwa an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta xowa i oktsinkich.
42001005	Tam ti na Erodes u pulek takix ban chabl xi Judea, ta ti kwajat jun i ple xu bijyb ta Sakaras, jn ti b xu kidhtalb bin junkunlil na Abas. Nin tomtal in bij ta Elisabet ani jaj u kidhtalb kal an ple Arn.
42001006	Chablam ti b lujattsik tajat tin tamt na Dios, in tajltsik ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb ani xowa in ulal ka tajan an Okxlb.
42001007	Por yab in kool i chakamtsik kom na Elisabet yab u knal, tm jun pakdhaichtsik tajat.
42001008	Jun i kij, tam ti an pletsik xon tu taknal jeye na Sakaras in lujuy ka tjontsik abal kin tjontsi na Dios,
42001009	ubtintsik abal kin chobna xita neech kin lujuy ka ochich ti ikbax ban pulek at xon tu kaknb an Okxlb. Ubtintsik okox kom anchan tin ujnmaltsik in tajl ani na Sakaras, jaich in lujuy ka ochich.
42001010	Lejat an ikob kwajat ti tal, ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajat elb ti l.
42001011	Tmki jachan, na Sakaras in chuu jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb xi xalkan kubl tin ejt xon ti kwajat ti tal an ikob.
42001012	Tam ti na Sakaras in chuu an tokat abatwle, laban tajat ani jikey.
42001013	Por utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Sakaras, yab ki jikey, pos na Dios in achmalich na lbil ani na tomtal Elisabet neech kin koy jun i chakam xi neech ka bijiy ta Juan.
42001014	Tat neech tajat ki kijidhm ani yn neech ka kulb abal wachin jachan an chakam,
42001015	pos jachan na chakmil neech ka kwajay plek tin tamt na Dios. Yab neech kin ucha i yajtsik uxnl nibal i bk ani neech tajat ka kwajay teykmte kal an Tokat Ejattalb asta tam ka wachinki.
42001016	Neech kin taja ka witsiytsik ti t ban Okxlb nin Diosil, yn i atiklbtsik xu kidhtalb kal na Israel.
42001017	Jech na Juan neech ka okxin xon ti neech ka ulich an Ajtiklb ani neech kin koy nin ejattal ani an chplb jelti xin koy an tiltsix Elas. Neech kin taja ka pkwlntsxin an ttalbtsik kal nin chakmiltsik ani abal kin lujkchtsik jeye nin chalab xi yabtsik u tajax ti kij. Anchan, neech tm ka kwajch tojojodh an atiklbtsik abal kin bachu an Ajtiklb.
42001018	Na Sakaras in konoy ench an tokat abatwle: —Janti neech ku ejto ku chobna max tsubax jech? Pos nan in yejchelich ani nu tomtal plekich jeye tajat.
42001019	Tkoyat ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Nan u bij Gabriel ani u tjontsal a Dios, Jaj tin abmal tu tawna ani tu ltsi jech an ti alwa tilab.
42001020	Por xo, kom yab a bela xowa tu utsa, neech ki mb ani yab neech ka ejto ta kw asta ka wachin na chakmil. Jech neech ka tmun, tam kin bajaw an kij.
42001021	Lejat kwajat ti tmnal jech, an atiklbtsik kwajat elb in aytsal na Sakaras, u labnalichtsik abal owch tajat ani yab u kalel ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
42001022	Tam ti kale na Sakaras, yabich in ejtowal kin tawna an atiklbtsik, tawnaxin kal in kubakki abal mbdhats. An atiklbtsik in chobn tm abal na Sakaras in chumal jun i xalkantsixtalb ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
42001023	Tam ti kidhch an kij ti tjontsix, na Sakaras kale tin kim.
42001024	Ms tayl, nin tomtal Elisabet jilkon kodh ani b a ch yab kale tin kim. Jaj in ulal ench tin itsch:
42001025	“An Okxlb tin tajtsm jech abal yabich ti kin tidhebdha an atiklbtsik.”
42001026	Tam tin akaklbich a ch ti kwajat kodh na Elisabet, aban kal na Dios an tokat abatwle Gabriel ba jun i bitsow xi kwajat Galilea xu bijyb Nasaret
42001027	abal kin chabiy jun i tsidhan xin bij ta Mara. Jech an tsidhan, kwajatich konodh abal ka tomikn kal jun i inik xin bij Jos. Jech an inik u kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
42001028	An tokat abatwle ochich xon ti kwajat na Mara ani in ulu ench: —Mara, tu chapndhl, xi kanidhb tajat kal an Okxlb! An Okxlb kwajat kal tat ani ti lbtajmal ms k xi keet an mmlbtsik.
42001029	Por tam ti na Mara in chuu an tokat abatwle, laban tajat kal xowa in acha utsan ani u chalpax xantki ti chapndh anchan.
42001030	Utsan tm ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Mara, yab ki jikey, pos i chutat kal na Dios ke alwa ka bachu nin alwatal.
42001031	Xo neech ki jilkon kodh, neech ka wachiy jun i chakam kwitl ani neech ka bijiy ta Jess.
42001032	Jaj neech ka kwajay ultalb tajat, neech ka bijyat tin Chakmil a Dios xi plek tajat ani neech ka kwajb kal na Dios ti Pulek Takix jelti nin weje paklil Dabid,
42001033	neech kin takiy malill i kij nin kidhtaltsik na Israel ani nin takixtal yab jayki neech kin koy in okontal.
42001034	Na Mara in konoy ench an tokat abatwle: —Jantich tm ti neech ku koy i chakam ani nan yab jayki in junkunk kal ni jun i inik?
42001035	Tkoyat ench kal an tokat abatwle: —An Tokat Ejattalb neech ka ulich ba tat ani na Dios xi plek tajat, neech ti ki paxkiy kal nin chp jelt xan tu paxkix jun i chalam. Jaxtm, an chakam kwitl xi neech ka koy tokat Ja tajat ani neech ka bijyat tin Chakmil a Dios.
42001036	Na exlowl Elisabet, maske plekich tajat, neech jeye kin wachiy jun i chakam kwitl. Xu usnal ke yab u knal, xo in koolich akak a ch ti kwajat kodh.
42001037	Abal na Dios yab waach ni jun xata xi yab neech kin ejto kin taja.
42001038	In ulu tm ench na Mara: —Nan tin jolbal an Okxlb, ke Jaj kin taja kal nan jelt xan tin utsl. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, an tokat abatwle kalch tm.
42001039	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Mara kale jikatki ba jun i bitsow xi kwajat ban chnlom xi Judea.
42001040	Tam ti ulich ba jachan an bitsow, ochich bin kim na Sakaras ani in chapndha na Elisabet.
42001041	Tam ti na Elisabet in acha nin chapndhaxtal na Mara, an chakam xi kwajat in kitkm, yoyon ani na Elisabet in bachu nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
42001042	Ani kawidh tajat tin ulu ench: —Na Dios ti lbtajmal ms k xi ejtal an mmlbtsik ani in lbtajmal an chakam xa kitkm.
42001043	Jita u y nan abal ka tsch ti kin lna nin nna nu Ajtik?
42001044	Pos tam tu achpiyki na chapndhomtal, an chakam xi kwajat u kitkm, yoyon kal i kulbxnich.
42001045	Kijidh tajat abal a bela xowa i utsan, pos neech ka tjan jelt xan ti utsmal an Okxlb.
42001046	In ulu tm ench na Mara: Nan u kaknl an Okxlb
42001047	ani nu ejattal u kijidhml kal na Dios nu Loxil.
42001048	Abal na Dios in chuu ke nan jaich jun in chojontl jolbal ani xo, ejtal an atiklbtsik xi neech ka wachin tech ti kayl, neech kin ulutsik ke nan in lbtajadh.
42001049	Pos na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, tin tajtsmal yn xowa pakdha. Jaj, tokat Ja tajat.
42001050	Na Dios echeki neech kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ejtal xita kl tu kaknb.
42001051	Yn xata pakdha in tajmal kal nin chp; in pakwtsmal tin chalab xin tekltsik tinb abal yab kin ejto kin taja xowa in chalpaymal.
42001052	In wkontsmal tin awiltal an pakdha takix ani in tekbmal xi yabtsik in tekl tinb.
42001053	Xu kaltsik, in pidhmal kin koy xowakich xi alwa ani xi tumnladhtsik, in ajmal ka kale mapats kubak.
42001054	In tolmiymal nin tjontsixil, xi jaich an israelitatsik ani yab in uktsmal kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb;
42001055	anchan tin utsmal ni weje paklil Abraham ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik abal malill i kij.
42001056	Na Mara kwajay taja kal na Elisabet x a ch xna ani ms tayl witsch tm jun tin kim.
42001057	Tam tin bajch an kij xowki na Elisabet ti neech kin wachiy an chakam, in wachiy jun i chakam kwitl.
42001058	Nin at kimdhtsik ani nin jabtsik, kulb tajat tam tin achatsik ke na Elisabet kontsidh tajat ti yajnantsixtalb kal an Okxlb.
42001059	Tam tin kidhbay waxik a kts ti wachink an chakam, in jnatsik abal ka kwajbantsat ti exl bin tul jelt xan ti usnk kin taja na Abraham. U lenbwiik ka bijyat ta Sakaras jelti nin tta,
42001060	por nin nna in ulu ench: —Yaba. Kool ka bijyat ta Juan.
42001061	Tkoyat tm ench: —Jantki? Yab waach ni jun xita a kidhtal xi anchan in bij.
42001062	Konyat tm kal i kubaklekki nin tta an chakam abal ka chobn xowa bijlb in l kin chuu ka kwajbantsat nin chakmil.
42001063	Nin tta an chakam, in konoy jun i okcha ani in dhutsa taja ench: “Jaj neech ka bijyat ta Juan.” Ani ejtaltsik laban.
42001064	Tmki jachan, in ejtch tm jun ti kw na Sakaras ani tujey kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
42001065	Ejtal nin at kimdhtsik laban tam tin chuu jech ani putlki ba jachan an chenadh chabl xi Judea, u tilnal xowa tmnk.
42001066	Ejtal xin achltsik jech u chalpaxtsik ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Janty awil neech kin taja jachan an chakam kwitl tam ka pubey? Pos jech an chakam kwitl, tsubax lejtal ti teykmte kal in chp an Okxlb.
42001067	Na Sakaras, nin tta an chakam, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, ijtsin kin ulu ench:
42001068	Ki kakna an Okxlb, nin Diosil na Israel, abal tsinek tech ba nin bitswil abal ti ku loo.
42001069	Tu pidhámal jun i pulek Loßóxil, xi tál bin kidhtal na Dabid, nin tœójontsixil.
42001070	Anchan tin ulmal kal nin tokat tiltsxiltsik asta ti weje.
42001071	In ulmal ke neech ti ku loo kal xi tu pjeyal ani kal xi tu atl,
42001072	ke neech kin yajnantsi ni weje pakliltsik ani ke yab neech kin uktsi nin tokat lejkintalbil.
42001073	Jech jaich xowa na Dios in lej tsubax utsmal ni weje paklil Abraham:
42001074	ke neech ti ku loo kal xi tu pjeyaltsik abal ki tjontsch kal ni jun i jkib
42001075	ani ku kwajay lujat ani tokat tin tamt Jaj, tsudhey ka tsudhey putl i kij asta xon talat tu ejat.
42001076	Ani tat teye, chakam, neech ki bijyat tin tiltsxil a Dios xi plek tajat, pos neech ki okxin ka tojojontsi tin blil an Ajtiklb
42001077	abal kin pidha kin chobna nin bitswil ke nin walastalbiltsik neech ka pakwlantsat ani anchan neech kin bachchtsik an loeltalb.
42001078	Kom tu kanidhl ani tu yajnantsal ni Diosil, neech ti ku abtsi jun xita xi t walki abal ti ku tolmiy. Jaj in junwal jelt in tajx jun i t kij xin wkoyal i jikwaxtalb.
42001079	Jaj neech kin tajbay xi xeechtsik ban jikwaxtalb, xi neechtsikwiik ban kibeltalb tam ka chemech ani neech ti ku tajbantsi ku beley ban bl xi kijidh.
42001080	An chakam kwitl u pubel ani nin ejattal ms u chapnibl, kwajay ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh asta tam tin bajaw an kij kin pidhna tinb ka exl kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel.
42002001	Tam ti jachan i kij, an lej pulek takix xu bijyb ta Awgusto in ulu abal ka ajyat putlki ejtal an atiklbtsik.
42002002	Jech an jidhtal ajumtalb, tajan tam ti na Sirenio kwajat ti pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Siria.
42002003	Ejtaltsik kool ka witsiy bin bitswil abal ka jin taja.
42002004	Jaxtm, na Jos kale Nasaret, an bitsow xi kwajat Galilea ani kale ban chabl xi Judea ban bitsow xu bijyb Beln xon tu chakam an pulek takix Dabid, kom na Jos u kidhtalb kal na Dabid.
42002005	Kale Beln abal ka jin taja junax kal na Mara, xi konodhich tin kool abal ka tomkin kl ani kwajatich kodh.
42002006	Lejat kwajattsik Beln, in bajaw xowki na Mara ti neech kin wachiy an chakam.
42002007	Taja tin wachiy nin jidhtal chakmil, in dhantsiy, in boliy kal i kudhkum ani in kwachba xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik, pos yab in elatsik ejtidh xon ti ka koych ba jachan an at xon tu koynb.
42002008	Kunat Beln, ta ti kwajat chb x i belkol konltsik xin beletnl nin kowltsik tam akal.
42002009	Jun jiktowle tin chuutsik jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb, nin labidh tokt an Okxlb tajkan malill xon ti kwajattsik ani jikeytsik tajat.
42002010	Por utsantsik ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Yab ki jikeytsik, pos tu tsidhantsaltsik jun i alwa tilab ani yn neech ka kulb kal jech tin kwenta:
42002011	ke xo wachinich ti chakam bin bitswil na Dabid jun i Loox abal tattsik, jaich na Kristo an Ajtiklb.
42002012	Ti exl, neech ka elatsik an chakam dhantsidh, bolilidh kal i kudhkum ani kwachat xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik.
42002013	Tmki jachan, xalkan tin wl an tokat abatwle yn i tokat abatwletsik xi tl walki, in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij na Dios ani in ulaltsik ench:
42002014	Kin koy an labidh tokattalb na Dios t walki ani ban chabl, kin koy an kijidhtalb an iniktsik xu kanidhbtsik kal na Dios!
42002015	Tam ti an tokat abatwletsik kadhchtsik jun walki, an belkol konltsik tujey ti tsx jn ani jn ench: —Pos wana p asta Beln abal ki chuu jech xowa tmnk, xi tu ltsch an Okxlb.
42002016	Kaletsik jikat ani in ela na Mara ani na Jos ani an chakam xi ta ti kwachat xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik.
42002017	Tam tin chuutsik, in tilatsik xanty usnktsik kal an tokat abatwle kal tin kwenta jech an chakam.
42002018	Ejtal xi kl ti achan xowa in ulutsik, labantsik kal xowa in acha.
42002019	Por na Mara in chalpm tokot tin itsch ejtal jech.
42002020	Ms tayl, an belkol konltsik kalchtsik tm, por in pubdhantsal ani in kaknantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa in achatsik ani in chuutsik, abal anchan ti tmnk jelt xan ti usnktsik.
42002021	Tam ti kidhey waxik a kts ti wachink an chakam, tajtsin ti exl bin tul jelt xan ti usnk na Abraham ani bijyat ta Jess. Jachan an bijlb, jaich xi usnk na Mara kal an tokat abatwle tam ti jaj yabl kodh.
42002022	Tam ti kidhey an kij xowki jajtsik yejat kin toko tinb jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in jnatsik an chakam ban bitsow Jerusaln abal kin utu ban Okxlb.
42002023	In tajatsik anchan kom bin takixtal an Okxlb kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Ejtal an tsitsik kwitl xi jidhtal ka wachin ti chakam, yejat ka pidhn abal an Okxlb.”
42002024	Kalnektsik jeye abal kin pikba chb i bk o chb i tsitsik kuku jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Okxlb.
42002025	Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat Jerusaln jun i inik xu bijyb Simen. Jaj jaich jun i lujat inik xin kaknl na Dios ani in aytsm jeye ka lowat an israelitatsik. Jaj teykmte tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb
42002026	ani usnk kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal yab neech ka chemech max yab kin chuu okox an Kristo xi neech ka aban kal an Okxlb.
42002027	Jech na Simen kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Tam ti na Jess jn kal nin ttatsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal ka tajtsin xan tin ulal an takixtalb ke yejat ka tajtsin,
42002028	na Simen in mulukna an chakam ani in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ench:
42002029	Okxlb, awilich ti kin walka kin chemech tsububudh u itsch abal a tajaich jelt xan ta utsmal na tjontsixil.
42002030	Pos xo u chuch kal nan tajat u wal an Loox
42002031	xa kwajbmal tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik.
42002032	Jaj jaich jelti an tajaxtalb xi neech kin tajbay ejtalki an bitsowtsik xi yab u israelitatsik ani neech kin pidha ti labidh tokattalb an israelitatsik.
42002033	Nin tta ani nin nna na Jess labantsik kal xowa in achl in ulal na Simen kal tin kwenta an chakam.
42002034	Lbtajantsik kal na Simen ani utsan ench na Mara nin nna na Jess: —Ka acha, jech an chakam kwajb abal kin taja ke yn i israelitatsik ka kale ban kibeltalb o ka loeytsik. Jaj jaich jun i exl xi neech ka pojk kal yn xita.
42002035	Anchan neech ka chobn xowa in chalpayal jun xita tin itsch. Por abal tat, ejtal jech neech kin junu jelti max exom ta tidhbantsb ta ejattal kal jun i macht.
42002036	T jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb plekich tajat xu tiltsix jeye, jaj in bij ta Ana ani u chakmlb kal na Fanuel, xu kidhtalb kal na Aser. Jech an mmlb, tsidhan tajat ti tomkink ani tokot bk i tamub kwajay kal nin tomkl.
42002037	Jaj jaich xo jun i chemtsidh mmlb xin koolich che inik kal ch i tamub ti kwetm. Echeki kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, akal i kij in tjontsal an Okxlb kal i klixnich ani kal i lb.
42002038	Na Ana ulich jeye tmki jachan, in tuju kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta jachan an chakam xu bijyb ta Jess. Jachan an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Jerusaln, jaich xin aytsm ka lowat abal yabich ms ka kyattsik taknl kal i keet bitsow.
42002039	Tam ti na Jos ani na Mara in tajaichtsik ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal an Okxlb, witsiytsik Nasaret, an bitsow xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea.
42002040	Tsudhl u tajkanal an chakam u pubel, u likel ani ms u chalpadhml. Ani echeki in bachwal nin alwatal na Dios.
42002041	Tamub ti tamub nin ttatsik na Jess u kalel Jerusaln abal kin ajbna an paskwa, an ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik.
42002042	Tam ti na Jess in kidhbay lajuchb i tamub, kaletsik ejtal ti b Jerusaln, jelt xan tin ujnmalichtsik in tajl tam kin bajaw an ajib.
42002043	Tam ti okonich an ajib, kaletsik tm abal ka witsch tin kim, por na Jess jilkonk Jerusaln ani nin ttatsik yab in chob max Jaj jilkonk taja.
42002044	Jajtsik in chalpay ke na Jess ta jeye ti tl bin yanl an atiklbtsik ani anchan ti beleytsik putl a kts; por tam ti alyat na Jess bin kidhtaltsik ani bin exlowltsik, yab elan.
42002045	Kom yab elan, witsiytsik tm Jerusaln nin ttatsik abal kin aliy taja.
42002046	Xechintsik kin aliy ani tin xlb a kts in ela ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Taja ti buxl junax kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. In ochwiyal xanty in tilltsik ani in konyal ka wiltsin xowa Jaj in l kin exbay.
42002047	Ejtaltsik xin achl u labnal abal in chutal chalpadh tajat na Jess ani abal in tkoyal jeye alwa xowa u konyb kal jajtsik.
42002048	Tam ti chutat kal nin ttatsik, labantsik ani utsan ench kal nin nna: —Chakam, jantki tu tajtsmal anchan? Na tta ani nan neye u kwajinekich tajat tu lim ani tu chalpax abal i kibchonk.
42002049	Tkoyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin ayaltsik? Yabxe a chobtsik ke yejat kin kwajay tech abal ku taja xowa in jilm ka tajan nu Tta?
42002050	Por nin ttatsik yab in exbay xantki ti tkoyattsik anchan.
42002051	Junaxich tm ti witsiy ban bitsow Nasaret. Taja ti kwajay ani in tajl ejtal xowa u usnal kal jajtsik. Ani nin nna echeki in chalpm tin itsch ejtal xowa tmun.
42002052	Na Jess neech u pubel ani ms u chalpadhml, in tajl ejtal xowa alwa tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
42003001	Tam ti lajubich i tamub ti takix an lej pulek takix Tiberio, na Ponsio Pilato u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Judea. Na Erodes u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Galilea, nin kidhb xin bij ta Felipe, u takix ban chabl xi Iturea ani xi Trakonite. Na Lisanias, u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Abilinia.
42003002	Na Ans ani na Kayfs, jaich nu oklek pletsik. Tam ti jachan i kij, na Dios in tawna na Juan ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Jech na Juan, jaich xu chakmlb kal na Sakaras,
42003003	watey putlki an kwentsaltsik xi kunat ban walja Jordn, in utsl an atiklbtsik ke yejatich kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ka pujanichtsik abal ka pakwlantsat an tin walastalbiltsik.
42003004	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsix Isaas ench: Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: “Ka tojojontschtsik tin blil an Ajtiklb; ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.
42003005	An chabl xi jokitsik neech ka tsutsiyat, ejtal an pakdha chn ani an tsitsik chn neech ka lujkuwat, an bl xi kuchutsik neech ka lujkuwat ani an bl xi jkmx neech ka lejkiyat.
42003006	Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl ti neech ka chutat an loeltalb xin pidhnl na Dios.”
42003007	Tam ti an atiklbtsik u ulel abal ka pujyat kal na Juan, u usnaltsik ench kal na Juan: —Tattsik a junwal jelti chan! Abal a ltsik ka jeka kal i pujaxtalb nin chkub na Dios xi exomich ti kunel.
42003008	Ki kwajchtsik alwa abal ka xalkan ke tsubax lejtal ta jilaichtsik ta walablom ani yab ka chalpaytsik ta ejattal ke neech ki loeytsik abalki i kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham; pos tu utsltsik ke na Dios neech kin ejto kin kldha in chakmiltsik a Abraham asta ba jech an tujubtsik.
42003009	Anchan jelt xan ti jun i inik in kwajll ani in tsikl jun i te xi yab xata ti alwa, anchan jeye ti neech kin taja na Dios kunat i kij kal an iniktsik xi yab alwa.
42003010	Konyat tm ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Janty yejat ki taja?
42003011	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Xita in kool chb in xekt, yejat kin pidha jn xi yab in kool ani xita in kool i kapnl, yejat jeye kin pidha xi yab in kool.
42003012	Ulich jeye chb x i bachkul jalbixtalb xin l ka pujyattsik ani konyat ench na Juan kal jajtsik: —Oktsix, janty yejat ki taja?
42003013	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Yab ka konoy watats an jalbixtalb, tokotki xowa in ulal an awiltalbtsik.
42003014	Konyat jeye kal chb x i soldadotsik ench: —Ani waw, janty yejat ki taja? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Yab ka kntsitsik xata ni jun xita, nibal ka ani lna ni jun xita xi yab in walm ani ki kulbtsik kal xowa a tl.
42003015	Ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajat in aytsm an Kristo xi bijidh neech ka tsch ani in chalpayaltsik max na Juan jachich an Kristo;
42003016	por utsantsik ejtal ench kal na Juan: —Nan tu pujyaltsik kal i ja, por ta tl jun xita xi ms in kool i awiltalb k nan; nan nibal ela xata u y abal ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab. Jaj neech ti ki pujaytsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal i kamal.
42003017	In teykm an pala abal kin jutsuy an trigo ani abal kin wixkintsch an ti aml. Neech kin junku an trigo bin wiltil, por an aml neech kin tsika ban kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
42003018	Ench ani yn ms xan ti, na Juan in takyal ani in tiltsal an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik.
42003019	In kwiya jeye an pulek awiltalb Erodes abal in tajmal tin tomtal na Erodas, nin tomtal nin kidhb Felipe ani kal tin kwenta jeye xowa yab alwa in tajmal.
42003020	Por na Erodes yab in taja ti kij xowa utsan kal an Juan, ms tokot in ntsi kin taja xowa yab alwa: in baliy na Juan ban wikaxte.
42003021	Jun i kij, tam ti na Juan bl kwajat ti pjal an ti atiklbtsik, pujyat jeye na Jess. Lejat na Jess kwajat ti l, jakpin an walki,
42003022	paay an Tokat Ejattalb ani buxkan tin b Jaj. Tejwa tajat ti paay jelti jun i kuku ani achatm jun i kwintalb t walki, xu kw in ulu ench: —Tat tu Chakmil ani tu kanidhl tajat. In kulbl tajat kal Tat.
42003023	In kool xna jun inik lju i tamub tam ti na Jess in tuju nin tojlbil. An atiklbtsik in chalpayal ke na Jess u chakmlb kal na Jos. Na Jos u chakmlb kal na El,
42003024	na El u chakmlb kal na Matat, na Matat u chakmlb kal na Leb, na Leb u chakmlb kal na Melki, na Melki u chakmlb kal na Jana, na Jana u chakmlb kal na Jos,
42003025	na Jos u chakmlb kal na Matatas, na Matatas u chakmlb kal na Ams, na Ams u chakmlb kal na Nam, na Nam u chakmlb kal na Esli, na Esli, u chakmlb kal na Nagai,
42003026	na Nagai u chakmlb kal na Mt, na Mt u chakmlb kal na Matatas, na Matatas u chakmlb kal na Semei, na Semei u chakmlb kal na Jos, na Jos u chakmlb kal na Jud,
42003027	na Jud u chakmlb kal na Joana, na Joana u chakmlb kal na Resa, na Resa u chakmlb kal na Sorobabel, na Sorobabel u chakmlb kal na Salatiel, na Salatiel u chakmlb kal na Neri,
42003028	na Neri u chakmlb kal na Melki, na Melki u chakmlb kal na Adi, na Adi u chakmlb kal na Kosam, na Kosam u chakmlb kal na Elmodam, na Elmodam u chakmlb kal na Er,
42003029	na Er u chakmlb kal na Josu, na Josu u chakmlb kal na Elieser, na Elieser u chakmlb kal na Jorim, na Jorim u chakmlb kal na Matat,
42003030	na Matat u chakmlb kal na Leb, na Leb u chakmlb kal na Simen, na Simen u chakmlb kal na Jud, na Jud u chakmlb kal na Jos, na Jos u chakmlb kal na Jonn, na Jonn u chakmlb kal na Eliakim,
42003031	na Eliakim u chakmlb kal na Melea, na Melea u chakmlb kal na Mainn, na Mainn u chakmlb kal na Matata, na Matata u chakmlb kal na Natn,
42003032	na Natn u chakmlb kal na Dabid, na Dabid u chakmlb kal na Isa, na Isa u chakmlb kal na Obed, na Obed u chakmlb kal na Bs, na Bs u chakmlb kal na Salmn, na Salmn u chakmlb kal na Nsn,
42003033	na Nsn u chakmlb kal na Aminadab, na Aminadab u chakmlb kal na Aram, na Aram u chakmlb kal na Esrom, na Esrom u chakmlb kal na Fares, na Fares u chakmlb kal na Jud,
42003034	na Jud u chakmlb kal na Jakob, na Jakob u chakmlb kal na Isk, na Isk u chakmlb kal na Abraham, na Abraham u chakmlb kal na Tar, na Tar u chakmlb kal na Nakor,
42003035	na Nakor u chakmlb kal na Serug, na Serug u chakmlb kal na Ragaw, na Ragaw u chakmlb kal na Peleg, na Peleg u chakmlb kal na Eber, na Eber u chakmlb kal na Sala,
42003036	na Sala u chakmlb kal na Kainn, na Kainn u chakmlb kal na Arfaksad, na Arfaksad u chakmlb kal na Sem, na Sem u chakmlb kal na No, na No u chakmlb kal na Lamek,
42003037	na Lamek u chakmlb kal na Matusaln, na Matusaln u chakmlb kal na Enok, na Enok u chakmlb kal na Jared, na Jared u chakmlb kal na Mlall, na Mlall u chakmlb kal na Kainn,
42003038	na Kainn u chakmlb kal na Ens, na Ens u chakmlb kal na Set, na Set u chakmlb kal na Adn ani na Adn tajadh kal na Dios.
42004001	Na Jess, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, kale ban walja Jordn ani jn kal an Tokat Ejattalb ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
42004002	Kwajay taja chab inik a kts ani taktamiyat kal an lej atax. Yab kapch tin nakl jachan an kij ani tayl kaay.
42004003	Utsan tm ench kal an lej atax: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka utsa jech an tujub ka wenkon ti kapnl.
42004004	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab tokotki kal i kapnl ti ejat an inik, ejat jeye kal ejtal xowa na Dios in ulal.”
42004005	Jn tm kal an lej atax ba jun i tekat chn ani xalkantsat junwki ejtal an ti chabltsik xi kwajat taknl kal an pakdha takix.
42004006	Ani utsan ench kal an lej atax: —Neech tu pidha ti awiltalb ka takiy ejtal jech an chabltsik ani abal ka dhabalna jeye nin publ. Pos ejtal jech, nan in pidhnk ani neech ku ejto ku pidha xita ku lena.
42004007	Max ki tudhlan abal ti kin kakna, ejtal jech Tat neech ka dhabalna.
42004008	Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Lej atax, ki wkon tech tu tamt, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil ani Jajki ka tjontsal.”
42004009	Tayl, jna na Jess kal an lej atax ban bitsow xi Jerusaln, kadhb bin b an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani utsan ench: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka petna tab abal chaat,
42004010	pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Na Dios neech kin aba nin tokat abatwlejiltsik abal ti ki beletna.
42004011	Neech ti ki bachu abal yab ka chaaw na akan kal ni jun i tujub.
42004012	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —In ulal jeye ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “Yab ka taktamiy an Okxlb na Diosil.”
42004013	Tam ti an lej atax yabich ms in ela xan ti kin taktamiy na Jess, in jilaich tm w i kij.
42004014	Na Jess witsiy Galilea teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u tilnal Jaj putlki ban chabl xi taja kunat.
42004015	U kwajl ti oktsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kal ejtalki tu kaknb.
42004016	Kale tm Nasaret na Jess, an bitsow xon ti Jaj pubenek. Tam tin bajaw nin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochich ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl echeki ani kubey abal kin ajay an Tokat Dhuslab.
42004017	Pidhan tm kin ajay an dhutsadh w xin jilm an tiltsix Isaas, tam tin wila, in ela xon ti kwajat dhutsadh ench:
42004018	Nin Tokat Ejattal an Okxlb kwajat kal Nan, pos tin takwymal abal ku ltsi an ti alwa tilab an chojontltsik, tin abmal abal ku kijidhmdha xu tepinaltsik, abal ku tiltsi xi kwajat ti wiknltsik, ke walkanichtsik, abal ku chuxindha xu jokoltsik, abal ku loo xu atax tajtsinaltsik
42004019	ani abal ku tila ke in bajch xowki an Okxlb neech ti ku xalkantsi an tin alwatal.
42004020	Tam ti okon kin ajay, in tuliy an w, in witsbantsi xu tolmix ba jachan an at ani buxkan, por in ntsal ti telnal kal ejtal xi taja ti kwajattsik.
42004021	In tuju tm ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Xo exomich ti tjnal ta tamttsik jelt xan tin ulal jech an Tokat Dhuslab.
42004022	Kal ejtaltsik tu tilnal alwa na Jess ani u labnaltsik kal an labidh tilabtsik xi Jaj in ulal. U knxtsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech nin chakmil na Jos?
42004023	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan u chob alwa ke neech ti kin utsatsik jech an tilab: “Illix, ka illiy tab.” Neech jeye ti kin utsatsik: “Xowa i achmal a tajm t Kapernam, ka taja jeye tech ba chablil.”
42004024	In ntsi tm ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke ni jun i tiltsix u bachwb alwa bin chablil.
42004025	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yn i chemtsidh mmlb ta ti kwajat ban chabl xi Israel tam ti xechin an tiltsix Elas. Tam ti yab ulich i b x i tamub kal chejel ani wachin i pulek kanab tin publ jachan an chabl;
42004026	por na Elas yab aban kal na Dios ba ni jun i chemtsidh mmlbtsik xu kwajl Israel, tokot aban ba jun i chemtsidh mmlb xu kwajl Sarepta, kunat ban bitsow xi Sidn.
42004027	Anl jeye, yn ta ti kwajat Israel xu yaultsik kal an kwajat atax tt tam ti xechin an tiltsix Eliseo, por yab jeldh ni jun xita xi jajtsik, tokot jeldh na Nmn xu kwajl ban chabl xi Siria.
42004028	Tam tin achatsik ejtal jech, ejtaltsik xi ta ti kwajat ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb chakuytsik tajat.
42004029	Chakaytsik ani in kldha na Jess ba jachan an bitsow ani jn tm bin b an chn xon ti kwajat jachan an bitsow abal ka nixk taja.
42004030	Por na Jess watey junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani kale.
42004031	Kale tm na Jess Kapernam, jun i bitsow xu taknal Galilea ani taja ti kwajay in oktsal an atiklbtsik tam in bajwal in ktsjil an koyxnich.
42004032	Ejtal u labnaltsik tajat xan tu oktsinaltsik, abal in chutaltsik ke na Jess u kw kal yantam i awiltalb.
42004033	Ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xi ochadh kal jun i atax ejattalb ani dhjaxin kawidh ench:
42004034	—Ti ku jila! Janty a l kal waw, Jess xi Nasaret? I tsinek abal ti ku kibdha? Nan tu exll ani u chob ke Tat i Tokat Chakmlb kal a Dios.
42004035	Kwiyan tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Ki chamkan ani ki kale ba jech an inik! Kwajl tm chabl an inik kal an atax ejattalb tin tamt ejtal jajtsik, kale ani yab xata ti tajtsin jachan an inik.
42004036	Ejtal jikey ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom kwintalb awil jech? Jech an inik in utsl an atax ejattalbtsik kal yantam i awiltalb ani i chplb abal ka kale ani u kalel!
42004037	Putlki jachan an chabl ti chobn xowa in tajl na Jess.
42004038	Kale tm na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kale bin kim na Simn. Nin mm na Simn ta ti kwajat u yaul kal i kaklch ani pakabdh na Jess abal kin jeldha.
42004039	Kutpan tm na Jess xon ti kwajat an yaul, in utsa an kaklch abal ka wkon ani tmki ti wkon. Chakay tm an mmlb ani tujey ti tjontsb kal an mmlb na Jess ani nin juniktsik.
42004040	Tam ti ochichich na kts, ejtal xin kool i yaultsik xu yaul kal xowakich i yawlch, in tsidha ba na Jess. Jaj juntsik ti juntsik tin puntsi tin kubak an yaultsik ani anchan tin jeldhatsik.
42004041	Anl jeye, yn i yaultsik in kldhantsi ti atax ejattalbtsik; tam u kalel, u dhajnaltsik chapik ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios. Por na Jess in kwiya an atax ejattalbtsik ani yab ms in walka ti tilomtsik, abal chobte kal an atax ejattalbtsik ke Jajich nu Kristo.
42004042	Tam ti tsudhey, na Jess kale ban bitsow ani kale ba jun i chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Por alyat kal an atiklbtsik ani ulichtsik asta xon ti Jaj kwajat. U lenb ka kubdh abal yab ka kale,
42004043	por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Kool jeye kin kale ku tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba keet an bitsowtsik abal ka takyatichtsik kal na Dios, pos jaich tin abnk.
42004044	Anchan ti xechin na Jess ti tiltsix Galilea, putlki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
42005001	Jun i kij, tam ti na Jess kwajat bin wl an pujal xi Jenesaret, ulich yn i atiklbtsik, ke asta u kichnalich tajat na Jess, abal in ltsik kin acha nin kwintal na Dios.
42005002	Na Jess in chuu chb i tan xi ta ti kwajat mapats tin wl an pujal xon ti yab owtsik. Taja ti kwajat kom an jixom tooltsik painek ti tokom an tin jixb an tool.
42005003	Na Jess balin tm ba jn an tan xin dhabal na Simn ani pakabdh na Simn abal kin wmdha w an tan bin wl an ja. Buxkan tm na Jess ban tan ani tujey kin oktsi taja an atiklbtsik.
42005004	Tam ti okon ti kw, in utsa ench na Simn: —Ka jna an tan xon ti owtsik an pujal ani ka petna taja nin jixb an tool abal ka jixa an tool.
42005005	Tkon na Simn: —Oktsix, u tjnkich putl i akal ani yab xata i jixmal, por kom Tat a ulal, neech ku petna jun an jixaxtalb.
42005006	Tam tin tajatsik xowa utsan, yn i tool ykwan, ke asta u michkanalich an jixaxtalb kal in lm an tooltsik.
42005007	In kaniy tm kal in kubakki nin at jixom tool xi ta ti kwajattsik jun pake tan abal ka tsch ti tolmiyb. Utey tm xi jn an tan ani in tsutsiytsik chablam ke asta wetsikich ka luychin ban pujal kal in lm.
42005008	Tam ti na Simn Pedro in chuu jech, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, ki wixkin tech kal nan, pos nan in walablom!
42005009	Anchan tin ulu na Simn, kom jaj ani xi ms nin at jixom tool jikenektsik tajat abal yn i tool in jixatsik.
42005010	Anl jeye, na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo, xi jaych nin juniktsik na Simn, jikenektsik jeye. Por na Jess in utsa ench na Simn: —Yab ki jikey, pos asta xo neech ka tujch ka aliy an atiklbtsik xi neech ti kin bela.
42005011	Tam tin jnaichtsik an tan bin wl an pujal, in jilatsik ejtal ani kaletsik kal na Jess.
42005012	Tam ti na Jess kwajat ba jun i bitsow, ulich jun i inik xu yaul kal an kwajat atax tt. Tam ti chutat na Jess, an inik, tudhlan kutl asta chabl ani pakabdh ench na Jess: —Ajtik, max a l, neech ka ejto ti kin jeldha kal jech an yawlch xu kool.
42005013	Takan tm kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —U l ani xo i jelch. Tmki ti wkon an kwajat atax tt ba jachan an inik.
42005014	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka ltsi xanty tu tajtsi, tokot ki kale ban ple ani ka pidhna an pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta na tokeltal jelt xan tin jilm ka tajan na Moiss. Ka taja anchan abal ejtal kin chobna ke i jelch kal an yawlch xa koolwiik.
42005015	Por blki u chobnb putlki xanty in tajl na Jess. Yandha i atiklbtsik u junkunal abal ka axtsin xowa in ulal ani abal ka jeldhtsik kal an yawlch xin kool.
42005016	Por na Jess u kalel xon ti yab xita u kwajl ani taja u kwajl ti l.
42005017	Jun i kij, na Jess kwajat ti oktsix ani ta ti buxutsik taja chb x i fariseotsik ani i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jechtsik, tl tki tki ban kwentsaltsik xi Galilea, xi Judea ani xi tltsik jeye ban bitsow Jerusaln. Ani nin chp an Okxlb u xalkanal ba na Jess abal kin jeldha an yaultsik.
42005018	Ulich tm chb x i iniktsik xin tsidhl kal i chayte jun i inik. Jech an inik yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani in exatsik kin dha ban at xon ti kwajat na Jess.
42005019	Por yab in elatsik xon ti kin dha, kom yn ta ti kwajat an atiklbtsik; kadhiytsik tm bin b an at, in wkontsi w tin jujl ani taja tin paba an yaul kal nin chaytil junax chejel an atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess.
42005020	Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal u belnal kal jajtsik, in utsa ench an yaul: —Jab, na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat.
42005021	An fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tujutsik tm kin chalpay ench: —Jitam j p jeye jech an inik xin tajl tinb jelti max u Dios? Tokot a Dios in ejtowal kin pakwlantsi an walastalbtsik.
42005022	Por na Jess in chobna xanty kwajat in chalpayaltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta chalpayaltsik anchan?
42005023	Jowa ms yab tojlb ku ulu: “Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat”, o ku ulu: “Ki chakay ani ki beley”?
42005024	Pos neech tu xalkantsitsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb tech ti chabl abal ku pakwlantsi i walastalbtsik. In utsa tm ench an yaul xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon: —Tat tu utsl, ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki kalch ta kim.
42005025	Tmki jachan, an inik xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon, chakay tin tamt ejtal xi taja ti kwajattsik. In dhaya nin chaytil xon ti kwachatwiik ani kalch tm tin kim in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios.
42005026	Ejtal labantsik, in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios ani kal an jkib in ulutsik ench: —Xo i chuu yn xata xi labidh tajat.
42005027	Tayl, tam ti na Jess kalch, in chuu jun i inik xin bij ta Leb xin bachwal an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma. Jech an inik buxl xon tu ulel ti pidhnb an jalbixtalb ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan.
42005028	Chakay tm na Leb, in jila ejtal ani in wwna na Jess.
42005029	Ms tayl, na Leb in tajtsi na Jess jun i pulek kapxnich tin kim; ta jeye ti buxutsik junax kal jajtsik ban mesa yn i bachkul jalbixtalb ani keet jeye i atiklbtsik.
42005030	Por an fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tujutsik kin kawiy nin exbaliltsik na Jess. Ench tin ulutsik: —Jantki ta kapultsik ani i uchaltsik kal i bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal i walablomtsik?
42005031	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Xi kwajattsik alwa ani yab u yaul yab in yntsal i illix, por xu yaultsik, in yntsal.
42005032	Nan yab in tsinek ku aliy xi xeechtsik lujat, in tsinek ku aliy xi walbidhtsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom.
42005033	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal jajtsik: —Nin exbaliltsik na Juan ani nin exbaliltsik an fariseotsik u kltsik ani u ltsik tajat, por na exbaliltsik echeki u kapultsik ani u uchaltsik.
42005034	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Awxe neech kin ejtotsik ka klin xi kanidhtsik ba jun i tomkixtalb tam bl kwajat an tomkinl inik kal jajtsik? Yaba!
42005035	Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam neech ka wkontsat an ti tomkinl inik ani nechich jeye tm ka klintsik.
42005036	Tiltsintsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Yab xita in kotyal jun peje i t xeketlb abal kin patskuy kl i kej xeketlb. Max kin taja anchan, in odhnl an t xeketlb, tm jun, an t xeketlb yab neech kin tomna an kej xeketlb.
42005037	Nibal u balyb an t yajtsik uxnl ban kej t balixtalb; pos max ka tajan anchan, an t yajtsik uxnl in michl an kej t balixtalb, neech tm ka waklan an yajtsik uxnl ani an t balixtalb u kibchonal.
42005038	Jaxtm ti yejat ka balyat an t yajtsik uxnl ban t t balixtalb abal chablam yab ka kibchon.
42005039	Ni jun xita xi kin ucha okox an kej yajtsik uxnl, in kulbetnl jeye an t yajtsik uxnl, pos in ulal ench: “An kej yajtsik uxnl, ms ja alwa.”
42006001	Jun i kij tin ktsjil an koyxnich, lejat na Jess neech ti belal ban alelb xon ti waach i tayablbtsik, nin exbaliltsik in belal puwal i trigo, in ixyal kal in kubak ani in kapaltsik.
42006002	Konyat tm ench kal taltsik an fariseotsik: —Jantki ta tajltsik i tojlb xi yab alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich?
42006003	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik xowa in taja na Dabid tam ti jaj ani nin juniktsik kaay?
42006004	Ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in iki an pan xi pikbantsidh na Dios, in kapu ani in pidha jeye nin juniktsik xi ta ti kwajat junax kal jaj, maske jachan an pan, tokot bijtsidh neech kin kapu an pletsik.
42006005	In ulu jeye ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb abal ku ulu xowa alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
42006006	Jun i kij, jaychki tin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochich na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani in tuju ti oktsix. Taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i inik xi mulkank in ejt kubak.
42006007	An oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an fariseotsik, ta ti kwajat in kwchiyaltsik na Jess abal in l kin chuu max kin jeldha jachan an inik tin ktsjil an koyxnich. Pos max kin taja anchan, neech tm kin koytsik jun xata xantokl ti kin lna na Jess.
42006008	Por na Jess, kom in chob alwa xanty kwajat ti chalpantsb, in utsa ench an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ki chakay ani ki kubey junax chejel. Chakay tm an inik ani kubey tametlb.
42006009	Utsan tm ench xi keettsik kal na Jess: —Neech tu konoytsik jun xata: Janty alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich? Xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa? Ka jeldh an yaultsik o ka walb ka chemech?
42006010	In teloloy tm na Jess ejtal an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat wilill ani in utsa ench an inik: —Ka lujku na kubak. Anchan tin taja an inik ani jelnek ti jilkon nin kubak.
42006011	Por chakuy tajat xi keettsik ani tujey ti knx jajkitsik xanty alwa kin tajtsi na Jess.
42006012	Tam ti jachan i kij, na Jess kale ba jun i chn abal ti l taja ani taja tin watna putl i akal ti lantsix an ta Dios.
42006013	Tam ti tsudhey, in kaniy nin exbaliltsik ani in takuy lajuchb xi jajtsik, xin bijiy ti abatwletsik.
42006014	Jajtsik jaich na Simn, xi bijyat jeye ta Pedro; na Andrs, nin kidhb na Simn; na Santiago, na Juan, na Felipe, na Bartolom,
42006015	na Mateo, na Toms, na Santiago xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo; na Simn xu taknal ban junkuntalb xu bijyb kananista;
42006016	na Judas, xu chakmlb kal na Santiago ani na Judas Iskariote, xi ms tayl in pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh.
42006017	Paay tm na Jess ban chn junax kal jajtsik ani kubey ba jun i chalam kal nin exbaliltsik. Junkunk taja yn i atiklbtsik xi tl ban chabl Judea, ban bitsow Jerusaln ani xu kwajltsik jeye Tiro ani Sidn tin waltsik an pujal. Ulnektsik taja abal kin acha xowa in ulal na Jess ani abal ka jeldh jeye kal xowakich an yawlchtsik xin kool.
42006018	Xin achltsik i yajtsiktalb abal ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik, u jelltsik jeye.
42006019	Jaxtm, kal ejtaltsik tu lenb ka takan na Jess abal u jeldhbtsik kal an chplb xu kalel ba Jaj.
42006020	In teloloy tm na Jess nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Kijidh tajat abal tattsik xi chojontl, kom a walkltsik ki takyat kal na Dios.
42006021	Kijidh tajat abal tattsik xi xo i kal, pos neech ki ajwdhtsik. &Kijidh tajat abal xi xo i uknaltsik, pos tayl neech ki teen.
42006022	Kijidh tajat abal tattsik tam ki atan kal an atiklbtsik, tam ki ajan, tam ki odhbijyat ani tam ki pojk jelti jun xata atax, kal tu kwenta Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42006023	Ki kulbtsik tajat ani ki kijidhm jachan i kij, pos neech ka bachutsik jun i pulek chejwalixtalb t walki; pos anchan jeye ti atax tajtsink an tiltsixtsik kal nin weje paklil jachan an atiklbtsik.
42006024	Por chojontl a chubl tumnladh iniktsik abal a kymalichtsik xowa ti kijidhmdhmal.
42006025	Chojontl a chubl xi xo kidhat a kooltsik, pos tayl neech ta kal. Chojontl a chubl xi xo i tenaltsik, pos tayl neech ki ukintsik kal i tepintalb.
42006026	Chojontl a chubl tam ejtal an atiklbtsik ti till alwa, pos anchan jeye tin tajmal nin weje pakliltsik kal an kambix tiltsixtsik.
42006027	Por tattsik xi xo i kwajat tin axtsal, tu utsltsik ench: &Ka kanidha xi ti atltsik, ka tajtsi ti alwatalb xi ti atltsik,
42006028	ka lbtaja xi ti odhbijyaltsik ani ki kontsintsi xi ti atax tajtsaltsik.
42006029	Max jun xita ti ki pikiy ba jun a chab, ka pidha jeye ti piktsi xi jun pake. Max jun xita ti ki kntsi ta wt, ka walka jeye kin jna na xekt.
42006030	Ka pidha xitakich xowa ti ki kontsi ani xita ti ki kntsi xowa tat a dhabal, yab ka kontsi ti ki witsbantsi.
42006031	Ka tajtsi xi keettsik jelt xan ta l ki tajtsin kal jajtsik.
42006032	Max tokot a kanidhltsik xita ti kanidhl, janty exom a tajltsik watats? Pos asta an walablomtsik in tajl anchan.
42006033	Max tokot a tajtsaltsik ti alwatalb xita ti tajtsaltsik ti alwatalb, janty exom a tajltsik watats? Pos anchan jeye in tajl an walablomtsik.
42006034	Ani max tokot a matintsaltsik xa chalpayal ke neech ti ki pidha xata, janty neech ka tatsik? Pos an walablomtsik u mtntsxtsik jeye ani in aytsmtsik ka witsbantsat.
42006035	Por tattsik yejat ka kakna xi ti atltsik, ka taja i alwatalbtsik, ka matintsixna xowakich, por yab ka aytsm ki witsbantsat. Anchan, plek tm an chejwalixtalb neech ka bachu ani neech ki kwajaytsik ta chakmlbtsik kal na Dios xi plek tajat; pos Jaj i alwa inik tajat kal xi yabtsik in pidhnl i jalbintsixtalb ani kal xi yab alwa iniktsik.
42006036	Ki yajnantsixintsik, jelti xan ti ni Tta u yajnantsix.
42006037	Yab ka teltsi xanty in tajl xi keettsik ani na Dios yab jeye neech ti ki teltsi xanty a tajltsik. Yab ka walbiy ni jun xita ani yab teye neech ki walbiyattsik kal na Dios. Ki pakwlantsixin ani na Dios neech jeye ti ki pakwlantsitsik.
42006038	Ka pidhatsik xowa in yntsal xi keettsik ani na Dios neech jeye ti ki pidha xowa tattsik a yntsal. Neech ki pidhan ba na morrlil lejbadh alwa, kichadh alwa ani dhiyadh asta ke u waklanalich kal in tsutst. Na Dios jaychki neech kin yna an lejab xi tattsik ka yna kal keettsik.
42006039	Utsantsik tm kal na Jess jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Awxe jun i jokol neech kin ejto kin lotokna in at jokol? Yabxe neech ka kwajlan chablam ti b ban jl?
42006040	Ni jun i exbal in chob ms k nin oktsxal, por tam kin okch an ti exbal, neech jeye tm kin bajaw jelti nin oktsxal.
42006041	Jantki ta teltsal an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal ani yab a chutal an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal?
42006042	Ani max yab a ejtowal ka chuu an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal, jantki ta utsl ench na at kidhb: “Kidhb, ti kin walka tu jixtsi an ti elits xa kool ba na wal”? Kambix inik! Ka wkoy okox an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal ani anchan neech tm ka ejto ka chuu alwa abal ka jixtsi an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal.
42006043	Yab waach i alwa te xi neech kin koy in wall yab alwa, nibal waach i te xi yab alwa xi neech kin koy in wall alwa.
42006044	Pos an tetsik kal nin wallki tu exlb. Yab u pitnal i igo ban kdhtsik, nibal u pitnal i uba ban kidhadh te.
42006045	An inik xi alwa, in ulal xowa alwa, kom alwa xowa kwajat bin itsch. An atax inik, in ulal xowa yab alwa, kom yab alwa xowa kwajat bin itsch. Pos xowa kwajat bin itsch, jaich in ulal.
42006046	Jantki tin bijyaltsik, “Ajtik, Ajtik” ani yab a tajltsik xowa tu utsl?
42006047	Neech tu utsatsik xita in junwal xu uteltsik kal Nan, xi tin axtsal ani in tajl xowa Nan u ulal:
42006048	In junwal jelti jun i inik xin kuba jun in kim ench: okox in chaja alkidh tajat an chabl ani in kwajbantsi tin akan ba tujub. Tam ti owtsikm an walja, jlch chapik an ja xon ti kwajat an at ani yab ejtowat ka yoywat abal nin akan kubat ba tujub.
42006049	Por xin achl nu kwintal ani yab in tajl xowa u ulal, in junwal jelti jun i inik xin kuba nin kim eb chabl ani yab aknidh alwa; tam ti owtsikm an walja jlch chapik an ja xon ti kwajat an at, julp an at ani pakudh ejtal ti jilan.
42007001	Tam ti na Jess in okch kin tawna an atiklbtsik, kale Kapernam.
42007002	Taja ta ti kwajat jun i romano xu oklek soldadotsik xin kool jun in tojnlil xin kanidhl tajat. Jech nin tojnlil u yaul ti kwajat ani nechich tajat ka chemech.
42007003	Tam ti jachan an oklek soldadotsik in acha u tilnal na Jess, in aba chb x in oklkil an judotsik abal kin pakabdha na Jess ka kale ti jeldhantsb an tin tojnlil.
42007004	Kaletsik ba na Jess ani in pakabdha tajat ench: —Jech an oklek soldadotsik in tomnl tajat ka tolmiy;
42007005	pos jaj tu kanidhl tajat ani in abnmal ku kubtsin an ti at xon ti tajl an junkuntalb.
42007006	Kale tm na Jess kal jajtsik. Por tam tu kunelichtsik ban at, an oklek soldadotsik in aba chb x in jabtsik abal ka utsan ench na Jess: —Ajtik, yabich ki tojlin, pos yab in tomnl ki ochich bu kim;
42007007	jaxtm ti nibal ela nan in kale tu aliy. Kal tokot ka ulu ka jeley nu tojnlil, neech ka jeley.
42007008	Pos nan in taknlki neye tin kwajat kal nu oklkiltsik, por u kool neye i soldadotsik xi nan u takyal. Tam ku utsa jun i soldado ka kale, u kalel; tam ku utsa jeye xi keet ka tsch, u tsiil ani tam ku utsa nu tojnlil kin taja jun xata, in tajl.
42007009	Tam ti na Jess in acha jech, laban tajat kal xowa in acha in ulmal jachan an inik, in teloloy tm an atiklbtsik xi kl ti wewkmte ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke nibal ban israelitatsik yab u elmal jun xita xin kool in belomtal jelt xan tin kool jech an inik xi yab u israelita.
42007010	Tam ti witsiytsik ban at xi abnktsik ti kanix an ta Jess, jelnekich tin ela jachan an tjontsix.
42007011	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess neech ba jun i bitsow xu bijyb Nan, junkmte kal nin exbaliltsik ani kal yn i atiklbtsik jeye.
42007012	Tam tu kunelich ba jachan an bitsow, in chuu jun i chemlom xu nedhbich ti jolyb. Jachan an chemlom jaich in junkax chakmil jun i chemtsidh mmlb. Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti neech junkmte.
42007013	Tam ti chutat kal an Ajtiklb jachan an chemtsidh mmlb, kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb ani in utsa ench: —Yab ki ukin.
42007014	Utey tm na Jess, in taka an kimlb ani kubeytsik xi neech in kitm jachan an kimlb. Na Jess in utsa tm ench an chemlom: —Kwitl, Nan tu utsl: Ki chakay!
42007015	Buxkan tm xi chemnekwiik ti kwajat ani tujey ti kw; na Jess in pidhnaich tm ba nin nna.
42007016	Ejtaltsik xin chuu jech, jikey ani tujeytsik kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios. In ulaltsik ench: —Jun i pulek tiltsix xalkank ba waw. In ulaltsik jeye ench: —Na Dios tsinek abal kin tolmiy nin bitswil.
42007017	Putl Judea ani an kwentsaltsik xi kwajat malill, in chobnatsik xanty in tajmal na Jess.
42007018	Na Juan in acha jeye ejtal jech, kom u tiltsinal kal nin exbaliltsik. In kaniy tm chb nin exbaliltsik
42007019	ani in aba abal ka kale ti konyb na Jess max Jajich lejtal xi bijidh neech ka tsch o kool ki aytsi keet.
42007020	Tam ti uteytsik ba na Jess xi abnk kal na Juan, in utsatsik ench: —Na Juan xu pujax tu abmal abal tu konoy max tatich kwa xi bijidh neech ka tsch o yejat ki aytsi keet.
42007021	Jachan i ora tam ti ulich nin exbaliltsik na Juan, na Jess in jeldha yn i yaultsik kal xowakich an yawlchtsik ani an chukuxtalbtsik xin kool, xi ochadhtsik kal i atax ejattalb in kldhantsi ani xu jokoltsik in chuxindha.
42007022	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalchtsik ani ka utsa na Juan xowa a chumaltsik ani xowa a achmal. Ka utsa abal an jokoltsik u chuxinal, an kwechetsik u belal, xin kooltsik an kwajat atax tt u jell, an tanchutsik u ochxinal, an chemlomtsik u ejdhb ti t ani an chojontltsik u tiltsinal an ti alwa tilab.
42007023	Kijidh tajat abal xita ti kin bela ani yab ka kux witsiy tayl.
42007024	Tam ti kalch xi abnktsik kal na Juan, na Jess tujey tm kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Juan. In ulu ench: —Janty i kalnek ka chuutsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh? Jun i pakb xi kwajat ti wawyb kal i ik?
42007025	Max yaba, janty i kalnektsik ka chuu? Jun i inik xi xeketlidh kal i alwa kudhkum? A chobtsik alwa ke xu xeketlinaltsik kal i alwa kudhkum ani kidhat in kool u kwajltsik bin kim i pakdha takix.
42007026	Pos tm, janty i kalnektsik ka chuu? Jun i tiltsix? Ani kejle ani tu utsltsik ke na Juan, ms ja plek k jun i tiltsix.
42007027	Jech na Juan jaich xu tilnal kal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: J u okxiyal nu abatwlejil abal ti ki tojojontsi an ti bl.
42007028	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ba ejtal an atiklbtsik yab jayki wachink jun i tiltsix ms plek k na Juan xu pujax; por xi ms chipl xon tu takix na Dios, ms ja plek k na Juan.
42007029	Tam tin achatsik jech, ejtal an atiklbtsik ani an bachkul jalbixtalb xi pujadhtsik kal na Juan, in exlatsik abal na Dios lujat tajat xowa in tajl;
42007030	por an fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, xi yabtsik pujadh kal na Juan, in pojkatsik xowa na Dios in lenmal kin taja kal jajtsik.
42007031	In ulu tm ench an Ajtiklb: —Jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij? Janty in junwaltsik?
42007032	In junwal jelti tsitsik chakam xu buxkanal ti ubt xon tu tajnal an njlch ani in dhjayaltsik nin at chakamtsik ench: “I jutsuy i chl ani yab i bixmchtsik; i ajatna i tepidh ajatlb ani yab i ukintsik.”
42007033	Pos tsch na Juan xu pujax, xi yab in kapal i kapnl nibal in uchl i yajtsik uxnl ani a ulaltsik ke jaj ochadh kal i atax ejattalb.
42007034	Tayl in tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, xin kapul ani in uchal por a ulaltsik ke in jiklom ani ke u jab i walablomtsik ani i bachkul jalbixtalb.
42007035	Por nin chalab na Dios u xalkanal abal lujat bin xechintal an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal.
42007036	Pakabdh na Jess kal jun i fariseo abal ka kale ti kapul bin kim jech an fariseo, kale bin kim jachan an fariseo ani buxkan ban mesa.
42007037	Tm, jun i mmlb xi xeech yab exbadh, xu kwajl jeye ba jachan an bitsow, xin acha abal na Jess kalnek ti kapul bin kim jachan an fariseo, ulich ani in tsidhl jun i frasko xi tajadh kal i alabastro, tsutsat kal i niwiytalb.
42007038	Utey u uknal ba na Jess ani tujey kin axdhantsi tin akan kal in jaml nin wal. Tayl exmch kin kwitsi kal nin xil, in chuchbantsi ani in joltsi bin akan an ti niwiytalb.
42007039	Tam tin chuu jech an fariseo xi kl ti kanidh na Jess, in chalpay ench: —Max jech an inik tsubaxak lejtal jaich jun i tiltsix, neech kin exla xita kl ti kwajat ti taknal ani xitam mmlb jeye jaj. Pos jaj, jaich jun i mmlb xi xeech yab exbadh.
42007040	Utsan tm ench an fariseo kal na Jess: —Simn, u kool jun xata xanty u l tu utsa. Tkon ench an fariseo: —Ti kin utsaich, Oktsix.
42007041	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Chb i iniktsik in jntsal ti tumn jun i inik xin matintsixnl i tumn. Jn in jnl b i bo inik i denariotsik ani jn in jnl chab inik lju;
42007042	kom yab in ejtowaltsik kin witsba, an matintsix tumn in pakwlantsi an tin jntsixtaltsik chablam. Ani xo ti kin utsa, kal jowa kl ti neech ka kakn ms an matintsix tumn?
42007043	Tkon ench na Simn: —Nan u chalpayal abal kal xi ms yn nin jntsixtal pakwlantsat. Utsan kal na Jess: —Tsubax xowa a ulu.
42007044	Chawkin tm na Jess, in tela an mmlb ani in utsa ench na Simn: —A chutal jech an mmlb. In ochich ba na kim ani yab tin pidha ti ja abal ku taka nu akan; por jech an mmlb tin axdhantsmal tu akan kal nin jaml nin wal ani tin wayedhantsmal kal nin xil.
42007045	Tat yab tin chuchbay, por jech an mmlb, asta tin ochenek yab in koydhmal tin chuchbantsi tu akan.
42007046	Yab tin joltsmal ti asyte bu k, por jaj tin joltsmal ti niwiy asyte bu akan.
42007047	Jaxtm tu utsl, kom pakwlantsat ejtal nin walastalbil maske yn tajat, jaxtm ti kanidhaxin tajat; por xita w in walastalbil ka pakwlantsat, w jeye ti neech ti kanidhax.
42007048	In utsa tm ench an mmlb: —Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat.
42007049	Xi ms an kapultsik xi ta jeye ti buxutsik kal Jaj, tujeytsik ti tsx jajkitsik ench: —Jitam j p jeye awil jech an inik, ke asta i walastalbtsik in ejtowal kin pakwlantsi?
42007050	Por na Jess in utsa ench an mmlb: —I loey abal i belmch, ki kalch tsububudh a ejattal.
42008001	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess xechin ba yn i bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik ti tiltsix ani ti ltsix an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios. Junkmte kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik.
42008002	T jeye ti xeech ti junkil chb x i mmlbtsik xi Jaj in jeldhmal kal an yawlch xin kooltsikwiik ani in kldhantsm ti atax ejattalbtsik. Kal jech an mmlbtsik ta jeye ti xeech na Mara xu bijyb ta Magdalena, xi kldhantsidh bk ti atax ejattalb.
42008003	T jeye ti xeech na Juana, nin tomtal na Kusa, an inik xi jaichwiik in oklek tojnlil na Erodes. Na Susana ani yn ms keet i mmlbtsik ta jeye ti xeechtsik abal kin tolmiy na Jess kal xowa in kooltsik.
42008004	Yn xi kale ban bitsowtsik abal kin chuu na Jess. Tam ti junkunich yn i atiklbtsik, na Jess tujey tm kin tawnatsik kal i junbaxtalbki. Ench tin utsatsik:
42008005	—Jun i m kale ti bkul iyalb. Tam ti kwajatich ti bkul, taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban bl, kachyat ani kapat kal an chichintsik.
42008006	Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban tujublom ani tam ti jachan an iyalbtsik ixkan, wayey kom taja, yab ch an chabl.
42008007	Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban kdhlom, ixkan, por kom junax ti pakey kal an kdh, paxkiyat.
42008008	Por taltsik an iyalb, kwajlan ban chabl xi alwa, tam ti ixkan ani pakey, tuuntsik tajat. Xi jun i iyalb in koy asta bo inik i itsixlek. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, utsantsik kawidh ench kal na Jess: —Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
42008009	Konyat tm kal nin exbaliltsik xanty in l kin ulu jech an junbaxtalb.
42008010	Ani Jaj in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik, ti pidhl na Dios ka chobna xowa in kool yab tejwa kal tin kwenta xan ti Jaj tu takix; por xi keettsik, tokot u tawnl kal i junbaxtalbki. Anchan, maske in chutaltsik, por jyki max yab in chutal; maske in achltsik, por yab in exbayal.
42008011	Jech jaich xowa in l kin ulu an junbaxtalb: An iyalb, in junwal jelti nin kwintal na Dios;
42008012	an iyalb xi kwajlan ban bl, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios, por tam tl an lej atax u wkontsb bin itsch abal yab kin belatsik ani yab ka loey.
42008013	An iyalb xi kwajlan ban tujublom, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin axtsal tin kwintal na Dios ani in bachwal kal yantam i kulbtalb, por eb itschki; neech ka belmch w i kij, por tam ka taktamiyat, u kuxkultsik.
42008014	An iyalb xi kwajlan ban kdhlom, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios por yab in tajltsik ti kij. In walkl ka ttsik kal an chalpaxtalb, kal an tumn ani kal xowakich xin kulbetnltsik tajat. Anchan yab in ejtowal kin bajaw ka xechin lujat.
42008015	Por an iyalb xi kwajlan ban alwa chabl, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin bachwal nin kwintal na Dios kal ejtal nin ejattal; in tajltsik xowa in achl ani kom in ntsal ti belomtsik, u xechinalichtsik tm lujat tajat.
42008016	Ni jun xita yab in letkoyal jun i tajbaxtalb abal tayl kin paxkiy kal jun i balixtalb o kin kwajba tin l i chy. U letkoyb an tajbaxtalb ani u kwajbb tekat abal ka tajbayat xita ka ochich.
42008017	Pos yab waach xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalkan tayl, nibal waach xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn tayl ani ka kwajb tejwa.
42008018	Anchan p, ka achatsik alwa, xita in exbayal, neech ka pidhan kin exbay ms ani xita yab in exbayal, neech ka kntsin asta xowa in chalpayal ke in exbayal.
42008019	Ulichtsik tm nin nna ani nin kidhbtsik na Jess, por yab in ejtotsik ka utey asta xon ti Jaj kwajat abal yn tajat ta ti kwajat an atiklbtsik.
42008020	Utsan tm ench na Jess: —Na nna ani na kidhbtsik n kwajat elb ani in ltsik ti ki chuu.
42008021	Por Jaj in utsatsik ench: —Xita in achltsik nin kwintal na Dios ani in tajltsik xowa in l na Dios, jachan, jaich xi kwajattsik jelti nu nna ani nu kidhbtsik.
42008022	Jun i kij, na Jess balin ba jun i tan kal nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Wana jun pake pujal. Ani kaletsik.
42008023	Por lejat exom ti watel, na Jess wayich. Tajatsik ti elan ban pujal kal jun i chapik ik, tujey ti baltsinal ti ja an tan ani wetsikich tajat ka luychin.
42008024	Kale tm ti bakyb na Jess ani utsan ench: —Oktsix! Oktsix! Exomich tu lupnal! Chakay tm na Jess, in kwiya an ik ani an mlk ja. Junwki ti kublan ani jilkon chamamadh.
42008025	In utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Janty tmun kal an belomtalb xa kooltsik? Por jajtsik jikenek ani labnktsik tajat kal xowa in chuu tmun ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom awiltalb in kool jech an inik xin utsl ka chamkan an ik ani an ja ani u axtsinal?
42008026	Ulchichtsik tm ban chabl xi Gadara, xi kwajat jun pake pujal tin tamt an chabl xi Galilea.
42008027	Tam ti na Jess pach ban tan, utukn kal jun i inik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow. Jech an inik nakatich tajat i kij ti kwajat ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik. Yab u xeketlinal nibal u kwajl ba jun i at, u kwajl xon tu jolyb an chemlomtsik.
42008028	Tam ti chutat na Jess, tudhlan tin tamt ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Jantki ta ochom kal nan, Jess, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xi plek tajat? Tu pakabdhl abal yab ti kin yajlombdha.
42008029	In ulu jech, kom na Jess kwajatich in utsl an atax ejattalb abal ka kalch ba jachan an inik. Owenekich tajat ti ochadh jachan an inik kal an atax ejattalb. Wiktsink kal an atiklbtsik tin kubak ani tin akan kal i patl abal ka kyat wikadh, por in tapyal ani u jnb kal an atax ejattalb ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
42008030	Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Jan ta bij? Jaj tkon ench: —Nan u bij Lejin. Anchan tin ulu kom jaj yn tajat ti b ti kwajat ba jachan an inik.
42008031	Jachan an atax ejattalbtsik in pakabdha na Jess abal yab ka abntsik ban owtsiktalb.
42008032	Ba jachan an chnlom ta ti xeech yn i olomtsik ti kapupl ani pakabdhaxin an atax ejattalbtsik abal ka walk ka ochich ban olomtsik. Walk ka ochichtsik taja kal na Jess.
42008033	Kale tm an atax ejattalbtsik ba jachan an inik ani ochich ban olomtsik. Ejtal an olomtsik in petna tinb ban chn, kwajlan ban pujal ani taja ti lupuntsik.
42008034	Tam ti an belkol olomtsik in chuu xanty tmun, jlchtsik ani kale kin tila ban bitsow ani ban kwentsaltsik.
42008035	An atiklbtsik kale kin chuu xanty tmnk. Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, elan an inik xi ochadhwiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik, buxlki xon ti kwajat na Jess, xeketlidhich ani juntam anikijich. An atiklbtsik, jikey.
42008036	Xi chlmadhtsik, jaich kl ti tiltsin an atiklbtsik xi ulich xan ti jeldh jachan an inik xi ochadhwiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik.
42008037	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja ban chabl xi Gadara, tujeytsik kin pakabdha na Jess abal ka kalch bin chabliltsik, kom jajtsik u jikltsik tajat. Jaxtm na Jess ti balin ban tan abal ka kalch.
42008038	Por pakabdh na Jess kal an inik xin kldhantsmal an ti atax ejattalbtsik abal ka jn jeye kal Jaj, por utsan kal na Jess abal ka jilkon taja ani utsan jeye ench:
42008039	—Ki kalch ta kim ani ka tila xanty ti tajtsmal na Dios. Kalch tm an inik ani in tila putl an bitsow xanty tajtsin kal na Jess.
42008040	Tam ti na Jess witsch jun pake pujal, bachwat kal an atiklbtsik kal yantam i kulbtalb kom kal ejtal ti kwajat aytsmte.
42008041	Ulich tm jun i inik xu bijyb ta Jairo, xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in pakabdha abal ka kale ti lnb tin kim,
42008042	kom ta tin kool jun in junkax tsidhnil xin koolich lajuchb i tamub ani jech an tsidhan exomich ti chemel. Kale tm na Jess ani kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn, ke asta u kichnalich tajat.
42008043	Ba nin yanl an atiklbtsik, ta jeye ti tl jun i mmlb xin koolich lajuchb i tamub ti yaul kal i lakmtalb. In pakmalich ejtal xowa in kool kal i illixtsik ani yab u ejtowb ka jeldh kal ni jun i illix.
42008044	Jech an mmlb utey tin kx na Jess, in taktsi tin wl nin kudhkmil ani tmki jachan ti kublan ti xichnal.
42008045	Konoxin tm na ench Jess: —Jita tin taka? Kom ejtaltsik in ulal abal ni jun xita kl ti taknk, na Pedro ani nin juniktsik in ulu ench: —Oktsix, kal yn i atiklbtsik ta kichnal ani i nixkb tki tki, ani bl a konyal xita ti taka?
42008046	Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Tin takm jun xita, pos u acha abal kale i chplb xu kool ani jeley jun xita kl.
42008047	Tam ti an mmlb in acha abal axnk, utey u wipipl ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess. In lna tm tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik xantki tin kwenta ti takxink ani xan ti jeley tmki.
42008048	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, i jeley abal i belmch, awil ki kale tsububudh a itsch.
42008049	Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess, tam ti ulich jun xita xi tl bin kim na Jairo, an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani utsan ench na Jairo: —Na tsidhnil chemech, yabich ki kwajay ka ani tojliy an Oktsix.
42008050	Por tam ti na Jess in acha xowa utsan na Jairo, in utsa ench: —Yab ki jikey, tokot ki belmch ani na tsidhnil neech ka ejech.
42008051	Tam ti ulich ban at, yab xita ms in walka ka ochich kal Jaj, tokot na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan, nin tta ani nin nna an tsidhan.
42008052	Ejtal u uknal ti kwajat ani u tepinaltsik abal chemnek an tsidhan. Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab ki ukintsik, an tsidhan yab chemnek ti kwajat, u wayalki.
42008053	Por labdhnki tokot, pos jajtsik in chob alwa ke chemnek ti kwajat.
42008054	Tyn tm bin kubak an tsidhan kal na Jess ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Tsidhan, ki chakay.
42008055	Ejech tm ti t an tsidhan ani tmki ti chakay; na Jess in ulu abal ka pidhan ti kapul an tsidhan.
