42008056	Nin tta ani nin nna an tsidhan labantsik tajat, por utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xanty tmun.
42009001	Na Jess in junku xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik, in pidha ti chplb, ti awiltalb abal kin ejtotsik jeye kin kldha xowakich i atax ejattalbtsik ani abal kin jeldha xu yaultsik kal xowakich i yawlchtsik.
42009002	In abatsik abal kin tila xan tu takix na Dios ani abal kin jeldha i yaultsik.
42009003	In utsatsik ench: —Yab xata ka jnatsik abal ti bl, yab ka jna a kwayab, nibal i morrl, nibal i kapnl ani nibal i tumn. Tokot ka jnatsik jn a xekt.
42009004	Ba xowakich an at xon ti ki ulichtsik ani ki bachwat alwa, ki kwajaytsik taja asta kin bajaw xowki neech ki kale ba jachan an chabl.
42009005	Ani xon ti yab ki lentsik ki bachwat, ki kale ba jachan an bitsow ani ka tiniy an pojodh xi palenek ba na akan jelti jun i exl abal yab i bachwattsik alwa kal jajtsik.
42009006	Kaletsik tm ani kaletsik kwentsal ti kwentsal in till an alwa tilab ani in jeldhl an yaultsik.
42009007	An pulek awiltalb Erodes, in chobna ejtal xowa in tajl na Jess. Yabich in chob xanty kin chalpay abal taltsik in ulal ke na Juan xu pujax ejnek ti t.
42009008	Keettsik in ulal ke jaich an tiltsix Elas xi xo ulnekich ani keettsik in ulal ke jaich jun i weje tiltsix xi ejnek ti t.
42009009	Por na Erodes in ulu ench: —Na Juan nan tajat u abna ka kotsin tin k. Jita j p tm jech an inik xu achl u tilnal ke in tajl yn xata? Ani na Erodes in lenl tajat kin chuu na Jess.
42009010	Tam ti witsiy an abatwletsik, in tiltsi na Jess xowa in tajmaltsik. Jntsik tm plki kal na Jess ba jun i chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh kunat ban bitsow xin bij Betsayda.
42009011	Por tam ti achan kal an atiklbtsik, wwntsik. Bachwat an atiklbtsik kal na Jess, tiltsin xan tu takix na Dios ani jeldh an yaultsik.
42009012	Tam ti wklch, utey xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik ba na Jess ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka utsaich an atiklbtsik ka kalch ti koyol ani abal kin aliy xanty kin kapu ban kwentsaltsik xi waach tech kunat, pos tech xon tu kwajat yab xita u kwajl.
42009013	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka pidha tattsik ti kapul. Jajtsik tkon ench: —Max yab ku kale ki chaay i kapnl abal ejtal jech an atiklbtsik yab neech ki ejto ki kapundha, pos yab i kool yn i kapnl, tokot b i pan ani chb i tool.
42009014	Nin yanl, bo mil xna i iniktsik. Por na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka utsa ka buxkantsik kwene ti kwene, xi juntsik i kwene, chab inik lju in yanl.
42009015	Anchan tin tajatsik ani ejtal buxkan.
42009016	In tyna tm na Jess xi bo an pan ani xi chb an tool. In tela walki ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta jachan an kapnl. Tam tin pejmalich, in pidhaich tm an exbaltsik ani an exbaltsik in pidhaich tm an atiklbtsik.
42009017	Ejtaltsik kapch ani ajwtsik. Ms tayl, in tsutsiytsik lajuchb i toknal kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon.
42009018	Jun i kij tam ti na Jess kwajat ti l plki ani ta jeye ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik taja, in konoytsik ench: —Kal an atiklbtsik, jita p tin usnal ke Nan neye?
42009019	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Taltsik in ulal ke Tat i Juan xu pujax, taltsik in ulal ke i Elas xi xechink ti tiltsix ti weje ani keettsik in ulal ke Tat jaich jun i weje tiltsix xi ejnek ti t.
42009020	Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ani tattsik, jita p ta ulaltsik ke Nan neye? Utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Tat i Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix. .
42009021	Por punkuntsattsik tajat kal na Jess abal yab xita kin ltsi jech.
42009022	Ench ti utsantsik: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna yn i yajtsiktalb, neech kin pojk kal in oklkil an judotsik, kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin chemdh por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
42009023	Ms tayl in utsa ejtaltsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ti kin wwna, yejat kin uktsitsiy tinb ani ti kin wwna tsudhey ka tsudhey, nibal kin ajay tinb maske ka chemdh.
42009024	Pos xita yab in l kin uktsitsiy tinb, neech kin kibdha nin ejattal ani xita kin uktsitsiy tinb kal Nanki tu kwenta, neech kin loo.
42009025	Pos, jant ti alwa max jun xita kin bajaw kin koy ejtal xowa waach ban kayl ani kin kibdha nin ejattal ban kibeltalb?
42009026	Max jun xita kin tidhena ti kin tila ani kin tidhena kin tila an alwa tilab, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tidhena jaj tam kin tsch kal ejtal nu labidh tokt, kal ejtal nin labidh tokt nu Tat ani nin labidh tokt jeye an tokat abatwletsik.
42009027	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke taltsik xi tech kwajat yab neech ka chemech asta kin chuu okox ti takix na Dios.
42009028	Tam ti waxikich a kts tin ulmal jech, na Jess kadhiy ba jun i chn ti l, junkmte kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan.
42009029	Lejat na Jess kwajat ti l, jalkun nin wal, dhaknib tajat nin kudhkmil ani chaxkin.
42009030	Xalkan tm chb i iniktsik xi kwajat ti tiloll kal Jaj. Jachan an iniktsik, jaich na Moiss ani na Elas,
42009031	wililidh kal i labidh tajaxtalb ani kwajat in tilltsik an cheml xi neech kin watna Jerusaln na Jess.
42009032	Maske na Pedro ani nin juniktsik in l tajat ti wayal, lamkantsik nin wal, in chutsitsik tin labidh tokt na Jess ani in chuutsik jeye xi chb an iniktsik xi ta ti kwajat kal Jaj.
42009033	Tam ti jachan an iniktsik wmch ba na Jess, utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Oktsix, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas. Por na Pedro yab in chob xanty kwajat in ulal.
42009034	Lejat kwajat ti kw, chakan jun i tokow, dhabyattsik kl ani jikeytsik tajat tam tin chuu dhabyattsik kal an tokow.
42009035	Achatm tm ban tokow jun i kwintalb xin ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat, ka axtsitsik xowa in ulal.
42009036	Tam ti chamkanich jachan an kwintalb, in chuchtsik tm abal na Jess kwetm ti kwajat. Yabich ms xata in ulutsik ani yab in tiltsi xata ni jun xita xowa in chuutsik.
42009037	Jun tsudhelom, tam ti pachtsik ban chn, kal yn i atiklbtsik ti bachwat na Jess.
42009038	Utsan tm ench kawidh kal jun i inik xi ta jeye ti kwajat ba jachan an atiklbtsik: —Oktsix, tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin chutsi tu chakmil, pos tokot j tu kool.
42009039	U oxnal kal jun i atax ejattalb ani u tajnal ka dhjan; u wipindhb ani u dhopopl in ijil bin wi. U tajtsinal xan ti ka len ani yab u lenb ka walk.
42009040	U pakabdhmalich na exbaliltsik abal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb, por yab in ejtmaltsik.
42009041	Tkon tm ench na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belom ani i walablomtsik tajat! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech na kwitlil.
42009042	Por tam ti exomich ti utwb an kwitl, kwajl chabl kal an atax ejattalb ani wipindh; por na Jess in kwiya an atax ejattalb, in jeldha an kwitl ani pidhanich tm an ttalb.
42009043	Ejtaltsik laban kal nin pulek awiltal na Dios.
42009044	—Ka achatsik alwa jech ani yab ka uktsi: Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn abal kin chemdh kal an iniktsik.
42009045	Por an exbaltsik yab in exbay xanty kwajat ti usnaltsik, pos yabtsik u pidhnal kin exbay ani in jiknltsik kin konoy ka wiltsin xanty utsantsik.
42009046	Tujey tm ti kwlx an exbaltsik abal in l kin chobnatsik xita j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik,
42009047	por na Jess in chobna xowa in chalpayaltsik. In yakwna tm jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba xon ti Jaj kwajat
42009048	ani in utsatsik ench: —Xita kin bachu jun i chakam kwitl jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal; ani xita tin bachu Nan, in bachwalich jeye xita tin abmal. Pos xita xin chakl ms tinb kal tattsik, jaich na ms ultalb.
42009049	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Juan: —Oktsix, i chumal jun i inik ti kldhax atax ejattalb kal Tat a bij ani waw i taxkantsi kom yab xeech kal waw.
42009050	Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab ka taxkantsi, pos xita yab tu atl, junax kal waw.
42009051	Tam ti exomich ti kunel xowki na Jess ti neech ka kadhch walki, in ulch tm abal nechich Jerusaln kal ni jun i jkib.
42009052	In okxiy chb x i iniktsik abal ka kale ba jun i kwentsal xu taknal Samaria ani kin aliy xon ti neech ka koychtsik;
42009053	por yab len ka bachwat kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja abal in achatsik ke Jerusaln ti neechtsik.
42009054	Tam ti na Jakobo ani na Juan, xi jaich in exbaliltsik na Jess, in chuu jech, in utsatsik ench na Jess: —Ajtik, a lxe ki konoy ka paay i kamal walki abal ka kibdhtsik, jelt xan tin tajmal ti weje an tiltsix Elas?
42009055	Teloloyattsik tm kal na Jess ani kwiytsikiyattsik ench: —Yab a chobtsik xantom ejattalb ti ijtsal ka ulu jech.
42009056	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal ku kibdhantsi tin ejattal an iniktsik, in tsinek abal ku lotsi. Ani kalchtsik tm pl kwentsal.
42009057	Tam ti jajtsik neech ti bl, utsan ench na Jess kal jun i inik: —Ajtik, u l tu junikna putlki xon ti ki kale.
42009058	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Na wxtsik in kool in kim ani an chichintsik in kool in pkw; por Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab u kool nibal ela xon ti kin koych.
42009059	Na Jess in utsa jeye keet ench: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Por tkoyat ench: —Ajtik, ti kin aytsi okox asta ka chemech nu tta ani ku joliy, tm neech tu wwna.
42009060	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jila ka jolyat an chemlomtsik kal xi yabtsik u belom; por tat, ki kalch ka tila abal na Dios in l kin takch an atiklbtsik.
42009061	Utsan tm jun na Jess kal keet ench: —Ajtik, u l tu junikna, por ti kin aytsi okox kin kale ku utsa xi ttsik tu kim abal in nechich.
42009062	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Xita kin tyna nin jobb an chabl ani in tell tin kx, yab neech kin ejto kin jna lujat an kadhl. Anchan jeye, xita kin tuju kin tjontsi na Dios por yab in tjontsi kal ejtal in ejattal, yab xata ti alwa xon tu takix na Dios.
42010001	Ms tayl, an Ajtiklb in takuy jeye ox inik lju i iniktsik abal kin aba chabtsik ti chabtsik ka okxin ban bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik xon ti Jaj neech ka watey.
42010002	In utsatsik ench: —Tsubax kejle, yn tajat waach xi neech ti kin bela, por w tajat waach xita tin till. Jaxtm, yejat ka pakabdhatsik na Dios abal kin aba xita ti kin tila ani kin aliy xita neech ti kin belatsik.
42010003	Ki kaletsik ani ka chobna abal Nan tu abltsik jelti borrego xon ti waach tajat i padhum.
42010004	Yab ka jnatsik i morrl, nibal in bl i tumn, nibal a pajab ani yab ki kubey ka chapndha ni jun xita ti bl.
42010005	Tam ki ochichtsik ba jun i at, ki chapndhomchtsik okox ench: “Ke an kijidhtalb ka wachin echeki ba jech an at.”
42010006	Max ba jachan an at u kwajl i alwa kimdh, neech kin bachutsik an chapndhomtalb; por max yaba, an chapndhomtalb neech jun ka witsiy ba tattsik.
42010007	Xon ti ki bachwat alwa, ki koychtsik taja; ka kapu ani ka ucha xowa jajtsik ti ki pidha, pos an tjontsix in tomnl kin bachu nin jalbl. Yab ki xechintsik tki tki ban attsik.
42010008	Tam ki ulichtsik ba jun i bitsow xon ti ki bachwat alwa, ka kaputsik xowa ki pidhan;
42010009	ka jeldha an yaultsik xi ka ela taja ani ka utsatsik ench: “Na Dios in l kin tujch ti ki takiytsik.”
42010010	Por max ki ulich ba jun i bitsow xon ti yab ki bachwattsik alwa, ki kale ban bltsik ani ka utsatsik ench:
42010011	“Asta an pojodh xi waach tech ba na bitswiltsik xi palenek ba ni akan, i tinyal jelti jun i exl kom tattsik yab tu bachu alwa. Por ka chobnatsik jech, na Dios in l kin tujch ti ki takiytsik.”
42010012	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, jech an bitsow, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Sodoma.
42010013	Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi Korasn! Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi Betsayda! Abal max jech an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xu tajmal ba jajtsik, u tajmalak ban bitsowtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn, an atiklbtsik xi taja u kwajl, wejeichak tin kwajbmaltsik nin kodhow kudhkmil ani buxkankichaktsik ban kwixix abal kin xalka ke in jilmalichtsik ti walablom.
42010014	Por tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi Korasn ani xi Betsayda k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn.
42010015	Ani tattsik, atiklbtsik xi Kapernam, a chalpayaltsikxe ke ms neech ki lbtajan kal na Dios? Pos tu utsltsik ke yaba! Neech ki petntsik asta xon ti kwajat an chemlomtsik.
42010016	Xita ti ki axtsitsik, Nan tin axtsal, xita ti ki pojkatsik, Nan tin pojkl ani xita tin pojkl, in pojkl xi tin abmal.
42010017	Xi ox inik lju an atiklbtsik, u kulbltsik tajat ti witsiy ani ench tin ulutsik: —Ajtik, asta an atax ejattalbtsik tu exbantsal tam ki kwiya kal Tat ta bij.
42010018	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan u chuu ti kwajlan an lej atax adhik tajat jelti ly, tam ti petn abal chaat.
42010019	Nan tu pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb abal ka kachiy i chan ani i dhiniy ani yab xata neech ti ki tajtsitsik. Tu pidhmal jeye ti awiltalb abal ka tantsi ejtal tin chp an lej atax.
42010020	Por yab ki kulbtsik abal i axtsinal kal an atax ejattalbtsik, ki kulbtsik abal na bij kwajatich dhutsadh t walki.
42010021	Tmki jachan, na Jess u kulbl tajat kal an kulbtalb xi pidhan kal an Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Tta, tu kaknl, Okxlb xi takix walki ani chabl, abal a chintsmal jech xi chalpadhtsik ani xin exbayaltsik ani a xalkantsmal xi yabtsik lej chalpadh. Tta, anchan ta taja kom anchan ta lena.
42010022	Nu Tta tin pidhmalich ejtal xowa waach. Yab xita tin exll xitam j neye Nan, xin Chakmlb kal a Dios, tokot an Ttalb tin exll. Ani yab xita in exll xitam j jeye an Ttalb, tokot Nan u exll ani xita Nan, xin Chakmlb kal na Dios u l ku pidha kin exla.
42010023	In teloloy tm an exbaltsik ani in utsa jajkitsik ench: —Kijidh tajat abal xita in chutal xowa tattsik exom a chutal,
42010024	pos tsubax tu utsltsik, ke yn i tiltsixtsik ani i pakdha takix in lenmal kin chuu xowa tattsik exom a chutal, por yab in chuutsik; in lenmaltsik jeye kin acha xowa tattsik exom a achl, por yab in achatsik.
42010025	Jun i oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, chakay kin tawna ench na Jess abal kin taktamiy: —Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
42010026	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Janty kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb? Janti ta exbayal?
42010027	An oktsix xin will an takixtalb tkon ench: —“Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal a itsch, kal ejtal a ejattal, kal ejtal a chp ani kal ejtal a chalab ani ka kakna jeye na at kidhtaltsik jelt xan ta kaknl tab.”
42010028	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Alwa tajat xan ta tkon. Max ka taja jech, neech ka bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
42010029	Por an oktsix xin will an takixtalb, kom yab in l ka jilkon tidhetl tin tamt na Jess, in konoy ench: —Ani jita j p tm nu at kidhtal?
42010030	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jun i inik tl ti belal ban bl xi Jerusaln in km Jerik. Yakwan kal i kwtsik, kwetsin ejtal xowa in tsidhl ani kwetsin asta tin kudhkmil; chawat alwa, putedh ani tm ti jilanich.
42010031	Watey jun i ple ba jachan an bl, por tam tin chuu, yab in taja ti kij, wateyki.
42010032	Watey jeye taja jun i lebita, tam tin chuu, wateyki jeye.
42010033	Por jun i inik xu kwajl Samaria xi ta jeye ti neech ba jachan an bl, tam tin chuu, in kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb.
42010034	Utey tm xon ti kwachat jachan an inik, in illintsi kal i asyte ani kal i yajtsik uxnl xon ti chaudh ani in boltsi kal i kudhkum. In kadhba tm ban konl xi tl in pnm, in jna ba jun i at xon tu ulel i kubltsik ani taja tin beletna.
42010035	Ti jun tsudhelom, tam ti an samaritano nechich, in jixa chb i tipax tumn, in pidha an dhabal kubtalb at ani in utsa ench: “Ti kin beletnantsi alwa jech an ti inik ani max ka paku ms an tumn, neech tu witsbantsi tam kin witsiy.”
42010036	Konyat tm ench an oktsix kal na Jess: —Kal jowa xi jech x ta chalpayal tu kaknb jech an inik xi chaudh kal an kwtsik?
42010037	An oktsix xin will an takixtalb in ulu ench: —Xi kl ti kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalch ani anlki teye ka taja.
42010038	Na Jess in ntsi an bl ani ulich ba jun i kwentsal. Taja, jun i mmlb xin bij Marta in bachu na Jess tin kim.
42010039	Na Marta in kool jun in kidhb xu bijyb Mara. Jech na na Mara, buxkan kunat bin akan na Jess abal kin axtsi xanty in ulal.
42010040	Por na Marta in ntsal tokot ti tojojl abal yn tajat in kool xanty kin taja. Utey tm ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, Yabxe a chalpayal ke yejat ti kin tolmiy nu kidhb an tin tojojl? Ka utsa ti kin tolmiy.
42010041	Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Marta, Marta, tatki a tojliyal tab ani i chalpax kal xowakich.
42010042	Por jn tokot waach xowa yejat. Na Mara in takwymal xowa ms alwa ani yab neech ka kntsin.
42011001	Jun i kij kwajat ti l na Jess, tam ti okonich an ti l, utsan ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik: —Ajtik, ti ku oktsi weye xan ti ku lan, jelt xan ti na Juan in oktsmal nin exbaliltsik.
42011002	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam ki lantsik, ka ulu ench: Tta, xi kwajat walki, Tat i tokat tajat. Ti ku takch weye. Ka tjan tech ban chabl xowa Tat a l, jelt xan tu tjnal t walki.
42011003	Ti ku pidha xo an ti kapnl xi yntsal tsudhey ka tsudhey.
42011004	Ti ku pakwlantsi an ti walab, jelt xan ti waw i pakwlantsal xita tu waltsal. Yab ka walka ku taktamiyat, tokot ti ku beletna abal yab ku t kal an lej atax.
42011005	Utsantsik jeye ench kal na Jess: —Max jn ti b xi tattsik in kool jun in jab ani ka ulich chejel akal ti bakyb ani ka utsan ench: “Jab, ti kin matintsi x i pan,
42011006	pos jun u jab xi tl ti belal w, ulich tu kim ani yab xata u kool ku pidha kin kapu.”
42011007	Neech ka tkoyat ench altki kal na jn: “Yabich ti kin tojliy; mapudhich tu kool an wileb ani nu chakmiltsik j kwachatsik kal nan bu waytal. Yab neech ku ejto kin chakay tu pidha.”
42011008	Por neech tu utsatsik, maske yab ka chakay kin pidha xata abal in jab, neech ka chakay kin pidha abal yab ms kin ntsi ti itixbdhb ani neech kin pidha ejtal xowa in yntsal.
42011009	Jaxtm tu utsltsik ench: Ka kontsaltsik na Dios xowa a l ani neech ti ki pidhatsik; ka ayaltsik ani na Dios neech ti ki tolmiy abal ka ela; ka tawnltsik na Dios ani neech ti ki axtsitsik.
42011010	Abal xita in kontsal na Dios, in bachwal xowa in konyal; xita in ayal, in ell ani xita in tenyal an wileb, u japtsinal.
42011011	Awxe jun i ttalb xi tattsik a kidhtal, max ka kontsin ti pan kal in chakmil, neech kin pidha ti tujub? O max ka kontsin ti tool, neechxe kin pidha ti chan?
42011012	O kin pidha jun i dhiniy max ka kontsin jun i dhaktsok?
42011013	Pos max tattsik, xi yab i alwa inik, a witl ka pidha xowa alwa na chakmiltsik, an Ttalb xi kwajat walki, ms Ja in witl tajat! Ani Jaj neech kin pidha an ti Tokat Ejattalb xita kl ti ka kontsin.
42011014	Na Jess kwajat in kldhl jun i atax ejattalb xi mbdhats kl jun i inik ani tam ti kale an atax ejattalb, an m in ejtch tm ti kw. An atiklbtsik laban tajat kal jech xowa in chuu.
42011015	Por taltsik in ulu ench: —Jech an inik in kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin chp an lej atax, nin lej oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik.
42011016	Xi keettsik jeye, abal kin taktamiy na Jess, in kontsal kin taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb xi tl walki.
42011017	Por na Jess, kom in chob alwa xanty kwajat in chalpayaltsik, in utsatsik ench: —Max jun i yejche bitsow ka kxin ani ka tujey ti pjxtsik, neech ka okon jachan an bitsow; ani max xu kwajltsik ba jun i at ka kxin, neech jeye ka okon.
42011018	Anchan jeye, max an lej atax ka kxin kal nin kidhtaltsik, jan ti neech kin ejto kin koy nin awiltal? Jech tu utsltsik abal a ulal ke u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin chp an lej atax;
42011019	pos max anchanak, kal jita in chp tin kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik na kidhtaltsik? Anchan, ti xalkantsalichtsik ke i ukpinktsik ta kwajat.
42011020	Por Nan u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin awiltal na Dios ani kal jech, u xalkanalich ke na Dios tujenekich ti takix ba tattsik.
42011021	Tam jun i likat inik kwajat tojojodh alwa ani in belkm nin kim, yab neech ka ejtowat ka kwetsin xowa in kool tapadh taja.
42011022	Por max tl jun xita ms likat k jaj ani ka t, neech tm ka kntsin ejtal tin yamtal xin ynl ti belkol ani neech ka wlchxnantsat ejtal xowa in kool.
42011023	Xita yab junax kal Nan, tin atl. Ani xita yab tin tolmiyal ku utu an atiklbtsik ba na Dios, jachan, jaich xin tajl abal an atiklbtsik yab ka utey ba na Dios.
42011024	Tam jun i atax ejattalb ka kale ba jun i inik, u xechinal ba waynek chabltsik in ayal xon ti ka koych. Tam yab kin ela xon ti ka koych, in chalpayal ench: “Neech kin witsiy ban inik xon tin kalnek.”
42011025	Tam ka witsiy, in ell jachan an inik jelti jun i at xi yab kwajtsidh, kwetodh ani lejkikidh.
42011026	Neech tm jun ka kale ani neech kin iki bk i atax ejattalbtsik xi ms atax k jaj ani ejtal neech ka ochichtsik ti kwajl ba jachan an inik. Jachan an inik neech tm ka jilkon ms kibenek k tam ti kwajatwiik.
42011027	Lejat na Jess kwajat in ulal jech, jun i mmlb xi ta jeye ti kwajat ban atiklbtsik, in ulu kawidh ench: —Kijidh tajat abal an mmlb xi ti wachiymal ta chakam ani ti pubedhm!
42011028	Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Ms kijidh abal xita xin axtsaltsik xowa in ulal na Dios ani kin taja!
42011029	An atiklbtsik in ntsal ti junkunaltsik malill xon ti kwajat na Jess. Tujey ti kw na Jess ani ulu ench: —Tattsik xi kwajat jech i kij, i ataxtsik tajat ani tin kontsaltsik ku taja jun i labidh exl; por yab ms neech ki pidhantsik keet i exl, tokot an exl jelt xan ti tmun kal an tiltsix Jons.
42011030	Pos anchan xan ti na Jons kwajay ti exl abal an atiklbtsik xi Nnibe, anchan neye Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin kwajay tin exl abal tattsik xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij.
42011031	An pulek takix mmlb xi All, neech ka ejech ti t tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam ki ljundh xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij. Jaj neech kin xalka abal tattsik, xi kwajat xo jech i kij, i walbidhtsik. Jaj tsch w chabl abal kin axtsi tin chalpadhtal na Salomn ani xo, tech in kwajat Nan, xi jaich jun xita xi ms plek k na Salomn ani yab tin axtsaltsik.
42011032	Xi kwajinektsik ban bitsow xi Nnibe, neech ka ejechtsik ti t tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam ki ljundh xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij. Neech kin xalkatsik abal tattsik, xi kwajat xo jech i kij, i walbidhtsik. Jajtsik in jila ti walablom tam ti tiltsin an tin kwintal na Dios kal na Jons; ani xo, tech in kwajat Nan, xi jaich jun xita xi ms plek k na Jons ani yab tin axtsaltsik.
42011033	Yab xita in letkoyal jun i tajbaxtalb abal kin kwajba xon ti chinat o abal kin paxkiy kal jun i kajn. In letkoyal abal kin kwajba tekat ani ka tajbayat xita ka ochich.
42011034	Na wal in junwal jelti jun in tajbaxtal na tul; max na wal alwa, na tul putl tin kool an tajaxtalb; por max yab alwa, na tul jelti max kwajat ba jikwaxtalb.
42011035	Ka koy i kwenta kal an tajaxtalb xa kool abal yab t ka wenkon ti jikwaxtalb.
42011036	Pos max ejtal na tul in kool i tajaxtalb ani yab in kool ni w i jikwaxtalb, ejtal xowakich, tajax ti neech ka chuu jelti tam i tajbantsb kal jun i tajbaxtalb.
42011037	Tam ti na Jess in kubdha ti kw, pakabdh kal jun i fariseo abal ka kale ti kapul tin kim jech an fariseo. Na Jess ochich alt ani buxkan ban mesa.
42011038	An fariseo, laban abal in chuu ke yab in taka okox nin kubak xan ti jajtsik in tajl tam neech ti kapul.
42011039	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik an fariseotsik, a taktsal tin kx an baso ani an talab, por alkidh yab a takltsik. Anlki teye tattsik, eblidh i tokattsik, por ba na ejattal tokot a chalpmtsik i kwlch ani i ataxtalb.
42011040	&Yabtsik i chalpadh! Yabxe a chobtsik abal xita in tajmal xi eblidh in tajmal jeye xi alkidh?
42011041	Ka pidha an chojontltsik xowa a kanidhltsik tajat; anchan, tokatich tm neech ka kwajay na ejattal.
42011042	Chojontl a chubl, fariseotsik! Xa pidhltsik na Dios xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu kal an menta, an ruda ani ejtal xi ms an chojltsik, por yab a tajltsik ti kij xowa lujat nibal i kanidhaxtsik jelt xan tu kanidhax na Dios. Yejat ka tajatsik xowa lujat ani ki kanidhaxintsik, por yab ka jila ka pidha xowa in lujyal na Dios.
42011043	Chojontl a chubl, fariseotsik! abal a kulbetnltsik ki buxkan ban alwa kwajtalbtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani a kulbetnltsik ki chapndh ti bl kal yantam i kaknaxtalb.
42011044	Chojontl a chubl, oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! abal a junwaltsik jelti jlimtalb xi yab tejwa ani tam jun xita kin kachiy maske yab in chob, u jilkonal choodh kal an ataxtalb. Anchan teye tattsik, yab tejwa an ataxtalb xa kooltsik ba na itsch ani xita ti ki wwnatsik u chnal kal na walastalbiltsik.
42011045	Tkon tm jn an oktsix xin will an takixtalb ani in ulu ench: —Oktsix, tam a ulal jech, tu tejtsalich weye.
42011046	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Chojontltsik teye a chubl, oktsixtsik xa will an takixtalb! abal a utsltsik keet kin taja xowa in ulal an takixtalb ani tattsik nibal ela a tajltsik ti kij xowa a oktsixnl.
42011047	Chojontl a chubltsik! abal a kubtsal ti exl xon ti jolidh an tiltsixtsik xi chemdhats kal na weje pakliltsik.
42011048	Kal jech, u kalel jelti max a ulalichtsik ke alwa xowa in tajmal na weje pakliltsik; jajtsik in chemdha ani tattsik a kubtsal ti exl xon ti jolidh.
42011049	Kom na Dios chalpadh tajat, jaxtm tin ulu ench: “Neech ku abtsi ti tiltsixtsik ani ti abatwletsik, taltsik neech ka chemdh ani xi keettsik neech ka atan.”
42011050	Atiklbtsik xi xo jech i kij, na Dios neech ti tajatsik ka jalbiy nin chemtal ejtal an tiltsixtsik asta tam ti tujenek an kayl,
42011051	asta tam ti chemdh na Abel asta tam ti chemdh na Sakaras. Jech na Sakaras, jaich xi chemdh tamchejelidh ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jaxtm tu utsl atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, ke na Dios neech ti tajatsik ka jalbiy nin chemtal an tiltsixtsik ani an abatwletsik.
42011052	Chojontl a chubl, oktsixtsik xa will an takixtalb! abal yab a ltsal an atiklbtsik xan ti kin uwa abal ka takyatichtsik kal na Dios. Yab a ltsik ki takyat kal na Dios nibal a walkl ka takyattsik kal na Dios xin ltsik ka takyat.
42011053	Tam ti na Jess in okoy kin ulu ejtal jech, an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb ani an fariseotsik, in chakuntsitsik tajat na Jess ani tujeytsik kin taktamiy kal yn i konkomixtalb.
42011054	In taktamiyal abal in ltsik kin acha max kin ulu jun xata yab alwa ani anchan kin ejtotsik kin lna.
42012001	Tam ti jachan, junkun yn i mil i atiklbtsik, ke tokotich u nxkx kal in yanl. Na Jess in okxiy kin utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye. Jech, jaich xowa in kambixnlkitsik.
42012002	Pos yab waach ni jun xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalkan ani yab waach xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn tayl.
42012003	Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ejtal xowa a ulmal ban jikwaxtalb, neech ka achan tam kij; ani xowa a ulmaltsik chinat ani mapudh i wileb, neech ka ulwat kawidh tin b an attsik.
42012004	Jabtsik, tu utsl ke yab yejat ka jikna ni jun xita xin ejtowal ti chemdhax ani tayl yab ms xata in ejtowal kin taja.
42012005	Por neech tu utsatsik xita yejat ka jikna: ka jiknatsik na Dios, xi tam ti chemdhmalich, in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki petna ban kibeltalb. Jech jaich yejat ka jiknatsik.
42012006	Yabxe u nujwb b i tsitsik chichin kal chb i tipax tumn? Por na Dios yab in uktsal ni jn xi jech an chichintsik.
42012007	Pos asta na xil xa kooltsik ba na k, ejtal ajidh ti kwajat juntsik ti juntsik. Yab ki jikeytsik, pos tattsik ms yn a jalbl k yantam i chichintsik.
42012008	Tu utsltsik ejtal ta b, xita ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tila tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios;
42012009	por xita kin tidhena ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tidhena ku tila tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios.
42012010	Xita kl ti kin odhbijyat Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ka pakwlantsat; por xita kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab jayki neech ka pakwlantsat.
42012011	Tam ki jntsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, tin tamt i ljundhomtsik o ban awiltalbtsik, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax xan ti neech ki tkon o xanty neech ka ulu,
42012012	pos tam kin bajch xowki neech ta kw, an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich neech ti ltsi xanty neech ka ulu.
42012013	Utsan ench na Jess kal jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat ban atiklbtsik: —Oktsix, ka utsa nu kidhb ti kin pidha an ti jiltsixtalb xi nan neye u lujyal.
42012014	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jab, Nan yab in kwajbadh tin ljundhax ani tin wlchxlix.
42012015	In ulu jeye ench: —Ka koy tajat i kwenta kal an chenetalb, pos nin xechintal jun xita yab jaich tu likel kal xowa yn xata in kool.
42012016	Tiltsintsik tm jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xi tumnladh tajat, in taja in ale ani labey tajat.
42012017	Kwajay tm kin chalpay ench an tumnladh inik: “Janty xo neech ku taja? Yab u kool xon ti ku tapa an kapnl.”
42012018	In chalpay tm ench: “U chobich xanty neech ku taja. Neech ku paku nu wiltiltsik abal ku taja t ms pakdha, neech ku tapa ejtal an kapnl ani ejtal xowa u kool.
42012019	Neech tm ku ulu ench tu ejattal: yn xata u kool tapadh abal ku watna kl yn i tamub; jaxtm xo, awilich kin kwajay koyol koyolki, kapul kapulki, uchal uchalki ani in kulbl.”
42012020	Por utsan ench kal na Dios: “Jab, yab tajat i chalpadh, pos jech i akal neech ki chemech ani xowa a kool tapadh, jita neech kin dhabalna?”
42012021	Anchan in tamwal xita in junkuwal i tumn abal jajki ani yab tumnladh abal a Dios.
42012022	Tayl, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Tu utsltsik jech: Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal xanty neech ka kapu abal ki kwajay ejat, nibal ki kwajay ta chalpaxtsik kal xowa a kudhkmil neech ka kwajba.
42012023	Ni ejattal ms in jalbl k an kapnl ani ni tul ms in jalbl k ni kudhkmil.
42012024	Ka tela an chichintsik, yab u m, yab u kjol nibal in tapl xata ba wiltetsik; por u kapundhbtsik kal na Dios. Awxe tattsik ms w a jalbl k an chichintsik?
42012025	Jita xi tattsik, max ka kwajay tajat ti chalpax, neech kin ejto kin nakedha tinb ela chejel metro ms?
42012026	Max yab a ejtowaltsik ka taja xowa xi yab lej uluts, jantki ta kwajat ta chalpaxtsik kal xowakich xi ms?
42012027	Ka telatsik xan tu pakel an wich, yab u tojnaltsik nibal u dhutselix; tu utsltsik ke nibal an pulek takix Salomn, kal ejtal nin tumnladhtal, yab kudhkumlink labidh jelti an wichtsik.
42012028	&Pos max na Dios in labidhmdhl anchan an chojl xi xo kwajat ban alelb ani kalm neech ka tsikan, awxe na Dios yab neech ti ki kudhkumliytsik ms alwa? Tattsik w tajat ta belom.
42012029	Pos yab ki xechintsik ta chalpax ani ta lim xanty ka kapu o xanty ka ucha.
42012030	&An atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, jaich in ayal ejtal jech; por tattsik, a kool jun a Tta xin chob abal a yntsal ejtal jech.
42012031	Ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani ejtal jech neech ka bachutsik.
42012032	Yab ki jikeytsik, tattsik xi tin bellich, yab tajat yn ta b, por na Tta in kulbetnmal ti pidhatsik an ti awiltalb abal ki takxin kal Nan.
42012033	&Ka nujutsik xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik; anchan, a junkuwalichtsik i alwatalb t walki xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xon ti an kw yab in ejtowal ka ochich, nibal u kapnal kal an takl.
42012034	Pos xon ti kwajat xowa alwa xi tattsik a kulbetnl, taja jeye neech ka kwajay na ejattal.
42012035	Ki kwajaytsik echeki i tojojodh, xeketlidh ani letotl na tajbaxtaltsik.
42012036	Ka tajatsik jyki jelti tam jun i tjontsix kwajat in aytsm ka witsiy nin ajtik ba jun i tomkixtalb. Kwajat tojojodh abal kin japtsi an ti wileb tam ka ulich tokot kin teney.
42012037	Kijidh tajat abal an tjontsix, xi ka elan ejat tam ka ulich nin ajtik; tsubax tu utsltsik ke jachan an tjontsix neech ka utsan kal nin ajtik ka buxkan ban mesa ani neech ka jotsin an ti kapnl kal nin ajtik.
42012038	Kijidh tajat abal jachan an tjontsix xi ka elan ejat kal nin ajtik, maske ka ulich chejel akal o dhajawichki.
42012039	Ka chobnatsik jech, max jun i dhabal at in chobak xy i ora neech ka ulich an kw, yab neech kin walka ka japtsin tin kim abal ka kwyat.
42012040	&Anchan teye tattsik, ki kwajaytsik i tojojodh; pos tam yab xata a tlmtsik, neech kin ulich Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42012041	Konyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, a tila jech an junbaxtalb abal wawki o abal ejtal tu b?
42012042	In ulu ench an Ajtiklb: —An tjontsix xi lujat ani chalpadh, jaich xi neech ka punkuntsat kin takiy xi ms nin tojnlil an ajtiklb; jaj jaich xi neech kin ulu xowki ti yejat ka pidhan ti kapul xi kwajattsik ba jachan an at.
42012043	Kijidh tajat abal an tjontsix xi ka elan kal nin ajtik tam ka witsiy, in tajl xowa jiltsidh kin taja.
42012044	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka kwajb ti belkol kal ejtal xowa in kool an ajtiklb.
42012045	Por max an tjontsix xi ka jilan punkudh, kin chalpay ke nin ajtik yab neech ka witsiy jikat ani ka tujey tokot ti kapul, ti uchal asta ka itey ani ka tujey kin atax tajtsi xi keet an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik xi taja u tojnal,
42012046	neech ka ulich nin ajtik tam jaj yab xata in tlm, nibal in chob xy i ora; neech tm ka pidhan jun i yajtsiktalb plek ani neech ka tajtsin anlki jelt xan tin tamwaltsik xi yab alwa inik.
42012047	An tjontsix xin chob xanty in l nin ajtik, por yab tojojon nibal kin taja ti kij, yn tajat i wichate neech kin bachu.
42012048	Por an tjontsix xi yab in chob, maske kin taja xowa walats, w i wichate neech kin bachu. Xita yn ka pidhan, yn jeye neech ka kontsin; ani xita yn ka punkuntsat, ms yn neech ka kontsin.
42012049	Nan in tsinek tech ti chabl abal ku taja jelt xan tin tajl an kamal, in tsikl xowa u tal ani in tokwal xowa yab u tal; ani u lak max exomichak ti tal!
42012050	&Por kool ku watna okox jun i yajtsiktalb plek, ani tojlb tajat ku kuxuy asta kin bajaw xowki neech ka tmun jech!
42012051	&A chalpayaltsikxe ke Nan in tsinek abal ku tsidha i kijidhtalb tech ti chabl? Tu utsltsik ke yaba, in tsinek abal ku taja i kxtalb.
42012052	Por xo ani tin nakl an kij, b xi kwajat ba jun i kimdh, neech ka kxin, xi x neech kin chakuntsi xi chb ani xi chb neech kin chakuntsi xi x.
42012053	&An ttalb neech kin chakuntsi nin kwitlil ani an kwitl neech kin chakuntsi nin tta; an nnalb neech kin chakuntsi nin tsidhnil ani an tsidhan neech kin chakuntsi nin nna; an mmlb neech kin chakuntsi nin alb ani an albe neech kin chakuntsi nin mm.
42012054	Utsan jeye ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Tam tattsik ka chuu u chakl an tokow xon tu ochel na kts, tmki a ulaltsik abal neech ka ulich i b ani anchan u tmnal.
42012055	Ani tam u wawnal an ik xi all ti tl, a ulaltsik abal neech tajat ka yajb an kakal ani anchan u tmnal.
42012056	&Kambixtsik! A witltsik ka exbantsi xowki neech ka ulich an b ani xowki neech ka yajb tajat an kakal, por yab a ejtowaltsik ka exbantsi xanty exom ti tmnal jech i kij.
42012057	Jantki ti yab a ejtowaltsik ka chalpay xowa alwa ka taja?
42012058	Max jun xita ti ki utsbiy abal a waltsmal ani ki lxin ti bl kal jaj tam i nechich ban awiltalb, ki lejkin kal jaj abal yabich ti ki utu tin tamt an ljundhom; pos max ti ki utu taja, an ljundhom neech ti ki pidhna ban ykwal ani an ykwal neech ti ki baliy ban wikaxte.
42012059	Tsubax tu utsl ke yab neech ki kale ban wikaxte asta ka jalbiy ejtal xa jnl.
42013001	Tmki jachan, ulich chb x i atiklbtsik ani tiltsin na Jess xan ti na Pilato tin chemdhmal i iniktsik xu kwajltsik Galilea. Tiltsin abal in xukuntsmal tin xichl kal in xichl an konltsik xin chemdhltsik abal kin pikba.
42013002	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A chalpayaltsikxe ke jachan an iniktsik xu kwajl Galilea in tamu anchan abal ms ja walbidhtsik k xi keet xu kwajltsik tyki ba jachan an bitsow?
42013003	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yaba. Max yabtsik teye ka jila ta walablom, anlki teye neech ki chemechtsik.
42013004	O a chalpayaltsik ke xi lajuwaxik xi chemechtsik tuchidh kal an pulek tiadh tujub xu bijyb Silo, ms ja walbidhtsik k xi keet xu kwajltsik Jerusaln?
42013005	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yaba. Max yabtsik teye ka jila ta walablom, anlki teye neech ki chemechtsik.
42013006	Tiltsintsik tm kal na Jess jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Jun i inik in taymal jun akanlek i igo bin ale ani kale kin chuu max walidh, por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall.
42013007	In utsa tm ench an inik xi kl tu belkmtsb an tin ale: “Oxtalich tin tsiil tamub ti tamub ku altsi tin wall jech an te, por yab jayki u eltsmal. Ka kwajlaich, pos yab xata ti alwa ka kwajay kubat aniki ba nu ale.”
42013008	Por an belkol alelb tkon ench: “Ajtik, jila bl kubat jech i tamub. Neech ku jobtsi an ti chabl xon ti kubat ani neech ku mujtsi an ti lukuk xi alwa,
42013009	yab telab max anchan ka walin; max yab ka walin, neech tm ku kwajlaich.”
42013010	Jun i kij, tin ktsjil i koyxnich, na Jess kwajat ti oktsix ba jun i at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
42013011	Taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb xin koolich lajuwaxik i tamub ti yaul. Ktandhats kal jun i atax ejattalb ani jaxtm ti yab in ejtowal ni w ka lujkun.
42013012	Tam ti chutat kal na Jess, kanyat ani utsan ench: —Mmlb, i jelch kal an yawlch xa kool.
42013013	In kwajba tm nin kubak ban mmlb ani tmki jachan ti lujkun an mmlb. An mmlb tujey tm kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
42013014	Por an inik xu oklek ba jachan an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, chakuy abal na Jess in jeldha an mmlb tin ktsjil i koyxnich ani in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Waach akak a kts xowki ti alwa ku tjon; ki tschtsik jachan a kts abal ki jeldhtsik ani yab tam in ktsjil i koyxnich.
42013015	Tkon tm ench na Jess: —Kambixtsik, yabxe a willtsik na bkajil o na burrujil tam in ktsjil i koyxnich abal ka jnatsik ka uchandha?
42013016	&Jech an mmlb xu kidhtalb jeye kal na Abraham, xu kyb kal an lej atax ti yaul lajuwaxikich i tamub kal jech an yawlch, awxe yab in tomnl ka jeldh tam in ktsjil i koyxnich?
42013017	Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, ejtaltsik xi kl tu atnal na Jess, tidhebtsik; por ejtal xi ms an atiklbtsik u kulbl tam tin chuutsik an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess.
42013018	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Janty in junwal xan tu takix na Dios ani jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay?
42013019	In junwal jelti jun in itsch i mostasa xi jun i inik in tayl bin ale, u pubel tajat asta kin bajaw jelti jun i te. U pubel tajat, ke an chichintsik xi xeech ti jumuml in tajltsik nin pkw bin kweltsik jech an te.
42013020	In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay xan tu takix na Dios?
42013021	In junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye xi jun i mmlb in xukyal kl ox lejab i cheedh trigo ani in jilbdhl ejtal an xokadh cheedh trigo.
42013022	Tam ti na Jess neech ti belal abal Jerusaln, u kwajl ti oktsix ban bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik xon tu watel.
42013023	Konyat ench kal jun xita: —Ajtik, wxe tajat xu loel? Jaj tkon ench:
42013024	—Ka tajatsik an chplb abal ka ejto ki kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios, jelti an chplb xi yejat ka tajatsik tam a l ki ochich ba jun i xuyat wileb. Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yn tajat xi neech kin lena ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, por yabtsik neech kin ejto.
42013025	Tam ka chakay an dhabal at ani kin mapuy an wileb, tattsik, xi jilkonk elb, neech ka teneytsik an wileb ani neech ka ulutsik ench: “Ajtik ti ku japtsi weye.” Por Jaj neech ti ki tkoytsik ench: “Yab tu exlltsik nibal u chob xon ta tl.”
42013026	Neech tm ki tujeytsik ka utsa ench: “U kwajinek p tu kapul ani tu uchal junax kal Tat ani Tat i oktsixnk ba ni bitswil.”
42013027	Por Jaj neech ti ki tkoytsik ench: “Tu utslichtsik ke yab tu exll nibal u chob xon ta tl. Ki wixkintsik tech kal Nan, ejtal tattsik xa tajl xowa yab alwa!”
42013028	Taja neech ki ukintsik ani neech ti rechechl na kamab tam ka chuutsik abal na Abraham, na Isk, na Jakob ani ejtal an tiltsixtsik kwajat xon tu takix na Dios ani tattsik i jilan elb.
42013029	Pos neech ka tsch an atiklbtsik xi ebl ani all, xon tu kalel na kts ani xon tu ochel jeye abal ka buxkantsik ti kapul xon tu takix na Dios.
42013030	Jachan i kij, taltsik xi xo kwajat kuxlek, neech ka kwajay ultalb ani taltsik xi xo kwajat ultalb, neech ka kwajay kuxlek.
42013031	Tmki jachan a kts, ulich chb x i fariseotsik ani utsan ench na Jess: —Ki kalch pl, pos na Erodes in l ti ki chemdha.
42013032	Por Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ani ka utsa ench jachan an inik xin kool in chalab jelti a wx: “Ka tela, xo ani kalm u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik, u jeldhl an yaultsik ani chabki neech ku okoy.”
42013033	Por xo kool ku ntsi nu blil, kalm ani chabki jeye, pos yab in tomnl ke jun i tiltsix ka chemdh pl bitsow ani yab Jerusaln.
42013034	In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln, xa chemdhl an tiltsixtsik ani a tujbayal xi abtsinaltsik kal na Dios abal ti ki ltsi an tin tsubaxtalbil! Ynl u lena ku junku na chakmiltsik, jelt xan ti an pkwlam kwita in junkuwal nin tsitsik tm abal kin pkwna tin l nin sutsts, por yab a lenatsik.
42013035	Ka achatsik xanty neech tu utsa, an pulek at xon ta kaknltsik na Dios, neech ka walb. Tu utsltsik abal yab ms neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik, asta kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka ulutsik ench: “Lbtajadh ti kwajat xi tl tin bij an Okxlb!”
42014001	Jun i kij, tin ktsjil i koyxnich, na Jess kalnek ti kapul bin kim jun in oklkil i fariseo ani xi keet an fariseotsik ta ti kwajat ti kwchix.
42014002	T jeye ti kwajat taja tin tamt na Jess, jun i inik xu yaul kal i ml.
42014003	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an fariseotsik: —Awilxe ka jeldh jun i yaul tam in ktsjil i koyxnich o yaba?
42014004	Por jajtsik yab kuchun. Tyn tm an yaul bin kubak kal na Jess, jeldh ani in utsa tm ka kalch.
42014005	Utsan tm ench an fariseotsik kal na Jess: —Jita xi tattsik a kidhtal, max nin burrujil o nin bkajil ka balkin ba jun i mom, yab in jixl tmki maske in ktsjil i koyxnich?
42014006	Ani yabtsik in ejto ka tkon ni w.
42014007	Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti tkultsik an ti ultalb kwajtalb ban mesa xi kanidhtsik ba jun i tomkixtalb, in pidhatsik jech an ti takixtalb:
42014008	—Tam jun xita ti kaniy ta ajblom ba jun i tomkixtalb, yab ki buxkan ban kwajtalb xi ultalb, yab telab ka ulich jun xita xi ms uluts k tat
42014009	ani ka ulich ti ki utsa ench xi ti kanymal: “Ka pidha jachan an ti kwajtalb na je jn.” Tidhetlich tm abal tat ki kale ta buxkanal ban kwajtalb xi ms kuxlek.
42014010	Tam ki kanyat ba jun i tomkixtalb, ms alwa ki buxkan ban kwajtalb xi kuxlek; abal tam ka ulich xi ti kanymal, ti ki utsa ench: “Jab, j ki watey ta buxkanal ban koytalb xi ms ultalb.” Anchan neech ki kakn kal xi ta buxutsik ban mesa junax kal tat.
42014011	Pos xita in tekl tinb, neech ka chak; ani xita in chakl tinb, neech ka tekb.
42014012	In utsa jeye ench an inik xi kl ti kanidh: —Tam ka taja jun i kapxnich, yab ka kaniy na jabtsik, nibal na kidhbtsik, nibal na exlowltsik, nibal na at kimdh xi tumnladh; pos tam kin tajatsik jeye i kapxnich, neech jeye ti ki kaniy ani anchan, jelti max i witsbantsbich.
42014013	Tam ka taja jun i ajib, ms alwa ka kaniy an chojontltsik, an mochotsik, an kwechetsik ani an jokoltsik,
42014014	ani kijidh tajat neech ki kwajay. Pos jajtsik yab neech kin ejto ti jalbintsi, por tat, neech ka bachu an chejwalixtalb tam ka ejdh ti t an atiklbtsik xi alwa inik.
42014015	Tam tin acha jech, jn ti b xi ta ti buxutsik ban mesa, in utsa ench na Jess: —Kijidh tajat abal xita xi neech ti kapul xon tu takix na Dios!
42014016	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Jun i inik in taja jun i pulek kapxnich ani in abna ka kanyat yn i atiklbtsik.
42014017	Tam ti kwajatich tojojodh an kapnl, in aba nin tojnlil kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik kanidh: “Ki tschichtsik, tojojodhich ejtal.”
42014018	Por ejtaltsik in konoy ka pakwlantsat abal yab neech kin ejtotsik ka kale. Xi jidhtal in ulu ench: “Tall tu chaay jun i chabl ani kool kin kale ku chuu; tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin pakwlantsi.”
42014019	Jn in ulu jeye ench: “U chaymal bo kubl i bkatsik xu knal ani u l kin kale ku chuu max alwa; tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin pakwlantsi.”
42014020	Ani jn in ulu jeye ench: “Tall tin tomkin ani jaxtm ti yab neech ku ejto kin kale.”
42014021	Tam ti witsiy an tjontsix, in utsa ejtal jech nin ajtik. Chakuy an ajtiklb ani in utsa ench nin tjontsixil: “Ki kale jikatki ban pakdha bl ani ban chikwdha bl xi waach tech ban bitsow ani ka kaniy ka tsch tech xi chojontltsik, xi mochotsik, xu kwechetsik ani xu jokoltsik.”
42014022	Ms tayl, in ulu ench an tjontsix: “Ajtik, u tajmalich xan ta ulmal ani bl tajat ejtidh alt.”
42014023	Utsan tm ench an tjontsix kal an ajtiklb: “Ki kale putlki ban pakdha bl ani ban bltsik xi tin waltsik an bitsow ani ka tajtsitsik ti chplb ka ochich abal ka tsutsich nu kim.
42014024	Tu utsltsik, ke ni jn xi jachan xu kanymaltsik okox, yab neech ka ochich ba nu kim ti kapul.”
42014025	Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wewkmte na Jess, chawkilch ani in utsatsik ench:
42014026	—Max jun xita ka utey kal Nan, por in kanidhl ms nin tta, nin nna, nin tomtal, nin chakmiltsik, nin kidhbtsik, nin ixmtsik ani in kanidhl tajat tinb, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wwna.
42014027	Anl jeye, max jun xita in l ti kin wwna ani yab in l kin watna i yajtsiktalb o i cheml kal Nanki tu kwenta, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wwna.
42014028	Max jun xita xi tattsik in l kin kuba jun i at pulek, yabxe neech ka buxkan okox kin chalpay xatwa neech kin paku abal kin chuu max neech kin ejto kin okoy?
42014029	Pos max yab kin taja anchan, kin kwajbantsch tokot okox an tin akan ani yab kin ejto kin okoy, neech tm ka labdhn kal ejtal xita kl ti ka chutat
42014030	ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Jech an inik in tuju kin taja jun i at pulek ani yab in ejto kin okoy.”
42014031	O max jun i pulek takix neech ti pjx kal keet i pulek takix, yabxe neech ka buxkan okox kin chalpay max neech kin ejto kin tomna kal lju mil i soldadotsik, xi tl kal jun inik mil i soldadotsik?
42014032	Max yab neech kin ejto kin tomna, neech tm kin aba nin abatwlejiltsik abal kin konoy i lejkintalb tam na jn an pulek takix w bl ti tl ani anchan yabich tm ka pjxin.
42014033	Anchan jeye, max jun xita xi tattsik yab kin jila ejtal xowa in kool, yab neech kin ejto ka tsch ti exbal kal Nan.
42014034	An atem alwa, por max ka xawm, yabich xata ti neech ka yn.
42014035	Yab alwa abal an chabl nibal abal ka xukuxn an ti alwa lukuk, tokot abal ka wakl. Xin kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
42015001	Ejtal an bachkul jalbixtalb ani an walablomtsik, u uteltsik ba na Jess abal kin axtsi xanty in ulal.
42015002	Jaxtm tu kawyb na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik u junkunal kal an walablomtsik ani u kapul junax kal jajtsik.
42015003	Kwajbantsattsik tm jech an junbaxtalb kal na Jess:
42015004	—Jita xi tattsik, max in kool bo inik i borregotsik ani kin kibdha jn, yab neech kin jila xi che inik lajubelju ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh abal ka kale kin aliy na jn xi kibchonk asta kin ela?
42015005	Tam kin ela, kulbenek neech kin okobna
42015006	ani tam ka ulich tin kim, neech kin kaniy ejtal nin jabtsik, nin at kimdhtsik ani neech kin utsatsik ench: “Ki kulbtsik kal nan, abal u ela an borrego xu kibdhmal.”
42015007	Tu utsltsik abal u wachinal ms i kulbtalb t walki tam jun i walablom kin jilaich ti walablom k kal xi che inik lajubelju i atiklbtsik xi alwa ani yabtsik yejat kin jalkuy nin chalab.
42015008	Anl jeye, jitam mmlb xin kool lju i tipax tumn ani kin kibdha jn, yab neech kin letkoy jun i tajbaxtalb ani kin kwetoy putl an alt abal kin aliy kal yantam i kwenta asta kin ela?
42015009	Tam kin ela, neech kin kaniy ejtal nin jabtsik, nin at kimdhtsik ani neech kin utsatsik ench: “Ki kulbtsik kal nan abal u ela an tipax tumn xu kibdhmal.”
42015010	Tu utsltsik abal u kulbltsik tajat nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios tam jun i walablom kin jilaich ti walablom.
42015011	In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Jun i inik in kool chb in kwitliltsik
42015012	ani an kwitl xi tayl in utsa ench nin tta: “Tta, ti kin pidhaich an ti jiltsixtalb xi nan neye neech ku lujuy ku bachu.” Pidhantsik tm kal an ttalb xowa jajtsik in lujyal kin bachu.
42015013	Tam ti watch chb x a kts, an tayl kwitl in nuju ejtal xowa jaj in lujuy kin bachu. Kal an tumn xin bachu, kale ti kwajl pl chabl, xon ti kwajay kin atax paku ejtal an tumn xin bachmal.
42015014	Por tam tin pakmalich ejtal an tumn, wachin jun i pulek kanab ba jachan an chabl ani jaj tujey jeye kin acha i kanab.
42015015	Kale tm kin kontsi ti tojlb jun i inik xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl ani aban ti belkol olomtsik bin ale jachan an inik.
42015016	Kom u kalich tajat, in lakich max kin kaptsi tin kapwl an olomtsik, por yab u pidhnal kal ni jun xita.
42015017	Kwajay tm ti chalpax ench: “Yn i tojnaltsik bin kim nu tta u kapultsik alwa ani nan tech in kwajat tin chemel kal i kanab!
42015018	Neech kin witsiy bin kim nu tta ani neech ku utsa ench: Tta, u waltsmal na Dios ani tat teye;
42015019	yabich in tomnl kin bijyat ke in chakmlb kal tat; ti kin bachu neye jelti jun a tojnlil.”
42015020	In tuju tm an bl ani witsiy bin kim nin tta. Tam ti bl w ti tl, chutat kal nin tta ani kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb. jlch abal ka kale ti tamwb, mulukn ani chuchbayat.
42015021	In ulu tm ench jachan an kwitl: “Tta, u waltsmal na Dios ani tat teye, yabich in tomnl kin bijyat ke in chakmlb kal tat.”
42015022	Por an ttalb in utsa ench nin tojnliltsik: “Ka jixatsik jikat an alwa xeketlb, ka xeketliy ani ka pajbiy; ka kwajbantsi jeye ti aniyo bin tstsbixtal.
42015023	Ka tsidhatsik an baka xi ms kotsl ani ka chemdha. Neech tu kapul ani neech ki taja i ajib.
42015024	Pos jech nu chakmil kwajatwiik jelti max chemnek ani xo jelti max ejnekich ti t; kibchonkwiik ti kwajat ani xo i elaich.” Tujeytsik tm kin taja i ajib.
42015025	Tam ti jachan, an okox kwitl xeech ban alelb; por tam tu witslich ani exomich ti kunel ban at, in acha an tnlch ani an bixmch.
42015026	In kaniy tm jun ti b an tojnaltsik ani in konoy xanty exom ti tajnal.
42015027	Utsan ench kal jachan an tojnal: “Exom i ajib kom na kidhb witsch; na tta in abna ka chemdh an baka xi ms kotsl abal na kidhb witsiy juntam aniki.”
42015028	Por an okox kwitl chakuy ani kom yab in l ti ochel alt, kale ti pakabdhb kal nin tta abal ka ochich.
42015029	Jech an okox kwitl in utsa ench nin tta: “Tat, a chob xyich i tamub tu tjontsmal ani yab jayki tu chikat tajtsmal ta takixtal; por yab jayki tin ela pidhmal jun i chakam chibo abal ku chemdha ani ku ajbna kal nu jabtsik.
42015030	Por xo ulich jech na chakmil, xi ti atax pakwtsmal ta tumnal kal i junkux inik uxumtsik ani a chemdhantsal kin kapu an baka xi ms kotsl.”
42015031	Utsan tm ench kal nin tta: “Kwitl, tat echeki tech i kwajat kal nan ani ejtal xowa u kool, a dhabal teye.”
42015032	Por xo alwa ki taja i ajib ani ku kulb, pos na kidhb xi kwajatwiik jelti max chemnek, xo jelti max ejnekich ti t; kibchonkwiik ti kwajat ani xo i elaich.
42016001	Na Jess in utsa jeye ench nin exbaliltsik: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xin kool jun i oklek tojnal ani kale ti ltsinal an tumnladh inik ke exom ti atax pakwtsinal tin tumnal kal jech an oklek.
42016002	Abn tm ti kanyb kal nin ajtik ani utsan ench: “Janty in y xowa u achl in usnal kal tat ta kwenta? U l ti kin ltsi xo xanty a tajm kal nu tumnal, pos yabich ms neech ka ntsi ta oklek tojnal kal nan.”
42016003	An oklek tojnal in chalpay tm ench: “Janty xo neech ku taja abal nu ajtik neech ti kin kldhaich an tin tojnal? Nan yabich in likat ku taja u ale ani tidhetl u achl kin xechin tin konox tolmixtalb.
42016004	U chalpch xanty neech ku taja abal ku koy xita ti kin bachu tin kim tam kin kldhjich an tin oklek tojnal.”
42016005	Tujey tm kin kaniy juntsik ti juntsik xu jntsixtsik ban ajtiklb. Xi jidhtal in konoy ench: “Jatwa a jntsal nu ajtik?”
42016006	Tkoyat ench: “U jntsal bo inik barril ti asyte.” Utsan tm ench kal an oklek tojnal: “J kwajat an w xon ti dhutsadh abal anchan a jnl; ki buxkan jikat ani ka taja jn xin ulal abal tokot a jnl chab inik lju.”
42016007	Tayl in konoy jeye xin chabtal: “Ani tat, jatwa a jnl?” Jaj tkon ench: “Bo inik lejab i trigo.” In utsa jeye tm ench: “J kwajat an w xon ti dhutsadh abal anchan a jnl; ka taja t xon ti kin ulu abal tokot a jnl che inik i lejab.”
42016008	An ajtiklb in chuu abal jachan an oklek tojnal xi yab alwa, in chob tajat xan ti kin uwa abal yab ka xechin ti chojontlbl tayl. Pos an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, ms ja in chobtsik xan ti kin uwa kal nin kidhtaltsik k an atiklbtsik xu belom.
42016009	Nan tu utsltsik ench: ka yna xowa waach tech ban walbidh kayl abal ka koy a jabtsik, pos tam ka taley xowa waach tech ti kayl, ka wachin xita ti ki bachu ban at xi yab jayki u pakchunal.
42016010	Xita in tajl alwa kal xowa w in kool, anchan jeye neech kin taja kal xi yn ani xita in tajl yab alwa kal xowa w in kool, anchan jeye neech kin taja kal xi yn.
42016011	&Jaxtm, max yabtsik a tajl alwa kal xowa a kool tech ban walbidh kayl, awxe neech ki pidhan kal na Dios abal ka beletna xowa alwa?
42016012	Ani max yab ka beletna alwa xowa na Dios ti pidhl ka beletna, awxe neech ti ki pidha na Dios xowa ti bijtsmalich ke tat neech ka dhabalna?
42016013	Ni jun i tjontsix yab neech kin ejto kin tjontsi chb i ajtiklb; pos neech kin ata na jn ani neech kin kanidha na jn. Neech kin taja xowa ka utsan kal na jn ani na jn yab neech kin taja ti kij. Yab neech ka ejto ka tjontsi na Dios ani ka tjontsi jeye an tumnladhtalb.
42016014	An fariseotsik xi chene tajat kal an tumn, kwajat in achltsik ejtal jech ani in labdhnatsik na Jess.
42016015	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik a wynl ke i alwa iniktsik tajat tin tamt an atiklbtsik, por na Dios ti exlantsal an ta ejattaltsik; pos xowa u chutb kal an iniktsik ke alwa tajat, na Dios in pojkl.
42016016	Asta tam ti xechin na Juan xu pujax u ynal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani in oktsixtal an tiltsixtsik. Tam ti xechin na Juan xu pujax, tm ti tujey ti tilnal an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios ani ejtalki in tajl an chplb abal ka kwajch taknl kal na Dios.
42016017	Por ms yab tojlb ka kibchon an walki ani an chabl k yab ka tmun ejtal jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
42016018	Max jun i inik kin jila nin tomtal ani ka tomkin ti t kal keet i mmlb, u walbinalich tm kal i uxmbetalb ani xita ka tomkin kal an jiladh mmlb, u walbinalich jeye kal i uxmbetalb.
42016019	Twiik ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xu xeketlinal kal i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani in tajl i pakdha ajib tsudhey ka tsudhey.
42016020	T jeye ti kwajat jun i chojontl inik xu bijyb ta Lsaro, xi ttidh tajat ani u buxkanal chabl bin wilbil jachan an tumnladh inik.
42016021	Jech an chojontl inik, in lenl kin kapu nin mumats an kapnl xu kwajlanal tin l nin mesajil an tumnladh inik. Jech na Lsaro ttidh tajat ke asta an pikotsik u utel ti lekwtsinal kl an tin ttal.
42016022	Jun i kij, an chojontl inik chemech ani jn kal an tokat abatwletsik abal ka kwajay xon ti kwajat na Abraham. Chemech jeye an tumnladh inik ani jolyat.
42016023	Tam ti an tumnladh inik kwajat ti chojontlbl kal an yajal ban kibeltalb, in tela tekat ani in w chuu na Abraham junax kal na Lsaro.
42016024	Dhjaxin tm kawidh ench: “Tta Abraham, ti kin yajnantsi neye, ka aba na Lsaro abal kin axdha nin tsm nin tstsbixtal ba ja ani ka tsch ti kin chamambdhantsi tu lekb, pos yabich tajat u kuxyal an yajtsiktalb ba jech an kamal.”
42016025	Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “Chakmlb, ka chalpay abal tat a bachmalich xowa alwa tam ta xechink ti chabl ani na Lsaro mapal yajtsiktalb in bachmal. Xo, jaj exom in bachwal i kijidhtalb tech ani tat exom a bachwal i yajtsiktalb.
42016026	Ani tm jun, yab neech kin ejto ka watey xon ti tat i kwajat kom waach jun i owtsik jl ani yab xan ti ka watey tachan. Jaxtm, xi techtsik kwajat, yab neech kin ejto ka kale tachan max in ltsik ka kale ani xi tachantsik kwajat, yab neech kin ejto ka tsch tech max in ltsik ka tsch.”
42016027	In ulu tm ench an tumnladh inik: “Tta Abraham, tu kontsal p ti alwatalb abal ka aba na Lsaro bin kim nu tta,
42016028	xon ti kwajat b u kidhbtsik abal kin ltsitsik jech ani anchan, yabtsik ka tsch tech ban yajtsiktalb.”
42016029	Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “T in kooltsik an takixtalb xin dhutsmalt na Moiss ani an tiltsixtsik; awil kin exbantsitsik jaich!”
42016030	Tkon ench an tumnladh inik: “Ani kejle, tta Abraham, por max jn xi chemnekich ka ejech ti t ani ka witsiy xon ti jajtsik kwajat, neech tm kin jilatsik ti walablom.”
42016031	Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “Max yab in l kin exbantsitsik xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss ani an tiltsixtsik, yab jeye neech kin exbantsitsik maske jun i chemlom ka ejech ti t ani ka witsiy xon ti jajtsik kwajat.”
42017001	Na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Echeki waach xantokl tu walbindhb an atiklbtsik; por chojontl in chubl xita kin walbindha jun xita!
42017002	Ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin k kin walbindha jn ti b xi jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik.
42017003	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ka walbindha ni jun xita. Max jun a at kidhb ti waltsi, ka tawna, max kin exbay ani yabich ms kin taja an walastalb, ka pakwlantsi.
42017004	Maske ti waltsi bkl ta kts ani bkl ti ki utsa ench: “Yabich ms neech kin witsiy ku taja”, ka pakwlantsi.
42017005	An exbaltsik in utsa ench an Ajtiklb: —Ti ku tolmiy abal ku belmch ms.
42017006	Utsantsik tm ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Max i belomaktsik ela w, jelt in publ jun in itsch i mostasa, neech ka ejtotsik ka utsa jech an te xu bijyb sikmoro: “Ki puchun tech xon ta kwajat ani ki kale ta kubl ban pujal”; ani an te neech ti ki axtsi.
42017007	Max jun xita xi tattsik in kool jun i jolib ti jbal chabl o ti belkol konltsik ban alelb, tam ka witsch, yab in utsl ench: “Ki ochichich ani ki buxkan ta kapul.”
42017008	Yab in tajl anchan, tokot in utsl ench: “Ti kin lejkintsi an ti kapnl xowa neech ku kapu ani ki kwajay tech abal ti kin bntsi xowa ku yntsi, lejat in kwajat tin kapul ani tin uchal. Tayl, tm teye ki kapch ani ki uchch.”
42017009	Awxe neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb jech an tjontsix abal in taja xowa utsan? Yaba!
42017010	Anchan teye tattsik, tam ki okon ka taja ejtal xowa ti utsltsik na Dios, yejat ka ulutsik ench: “Waw u tjontsix por yab xata tu alwa, pos yab ms xata i tajmal, tokot xowa xi yejat ki taja.”
42017011	Tam ti na Jess in ntsch an bl abal Jerusaln, watey bin xmll an chabltsik xi Galilea ani xi Samaria.
42017012	Tam ti ulich ba jun i kwentsal, kale ti tamwb kal lju i iniktsik xin kool i kwajat atax tt, por yab utukn,
42017013	tokot dhjaxintsik kawidh ench: —Jess, Oktsix, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
42017014	Tam ti chutattsik kal na Jess, utsantsik ench: —Ki kaletsik tin tamt an pletsik abal ki chutat kal jajtsik. Lejat neech ti belal, jeleytsik.
42017015	Jn ti b xi jajtsik, tam tin chuu abal jeley, witsiy in pubdhantsal kawidh tin bij na Dios.
42017016	Tudhlan kutl asta chabl tin tamt na Jess abal kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb. Jech an inik, u kwajl Samaria.
42017017	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Yabxe p lju an yaultsik xi jeley? Jn ti kaletsik xi belju?
42017018	Tokot jech an pl inik witsiy abal kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
42017019	Utsan tm ench an inik kal na Jess: —Ki chakay ani ki kalch, i jeley abal i belmch.
42017020	Konyat na Jess kal an fariseotsik xowki neech ka tujey ti takix na Dios ani Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Xan tu takix na Dios, yab neech kin junu jelti jun xata xi tejwa.
42017021	Yab neech ka ulwat ench: “J kwajat” o “N kwajat”; pos na Dios tujenekich ti takix xon ta kwajattsik, por tokot u xalkanal bin itsch xita kl ti ka bachwat.
42017022	In utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Neech kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka lena ti kin chuu, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, maske jn tokot a kts, por yab neech ka ejto ti kin chuutsik kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech kin witsiy.
42017023	Taltsik neech ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo” o “Ka tela, n kwajat.” Por yab ki kaletsik ti kin aliy nibal ka wwnatsik.
42017024	Pos jelt xan tu lamkil an ly jun pake jun pake ban walki, anchan jeye neech ka tmun jachan i kij tam kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42017025	Por kool okox ku watna yn i yajtsiktalb ani neech kin pojk kal an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij.
42017026	Jelt xan ti tmun tam ti xechink na No, anchan jeye neech ka tmun tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42017027	Jech an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tokot in belltsik ti kapul ani ti uchal, u tomkinaltsik ani in pidhnltsik nin tsidhnil abal ka tomkin, asta tin bajaw xowki na No ti ochich ban tan at, tsch an chapik bal kij ani ejtaltsik chemech.
42017028	Anchan jeye ti tmun tam ti xechin na Lot. An atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tokot in belltsik ti kapul ani ti uchal, u chaum ani u njultsik, u m ani u kbal attsik;
42017029	por tam ti na Lot kale ba jachan an bitsow xi Sodoma, kwajlan i kamal ani i asufre xi tl walki ani ejtal chemdhtsik.
42017030	Anchan jeye neech ka tmun jachan i kij tam kin xalkan, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42017031	Jachan i kij, max jun xita kwajat bin b nin kim ani in kool xata tapadh alt, yab ka paay kin iki ani max jun xita kwajat bin ale, yab ka witsiy tin kim.
42017032	Ka chalpaytsik xanty in tamu nin tomtal na Lot.
42017033	Xita kin lena kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha; por xita kin kibdha, neech kin loo.
42017034	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jachan i akal, max kwajat chb ti wayal junax ba jun i waytalb, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
42017035	Max chb i mmlbtsik kwajat ti cheel junax, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
42017036	Max chb i iniktsik kwajat ti tojnal junax bin ale, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
42017037	Tam ti an exbaltsik in acha jech, konoxintsik ench: —Ajtik, jn ti neech ka tmun jech? Na Jess tkon ench: —Xonti kwajat an chemlom, taja neech ka junkun an tottsik.
42018001	Na Jess in kwajbantsitsik jun i junbaxtalb abal kin oktsitsik ke yejat ka lan echeki ani yab kin jilatsik tinb.
42018002	In utsatsik ench: —Twiik ti kwajat ba jun i bitsow jun i ljundhom xi yab in jiknl a Dios nibal in tajl ti kij ni jun xita.
42018003	Tyki ba jachan an bitsow, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i chemtsidh mmlb xu kalel kin chuu jachan an ljundhom abal in l ka kinandhantsat jun xita xi waltsink kl.
42018004	Owey ti pakabdhax an ti ljundhom, por yab u tajnal ti kij. Tayl in chalpay ench an ljundhom: “Maske yab u jiknl na Dios, nibal u tajl ti kij ni jun xita,
42018005	kom jech an chemtsidh mmlb, blki neech kin ntsi ti kin itixbdha, neech ku exbantsi abal yabich ms kin ntsi ti tsiil yab t ti kin chakdha.”
42018006	Ani in ulu ench an Ajtiklb: —Jech jaich in ulu an ljundhom xi yab alwa inik.
42018007	Awxe na Dios yab neech kin exbantsitsik jeye xi Jaj in takwymal, xi akal i kij u tawnb kawidh kl? Awxe neech kin koy ti aytsixtsik?
42018008	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke neech ti ki exbantsitsik jikatki. Por tam kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, blxe awil neech ku ela tech ti kayl xu belomtsik?
42018009	Na Jess in tila jeye jech an junbaxtalb abal taltsik an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat, in chalpayaltsik ke alwa iniktsik ani in pojkl xi keettsik. Ench tin ulu:
42018010	—Chb i iniktsik kale ti l ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios: jn i fariseo ani jn i bachkul jalbixtalb.
42018011	An fariseo kubat ti l ench: “Dios, tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb abal yab u junwal jelti xi keettsik, xu kw, xi yabtsik alwa inik ani xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal. Nibal ela u junwal jelti jech an bachkul jalbixtalb.
42018012	Nan in kl chbl ti semana ani tu pidhl xowa a lujyal ka bachu kal ejtal xowa u tl.”
42018013	Por an bachkul jalbixtalb, wki ja ti jilkon ani nibal ela in lenl kin tela walki, in pewyal tokot in tamt nin itsch ani in ulal ench: “Dios, ti kin kontsi neye ti yajnantsixtalb abal in walablom!”
42018014	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jech an bachkul tumn witsiy tin kim pakwlantsidh kal na Dios, por an fariseo yaba. Pos xita kin teka tinb, neech ka chak ani xita kin chaka tinb, neech ka tekb.
42018015	U utuntsb jeye ti chakamtsik na Jess abal kin puntsi tin kubak ani kin lbtaja, por tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, tujey kin kwiya an tsidhom chakamtsik.
42018016	Kanyattsik kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —Ka walka ka utey an chakamtsik xon tin kwajat, yab ka tamkuy, pos xita in jill tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, in junwal jelti chakam.
42018017	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita yab kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jelti jun i chakam, yab jayki neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
42018018	Konyat ench na Jess kal jun i oklek: —Alwa Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
42018019	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios.
42018020	A exllich an takixtalb: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita ani ka kakna na tta ani na nna.”
42018021	Utsan ench kal an inik: —Ejtal jech u tajl asta tin chipl.
42018022	Tam ti na Jess in acha xan ti tkon, in utsa ench: —Bl u kibel ka taja jun xata: ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik, anchan neech tm ka koy t walki xowa ms yn in jalbl, ki tsch tm ani ti kin wwna.
42018023	Tam ti an inik in acha jech, tepin tajat kom watats ti tumnladh.
42018024	Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal tepin tajat an tumnladh inik, in ulu ench: —Tojlb tajat abal jun i tumnladh inik kin walka tinb ka takyat kal na Dios!
42018025	Ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xin bij kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
42018026	Xin achatsik xowa in ulu na Jess, in ulu ench: —Tm, jita neech kin ejto ka loey?
42018027	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Xowa yab in ejtowal kin taja an iniktsik, na Dios in ejtowal kin taja.
42018028	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat.
42018029	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin jila in kim, in ttatsik, in kidhbtsik, in tomtal o in chakmiltsik abal kin tjontsi na Dios,
42018030	ms yn neech kin bachu ba jech an kayl ani ban t kayl xi neech ka tsch tayl, neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
42018031	Na Jess in kaniy plki xi lajuchb an exbal ani in utsatsik ench: —Xo u nechich Jerusaln, xon ti neech ka tmun ejtal xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik kal tu kwenta Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42018032	Neech kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik, neech kin labdhn, neech kin odhbijyat ani neech kin tubkayat.
42018033	Neech kin chawat ani neech kin chemdh; por tin xlb a kts, neech kin ejech ti t.
42018034	Por jajtsik yab in exbay xata jech xowa utsan kal na Jess, nibal in chobtsik xanty nu tiltsinal, pos jech xowa utsantsik, jaich xowa yabl neech kin ejtotsik kin exbay.
42018035	Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kunel ban bitsow xi Jerik, in ela jun i jokol buxl wal bl ti konox tolmixtalb.
42018036	Tam ti an jokol in acha abal exom ti watel yn i atiklbtsik, in konoy xanty exom ti tmnal.
42018037	Utsan abal exom ti watel taja na Jess xi Nasaret.
42018038	Tam tin acha jech, dhjaxin tm kawidh ench: —Jess, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
42018039	Xi ta ti neechtsik okox kwiyxin abal ka chamkan, por an jokol ms kawidh ti dhjaxin ench: —Tat, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
42018040	Kubey tm na Jess ani in abna ka iktat an jokol. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajat, in konoy ench:
42018041	—Janty a l tu tajtsi? An jokol tkon ench: —Ajtik, u l neye ti kin chuxindha.
42018042	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki chuxinich! I jeley abal i belmch.
42018043	Tmki jachan ti chuxin an jokol, in wwna tm na Jess ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios. Ejtal an atiklbtsik xin chuu jech, in pubdhantsitsik jeye tin bij na Dios.
42019001	Ulich tm na Jess ban bitsow xi Jerik ani tam ti exomich ti watel taja, ochich ba jech an bitsow.
42019002	Ba jech an bitsow, ta ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xin bij Sakeo, jaj u oklek kal xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb.
42019003	Na Sakeo in l kin exla na Jess, por yab in ejto kin chuu kom yn tajat an atiklbtsik ta ti neech ani tm jun, yab nakat na Sakeo.
42019004	jlch tm abal ka okxin ani abal kin ejto kin chuu na Jess, kadhiy ba jun i te kunat xon ti na Jess neech ka watey.
42019005	Tam ti na Jess watey taja, in tela tekat, in chuu na Sakeo ani in utsa ench: —Sakeo, ki paay jikatki, pos xo kool kin koych ta kim.
42019006	Paay tm jikatki na Sakeo ani kal yantam i kulbtalb ti bachwat na Jess.
42019007	Tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu jech, ejtal in tujutsik ti kawix, in ulaltsik abal na Jess kalnek ti koyol bin kim jun i walablom inik.
42019008	Kubey tm na Sakeo ani in utsa ench an Ajtiklb: —Ajtik, neech ku pidha an chojontltsik junax chejel xowa u kool ani max u kwymal jun xita, neech ku witsbantsi chl in yanl xowa u kwetsmal.
42019009	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Xo lowatichtsik xu kwajl bin kim na Sakeo, pos jaj u kidhtalb jeye kal na Abraham ani xo belmchich jelt xan ti belmmadh na Abraham.
42019010	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tsinek ku aliy ani ku loo an atiklbtsik xi kibchonkichwiik ti kwajat.
42019011	Kom kunatich ka ulich Jerusaln ani kom xi ta ti kwajattsik in achl xowa in ulal na Jess in chalpayal ke wich u kibel kin tuju ti takix na Dios, jaxtm na Jess in ntsi ti kw ani in tiltsitsik jech an junbaxtalb.
42019012	In utsatsik ench: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xu kidhtalb kal i pakdha takix. Jech an inik, kale w ba jun i pl bitsow abal ka bijyat ti pulek takix ani tayl ka witsiy ti takix.
42019013	Tam ti nechich ka kalch, in kaniy lju in tojnliltsik, in pidha juntsik ti b jun i patl tumn xi yn tajat in jalbl ani in utsatsik ench: “Ka tjondhatsik jech an tumn asta kin witsiy.”
42019014	Jech an inik u atnal kal an atiklbtsik xi taja bin bitswil. Jaxtm ti aban jeye chb x i iniktsik tin kuxmats abal ka kaletsik kin ulu ench: “Yab i kulbetnl jech an inik abal ti pulek takxal.”
42019015	Por blki bijyat ti pulek takix ani witsiy ba nin bitswil. Tam ti ulich, in abna ka kanyat an tojnaltsik xin jiltsmal an ti tumn abal kin chobna xatwa in tmal juntsik ti b kal jachan an tumn.
42019016	Ulich xi jidhtal ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, u tjondha na tumnal ani in ta ljujl ms in yanl.”
42019017	Tkoyat ench kal an pulek takix: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix; kom i tjon alwa kal w, neech tu pidha ti awiltalb ka takiy lju i bitsowtsik.”
42019018	Ulich jeye xin chabtal ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, u tjondha na tumnal ani in ta bl ms in yanl.”
42019019	Tkoyat jeye ench: “Tat neech tu kwajba ka takiy b i bitsowtsik.”
42019020	Ulich jeye jn ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, j kwajat na tumnal. U boliy kal jun peje i kudhkum ani u tapa;
42019021	kom tu jiknl abal tat kidhat tajat a kawyal. Pos tat a kniyal xowa yab tat a dhabal ani i junkux xon ti yab i mmadh.”
42019022	In ulu tm ench an pulek takix: “Tat yab i alwa tjontsix, kal xowa a ulal, u xalkanal abal i walbidh. Max a chob abal kidhat u kawyal, abal u kniyal xowa yab u dhabal ani in junkux xon ti yab in mmadh,
42019023	jantki p tm ti yab a kwajba nu tumnal xon tu tjondhb abal tam kin witsiy, ku bachu nu tumnal klich xowa in tmal?”
42019024	In utsatsik ench xi taja ti kwajat: “Ka kntsi an ti tumn ani ka pidha xin kool lju.”
42019025	Jajtsik in ulu ench: “Ajtik, por in koolich lju an tumn xi yn in jalbl.”
42019026	An pulek takix tkon ench: “Tu utsltsik ke xita in koolich, neech ka pidhan ms kal na Dios; por xita yab in kool, neech ka kntsin kal na Dios asta xowa w in kool.
42019027	Ani an atiklbtsik xi tin atl, xi yabtsik tin kulbetnl tin pulek takxal, ka tsidhatsik tech ani ka chemdhatsik tu tamt.”
42019028	Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, na Jess in ntsi an bl abal Jerusaln.
42019029	Tam ti exomich ti ulel ban bitsowtsik xi Betfaj ani Betania, kunat ban chn xu bijyb Olibos, in aba chb nin exbaliltsik
42019030	ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat kunat, tam ki ulichtsik taja neech ka ela wikats jun i burru xi yabl jayki pnadh. Ka wila ani ka tsidha tech.
42019031	Max ti konoy jun xita xantki ta will, ka utsatsik abal an Ajtiklb in yntsal.
42019032	Kale tm an exbaltsik ani anchan tin ela xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess.
42019033	Tam ti exomtsik in will an burru, konyat ench kal an dhabal: —Jantki ti exom a will an burru?
42019034	Jajtsik tkon ench: —An Ajtiklb in yntsal.
42019035	In jntsitsik tm na Jess, in tatlabiy an burru kal jajtsik nin kudhkmil ani in pumba na Jess.
42019036	Lejat na Jess neech punat, an atiklbtsik in nukl nin kudhkmil tin nakl an bl.
42019037	Tam ti exomich ti kunel bin pabl an chn xu bijyb Olibos, ejtal xita kl ti wewkmte in tuju ti dhajnaltsik kawidh kal i kulbxnich ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin chumaltsik.
42019038	In ulaltsik ench: —Lbtajadh an Pulek Takix xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Ka wachin i kijidhtalb t walki ani kin koy na Dios an labidh tokattalb!
42019039	Taltsik an fariseotsik xi ta ti kwajat ba jachan an atiklb in utsatsik tm ench na Jess: —Oktsix, ka utsatsik ka chamkan xi ti wwnltsik.
42019040	Por na Jess in tkoytsik ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max jech an atiklbtsik ka chamkan, an tujubtsik neech ka dhjaxintsik kawidh.
42019041	Tam ti ulchich kunat Jerusaln ani in chuu jachan an bitsow, na Jess ukin kal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja
42019042	ani in ulu ench: —Max an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jech an bitsow in ejtowalak kin exbaytsik jech a kts xan ti neech kin koytsik an kijidhtalb, alwaak tajat! Por yab in exbayaltsik.
42019043	Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam xi kl tu atnal neech ka mapyattsik kl, neech ka wiliyat ani neech ka pjeyattsik tki tki.
42019044	Neech ka pakwtsin an tin bitswil ani yab neech ka jilan ni jun i tujub tbx. Neech ka pakwat ejtal ani neech ka chemdh ejtal an atiklbtsik xi taja u kwajl kom yab in exbaytsik an kij xowki ti tsch ti lnb kal na Dios abal ka lowattsik.
42019045	Ochich tm na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tujey kin kldha xi ta ti kwajattsik taja ti chaum ani ti njultsik.
42019046	In utsatsik ench: —Ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh ti neech ka yn”, por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.
42019047	Tsudhey ka tsudhey na Jess u kwajl ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios; por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an oklektsik xi ba jachan an bitsow in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
42019048	Por yab in elatsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha, pos kal ejtal an atiklbtsik tu axtsinal xowa in oktsixnl na Jess.
42020001	Jun i kij, tam ti na Jess kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios in oktsal an atiklbtsik ani in tiltsal an ti alwa tilab, ulichtsik nin oklkil an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss junax kal nin oklkil an judotsik
42020002	ani utsan ench na Jess: —Ti ku utsa kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech. Jita ti pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb?
42020003	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Neech neye tu konoytsik jun xata ani ti kin tkoytsik.
42020004	Kal jita ti abnk na Juan ti pjal? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik?
42020005	Tujey tm ti kwlx jajkitsik ani u knxtsik ench: —Janty ki utsa? Max ki utsa ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech ti ku konoy ench: “Jantki ti yabtsik a beltsi?”
42020006	Ani max ki utsa ke kal i iniktsik ti abnk, an atiklbtsik neech ti ku chemdha kal i tujbaxtalb, kom in chobtsik alwa ke kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
42020007	Jaxtm tin ulutsik ke yab in chob xita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pjal.
42020008	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl ejtal jech.
42020009	Tujey tm na Jess kin tawna an atiklbtsik ani in kwajbantsi jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xin taya yn i akanlek i uba. Tayl in matixna jachan an alelb abal ka tjomn kal keettsik, an dhabal alelb kale w ti belal ani owey ti witsiy.
42020010	Tam tin bajch an kij xowki neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba jun in tojnlil abal ka kontsin jachan an mat alelb xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu an dhabal alelb; por an mat alelb in chaaw nin tojnlil an dhabal ani mapats tin aba ka kale.
42020011	An dhabal alelb in aba jun keet in tojnlil; por odhbijyat jeye, chawat ani mapats jeye ti aban ka kale.
42020012	An dhabal alelb in abna jun keet, por an mat alelb in chojbdha ani in kajna ka kale elb alelb.
42020013	Tayl an dhabal alelb in ulu ench: “Janty ku taja? Neech ku aba nu chakmil xu kanidhl tajat; tam ka chutat, neech xna ka kakn.”
42020014	Por tam ti an chakmlb chutat kal an mat alelb, tsxintsik ench: “Jech jaich neech kin dhabalna tayl an alelb; wana ki chemdha abal waw ki dhabalna tayl an alelb.”
42020015	Kldh tm an chakmlb ba jachan an alelb ani chemdh. Konoxin tm ench na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik neech ka tajtsintsik jachan an mat alelb kal an dhabal alelb?
42020016	Neech ka tsch ti chemdhbtsik jachan an mat alelb ani neech kin matintsi keet an ti alelb. Tam tin achatsik anchan, in ulutsik ench: —Ke yab kin walka na Dios ka tmun anchan!
42020017	Por teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Janty p tm in l kin ulu xi kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab? Awxe yab Nan tin till tam in ulal ench?: An tujub xin pojka an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ultalb.
42020018	Xita ka kwajlan ba jachan an tujub, muax neech ka kale ani max an tujub ka kwajlan ba jun xita, neech ka jilan jelti i pojodh.
42020019	An oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in lena kin yakwa na Jess tmki jachan abal in achatsik ke na Jess in ulu jech an junbaxtalb kal jajtsik tin kwenta; por in jiknl an atiklbtsik.
42020020	Abtsin tm na Jess ti kwchixtsik xin wynl u alwa iniktsik abal ka taktamiyat kal i tilabtsik ani ka tajan kin ulu jun xata yab alwa ani anchan, ka ejtowat ka utsbiyat ban pulek awiltalb.
42020021	Jaxtm ti konyat ench: —Oktsix, waw i chob ke xowa a ulal ani xowa a oktsixnl ejtal tsubax, Tat yab a dhl ti kwenta xanty in tajl o in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, Tat a oktsixnl kal i tsubaxtalb nin takixtalbil na Dios.
42020022	Ti ku utsa max alwa ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano, o yaba.
42020023	Por na Jess in chuu abal kwajatki ti taktamiyb ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta kwajattsik tin taktamiyal?
42020024	Ti kin ltsi jn i patl tumn. Jita j in wal xi jech kwajat chilbadh ban tumn ani jita in bij xi jech kwajat dhutsadh? Tkontsik ench: —An lej pulek takix romano.
42020025	Utsantsik tm ench: —Pos, ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu.
42020026	Ani yab ejtowat ka walbindh kal xowa Jaj in ulu tin tamt an atiklbtsik; tokot labantsik tam tin acha xan ti tkon ani chamkantsik.
42020027	Ms tayl, kale ti chutb na Jess kal chb x i saduseotsik. An saduseotsik in ulal abal an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t ani jaxtm ti utsan ench na Jess:
42020028	—Oktsix, na Moiss tu jiltsmal dhutsadh ench: Max jun i inik ka chemech ani yab kin jila ni jun i chakam kal nin tomtal, nin kidhb jachan an inik, yejat ka tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb ani kin koy i chakamtsik abal ka kwajay jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemnek.
42020029	Pos alwaich, twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. Nin jidhtal tomkin, por chemech an yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
42020030	Nin chabtal tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb, por chemech jeye ani yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
42020031	Tomkin jeye nin oxtal kal jachan an chemtsidh mmlb por yab jeye in koy in chakmil. Anchan tin taja ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik, chemechtsik por yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
42020032	Tayl, chemech jeye an mmlb.
42020033	Tam ka ejechtsik ti t, kal jowa an kwitl ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb abal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik tomkink kal jachan an mmlb?
42020034	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tech ti kayl, an iniktsik ani an mmlbtsik u tomkinal.
42020035	Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik xi takudh kal na Dios abal ka kwajch malill i kij t walki, yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin,
42020036	pos, yabich neech ka chemechtsik. Jajtsik neech ka kwajay jelti an tokat abatwletsik ani u chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios abal ejnekichtsik ti t.
42020037	Ani kal tin kwenta max an chemlomtsik u ejel ti t, yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik bin dhuslbil na Moiss xan ti tawn kal na Dios ban kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal, tam ti utsan ench?: “Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.”
