42020038	Na Dios, yab in Diosil i chemlomtsik; na Dios, in Diosil xi ejattsik; pos abal Jaj, ejtal kwajat ejat.
42020039	Utsan tm ench kal taltsik an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb: —Oktsix, alwaich xan ta ulu.
42020040	Ani yabich ms xita kwajay ti konkomix ni jun xata.
42020041	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin ulal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal an pulek takix Dabid?
42020042	Pos na Dabid in ulu jeye ench xon ti dhutsadh nin ajatlbiltsik: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt,
42020043	asta ke Nan tu tantsi xi ti atl.”
42020044	Pos max na Dabid in bijiy jeye tin Ajtik, tm, yab tokotki in kidhtal.
42020045	Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti kwajat ti axnal tam ti na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik:
42020046	—Ka koytsik i kwenta kal xowa in tajl an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, yab ka tajatsik xan ti jajtsik in tajl. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ka xechin kal in jochdha xekt ani in kulbetnltsik ka chapndh kal yantam i kaknaxtalb. In kulbetnltsik jeye ka buxkan ban ultalb koytalbtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani xon tu tajnal i kapch.
42020047	Jajtsik, in kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik; ani abal ka utsantsik ke jaj i alwa iniktsik, in tajl i nakdha lb. Jajtsik, jaich xi neech kin bachu ms pakdha an yajtsiktalb.
42021001	Na Jess kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios in tell xan ti an tumnladh iniktsik in balyal an tumn bin bl an pikbantsixtalb.
42021002	In chuu jeye xan ti jun i chojontl chemtsidh mmlb tin baliy taja chb i tsitsik tipax tumn xi yab in lej jalbl
42021003	ani in ulu ench na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jech an chojontl chemtsidh mmlb, ms ja yn in pidhna k xi keettsik;
42021004	pos xi keettsik tokot in pidhnl xowa yabich in yntsal; por an mmlb kal in chojontltal, in pidhna ejtal xowa ta tin kool abal kin watna kl na kts.
42021005	Taltsik kwajat in tilltsik an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulaltsik abal labidh tajat an tujubtsik xi kl ti tajadh ani ejtal xowakich xi pidhnats ti pikbaxtalb. Tam ti na Jess in acha anchan, in ulu ench:
42021006	—Neech kin bajaw i kij, tam ejtal jech xowa a chutaltsik neech ka pakwat ani yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx.
42021007	Konyat tm na Jess: —Oktsix, jowki neech ka tmun jech? Jantom exl neech ka wachin tam neech ka tmunich jech?
42021008	Na Jess in ulu ench: —Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta ani yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik. Pos yn neech ka tschtsik kin kambixna nu bij ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Nanich nin Kristo, exomich in bajwal an pakwenib.” Por yab ka wwnatsik.
42021009	Tam ka achatsik exom i pjxtalb, yab ki jikeytsik; pos jech kool ka tmun okox, por jachan i kij yabl neech ka ulich an pakwenib.
42021010	In ntsi kin ulu ench: —An atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jun i pulek chabl, neech ti pjx kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajltsik pl chabl; ani jun i pulek takix, neech ti pjx kal keet i pulek takix.
42021011	Neech ka lwkin an chabl, neech ka wachin i kanab, neech ka wachin i yawlchtsik tki tki, neech ka wachin i kakadh telomtalb walki ani yn i exltsik.
42021012	Por tam yabl watenek jech, neech ki yakwantsik ani neech ki atantsik. Neech ki jntsik ta ljundhb ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, neech ki balyattsik ban wikaxte, neech ki jntsik tin tamt an pakdha takix ani tin tamt an pakdha awiltalb kal Nanki tu kwenta.
42021013	Anchan, neech ka ejtotsik ti kin tila.
42021014	Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax okox xan ti neech ki tkon abal ka lootsik tab,
42021015	pos Nan neech tu pidhatsik ti tilab ani ti chalab xan ti ki tkon abal ni jun xita xi ti atltsik, yab kin ejto ti ki tomnatsik.
42021016	Por taltsik xi tattsik, neech ka pidhn kal nin ttatsik, taltsik kal nin kidhb, taltsik kal nin exlowl ani taltsik kal nin jab. Neech ki chemdh taltsik xi tattsik
42021017	ani neech ki atantsik kal Nanki tu kwenta kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom;
42021018	por yab neech ka kibdhatsik ni jun a xil xa kool ba na k.
42021019	Max ka kuxuytsik ejtal jech, neech ka bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
42021020	Tam ka chuutsik abal an bitsow xi Jerusaln wilidhich tu kyb kal an soldadotsik, ka chobna abal kunatich i kij neech ka pakwat.
42021021	Jachan i kij, xi kwajattsik Judea, yejat ka kaletsik ti chinkonal ban chnlom; xi kwajattsik ban bitsow Jerusaln, ka kaletsik taja ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiytsik ban bitsow.
42021022	Abal jachan i kij, mapal yajtsiktalb neech ka wachin, pos anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.
42021023	Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi kwajat kodh o u tsutsdhom ti tsitsik chakam jachan i kij! Pos jachan i kij, neech ka wachin jun i pulek yajtsiktalb tech ti chabl ani neech ka pidhan jun i pulek yajtsiktalb an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.
42021024	Taltsik neech ka chemdh ban pjxtalb ani xi keettsik neech ka jn wikats tki tki ban pl chabl abal ka tajantsik ti jolib. An atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo neech ti takixtsik ban bitsow xi Jerusaln ani neech kin atax tajtsi ejtal xowakich asta kin bajaw xowki neech ka kubdhtsik ti takix.
42021025	Jachan i kij, neech ka wachin i exltsik ba na kts, ba na ch ani ba na ttsik; tech ti chabl an atiklbtsik neech ka ukpindh ani neech ka jikeytsik tam kin acha ti bososl an ja ban pujal ani ti mlk.
42021026	Neech ka puteytsik kal an jkib tam kin chalpay xanty neech ka tmun tech ban kayl; pos asta an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki neech ka yoywat.
42021027	Neech tm kin chutat, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik tam in tl ba jun i tokow kal nu chp ani kal nu labidh tokt.
42021028	Tam ka tujch ti tmnal jech xowa in kwajat tu utsltsik, ka likedhatsik tab ani ki kulb, pos kunatich i kij neech ki lowattsik.
42021029	Utsantsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Ka telatsik in akan an igo o keet i te.
42021030	Tam ka chuutsik exomich ti eblinal nin xekl, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
42021031	Anchan jeye, tam ka chuchtsik abal exomich ti tmnal xowa in kwajat tu utsl, ka chalpaytsik abal kunatich i kij neech ka tujey ti takix na Dios.
42021032	Tsubax tu utsltsik ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun okox ani tm neech ka chemech an atiklbtsik xi xo kwajat ejat jech i kij.
42021033	An walki ani an chabl neech ka wixk, por xowa u ulal, anchan neech ka tmun.
42021034	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab tokotki ka chalpm ta kapul, ta uchal ani xowa a kulbetnltsik tajat tech ti kayl abal tam kin bajaw jachan an kij yab ki yakwantsik i ukpidh,
42021035	jelt xan tu yakwnal jun xita kal jun i paltsixtalb, pos anchan ti neech ka ulich jachan an kij ba ejtal xu kwajltsik putlki tech an kayl.
42021036	Ki kwajaytsik echeki i tojojodh, ki lantsik echeki abal ka ejto ka jeka ejtal jech an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka watey ani ka ejto ki uteytsik kal ni jun i jkib tu tamt tam kin tsch jun Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
42021037	Na Jess u oktsix tam kij ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tam ka jikwchinich u kalel ban chn xin bij Olibos abal ka koych taja.
42021038	Tsudhey ka tsudhey u ulel dhajawe an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal kin achatsik xanty in ulal na Jess.
42022001	Tam ti jachan i kij, exomich ti kunel an ajib xowki tu tajnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ka kapat junax kal an borrego xu chemdhb tam exom an ajib xu bijyb paskwa.
42022002	Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha chinatki na Jess kom in chejnltsik an atiklb.
42022003	Ochich tm an lej atax bin itsch na Judas xu bijyb jeye Iskariote, jech na Judas, jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik.
42022004	Na Judas kale kin chuu an oklek pletsik ani xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, kwin kal jajtsik ani in utsa xan ti neech kin pidhatsik an ta Jess abal kin chemdha.
42022005	Jajtsik kulbtsik ani utsan na Judas abal neech ka pidhan ti tumn;
42022006	na Judas in tokoy ani in tuju tm kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin pidhna na Jess tam yab waach yn i atiklbtsik.
42022007	In bajaw in ktsjil an ajib xowki tu tajnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ka kapat junax kal an wiyadh borrego xu chemdhb abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
42022008	Na Jess in aba tm na Pedro ani na Juan ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ka tojojoy an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
42022009	In konoytsik ench na Jess: —Jn ta l ku kale ki tojojoy?
42022010	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam ki ochichtsik ban bitsow, neech ka ela jun i inik xin nedhl jun mul i ja. Ka wwnatsik asta ban at xon ti ka ochich
42022011	ani ka utsa ench an dhabal at: “An Oktsix in l kin chobna xon ti kwajat an alt xon ti neech kin kapu an wiyadh borrego junax kal nin exbaliltsik kal tin kwenta an paskwa.”
42022012	Neech tm ti ki ltsitsik jun i alt plek ba jun i pntsx at xi kwajat tojojodhich; ka tojojoy taja an tokat kapxnich.
42022013	Kaletsik tm ani anchan tin ela ejtal xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess ani in lejkchtsik tm an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
42022014	Tam tin bajch an ora, na Jess ani nin abatwlejiltsik buxkan ban mesa.
42022015	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —U lenmal tajat ku kapu kal tattsik jech an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa tam yabl in chemdhats!
42022016	Pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku ajbna ms an paskwa, asta tam ka tjanich xan ti yejat xon tu takix na Dios.
42022017	In tyna tm jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in ulu ench: —Ka bachutsik jech ani ka ucha wetsik wetsik,
42022018	pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta tam u takixich na Dios.
42022019	Tayl, in tyna jeye an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jech jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna ka chemdh abal tattsik ta alwabl. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.
42022020	Anchan jeye tin taja kal an yajtsik uxnl tam ti okonichtsik ti kapul ani in ulu ench: —Jech an yajtsik uxnl, jaich nu xichl xi neech ku wakla abal ku jalbiy kl na walabtsik. Jaich an t lejkintalb xi neech ku taja abal tattsik ta alwabl.
42022021	Por xo, an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh, tech kwajat ti kapul kal Nan ban mesa.
42022022	Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kool ku tamu xan tin bijtsidh ke yejat ku watna; por chojontl in chubl an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
42022023	Tujey tm ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Jita awil xi neech an ti pidhnax?
42022024	Tayl, an exbaltsik kwajay ti kwlx abal in l kin chobnatsik xitam j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik.
42022025	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —An pakdha takix xi tech ti kayl, chapiktsik tajat in takyal nin bitswil ani an oklektsik xi taja, u bijyb ti alwa iniktsik.
42022026	Por tattsik yab yejat ka taja anchan, tokot ka tajatsik ench: Xita ms uluts xi tattsik, yejat ka kwajay jelti xi ms tayl ani xu takix, yejat ka kwajay jelti xu tjontsix.
42022027	Pos jita j xi ms uluts, xu buxkanal ti kapul ban mesa o xu tjontsix? Yabxe jaich xu buxkanal ti kapul ban mesa? Por Nan in kwajat kal tattsik jelti xu tjontsix.
42022028	Tattsik echeki tin juniknmal ani yab i kuxkulmadhtsik tam tu watna xowakich i yajtsiktalb.
42022029	Jaxtm, neech tu kwajbatsik ta takix jelt xan ti nu Tta tin kwajbmal tin takix
42022030	abal ki kapchtsik ani ki uchchtsik ba nu mesajil xon ti Nan neech tin takix. Neech jeye ki buxkantsik ba tokat kwajtalb abal ka ljundha nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
42022031	In ulu jeye ench an Ajtiklb: —Simn, Simn, ka acha, an lej atax in konymal i awiltalb abal ti ki tiniytsik jelt xan tu tinyb an trigo;
42022032	por tu kontsintsmalich abal yab ka jila ta belom. Por tam ka chalpay abal yab alwa xowa a taja ani ki witsiy jun kal Nan, ka tolmiy na at kidhbtsik abal ti kin belatsik tokotki Nan.
42022033	Utsan tm ench kal na Simn: —Ajtik, in kwajat tojojodh abal kin kale junax kal Tat ban wikaxte ani asta abal kin chemdh junax kal Tat.
42022034	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Pedro, tsubax tu utsl ke xo tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
42022035	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tam tu abatsik ka tila an alwa tilab ani yab a jna i morrl, nibal in bl i tumn, nibal a pajabtsik, a yntsixe xata? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Ni jun xata.
42022036	Utsantsik tm ench: —Por xo yab anchan, max jun xita in kool i morrl, kin jna ani kin jna jeye in bl i tumn. Xita yab in kool i macht, kin nuju nin kk xekt abal kin chaay.
42022037	Pos tu utsltsik ke kool ka tmun kal Nan jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Ajyat jeye jelti max yab i alwa inik.” Pos ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta, kool ka tmun anchan.
42022038	In ulutsik tam ench: —Ajtik, j kwajat chb i macht. Na Jess tkon ench: —Lejatich.
42022039	Kale tm na Jess, kale ban chn xu bijyb Olibos jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl echeki ani junikn kal nin exbaliltsik.
42022040	Tam ti ulichtsik taja, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ki lan abal yab ki tatsik kal an lej atax.
42022041	Tayl wm tm na Jess ba nin exbaliltsik, nin owl jaich xna jelti xon tu kwajlanal jun i tujub tam ka kwin kal jun xita ani tudhlan taja ti l.
42022042	Ench tin ulu: —Tta, max Tat a l ka chuu yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka ejto ti kin wixkintsi; por yab ka tjan xan ti Nan u l, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
42022043	Xalkan tm jun i tokat abatwle xi tl walki abal ka pidhan kl ti chplb.
42022044	Ani kom plek tajat an yajtsiktalb xi kwajat in achl na Jess, ms chapikich u l ani nin chakb jykijich i xich u tuknal chabl.
42022045	Tam ti chakay xon ti kwajat an ti l, witsiy xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela kom yab in ejtmaltsik kin kuxuy an tepintalb.
42022046	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki ta wayaltsik? Ki chakay ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax.
42022047	Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess, tam ti ulich yn i atiklbtsik. Okox ti tl xu bijyb ta Judas xi jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani utey ba na Jess abal kin chuchbay.
42022048	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Judas, kal jun i chuchbaxtalb ti neech tin pidhna kin chemdh Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik?
42022049	Xi ta ti kwajattsik kal na Jess, tam tin chuu xanty exom ti tmnal, konoxintsik ench: —Ajtik, ki tomnaxe kal an macht?
42022050	Jn ti b xi jajtsik in taktsi tin tojnlil an oklek pletsik, in taktsi tin ejt xuchun.
42022051	Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Jila kwajat, yab ka tajatsik anchan. In taktsi tm na Jess tin xuchun nin tjontsixil an oklek pletsik ani in jeldhantsi.
42022052	Tayl in utsatsik tm ench an oklek pletsik, nin oklkiltsik an belkol at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani nin oklkil an judotsik xi ulnektsik kl ti yakwnal: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i te, kal i macht abal ti kin yakwa, jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun i kw?
42022053	Tsudhey ka tsudhey in kwajinek kal tattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani yab tin takmaltsik; por xo in bajmalich na orajiltsik abal ka taja xowa na l ani xowki an lej atax, xu takix ban jikwaxtalb neech ka walk kin xalka nin awiltal.
42022054	Yakwan tm na Jess ani jn bin kim in oklkil an pletsik. Na Pedro wwnaxin wki.
42022055	Bin kim in oklkil an pletsik, jokp i kamal chejel elb, buxkantsik malill ban kamal ani na Pedro buxkan jeye taja kal jajtsik.
42022056	Tmki jachan, jun i mmlb xu tojnal ba jachan an at chutat kl na Pedro buxl bin wl an kamal; tam ti chutat, teloloyat alwa ani in ulu ench an mmlb: —Jech an inik junax jeye ti xeech kal na Jess.
42022057	Por na Pedro in ulu ke yab tsubax. Ench tin ulu: —Mmlb, yab u exll.
42022058	Ms tayl, chutat jun kal keet ani utsan ench: —Tat jaych teye a kidhtal. Por na Pedro in ulu ench: —Paylomlb, yab u kidhtal.
42022059	Jun i ora xna ms tayl, in witsko jun jun xita kin ulu ench: —Tsubax kejle, jech an inik ta jeye ti kwajat junax kal na Jess, pos jaj Galilea jeye ti tl.
42022060	In ulu tm ench na Pedro: —Jab, yab u chob xanty i kwajat a till. Tmki jachan, tam ti na Pedro bl kwajat ti kw, dhjan an pekel.
42022061	Chawkin tm an Ajtiklb ani teloloyat na Pedro. Na Pedro in chalpay tm xanty usnk kal an Ajtiklb: “Xo, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.”
42022062	Kale tam na Pedro ani ukin tajat.
42022063	Na Jess u labdhnb ani u chawb kal an iniktsik xi kl ti belkmte.
42022064	U putsuntsb tin wal, u chawb ani u usnal ench: —Ti ku utsa xita ti chaaw!
42022065	Ani yn i odhbijixtalb u usnal.
42022066	Tam ti tsudhey, junkun nin oklkiltsik an judotsik, nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb. Jn na Jess tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb ani taja, konyat ench:
42022067	—Ti ku utsa, tatxe ni Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix? Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Max tu utsatsik abal Nan, yab neech ti kin beltsi.
42022068	Max tu konoytsik xata, yab neech ti kin tkoytsik nibal neech ti kin walkatsik.
42022069	Por asta xo, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik neech kin buxkan bin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
42022070	Tayl konoxin tm ejtaltsik ench: —Tatxe p tm ni Chakmlb kal na Dios? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik a ulal abal anchan.
42022071	In ulutsik tm ench: —Yabich ms i yntsal i lnaxtsik. Pos i achaich xan ti Jaj tu kw.
42023001	Chakaytsik tm ejtal ani in jnatsik na Jess tin tamt na Pilato.
42023002	Tam ti tajaich tin kooltsik, tujey tm kin lnatsik ench: —I elmal abal jech an inik in pidhkwliyal an atiklbtsik xi waw i kidhtal. In ulal ke yab yejat ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano ani in ulal jeye ke Jajich nu Kristo, jun i Pulek Takix, xi takudh kal na Dios.
42023003	Konyat tm ench kal na Pilato: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Na Jess tkon ench: —Tat a ulal abal anchan.
42023004	Na Pilato in utsa tm ench an oklek pletsik ani an atiklbtsik: —Yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb jech an inik.
42023005	Por jajtsik in ntsal kin ulu ms kawidh ench: —Exom in pjxlindhl ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Judea. Tujey ban chabl xi Galilea ani xo techich jeye exom in tajl.
42023006	Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, in konoytsik max jech an inik Galilea u kwajl.
42023007	Tam tin acha abal Galilea u kwajl, in abna ba na Erodes, an pulek awiltalb xi Galilea, xi ta jeye ti kwajat Jerusaln jachan i kij.
42023008	Tam ti na Erodes in chuu na Jess, kulb tajat; pos na Erodes kejle owenekich in lenl kin exla, kom in achl u tilnal ani in l kin chuu tam in tajl jun i labidh labandhaxtalb.
42023009	Yn xata konyat na Jess kal na Erodes, por yab in tkoy ni jn.
42023010	T jeye ti kwajattsik taja in oklkil an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, xi kl tu lnb chapik na Jess.
42023011	Tm, na Erodes ani nin soldadojiltsik yabtsik in kakna na Jess. Ani abal kin labdhnatsik, in xeketliy kal i alwa kudhkum jelti xin ynl jun i pulek takix. Tayl in abna jun ka jn na Jess ba na Pilato.
42023012	Asta tam ti jachan i kij, na Pilato ani na Erodes in koytsik i junaxtalb; pos tam ti kwajatwiik, u txtsik.
42023013	Na Pilato in junku tm nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, an awiltalbtsik xu takix ba jachan an bitsow, an atiklbtsik
42023014	ani in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik tin tsidhantsi jech an ti inik, a ulaltsik abal in pidhkwliyal an atiklbtsik, por nan u ljundhmalich ta tamttsik ani yab u eltsi ni jun i walastalb xi tattsik a utsl in tajm.
42023015	Nibal kal na Erodes yab eltsin, pos jich jun tu witsbantsmal. A tellichtsik abal yab in tajmal ni jun xata xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml.
42023016	Neech ku ulu ka kwadhan ani tm neech ku walka.
42023017	Tam exom an ajib, na Pilato in ujnmal kin walka jun i wiknl.
42023018	Por ejtal tujeytsik ti dhajnal kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha jachan an inik! Ani ka walka na Barrabs!
42023019	Jech na Barrabs, balidh ban wikaxte abal chemdhaxnk ba jun i pjextalb xin tajmal tam tin tomna an awiltalbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow.
42023020	Na Pilato in lwiik kin walka na Jess ani in tawna jun an atiklbtsik.
42023021	Por jajtsik ms kawidh tin ulutsik ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
42023022	Na Pilato in witsko jun tin oxtsl kin utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Jantom walastalb in tajmal? Nan yab u eltsal ni jun in walab xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml. Neech ku ulu ka kwadhan ani tm neech ku walka.
42023023	Por jajtsik in ntsi kin konoy abal ka chemdh na Jess pajkidh ban peltsidh te; kom kawidh u dhajnal an atiklbtsik ani nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, exbantsat xowa nin konyaltsik.
42023024	In tokoy tm na Pilato kin taja xan tu kontsinal,
42023025	in pidhna na Jess abal ka tajtsin xan tin konyal an atiklbtsik ani in walka an inik xu kontsinal. Jech an inik xi walk, ta ti kwajat ti wiknl abal chemdhaxnk ba jun i pjextalb.
42023026	Tam tu nedhbich na Jess abal ka pajkiyat ban peltsidh te, yakwan jun i inik xu kwajl Sirene xu bijyb ta Simn. Jech na Simn u witslich bin ale, tajan kin kitna an peltsidh te ani ka kale in kitm in aykm na Jess.
42023027	Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wewkmte ani yn i mmlbtsik u uknal ani u tepinaltsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
42023028	Por teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Mmlbtsik xi kwajl Jerusaln, yab ti kin ukintsi, ka ukintsi tab ani na chakmiltsik.
42023029	Pos neech kin bajaw i kij tam neech ka ulwat ench: “Kijidh tajat abal an mmlbtsik xi yab u knal, xi yab jayki in wachiymal ani nibal tsutsudhommadhtsik.”
42023030	An atiklbtsik neech tm kin tuju kin ulutsik ench: u kwajlanalak an pakdha chn abal ti ku tuchiy. Ani neech jeye kin ulutsik ench: u kwajlanalak an tsitsik chn abal ti ku china.
42023031	Pos max Nan, xi yab in walbidh in tajtsinal jech, janty neech ka tajtsin xi walbidh?
42023032	T jeye tu nedhb chb i atax iniktsik abal ka chemdh junax kal na Jess.
42023033	Tam ti ulichtsik ban chabl xu bijyb tin Beklk in k i chemlom inik, pajkiyatich tm na Jess ban peltsidh te. Pajkiyat jeye ba peltsidh te chablam an atax iniktsik, jn tin ejt na Jess ani jn tin kwatab.
42023034	Tam ti exomich ti pajkiyb na Jess ban peltsidh te, in ulu ench: —Tta, ka pakwlantsitsik, pos yab in chob xanty exom in tajltsik. An soldadotsik, abal kin wlchxnantsi tin kudhkmil na Jess, ubtintsik abal kin chuu xita kin lujuy kin ta.
42023035	An atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat taja ti telom, asta u labdhnb na Jess kal an awiltalbtsik ani in ulaltsik ench: —In lomal keettsik, kin loo jeye xo tinb max tsubax lejtal Jajich nu Kristo xi takudh kal na Dios.
42023036	U labdhnb jeye na Jess kal an soldadotsik, u uteltsik kin pidha kin ucha ti jiliy yajtsik uxnl
42023037	ani in utsltsik ench: —Max Tatich lejtal nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik, ka loo xo tab!
42023038	Kwajb bin k an peltsidh te jun i dhuslab xi kwajat dhutsadh griego, latn ani ebreo, xin ulal ench: “Jech jaich nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
42023039	Jn ti b an atax iniktsik xi ta ti kwajat jeye pajkidh ban peltsidh te, u odhbijix ench: —Max Tatich lejtal ni Kristo, ka loo tab ani ti ku loo weye!
42023040	Por na jn in kwiya xi odhbijxin, in utsa ench: —Yab a jiknl a Dios, maske i kwajat teye a tamtm jaychki an yajtsiktalb?
42023041	Waw in tomnl wa ki bachu jech an yajtsiktalb kom exom i jalbiyal an walastalb xi tajmal; por jech an inik, yab in tajmal ni jun xata walats.
42023042	In ulu tm ench an inik xi kwiyxin: —Jess, ti kin chalpay neye tam ki tujch ta takix.
42023043	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke xoich neech ki kwajay junax kal Nan ban kijidhtalb xi walki.
42023044	Tam ti chejelich xna a kts jikwchin ani putl an chabl jilkon jikwax asta x i wkal.
42023045	Na kts yab tajkan ani xlan an tolow kudhkum xi ta ti palat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Chab peje ti jilkon.
42023046	In ulu tm kawidh na Jess ench: —Tta, ka bachu nu ejattal. Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, chemchich tm.
42023047	Tam ti an oklek soldado romano in chuu ejtal xanty tmun, in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech jaich jun i lujat inik.
42023048	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat ani in chuutsik xanty tmun, kaletsik tm ani in pewyaltsik nin tamt itsch kal tin kwenta an tepintalb.
42023049	Por ejtal nin jabtsik na Jess ani an mmlbtsik jeye xi juniknaxnktsik asta Galilea, jilkontsik wki in tell ejtal xowa tmun.
42023050	T ti kwajat jun i inik xi alwa inik tajat ani lujat xu bijyb ta Jos. Jech an inik u kwajl ban bitsow Arimatea, an bitsow xi kwajat Judea. Jaj u kidhtalb jeye kal nin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
42023051	Jech na Jos, kwajat jeye in aytsm xowki neech kin tujch ti takix na Dios ani jaxtm jaj yab in kldhl ti alwa xowa in taja an Junkulom Awiltalb.
42023052	Kale kin chuu na Pilato ani in kontsi an tin tul na Jess.
42023053	Tam tin pabmich ban peltsidh te, in boliy kal jun i dhak kudhkum ani in kwajbaich tm ban jlimtalb xi ta ti cholkadh ba jun i tujub chn, xon ti yab jayki jolidh bl ni jun xita.
42023054	Tam ti jachan, jaich nin ktsjil xowki tu tojojoyb ejtal xowa neech ka yntsin tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos jun tsudhelom, jachich nin ktsjil an koyxnich.
42023055	An mmlbtsik xi tsinek junax kal na Jess asta Galilea, kaletsik, in chuu an jlimtalb ani in chuutsik jeye xan ti tapantsat an tin tul na Jess.
42023056	Tam ti witsiytsik tin kim, in lejkiytsik i niwiytalb, i majuxtalb ani koychtsik tin ktsjil an koyxnich, jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb ke yejat ka tajan.
42024001	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, an mmlbtsik xin juniknmaltsik na Jess, kale jun ban jlimtalb dhajawe ani in jnatsik i niwiytalb xin lejkiymal. Junikntsik jeye kal keet i mmlbtsik.
42024002	Tam ti ulichtsik ban jlimtalb, in chuu abal an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb, wkodh.
42024003	Ochichtsik, por yab in ela nin tul na Jess.
42024004	Jikeytsik tajat, ke nibalich in chalpayal xanty kin taja. Jun jiktowle tin chuutsik chb i iniktsik kubutsik tin wl jajtsik, xeketlidh kal i chaxixl kudhkum.
42024005	Kom an mmlbtsik jikey tajat, kutpan asta chabl; por utsantsik ench kal jachan an iniktsik: —Jantki ta ayal ban chemlomtsik xi kwajat ejat?
42024006	Yab waach tech, ejnekich ti t. Ka chalpay xan ti utsatsik tam ti Jaj bl kwajat Galilea,
42024007	tam tin ulu ke Jaj, xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik neech ka pidhn ban walablom iniktsik, neech ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani tin xlb a kts neech ka ejech ti t.
42024008	An mmlbtsik in chalpay tm xanty in ulmal na Jess
42024009	ani tam ti witschtsik xon ti kwajat xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani ejtal xi ms, in tiltsitsik ejtal xowa in chuu.
42024010	Xita kl ti ltsintsik jech an ti tilab an abatwletsik, jaich na Mara Magdalena, na Juana, na Mara nin nna na Jakobo ani xi keettsik jeye an mmlbtsik.
42024011	Por an abatwletsik yab in taja ti kij xowa in ulu an mmlbtsik ani yab in beltsi.
42024012	Por na Pedro kale adhik ban jlimtalb. Tam ti ulich taja ani in tela alt, in chuu abal yab waach nin tul na Jess, tokot in chuu ta ti kwajat an dhak kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh an tin tul na Jess. Na Pedro labnk tajat ti witsiy tin kim tam tin chuu xanty tmnk.
42024013	Jaychki jachan a kts, chb xu belnal kl na Jess neech ti bl abal neechtsik ban kwentsal xin bij Emas, nin owl, jaich xna lajujn i kilmetro abal Jerusaln.
42024014	In tilltsik ti neech ejtal xanty tmun kal tin kwenta na Jess.
42024015	Ani lejat neechtsik in till ani in kwlxnl jech, utukntsik kal na Jess ani beley junax kal jajtsik.
42024016	Por maske in chutaltsik, yab u pidhnal kin exla max jaich na Jess.
42024017	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty p a tilltsik? Ani jantki ta tepinaltsik?
42024018	Jn ti b xi jajtsik, xu bijyb ta Cleofas, tkon ench: —Ejtal an atiklbtsik in chob xanty tmnk Jerusaln jech i kij, tokot Tat xi taja teye ta kwajat yab a chobnmal?
42024019	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty p tmnk? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Jess xi Nasaret pidhn kal nin oklkil an pletsik ani kal ni awiltalbiltsik abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
42024020	Jech na Jess, jaich jun i tiltsix xin kool tajat i awiltalb kal xowa in tajl ani kal xowa xin ulal tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt jeye an atiklbtsik.
42024021	Waw i chalpaymal max Jajich xi neech ti ku loo ejtal waw xu israelita ani xo watenekich x a kts ti chemdhats.
42024022	Por taltsik i mmlbtsik xi waw i kidhtal tu labandhmal, pos kalnektsik dhajawe ban jlimtalb
42024023	ani kom yab in eltsi an tin tul na Jess, tam ti witsiytsik tu utsa abal in chumal i tokat abatwletsik xi usnktsik kl abal na Jess ejnek ti t.
42024024	Tayl kale jeye chb x ni kidhtaltsik ban jlimtalb ani anchan tin elatsik xan tin ulmal an mmlbtsik, por yab in chuutsik na Jess.
42024025	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabtsik tajat a ejtowal ka exbay ani tojlb tajat ka belatsik xowa in ulmal an tiltsixtsik!
42024026	Yabxe in ulmal an tiltsixtsik ke kool kin watna okox ejtal jech an Kristo abal tayl kin bachu nin kaknabl?
42024027	Tujey tm ti wiltsinaltsik ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xi kal Jaj tin kwenta, in tuju kal nin dhutsadh wil na Moiss ani tayl kal ejtal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik.
42024028	Tam ti ulich ban kwentsal xon tin ulmal neechtsik, na Jess in wyna jelti max neech kin ntsi an bl.
42024029	Por in pakabdha abal ka jilkon jeye kal jajtsik, ench tin utsa: —Ki jilkon teye kal waw, pos dhamlich ani exomich ti jikwchinal. Ochich tm na Jess abal ka jilkon kal jajtsik.
42024030	Tam ti kwajatich buxutsik ban mesa, in tyna an pan, in lbtaja, in peja ani pidhantsik.
42024031	Tmki jachan, pidhanichtsik tm kin exla abal jaich na Jess xi ta ti kwajat kal jajtsik. Por Jaj yab ms chutat.
42024032	tsxintsik tm ench: —Yabxe tu kijidhmdhantsi ti itsch kal tin kwenta tam ti tl ti bl tu tiltsal ani tu wiltsal an ti Tokat Dhuslab?
42024033	Tmki jachan in tujutsik an bl abal ka witsiy Jerusaln. Tam ti ulichtsik, in ela junkunk xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani nin juniktsik.
42024034	Utsantsik ench xi chb: —Tsubax lejtal, an Ajtiklb ejnek ti t ani in xalkmal tinb abal ka chutat kal na Simn.
42024035	In tilatsik jeye tm xi chb xanty in tamm ti bl ani xan tin exlatsik na Jess tam tin peja an pan.
42024036	Bl kwajat in tilltsik jech, tam ti na Jess xalkan junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani chapndhomch ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
42024037	Jikeytsik tajat abal in chalpay max kwajat in telltsik jun i ejattalb.
42024038	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jantki ta jikltsik? Jantki ta chalpaxtsik tajat ta itsch?
42024039	Ka telatsik nu kubak ani nu akan. Nan. Ti kin takatsik ani ti kin tela, jun i ejattalb yab in kool i tulek nibal i beklek jelt xan ta chutaltsik u kool.
42024040	Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, in lna nin kubak ani nin akan.
42024041	Por kom jajtsik yabl in bell max ejnek ti t abal u kulbltsik ani labnktsik tajat, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A kooltsikxe tech i kapnl?
42024042	Pidhan tm jun peje ti wiyadh tool ani jun peje ti tuyik kal i chiik,
42024043	in bachu ani kwajay kin kapu tin tamt jajtsik.
42024044	Tayl utsantsik ench: —Xowa u tamu, jaich xowa tu utsa tam ti bl in kwajat kal tattsik: ke kool ka tmun ejtal xan ti kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta ba nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, bin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik ani ban ajatlbtsik.
42024045	In pidhatsik tm ti chalab abal kin exbaytsik an Tokat Dhuslab
42024046	ani ench tin utsatsik: —Anchan ti kwajat dhutsadh, ke an Kristo, xi jaich Nanich, kool kin chemdh ani tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
42024047	Kwajat jeye dhutsadh, ke kool ka tiltsin an atiklbtsik abal yejatich kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ti kin bela abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik kal na Dios. Jech an tiltsixtalb, Neech ka tujey Jerusaln ani tayl putlki an kayl neech ka tilan.
42024048	Tattsik yejat ka tila ejtal jech xowa a chumaltsik.
42024049	Ani Nan neech tu abtsitsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal neech ti ki abtsi an Ttalb. Por ki jilkontsik tech ban bitsow xi Jerusaln asta ka bachutsik nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb xi neech ka tsch walki.
42024050	Kldhtsik tm kal na Jess ba jachan an bitsow ani jntsik asta Betania, in dhaya tm nin kubak tekat na Jess ani lbtajantsik.
42024051	Tam tin lbtajaichtsik, wm kal jajtsik ani jnjich tm walki.
42024052	Tam ti okonichtsik kin kakna, u kulbltsik tajat ti witsiytsik Jerusaln,
42024053	echeki u kaleltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
43001001	Tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl, kejle Ja kwajatich jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios; ani jachan nin Kwintal na Dios, kwajat kal na Dios ani jaich na Dios.
43001002	Pos tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl, Jaj kejle kwajatich kal na Dios.
43001003	Kal Jajki tin kwenta na Dios tin taja ejtal xowa waach; yab waach ni jun xata xowa yab tajadh kal Jajki tin kwenta.
43001004	Kal Jaj ti kwajat an t xechintalb ani jech an t xechintalb jaich an tajaxtalb abal an atiklbtsik.
43001005	Jech an tajaxtalb u tajbax ban jikwaxtalb ani an jikwaxtalb yab in ejtmal kin tepdha.
43001006	Wachin jun i inik xi abadh kal na Dios, xin bij ta Juan.
43001007	Jech na Juan, tsch jelti jun i ltsix abal kin lna jachan an tajaxtalb abal ejtaltsik ka belmch kal tin kwentaki xowa in lnl na Juan.
43001008	Na Juan yab jaj nu tajaxtalb; jaj jaich jun i ltsix xi abnk abal kin lna an tajaxtalb.
43001009	An lej tajaxtalb, xin tajbayal ejtal an atiklbtsik, u ulelich ti kwajat ban kayl.
43001010	Jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios kwajatich ban kayl ani maske kal Jajki tin kwenta ti tajadh an kayl, yab exl kal xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
43001011	Tsch ban kayl xon ti kwajattsik xi Jaj in tajmal, por yab bachwat kal jajtsik.
43001012	Por ejtaltsik xita kl ti bachwat ani belan, pidhantsik ti awiltalb ka kwajay u chakmlb kal a Dios.
43001013	Yab in junwal jelti xu chakmlbtsik kal i ttalb xi tech ti kayl, xu wachinaltsik ti chakam kom anchanich ti jilnktsik o abal anchan tin kulbetna jun i inik; jajtsik u chakmlb kal a Dios.
43001014	Ani jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios, wenkon ti inik ani kwajay kal waw, kal yantam i alwatalb ani i tsubaxtalb. I chutsmalich tin labidh tokt, xi jaich nin labidh tokt nin junkax Chakmil an Ttalb.
43001015	Na Juan jaich in till tam tin ulu ench: —Jech jaich xi nan tu tiltsmaltsik, tam tu ulu ke xi neech ka tsch tayl, kwajat ms ultalb k nan, kom Jaj kejlejich Ja kwajat tam ti nan yabl in waach.
43001016	Kal ejtal xowa Jaj in kool, i bachkuntsmalich yn tin lbtajaxtalbil kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal.
43001017	An takixtalb pidhan na Moiss abal kin lna, por an alwatalb ani an tsubaxtalb tsch kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.
43001018	Yab jayki chuudh na Dios kal ni jun xita; tokot kal nin junkax Chakmil ti chuudh, xi kwajat junax kal an Ttalb ani jaich Jaj xi tu ltsmal abal ki exla an Ttalb.
43001019	An judotsik xi Jerusaln in aba i pletsik ani i lebitatsik ba na Juan abal kin konoy xitam j jeye jaj,
43001020	por na Juan in ulu tsubax ench: —Yab nan nin Kristo.
43001021	Konyat tm jun: —Tatxe p ni Elas, an tiltsix? Na Juan in ulu ench: —Yab nan. Konyat tm jun ench: —Tm, tatichxe p an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch? Ani jaj tkon ench: —Yaba.
43001022	Utsan tm ench: —Pos jita p teye? Kool ki jntsi jun i tsubaxtalb xi tu abmal. Janty p neech ti ku utsa kal tat ta kwenta?
43001023	Na Juan in tkoytsik ench: —Nanich xin tilmal an tiltsix Isaas tam tin ulu ench: Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: “Ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa; abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.”
43001024	Xi kalnektsik ti kw kal na Juan, abnk kal an fariseotsik.
43001025	Ani in konoytsik ench: —Tm, max yab tat ni Kristo, nibal i Elas, nibal an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch, jantki p tm ta pujax?
43001026	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Juan: —Nan tu pujyaltsik kal i ja, por kal tattsik ta kwajat jn xi yabtsik a exll.
43001027	Neech ka tsch tayl, por Jaj kwajat ms ultalb k nan. Nan yab xata u y nibal abal ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.
43001028	Ejtal jech tmun ban chabl xin bij Betbara, xu jilkonal ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn, xon ti na Juan kwajat ti pjal.
43001029	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Juan in chuu ti utel na Jess xon ti jaj kwajat ani in ulu ench na Juan: —Ka telatsik, jech jaich jelti nin borregojil na Dios xi neech ka pikb abal kin wkontsi tin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
43001030	Jaj u till tin kwajat tam tu ulu ench: “Tayl neech ka tsch jun i inik xi ms ultalb k nan, abal kejle Ja kwajatich tam ti nan yabl in waach.”
43001031	Nan yab u exll xitam j jeye Jaj; por jaich tin pjal kal i ja abal ka exl kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel.
43001032	In ulu jeye ench na Juan: —Nan u chuu an Tokat Ejattalb ti pal walki jelti jun i kuku ani jilkon kal Jaj.
43001033	Nan yab u exll xitam j jeye Jaj; por xi tin abmal tin pjal kal i ja, tin utsa ench: “Tam ka chuu an Tokat Ejattalb ti pal ani ka jilkon ba jun xita, jachan jaich xi neech ti pjal kal an Tokat Ejattalb.”
43001034	Ani xo nan u chumalich ani u ulal ke jech jaich nin Chakmil na Dios.
43001035	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, taja jun ti kwajat na Juan junax kal chb in exbaliltsik.
43001036	Ani tam tin chuu ta ti xeech na Jess, na Juan in ulu ench: —Ka telatsik, jech jaich jelti nin borregojil na Dios.
43001037	Chablam nin exbaliltsik na Juan in acha tam tin ulu jech ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
43001038	In tela tm na Jess tin kx, in chuu abal wewkmte ani in utsatsik ench: —Janty a ayaltsik? Jajtsik in utsa ench: —Oktsix, jn p teye i kwajl?
43001039	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Jala ani neech ka chuutsik. Kaletsik tm ani in chuu xon tu kwajl na Jess. Jachan a kts jilkontsik kal Jaj abal tam ti jachan jaykich xna chich i wkal.
43001040	Jn ti b an exbaltsik xin achmaltsik xan tin ulu na Juan ani in wwnmal na Jess, jaich na Andrs, nin kidhb na Simn Pedro.
43001041	Na Andrs, kale okox kin aliy nin kidhb Simn ani in utsa ench: —I elmal an Mesas —jech in l kin ulu, an Kristo.
43001042	Na Andrs in jna tm na Simn xon ti kwajat na Jess ani tam ti na Jess in chuu na Simn, in utsa ench: —Tat i Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, por neech ki bijyat ta Sefas —jech in l kin ulu, Pedro.
43001043	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Jess in lena ka kale ban chabl xi Galilea, in ela na Felipe ani in utsa ench: —Ti kin wwna.
43001044	Jech na Felipe u kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Betsayda, xon tu kwajltsik jeye na Andrs ani na Pedro.
43001045	Na Felipe in ela na Natanael ani in utsa ench: —I elmal an inik xu tilnal kal an tiltsixtsik ani kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jech an inik jaich na Jess, xu chakmlb kal na Jos xu kwajl ban bitsow Nasaret.
43001046	Na Natanael in utsa ench na Felipe: —Awxe neech kin ejto ka wachin jun xata alwa Nasaret? Tkoyat ench kal na Felipe: —Jala ani wana ka chuu.
43001047	Tam ti na Jess in chuu ke na Natanael exomich ti kunel, in ulu ench kal tin kwenta na Natanael: —J tl jun i inik xi tsubax lejtal tu israelita ani yab u kambix.
43001048	Konyat tm ench kal na Natanael: —Jn p tm tin exlmal? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan kejle tu chumalich tam ti yabl i kanidh kal na Felipe, tam ta kwajat tin l in akan an igo.
43001049	Utsan tm ench kal na Natanael: —Oktsix, Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios; Tat nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik.
43001050	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tin bell abalki tu utsa ke tu chumal tin l in akan an igo? Pos neech ka chuu tayl xanty ms pakdha k jech.
43001051	In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka chuutsik japidh an walki ani neech ka chuutsik ti pal ani ti kadhl nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios, ba Nanich xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
43002001	x a kts tayl, wachin jun i tomkixtalb ban bitsow Kan, xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea ani taja ti kwajat nin nna na Jess.
43002002	Na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik kanidhtsik jeye ba jachan an tomkixtalb.
43002003	Taley an yajtsik uxnl ani utsan ench na Jess kal nin nna: —Yabich in kooltsik i yajtsik uxnl.
43002004	Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, janty kool ki chuu waw kal jech? Yabl in bajmal xowki neech ku xalka xitam j neye Nan.
43002005	Por utsan ench kal nin nna na Jess xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: —Ka tajatsik ejtal xowa Jaj ti ki utsa.
43002006	T tu kyb taja akak i pakdha balixtalb xi tajadh kal i tujub xu baltsinal ti ja, xin ynl an judotsik kin takaxna abal kin toko tinb. Xi jun i yejche balixtalb in knl che inik o bo inik litro i ja.
43002007	Na Jess in utsa ench xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: —Ka tsutsiy kal i ja jachan an pakdha balixtalb. In tsutsiytsik tm alwa
43002008	ani utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka jotiytsik xo w ani ka jntsi an tojom ajib. Ani anchan tin tajatsik.
43002009	An tojom ajib in leka an ja xi wenkonkich ti yajtsik uxnl, maske yab in chob xon tu tsidhb; tokot in chob xi kwajattsik ti tojojl, kom jajtsik in jotymal an ja. An tojom ajib in kaniy tm an tomkinl inik
43002010	ani in utsa ench: —Ejtalki in pidhnl okox an alwa yajtsik uxnl ani tam ynich in uchm an ajblomtsik, tm neech kin pidhna an yajtsik uxnl xi yab lej alwa. Por tat a tapmal an alwa yajtsik uxnl abal ka pidhna tayl.
43002011	Jech xowa in taja na Jess ban bitsow Kan xu taknal Galilea, jaich an jidhtal labidh exl xi kl tin xalka nin labidh tokt ani belan kal nin exbaliltsik.
43002012	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, kale ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam, junkmte kal nin nna, nin kidhbtsik ani nin exbaliltsik. Taja ti kwajay chb x a kts.
43002013	Tam ti exomich ti kunel xowki an judotsik tin ajbnl an paskwa, na Jess kale ban bitsow xin bij Jerusaln.
43002014	In ela taja alt ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xin nujwaltsik i baka, i borrego, i kuku ani xin jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik.
43002015	Tam tin chuu jech, na Jess in taja jun i wichate kal i ldhutsik ani in ajatsik ejtal ka kale elb xi t ti kwajattsik taja ti njul, junax kal nin borregojiltsik ani nin bkajiltsik. Xin jaltsal an ti tumn an atiklbtsik, in waklantsi an ti tipax tumn chabl ani in ketpantsi an tin mesajiltsik.
43002016	An njul kukutsik utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ka kldhatsik elb xi jech! Yab ka wenko nin kim nu Tta ti njumtalb!
43002017	In chalpay tm nin exbaliltsik xi kwajat dhutsadh ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “U kanidhl tajat na kim.”
43002018	Konyat tm ench kal an judotsik: —Jantom exl neech ti ku pidha ki chuu abal ki exla ke ani lejtal ta kool i awiltalb ka taja jech?
43002019	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka pakutsik jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani Nan neech ku kuba ti t ti x a kts.
43002020	Utsan tm ench kal an judotsik: —Chab inik kal akak i tamub in jnmal abal ka kuban jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios; ani Tat a ulal ke neech ka kuba ti t ti x a kts?
43002021	Por an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xi kwajat in till na Jess jaich Jaj nin tul.
43002022	Jaxtm, tam ti na Jess chemdh ani ejech ti t, nin exbaliltsik in chalpay jech xowa in ulmal na Jess ani in belatsik an Tokat Dhuslab ani ejtal xowa usnktsik kal na Jess.
43002023	Tam ti na Jess kwajat Jerusaln, ban ajib kal tin kwenta an paskwa, kal yn ti belan tam tin chuutsik an labidh exltsik xin tajl.
43002024	Por na Jess yab in lej beltsaltsik, abal Jaj in exll ejtalkitsik.
43002025	Yab in yntsal ka ltsin kal ni jun xita xanty in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, pos Jaj in chob alwa xanty in chalpayal tin itsch jun i inik.
43003001	T ti kwajat jun i Fariseo xin bij ta Nikodemo, jun i ultalb inik ban judotsik.
43003002	Jech na Nikodemo kale jun i akal kin lna na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Oktsix, i chob abal a Dios ti abmal ta oktsix, pos ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin xalka nin awiltal kal i labidh exltsik jelt xan ta tajl, max na Dios yab kwajat kal jaj.
43003003	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke xita yab ka wachin ti chakam ti t, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
43003004	Konoxin tm ench na Nikodemo: —Por jan ti neech kin ejto jun i pulek inik ka wachin ti chakam ti t? Awxe neech kin ejto ka ochich jun bin nna abal ka wachin ti chakam ti t?
43003005	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke xita yab ka pujan kal i ja ani kal an Tokat Ejattalb, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
43003006	Xu wachinal tech ti kayl, in kool in tul jelti nin tta ani nin nna; por xu wachinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb, in kyalich an Tokat Ejattalb.
43003007	Yab ki laban abal tu utsl: “Ejtaltsik kool ka wachin ti chakam ti t.”
43003008	An ik u wawnal xon ti kin lena; a achl u bososl, por yab a chob xon ti tl nibal a chob xon ti neech. Anchan jeye ejtal xu wachinaltsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
43003009	Konyat tm jun ench kal na Nikodemo: —Jantich tm tu tjnal jech?
43003010	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tat, xi jaich jun in oktsxal an israelitatsik, yab a chob jech?
43003011	Tsubax tu utsl, ke waw tokot i till xowa i chobich ani tokot i lnl xowa i chumal; por tattsik, yab a bell xowa tu utsltsik.
43003012	Max yab tin beltsaltsik tam kin kwajay tu tiltsitsik xowa waach tech ti kayl, jan ti neech ti kin beltsitsik max kin kwajay tu tiltsitsik xowa waach t walki?
43003013	Ni jun xita yab kadhinek walki, tokot xi painek t walki, jaich Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, xin kwajl t walki.
43003014	Ani anchan xan ti na Moiss tin tekba an chan t ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, anchan neye ti neech kin tekb Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik,
43003015	abal ejtal xita ti kin bela, yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, tokot kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43003016	Na Dios in kanidha tajat xi kwajattsik ban kayl. Jaxtm tin aba nin junkax Chakmil ka tsch tech ti kayl, abal ejtal xita kl ti ka belan, yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, tokot kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43003017	Na Dios yab in abmal nin Chakmil abal ti walbix, in abmal abal ti lol.
43003018	Xita kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, yab neech ka walbiyat, por xita yab kin bela, walbidhich ti kwajat abal yab in bela nin junkax Chakmil na Dios.
43003019	Xita yab in bela, walbidhich ti kwajat, abal tam ti tsch an tajaxtalb ban kayl, in kulbetnatsik ms an jikwaxtalb k an tajaxtalb, kom tokot in tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
43003020	Ejtal xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, in pojkltsik an tajaxtalb ani yab u uteltsik ban tajaxtalb abal yab ka xalkan an walastalb xin tajltsik.
43003021	Por xi kwajattsik xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb, u uteltsik ja ban tajaxtalb abal ka xalkan ke xowa in tajltsik, jaich xowa in l na Dios.
43003022	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess kale kal nin exbaliltsik ban chabl xi Judea ani kwajaytsik w owat taja ti pjal.
43003023	Ani na Juan kwajat jeye ti pjal ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Enn, kunat Salim, kom taja waach tajat i ja. U ulel taja an atiklbtsik ani u pujyb.
43003024	Jech tmun tam ti yabl balidh na Juan ban wikaxte.
43003025	Taltsik nin exbaliltsik na Juan in tuju tm ti kwlx kal an judotsik kal tin kwenta an tokeltalb.
43003026	Kaletsik tm kin utsa ench na Juan: —Oktsix, xi ta ti kwajat kal tat t jun pake walja Jordn, xi tat a tilmal, u pjal jeye xo ani kal ejtaltsik ti exom ti wwnb.
43003027	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Juan: —Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin koy xata max yab ka pidhan kal na Dios.
43003028	Tattsik a achmal tam tu ulu tsubax ke yab nan nin Kristo, nan jaich jun i abatwle xin abnk okox k Jaj.
43003029	Ba jun i tomkixtalb, xita kl tu dhabalb an tomkinl tsidhan, jaich kal an tomkinl inik; ani nin jab an tomkinl inik, xi kwajat junax ani in achl xowa in ulal, u kulbl jeye tajat kal xowa in achl in till an tomkinl inik. Anchan jeye, xo in kulbl neye tajat.
43003030	Jaj kool kin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb ani nan kool kin kwajay ms tayl.
43003031	&Xi tekat ti tl, ms Ja plek k ejtal waw. Xi kwajat chabl, chablki ti kwajat ani tokot in till xowa waach chabl. Por xi tl walki, ms Ja plek k ejtal waw
43003032	ani in till xowa in chumal ani in achmal; por yab xita kl tu beltsinal xowa in ulal.
43003033	Por max jun xita kin bela, in ulalich tm ke na Dios tsubax xowa in ulal;
43003034	abal xita abnk kal a Dios, in kwintal a Dios in till, pos na Dios yn tajat tin pidhnl nin Tokat Ejattal.
43003035	An Ttalb in kanidhl nin Chakmil ani in pidhmalich ejtal xowa waach tech ti chabl ani xowa waach walki.
43003036	Xita kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por xita yab in l kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, yab neech kin ejto kin koy jachan an xechintalb, tokot neech kin bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
43004001	An fariseotsik in chobna abal na Jess u pjal ms k na Juan ani kal yn ms xita kl tu wwnb;
43004002	maske yab kejle Jaj na Jess nu pjal, u pjal nin exbaliltsik.
43004003	Tam ti na Jess in chobna jech, kale tm Judea abal ka witsiy Galilea.
43004004	An bl xin yakwmal abal ka witsiy Galilea, kool ka watey ban chabl xi Samaria,
43004005	jaxtm ti ulich ba jun i bitsow xin bij Sikar xu taknal Samaria. Jech an bitsow, kwajat kunat ban chabl xi na Jakob in pidhmal nin chakmil xin bij Jos.
43004006	Taja ti kwajat an mom xu bijyb tin momil na Jakob. Kom na Jess u chekelich ti tl an ti belal, buxkan bin wl an mom. Tam ti jachan, wich xna chejel kts.
43004007	An exbaltsik kalnek ban bitsow abal kin chaay xanty kin kapu. Tmki jachan, ulich ban mom jun i mmlb xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl xi Samaria abal kin jotiy i ja ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin pidha neye an ti ja.
43004009	Tkoyat tm ench kal an mmlb: —Jantki Tat, xa kidhtal an judotsik, tin kontsal ti ja maske a chob alwa ke nan in kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria? (Utsan anchan, kom an judotsik u tx kal xu kwajltsik Samaria.)
43004010	Tkoyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Max a exllak an chejwalixtalb xin pidhnl na Dios ani xita xi exom ti kontsal an ti ja, u chob alwa abal neech ti kin kontsi an ti ja ani Nan neech tu pidha ti ja abal a ejattal.
43004011	Utsan tm ench kal an mmlb: —Paylomlb, nibal ela a kool xantokl ka jotiy an ja ani an mom owtsik. Jn ti neech ka ela an ja abal nu ejattal xi kwajat a ulal ke neech ti kin pidha?
43004012	Ni weje paklil Jakob tu jiltsmal jech an ti mom, xon ti jaj in jotymal an ja abal kin ucha. Taja jeye tin jotymal an ja nin chakmiltsik ani taja tin uchandhmal nin konliltsik. Awxe Tat ms i plek k jaj?
43004013	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Ejtal xin uchltsik jech an ja, neech jun ka tsikey;
43004014	por xita kin ucha an ja xi Nan u pidhnl, yab jayki neech ka tsikey. Pos an ja xi Nan neech ku pidha, neech ka kwajay alkidh ba jaj jelti jun in kalemtal i ja abal ka pidhan kl ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43004015	Utsan tm ench kal an mmlb: —Paylomlb, ti kin pidha neye jachan an ti ja abal yab ms jayki kin tsikey, nibal kin witsiy ms ku jotiy i ja ba jech an mom.
43004016	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ki kale ka kaniy na tomkl ani ki tsch tm jun tech.
43004017	Tkoyat ench na Jess kal an mmlb: —Yab u kool u tomkl. Utsan tam ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ta ulal ke yab a kool a tomkl;
43004018	pos a beletnmalich b i inik ani xi xo i kwajat a belkm, yab a tomkl. Tsubax tajat xowa a ulu.
43004019	Tam tin acha jech an mmlb, in ulu ench: —Paylomlb, nan u achl ke Tat jaich jun i tiltsix.
43004020	Ni weje pakliltsik xi tech jeye ti kwajinek Samaria in kaknmaltsik na Dios ba jech an chn, por tattsik an judotsik a ulal ke Jerusaln ti yejat ki kakna.
43004021	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, ti kin beltsi ke neech kin bajaw an kij tam neech ka kaknatsik an Ttalb ani yab neech ka yntsi ki tschtsik ba jech an chn o ki kaletsik Jerusaln.
43004022	Tattsik xi kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria, yab a chob xanty a kaknltsik; por waw i chob wa xanty i kaknl; pos an loeltalb tl ban judotsik.
43004023	Por xo in bajch an ora ani jaich xoich, tam xi tsubax lejtal tin kaknl an Ttalb neech kin kakna kal in ejattalki ani kal i tsubaxtalb. Pos an Ttalb in l kin chuu ke anchan kin tajatsik xi kl tu kaknb.
43004024	Na Dios i Ejattalb ani xita kl ti ka kakn, yejat kin kakna kal in ejattalki ani kal i tsubaxtalb.
43004025	Utsan ench kal an mmlb: —Nan u chob abal neech ka tsch an Mesas, xi jaich an Kristo xi bijidh neech ka tsch. Ani tam Jaj ka ulich, neech ti ku wiltsi ejtal jech.
43004026	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jachan xa bijiy, jaich Nanich, xi xo kwajat ti kw kal tat.
43004027	Tmki jachan, ulich nin exbaliltsik ani labantsik tajat abal in chuu ti tiloll na Jess kal jun i mmlb. Por ni jun xita yab in lena kin konoy xanty in konyal o xanty in till kal an mmlb.
43004028	An mmlb in jilna tm an mul ani kale ban bitsow xon ti kwajay kin tiltsi ench an atiklbtsik:
43004029	—Jala ka chuutsik jun i inik xi tin utsmal ejtal xanty u tajmal. Awxe yab jachich an Kristo?
43004030	Kaletsik tm ban bitsow ani kaletsik xon ti kwajat na Jess.
43004031	Lejat an exbaltsik kwajat in pakabdhl na Jess ench: —Oktsix, kapulich teye.
43004032	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nan u kool jun xata xanty neech ku kapu, xi tattsik yab a exll.
43004033	Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Awxe tsidhantsidh ti kapnl kal jun xita?
43004034	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nu kapnlil, jaich ku taja xowa in l xi tin abmal ani ku okontsi an tin tojlbil.
43004035	Tattsik a ulal abal bl u kibel ch a ch abal ka junkuntsat tin wall a tayablb, por Nan tu utsltsik abal nin wall an tayablb yejnekich ani alwaich ti kwajat abal ka junkuwat.
43004036	Xu tojnal abal kin junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb, in bachwal nin jalbl. Ani an wallb xin junkuwal, jaich xi yab jayki neech ka kibey; abal xu m ani xin junkuntsal tin wall an tayablb, ka kulbtsik junax.
43004037	Tsubax xan tin ulal ench jun i tilab: “Keet xu m ani keet xin junkuntsal tin wall an tayablb.”
43004038	Nan tu abmaltsik ka junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb xi yab tattsik a taymal; jaxtm tu utsltsik ke keet xi tjnk ani tattsik neech ki labey kal an tojlb xi jajtsik in tajmal.
43004039	Yn i atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow xu taknal Samaria, in belatsik na Jess kal xowaki in achatsik utsan kal an mmlb, tam ti utsantsik ench: “Tin utsmal ejtal xanty u tajmal.”
43004040	Jaxtm, tam ti ulich an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria, pakabdh na Jess abal ka jilkon kal jajtsik. Na Jess jilkon kal jajtsik chb a kts,
43004041	ani kal yn ms ti belan, tam tin achatsik xanty in ulal na Jess.
43004042	Utsan tm ench an mmlb kal an atiklbtsik: —Xo i bellich, yab tokotki kal xowa tat tu utsmal, i bell abal waw weye i achmalich xanty in till ani i chobich abal tsubax lejtal Jajich nu Kristo nin Loxil xi ejtal tech ti kayl.
43004043	Chb a kts ms tayl, na Jess kale Samaria ani in ntsi an bl abal ban chabl xi Galilea.
43004044	Pos jelt xan ti na Jess in ulu, ni jun i tiltsix u kaknb bin chablil.
43004045	Tam ti na Jess ulich Galilea, bachwat alwa kal xi tajatsik, abal xu kwajltsik taja, kalnektsik jeye Jerusaln kin ajbnatsik an paskwa ani in chumaltsik ejtal xowa in taja ba jachan an ajib.
43004046	Na Jess witsiy Kan, an bitsow xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea xon tin wenkmal an ja ti yajtsik uxnl. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun in tojnlil an pulek awiltalb. Jech an tjontsix, in kool jun in chakmil u yaul ban bitsow xi Kapernam.
43004047	Tam ti jachan an tjontsix in acha ke na Jess ulich Galilea, kale kin chuu ani in pakabdha abal ka kale bin kim ani ka jeldhantsat tin chakmil xi ta ti kwajat tolowich tajat.
43004048	Utsan tm ench kal Jess: —Max yab ka chuutsik i exl ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik, yab neech ti kin belatsik.
43004049	Por utsan ench kal an tjontsix: —Ajtik, ki tsch jikat, lejat yabl u chemel nu chakmil.
43004050	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalch ta kim, na chakmil yab neech ka chemech. An inik in bela xowa utsan kal na Jess ani kale.
43004051	Tam tu witslich tin kim, kale ti tamnal kal nin tojnliltsik ani utsan ench: —Na chakmil yab chemech.
43004052	Ani in konoy tm nin tojnliltsik xy i ora ti tujey ti elbml nin chakmil ani utsan ench: —Ti wel, jn xna i wkal ti wkon an kaklch.
43004053	In chalpay tm an ttalb ke jachan i ora, tm ti usnk ench kal na Jess: “Na chakmil yab neech ka chemech.” Jaj ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik in bela na Jess.
43004054	Jech jaich in chabtal an labidh labandhaxtalb xin taja na Jess abal ti exl, tam ti witsiy Judea ani ulich Galilea.
43005001	Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess witsiy Jerusaln xon ti an judotsik kwajat in tajl jun i ajib.
43005002	Taja Jerusaln, kunat bin wilbil an bitsow, waach jun i chakat ja xi ti kwintalb ebreo u bijyb Betesda. Jech an chakat ja, kwajat ban wileb xu bijyb Obejatsik ani in kool b i chalam.
43005003	Taja ban chalam, ta ti kwachatsik yn i yaultsik, xu jokoltsik, xu kwechetsik ani xi yabtsik in ejtowal ka yoyon. Jech kwajattsik in aytsm ka lanyat an ja.
43005004	Abal owdhaki i kij u pal jun i tokat abatwle ani in lanyal an ja. Xita ka ochich okox tam ka lanyat an ja, u jell kal xowakichki an yawlch xin kool.
43005005	T jeye ti kwajat taja jun i inik xin koolich jun inik lajuwaxik i tamub ti yaul.
43005006	Tam ti na Jess in chuu kwachl jech an inik ani in chobna abal nakatich tajat i kij ti kwajl anchan, in konoy ench: —A lxe ki jeley?
43005007	Tkoyat ench kal an yaul: —Ajtik, yab u kool xita ti kin dha ban chakat ja tam ka lanyat. Echeki tam u l neye kin ochich, okox u ochel keet.
43005008	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley.
43005009	Tmki jachan ti jilkon jelnek an inik, in dhaya nin chaytil ani beley. Por kom tam ti jachan a kts jaich in ktsjil an koyxnich,
43005010	utsan ench kal an judotsik jachan an inik xi jeldh: —Xo in ktsjil i koyxnich, yab alwa ka kitna na chaytil.
43005011	An inik tkon ench: —Xi tin jeldha, tin utsa ench: “Ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley.”
43005012	Konyat tm ench: —Jitam j p jeye xi ti utsa: “Ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley”?
43005013	Por an inik yab in chob xitam j xi kl ti jeldhats, kom na Jess pitkonkich bin yanl an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat.
43005014	Tayl elan jachan an inik kal na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani utsan ench: —Ka acha, xo i jelch, yabich ms ka wala abal yab ka tamu jun xata ms yajtsik.
43005015	Kale tm an inik ani in ltsi an judotsik ke kal na Jess ti jeldhats.
43005016	Jaxtm na Jess tu atnal kal an judotsik ani u lenb ka chemdh, abal na Jess in tajl jech tin ktsjil an koyxnich.
43005017	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nu Tta echeki u tojnal ani jaxtm Nan tin tojnal neye.
43005018	Jaxtm an judotsik msich tin lenl kin chemdha na Jess, abal yab tokotki yab in pakwlantsal nin ktsjil an koyxnich, u lenb ka chemdh, abal in ulal ke Jaj jyki jeye a Dios, kom in ulal ke na Dios jaich nin Tta.
43005019	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke nin Chakmil na Dios yab neech kin ejto kin taja ni jun xata kal Jajki tin kwetm chalab; tokot in tajl xowa in chutal in tajl an Ttalb. Ejtal xowa in tajl an Ttalb, anlki jeye tin tajl an Chakmlb.
43005020	Pos an Ttalb in kanidhl nin Chakmil ani in xalkantsal ejtal xowa Jaj in tajl; ani neech kin xalkantsi xowa ms pakdha xi Jaj in tajl, xi neech ti ki jilatsik i labnk.
43005021	Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb in ejdhl an chemlomtsik ani in pidhl ti xechintalb, anchan jeye an Chakmlb in pidhl ti xechintalb xita Jaj in l kin pidha.
43005022	Pos an Ttalb yab in ljundhl ni jun xita, nin Chakmil jaich nin pidhmal ejtal an ti awiltalb abal ti ljundhax,
43005023	abal kal ejtalki ti ka kakn an Chakmlb jelt xan tu kaknb an Ttalb. Xita yab kin kakna an Chakmlb, yabich jeye tm u kalel in kaknl an Ttalb xi kl ti abnk.
43005024	Tsubax tu utsltsik: Xita kin exbay xowa Nan u ulal ani kin bela xitam J tin abmal, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; ani yabich neech ka jilkon walbidh, pos jaj in watnaich an cheml ani in kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43005025	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech kin bajaw an ora ani jaich xoich, tam xi kwajattsik jelti max chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb neech kin axtsitsik tin kwintal nin Chakmil na Dios; ani xita kin axtsi, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43005026	Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb in kool i awiltalb abal kin pidhna i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, anchan jeye tin pidhmal ti awiltalb nin Chakmil abal kin pidhna i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43005027	In pidhmal jeye ti awiltalb abal ti ljundhom, kom Jajich xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik.
43005028	Yab ki labantsik kal jech, kom neech kin bajaw an ora tam ejtal an chemlomtsik neech kin axtsi tin kwintal
43005029	ani neech ka kale xon ti kwajattsik jolidh. Xita xin tajmaltsik xowa alwa, neech ka ejechtsik abal yabich jayki ka chemechtsik; por xita xin tajmaltsik xowa yab alwa, neech ka ejechtsik abal ka abnjichtsik ban kibeltalb.
43005030	Nan yab u ejtowal ku taja xata kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab. Nan in ljundhax xantiki ti kin utsan ani in ljundhax in lujtalki, pos yab exom u tajl xowa Nan u l, tokot u tajl xowa in l an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
43005031	Max Nankijak in xeech u till tub, yab tsubax xowa u ulal.
43005032	Waach keet xi tin till ani u chob alwa ke tsubax xowa in ulal.
43005033	Tattsik a abnmal ka konyat na Juan ani tsubax xan ti jaj tknk.
43005034	Nan yab in teykmte kal xowa kin ulu jun i inik kal Nan tu kwenta; por u ulal jech abal tattsik ka ejto ki loey.
43005035	Xowa in ulu na Juan, in junwal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb xi kwajat letotl abal ti tajbax ani tattsik a lena ki kulb w i kij kal nin tajaxtalbil.
43005036	Por Nan u kool jun i ltsixtalb ms alwa k xowa xin ulmal na Juan. Ejtal xowa an Ttalb tin pidhmal ku taja, jaich nin xalkl abal tsubax lejtal tin abadh kal an Ttalb.
43005037	Anl jeye, an Ttalb xi tin abmal, in pidhnl jeye i ltsixtalb kal Nan tu kwenta, maske tattsik yab jayki a axtsmal tin kwintal nibal jayki a chumaltsik.
43005038	Por tattsik yab a beltsal nin tsubaxtalbil abal yab tin belltsik Nan, xin abadh kal an Ttalb.
43005039	Tattsik a ajyal an Tokat Dhuslab kal yantam i kwenta, abal a ltsik ka chuu max ka elatsik taja an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por an Tokat Dhuslab Nan tin till,
43005040	por tattsik yab a l ki uteytsik kal Nan abal ka ejto ka koytsik jachan an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43005041	Nan yab u l kin exl ke in alwa inik kal an atiklbtsik.
43005042	Por Nan tu exlltsik ke yab a kaknl a Dios.
43005043	Nan in tsinek abal in abnk kal nu Tta, por tattsik yab tin bachwal; por max tl jun xita kal jajki tin kwetm chalab, jachan neech ja ka bachutsik.
43005044	Janti neech ka ejto ki belmchtsik, max tokot a l ki exlomn ke i alwa inik kal an atiklbtsik ani yab kal na junkax Diosil?
43005045	Yab ka chalpaytsik ke Nan neech tu lnatsik tin tamt nu Tta; xita ti lnltsik, jaich xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss, xon ta kwajbmaltsik na aytsixtalbil.
43005046	Abal max tsubaxak ta belltsik xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss, neech jeye tm ka belatsik xowa Nan u ulal, pos Nan tin till xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss.
43005047	Por max yab a belltsik xowa in jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss, jan ti neech ka ejto ka belatsik xowa Nan tu utsltsik?
43006001	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess kale jun pake pujal xi kwajat Galilea, xi jaychki in kidhtal an pujal xi Tiberias.
43006002	Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti neech wewkmte kom in chumalichtsik an labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl, abal in jeldhl an yaultsik.
43006003	Kadhiy tm na Jess ba jun i chn ani buxkan taja kal nin exbaliltsik.
43006004	Tam ti jachan i kij, exomich ti kunel an paskwa, an ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik.
43006005	Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwnadh, in utsa ench na Felipe: —Jn neech ki chaay i kapnl abal ka kapch ejtal jech an atiklbtsik?
43006006	Por na Jess in ulu anchan abal in l kin acha xanty kin ulu na Felipe, pos Jaj in chobich alwa xanty neech kin taja.
43006007	Tkoyat tm ench kal na Felipe: —Maske ki chaay chb bo inik i denariotsik i pan, yab neech ka kidhey abal kin ela bachutsik wetsik.
43006008	Utsan tm ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik xin bij Andrs, xi jaich nin kidhb na Simn Pedro:
43006009	—J kwajat jun i chakam kwitl xin tsidhl b i pan xi tajadh kal i sebada ani chb i tool; por kal jech yab neech ka kidhey abal ki kapundha yantam i atiklbtsik.
43006010	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka utsa ejtal an atiklbtsik ka buxkan. Taja xon ti kwajattsik, waach tajat i tsitsik chojl ani buxkantsik bo mil iniktsik xna.
43006011	In tyna tm na Jess xi b an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in pidhaich tm nin exbaliltsik. An exbaltsik in pidhaichtsik tm ejtal xi t ti buxutsik. Anlki jeye tin taja kal an tooltsik ani in pidhatsik asta xan ti jajtsik in lena.
43006012	Tam ti ajwchtsik, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka junkutsik an pejmatstalbtsik xi jilkon abal yab xata ka odhn.
43006013	In junkutsik tm ani in tsutsiytsik lajuchb i toknaltsik kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon kal xi b an pan xi tajadh kal i sebada.
43006014	Tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu jech an labidh labandhaxtalb xin taja na Jess, in ulutsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal jech jaich an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch tech ti kayl.
43006015	Por kom na Jess in chuu abal u lenb ka jn kal i chplb abal ka tajan ti pulek takix, kale jun ban chn abal ka kwajay kwetm.
43006016	Tam ti jikwchinkich, nin exbaliltsik na Jess kale ban pujal,
43006017	ochichtsik ban tan ani in tujchtsik tm kin watna an pujal abal ka kaletsik Kapernam. Jikwchinkich alwa ani na Jess yabl ulnek xon ti jajtsik kwajat.
43006018	An ja u mlk asta tekat, kom u wawnal jun i chapik ik.
43006019	Tam tin belmalichtsik b o akak i kilmetro, in chuutsik na Jess ti utel ban tan, tl belal tin b an ja ani jikeytsik tajat.
43006020	Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nan, yab ki jikeytsik!
43006021	Tam tin achatsik jech, in utsaichtsik tm ka ochich ban tan ani junwki ti ulichtsik ban chabl xon tin ulmaltsik neech.
43006022	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an atiklbtsik xi jilkonktsik jun pake pujal, in chuu abal an exbaltsik kalnekich kal an junkax tan xi ta ti kwajat ani na Jess yab kalnek kal jajtsik.
43006023	Por tmki jachan, ulich keet i tan xi tl ban bitsow xin bij Tiberias, taja kunat xon ti kapmadh an atiklbtsik tam ti an Ajtiklb in pidhnmalich i jalbintsixtalb.
43006024	Ani jaxtm, tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu ke na Jess yabich taja ti kwajat nibal nin exbaliltsik, balin ban tan ani kaletsik Kapernam abal kin aliy.
43006025	Tam ti an atiklbtsik ulich jun pake pujal, in ela na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Oktsix, jowkijich ta ulnek tech?
43006026	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke tattsik tin ayal abal a chuu tu kapundhatsik asta ki ajw ani yab abal a chumaltsik an labidh labandhaxtalb.
43006027	Yab ki tjontsik abal ka ta an kapnl xu tall, ki tjontsik abal ka ta an kapnl xi yab u tall xi neech ti ki pidhatsik an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech jaich an kapnl xu pidhnl Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik. Pos na Dios an Ttalb tin takwymal abal ku pidhna jech an kapnl.
43006028	Konyat tm ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Janty yejat ki taja abal ki ejto ki taja xowa in l na Dios?
43006029	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Na Dios in l kin chuu ke tattsik ka bela xi Jaj in abmal.
43006030	Konyat tm jun ench na Jess: —Jantom labidh labandhaxtalb neech ka ejto ti ku xalkantsi abal ki chuu ani anchan tu belaich? Janty a ejtowal ka taja?
43006031	Ni weje pakliltsik in kapmal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh an kapnl xi tl walki, jelt xan tin ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “Na Dios in pidhatsik kin kapu an kapnl xi tl walki.”
43006032	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik: Yab kal a Moiss ti pidhnk na weje pakliltsik an ti kapnl xi tl walki, kal nu Tta ti pidhnktsik jachan an kapnl xi tsubax lejtal ti tl walki.
43006033	Pos an kapnl xin pidhnl na Dios, jaich xi painek walki ani in pidhl an atiklbtsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006034	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an atiklbtsik: —Ajtik, ti ku pidha echeki jachan an ti kapnl.
43006035	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nanich an kapnl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Xita ka utey kal Nan, yab jayki neech ka kaay ani xita ti kin bela, yab jayki neech ka tsikey.
43006036	Por anchan jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik, tattsik yab tin bell maske tin chumalichtsik.
43006037	Ejtal xowa tin pidhl an Ttalb, u ulel kal Nan ani xita ka utey kal Nan, yab neech ku pojka.
43006038	Pos Nan yab in painek walki abal ku taja xowa u l, in painek abal ku taja xowa in l xi tin abmal.
43006039	Xowa in l nu Tta xi tin abmal, jaich ke yab ku kibdha ni jun xita xi Jaj tin pidhl, tokot ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43006040	Xowa in l xi tin abmal, jaich ke ejtal xita kin chuu nin Chakmil na Dios ani kin bela, kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani Nan neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43006041	Tam ti an judotsik in acha jech, tujeytsik kin kawiy na Jess abal in ulu ench: “Nanich nin kapnl xi painek walki.”
43006042	Ani in ulutsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech na Jess, nin chakmil na Jos? Waw i exlantsal tin tta ani tin nna. Jantki p tm tin ulal ke Jaj walki ti painek?
43006043	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka jilaichtsik ti kin kwna.
43006044	Yab xita neech kin ejto ka utey kal Nan max yab ka utwat kal an Ttalb xi tin abmal ani neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43006045	Ba nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik in ulal ench: “Na Dios neech kin oktsi ejtalkitsik.” Jaxtm, ejtal xita kin axtsi an Ttalb ani kin walka ka oktsin kal Jaj, u utel kal Nan.
43006046	Jech yab in l kin ulu ke jun xita in chumalich an Ttalb; xita kl tokot ti chuudh na Dios, jaich xi taja ti tl ba na Dios.
43006047	Tsubax tu utsltsik, xita ti kin bela Nan, in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006048	Nanich an kapnl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006049	Na weje pakliltsik in kapmal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh an kapnl xi tl walki ani blki chemechtsik;
43006050	por xita kin kapu an kapnl xi tl walki xi Nan u till, yab jayki neech ka chemech.
43006051	Nanich an kapnl xi painek walki; xita kin kapu jech an kapnl, neech ka kwajay ejat malill i kij. An kapnl xi Nan neech ku pidha, jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna abal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl kin ejto kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006052	Tujey tm ti kwlx an judotsik jajkitsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Janti neech kin ejto jech ti ku pidha ki kaptsi tin tul?
43006053	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max yab ti kin kaptsitsik an tu tul ani yab ti kin uxtsitsik an tu xichl, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab neech ka ejto ka koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006054	Xita ti kin kaptsi an tu tul ani ti kin uxtsi an tu xichl, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani Nan neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43006055	Pos nu tul jaich i lej kapnl ani nu xichl jaich i lej uxnl.
43006056	Xita ti kin kaptsi an tu tul ani ti kin uxtsi an tu xichl, kwajatich kal Nan ani Nan kal jaj.
43006057	Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb xi tin abmal kwajat ejat ani Nan in kwajat ejat kal Jaj, anchan jeye, xita tin kaptsi an tu tul jelti max i kapnl, neech ka kwajay ejat kal Nan.
43006058	Jech xowa in kwajat u till jaich an kapnl xi painek walki. Jech an kapnl yab in junwal jelti an kapnl xi painek walki xin kapmal na weje pakliltsik ani blki chemechtsik; xita kin kapu jech an kapnl xin kwajat u till, neech ka kwajay ejat malill i kij.
43006059	Na Jess in oktsixna jech ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam.
43006060	Tam tin achatsik jech an oktsixtalb, yn xi kl ti wewkmte na Jess in ulutsik ench: —Jech xowa kwajat in ulal tojlb tajat abal ki bela. Jita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka exbantsat?
43006061	Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal kwajattsik ti tilom kal jech tin kwenta, in konoytsik ench: —Ti itixbdhltsik jech?
43006062	Pos janty p tm neech ka tmun max tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, tin kadhl xon tin kwajatwiik?
43006063	An ejattalb jaich nin pidhnl an xechintalb; ni tul yab xata ti alwa. Xowa Nan tu tiltsmaltsik jaich abal tin kwenta a ejattaltsik ani jaich kl ti neech ki pidhan an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006064	Por waach taltsik na kidhtal xi yab in bell. In ulu anchan na Jess, kom in exlltsik xita kl ti yab u belnal asta ti tujenek an kayl ani xita kl ti neech ka pidhn abal ka chemdh.
43006065	Ani in ulu ench: —Kal jech tin kwenta tu utsmaltsik ke yab xita neech kin ejto ka utey kal Nan, max yab kal an Ttalb ti ka utwat.
43006066	Asta tam ti tm, yn xi kl ti wwnadh na Jess in jilatsik ti wwnax ani yabich ms xechintsik kal Jaj.
43006067	Konyat tm ench kal na Jess xi lajuchb an exbaliltsik: —A lxe teye ki kaletsik?
43006068	Por tkoyat ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, Ba jita ti neech ki ejto ku kale? Pos tokot Tat tu oktsal xan ti neech ki ejto ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43006069	Waw i belmalich ani i chobnmalich ke Tatich ni Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios xi ejat.
43006070	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe Nan tu takwymal tattsik xi lajuchb? Por jn ti b xi tattsik jaich in kidhtal an lej atax.
43006071	Tam tin ulu jech, na Jess kwajat in till na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn, pos na Judas jaich xi neech kin pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh, maske jaj jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik.
43007001	Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess xechin ban chabl xi Galilea kom yab in l ka xechin Judea, abal taja u lenb ka chemdh kal an judotsik.
43007002	Por kom exomich ti kunel xowki tu ajbnb an padheltsik, jun i ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik,
43007003	utsan ench na Jess kal nin kidhbtsik: —Yab ki kwajayki tech, ki kale Judea abal an atiklbtsik xi ti wwnl xu kwajltsik taja, kin chuu jeye xanty a tajl.
43007004	Pos max jun xita in l ka exlomn, yab in tajl xata chinat. Kom Tat a tajl xata jelti jech, ka taja tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik.
43007005	Anchan ti utsan kal nin kidhbtsik kom yab u belnal nibal kal jajtsik.
43007006	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabl in bajmal xowki ti neech kin kale, por abal tattsik, xowkijakichki alwa.
43007007	Xu kwajltsik tech ti kayl yab neech kin ejto ti ki pojkatsik, por Nan tin pojkl, abal u xalkantsal ke yab alwa xowa in tajltsik.
43007008	Ki kalchtsik ta ban ajib, Nan yabl in neech kom yabl in bajmal xowki ti neech kin kale.
43007009	Ani tam tin utsmalichtsik jech, Jaj jilkon Galilea.
43007010	Por tam ti kalnekich nin kidhbtsik ban ajib, na Jess kale jeye, maske yab chobte kal ni jun xita, jelti max chinatki.
43007011	U alyb kal an judotsik ban ajib ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jn awil ti kwajat jachan an inik?
43007012	Kal yn an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat u tilnal na Jess. Taltsik in ulal ench: “Jaj jaich jun i alwa inik” ani taltsik in ulal ench: “Yab i alwa inik, pos in kambiyal an atiklbtsik.”
43007013	Por kal ni jun xita tu tilnal kawidh, abal u chejnb an judotsik.
43007014	Por tam ti chejlbich an ajib, na Jess ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in tuju ti oktsix.
43007015	An judotsik laban tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Janti awil tin witmal jech an inik yn xata ani yab exblommadh?
43007016	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —An oktsixtalb xu pidhnl yab Nan u dhabal, in dhabal xi tin abmal.
43007017	Max jun xita in l kin taja xowa in l na Dios, neech kin exla max nu oktsixtal tsubax lejtal ba Dios ti tl, o exom tin kw kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab.
43007018	Max in kwak kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, u kalelich tm jelti max u ayal kin kakn kal an atiklbtsik; por yab u tajl anchan, tokot u ulal xowa tin pidhmal na Dios xi tin abmal abal Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb. Nan tokot u ulal xowa tsubax ani yab in kambix.
43007019	Yabxe tsubax ke na Moiss ti jiltsmaltsik dhutsadh an tin takixtal na Dios? Por ni jun xita xi tattsik yab in tajl ti kij. Jantki ta ltsik ti kin chemdha?
43007020	Tkoyat ench kal an atiklbtsik: —I ochadh kal i atax ejattalb; jita in l ti ki chemdha?
43007021	Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Kal jun xata xowa u taja tin ktsjil an koyxnich, ejtal tattsik i labnal.
43007022	Na Moiss ti ltsi ka tajatsik an exl ba na tul, (yab abal jaj in tujmal kin taja, in tujmal kin taja na weje pakliltsik) ani jaxtm xo ta tajtsaltsik an ti exl bin tul na chakmiltsik maske in ktsjil i koyxnich.
43007023	Pos alwaich, max abal yab a ltsik ka chikat taja nin takixtal na Dios xin jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss, a tajtsaltsik an ti exl bin tul an chakamtsik maske in ktsjil i koyxnich, jantki tin chakuntsal abal u jeldha jun i inik tin ktsjil i koyxnich?
43007024	Yab ti kin kawiy kal tin kwentaki xowa a chutaltsik u tajl. Tam ka tajatsik anchan, ka tajatsik in lujtalki.
43007025	Taltsik xu kwajltsik Jerusaln in ulutsik tm ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xi xeech ti alyb abal ka chemdh?
43007026	Pos n kwajat tejwa ti oktsix ani yab xata tu usnal kal ni jun xita. Awxe an awiltalbtsik in belmalich lejtal ke jech an inik jaich an Kristo?
43007027	Por waw i chob xon ti tl jech an inik; por tam ka ulich an Kristo, yab xita neech kin chobna xon ti neech ka tsch.
43007028	Tam tin acha jech na Jess, xi kwajat ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulu kawidh ench: —Tm, tin exlltsik ani a chobtsik xon tin tl! Por yab in tsinek kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, in tsinek abal in abnk kal na Dios xi kwajat ejat xi tattsik yab a exll.
43007029	Nan u exll kom ba Jaj tin tl ani Jaj tin abmal.
43007030	Len tm ka jn ti wiknl, por ni jun xita yab utey ti yakwax, kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh.
43007031	Por kal yn ti belan ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tam ka tsch an Kristo, awxe neech kin taja ms i labidh labandhaxtalb k jech an inik?
43007032	An fariseotsik in acha xanty in till an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess. Aban tm kal an oklek pletsik ani an fariseotsik i ykwaltsik abal ka yakwan na Jess.
43007033	Ani na Jess in ulu ench: —Bl neech kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik ani neech jun kin kale xon ti kwajat na Dios xi tin abmal.
43007034	Neech ti kin aliytsik, por yab neech ti kin ela, pos yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay.
43007035	Tujey tm an judotsik ti tsx jajkitsik ench: —Jn awil ti neech ka kale jech an inik abal in ulal ke yab neech ki ejto ki ela? Awxe neech ban judotsik xi kwajat tki tki kal an griegotsik ani kin oktsi an griegotsik?
43007036	Janty awil in lena kin ulu abal tu utsa ench: “Neech ti kin aliytsik por yab neech ti kin ela, pos yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay”?
43007037	Tin okontalich an ajib xi jaich na kts xi ms uluts, chakay na Jess ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Max jun xita u tsikl, ka utey kal Nan ani kin ucha an ja.
43007038	Pos jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, tin ejattal xita tin bell Nan, neech ka kale jelti i waljatsik xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43007039	Kal jech, na Jess in lena kin ulu ke xita kl ti ka belan, neech kin bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb. Abal tam ti jachan, yabl ulnek an Tokat Ejattalb, pos na Jess yabl xalkantsidh an tin labidh tokt.
43007040	Taltsik an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat, tam tin acha jech, in ulutsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech an inik jaich an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch.
43007041	Xi keettsik in ulal ench: —Jech jaich an Kristo. Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Janti neech ki ejto ki ulu ke Jaj jachich an Kristo ani i chob alwa ke Galilea u kwajl?
43007042	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke an Kristo kool ka tsch bin kidhtaltsik an pulek takix Dabid ani Beln ti neech ka wachin, ban kwentsal xon ti kwajinek na Dabid.
43007043	Jaich kal jech ti yab jununl nin chalab an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
43007044	Taltsik in lwiik kin yakwa, por ni jun xita yab in taja anchan.
43007045	Witsiy an ykwaltsik xon ti kwajat an fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik ani konyat ench: —Jantki ti yabtsik a tsidha?
43007046	Ani an ykwaltsik tkon ench: —Yab jayki i achmal xita ti kw jelt xan tu kw jachan an inik!
43007047	Utsantsik tm ench kal an fariseotsik: —A walkmichtsikxe teye ki kambiyat?
43007048	Awxe belnkich kal jn ti b ni oklkiltsik o kal an fariseotsik?
43007049	Por jech an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll an takixtalb, bijtsidhichtsik abal neech ban kibeltalb.
43007050	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Nikodemo, xi jaich jn ti b xi jajtsik in kidhtal xi kalnek kin lna jun i akal na Jess:
43007051	—An takixtalb xi waw i kool, in ulal ke yab in tomnl ki walbiy jun i inik max yab ki axtsi okox ani ki chobna xanty in tajmal.
43007052	Tkoyat tm ench na Nikodemo: —I galileoxe teye? Ka ajay an Tokat Dhuslab ani neech ka chuu ke ni jun i tiltsix yab wachink jayki Galilea.
43007053	Kalchtsik tm kejtsik kejtsik tin kim.
43008001	Por na Jess kale ban chn Olibos.
43008002	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, witsiy dhajawe ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Utukn na Jess kal ejtal an atiklbtsik, buxkan ani tujey ti oktsix.
43008003	Utuntsat tm kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal an fariseotsik jun i mmlb xi elnk chinat junax kal jun i inik xi yab in tomkl. Kwajb junax chejel xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik
43008004	ani utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, jech an mmlb elnk chinat junax kal jun i inik xi yab in tomkl.
43008005	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal abal jelti jech an mmlbtsik yejat ka chemdh tujbadh. Tat, janty a ulal?
43008006	In ulutsik anchan, abal in l kin achatsik xanty kin ulu na Jess ani max yab ka tkon alwa, neech tm ka ejtowat ka walbiyat. Kutpan tm na Jess ani in tuju ti dhutsum ban chabl kal in tstsbixtal.
43008007	Por kom in achl abal in ntsal ti konyb, lujkun tm ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita xi tattsik yab walbidh, awil kin tuju kin tujbay jech an mmlb.
