43008008	Kutpan tm jun na Jess ani in ntsi ti dhutsum ban chabl.
43008009	Por tam tin achatsik jech, in chalpay abal walbidhtsik ani in tuju ka kaleltsik juntsik ti juntsik. Okox tin tuju ka kale xi yejchelichtsik ani tayl xi ms. Tam ti ejtalich kalnektsik, na Jess jilkon kwetm kal jachan an mmlb, xi taja ti jilkonk.
43008010	Lujkun tm na Jess ani kom yab ms in chuu xita waach, tokot an mmlb, in utsa ench: —Mmlb, jn ti kaletsik xi kwajat ti lnl? Ni jun xita ti walbiy?
43008011	Tkon ench an mmlb: —Yaba Ajtik, ni jun xita. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye tu walbiyal; ki kalch ani yabich ms ka wala.
43008012	Na Jess in tawna jun an atiklbtsik ani in utsa ench: —Nanich nin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal an kayl; xita ti kin wwna neech kin koy an tajaxtalb xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech ka xechin jelti max ban jikwaxtalb.
43008013	Utsan tm ench kal an fariseotsik: —Tatki exom a till tab ani jachan xowa a till, yab xata in jalbl.
43008014	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Maske Nanki u till tub, in jalbl tajat xowa u till. Pos u chob xon tin tl ani xon tin neech; por tattsik yab a chob xon tin tl nibal xon tin neech.
43008015	Tattsik tin walbiyal kal xowaki a chutal u tajl. Nan yab u walbiyal ni jun xita.
43008016	Ani max ku walbiy jun xita, in lujtalki tu tajl; pos yab u tajl Nan kwetm, i tajl junax kal an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
43008017	Ban takixtalb xi tattsik a kool, ta kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Tam chb i lnax kin ulu jaychki, awil ka beltsin.”
43008018	Nan u till tub ani an Ttalb xi tin abmal tin till jeye.
43008019	Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jn ti kwajat na Tta? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik yab tin exll, nibal a exlltsik nu Tta; max tin exllaktsik, a exllaktsik jeye nu Tta.
43008020	Ejtal jech in ulu na Jess tam ti kwajat ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xon ti kwajat in bl an pikbantsixtalb. Por kal ni jun xita ti yakwan, kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh.
43008021	Witskontsattsik jun ka utsan ench kal na Jess: —Nan neech kin kale ani neech ti kin aliytsik, por neech ki chemechtsik kal na walastalbil; pos xon ti Nan in neech, tattsik yab neech ka ejto ki kale.
43008022	In ulutsik tm ench an judotsik: —Awxe neech kin chemdha tinb ani jaxtm tu utsl ke waw yab neech ki ejto ku kale xon ti Jaj neech?
43008023	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik tech i kwajl chaat, por Nan in kwajl t tekat; tattsik tech i kwajl ban kayl, por Nan yaba.
43008024	Jaxtm tu utsatsik ke neech ki chemech kal na walastalbiltsik; pos max yab a belltsik xowa tu utsl kal tin kwenta xitam j neye, neech ki chemech kal na walastalbiltsik.
43008025	Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jita p teye? Ani tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tu utsmalichtsik asta tam tu tujuki tu oktsitsik.
43008026	Yn tajat u kool xanty tu utsatsik ani tu lujtsitsik, por xita tin abmal jaich na Dios xi kwajat ejat. Ani xowa u utsltsik xi tech ti kayl, jaich xowa u achmal in ulal.
43008027	Por jajtsik yab in exbay ke na Jess kwajat in till an Ttalb.
43008028	Jaxtm ti utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam tattsik ti kin tekbaich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, tm neech ti kin exlatsik ke Nanich xitam j tu utsmaltsik ani ke yab xata u till kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, tokot u till xowa in oktsidh kal an Ttalb.
43008029	Abal nu Tta xi tin abmal, kwajat kal Nan ani yab jayki tin jilmal kwetm, pos echeki u tajl tokot xowa Jaj in l.
43008030	Tam ti na Jess in tila jech, kal yn ti belan.
43008031	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess an judotsik xi kl ti belnk: —Max tattsik yab ka jila ka bela xowa tu utsltsik, tsubaxich tm tu exbaliltsik.
43008032	Neech tm ka exlatsik an tsubaxtalb ani an tsubaxtalb neech ti ki walkaichtsik.
43008033	Tkontsik tm ench: —Waw i weje paklil na Abraham ani yab jayki u kwajinek tu jolib kal ni jun xita. Jantki p tm ta ulal ke neech tm ku walkjich?
43008034	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xu walablomtsik, u kyb jelti jolib kal an walastalb.
43008035	Jun i jolib yab neech ka kwajay echeki ban kimdh xon tu tjontsix, por jun i chakmlb echeki ja neech ka kwajay ba jachan an kimdh.
43008036	Jaxtm, max an Chakmlb ti ki walkatsik, tsubaxich tm ta walkadhichtsik.
43008037	U chobich abal a weje pakliltsik na Abraham; por a ltsik ti kin chemdha, kom yab a bell xowa tu utsltsik.
43008038	Nan u till xowa tin xalkantsmal nu Tta ani tattsik a tajl xowa ti utsl na tta.
43008039	Tkoyat tm ench kal jajtsik: —Ni tta jaich na Abraham. Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Max tsubaxak lejtal ta chakmlbtsik kal na Abraham, a tajlaktsik xowa jaj in tajmal.
43008040	Por xo, maske tu ltsmalichtsik an ti tsubaxtalb xi tin xalkantsmal na Dios, blki a ltsik ti kin chemdha. Na Abraham yab jayki in tajmal anchan!
43008041	&Tattsik a tajl xowa in tajl na tta. Utsan tm ench kal jajtsik: —Waw yab u chakmlb kal keetich keetich i ttalb, jn tokot i tta i kool ani jaich na Dios.
43008042	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Max tsubaxak lejtal na Dios jaichtsik na tta, neech ti kin kaknatsik, pos Nan ba Dios tin tl. Yab in tsinek kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, in tsinek kom na Dios tin abmal.
43008043	Tattsik yab a ejtowal ka exbay xowa u ulal kom yab a l ka achatsik an tsubaxtalb xi tu utsl.
43008044	Tattsik a tta an lej atax ani kl ta dhabalbtsik; ani tokot a l ka tajatsik xowa jaj in l. An lej atax jaich jun i chemdhax asta ti tujenek an kayl. Yab jayki in ynmal an tsubaxtalb ani yab jayki in ulal xowa tsubax. Tam u kambix, kwajat ti kw jelt xan ti jaj jeye; pos jaj jaich jun i kambix ani jaich nu oklek kal an kambixtalb.
43008045	Por kom Nan u ulal xowa tsubax, yabtsik tin beltsal.
43008046	Jita xi tattsik neech kin ejto ti kin utsa ke Nan in walbidh? Ani max u ulal xowa tsubax, jantki ti yab tin beltsaltsik?
43008047	Xita u dhabalb kal a Dios, in axtsal tin kwintal na Dios; por kom tattsik yab i dhabalb kal na Dios, jaxtm ti yabtsik a l ka axtsi an tin kwintal.
43008048	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an judotsik: —Tsubax xowa i ulal tam ki ulu ke Tat i kwajl Samaria ani i teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb.
43008049	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab in teykmte kal ni jun i atax ejattalb, tokot u kaknl nu Tta, por tattsik yab tin kaknl.
43008050	Nan yab u ayal kin kakn. Waach jun xita xin l kin chuu kin kakn ani Jaj, jaich nu ljundhax.
43008051	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin exbay xowa u ulal, yab jayki neech ka chemech.
43008052	Tkoyat tm ench kal an judotsik: —Xo ojni i exbch ke tsubax lejtal i kwajat teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb. Na Abraham ani ejtal an tiltsixtsik chemech, por Tat a ulal ke xita kin exbay xowa a ulal, yab jayki neech ka chemech.
43008053	Awxe Tat ms i uluts k ni tta Abraham? Jaj ani an tiltsixtsik chemech. Jitam j p ta chalpayal ke Tat teye?
43008054	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Max Nanki u ayal kin kakna, an kaknaxtalb xi ku bachu yab xata in jalbl. Por xita tin kaknl jaich nu Tta xi tattsik a ulal ke jaich na Diosil.
43008055	Tattsik yab a exll, por Nan u exll ani max ku ulu ke yab u exll, in kalelich neye tm in kambix jelti tattsik. Nan tsubax u exll ani u tajl xowa Jaj in ulal.
43008056	Na weje paklil Abraham, kulb tajat abal jaj neech kin chuu an kij xowki Nan ti neech kin tsch. In chuu ani kulb tajat.
43008057	Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an judotsik: —Nibal bl a kool chab inik lju i tamub, ani a ulal ke a chumal na Abraham?
43008058	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam ti yabl waach na Abraham, Nan kejlejich ta tin kwajat.
43008059	In penatsik tm i tujub abal kin tujbay na Jess, por Jaj chinkon ani kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Taja ti watey junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani kale.
43009001	Tam ti na Jess watey ba jun i kwentsal, in chuu jun i inik xi jokol ti wachink ti chakam.
43009002	Ani konyat ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, jantki ti anchan ti wachink ti chakam jech an inik? Awxe in walmal nin ttatsik, o jaj in walmal?
43009003	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab jaj in walmal, nibal nin ttatsik; jech tmnk anchan abal ka xalkan ba jech an inik xowa na Dios in ejtowal kin taja.
43009004	Lejat xo bl tajax, yejat ku tajtsi an tin tojlbil xi tin abmal; pos neech ka jikwchin ani yab xita neech kin ejto ti tojnal.
43009005	Lejat in kwajat tech ti kayl, Nan nin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal an kayl.
43009006	Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu jech, in tuba in ijil chabl, in taja w i kut kal nin ijil ani in mawtsi kl tin wal an jokol.
43009007	In utsa tm ench: —Ki kale ka midhiy na wal ban chakat ja xu bijyb Silo (Silo, in l kin ulu Abatwle). Kale tm an jokol, in midhiy taja nin wal ani tam ti witsiy, in ejtowalich tm ti chuux.
43009008	Jaxtm, tam ti chutat kal nin at kimdhtsik ani kal ejtal xita kl tu exlb abal jaj u jokol, in ulutsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xu buxkanal ti konox tolmixtalb?
43009009	Taltsik in ulal ench: —Jaj. Keettsik in ulal ench: —Yab jaj, por in junwal tajat. Por xu jokolwiik in ulal ench: —Nan.
43009010	Konyat tm ench: —Por jan ti p ta uwa abal i chuuxich xo?
43009011	Tkon ani in ulu ench: —An inik xu bijyb ta Jess in taja i kut, tin mawtsi kl tu wal ani tin utsa ench: “Ki kale ban chakat ja xu bijyb Silo ani ka midhiy taja na wal.” Pos in kale ani tam tu midhiy nu wal, in chuxinich tm.
43009012	Konyat tm ench: —Jn xo ti kwajat jachan an inik? Ani jaj tkon ench: —Yab u chob.
43009013	Jn tm ban fariseotsik jachan an inik xu jokolwiik.
43009014	Por kom in ktsjil i koyxnich tam ti na Jess in taja an kut ani in jeldha an jokol,
43009015	an fariseotsik in konoy jun jachan an inik xan tin uwmal abal u chuuxich xo. Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Tin mawtsi ti kut bu wal, u midhiy ani xo in chuuxich.
43009016	In ulu tm ench taltsik an fariseotsik: —An inik xin taja jech, yab xna ba Dios ti tl, pos yab in pakwlantsal in ktsjil an koyxnich. Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Janti neech kin ejto kin taja jelti jech i labidh labandhaxtalb max i walablom inik? Jaxtm ti keetich keetich an chalab in kooltsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tajm na Jess.
43009017	Konyat tm jun ench an inik xu jokolwiik: —Ani tat, janty a ulal kal tin kwenta jachan an inik xi ti chuxindha? Ani jaj in ulu ench: —Nan u ulal ke Jaj jaich jun i tiltsix.
43009018	Por an judotsik yab in bell ke jachan an inik u jokolwiik ani xo u chuuxich, asta ti kantsin tin ttatsik jachan an inik xi jeldhats
43009019	ani konyat ench an ttalbtsik: —Jaichxe jech na chakmil, xa ulaltsik ke jokol ti wachink ti chakam? Janti p xo tu chuuxich?
43009020	An ttalbtsik tkon ench: —I chob alwa abal jech jaich ni chakmil ani i chob abal jokol ti wachink ti chakam;
43009021	por yab i chob xantki tu chuuxich xo nibal i chob xita kl ti chuxindhats. Jaj ka konoy, plekich ani neech ti ki ltsitsik xita kl ti jeldhats.
43009022	Nin ttatsik in ulu jech abal in chejnl an judotsik, pos an judotsik in tajmalichtsik i kw abal yabich neech kin walka ka ochich ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xita kin bela ke na Jess jaich an Kristo.
43009023	Jaxtm tin ulu ench nin ttatsik jachan an inik: “Jaj ka konoy, plekich.”
43009024	Kanyat tm jun kal an judotsik jachan an inik xi jokolwiik ani utsan ench: —Tin bij na Dios, ti ku utsa xowa tsubax. Waw i chob abal jachan an inik i walablom.
43009025	Jaj in tkoytsik tm ench: —Nan yab u chob max i walablom o yaba. Tokot u chob ke nan in jokolwiik ani xo in chuuxich.
43009026	Ani konyat jun ench: —Janty ti tajtsi? Jan tin uwa abal kin ejto ti ki chuxindha?
43009027	Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Tu utsmalichtsik ani yab tin beltsal; jantki ta l tu witskontsitsik? A ltsik teye ka wwna?
43009028	Odhbijyat tm ani utsan ench: —Tat a wwnl jachan an inik, por waw i wwnl a Moiss.
43009029	Waw i chob abal na Moiss tawnadh kal na Dios; por jachan an inik, nibal i chob ela xon ti tl.
43009030	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal jachan an inik xu jokolwiik: —Pos jaich jech xowa yab i ejtowal ki exbay! Tattsik yab a chob xon ti tl ani nan tin chuxindha.
43009031	Waw i chob ke na Dios yab in axtsal xowa kin konoy jun i walablom; tokot in axtsal xita kl tu kaknb ani in tajl xowa in l na Dios.
43009032	Yab jayki i achmal ti tilnal jun xita xin ejtowal kin chuxindha jun xita xi jokol ti wachink ti chakam.
43009033	Max jech an inik yabak ba Dios ti tl, yab neech kin ejto kin taja jun xata jelti jech.
43009034	Utsan tm ench: —Tat xi walbidh tajat ta wachink ta chakam, a l ti ku oktsi? Ani utsan abal yabich ms ka kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
43009035	Na Jess in chobna abal ajnk jachan an inik xu jokolwiik ani tam tin ela in utsa ench: —A bellxe nin Chakmil na Dios?
43009036	Utsan ench kal an inik: —Ajtik, ti kin ltsi xitam j abal ku bela.
43009037	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Pos a tellich ta kwajat, jaich Nanich xi kwajat ta tilom junax.
43009038	Tudhlan tm jachan an inik tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —U bell, Ajtik.
43009039	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Nan in tsinek tech ban kayl abal ku xalkantsi an atiklbtsik xan ti kwajat. In tsinek abal ku chuxindha xi kwajattsik jelti max u jokol ani xu chuuxtsik, ka jilkon jelti max u jokol.
43009040	Tam tin achatsik jech, taltsik an fariseotsik xi ta ti kwajat xon ti kwajat na Jess, konoxintsik ench: —U jokolxe weye?
43009041	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Max i jokolaktsik, yabak i walbidh; por kom a ulal abal i chuuxtsik, jaxtm ta walbidh.
43010001	Tsubax tu utsltsik, xi yab u ochel bin wilbil in mapl an borregotsik, xin tikontsalki an mapuxtalb, jachan jaich an kw.
43010002	Por xu ochel ban wileb, jachan jaich an belkol borregotsik.
43010003	U japtsinal kal an belkol wileb abal ka ochich, in bijyal tin bij an borregotsik ani u exlantsb tin kwintal ani in kldhl an borregotsik xon ti kwajat mapudh.
43010004	Tam in kldhmalich ejtal an borregotsik xi jaj in dhabal, u okxinal ani u wwnb kal an borregotsik kom u exlantsb an tin kwintal.
43010005	Por an borregotsik yab in wwnl ni jun xita xi yab kl tu dhabalb, in jiknl tokot kom yab in exlantsal an tin kwintal.
43010006	Utsantsik jech an ti junbaxtalb kal na Jess, por yab in exbaytsik xanty len ka utsantsik.
43010007	Witskontsattsik tm jun ka utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik: Nanich nin kwajat jelti an wileb xon tu ochel an borregotsik.
43010008	Ejtal xi tsinektsik okox k Nan, i kwtsik, por yab tajan ti kij kal an borregotsik.
43010009	Nanich nin kwajat jelti an wileb; xita ka ochich ba Nan xin kwajat jelti an wileb neech ka loey. Neech kin junu jelti jun i borrego xu ochel ani u kalel ban mapuxtalb ani in ell i tm.
43010010	An kw u tsiilki ti kw ani ti chemdhax; por Nan in tsinek abal ka koytsik an t xechintalb, an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43010011	Nanich nin kwajat jelti an alwa belkol borregotsik. An alwa belkol, yab in dhl ti kwenta maske ka chemdh abal kin loo an borregotsik.
43010012	Por xu belkol abal in lki kin ta i tumn, tam kin chuu tl an padhum, in jill kwetm an borregotsik ani jaj u kalel ti chinkonal. In tajl anchan kom yab i alwa belkol ani kom yab jaj in dhabal an borregotsik. U yakwnal tm taltsik an borregotsik kal an padhum ani xi keettsik, u bukel, kom u jikdhb.
43010013	Jech an inik u kalel ti chinkonal, kom tokotki kwajat ti belkol abal in l kin ta i tumn ani yab in kanidhl an borregotsik.
43010014	Nanich nin kwajat jelti an alwa belkol. Anchan jelt xan ti nu Tta tin exll ani Nan u exll Jaj, anchan tu exll xita tin bellichtsik ani jajtsik tin exll neye. Nan neech ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal ku lootsik.
43010016	U kool jeye keet xi neech ti kin belatsik xi yabl kwajat kal Nan ani kool jeye ku ututsik kal Nan. Neech ti kin axtsitsik an tu kwintal, jn tokot i kwene neech ka wachin ani jnki jeye tokot i belkol.
43010017	An Ttalb tin kanidhl abal u pidhnl tub kin chemdh ani tayl kin ejech ti t.
43010018	Yab xita tin nixl ku pidhna tub kin chemdh, Nanki u pidhnal tub kal u kulbtal. U kool i awiltalb ku pidhna tub kin chemdh ani u kool i awiltalb abal kin ejech ti t. Jech jaich xowa tin utsmal ku taja nu Tta.
43010019	Tam ti an judotsik in acha jech, in koytsik keetich keetich i chalab kal tin kwenta xowa in ulu na Jess.
43010020	Yn xi jajtsik in ulal ench: —Jantki ta exbantsaltsik? Jaj ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani u olmanal.
43010021	Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Ni jun xita xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalb yab neech kin ejto ti kw anchan. Awxe jun i atax ejattalb neech kin ejto kin chuxindha jun i jokol?
43010022	Tam ti jachan i kij, chamay ani ban bitsow Jerusaln kwajat ti tajnal i ajib kal tin kwenta xowki ti tokwat ani tujey ti ynb an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
43010023	Na Jess ta ti xeech ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ban chak xu bijyb Salomn,
43010024	wiliyat kal an judotsik ani utsan ench: —Asta jowki neech tu koy tu chalpax? Max Tatich ni Kristo, ti ku ltsitsch.
43010025	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tu ltsmalichtsik ani yab tin beltsal. Ejtal xowa u tajl kal tin awiltal nu Tta, in xalklich xitam j neye Nan.
43010026	Por yabtsik a bell, kom yab tin bell jelti xi utenekichtsik kal Nan, jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik okox.
43010027	Xita tin bellichtsik, tin axtsalichtsik xowa u ulal; u exlltsik ani jajtsik tin wwnl.
43010028	U pidhmalichtsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, nibal xita neech kin ejto ti kin kntsi.
43010029	Nu Tta jaich tin pidhmaltsik. Jaj jaich xi ms plek ani xi ms ultalb ani kal ni jun xita ti neech ka ejtowat ka kntsin.
43010030	Nan ani an Ttalb, jun tokot tu ynal.
43010031	In pena tm jun i tujub an judotsik abal kin tujbay na Jess.
43010032	Ani utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ynich tajat xata alwa u tajmal ta tamttsik kal tin awiltal nu Tta, kal jowa kl tin kwenta ta l ti kin tujbaytsik?
43010033	Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Yab i lenb ki tujbayat kal ni jun xowa alwa a tajmal. I lenb ki tujbayat kom plekich tajat an walastalb a tajl abal a tajlich tab jelti max i Dios. Pos Tat jaych teye jun i inik jelti waw.
43010034	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ban takixtalb xi tattsik a ynl kwajat dhutsadh ke na Dios in ulmal ench: “Tattsik i diostsik teye.”
43010035	I chob ke xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke yab tsubax ani na Dios in bijiy ti diostsik an atiklbtsik xi axtsin kl tin kwintal.
43010036	Ani max na Dios tin takwymal ani tin abmal tech ti kayl, yab neech ka ejto ka ulutsik ke u odhbijyal na Dios abal u ulal ke Nan in Chakmlb kal Jaj.
43010037	Max yab u tajl xowa in tajl nu Tta, yab ti kin belatsik.
43010038	Por max u tajl, maske yab ti kin belatsik, ka belatsik xowa a chutal u tajl abal ka chobnatsik ke an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan ani Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb.
43010039	U lenbwiik jun ka yakwan, por chinkontsattsik kal na Jess.
43010040	Witsiy tm na Jess ban walja Jordn ani taja ti kwajay xon ti na Juan kwajinek ti pjal ms okox.
43010041	Kal yn i atiklbtsik tu kalel ti chutb na Jess ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal, maske na Juan yab in taja ni jun i labidh exl, ejtal xowa in ulu kal tin kwenta jech an inik, tsubax.
43010042	Ani kal yn ti belan na Jess tam ti taja ti kwajat.
43011001	T ti kwajat jun i inik u yaul xu bijyb ta Lsaro. Jech an inik u kwajl ban kwentsal xin bij Betania, xon tu kwajltsik jeye na Mara ani na Marta, nin ixmtsik.
43011002	Jech na Mara, nin ixm na Lsaro, an inik xu yaul, jaich an mmlb xin mawtsi kal i niwiytalb tin akan an Ajtiklb ani in wayedhantsi kal in xil.
43011003	Jech chb an mmlbtsik in abna ka utsan ench na Jess: —Ajtik, na jab u yaul.
43011004	Tam ti na Jess in acha, in ulu ench: —Jech an yawlch yab jaich tokot abal ka chemech, jaich abal kin xalka nin labidh tokt na Dios ani anchan ka xalkan jeye nin labidh tokt nin Chakmil na Dios.
43011005	Maske na Jess in kanidhl tajat na Marta, na Mara ani na Lsaro jeye,
43011006	tam ti utsan ke na Lsaro u yaul, yab kale jikat kin lna, jilkon bl chb a kts xon ti kwajat.
43011007	Tayl in utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Wana jun Judea.
43011008	Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, xo t, an judotsik xi taja u kwajl in lenmaltsik ti ki tujbay; ani xo a l jun ki kale taja?
43011009	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe lajuchb i ora in kool xi jun a kts? Pos max jun xita xeech ti belal tam kij, yab u tadhkunal kom in tell an tajaxtalb xi waach ba jech an kayl.
43011010	Por max jun xita xeech tam jikwax, u tadhkunal kom yab tajax xon ti xeech.
43011011	Tayl utsantsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Ni jab Lsaro waymadhich, por neech ku bakiy.
43011012	Utsan tm ench kal an exbaltsik: —Ajtik, max waymadhich, tm, neech ka elbm.
43011013	Por xowa in lena kin ulu na Jess, jaich ke na Lsaro chemnek, por an exbaltsik in chalpay ke na Jess kwajat in till i ani wayich.
43011014	Utsutsuyattsik tm tsubax ench kal na Jess: —Na Lsaro chemech.
43011015	In kulbl tajat kal tattsik ta kwenta abal yab taja tin kwajat abal anchan ki belmchtsik. Por wana ki chuu.
43011016	Na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya, in utsa tm ench nin at exbaltsik: —Wana weye abal ku chemech junax kal Jaj.
43011017	Tam ti na Jess ulich Betania, utsan abal in koolich ch a kts ti jolidh na Lsaro.
43011018	An kwentsal xi Betania, kwajat kunat ban bitsow Jerusaln, chb kal chejel xna i kilmetro in owl;
43011019	ani kal yn i judotsik ti kalnek ti lnb na Marta ani na Mara abal ka kijidhmdhatsik kom chemnek nin kidhb Lsaro.
43011020	Tam ti na Marta in acha abal tich tu ulel na Jess, kale kin tamu; por na Mara jilkon ban at xon tu kwajltsik.
43011021	Ani utsan ench na Jess kal na Marta: —Ajtik, max techak ta kwajat, yabak chemnek nu kidhb.
43011022	Por u chob alwa ke neech ti ki pidha na Dios xowa ka kontsi.
43011023	Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Na kidhb neech ka ejech ti t.
43011024	Tkoyat ench kal na Marta: —Ani kejle, u chobich abal neech ka ejech ti t tam ka ejdh an chemlomtsik tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43011025	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Nanich nin ejdhax ti t ani xu pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Xita ti kin bela, maske ka chemech, blki neech ka kwajay ejat;
43011026	ani ejtal xi xo kwajat ejat ani tin bell Nan, yab neech ka kwajay chemnek malill i kij. A bellxe jech?
43011027	Na Marta tkon ench: —U bell, Ajtik. U bell abal Tatich ni Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios xi bijidh neech ka tsch tech ti kayl.
43011028	Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Marta kale kin kaniy nin kidhb Mara ani in utsa ench chinatki: —Ulnek an Oktsix ani tin abmal tu kaniy.
43011029	Tokot tin acha jech na Mara, chakay ani kale kin chuu na Jess.
43011030	Na Jess yabl ochenek ban kwentsal, taja bl ti kwajat xon ti kwajinek ti tiloll kal na Marta.
43011031	Tam ti chutat abal chakay na Mara ani kale jikatki tajat, an judotsik xi taja ti kwajat ti kijtnax, wwnaxintsik. In chalpaytsik max na Mara neech ti uknal xon ti jolidh na Lsaro.
43011032	Tam ti na Mara ulich xon ti kwajat na Jess, tudhlan tin tamt ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, max techak ta kwajat, yabak chemnek nu kidhb.
43011033	Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti uknaltsik na Mara ani an judotsik xi wwnaxnk, tepin tajat asta tin ejattal
43011034	ani in konoytsik ench: —Jn ta jolymal? Tkoyat ench: —Ajtik, jala ka chuu.
43011035	Ukin tm jeye na Jess.
43011036	In ulu tm ench an judotsik: —Ka telatsik, in kanidhl tajat.
43011037	Por taltsik an judotsik in ulu ench: —Jech an inik, xin chuxindha an jokol, awxe yabwiik neech kin ejto kin jeldha na Lsaro abal yab ka chemech?
43011038	Na Jess, kal yantam i yajnantsixtalb, utey xon ti jolidh na Lsaro. Xon ti kwajat jolidh, jaich jun i cholax chn ani paxkidh kal jun i tujub.
43011039	In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka wkoytsik an tujub. Utsan ench kal na Marta, nin ixm an chemlom: —Ajtik, kaxiyich xna nin tul, kom chich a kts in kool ti chemnek.
43011040	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe tu utsmich ke max i belom, neech ka chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios?
43011041	Wkoyat tm an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb, in tela walki na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Tta, tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb abal tin axtsmal.
43011042	U chob alwa abal Tat echeki tin axtsal, por jech tu ulal abal tin alwabl ejtal jech an atiklbtsik xi j kwajat abal kin belatsik ke Tat tin abmal.
43011043	Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, in ulu kawidh ench: —Lsaro, ki kale!
43011044	Ejech tm xi chemnek ani kale, malidh nin kubak ani nin akan kal i bolixtalb ani nin k bolidh jeye kal i kudhkum. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka wila ani ka walkaich ka kale.
43011045	Kal tin kwentaki xowa in chuutsik in taja na Jess, yn an judotsik xi kalnek ti junkil an ta Mara, in bela na Jess.
43011046	Por taltsik an judotsik kale kin chuu an fariseotsik ani in tiltsi xowa in tajmal na Jess.
43011047	Tam ti an fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik in acha jech, junkun kal an Junkulom Awiltalb ani in ulutsik ench: —Janty neech ki taja? Jech an inik exom tajat in tajl yn i labidh exltsik.
43011048	Max ki walka kin ntsi anchan, kal ejtal ti neech ka belan. Neech tm ka tsch an awiltalbtsik xi Roma, neech ti ku pakwtsi an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech ti ku chemdha.
43011049	Por jun ti b xi jajtsik xu bijyb ta Kayfs, xi jaich nin oklkil an pletsik tam ti jachan i tamub, in ulu ench: —Tattsik yab a chob xata,
43011050	nibal a chalpayaltsik ke ms alwa abal waw, ka chemech jn tokot i inik abal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik ani yab ku chemdh ejtal.
43011051	Por na Kayfs yab in ulu jech kal jajki tin kwetm chalab; kom jaj kwajat ti oklek pletsik jachan i tamub, jaxtm ti ijtsin kin ulu kal na Dios ke na Jess neech ka chemdh abal ka loey an judotsik;
43011052	ani yab tokot jki, abal kin junku jeye nin chakmiltsik na Dios xi kwajat tki tki.
43011053	Jaxtm, asta tam ti jachan i kij, an awiltalbtsik xi Judea in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
43011054	Na Jess yabich tm in lej xalkl tinb ka chutat kal an judotsik, kale ba jachan an chabl xi Judea ani kale ba jun i chabl kunat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ba jun i bitsow xin bij Efrain. Taja ti kwajay kal nin exbaliltsik.
43011055	Tam ti jachan i kij, u kunelich xowki tin ajbnl an paskwa an judotsik ani yn i atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban kwentsaltsik kalnek Jerusaln abal kin tokotsik tinb tam yabl watenek an paskwa.
43011056	In ayaltsik na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Janty a chalpayaltsik? Awxe neech ka tsch an ti ajblom o yaba?
43011057	An fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik in ulmal ke max jun xita in chob xon ti kwajat na Jess, kin lna abal ka kale ti yakwnal.
43012001	Bl u kibel akak a kts abal ka watey an paskwa, na Jess kale Betania xon tu kwajl na Lsaro, xi chemnek ani ejdh ti t kal na Jess.
43012002	Tajan taja jun i kapch abal tin kaknabl na Jess; na Marta u jtil ani na Lsaro jaich jn ti b xi buxl ti kapul ban mesa kal na Jess.
43012003	In uldha tm na Mara chejel litro xna i niwiytalb xi tajadh kal i wich xin bij nardo. Jech an niwiytalb, kajbidh tajat in jalbl. Na Mara in mawtsi kl tin akan na Jess ani in wayedhantsi kal nin xil. Putl an alt niwb kal jachan an niwiytalb.
43012004	Na Judas Iskariote, xi jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik na Jess, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn na Jess abal ka chemdh, in ulu tm ench:
43012005	—Jantki ti yab nujwat jech an niwiytalb kal x i bo inik i denariotsik abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik?
43012006	Por na Judas yab in ulu jech abal tsubax lejtal tin kanidhl an chojontltsik, in ulu anchan, kom jaj jaich jun i kw, ani kom jaj in xechindhl nin bl an tumn, in kwyal xowa u balyb taja.
43012007	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Jila kwajat, yab xata ka utsa; pos jaj in tapmal jech abal ti kin mawtsi an tu tul abal ka kwajch tojojodh tam kin bajaw xowki neech kin jolyat.
43012008	An chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik, por Nan, yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
43012009	Kal yn i judotsik ti chobn ke na Jess ta ti kwajat Betania ani kaletsik taja, yab tokotki abal kin chuutsik na Jess, anl jeye abal kin chuutsik na Lsaro, xi ejdhats ti t kal na Jess.
43012010	Nin oklkil an pletsik in tajatsik i kw abal kin chemdha jeye na Lsaro,
43012011	pos kal tin kwentaki na Lsaro, yn i judotsik in plmdhltsik tinb ani in bellichtsik na Jess.
43012012	Yn i atiklbtsik kalnek Jerusaln abal kin ajbnatsik an paskwa. Tam ti jun tsudhelom in achatsik abal na Jess exomich ti ulel ba jachan an bitsow,
43012013	in pejatsik i apach, kale kin bachu ani in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Lbtajadh nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik!
43012014	Na Jess in ela jun i chakam burru ani puney taja, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench:
43012015	Yab ki jikey, atiklbtsik xi kwajl Sin; ka telatsik, nich tl na Pulek Takxal punat ba jun i chakam burru.
43012016	Tam ti jachan i kij, nin exbaliltsik yab in exbay ejtal jech, por ms tayl, tam ti na Jess xalkantsatich tin labidh tokt, in chalpaytsik tm abal ejtal jech kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab kal tin kwenta na Jess ani anchanich ti tmnk.
43012017	An atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat tam ti na Jess in ejdha ti t na Lsaro ani in utsa ka kale ban jlimtalb, in tilltsik xowa in chumal.
43012018	Jaxtm an atiklbtsik ti kale kin bachu na Jess, abal in chobnmalichtsik an labidh exl xin tajmal.
43012019	Por an fariseotsik in ulu jajkitsik ench: —A chutalichtsik xo, yab neech ki ejto ki taja ni jun xata. Ka tela, kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti exom ti wwnb.
43012020	Kal an atiklbtsik xi kalnek Jerusaln abal ti l tam exom an ajib, ta jeye ti kwajattsik chb x i griego.
43012021	Jech an griegotsik utey ba na Felipe. Na Felipe, jaich xu kwajl Betsayda, an chabl xu taknal Galilea. Tam ti utukn kal an griegotsik, pakabdh kl ench: —Jab, i l weye ki chuu na Jess.
43012022	Na Felipe kale kin utsa na Andrs ani chablam ti b ti kale kin ltsi na Jess.
43012023	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —In bajch an kij xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin xalkantsat an tu labidh tokt.
43012024	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max jun i iyalb yab ka tayan ani yab ka kibchon nin tul, yab jayki neech ka yaney. Por max ka tayan ani ka kibchon nin tul, neech ka ixkan, neech ka pubey ani neech kin koy yn in wall.
43012025	Xita in kanidhl nin ejattal neech kin kibdha; por xita xi yab in kanidhl nin ejattal tech ti kayl, in koolich tojojodh nin ejattal abal kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43012026	Max jun xita in l ti kin tjontsi, ti kin wwna ani xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay, taja jeye neech ka kwajay xita tin tjontsal. Max jun xita ti kin tjontsi, neech ka kakn kal nu Tta.
43012027	Xo in chalpax tajat tin kwajat; por yab neech ku utsa nu Tta ti kin loo kal xowa neech ku tamu, pos jaich tin tsinek abal ku tamu anchan.
43012028	Tta, ka xalkaich na labidh tokt. Achatm tm jun i kwintalb t walki ani xu kw in ulu ench: —U xalkmalich ani neech jun ku xalka ti t.
43012029	An atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat ani in acha jachan an kwintalb, in ulutsik abal i junkil b u julull ani xi keettsik in ulal: —Tawn kal jun i tokat abatwle.
43012030	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab abal Nan tu kwenta ti achatm jech an kwintalb, achatm abal tattsik ta kwenta.
43012031	Xo in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhb an atiklbtsik xi tech ban kayl ani neech ka petnjich ban kibeltalb an lej atax xi kwajat ti takix ba jech an kayl.
43012032	Ani tam Nan kin tekbjich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, neech ku ututsik ejtal kal Nan.
43012033	Kal jech kwajatich in lnl xan ti neech ka chemdh.
43012034	Tkoyat ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Waw i achmal ti ajyb bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ke an Kristo yab jayki neech ka chemech. Jantki p tm ta ulal ke nin Chakmil na Dios neech ka tekb pajkidh ba peltsidh te? Jita p jeye jachan xa utsl ke Jajich xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik?
43012035	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Bl neech kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik, Nan xin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, por yabich neech kin lej owey. Ki uteytsik kal Nan lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik abal yab ki yakwantsik ukpidh kal an jikwaxtalb; pos xi xeechtsik ban jikwaxtalb yab in chob xon ti neech.
43012036	Ti kin belatsik lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik, Nan in kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal ki kwajaytsik jelti an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban tajaxtalb. Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Jess kale ani in chinkontsitsik.
43012037	Maske na Jess in tajmalich tajat yn i labidh exltsik tin tamt an judotsik, blki yab u belnal.
43012038	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsix Isaas ench: Okxlb, jita in belmal xowa i lnmal? Jita xalkantsidh tin chp an Okxlb?
43012039	Jaxtm ti yab u belnal na Jess, pos na Isaas in dhutsmal jeye ench:
43012040	Jokolbdhatstsik kal na Dios ani chapikmdhantsidhtsik tin itsch, abal yab ka chuxintsik kal nin wal, nibal kin exbaytsik kal nin itsch, ani nibal ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku jeldha.
43012041	Na Isaas in tilmal jech abal in chutsmalich tin labidh tokt na Jess ani Jaj kwajat in till tam tin ulu jech.
43012042	Por blki, kal yn i judotsik ti belan na Jess, belan asta kal taltsik i awiltalbtsik; por yabtsik in xalkl, kom in chejnl an fariseotsik ani in chejnl yabich ka walkan ka ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
43012043	Pos jajtsik ms in kulbetnl ka kakn kal an atiklbtsik k kal na Dios.
43012044	Na Jess in ulu kawidh ench: —Xita ti kin bela Nan, yab Nan tin bell, in bell an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
43012045	Ani xita tin chutal Nan, in chutalich xita tin abmal.
43012046	Nan, xin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, in tsinek ban kayl abal xita ti kin bela yab ka jilkontsik ban jikwaxtalb.
43012047	Por max jun xita kin acha xowa u ulal ani yab kin taja ti kij, yab Nan exom u walbiyal; pos yab in tsinek ku walbiy an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl, in tsinek abal ku loo.
43012048	Xita tin pojkl ani yab in tajl ti kij xowa u ulal, in koolich xita kl ti neech ka walbiyat: xowa Nan u ulmal, jaich kl ti neech ka walbiyat tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
43012049	Xowa Nan u ulmal, yab u ulmal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab; an Ttalb xi tin abmal, jaich tin utsmal xowa neech ku ulu ani xowa neech ku oktsixna.
43012050	Ani u chob alwa ke xowa tin utsmal ku ulu nu Tta, jaich abal ka ejtotsik ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jaxtm, xowa u ulal, u ulal xantiki tin utsmal ku ulu an Ttalb.
43013001	Wich u kibel abal ka ajbn an paskwa. Na Jess in chobich abal in bajmich an kij xowki neech kin jilaich an kayl abal ka kalch ban Ttalb. Kom echeki in kanidhl an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal, xo kwajat in xalkantsal ke tsubax lejtal tin kanidhltsik tajat.
43013002	Na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn, dhantsidhich bin itsch kal an lej atax abal kin pidhna na Jess ka chemdh. Na Jess in chob alwa abal ba Dios ti tl ani abal neech jun ka witsch tyki ani in chob jeye abal pidhnkich ejtal an ti awiltalb kal an Ttalb. Jaxtm, tam ti kwajattsik an ti kapul, chakay na Jess ban mesa, in kotiy nin eblidh kudhkumil ani in wika jun i kudhkum bin tsukul.
43013005	In jolo tm i ja ba jun i balixtalb ani kwajay kin taktsi tin akan nin exbaliltsik ani kin wayedhantsi kal an kudhkum xin wkm bin tsukul.
43013006	Tam ti nechich jeye ti taktsinal tin akan na Simn Pedro, na Simn Pedro in ulu ench: —Ajtik, Tat neech ti kin taktsi tu akan?
43013007	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xo yab neech ka ejto ka exbay xowa exom u tajl, por tayl neech ka exbay.
43013008	Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Nan yab jayki neech tu walka ti kin taktsi an tu akan. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Max yab tu taktsi an ta akan, yabich neech ka ejto ki kwajay kal Nan.
43013009	Utsan ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, tm, yab tokotki ti kin taktsi tu akan, ti kin taktsi jeye tu kubak ani ti kin pakwtsi tu k.
43013010	Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Xi tm ti oknk ti atsim, yab yejat xowa ms kin taka, tokot nin akan; pos ejtal kwajat tokat nin tul. Tattsik i tokat ta kwajat, maske yab kejle ejtal ta b.
43013011	Na Jess in ulu: “Yab ejtal ta b i kwajattsik tokat”, kom in chobich xita kl ti neech ka pidhn abal ka chemdh.
43013012	Tam ti okonich kin taktsi tin akan nin exbaliltsik, na Jess in kwajba jun nin eblidh kudhkmil, buxkan jun ban mesa ani in utsatsik ench: —A exbayaltsikxe xowa tu tajtsi?
43013013	Tattsik tin bijyal tin Oktsix ani tin Ajtiklb ani tsubax xowa a ulaltsik, kom ani kejle.
43013014	Pos max Nan, xin Oktsix ani in Ajtiklb, tu taktsitsik an ta akan, anlki teye ti yejat ki tktsxintsik an ta akan jn ani jn.
43013015	Nan tu pidhaichtsik jun i oktsixtalb abal ka tajatsik teye anlki jelt xan ti Nan u taja.
43013016	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ni jun i tjontsix kwajat ms plek k nin ajtik ani ni jun i abatwle kwajat ms plek k xi kl ti abadh.
43013017	Max a exbayaltsik ejtal jech ani ka tajatsik anchan, kijidh tajat neech ki kwajaytsik.
43013018	Yab abal ejtal ta b tin kwajat tu utsltsik jech; Nan u chob xita nu takwymaltsik. Por kool ka tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Xi kwajat ti kapul junax kal Nan, tin atlich xo.”
43013019	Tu okxintsaltsik tu ltsi jech abal tam ka tmun, ka belatsik ke Nanich xitam j tu utsmaltsik u y.
43013020	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin bachu xita Nan u abmal, Nan tin bachwal ani xita ti kin bachu Nan, in bachwalich xita tin abmal.
43013021	Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Jess in acha jun i pulek yajtsiktalb tin ejattal ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
43013022	Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti tlx jn ani jn, maske yab in chobtsik xitam j na kwajat ti usnal.
43013023	Jn ti b an exbaltsik, xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, kwajat jeye ti kapul jedhl bin okb na Jess.
43013024	Na Simn Pedro in utsa jech an exbal kal in kubakki abal kin konoy xitam j na kwajat in till.
43013025	Utkakan tm ms jech an exbal ba na Jess ani in konoy ench: —Ajtik, jitam j xi kwajat a till?
43013026	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Neech ku juu jun peje i pan ani xita ku pidha, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh. In juu tm jun peje an pan ani in pidha na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn,
43013027	tmki tam ti na Judas in bachu an pan, ochich an lej atax bin itsch na Judas. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Xowa neech ka taja, ka taja jikat.
43013028	Por ni jun xita xi ta ti kwajat ban mesa ti kapul, yab in exbay xantki ti utsan anchan na Judas.
43013029	Kom na Judas jaich nin xechindhl nin bl an tumn, taltsik in chalpay ke na Jess kwajat in utsl na Judas ke yejat kin chaay xata xowa neech kin yntsi abal an ajib, o kin pidha w ti tolmixtalb an chojontltsik.
43013030	Tam ti na Judas in kapmalich an pan, kale. Tam ti jachan, jikwaxich.
43013031	Tam ti kalnekich na Judas, na Jess in ulu ench: —Xo exomich ti xalkanal nu labidh tokt Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik ani nin labidh tokt na Dios u xalkanalich jeye ba Nan.
43013032	Ani max Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u xalkantsal tin labidh tokt na Dios, Jaj neech jeye ti kin xalkantsi tu labidh tokt kunatich i kij.
43013033	Tsitsik chakam, yabich neech kin kwajay nakat i kij kal tattsik. Neech ti kin aliytsik, por xowa u utsmal an judotsik, xo jaychki teye neech tu utsatsik: Yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan in neech.
43013034	Neech tu pidhatsik jun i t takixtalb: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn; ki kndhxintsik jelt xan ti Nan tu kanidhmaltsik.
43013035	Max ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn, ejtal an atiklbtsik neech kin chuu ke Nan lejtal tu exbaliltsik.
43013036	Konyat ench na Jess kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, jn ta neech? Ani tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xonti Nan in neech, yab xo neech ka ejto ti kin wwna; por tayl i neech teye xon ti Nan in neech.
43013037	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, jantki ti yab neech ku ejto tu wwna xoich? Nan yab u ajyal tub maske kin chemdh kal Tat ta kwenta.
43013038	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax lejtal yab a ajyal tab maske ki chemdh kal Nan tu kwenta? Tsubax tu utsl, ke tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
43014001	Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax. Ka bela na Dios ani ti kin bela neye.
43014002	Ba nin kim nu Tta, yn tajat waach xon ti ki kwajaytsik; max yabak anchan, tu utsmalichaktsik. Jaxtm, neech kin okxin abal tu tojojontsi xon ti neech ki kwajaytsik.
43014003	Ani tam in kalnekich ku tojojoy xon ti neech ki kwajaytsik, neech kin witsiy tu ikitsik ani tu jnatsik kal Nan abal ki kwajaytsik teye xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay.
43014004	A chobichtsik xon ti Nan in neech ani a chobichtsik jeye an bl.
43014005	Utsan ench kal na Toms: —Ajtik, yab i chob xon ta neech; jan ti neech ki ejto ki chobna an bl?
43014006	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nanich nin kwajat jelti an bl, Nanich nin tsubaxtalb ani Nanich nu pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Yab xita neech kin ejto ka ulich ban Ttalb max yab ti kin bela Nan.
43014007	Max tattsik ti kin exlatsik alwa, neech jeye ka exlatsik nu Tat; ani xo a exllichtsik, pos a ntsmalichtsik ka chuu.
43014008	Utsan tm ench kal na Felipe: —Ajtik, ti ku xalkantsi an ti Ttalb ani lejat kl.
43014009	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Felipe, owenekich tajat tin kwajl kal tattsik, ani yabl tin exll? Xita tin chutal Nan, in chutalich jeye an Ttalb; tm, jantki bl tin kontsal tu xalkantsitsik an ti Ttalb?
43014010	Yabxe a bell ke Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb ani an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan? Ejtal xowa tu utsltsik, yab u ulal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab. An Ttalb xi kwajat kal Nan, jaich nin tajl nin tojlbil.
43014011	Ti kin beltsitsik ke Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb ani an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan; max yab a belltsik ke anchan, ka belatsik kal xowa a chutal u tajl.
43014012	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita ti kin bela, neech jeye kin ejto kin taja xowa Nan u tajl ani neech kin ejto kin taja xowa ms pakdha, pos Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
43014013	Ejtal xowa ka konoytsik kal Nan tu bij, neech ku taja, abal Nan, xin Chakmlb kal na Dios, ku xalkantsi tin labidh tokt nu Tta.
43014014	Neech ku taja xowakichki ka konoy kal Nan tu bij.
43014015	Max tin kanidhltsik, ka tajatsik xowa tu utsl.
43014016	Ani Nan neech ku pakabdha an Ttalb ti ki abtsitsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. An Tokat Ejattalb jaich neech ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti ki pubdantsitsik an ta ejattal.
43014017	Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, yab neech kin ejto kin bachu xi yabtsik u belom kom yabtsik in chutal nibal in exll; por tattsik a exll, kom Jaj kwajat kal tattsik ani neech ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik.
43014018	Yab neech tu jilatsik kwetm, neech kin witsiy abal kin kwajay kal tattsik.
43014019	Kunat i kij, yabich neech kin chutat kal an atiklbtsik, por tattsik neech ti kin chuu; pos neech ki kwajaytsik ejat kom Nan in kwajat ejat.
43014020	Jachan i kij, neech tm ka exbchtsik ke Nan in kwajat kal nu Tta, tattsik i kwajat kal Nan ani Nan kal tattsik.
43014021	Xin exllich ani in tajlich xowa u ulal, in xalklich ke tsubax lejtal tin kanidhl. Xita tin kanidhl, neech jeye ka kanidh kal nu Tta, Nan neech neye ku kanidha ani neech kin xalkan ba jaj.
43014022	Utsan tm ench kal na Judas (yab kal na Judas Iskariote): —Ajtik, jantki ti neech ka xalka tab ba waw ani yab ja ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom?
43014023	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xita tin kanidhl, in tajl xowa Nan u ulal. Neech ka kanidh kal nu Tta ani nu Tta ani Nan, neech ku tsch abal ku kwajay kal jaj.
43014024	Xita yab tin kanidhl, yab in tajl xowa Nan u ulal. Xowa a achltsik u ulal, yab u ulal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, tl bin chalab an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
43014025	In kwajat tu utsltsik ejtal jech lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik;
43014026	por an Tokat Ejattalb, xi neech ti ki abtsitsik an Ttalb abal ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti ki pubdhantsitsik an ta ejattal, jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal ani ti ki chalpantsitsik xowa tu utsmal.
43014027	Tu jillichtsik kal yantam i kijidhtalb. Tu pidhltsik ti kijidhtalb xu kool, por yab tu pidhltsik an ti kijidhtalb jelt xan tin pidhnl an atiklbtsik. Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax nibal ki jikey.
43014028	A achmalichtsik tam tu ulu ke Nan neech kin kale ani ke neech jun kin witsiy abal kin kwajay kal tattsik. Max tin kanidhlaktsik, neech ki kulbtsik tajat tam ta acha ke Nan in neech ban Ttalb; pos nu Tta, ms Ja plek k Nan.
43014029	Tu ltsalichtsik okox jech, abal tam ka tmun, ka belatsik.
43014030	Yabich neech tin kw ynl kal tattsik, pos neech ka ulchich an lej atax xu takix tech ti kayl. Maske jaj u takix tech ti kayl, yab in kool ni jun i awiltalb abal ti kin takiy.
43014031	Anchan kool ka tmun abal kin chobna an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl, ke Nan u kanidhl an Ttalb ani tokot u tajl xowa Jaj tin utsmal ku taja. Ki chakchtsik ani wanch.
43015001	Nanich nin kwajat jelti nin akan an uba ani nu Tta jelti xu belkol.
43015002	Ejtal an kwelek xi yab u walim, in wkoyal; por in kaxwal ani in akyal an kwelek xu walim abal ka walin ms.
43015003	Tattsik i kwajat jelti max i akidhich kal an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik.
43015004	Ki kwajaytsik echeki kal Nan, jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat kal tattsik. Jun i kwelek yab neech kin ejto ti walim max yab palat ban akanlek; anchan teye tattsik, yab neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xata alwa, max yab i kwajattsik kal Nan.
43015005	Nanich nin kwajat jelti nin akan an uba ani tattsik jelti nin kwel. Xita kwajat kal Nan ani Nan kal jaj, neech tajat kin taja xowa alwa. Tattsik yab xata neech ka ejto ka taja xowa alwa, max yab i kwajat kal Nan.
43015006	Xita yab ka kwajay kal Nan, neech ka petn jelti an kwelek xi yab u walim, neech ka wayey ani neech ka tsikan.
43015007	Max ki kwajaytsik echeki kal Nan ani yab ka uktsitsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik, ka konoytsik xowa ka lena ani neech ki pidhantsik.
43015008	Nu Tta in bachwalich i kaknaxtalb tam tattsik a tajlich tajat xowa alwa ani anchan u xalkanalich ke tsubax lejtal tu exbaliltsik.
43015009	Nan tu kanidhltsik jelt xan ti an Ttalb tin kanidhl; pos ka ntsitsik ki kwajay i kn kal Nan.
43015010	Max ka tajltsik xowa tu oktsmal, neech ka ntsi ki kwajaytsik i kn kal Nan, jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat kn kal nu Tta abal u tajl xowa tin utsl.
43015011	Tu tiltsaltsik jech abal ka koytsik an kijidhtalb jelti xi Nan u kool ani anchan ki kwajaytsik ms i kulbl.
43015012	An takixtalb xi Nan tu pidhltsik, jaich jech: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti Nan tu kanidhltsik.
43015013	An kanidhaxtalb ms plek xi jun xita yejat kin koy jaich jech: kin pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal kin loo nin jabtsik.
43015014	Tattsik tu jab, max ka tajatsik xowa Nan tu utsl.
43015015	Yabich neech tu bijiy tu tjontsixiltsik, pos jun i tjontsix, yab in chob xanty in tajl nin ajtik. Tu bijyaltsik tu jab, kom tu pidhmalichtsik ka chobna ejtal xowa tin utsmal nu Tta.
43015016	Yab tattsik tin takwymal Nan, Nan tu takwymal tattsik. Tu takwymaltsik abal ka tajatsik tajat xowa alwa ani ke jachan xowa alwa ka taja ka kwajay echeki. Anchan, ejtal xowa ka kontsi an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij, neech ti pidhatsik.
43015017	Jech jaich xowa tu punkuntsaltsik ka taja: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn.
43015018	Max ti pojkltsik xi yabtsik u belom, ka chobnatsik ke Nan okox tin pojkadh.
43015019	Max yabak i belomtsik, an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, neech ti ki kanidhatsik jelt xan tin kanidhl nin kidhtaltsik. Por Nan tu takwymaltsik tam ta kwajatwiik kal jajtsik ani jaxtm xo ti pojkltsik, kom yabich a kidhtaltsik.
43015020	Ka chalpay xanty tu utsmaltsik: “Ni jun i tjontsix kwajat ms plek k nin ajtik.” Max Nan in atnk, neech teye ki atantsik ani max in exbantsidh an tu oktsixtal, neech teye ki exbantsattsik.
43015021	Ejtal jech neech ki tajtsintsik kal Nanki tu kwenta, kom yab in exlltsik xita tin abmal.
43015022	Jajtsik yabak walbidh, max yabak in tsinek tu tawnatsik. Por xo, yab neech kin ejtotsik kin ulu ke yab walbidh;
43015023	pos xita tin pojkl Nan, in pojklichtsik jeye nu Tta.
43015024	Yabak walbidhtsik max Nan yabak u tajmal xata ba jajtsik xowa yab jayki tajadh kal ni jun xita; por xo, in chumalichtsik ejtal xowa u tajmal ani blki tin pojkl ani in pojkl jeye nu Tta.
43015025	Por jech exom ti tjnal anchan abal ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtalbiltsik: “Tin pojkatsik maske yab xata tu waltsmaltsik.”
43015026	Por tam ka ulich an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, xi Nan neech ku abna, xi neech ti tolmiy ani ti ki likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal, jaich neech ti kin tila Nan. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, tl ban Ttalb.
43015027	Tattsik neech teye ti kin tilatsik, kom i kwajinektsik kal Nan asta tu tuju tin oktsix.
43016001	Ejtal jech tu tiltsaltsik abal yab ka jila ti kin bela.
43016002	Yabich neech ki walkan ki ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, asta neech kin bajaw i kij, tam jun xita ti ki chemdha neech kin chalpay ke exom in tajl jun xata alwa abal a Dios.
43016003	Neech kin tajatsik anchan, kom yab jayki in exlmaltsik an Ttalb nibal tin exlmaltsik Nan.
43016004	Tu okxintsalichtsik tu utsa jech, abal tam kin bajaw an kij, ka chalpaytsik ke tu okox utsmalichtsik. Jech yab tu utsmaltsik okox, kom Nan bl in kwajat kal tattsik.
43016005	Por xo neech kin kalch abal kin kwajay kal xi tin abmal ani yab xita tin konyal xon tin neech.
43016006	I tepinichtsik tokot abal tu utsltsik jech.
43016007	Por tsubax tu utsltsik ke ms alwa abal tattsik kin kale. Pos max yab kin kale, yab neech ka tsch abal ka kwajay kal tattsik an Tokat Ejattalb xi neech ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal; por max kin kale, Nan neech ku aba ka tsch.
43016008	Tam Jaj ka tsch, neech kin xalkantsi an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl ke walbidhtsik, ke waach jun i lujattalb ani ke neech ka ljundh an atiklbtsik kal na Dios.
43016009	Neech kin exbaytsik abal walbidh, kom yabtsik tin bela.
43016010	Neech kin exbaytsik ke waach jun i lujattalb, kom Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb ani yabich ms neech ti kin chuutsik.
43016011	Ani neech kin exbaytsik ke neech ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios, kom an lej atax, xu takix tech ban kayl, bijtsidhich abal neech ban kibeltalb.
43016012	U kool yn xanty neech tu utsatsik, por yab neech ka ejto ka exbaytsik xo.
43016013	Por tam ka tsch an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, Jaj neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xowa tsubax; pos yab neech ti kw kal Jajki tin kwetm chalab, tokot neech kin ulu xowa ka utsan kal na Dios ani neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xowa neech ka tmun tayl.
43016014	Jaj neech ti kin xalkantsi an tu labidh tokt, pos ejtal xowa u kool ani xitam j neye Nan, jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik.
43016015	Ejtal xowa in kool an Ttalb u dhabal neye; jaxtm tu ulu ke an Tokat Ejattalb jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik xitam j neye Nan ani ejtal xowa u kool.
43016016	Kunat i kij yabich neech ti kin chuutsik; por ms lej w tayl, neech jun ti kin chuutsik, kom Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
43016017	Taltsik nin exbaliltsik knxin tm jajkitsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu jech? Abal tu utsl ke kunat i kij yabich neech ki chuu ani ke ms tayl neech jun ki chuu ani ke jaich abal Jaj neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
43016018	Janty in l kin ulu kal: “Kunat i kij?” Yab i exbayal xanty kwajat in ulal.
43016019	Na Jess in chuu abal u lenb ka konyat jun xata kal nin exbaliltsik, jaxtm tin utsatsik ench: —Nan tu utsatsik abal kunat i kij yabich neech ti kin chuutsik ani ms lej w tayl neech jun ti kin chuutsik. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ta kwajat ta knxtsik?
43016020	Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ki ukintsik ani neech ki tepintsik, por an atiklbtsik xi yab tin bell, neech ka kulbtsik. Por maske tattsik i kwajat i tepinal, an tepintalb neech ka wenkon ti kulbtalb.
43016021	Tam jun i mmlb neech kin wachiy i chakam, u tepinal abal in bajch an ora xowki neech kin acha an yajal; por tam kin wachch an chakam, in uktsal an yajal kal an kulbtalb xin achl abal in wachch jun i chakam tech ti kayl.
43016022	Anchan jeye xo, tattsik i tepinal, por neech jun tu chuutsik. Tam tu chuutsik, neech tm jun ki kulbtsik tajat kal jun i kulbtalb xi yab xita neech kin ejto ti ki wkontsi.
43016023	Jachan i kij, yabich tm neech ti kin konoytsik ni jun xata. Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa ka kontsi an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij, neech ti ki pidha.
43016024	Asta xo, yab xata a konymaltsik kal Nan tu bij; ka konoytsik ani neech ki pidhan abal ki kulbtsik echeki.
43016025	Ejtal jech tu tiltsaltsik kal i junbaxtalbki; por neech kin bajaw an kij tam yabich neech tu tiltsitsik xata kal i junbaxtalbki. Tam kin bajaw jachan an kij, neech tm tu xalkantschtsik tejwa ejtal kal tin kwenta an Ttalb.
43016026	Tam jachan i kij, neech ka kontsitsik xata an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij ani yab exom u ulal ke Nan neech ku pakabdha an Ttalb kal tattsik ta kwenta,
43016027	pos an Ttalb ti kanidhltsik. Ti kanidhltsik, kom tattsik tin kanidhl ani a belmalichtsik abal ba Dios tin tl.
43016028	In kale xon ti kwajat an Ttalb ani in tsch ba jech an kayl, por xo, neech ku jilaich jun an kayl ani neech kin witsch xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
43016029	Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Xo tajaxich exom ta kw ani yabich a ynl i junbaxtalb.
43016030	Xo i exbch abal a chob ejtal xowakich ani yab yejat ki konoy xata ni jun xita. Jaxtm ti bell ke ba Dios ta tl.
43016031	Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tm, tin bellichtsik xo?
43016032	Pos, neech kin bajaw an kij ani jaich xoich, tam neech ki bukeytsik tki tki xontiki ka chalpaytsik ki kale ani neech ti kin jilatsik kwetm. Por yab kwetm tin kwajat, kom an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan.
43016033	Tu utsltsik jech abal ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal tin kwenta abal i kwajattsik kal Nan. Neech tajat ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb tech ti kayl; por yab ka jilatsik tab, pos Nan u tmalich xowa yab alwa xi waach ban kayl.
43017001	Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu ejtal jech, in teloloy walki ani in ulu ench: —Tta, in bajch an kij. Ti kin xalkantsch an tu labidh tokt, abal Nan, xin Chakmlb kal Tat, tu xalkantsch teye an ta labidh tokt.
43017002	Pos, Tat tin pidhmal ti awiltalb abal ku takiy an atiklbtsik ani abal ku pidhatsik jeye ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, ejtaltsik xi Tat tin pidhmal.
43017003	Neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal max ti ki exlaich Tat xi junkax Dios xi tsubax ani Nan, xi Tat tin abmal.
43017004	Nan tu xalkantsmalich an ta labidh tokt tech ti kayl ani u okymalich ku taja xowa tin abmal ku taja.
43017005	Tta, ti kin xalkantsch xo ta tamt an tu labidh tokt, kal jaychki an labidh tokattalb xu kool kal Tat asta tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl.
43017006	Xi Tat a takwymaltsik ti kayl abal ti kin pidha, u xalkantsmalich xitam j teye Tat. Tat a dhabaltsik ani tin pidha ani in exbaymalichtsik na kwintal.
43017007	Xo in chobichtsik abal ejtal xowa tin pidhmal, ba Tat ti tl;
43017008	pos u utsmalichtsik xowa Tat tin utsmal ani in exbaymalichtsik. In chobnmalichtsik ke tsubax lejtal ba Tat tin tl ani in belmalichtsik ke Tat tin abmal.
43017009	Tu pakabdhl abal ka pidhatsik ta alwatal, yab tu pakabdhl abal tin alwabl xi yabtsik u belom, tu pakabdhl abal tin alwabl xi Tat tin pidhmaltsik, kom Tat a dhabaltsik.
43017010	Ejtal xowa Nan u dhabal, a dhabal teye ani xowa Tat a dhabal u dhabal neye ani nu labidh tokt u xalkanal ba jajtsik.
43017011	Nan yabich ms neech kin kwajay ban kayl, por jajtsik neech ka jilkon ban kayl, Nan neech kin kalch abal kin kwajay kal Tat. Tokat Tta, ka beletnatsik kal na awiltal xita tin pidhmal abal ka kwajaytsik junini, jelti Tat kal Nan.
43017012	Tam tin kwajat kal jajtsik ban kayl, u beletnmal kal na awiltal, ejtaltsik xi Tat tin pidhmal. Xita Tat tin pidhmal, ni jun xita yab kibchonk, tokot xi kejle kibchonkich ti kwajat, abal ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.
43017013	Xo in nechich xon ti Tat i kwajat; por u ulal jech, lejat bl in kwajat ban kayl abal ka kulbtsik echeki jelt xan ti Nan in kulbl.
43017014	U ltsmalichtsik an ta kwintal, por atantsik kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, kom yabich tech u taknaltsik ban kayl, jelt xan ti Nan yab tech in taknal ban kayl.
43017015	Yab tu kontsal abal ka wkoytsik ban kayl, tu kontsal abal yab ka walka ka ttsik kal an lej atax.
43017016	Anchan jelti Nan yab in taknal ban kayl, jajtsik yab jeye u taknal ban kayl.
43017017	Ka tokotsik kal na tsubaxtalbil; na kwintal, jaich an tsubaxtalb.
43017018	Jelt xan ti Tat tin aba ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, anchan neye xo tu abltsik ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.
43017019	Ani kal jajkitsik tin kwenta ti neech ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal jajtsik, kin pidhna jeye tinb kin tila an tsubaxtalb.
43017020	Por yab exom tu pakabdhl abal jajkitsik ka pidha an ta alwatal, tu pakabdhl jeye kal tin kwenta xi neechtsik ti kin bela tayl, tam kin achatsik an tsubaxtalb xi neech ka tiltsintsik.
43017021	Tu kontsal abal ka kwajaytsik echeki junini. Tta, ka kwajaytsik junini kal waw, anchan jelti Tat i kwajat kal Nan ani Nan in kwajat kal Tat. Ka kwajaytsik echeki junini abal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, kin belatsik ke Tat tin abmal.
43017022	U pidhmalichtsik an ti labidh tokattalb xi Tat tin pidhmal abal ka kwajaytsik junini, anchan jelti Tat ani Nan u kwajat junini.
43017023	Nan kin kwajay junini kal jajtsik ani Tat kal Nan abal ka kwajaytsik in tsubtalki lejtal junini. Anchan, neech tm kin exbay an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, ke Tat tin abmal ani ke a kanidhltsik tajat jelt xan ti Nan tin kanidhl.
43017024	Tta, xita tin pidhmaltsik, u l ka kwajay xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay abal kin chuutsik an labidh tokattalb xi Tat tin pidhmal; pos kejle tin kanidhl asta tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl.
43017025	Tta, xa tajl tokot xowa lujat; xi yabtsik u belom, yab ti exll, por Nan tu exll ani jechtsik xita tin pidhmal, in chobichtsik ke Tat tin abmal.
43017026	U ltsmalichtsik xitam j teye Tat ani neech ku ntsi ku lna abal an kanidhaxtalb xi Tat tin kontsal, kin koytsik jeye ani Nan kin kwajay echeki kal jajtsik.
43018001	Tam ti okonich kin ulu ejtal jech, kale na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik abal ka kale jun jekat jl xu bijyb Sedrn. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i alelb ani ochich taja na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik.
43018002	Na Judas, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn na Jess abal ka chemdh, in exll jeye alwa jachan an alelb, pos ynl tajat junkunk taja na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik.
43018003	Na Judas ulich taja kal yn i soldadotsik ani kal xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech an belkoltsik, u taknal kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an fariseotsik. In jnmaltsik i macht ani i tajbaxtalb.
43018004	Por kom na Jess in chobich xanty neech kin tamu, utey xon ti kwajattsik ani in konoy ench: —Jita a ayaltsik?
43018005	Tkoyat ench: —A Jess xi Nasaret. Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nanich xita na ayaltsik. Na Judas, xi kl ti exom ti pidhnb na Jess abal ka chemdh, ta jeye ti kwajat kal an ykwaltsik.
43018006	Tam ti utsantsik kal na Jess: “Nanich xita na ayaltsik”, kuxkulchtsik ani kwajlan.
43018007	Konyattsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Jita a ayaltsik? Tkontsik ench: —A Jess xi Nasaret.
43018008	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tu utsmalichtsik ke Nanich xita na ayal. Max Nan tin ayaltsik, ka walka ka kale xi jechtsik kwajat kal Nan.
43018009	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulmal na Jess ench: “Xita Tat tin pidha, yab kibchon ni jn.”
43018010	Tmki jachan, na Simn Pedro xi ta tin kool jun i macht, in jixna ani in patntsi tin ejt xuchun jn ti b an ykwal xin bij ta Malko. Jech na Malko, jaich jn ti b nin tjnlil an oklek pletsik.
43018011	Por na Jess in utsa ench na Pedro: —Ka tapa an macht. Max an Ttalb in l kin chuu ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, awxe yab yejat ku watna?
43018012	An soldadotsik kl nin oklkil ani an ykwaltsik xu taknal kal an judotsik, in yakwa na Jess ani in wika.
43018013	Jn tm okox na Jess bin kim na Ans. Jech na Ans jaich nin paylm na Kayfs, xi kwajat ti oklek ple jachan i tamub.
43018014	Na Kayfs, jaich xin utsmal an judotsik ke ms alwa abal jajtsik, ke jn tokot i inik ka chemech abal tin alwabl an atiklbtsik.
43018015	Na Simn Pedro ani jn jeye an exbal in wwnatsik na Jess. Na jn an exbal, in exlowl an oklek ple, jaxtm tin ejto ka ochich junax kal na Jess bin elbil nin kim an oklek ple.
43018016	Por na Pedro, jilkon elb ban wileb. Jaxtm, kale an exbal xin exlowl an oklek ple, kwin kal an mmlb xu belkol wileb ani in dha jeye na Pedro.
43018017	Konyat tm ench na Pedro kal an mmlb xu belkol wileb: —Yabxe jaich teye jn ti b nin exbaliltsik na Jess? Tkon ench na Pedro: —Yaba.
43018018	Kom chamay tam ti jachan i kij, an tjontsixtsik ani an ykwaltsik in jokpmal i kamal ani taja ti kubutsik ti dhilal. Na Pedro taja jeye ti kwajat kal jajtsik ti dhilal bin wl an kamal.
43018019	Konyat na Jess kal a oklek pletsik xanty in oktsixnl ani xitam j nin exbaliltsik.
43018020	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan echeki in kwajinek tin kw tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Echeki in kwajinek tin oktsix ban pulek at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xon tu junkunal ejtal an judotsik ani yab u ulmal ni jun xata chinat.
43018021	Jantki tin konyal Nan? Ka konoytsik xanty u oktsmal xita tin achmal tin oktsix, jajtsik in chob xanty u oktsmal.
43018022	Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, chawat bin wal kal jn ti b an ykwaltsik xi taja jeye ti kwajat ani utsan ench: —Anchan ta tkoyal an oklek pletsik?
43018023	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Max u ulu jun xata yab alwa, ka ulu xowa yab alwa u ulu; por max alwa xowa u ulu, jantki tin chawal?
43018024	Na Ans in abna tm wikats na Jess ba na Kayfs, nin oklkil an pletsik.
43018025	Tam ti jachan, na Pedro ta ti kubat ti dhilal ani utsan ench: —Yabxe jaich teye jn ti b nin exbaliltsik na Jess? Na Pedro in ulu ench: —Yaba.
43018026	Konyat tm ench kal jn ti b nin tojnlil an oklek pletsik, nin exlowl an inik xi kotsidh tin xuchun kal na Pedro: —Yabxe tat xita xu chumal ba jachan an chakam alelb junax kal Jaj?
43018027	Na Pedro in ulu jun ke yab ani ani tmki jachan, dhjan an pekel.
43018028	Kldh tm na Jess bin kim na Kayfs ani jn ban at xon tu ljundhom an pulek awiltalb. Tam ti jachan, exomich ti tsudhl ani an judotsik yab ochich ba jachan an at abal yab ka walbintsik, pos max ka walbintsik, yab tm neech kin ejto kin kaputsik an kapnl kal tin kwenta an paskwa.
43018029	Jaxtm ti kale na Pilato ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantom walastalb in tajmal jech an inik abal a utsbiyaltsik?
43018030	Jajtsik tkon ench: —Max Jaj yabak jaich jun i walablom, yab neech ki tsidha tech ta tamt.
43018031	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Ka jnaichtsik ani ka ljundhaich xan tin ulal an takixtalb xi tattsik a exll. Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Waw yab i kool i awiltalb abal ki chemdha ni jun xita.
43018032	Anchan ti tmun abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulmal na Jess, tam ti kwajat in till xan ti neech ka chemdh.
43018033	Ochich tm jun na Pilato ban at xon tu ljundhom, in kaniy na Jess ani in konoy ench: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
43018034	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tin konyal jech kal Tatki ta kwetm chalab o abal i tiltsinkki kal keettsik?
43018035	Tkoyat ench kal na Pilato: —A chutalxe ke nan in judo neye? Na kidhtaltsik ani an oklek pletsik, jaich ti tsidhmaltsik tech tu tamt. Janty a tajmal?
43018036	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan yab tech in takix ban kayl. Pos max anchanak, an atiklbtsik xi tin wwnl, pjxnkak abal yab kin pidhn ban judotsik. Por Nan yab tech in takix ban kayl.
43018037	Konyat tm ench kal na Pilato: —Tm, Tat i Pulek Takix? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan in Pulek Takix, jelt xan ti tat a ulal. Nan in wachink ani in tsinek ban kayl abal ku tila xowa tsubax. Ejtal xita kin exbay an tsubaxtalb, in achltsik xowa u ulal.
43018038	Konyat ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty in y an tsubaxtalb?
43018039	Por tattsik a ujnmalich ke nan ku walka jun i wiknl tam u ajbnb an paskwa; a lxe ka chuutsik ku walka nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
43018040	Tujeytsik tm jun kin ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jachan yaba! Ka walka na Barrabs! Jech na Barrabs, jaich jun i kw.
43019001	Na Pilato in abna tm ka lekbayat na Jess.
43019002	An soldadotsik in taja jun i kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh, in kwajbantsi bin k na Jess ani in xeketliy kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn.
43019003	U uteltsik tm ba na Jess ani in utsltsik ench: —Ki kwajay kijidh, Pulek Takxal an judotsik! Ani in chawaltsik bin wal.
43019004	Kale tm jun na Pilato ani in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Ka telatsik, u kldhl abal ka chuutsik ke yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb.
43019005	Kale tm na Jess in kojm an kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh ani xeketlidh kal an chak kudhkum. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —J kwajat an inik!
43019006	Tam ti chutat na Jess kal an oklek pletsik ani kal xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Ka jnaichtsik ani ka chemdhaich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, nan yab u eltsal ni jun in walab.
43019007	Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Waw i kool jun i takixtalb ani jech an takixtalb in ulal ke yejat ka chemdh, abal in ulal ke u Chakmlb kal a Dios.
43019008	Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, ms jikch.
43019009	Ochich tm jun ban at xon tu ljundhom ani in konoy ench na Jess: —Jn p teye ta tl? Por yab tkoyat kal na Jess.
43019010	Utsan tm ench kal na Pilato: —Yab neech ti kin tkoy? Yabxe a chob ke nan u kool i awiltalb ku ulu ki chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te o ku ulu ki walk?
43019011	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab neech ka ejto ka koy ni jun i awiltalb kal Nan, max na Dios yabak ti pidhmal; jaxtm, xita tin pidhna kal tat, ms ja walbidh k tat.
43019012	Asta tam ti tm, na Pilato in ayal xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin walka na Jess; por utsan kawidh ench kal an judotsik: —Max ka walka, yab a jab an lej pulek takix romano! Ejtal xita ka wenkon ti pulek takix, in tomnlich an lej pulek takix romano!
43019013	Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, in ulu abal ka kldh na Jess ani buxkan xon tu ljundhom. An koytalb xon ti buxkan, ti kwintalb ebreo, u bijyb Gabata; jech in l kin ulu, Tujbidh.
43019014	Tam ti jachan, jnich a kts u kibel abal kin bajaw an ajib xu bijyb paskwa ani chejel ktsjich xna. Na Pilato in utsa tm ench an judotsik: —J kwajat na Pulek Takxaltsik!
43019015	Por jajtsik in ulu kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha! Ka chemdha! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Ku chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te na Pulek Takxaltsik? Tkoyat ench kal an oklek pletsik: —Waw yab i kool ms i pulek takxal, tokot an lej pulek takix romano.
43019016	Pidhanichtsik tm an ta Jess kal na Pilato abal kin jnatsik kin chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te. In bachutsik tm na Jess ani in jna.
43019017	Kldhjich tm na Jess in okbm an peltsidh te abal ka kale ban chabl xu bijyb “In beklk in k i chemlom inik”, (ti kwintalb ebreo, in l kin ulu Glgota).
43019018	Tam ti ulich ban chabl xin bij Glgota, pajkiyat ban peltsidh te. Junax kal Jaj, pajkiyat jeye chb i iniktsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.
43019019	Na Pilato in abna ka kwajb bin k an peltsidh te, jun i dhuslab xon ti kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Na Jess xi Nasaret, nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
43019020	Yn i judotsik in ajay jachan an dhuslab kom an chabl xon ti pajkiyat na Jess ban peltsidh te, kunat ti kwajat ban bitsow. An dhuslab kwajat dhutsadh ebreo, griego ani latn.
43019021	Jaxtm ti utsan ench na Pilato kal nin oklek pleil an judotsik: —Yab ka dhutsa: “nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik”, ms alwa ka dhutsa ench: “Xin ulal ke Jaj in Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
43019022	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Xowa u dhutsa, anchanich neech ka jilkon.
43019023	Tam ti an soldadotsik in pajkiymalich na Jess ban peltsidh te, in pentsi an tin kudhkmil na Jess ani in muu ti ch i peje, juntsik peje abal jun i soldado. In pentsi jeye an tin eblidh kudhkumil ani kom yab ja tsukudhki, juntaki ja tin publ ti kwajat,
43019024	tsxin an soldadotsik jn ani jn ench: —Yab ki muu, wana ku ubtin abal ki chuu xita kin lujuy kin dhabalna. Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “In wlchxnatsik nu kudhkmil ani ubtintsik abal kin chuu xita kin lujuy kin dhabalna nu eblidh kudhkumil.” Jech jaich xowa in taja an soldadotsik.
43019025	Kunat ban peltsidh te xon ti kwajat pajkidh na Jess, ta ti kwajat nin nna ani nin kidhb nin nna; na Mara, nin tomtal na Kleofas ani na Mara Magdalena.
43019026	Tam ti na Jess in chuu nin nna ani kubl jeye tin wl an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, in utsa ench nin nna: —Mmlb, jachan kwajat na chakmil.
43019027	Tayl in utsa jeye ench an exbal: —Jachan kwajat na nna. Ani asta tam ti jachan i kij, nin nna na Jess, bachwat abal ka kwajch bin kim an exbal.
43019028	Ms tayl, kom na Jess in chob abal tmunich ejtal xowa bijidh neech ka tmun, in ulu ench abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab: —In tsikl.
43019029	T ti kwajat taja jun i balixtalb tsutsat kal i jiliy yajtsik uxnl. Axdh w i kwinim ba jachan an jiliy yajtsik uxnl, wikan bin tsm jun i te xu bijyb ti isopo ani utuntsat bin wi na Jess.
43019030	Tam ti na Jess in uchmich an jiliy yajtsik uxnl, in ulu ench: —Ejtalich tmun jelt xan ti bijidh neech ka tjan. Kutpan tm ani chemech.
43019031	Jnich a kts u kibel abal kin bajaw an paskwa ani an judotsik yab in l kin chuu ka jilkon nin tul an chemlomtsik ban peltsidh te tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos jachan a kts jaich xi uluts tajat. Jaxtm ti pakabdh na Pilato abal kin abna ka pejtsin tin chejettsik xi ta ti kwajattsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani ka wkoyatichtsik tm ban peltsidh te junax kal na Jess.
43019032	Kale tm an soldadotsik ani in pejtsi tin chejet xi ta jeye ti kwajattsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
43019033	Por tam ti uteytsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, in chuu abal chemnekich. Jaxtm ti yabich Ja pejtsin an tin chejet.
43019034	Por jn ti b an soldadotsik, in cholkantsi tin chyl kal jun i chupidh patl ani tmki ti kale i xich ani i ja.
43019035	Xita kwajat in till jech, jaich jun xita xin chumal ani tsubax xowa in ulal; jaj in chob alwa ke tsubax xowa in ulal abal ka belatsik teye.
43019036	Pos ejtal jech tmun abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Yab neech ka pejtsin ni jun in beklk.”
43019037	Ani ta jeye kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xon tin ulal ench: “Neech ka chuutsik xi chojbdhats.”
43019038	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jos, xu kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Arimatea, in pakabdha na Pilato abal ka walkan kin jna nin tul na Jess. Na Jos jaich jun i inik xin bell na Jess, maske chinatki, kom in chejnl an judotsik. Pidhan an ti awiltalb kal na Pilato, kale tm na Jos ani in jnaich tm nin tul na Jess.
43019039	Ulich jeye na Nikodemo, xi kalnek jun i akal ti kw kal na Jess ani in tsidhl jun inik lju i kilo i ill xi tajadh kal i mirra xukudh kal i loe.
43019040	Na Jos ani na Nikodemo in bachutsik tm nin tul na Jess ani in boliy kal i kudhkum xi umtsidh jachan an ti niwiy ill; anchan xan tin tajl an judotsik tam in jolyal i chemlomtsik.
43019041	Xon ti chemdh na Jess pajkidh ban peltsidh te, ta ti kwajat jun i chakam alelb; taja, ta ti cholkadh i chn xon ti neech ka jolyat i chemlom, bl tajat t ani yab jayki jolidh bl ni jun xita.
43019042	Taja ti kwajbantsat tin tul na Jess, kom kunat ti kwajat jachan an jlimtalb ani abal tam ti jachan, tmich tin tojojoyal an judotsik xowa in yntsal abal an paskwa.
43020001	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, na Mara Magdalena kale dhajawe ban jlimtalb, bl tajat jikwax. Tam ti ulich ban jlimtalb, in chuu abal wkodh an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh jachan an jlimtalb.
43020002	Kale tm adhik xon ti kwajat na Simn Pedro ani xi jn jeye an exbal xu kanidhb tajat ani in utsatsik ench: —An Ajtiklb wkodh ban jlimtalb ani yab i chob xon ti kwajbadh!
43020003	Na Pedro ani na jn an exbal kaletsik ani kale ban jlimtalb.
43020004	Chablam ti b ti kale ti dhiltsik; por na jn ms adhik ti kale k na Pedro ani okox ti ulich ban jlimtalb.
43020005	Kutpan kin tela ani in chuu an kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh tin tul na Jess, por yab ochich.
43020006	Tin kuxmats ulich jeye na Simn Pedro ani ochich ja ban jlimtalb. In chuu jeye an kudhkumtsik xi kl ti boltsidh tin tul na Jess.
43020007	In chuu jeye abal an kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh tin k na Jess yab junax ti kwajat kal xi ms an kudhkumtsik, plki ti kwajat mululudh.
43020008	Ochich jeye tm na jn an exbal xi okox ti ulnek ban jlimtalb, in chuu xanty tmnk ani in bela.
43020009	Pos yabl in exbaymaltsik xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, ke na Jess kool ka ejech ti t.
43020010	Tayl, jech an exbaltsik witsiy tin kim.
43020011	Na Mara jilkon elb ban jlimtalb ti uknal. Lejat kwajat ti uknal, kutpan kin tela alkidh ban jlimtalb,
43020012	ani in chuu chb i tokat abatwletsik xeketlidh kal i dhak kudhkum buxutsik xon ti kwajbantsidh tin tul na Jess, jn tin k ani jn tin akan.
43020013	Konyat ench kal an tokat abatwletsik: —Mmlb, jantki ta uknal? Jaj tkon ench: —In uknal abal in jntsidh an tu Ajtik ani yab u chob xon ti kwajbadh.
43020014	Tam tin ulmalich jech, chawkin ani in chuu na Jess, por yab in chob max jaich na Jess.
43020015	Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, jantki ta uknal? Jita a ayal? Na Mara, kom in chalpay max jaich xu belkol an ti chakam alelb, in utsa ench: —Paylomlb, max tat a jnmal, ti kin ltsi xon ta kwajbmal abal kin kale ku iki.
43020016	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mara! Na Mara chawkin ani in utsa ench kal i kwintalb xi ebreo: —Raboni! —jech in l kin ulu, Oktsix.
43020017	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin walka, yabich ms ti kin taka, pos yabl in kalnek xon ti kwajat nu Tta. Por ki kale ani ka tiltsi an kidhblbtsik ke Nan in nechich xon ti kwajat nu Tta ani a Ttatsik teye, nu Diosil ani a Diosiltsik teye.
43020018	Kale tm na Mara Magdalena ani in ltsi an exbaltsik ke in chumal an Ajtiklb ani in ltsitsik jeye xanty usnk kal na Jess.
43020019	Tam ti jikwchinich jaychki jachan na kts, nin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, junkunk an exbaltsik ba jun i at mapupudh an wileb abal in jiknl an judotsik. Ochich na Jess, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik ani chapndhaxin ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh!
43020020	Tam tin ulu jech, na Jess in lna nin kubak ani nin chyl. Ani an exbaltsik kulb tajat abal in chuutsik an Ajtiklb.
43020021	Utsantsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh! Anchan jelt xan tin abmal an Ttalb, anchan neye xo tu abltsik.
43020022	Jutsutsuyattsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Ka bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb.
43020023	Xita ka pakwlantsitsik, neech ka pakwlantsat; xita yab ka pakwlantsitsik, yab neech ka pakwlantsat.
43020024	Na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya, xi jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, yab ja waach kal xi ms an exbaltsik tam ti ulich na Jess.
43020025	Tayl ltsin ench kal xi keet an exbaltsik: —I chumal an Ajtiklb. Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Toms: —Max yab ku chuu bin kubak xon ti ochenek an pajkixtalb ani ku xapa nu tstsbixtal xon ti ochenek an pajkixtalb ani ku xapa jeye nu kubak bin chyl, yab neech ku bela.
43020026	Waxik a kts ms tayl, an exbaltsik junkunk jun ba jun i at ani tam ti jachan i kij, ta jeye ti kwajat na Toms kal jajtsik. Mapudhtsik tin kool an wileb, por ochich na Jess, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani chapndhomch ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh!
43020027	Utsan tm ench na Toms kal na Jess: —Ka xapa tech na tstsbixtal ani ka tela nu kubaktsik; ka tsidha na kubak ani ka xapa ba nu chyl. Yab ka jlkkliyal na chalab, tokot ka ntsi ti kin bela.
43020028	In ulu tm ench na Toms: —Tat tu Ajtik ani tu Diosil!
43020029	Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —I belmch abalki tin chuu? Kijidhtsik tajat abal xita tin belltsik maske yab tin chumal!
43020030	Na Jess in tajm yn ms i labidh exltsik tin tamt nin exbaliltsik, xi yab kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w.
43020031	Por xowa kwajat dhutsadh, jaich abal ka belatsik ke na Jess jaich an Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios ani max ka bela, neech ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
43021001	Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess in xalka jun tinb abal ka chutat kal nin exbaliltsik. Jech tmun bin wl an pujal xi Tiberias, ench ti tmun:
43021002	Jun i kij, kwajattsik junini na Simn Pedro, na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya ani na Natanael, xu kwajl Kan, an bitsow xu taknal Galilea. T jeye ti kwajat nin chakmiltsik na Sebedeo ani chb ms in exbaliltsik na Jess.
43021003	Tam ti tajatsik ti kwajat junini, utsantsik ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Neech tin jixom tool. Jajtsik tkon ench: —U neech weye kal tat. Kadhiytsik tm ba jun i tan ani kale; por jachan i akal yab xata in ejtotsik kin jixa.
43021004	Tam ti exomich ti tsudhl, na Jess in xalka tinb tin wl an pujal, por an exbaltsik yab in chob max jaich na Jess.
43021005	Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Chakamtsik, yabxe xata a kool ki kapu? Tkontsik ench: —Yaba.
43021006	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka petnatsik nin jixb an tool tin ejt an tan ani neech ka jixatsik an tool. Anchan tin tajatsik ani junwki nibalich in ejtowaltsik kin kldha ban ja nin jixb an tool kal in lm, kom yn i tool ykwnk.
43021007	Utsan tm ench na Pedro kal an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess: —Jaich an Ajtiklb! Tam ti na Simn Pedro in acha abal jaich an Ajtiklb, xeketlin kom chilim ti kwajat ani in petna tinb ban ja.
43021008	Xi keet an exbaltsik, ulich kal an tan bin wl an pujal xon ti yab owtsik, in bodhkm in jixb an tool tsutsat kal an tooltsik; pos nin owl xon ti kwajattsik abal bin wl an ja, in kool xna bo inik i metro.
43021009	Tam ti ulichtsik ban chabl, in elatsik jokpadh i kamal. Ban kamal ta ti exom ti tekel jun i tool ani i pan jeye.
43021010	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka tsidhatsik chb x i tool xi tall ta jixmaltsik.
43021011	Na Simn Pedro kadhiy ban tan ani in bodhoy in jixb an tool tsutsat kal an pakdha tool asta tin wl an ja xon ti yab lej owtsik. Nin yanl an tool, jun i bo inik kal chab inik lajux ani maske yn tajat an tool, nin jixb yab michkan.
43021012	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jala ta kapultsik. Ni jn an exbaltsik yab in l kin konoy xitam j jeye, kom in chobichtsik ke jaich an Ajtiklb.
43021013	Tayl utey na Jess, in tyna an pan ani in pidha an exbaltsik; anlki jeye tin taja kal an tool.
43021014	Jech jaich tin oxtalich ke na Jess in xalkl tinb abal ka chutat kal nin exbaliltsik tam ti ejnekich ti t.
43021015	Tam ti okonich ti kapultsik, na Jess in konoy ench na Simn Pedro: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe ms ke xi jechtsik? Tkon ench na Pedro: —Tu kanidhl Ajtik, Tat a chob alwa abal tu kanidhl. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Pos ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.
43021016	Konyat jun tin chabtal: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe? Tkoyat ench kal na Pedro: —Tu kanidhl Ajtik, Tat a chob alwa abal tu kanidhl. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.
43021017	Konyat jun tin oxtal: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe? Na Pedro tepin abal xlich ti konyb max in kanidhl na Jess ani tkon ench: —Ajtik, Tat ejtal a chob; a chob abal tu kanidhl. Utsan tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.
43021018	Tsubax tu utsl, ke tam ti ms i kwitle, i xeketlinal ani i kalel xon ti tat ka lena; por tam ki yejchelmch, neech ka dhaya na okb ani keet neech ti ki xeketliy ani neech ti ki jna xon ti yab a l ki kale.
43021019	Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, kwajat in till xan ti neech ka chemech na Pedro ani anchan, kin xalkantsi tin labidh tokt na Dios. Tayl utsan ench na Pedro: —Ti kin wwna!
43021020	Tam ti chawkin na Pedro, in chuu abal ta jeye ti tl tin kx an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess. Jech an exbal, jaich xi jedhkakank bin okb na Jess tam ti kwajattsik ti kapul ani in konymal ench: “Ajtik, jita j xi neech ti ki pidhna abal ki chemdh?”
43021021	Tam ti na Pedro in chuu jech an exbal, in konoy ench na Jess: —Ajtik, janty jeye neech kin tamu jech an exbal?
43021022	Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Max u l ka kwajay ejat asta tam Nan kin witsiy, jant neech ka yna? Tat ti kin wwnaich tokot.
43021023	Jaxtm ti tlan ban kidhblbtsik, ke jech an exbal yab neech ka chemech. Por xowa in ulmal na Jess jaich jech: “Max u l ka kwajay ejat asta tam Nan kin witsiy, jant neech ka yna?”
43021024	Jech an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, jaich xi kwajat in till ejtal jech ani jaj in dhutsmal. Ani i chob ke tsubax xowa in ulal.
43021025	Waach jeye yn ms keet xowa in tajmal na Jess. Yn tajat, ke max ka dhutsan juntsik ti juntsik, u chalpayal ke nibal tin putll an kayl yab neech ka exey an dhutsadh wtsik xi ka tajan. Anchan ka tjan.
44001001	Pulek Tefilo, ban jidhtal w xi tu dhutsuntsi, u dhutsa ejtal xowa na Jess in taja ani in oktsixna tam ti tujeyki ejtal jech
44001002	ani asta tam tin bajaw na kts xowki ti kadhch walki. Tam ti yabl kadhinek walki, in takiy nin abatwlejiltsik xin takwym tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal kin chobnatsik xanty neech kin taja.
44001003	Tam ti chemdh na Jess ani ejnekich ti t, in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal nin abatwlejiltsik. Tin nakl chab inik a kts, in ntsi kin xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal jajtsik ke tsubax lejtal ti ejnek ti t. U tiltsinaltsik kal na Jess xan tu takix na Dios.
44001004	Tam ti bl kwajat junax kal an abatwletsik, utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab ka kaletsik ban bitsow Jerusaln. Ench ti utsantsik: —Ka aytsitsik an Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal nu Tta ke neech ka tsch, jelt xan ti Nan tu utsmaltsik.

44001006	Konyat tm ench na Jess kal xi ta ti junkunktsik: —Ajtik, xoichxe ti neech ka taja abal yabich ku kwajay taknl kal i pl inik waw xu israelita?
