44001007	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab tattsik a lujyal ka chobna xowki o xowa neech kin taja an Ttalb xi tokot Jajki in kool i awiltalb kin taja;
44001008	por tam ka bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ka bachutsik i chplb. Neech ti ki likedha abal ki kaletsik ti kin tila putl Jerusaln, putl ban chabl xi Judea, xi Samaria ani asta ban owdha bitsowtsik xi waach tech ti kayl.
44001009	Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, lejat jajtsik kwajat in tell, na Jess dhayan ani jnjich walki; makwchiyat kal jun i tokow ani yabich ms chutat.
44001010	Lejat kwajat in telltsik walki tam ti exom ti kadhl na Jess, xalkan jun jiktowl xon ti kwajattsik, chb i iniktsik xeketlidh kal dhakni
44001011	ani utsantsik ench kal jachan an iniktsik: —Paylomlbtsik xi Galilea, jantki ta kwajattsik a tell walki? Jaychki jech na Jess xa chuutsik ti kadhl walki, neech ka witsiy jun anlki jelt xan ta chuutsik ti kale.
44001012	In jilaichtsik tm an chn xu bijyb Olibos ani witsiytsik Jerusaln. An bl abal ban chn Olibos asta Jerusaln, yab lej nakat; jaich tokot xowa in ulal an takixtalb ka beln tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
44001013	Tam ti ulichtsik ban bitsow, kadhiy ban at xon tu kwajltsik. Jajtsik, jaich na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan, na Andrs, na Felipe, na Toms, na Bartolom, na Mateo, na Jakobo xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo, na Simn xu taknal ban junkuntalb xu bijyb kananista ani na Judas, nin kidhb na Jakobo.
44001014	Ejtal jajtsik u junkunal echeki abal ka lantsik junax kal nin kidhbtsik na Jess, kal na Mara nin nna na Jess ani kal xi ms an mmlbtsik.
44001015	Tam ti jachan i kij, kubey na Pedro junax chejel xon ti kwajat an kidhblbtsik, (nin yanl an kidhblbtsik jaich jn i bo inik kal jun inik i atiklbtsik) ani in utsatsik ench:
44001016	—Kidhblbtsik, kool ka tjan xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in ulmal ban Tokat Dhuslab, xi kwnk tin wi na Dabid, kal tin kwenta xowa neech ka tmun kal na Judas. Jech na Judas, jaich xi yan ti lnax kal an iniktsik xi kal ti yakwan na Jess.
44001017	Pos na Judas jaich jn ti b xi waw i kidhtal ani in kool jeyewiik xowa yejat kin taja kal jech an tojlb.
44001018	Por kale ani in chaay jun i chabl kal an tumn xin ta kal nin walab; tayl kwajlan chepat, pewen ani txin ejtal nin tidhdh.
44001019	Ejtal an kwajltsik xi Jerusaln, in chobna ani in bijiytsik jachan an chabl, Asldama, ke jaj tin kwintaltsik in l kin ulu, Xich Chabl.
44001020	Abal ban dhutsadh w, an ajatlbtsik in ulal ench: Ka jilkon walbadh nin altjil ani yab ka kwajay ni jun xita taja.  Ani in ulal jeye ench: Ani ka kuxyat kal keet.
44001021	Waach tech kal waw i paylomlbtsik xi tu juniknmal echeki tam ti tech ti kwajat kal waw ni Ajtik Jess,
44001022	asta tam ti pujyat kal na Juan asta tam ti kadhch walki. Yejat p, ke jn ti b xi jajtsik ka junkun kal waw abal kin tila jeye ke na Jess ejech ti t tam ti chemdh.
44001023	Bijyat tm chb xi jajtsik: na Jos, xu bijyb Barsabs ani u bijyb jeye ta Justo ani na Matas.
44001024	lantsik tm ench: —Ajtik, Tat xa a exll ejtal an ejattalbtsik, ti ku ltsi xita xi jech chb a takwymal
44001025	abal kin taja nin tojlbil jun i abatwle xi na Judas in jila kal nin walab, pos jaj kale xon tin lujyal ka kale.
44001026	Ubtintsik tm abal kin chuu xitam j kin lujuy ka jilkon tin kuxl na Judas, ani na Matas, jaich in lujuy ka jilkon. Asta ti tm, na Matas junkunich kal xi lajujn an abatwletsik.
44002001	Tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an ajib Pentekosts, ejtal an belomtsik junkunk junini.
44002002	Jun jiktowle ti achatm jun xata xi tl walki, jelti tam u wawnal jun i chapik ik ani achatm putlki an alt xon ti buxutsik.
44002003	Xalkan tm ba jajtsik in b jun i kamal jomoml.
44002004	Ejtal in bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb ani in tujutsik ti kw keetich keetich, xantiki ti tajan ka kwin kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
44002005	Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat ti kwajltsik Jerusaln i judotsik xin tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin belomtaltsik, xi tltsik tki tki tin putll an kayl.
44002006	Tam ti achatm jachan, junkun jech an atiklbtsik ani nibalich in chobtsik xanty kin chalpay abal in achltsik ti kw an belomtsik keetich keetich jelt xan ti jajtsik u kw.
44002007	Labnktsik tajat ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Yabxe jaich xu kwajltsik Galilea xi jech kwajat ti tilomtsik?
44002008	Jantki p tm ti achltsik ti kw jelt xan ti waw u kw asta tu tsitsik?
44002009	Pos tech kwajat i atiklbtsik xi tl Partos, xi Medos, xi Elm, xi Mesopotamia, xi Judea, xi Kapadosia, xi Ponto ani xi tltsik ban chabl xi Asia.
44002010	Tech jeye kwajat xi tltsik Frijia, xi Panfilia, xi Ejipto ani xi ban chabltsik xi Afrika xi kwajattsik ms w k Sirene. Tech jeye kwajat i romanotsik xu kwajltsik tech; taltsik xi jajtsik u judo ani taltsik yaba, por in wwnantsmalichtsik tin belomtal an judotsik.
44002011	Tech jeye kwajat i atiklbtsik xi tl Kreta ani xi Arabia. Ani ejtal i achltsik ti kw kal waw i kwintal, tam ti kwajattsik in till an pakdha labidhtalb xin tajm na Dios.
44002012	Ejtal labnktsik tajat, yabich in chobtsik xanty kin chalpay ani u knx jajkitsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu ejtal jech?
44002013	Por taltsik u labdhnax ani in ulaltsik ench: —U itelkitsik ti kwajat.
44002014	Kubey tm na Pedro junax kal xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani in utsa kawidh ench an atiklbtsik: —At judotsik xi ulnek tech Jerusaln ani ejtal xi kwajltsik tech, ka chobnatsik jech ani ka achatsik alwa xanty neech tu utsa.
44002015	Jech an atiklbtsik yab u itel jelt xan ta chalpayaltsik, pos xowy belju i dhajaw.
44002016	Yab u iteltsik, jech jaich xowa xin ulmal an tiltsix Joel, tam tin ulu ench ijtsidh kal na Dios:
44002017	Na Dios in ulu abal ench neech ka tmun tam u kunelich an pakwenib, neech ku abtsi an tu Tokat Ejattal ejtalki an atiklbtsik; an chakmlbtsik neech ti tiltsix, xi yabltsik lej pakdha, neech kin chuu i xalkantsixtalb ani an yejcheltsik neech kin koy i watsib.
44002018	Jachan i kij neech ku pidha tajat tu Tokat Ejattal an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik xi tin tjontsal ani neech ti tiltsixtsik.
44002019	Ban walki neech ku xalka xowakich i labidh exltsik ani ban chabl neech ku xalka i exltsik: i xich, i kamal ani i paw xi jelti tokow.
44002020	Na kts neech ka jikwchin ani na ch neech ka wenkon jelti xich, tam yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, xi jaich na kts xi plek ani labidh.
44002021	Ani ejtal xita kin konoy ka lowat kal an Ajtiklb, neech ka loey.
44002022	At judotsik, ka acha xanty neech tu utsatsik: Na Jess xi Nasaret, jaich jun i inik xi takudh kal a Dios ta tamt tattsik abal kin taja i pakdha labidhtalb, i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik xin taja na Dios ba tattsik kal na Jesski, jelt xan ta chobichtsik alwa.
44002023	Por blki, tam ta pidhantsik an ta Jess, jelt xan ti na Dios in koolich kejle chalpadh, a jnatsik ti wiknl ani a pidhna ban atax iniktsik abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
44002024	Por na Dios in ejdha ti t ani in tantsi tin awiltal an cheml. Pos na Jess yab neech ka ejtowat ka t kal an cheml.
44002025	A Jess u tilnal kal an pulek takix Dabid tam tin ulu ti weje ench: Echeki u chutal an Okxlb tu tamt; Jaj kwajat tu ejt abal yab ku jikna ni jun xata.
44002026	Jaxtm ti kulb tajat nu itsch ani jaxtm tu tila i tilabtsik xi kijidh. Ani jaxtm jeye ti neech kin koych u aytsm ke Jaj ti kin ejdha ti t;
44002027	pos Tat, tin Tokat Chakmil, yab neech ka jila nu ejattal bin takixtal an cheml, nibal neech ka walka ka kachey nu tul.
44002028	Tin ltsmalich an ti bl abal ku ela an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani neech tajat ti kin kijidhmdha tam kin kwajch xon ta kwajat.
44002029	At kidhbtsik, tsubax kejle ke ni weje paklil Dabid chemech ani jolyat, pos an jlimtalb xon ti jolidh, tech bl kwajat kal waw.
44002030	Por na Dabid jaich jun i tiltsix ani in chob abal usnk tsubax tajat kal na Dios, ke jn ti b nin kidhtaltsik jaich neech an ti Kristo xi neech ka buxkan ti takix bin tokat kwajtalbil.
44002031	Jaxtm na Dabid, kom in chobich xanty usnk kal na Dios, in ulu abal an Kristo neech ka ejech ti t ani in ulu jeye abal nin ejattal yab neech ka jilkon bin takixtal an cheml nibal neech ka odhey nin tul.
44002032	Pos na Dios in ejdha ti t jech na Jess ani ejtal jech i chumal ani i ulal abal tsubax lejtal.
44002033	Pos Jaj dhayan kal in chp nin ejt kubak na Dios an Ttalb ani pidhan kl an ti Tokat Ejattalb xi usnk neech ku abtsin. Ejtal jech xowa a chumaltsik ani a achmal, tl ban Tokat Ejattalb.
44002034	Pos na Dabid yab jaj na kadhiy walki, por jaj in ulu ench: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt,
44002035	asta tu tantsi an ti atiklbtsik xi ti tomnl.”
44002036	Ka chobnatsik alwa, atiklbtsik xi Israel, ke jech na Jess xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te, na Dios in kwajba abal ti Ajtiklb ani ti Kristo.
44002037	Tam tin achatsik jech, tepintsik tajat asta tin itsch ani konyat ench na Pedro ani xi ms an abatwletsik jeye: —Kidhblbtsik, janty yejat ki taja?
44002038	Tkoyattsik ench kal na Pedro: —Ka jilaichtsik ta walablom ani ka tajaichtsik xowa in l na Dios. Ki pujanichtsik tin bij na Jesukristo abal ki pakwlantsatich an ta walastalbiltsik ani anchan, na Dios neech tm ti pidhaichtsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb.
44002039	Jech xowa na Dios in pidhnl, jaich abal tattsik, abal na chakmiltsik ani abal ejtalki jeye xi kwajattsik owdha; jaich abal ejtalkitsik xita ka kanyat kal an Okxlb ni Diosil.
44002040	Kal jech an tilabtsik ani chb x ms, na Pedro in tawna ani in takiytsik ench: —Ka bachchtsik an loeltalb ani yabich ki kwajaytsik yab alwa jelti xi keet an atiklbtsik.
44002041	Anchan p, xin belatsik jech xowa utsan, pujyattsik. Jachan a kts, belmch ox mil xna i atiklbtsik ms.
44002042	Ejtal in ntsi kin bela xowa j u oktsinaltsik kal an abatwletsik, kwajajadhtsik alwa jn ani jn, u ltsik ani u junkunaltsik abal kin kapu an pan.
44002043	Ejtal u labnaltsik tajat, kal tin kwenta xi yn an labidh labandhaxtalb ani an exltsik xin tajl an abatwletsik.
44002044	Ejtal xi belmmadhichtsik, u junkunal tajat ani u chjwlx xatakich jn ani jn.
44002045	In nujwaltsik nin chablil ani ejtal xowa in kooltsik ani in wlchxnltsik an tumn ejtalki ti b xantiki tin kooltsik an yejetalb.
44002046	Tsudhey ka tsudhey u junkunaltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ban attsik abal kin pjtsxna an pan; in kapaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb ani kal jun in chaat ejattaltsik.
44002047	In ajtintsaltsik na Dios ani u kaknbtsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik. Ani an Ajtiklb in yanedhl an belomtsik tsudhey ka tsudhey xu utelichtsik abal ka loch.
44003001	Jun i kij, tam ti xich i wkal, na Pedro ani na Juan kale junax ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech i ora tmich tin ujnmaltsik ka kalel ti l.
44003002	Tsudhey ka tsudhey u kwajl taja jun i inik xu kweche; jech an inik, u kweche ti wachink. U jnb ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani u kwajbb ban wileb xu bijyb ti Labidh abal kin kontsi ti tolmixtalb xu ocheltsik taja.
44003003	Tam ti chutat na Pedro ani na Juan kal an kweche ke exomichtsik ti ochel ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, pakabdhaxin an kweche abal ka pidhan ti tolmixtalb.
44003004	Teloloyat tm kal na Pedro ani na Juan ani utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Ti ku tela.
44003005	Telxin tm an inik abal in chalpay max neech ka pidhan ti tolmixtalb.
44003006	Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Yab u kool i plata nibal i oro, por neech tu pidha xowa u kool. Tin bij na Jesukristo xi Nasaret, tu utsl ki kubey ani ki beley.
44003007	In tyna tm na Pedro an inik bin ejt kubak ani in dhaya; tmki ti likey nin akantsik ani nin mulk nin akantsik jachan an inik.
44003008	Tikcholch tm an kweche, kubey ani in tujch tm ti belal. Ochich tm junax kal jajtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, u belal, u tikwnal ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios.
44003009	Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti chutat ti belal ani ti pubdhantsix tin bij na Dios.
44003010	Labnktsik tajat ejtal ani u jikl abal anchan in chuutsik tmun, pos u exlb ke jachan an inik, jaich xu buxkanal ti konox tolmixtalb bin wilbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xu bijyb ti Labidh.
44003011	Yab u jilchowb na Pedro ani na Juan kal an inik xi jeldh; ejtal an atiklbtsik labnk tajat ani adhiktsik ti kale bin chakll an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech an chak, jaich xu bijyb Salomn. Taja ti kwajattsik na Pedro, na Juan ani an inik xi jeldhats.
44003012	Tam ti na Pedro in chuu jech, in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Israel, jantki ta labnktsik tajat? Jantki ta kwajattsik tu tell jelti max kal waw i chp o i tokattal ti jeley ani ti beley jech an inik?
44003013	Yab anchan, nin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk, na Jakob ani ni weje pakliltsik in pidhmal tin pulek awiltal nin Chakmil Jess. Jachan an inik, jaich xi tattsik a pidhna ban tjodhtsik. Tam ti na Pilato in lena kin walka, tattsik yab a lena.
44003014	Tam ti yejat ka konoy abal ka walk jachan an inik xi tokat ani lujat, tattsik, tokot a konoy ki walkantsat jun i chemdhax inik.
44003015	Anchan ta chemdhatsik jachan an inik xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Por na Dios in ejdha ti t ani ejtal jech, waw i chumal.
44003016	Jaich kal tin bij jech na Jess, o jaich ki ulu, an belomtalb kal Jaj tin bij, jaich kl ti pidhan an ti chplb jech an inik xa chutaltsik ani a exll. Jech an belomtalb kal na Jess, jaich kl ti jeldh, anchan xan ti xo i kwajat a chutaltsik.
44003017	Kidhblbtsik, u chob alwa, ke tam ti tattsik ani na oklkiltsik a chemdha na Jess, a tajatsik anchan abal yab a chobtsik xanty i kwajat a tajl.
44003018	Por na Dios in taja anchan jelt xan tin ulmich kejle ms okox kal nin tiltsxiltsik, ke an Kristo kool kin watna i yajtsiktalb ani ka chemdh.
44003019	Jaxtm xo, ka jilaich ta walablomtsik ani ka belaichtsik na Dios abal ki pakwlantsattsik an ta walastalbil. An Okxlb neech tm kin abna i kij xi alwa,
44003020	neech kin aba na Jesukristo, xi takudhich ti weje abal tattsik ki loey.
44003021	Por xo, yejat kejle ke na Jesukristo ka kwajay ban walki asta tam na Dios kin lejkch ejtal, jelt xan tin ulmal kal nin tokat tiltsxiltsik xi kwajinektsik ti weje.
44003022	Anchan p, na Moiss in utsa ench ni weje pakliltsik: “Na Dios an Okxlb neech kin takuy jun ti b xi tattsik abal ti tiltsix jelt xan ti nan tin takwymal. Ka exbantsitsik ejtal xowa Jaj ti ki utsa.
44003023	Pos ejtal xi yab kin taja ti kij jachan an tiltsix, neech ka kibdhtsik ani neech ka wkoyat ban atiklbtsik xin takwymal na Dios.”
44003024	Ejtal an tiltsixtsik, asta tam ti xechin na Samuel ani xi ms tayltsik, in tilmal jech an kijtsik.
44003025	Xowa na Dios in ulmal kal nin tiltsxiltsik, jaich abal tattsik. Jaich jeye abal tattsik ta alwabl tin tajmal na Dios jun i lejkintalb kal ni weje pakliltsik, tam tin utsa na Abraham ench: “Ejtal xi ka wachintsik tech ti kayl, neech ka lbtjan kal tatki na kidhtaltsik.”
44003026	Tam ti na Dios in ejdha ti t nin Chakmil, tu abtsi okox waw abal ti ku lbtaja ani ki jilaich tu walablom.
44004001	Tam ti na Pedro ani na Juan bl kwajat in tawnl an atiklbtsik, ulich an pletsik junax kal nin oklkil an belkol pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani kal an saduseotsik.
44004002	Jajtsik u chakl tajat abal na Pedro ani na Juan in oktsal an atiklbtsik ani in ulal abal an chemlomtsik u ejel ti t jelt xan ti na Jess ejech ti t.
44004003	Jntsik tm ani balyat ban wikaxte asta jun tsudhelom, pos tam ti jachan a kts, wkalich.
44004004	Por yn i atiklbtsik belmch xin acha xowa in ulu na Pedro. Nin yanl an atiklbtsik xi belmch, tokot jki ajidh an iniktsik, in bajaw xna wich bo mil.
44004005	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, junkuntsik Jerusaln an pakdha awiltalbtsik, nin oklkiltsik an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44004006	T jeye ti kwajattsik na Ans, xi jaich in oklkil an pletsik, na Kayfs, na Juan, na Alejandro ani ejtal in kidhtaltsik an oklek pletsik.
44004007	Abn tm ka iktat na Pedro ani na Juan, kwajbtsik junax chejel ani konyattsik ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb, o kal jita in bij ta tajmaltsik ejtal jech?
44004008	Na Pedro, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb in utsatsik tm ench: —Oklek atiklbtsik ani oklek judotsik,
44004009	kom tattsik tu konyal kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi tjan ba jun i yaul inik abal a l ka chobnatsik xan ti jeldh,
44004010	neech ki ulu ta tamttsik abal kin chobna ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Israel, ke jech an inik xi j kwajat, jelnek tin bij na Jesukristo xi Nasaret. Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani xi na Dios in ejdha ti t.
44004011	Jelti jun i kbal at xin kwajba pl jun i tujub abal yab in l kin yna, anchan ta tajatsik kal na Jess, por Jaj in bajaw ka kwajay jelti an tujub xi ultalb.
44004012	Ba ni jun xita ms ti neech ki ela i loeltalb; pos na Dios yab xita ms tu bijtsmal tech ti kayl, xi neech kin ejto ti ku loo.
44004013	Tam ti an oklektsik in chuu ti kw na Pedro ani na Juan kal ni jun i jkib ani in chobtsik ke jajtsik yab exblommadh, nibal in chobtsik xan tu wilnal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, labantsik tajat ani in ulutsik tm, ke jechtsik jaich xi xechink kal na Jess.
44004014	An inik xi jeldhats ta jeye ti kubat junax kal jajtsik, jaxtm an oklektsik ti yab in ejto kin ulu ke yab tsubax.
44004015	Utsantsik tm abal ka kalch taja xon ti kwajat an junkuntalb ani jajtsik jilkon ti kwlx.
44004016	Ani in ulaltsik ench: —Janty neech ki taja kal jech an iniktsik? Pos ejtal xu kwajltsik Jerusaln in chob abal in tajmal jech an labidh labandhaxtalb ani yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke yab ani.
44004017	Por abal yabich ms ka chobn kal an atiklbtsik jech xowa tmun, wana ki utsatsik abal neech ki atax tajtsitsik abal yabich ms xita kin tiltsitsik an ta Jess.
44004018	Kanyattsik tm ani utsantsik abal yabich ka kwin nibal ka oktsixin tin bij na Jess.
44004019	Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Pedro ani na Juan: —Ka chalpaytsik max alwa ms tin tamt na Dios ki taja xowa tattsik a l, o ki taja xowa in l na Dios.
44004020	Pos waw yab neech ki ejto ki jila ki tila xowa i chumal ani i achmal.
44004021	Utsantsik tm ms kal an oklektsik abal neech ka atax tajtsintsik, por walktsik. Yab in ela xantokl ti kin walbindhatsik, pos ejtal an atiklbtsik in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa tmun.
44004022	An inik xi jeldh kal tin awiltal na Dios, in koolich chab inik watats i tamub.
44004023	Tam ti walkadhichtsik, na Pedro ani na Juan, kaletsik xon ti kwajat nin kidhtaltsik ani in ltsi ejtal xowa utsantsik kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik.
44004024	Tam tin achatsik, ejtal jununl ti lan ani in utsatsik ench na Dios: —Okxlb, Tat ni Dios xa tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach.
44004025	Tat, kal na Tokat Ejattal ani kal nin wi na tjontsixil Dabid, a ulu ti weje ench: Jantki tu pjx an pakdha bitsow ani an atiklbtsik in chalpayal xowa xi yab xata in jalbl?
44004026	An pakdha takix ani an oklektsik xi tech ti chabl, junkuntsik abal ti kin pjey ani abal kin pjey jeye an Kristo xu takwym.
44004027	Tsubax kejle, na Erodes ani na Ponsio Pilato, junkuntsik ba jech an bitsow kal an pl iniktsik ani kal an israelitatsik abal kin pjey na tokat Chakmil Jess, xi Tat a takwymal.
44004028	Kal jech, jajtsik in taja ejtal xowa Tat a ulmal ke anchan neech ka tmun.
44004029	Ani xo, Okxlb, ka acha xan tu utsan ke neech ku atax tajtsin, por ti ku pidha ti chplb abal waw xi jaich na tojnliltsik, ki ntsi ki tila na kwintal kal ni jun i jkib.
44004030	Kal na awiltal ki jeldha i yaultsik, ki taja i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik tin bij na tokat Chakmil Jess.
44004031	Tam ti okonichtsik an ti l, an chabl xon ti kwajattsik, yoyon; likedhantsattsik tin itsch kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani in ntsi kin tilatsik nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun i jkib.
44004032	Ejtal xi belmmadhichtsik, jununltsik ani tin kool nin chalab ani jununltsik nin ejattal. Ni jun xita yab in ulal ke xowa in kool kwetm tin dhabal, tokot in ulal abal ejtalki tin dhabaltsik.
44004033	An abatwletsik in ntsal kin tila kal yantam i awiltalb, ke na Jess ejnek ti t ani u lbtajnaltsik tajat kal na Dios ejtalkitsik.
44004034	Yab waach kal jajtsik ni jun xita xi watatsich tajat tin yntsal jun xata; pos ejtal xin kool i chabltsik o i attsik, in nujwaltsik, in tsidhl an tumn
44004035	ani in pidhl an abatwletsik. An abatwletsik in wlchxliyal xantiki jn tin yntsal.
44004036	Anchan jeye tin taja na Jos, jun i lebita xi Chipre tu chakam, an chabl xi kwajat ban ja; bijyat kal an abatwletsik ta Bernab, jech an bijlb in l kin ulu Xu kijidhmdhom.
44004037	Jech an inik in nuju jun i chabl xin kool ani in tsidha an tumn abal kin pidha an abatwletsik.
44005001	Por jun i inik jeye xu bijyb ta Ananas ani nin tomtal xin bij ta Safira, in nujutsik jeye jun i chabl.
44005002	Jech an inik, yab in pidhna ejtal an tumn, in jila w ani xi ms, in pidha an abatwletsik. Por jaj in pidhna jachan an tumn jelti max ejtal xin bachu ani nin tomtal in chob alwa ejtal jech.
44005003	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ananas, jantki ta walka ti ki tantsi ta itsch an lej atax abal ti taja ka kambiy an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab ka pidhna ejtal in jalbl an chabl xa nujmal?
44005004	Yabxe tat a dhabal jachan an chabl? Ani tam ta nujch, yabxe tat a dhabal an tumn xa bachu? Jantki ta chalpay ka taja anchan? Yab a kambiymal i iniktsik, xita a lenmal ka kambiy, a Dios.
44005005	Tam tin acha jech, na Ananas kwajlan ani chemech. Ejtal xin chobnatsik jech, jikeytsik tajat.
44005006	Ulich tm chb x i kwitl iniktsik, in boliy an chemlom ani in jnatsik kin joliy.
44005007	x i ora ms tayl, ochich nin tomtal na Ananas ani jaj yab in chob xanty tmnk.
44005008	Konyat ench kal na Pedro: —Ti kin utsa, tsubaxxe lejtal anchan ta nujmaltsik an chabl jelt xan ta ulmaltsik? An mmlb tkon ench: —Anchan.
44005009	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Jantki ta tajatsik i kw abal a lena ka kambintsi tin Tokat Ejattal an Okxlb? Jachan tl elb xi kaletsik kin joliy na tomkl ani xo, tat teye neech ti ki jna.
44005010	Tmki jachan, kwajlan jeye chabl na Safira ani chemech. Tam ti ochich an kwitl iniktsik, chemnekich tin ela; in kldhaichtsik tm ani in jna kin joliy tin wl xon ti jolidh nin tomkl.
44005011	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu belomich ani ejtal jeye xin chobnatsik jech, jikeytsik tajat.
44005012	Yn i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik in tajl an abatwletsik ban atiklb kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb; ejtal an belomtsik u junkunal ban chak xu bijyb Salomn ani juninitsik nin chalab.
44005013	Yab u junkunal kal jajtsik ni jun xita xi yab u belom, por u kaknbtsik tajat kal an atiklbtsik.
44005014	Tsudhey ka tsudhey ms u yanel an atiklbtsik xin bellich an Ajtiklb, i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik.
44005015	U kldhb an yaultsik ban bltsik, u kwajbb ban chytsik ani ban chaytetsik abal ka bajwattsik kal nin chalm na Pedro tam ka watey taja.
44005016	U ulel jeye i atiklbtsik Jerusaln xu kwajl ban kwentsaltsik xi taja kunat. In tsidhl an yaultsik ani xi kwajattsik jeye ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani ejtal u jeldhbtsik.
44005017	An oklek pletsik ani nin kidhtal an saduseotsik, xi ta ti kwajattsik kal jaj, chakuytsik tajat abal in atl xowa in tajl an abatwletsik
44005018	ani in jna abal kin baliy ban wikaxte xon tu balyb ejtalkitsik.
44005019	Por tam ti akal, jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb in japiy in wilbil an wikaxte ani in kldhatsik. Tam ti exomich ti kalel, utsantsik ench:
44005020	—Ki kalchtsik ani tam i kwajattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ka tiltsi an atiklbtsik ejtal kal tin kwenta jech an t xechintalb.
44005021	Tam tin achatsik jech, jun tsudhelom dhajawe ti ochichtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in tujutsik ti oktsix. Tam ti jachan, ulich an oklek pletsik junax kal xi ta ti kwajattsik kal jaj, in kaniytsik xu takix ban Junkulom Awiltalb ani ejtal jeye nin oklkil an israelitatsik. In abna tm ka iktat ban wikaxte an abatwletsik.
44005022	Por tam ti ulich ban wikaxte an belkoltsik, yab in elatsik; ani tam ti witsiytsik,
44005023	in ulu ench: —Mapupudh alwa ti ela an wikaxte ani an soldadotsik ta ti kwajat elb ti belkol ban wilebtsik; por tam tin japiy an wilebtsik, yab i ela ni jun xita alt.
44005024	Tam tin achatsik jech nin oklkil an pletsik, nin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an ultalb pletsik, u knxtsik xan ti neech ka kale ti oknal jech.
44005025	Tmki jachan, ulich jun i inik ani utsantsik kl ench: —An iniktsik xa balymaltsik ban wikaxte, ta kwajattsik in oktsal an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
44005026	Kale tm nin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at, kl an ykwaltsik ani in tsidhatsik, por yab xata tin tajtsitsik abal in chejnl ka tujbayat kal an atiklbtsik.
44005027	Tam ti uldhtsik, kwajb tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb ani utsantsik ench kal nin oklkil an pletsik:
44005028	—Waw i ulu alwa abal yabich i l ki chuu ki oktsixintsik tin bij na Jesukristo. Ani janty a tajatsik? Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln a oktsmalichtsik kal jachan an oktsixtalb ani a ltsik ti ku walbindha kal nin chemtal jachan an inik.
44005029	Tkon tm na Pedro ani xi ms an abatwletsik ench: —Waw i chob alwa ke yejat ki taja xowa in ulal nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani yab, xowa in ulal an iniktsik.
44005030	Nin Diosil ni weje paklil in ejdha ti t na Jess, xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
44005031	Na Dios in dhaya tekat, in kwajba tin ejt ani in kwajba ti Okpidh Oklek ani ti Loox. In taja anchan abal kin pidha bl ti kij an atiklbtsik xi Israel abal kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ka pakwlantsat tin walastalbiltsik.
44005032	Ejtal jech i chumal weye ani an Tokat Ejattalb jeye. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich xi na Dios in pidhmalich xu axtsinal kl tin tsubaxtalbil.
44005033	Tam tin achatsik jech, chakuytsik tajat ani in lenatsik kin chemdha an abatwletsik.
44005034	Por taja ban awiltalbtsik, ta ti kwajat jun i fariseo xu bijyb ta Gamaliel, jaich jn ti b an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani u kaknb tajat kal an atiklbtsik. Kubey ani in ulu abal ka kldh junw an abatwletsik.
44005035	In utsa tm ench an awiltalbtsik: —Atiklbtsik xi Israel, ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal xanty a l ka tajtsi jech an iniktsik.
44005036	Ka chalpaytsik ke ti wel chabki xechin na Tewdas, xin pjey an lej pulek takix ani in ulu ke jaj jaich jun i pulek inik, wwn kal ch i bo inik i iniktsik. Por chemdh ani ejtal xi kl ti wwnadh, buklantsik ani anchan ti okon.
44005037	Ms tayl, tam ti tajan an ajumtalb, xechin jeye na Judas xu kwajl Galilea ani kal yn jeye ti wwn; por chemdh jeye ani ejtal xi wwnaxnk, buklan.
44005038	Jaxtm tu utsltsik, jila kwajat jech an iniktsik ani yab xata ka utsatsik. Pos max jech xowa in tajltsik, in chalab i iniktsik, neech ka okon;
44005039	por max a Dios in chalab, yab neech ka ejto ka tamkuytsik. Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta; pos yab a chobtsik max exom ta pjx kal i iniktsik o kal a Dios.
44005040	Ejtal in exbaytsik xowa utsan kal na Gamaliel. Kanyat tm an abatwletsik, kwadhan ani utsantsik abal yabich ms ka xechintsik ti kw tin bij na Jess ani walkjichtsik tm.
44005041	Kalch tm an abatwletsik xon ti kwajat an awiltalbtsik ani u kulbltsik tajat abal pidhan ti chplb kal a Dios kin watna i tidhetalb kal tin kwentaki in bij na Jess.
44005042	Tsudhey ka tsudhey yab in jilltsik kin oktsixna an alwa tilab ani kin tila ke na Jess jaich na takudh kal na Dios. U oktsixtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ban attsik jeye.
44006001	Tam ti jachan i kij, kom an belomtsik yanch, an judotsik xu kw griego tujey ti itixbltsik kal an judotsik xu kw ebreo. In ulaltsik xu kw griego ke an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi jaj in kidhtal, yab u lej tajtsinaltsik ti kij tam u pidhnb an kapnl tsudhey ka tsudhey.
44006002	Junkuwat tm ejtal an belomtsik kal xi lajuchb an abatwletsik ani utsantsik ench: —Yab in tomnl ki jila ki tila nin kwintal na Dios kal tin kwentaki abal ku kwajay tu pidhnom kapnl.
44006003	Jaxtm kidhblbtsik, ka aliy bk i paylomlbtsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, xi alwa iniktsik, xi chalpadhtsik, xi teykmte tajat kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani jaich ka punkuntsitsik jech an ti tojlb.
44006004	Waw neech ki ntsi tu l ani ki oktsixna nin kwintal na Dios.
44006005	Ejtaltsik in tokoy jech ani takwyat na Esteban, jun i inik xu belom tajat ani teykmte tajat kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Takwyat jeye na Felipe, na Prkoro, na Nikanor, na Timn, na Parmenas ani na Nikols, jun i inik xu kwajl Antioka xin belmal jeyewiik nin belomtal an judotsik.
44006006	Tsidhtsik tm xon ti kwajat an abatwletsik, lan an abatwletsik ani in kwajbatsik nin kubak bin b xi takwyattsik.
44006007	Nin kwintal na Dios jikat tajat ti bukey ani an belomtsik jikat tajat ti yaney Jerusaln, asta yn in pleiltsik an judotsik belmch.
44006008	Na Esteban, jun i inik xin bachmal tajat nin alwatal ani nin chp na Dios, in tajl i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik ban atiklbtsik.
44006009	Tm, taltsik i atiklbtsik xu taknal ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xu bijybtsik ti jolib xi walkadhich, junax kal i atiklbtsik xi Sirene, xi Alejandra, xi Silisia ani xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia, in tujutsik ti kwlx kal na Esteban;
44006010	por yab u ejtowb ka tomn na Esteban abal jaj u kw kal yantam i chalpadhtalb xu pidhnal kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
44006011	Jalbiyat tm kal jechtsik taltsik i iniktsik abal kin ulu ke in achmal ti odhbjil ta Moiss ani ta Dios.
44006012	Anchan ti chakdh an atiklbtsik, nin oklkil an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; pjeyat kl na Esteban, yakwan ani jn tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb.
44006013	Alyat jeye i jnum kwtsik, xin ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik yab u koyol ti odhbjil an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an tin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44006014	I achmal jeye tin ulu ke na Jess xi Nasaret neech kin paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech kin jalkuy ejtal xowa in jilmal ka tajan na Moiss.
44006015	Tam ti an awiltalbtsik ani ejtal xi ta ti buxutsik in tela na Esteban, in chuutsik ke nin wal na Esteban in junwal jelt in wal jun i tokat abatwle.
44007001	Konyat tm ench na Esteban kal nin oklkil an pletsik: —Tsubaxxe jech xowa i usnal?
44007002	Ani na Esteban tkon ench: —At kidhtaltsik ani ttalbtsik, ka acha xanty neech tu utsatsik: Ni labidh tokat Diosil, in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal ni weje paklil Abraham tam ti kwajat ban chabl xi Mesopotamia, tam ti yabl kalnek ti kwajl Arn
44007003	ani utsan ench: “Ka jila na chablil ani ejtal na exlowltsik ani ki kale ban chabl xi neech tu ltsi.”
44007004	Kale tm na Abraham bin chablil an kaldeotsik ani kale ti kwajl Arn. Tayl chemech nin tta ani na Dios in tsidha na Abraham ti kwajl tech xon ti tattsik xo i kwajat.
44007005	Por yab pidhan kal na Dios tech ni jun peje ti chabl abal kin dhabalna, nibal jun peje ela xon ti kin kuba jun in akan; por utsan abal neech ka pidhan ani ke tayl, tam jaj ka chemchich, nin chakmiltsik jaich neech kin dhabalna; maske tam ti jachan i kij, na Abraham yabl in kool ni jun in chakmil.
44007006	Ani utsan jeye ench kal na Dios: “Na kidhtaltsik neech ka kwajay jelti pl iniktsik ba jun i chabl xi yab jajtsik in dhabal, neech ka tajan ti jolibtsik ani neech ka tajtsin xan ti ka len, tin nakl ch i bo inik i tamub.”
44007007	Por utsan jeye ench: “Nan neech ku ljundha an yejche bitsow xi kin taja ti jolib na kidhtaltsik ani tayl, na kidhtaltsik neech ka kale taja ani neech ti kin tjontsitsik ba jech an chabl.”
44007008	Na Dios in taja jun i lejkintalb kal na Abraham ani utsan kin tajtsal jun i exl bin tul an kwitl chakamtsik abal kin koy ti exl kal tin kwenta an lejkintalb. Jaxtm, tam ti wachin ti chakam na Isk, na Abraham in tajtsi jun i exl bin tul tam tin kidhbch waxik a kts ti wachink ti chakam. Anlki jeye tin taja na Isk kal nin chakmil Jakob ani na Jakob anlki jeye tin taja kal xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik. Jechtsik, jaich ni weje paklil.
44007009	Jech ni weje pakliltsik, in ata nin kidhb xin bij Jos ani in nujutsik abal ka jn ban chabl xi Ejipto. Por na Dios taja ti kwajat junax kal na Jos
44007010	ani in tolmiy kal ejtal an yajtsiktalb xin tametna. In pidha ti chalab ani in tolmiy abal kin bajaw ka kanidh kal an Faran. Jech an Faran, jaich an pulek takix xi Ejipto, xi kl ti bijyat na Jos ti pulek awiltalb abal ka takxin Ejipto ani abal ka takxin jeye bin kim jech an pulek takix.
44007011	Wachin tm i kanab ani jun i yajtsiktalb plek, ban chabl xi Ejipto. Anchan jeye ti tmun Kann ani ni weje pakliltsik yabich in ell xanty kin kapu.
44007012	Por tam ti na Jakob in acha abal waach i trigo Ejipto, in aba taja nin chakmiltsik, xi jaich ni weje pakliltsik. Jech jaich an jidhtal bl xin tajatsik.
44007013	Tam ti kaletsik jun tin chabtal, na Jos in xalka tinb abal ka exl kal nin kidhbtsik. Anchan tin chobna an pulek takix xi Ejipto xita kl tu kidhtalb jeye na Jos.
44007014	In abna tm na Jos ka iktat nin tta Jakob ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, jajtsik ox inik lajub ti b.
44007015	Anchan ti tmun, na Jakob kale ti kwajl Ejipto xon ti chemech ms tayl ani xon ti chemechtsik jeye ni weje pakliltsik.
44007016	Ms tayl, jntsintsik an tin beklk Sikm ani joltsin ban jlimtalb xi na Abraham in chaytsmal nin chakmiltsik na Amor ban chabl xi Sikm.
44007017	Tam ti kunatich an kij xowki ti neech ka tmun xowa na Dios in lej tsubax utsmal na Abraham, an atiklbtsik xi Israel yanenekich taja Ejipto.
44007018	Tujey tm ti takix taja Ejipto jun i pulek takix xi yab u exlb kl na Jos.
44007019	Jech an pulek takix, in kambiy ni kidhtaltsik ani tajtsintsik xan ti ka len ni weje pakliltsik. In taja jeye abal kin walba ka chemech nin chakmiltsik xi tsitsik.
44007020	Jachan i kij, tm jeye ti wachin na Moiss. Jech an chakam, kulbetn tajat kal na Dios ani tokot beletn x a ch bin kim nin ttatsik.
44007021	Por tam ti an ttalbtsik in jila, nin tsidhnil an pulek takix in pena ani in pubedha jelti max jaj in chakmil.
44007022	Jaxtm, na Moiss oktsin ejtal xowa in chob an atiklbtsik xi Ejipto in chablil ani in koy tajat i awiltalb kal xowa in tajl ani kal xowa in ulal.
44007023	Tam tin koolich chab inik i tamub, na Moiss in lena ka kale kin lna nin at kidhtaltsik, xi jaich an israelitatsik.
44007024	Ani in chuu taja ke jun i inik xi Ejipto in chablil exom in atax tajtsal jun i israelita. Abal kin loo ani abal kin tajtsi jaychki xowa exom in tajl, na Moiss in chemdha jachan an inik xi Ejipto in chablil.
44007025	Pos na Moiss in chalpayal ke ni at kidhtal, xi jaich an israelitatsik, neech kin exbaytsik ke jaj takudh kal na Dios abal kin walka nin at kidhtal; por yab in exbaytsik.
44007026	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Moiss in ela chb i at kidhtal ti pjx ani kom in l kin chuu yabich ka pjxintsik, in utsatsik ench: “Tattsik a kidhbkitsik tab; jantki ta atax tjtsxtsik jn ani jn?”
44007027	Tm, xi kwajat in chawal nin at kidhtal nixkl kl na Moiss ani utsan ench: “Jita ti kwajbmal ta oklek ani ta ljundhom kal waw?
44007028	A lxe neye ti kin chemdha, jelt xan ta chemdha ti wel an inik xi tech Ejipto in chablil?”
44007029	Tam tin acha jech na Moiss, jlch ani kale ban chabl xi Madin. Taja ti kwajay jelti jun i pl inik ani in koy chb in chakmiltsik.
44007030	Chab inik i tamub ms tayl, tam ti kwajat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh kunat ban chn xu bijyb Sina, in chuu jun i tokat abatwle bin kamlil jun i kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal.
44007031	Na Moiss laban tajat tam tin chuu jech an xalkantsixtalb ani tam ti utey abal kin chuu ms alwa, in axtsi tin kwintal an Okxlb. Ench tin ulu an Okxlb:
44007032	“Nan tin Diosil na weje pakliltsik, nin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.” Tujey tm na Moiss ti wipipl kal i jkib ani yab in l kin tela.
44007033	Utsan tm ench kal an Okxlb: “Ka kotiy na pajab, pos an chabl xon ta kubat, jaich jun i chabl xi tokat.
44007034	Nan u chumalich an yajtsiktalb xi exom in achl Ejipto an atiklbtsik xu takwym, xi jaich na kidhtal, u achmich ti ejltsik ani in painek abal ku kldhaichtsik taja. Pos xo, jalaich, neech tu aba Ejipto.”
44007035	Jech na Moiss xi pojk ani utsan ench kal an israelitatsik: “Jita ti bijiy ta oklek ani ta ljundhax?”, jaich aban kal na Dios jelti jun i pulek awiltalb ani i walkax, kal an tokat abatwleki xin chuu ta ti kwajat bin kamlil an kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal.
44007036	Jech na Moiss, jaich xin kldha Ejipto ni weje pakliltsik ani xin taja i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik tin nakl chab inik i tamub ba jachan an chabl, ban Chak Pujal ani ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
44007037	Jech na Moiss jaich xin utsa ench an israelitatsik: “Na Dios neech kin takuy jun i tiltsix xi waw i kidhtal, jelt xan ti nan tin takwymal, ka exbantsitsik xowa jaj ti ki utsatsik.”
44007038	Na Moiss kwajay kal an atiklbtsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, tam ti junkuntsik ban chn xu bijyb Sina. Taja, utsan na Moiss kal an tokat abatwle kal tin kwenta an xechintalb ani na Moiss, in watbantsi ni weje pakliltsik jech xowa utsan.
44007039	Por ni weje pakliltsik yab in lena kin exbay, in pojkatsik tokot ani in ltsikwiik ka witsiy Ejipto,
44007040	tam ti kwajat in utsltsik ench na Arn: “I l ti ku tajtsi ti diostsik xi ka okxin, pos yab i chob xanty in tamu na Moiss xi tu kldha ban chabl xi Ejipto.”
44007041	In tajatsik tm jun in chilbil i beserro kal i oro, in chemdhantsi ti konltsik abal kin pikbantsi ani kulbtsik tajat kal xowa in tajmaltsik kal in kubak.
44007042	Wkon tm na Dios kal jajtsik ani walktsik kin kakna a ttsik xi waach walki. Pos anchan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik ke ench ti utsan ni weje pakliltsik kal na Dios: Awxe tattsik, atiklbtsik xi Israel, a chemdhmal i konltsik abal ti kin pikbantsi tin nakl xi chab inik i tamub ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh? Yaba!
44007043	Tattsik tokot a xechindhantsitsik tin t padhlil na dios Molok ani nin til na dios Renfn, i chilabtsik xa tajmaltsik abal ka kakna. Jaxtm Nan, neech tu kldhatsik ba na chablil ani neech tu abnatsik ms tuwa k Babilonia.
44007044	In ntsi ti kw na Esteban ani in ulu ench: —Taja ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ni weje pakliltsik ta tin kool an t padhel xon tin tapl an tujubtsik xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin takixtal na Dios. Jech tajnk anchan xan ti na Dios tin utsa na Moiss, tam ti utsan kin taja jelt xan ti ltsin.
44007045	Ni weje pakliltsik in bachu jech an t padhel jelti jun i jiltsixtalb ani xi tschtsik kal na Josu, in tsidha kal jajtsik tam tin kntsitsik an ti chabl an keet atiklbtsik, jaich xin kldhatsik na Dios abal kin pidha an ti chabl ni weje pakliltsik. Anchan ti tjan asta tam tin bajaw na Dabid.
44007046	Na Dios kulb kal an pulek takix Dabid ani na Dabid in lena kin tajtsi jun i at xon ti ka kwajay nin Diosil na Jakob;
44007047	por na Salomn jaich nin kubtsi tin kim na Dios.
44007048	Por na Dios xi plek tajat, yab u kwajl ba at xi tajadh kal i iniktsik. Jelt xan tin ulu an tiltsix ench:
44007049	An walki jaich nu tokat kwajtal ani an chabl, jaich xon tu kubl nu akan. In ulu ench an Okxlb: Janti uwats an at xi neech kin tajtsin? O jn ti neech ku ejto kin koych?
44007050	Yabxe Nan u tajmal kal u kubak ejtal jech?
44007051	In ntsi ti kw na Esteban ani in ulu ench: —Por tattsik echeki tajat chapik na itsch ani a kooltsik na ochoxtal ani na itsch jelti xi yab in exlltsik na Dios. Echeki a tomnltsik an Tokat Ejattalb. A junwaltsik jelti na weje pakliltsik.
44007052	Jowa tiltsix yab atnk kal na weje pakliltsik? In chemdhatsik xi tsinek ms okox kin tila abal neech ka tsch jachan xi lujat tajat ani xo tam ti ulich, a chinat pidhnatsik ani a chemdha.
44007053	Tattsik xa bachu an takixtalb kal an tokat abatwleki, yab a tajltsik ti kij.
44007054	Tam ti jajtsik in acha ejtal jech, in chakuntsitsik tajat na Esteban ke asta u rechechltsik nin kamab kal i chkub.
44007055	Por na Esteban, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, in teloloy walki, in chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios ani in chuu jeye na Jess tin ejt na Dios.
44007056	In ulu tm ench: —Ka telatsik! U chutal jebl an walki ani u chutal na Jess xi aban abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik kwajat tin ejt na Dios.
44007057	Por jajtsik in tsutskiy nin xuchun ani u dhajnaltsik kawidh, tujeytsik tm kin nixka na Esteban.
44007058	Kldh ban bitsow ani exmch ti tujbayb. An lnaxtsik xin taja jech, in jila nin xekt ka beletnantsat kal jun i kwitl inik xin bij ta Sawlo.
44007059	Lejat kwajat ti tujbayb, na Esteban lan ani in ulu ench: —Ajtik Jess, ka bachu nu ejattal.
44007060	Tayl tudhlan ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Ajtik, ka pakwlantsitsik an tin walastalbil xi exom in tajl. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, chemech.
44008001	Na Sawlo in ulu jeye abal alwa ka chemdh na Esteban. Tmki jachan a kts, tujey tajat ti atnal an belomtsik xi Jerusaln. Ejtalki an belomtsik atan, jaxtm ti bukeytsik ban chabl xi Judea ani xi Samaria. Tokot an abatwletsik yab atan, jaxtm ti jilkontsik ja Jerusaln.
44008002	Taltsik an iniktsik xin wwnltsik tajat xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, in jna kin joliy na Esteban ani in ukintsitsik tajat abal chemdh.
44008003	Tam ti jachan, na Sawlo in ynl an belomtsik, u ochel ban attsik abal kin kldha bodhodhl an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik ani in jnl kin baliy al wikaxte.
44008004	Por xi kaletsik ban bitsow Jerusaln, in tilltsik an alwa tilab xontiki ti xeechtsik.
44008005	Jn ti b xi jajtsik, xin bij ta Felipe, kale ba jun i bitsow xu taknal Samaria ani in tuju kin tiltsitsik an ta Kristo.
44008006	An atiklbtsik u junkunal ani ejtal in achltsik kal yantam i kwenta xowa in ulal na Felipe ani in chutaltsik jeye an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin tajl jech na Felipe.
44008007	Pos yn i atiklbtsik xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik, u jeldhb ani an atax ejattalbtsik u dhajnal u kalel ba jajtsik ani yn xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani xu kwechetsik, u jeldhb.
44008008	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow u kulbltsik tajat kal jech xowa in chutal.
44008009	Por ta ti kwajat ba jachan an bitsow jun i inik xu bijyb ta Simn. Jech an inik, jaich jun i dhiman ani in kambiyal an atiklbtsik xi taja Samaria. In ulal ke jaj jaich jun i chalpadh inik.
44008010	Kal ejtaltsik tu axtsinal xowa jaj in ulal, kal xi tsitsik ani asta kal xi pakdhatsik ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik, jaich nin pulek chp na Dios.
44008011	U beltsinal tajat xowa in ulal ani in tajl, pos kal nin dhimantal, nakatich tajat i kij tin kymal kambidhtsik.
44008012	Tam ti na Felipe xeech in till na Jesukristo ani an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, yn i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik belmch ani pujantsik.
44008013	Na Simn xu dhimanwiik, belmch jeye ani pujan ani xechin kal na Felipe. Tam in chutal an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb ani an exltsik xu tjnal, u labnal tajat.
44008014	Tam ti an abatwletsik xi kwajat Jerusaln in chobna ke xu kwajltsik Samaria in bachmalichtsik nin kwintal na Dios, aban taja na Pedro ani na Juan.
44008015	Tam ti na Pedro ani na Juan ulichtsik taja, lantsik kal tin kwenta an belomtsik xi Samaria abal kin bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb.
44008016	Pos an belomtsik xi Samaria, yabl in bachmaltsik an Tokat Ejattalb, tokot pujadhtsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
44008017	Na Pedro ani na Juan in kwajbatsik nin kubak bin b an belomtsik ani in bachu tm an Tokat Ejattalb an belomtsik.
44008018	Tam ti na Simn in chuu ke an belomtsik in bachu an Tokat Ejattalb tam ti an abatwletsik in kwajba nin kubak bin b an belomtsik, in lena kin chaay jech an awiltalb,
44008019	in ulu ench: —Ti kin pidha neye jachan an ti awiltalb abal tam ku kwajbantsi an tu kubak bin b jun xita, kin bachu jeye an Tokat Ejattalb.
44008020	Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ka kibchon na tumnal junax kal tat abal a chalpayal ke xowa in pidhnl na Dios, neech ka ejto ka chaay kal i tumn.
44008021	Tat yab a kool ni jun xata xanty ka chuu kal jech, pos na ejattal yab kwajat lujat tin tamt na Dios.
44008022	Ka jilaich jech an walastalb xa kool ani ka pakabdha na Dios abal ka chuu max anchan ti ki pakwlantsi kal xowa a chalpay ta ejattal.
44008023	Pos u chutal ke yab tajat alwa na chalab a kool ani i teykmte tajat ta kwajat kal an walastalb.
44008024	Tkon tm ench na Simn: —Ti kin kontsintsi neye ban Okxlb abal yab ku tamu ni jun xata xowa i kwajat tin utsl.
44008025	Tam ti okonichtsik kin lna ani kin tila nin kwintal na Dios, an abatwletsik kale jeye kin tila an alwa tilab ba yn i kwentsaltsik xi Samaria ani tayl witschtsik tm jun Jerusaln.
44008026	Ms tayl, utsan ench na Felipe kal jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakay ani ki kale all, ka yakwa an bl xi tl Jerusaln ani neech Gasa. Jech an bl, jaich xu watel ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
44008027	Chakay tm na Felipe ani kale; ti bl, in ela jun i inik xu kwajl Etiopa. Jaj jaich jun i inik xu ewnuko. Jech jaich jun i pulek tjodh, pos jaj in belkmtsal tin tumnal na Kandase, an pulek takix mmlb xi Etiopa, jaj kalnek Jerusaln abal kin kakna na Dios.
44008028	Jech an inik u witslich bin pulek bitswil, punat bin karretajil ani kwajat in ajyal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsix Isaas.
44008029	Utsan tam ench na Felipe kal an Tokat Ejattalb: —Ki utey ban karreta ani ki beley junax kal jech an inik.
44008030	Tam ti utey na Felipe, in acha ke jachan an inik kwajat in ajyal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsix Isaas ani in konoy ench: —A exbayalxe xowa i kwajat a ajyal?
44008031	Tkoyat ench kal an inik: —Janti neech ku ejto ku exbay max yab waach ni jun xita ti kin wiltsi? Ani pakabdh na Felipe kal an inik abal ka kadhiy ani ka buxkan junax kal jaj.
44008032	An Tokat Dhuslab xi kwajat in ajyal, jaich jech: Jn abal ka chemdh jelti jun i borrego. Anchan jelti an borrego yab u kuxnal tin tamt an inik xi kl ti kwajat ti kaxwb, anchan jeye Jaj yab kuchun n w abal kin ulu xata.
44008033	Tajan jelti max yab xata in y ani yab ljundh jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb. Kom chemdh ani yab in jila ni jun in kuxl, jita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka tilan? Abal nin xechintal wkoyat tech ti kayl.
44008034	Konyat tm na Felipe ench kal jachan an tjodh inik: —Tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin utsa, jita kwajat in till jech an tiltsix, jaj in till tinb o keet in till?
44008035	In tuju tm na Felipe kin wiltsi xon ti kwajat in ajyal ban Tokat Dhuslab ani in tiltsi an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Jess.
44008036	Tam ti neechtsik ti belal, ulichtsik xon ti waach i ja ani an tjodh inik in ulu ench: —Tech waach i ja, awxe yab awil kin pujyat neye?
44008037	Utsan ench kal na Felipe: —Max a bell lejtal kal ejtal na ejattal na Jesukristo, awil ki pujan. An inik tkon ench: —U bell abal na Jesukristo jaich nu Chakmlb kal na Dios.
44008038	In ulu tm ka kubdh an karreta, paay chablam ti b ban ja ani pujyat kal na Felipe.
44008039	Tam ti kaletsik ban ja, jnjich tm na Felipe kal nin Tokat Ejattal an Ajtiklb ani yab ms witsiy ka chutat kal jachan an tjodh inik; por u kulbl tajat an tjodh inik tam tin ntsch nin blil.
44008040	Tayl, jun jiktowl tin chuu na Felipe abal Asotojich ti kwajat ani watey bitsow ti bitsow ti tiltsix an ti alwa tilab, asta ti ulich Sesarea.
44009001	Tam ti jachan, na Sawlo in ntsal kin ulu abal neech kin chemdha xin bellichtsik an Ajtiklb. Jaxtm ti kale kin chuu nin oklkil an pletsik,
44009002	abal kin kontsi ti awiltalb ka pidhan ka kale ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xi Damasko abal kin aliy xin bellichtsik an alwa tilab ani kin tsidha ti wiknl Jerusaln; i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik.
44009003	Por tam ti neech ti bl ani u kunelich ban bitsow xi Damasko, jun jiktowl ti wiliyat kal jun i chaxixl kamal xi tl walki.
44009004	Kwajlan tm na Sawlo chabl ani in acha jun i kwintalb, xu kw in ulu ench: —Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl?
44009005	Konoxin jeye tm na Sawlo ench: —Jita p teye, jab? Ani tkoyat ench kal xi kwajat ti kw: —Nan in Jess, xi tat a atl. Exom a yajlombdhl tatki tab, jelt xan tin tajl an konl tam in chochbiyal an chupidh patl.
44009006	In ulu tm ench na Sawlo u wipipl kal i jkib: —Ajtik, janty a l ku taja? Utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakch ani ki ulchich ban bitsow ani taja neech ki utsan xanty yejat ka taja.
44009007	An iniktsik xi junax ti neech kal na Sawlo, labnktsik tajat abal in achltsik an kwintalb por yab in chutaltsik xita.
44009008	Chakay tm na Sawlo ban chabl xon ti kwachat, por tam tin lama nin wal, yab in chutal ni jun xata. Jaxtm ti lotokn ani jn Damasko.
44009009	Kwajay taja x a kts yab u chuux, yab u kapul nibal xata in uchl.
44009010	Taja Damasko, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xu belom tajat xu bijyb ta Ananas, xi utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb ba jun i xalkantsixtalb: —Ananas! Ani jaj tkon ench: —Jetm in kwajat, Ajtik.
44009011	Utsan tm ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakay, ki kale ban bl xu bijyb Ejt ani ka konoy bin kim na Judas max ta kwajat taja jun i inik xu bijyb ta Sawlo xu kwajl Tarso. T kwajat ti l
44009012	ani ba jun i xalkantsixtalb, in chumal ke jun i inik xin bij Ananas neech ka ochich xon ti jaj kwajat ani neech kin kwajba nin kubak bin b jaj abal ka chuxindh jun.
44009013	Tam tin acha jech na Ananas, in ulu ench: —Ajtik, kal ynich tin tiltsidh xanty in tajl jachan an inik ani in tiltsidhich jeye ejtal an ataxtalb xin tajtsal xi ti bellichtsik xu kwajl Jerusaln.
44009014	Xo tsinek tech Damasko ani in kontsm ti awiltalb an oklek pletsik abal kin yakwa ejtal xi ti bellichtsik.
44009015	Por utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki kale, pos Nan u takwymal jachan an inik abal ti kin tila ban atiklbtsik xi yab u judo, ban pulek takixtsik ani ban israelitatsik jeye.
44009016	Nan neech ku ltsi ejtal an ti yajtsiktalb xi yejat kin watna kal Nan tu kwenta.
44009017	Kale tm na Ananas ban at xon ti kwajat na Sawlo. Tam ti ochich, in kwajba nin kubak bin b na Sawlo ani in utsa ench: —Kidhblb Sawlo, an Ajtiklb Jess, xin xalka tinb ti bl xon ta tl abal ka chuu, tin abmal abal tu chuxindha jun ani abal ka bachu jeye nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
44009018	Tmki jachan ti kwajlan jun xata xi pitkan bin wal jelt in otl i tool ani chuxinich tm jun. Chakch tm na Sawlo ani pujyatich jeye tm.
44009019	Tayl kapch ani likey tm jun ani kwajay chb x a kts taja kal an belomtsik xu kwajl taja Damasko.
44009020	Ms tayl, in tujch tm na Sawlo ti oktsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in ulal ke na Jess jaich nu Chakmlb kal na Dios.
44009021	Ejtaltsik xi kl tu axnal, u labnaltsik tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xi xechink Jerusaln in atax tajtsal xin belltsik na Jess? Yabxe jaxtm ti tsinek jeye tech abal kin yakwa an belomtsik ani kin jna abal kin pidhna ban oklek pletsik?
44009022	Por na Sawlo u oktsix kal yn ms i awiltalb ani in lnl ke na Jess jaich xi takudh kal na Dios abal ti loox, asta in ukpindhl an judotsik xu kwajl taja Damasko.
44009023	Tam ti watenekich yn a kts, an judotsik in taja i kw abal kin chemdha na Sawlo;
44009024	por na Sawlo in chobna xanty tu lenb ka tajtsin. Akal i kij an judotsik u kwajl kin aytsi na Sawlo bin wilbiltsik an bitsow abal kin chemdha;
44009025	por an belomtsik, in baliy na Sawlo ba jun i toknal plek ani in kldha rechechl bin kx in mapl an bitsow tam ti jikwax. Anchan ti kldh na Sawlo ba jachan an bitsow.
44009026	Tam ti na Sawlo ulich Jerusaln, in lena ka junkun kal an belomtsik; por kal ejtaltsik tu jiknb abal yab u belnal max jaj u belomich jeye.
44009027	Por jn kal na Bernab abal ka utwat ban abatwletsik. Na Bernab in tiltsitsik xan ti na Sawlo tin chumal an Ajtiklb ti bl, xan ti jeye ti tawn kal an Ajtiklb ani xan ti na Sawlo ti oktsixnk Damasko kal yantam i awiltalb kal tin bij na Jess.
44009028	Kwajay tm Jerusaln na Sawlo ani xechin junax kal jajtsik.
44009029	U kw kal yantam i awiltalb tin bij an Ajtiklb, u tiloll ani u kwlx kal an judotsik xu tilom griego; por u lenb ka chemdh kal jechtsik.
44009030	Tam ti an kidhblbtsik in chobna jech, jn Sesarea na Sawlo ani tam ti tajaich ti kwajat, aban Tarso.
44009031	Tam ti jachan, ejtal an belomtsik xi ban chabl xi Judea, xi Galilea ani xi Samaria, kijidhtsik tajat ti kwajat ani u likeltsik. In kooltsik nin belomtal ban Ajtiklb ani kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, tsudhey ka tsudhey u wachinal ms xin bellich an Ajtiklb.
44009032	Tam ti na Pedro xechin ti lnax an ti kidhblbtsik, kale jeye kin lna an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Lida.
44009033	In ela taja jun i inik xin bij ta Eneas, xin koolich waxik i tamub ti kwachl, kom yab in ejtowal ti belal.
44009034	Ani utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Eneas, na Jesukristo neech ti ki jeldha. Ki chakay ani ka dhaya na waytal. Na Eneas tmki ti chakay
44009035	ani chutat kal ejtaltsik xu kwajl Lida ani Sarn, in jilaichtsik tm nin weje belomtalbiltsik ani in belaich an Ajtiklb.
44009036	Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat ban bitsow xu bijyb Jope jun i mmlb xu belom tajat xu bijyb Tabita, ke ti kwintalb griego, u ulwb Dorkas. Jech an mmlb echeki in tajl xowa alwa ani in tolmiyal an chojontltsik.
44009037	Tam ti jachan i kij, yawlch ani chemech. Tam ti okonich ti taknal, kwajb ba jun i alt xi kwajat tekat ba jun i pntsx at.
44009038	An bitsow xi Jope, kunat ti kwajat Lida, xon ti kwajat na Pedro tam ti jachan i kij. Kom an belomtsik in chobna abal taja ti kwajat na Pedro, in abna ka pakabdh ench kal chb i iniktsik: —Ki tsch dhubat ban bitsow xi Jope.
44009039	Kale tm na Pedro junax kal jajtsik. Tam ti ulchich, jn ban alt xon ti kwajat an chemlom ani kal ejtal an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ti wiliyat, u uknaltsik ani in lnltsik nin lakab ani nin xekttsik xi tajtsidh kal na Dorkas tam ti ejat.
44009040	Utsantsik tm kal na Pedro abal ka kaletsik ejtal, tudhlan tm ani lan ani in teltm an mmlb xi chemnek, in ulu ench: —Tabita, ki chakay. In lama tm nin wal an mmlb ani tam ti chutat na Pedro, buxkan an mmlb.
44009041	In tyna tm bin kubak ani in dhaya. In kaniy tm an kidhblbtsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani chutatich tm abal ejnek ti t jachan an mmlb.
44009042	Ejtal jech, chobn putl ban bitsow xi Jope ani kal yn ti belan an Ajtiklb.
44009043	Na Pedro kwajay yn a kts ba jachan an bitsow, bin kim jun i inik xin lejkiyal i t, jech an inik, u bijyb ta Simn.
44010001	T ti kwajat ban bitsow Sesarea jun i inik xin bij ta Kornelio, jaj jaich jun i oklek xin takyal bo inik i soldadotsik, jech an kwene u bijyb Italiano.
44010002	Jaj ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik in kaknl na Dios ani in jiknl abal in chobtsik ke na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja. In pidhnl jeye yandha i tumn abal kin tolmiy an judotsik ani echeki in lantsal a Dios.
44010003	Jun i kij, tam ti xich xna i wkal, in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ba jech an xalkantsixtalb, in chuu ke jun in tokat abatwlejil a Dios ochich xon ti jaj kwajat ani utsan ench: —Kornelio!
44010004	Na Kornelio jilkon in tell an tokat abatwle kal yantam i jkib ani in konoy ench: —Janty, Ajtik? Utsan tm ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Na Dios in achmalich an lbtsik ani in chumich xowa a tajl jeye abal ka tolmiy an chojontltsik.
44010005	Pos ka aba xo i iniktsik ban bitsow xi Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro.
44010006	Jaj ta kwajat bin kim jun i inik xu bijyb jeye ta Simn, an inik xu lejkix t ani in kool nin kim bin wl i pujal. Na Simn Pedro neech ti ki utsa xanty yejat ka taja.
44010007	Tam ti kalch an tokat abatwle xi kl ti tawn, na Kornelio in kaniy chb nin tojnliltsik ani in kaniy jeye jun i soldado, jech jaich jun i inik xin bell jeye tajat na Dios jelti na Kornelio ani alwa inik tajat.
44010008	In tiltsitsik ejtal xowa in chumal ani in abatsik Jope.
44010009	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, lejat jajtsik neech ti bl ani exomich ti kunel Jope, na Pedro kadhiy bin b an at tam ti chejelich xna a kts abal ti l.
44010010	Kaay tajat ani in lena ti kapul, por lejat kwajat ti lejkintsb xanty kin kapu, in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb.
44010011	In chuu jakpin an walki ani in chuu ti pal jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i kudhkum plek xi wikats tamatki.
44010012	Ban kudhkum, ta ti kwajat yn i konltsik xi chetsik in akan, i chantsik ani i chichintsik.
44010013	In acha jun i kwintalb xi utsan kl ench: —Pedro, ki chakay, ka chemdha ani ka kapu.
44010014	Por na Pedro tkon ench: —Yaba, Ajtik; nan yab jayki u kapmal ni jun xata xowa Tat a ulmal ke yab yejat ka kapat.
44010015	Tawn tm jun kal jachan an kwintalb ani utsan ench: —Xowa Nan u tokmal, yab yejat ka bijiy atax.
44010016	xl tjan jech ani tayl kadhbjich tm jun walki an kudhkum.
44010017	Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti chalpax xanty in l kin ulu jachan an xalkantsixtalb, ulich ban wileb nin tojnliltsik na Kornelio, xi tltsik in konwiyal xon ti kwajat nin kim na Simn.
44010018	Tam ti ulichtsik, in konoytsik kawidh max ta ti kwajat ba jachan an at jun i inik xin bij Simn ani u bijyb jeye ta Pedro.
44010019	Kom na Pedro bl kwajat ti chalpax kal tin kwenta an xalkantsixtalb, utsan ench kal an Tokat Ejattalb: —N kwajat ti ayal x i iniktsik.
44010020	Ki paay, ki kale kal jajtsik ani yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, pos Nan u abmaltsik.
44010021	Paay tm na Pedro xon ti kwajat an iniktsik xi abnk kal na Kornelio ani in utsatsik ench: —Nanich xita i xeechtsik a ayal. Janty a l ta tsinektsik?
44010022	Tkontsik ench: —U tsinek abal u abnk kal an oklek soldadotsik xu bijyb ta Kornelio. Jaj jaich jun i lujat inik xin bell a Dios, xu kaknb ani u kanidhb tajat kal ejtal na at kidhtaltsik. Usnk kal jun in tokat abatwlejil na Dios abal yejat ti kaniy ki kale tin kim ani kin acha xowa neech ka utsa.
44010023	Utsantsik tm kal na Pedro abal ka ochichtsik ani taja ti jilkontsik kal jaj jachan i akal. Tam ti tsudhey, na Pedro kalch tm kal jajtsik ani junikn kal chb x i kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Jope.
44010024	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, ulichtsik Sesarea, xon ti kwajat aytsmte kal na Kornelio junax kal jun kwene in exlowltsik ani nin jabtsik xin kanymal na Kornelio.
44010025	Tam ti na Pedro ulich ban at, kale ti bachwb kal na Kornelio, tudhlan tin tamt na Pedro ani in kakna.
44010026	Por dhayan kal na Pedro ani utsan ench: —Ki chakay, pos jaychki neye jun i inik jelti tat.
44010027	Lejat u tilolltsik, ochich alt ani in ela taja yn i atiklbtsik xi junkunk.
44010028	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pedro: —Tattsik a chob ke nin belomtal an judotsik in ulal ke yab alwa ka junkun jun i judo kal jun i pl inik o ka ochich bin kim an pl inik. Por na Dios tin ltsmalich ke yab in tomnl ku bijiy atax o yab alwa ni jun xita.
44010029	Jaxtm, tokot tin kanyat, in tsch ani yab in kwajay tin chalpax. Pos xo u l ku chobna xantki tin kanymaltsik.
44010030	Tkon tm ench na Kornelio: —In koolich ch a kts, ench xna i ora, in kwajat tin kl tech tu kim ani tin l xin kwenta an wkal ani in xalkantsat abal ku chuu jun i inik xi xeketlidh kal jun i chaxixl kudhkum.
44010031	Ani tin utsa ench: “Kornelio, na Dios in achmalich na lbil ani in chumalich xowa a tajl abal ka tolmiy an chojontltsik.
44010032	Pos ka aba xo na tojnliltsik ban bitsow xin bij Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro. T kwajat bin kim na Simn, an inik xu lejkix t, jaj u kwajl bin wl an pujal. Tam ka ulich tech, neech ti kw kal tat.”
44010033	Jaxtm tu abna jikatki ki kale ta alyb ani alwa tajat abal i tsch. Xo ejtal tech u kwajat tin tamt na Dios ani i l ki acha ejtal xowa an Ajtiklb ti abmal ti ku utsa.
44010034	In tuju tm na Pedro ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Xo ojni u exbch abal na Dios yab u takukl an ti atiklbtsik.
44010035	Na Dios in bachwal xitakichki, tokot ka exl ke Jaj ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani kin tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.
44010036	Na Dios in abtsi nin kidhtaltsik na Israel an ti tsubaxtalb. Jech an tsubaxtalb, jaich an alwa tilab xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo ani jech na Jesukristo, jaich nu Ajtiklb kal ejtalkitsik.
44010037	A chobtsik alwa xanty tlan bin chablil an judotsik, tujey Galilea, tin kuxmats na Juan tam ti xechin ti tiltsix ani ti pjal.
44010038	A chobtsik alwa xan ti na Dios tin pidha na Jess xi Nasaret tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Xan ti na Jess ti xechin jeye in tajl xowa alwa ani in jeldhl ejtal xi kwajat teykmtetsik kal in chp an lej atax. Ejtal jech in tajl abal na Dios ta ti kwajat kal Jaj.
44010039	Waw i chumal ejtal jech xowa in tajmal na Jess, ban chabltsik xi Judea ani ban bitsow Jerusaln. Tayl chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
44010040	Por ejdh ti t kal na Dios tin xlb a kts ani tu xalkantsi an ta Jess abal ki chuu ke Jaj ejnek ti t.
44010041	Yab xalkantsat ejtal an atiklbtsik, tokot wawki, xi na Dios in takwymalich kejle okox abal ku xechin tu ltsix. Waw u kapch ani u uchch kal Jaj tam ti ejdhatsich.
44010042	Ani tu aba ki tiltsi an atiklbtsik ani ki ltsitsik jeye ke jech na Jesukristo bijidhich kal na Dios abal kin ljundha xi ejattsik ani xi chemnektsik.
44010043	Ejtal an tiltsixtsik xi ti weje, in tilmaltsik na Jess, ke ejtal xita kl ti ka belan, neech ka pakwlantsat tin walastalbiltsik.
44010044	Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti kw, ulich an Tokat Ejattalb ba ejtal xi kwajat in achltsik nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios.
44010045	Ani an judotsik xu belomich, xi tsinektsik junax kal na Pedro, labantsik tajat abal in chuu pidhantsik jeye an ti Tokat Ejattalb xi yabtsik u judo.
44010046	Abal in achatsik ti kw kal i keet kwintalbtsik ani ti kaknaxtsik an tin bij na Dios.
44010047	In ulu tm ench na Pedro: —Awxe waach jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin tamkuy abal yab ka pujyat jech an atiklbtsik, kom in bachmichtsik jeye xo an Tokat Ejattalb jelti waw?
44010048	In ulu abal ka pujyatichtsik tin bij na Jesukristo ani pakabdh na Pedro abal ka kwajay chb x a kts kal jajtsik.
44011001	An abatwletsik ani an belomtsik xi kwajat Judea, in acha abal in bachmaltsik jeye nin kwintal na Dios xi yabtsik u judo.
44011002	Tam ti na Pedro ulich Jerusaln, kawyat kal taltsik an judotsik xu belomich xin ulal ke yejat jeye ka tajtsintsik an ti exl bin tul xin bellichtsik na Jesukristo.
44011003	Konyat ench: —Jantki ta kalnek ka lna xi yab in kooltsik an exl bin tul ani i kapmadh kal jajtsik?
44011004	Tiltsintsik tm kal na Pedro asta tin tujtal ejtal xowa tmnk, ench ti utsantsik:
44011005	—Tam tin kwajat ban bitsow xi Jope ani in kwajat tin l, u chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ban xalkantsixtalb, u chuu jun xata jelti jun i kudhkum plek xi tl ti pal walki wikats tamatki ani ulich asta xon tin kwajat.
44011006	Tam tu tela alwa abal ku chuu xanty ta ti kwajat alkidh, u chuu i konltsik xi chetsik in akan, i padhumtsik, i chantsik ani i chichintsik.
44011007	Ani u acha jun i kwintalb xi tin utsa ench: “Pedro ki chakay, ka chemdha ani ka kapu.”
44011008	Por u ulu ench: “Yaba, Ajtik, pos yab jayki u kapmal jun xata xowa Tat a ulmal ke yab yejat ka kapat.”
44011009	Tin tawna tm jun jachan an kwintalb xi tl walki ani tin utsa ench: “Xowa Nan u tokmal, yab yejat ka bijiy atax.”
44011010	xl tjan jech ani tayl kalch tm jun walki.
44011011	Tmki jachan, ulich x i iniktsik ban at xon tin kwajat. Jech an iniktsik, tl Sesarea ani tsinek abal ti kin aliytsik.
44011012	An Tokat Ejattalb tin utsa abal kin kale kal jajtsik ani yab kin kwajay xata ku chalpay. Kaletsik jeye kal nan jech akak an kidhblbtsik ani ejtal tu b tu ochich bin kim jun i inik xin bij ta Kornelio.
44011013	Jech an inik, tu tiltsi xan tin chumal kubl jun i tokat abatwle taja tin kim ani utsan kl ench: “Ka aba i iniktsik ban bitsow xi Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro,
44011014	jaj neech ti ki utsa xan ti neech ka ejto ki loey, tat ani ejtal na kidhtaltsik.”
44011015	Tam ti nan u tuju ku tawnatsik, in bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb, jelt xan ti waw i bachmal ms okox.
44011016	U chalpay tm xan tin ulmal an Ajtiklb: “Tsubax kejle ke na Juan pujxin kal i ja, por tattsik neech ka bachu an Tokat Ejattalb.”
44011017	Pos max na Dios in pidhatsik jeye jaychki xowa waw tu pidhmal xi belmalich ni Ajtik Jesukristo, janty u y nan abal kin kwajay ku tamkuy na Dios kal xowa in l kin taja?
44011018	Tam ti an kidhblbtsik xi Jerusaln in acha ejtal jech, chamkantsik ani kwajay kin kaknatsik na Dios. Ench tin ulutsik: —Tm, in pidhmaltsik jeye na Dios xi yabtsik u judo an ti chalab abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani anchan kin ejtchtsik jeye kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal!
44011019	Tam ti chemdhjich na Esteban, tujey jeye ti atnal xi keet an belomtsik ani taltsik kale asta Fenisia, Chipre ani Antioka. Taja, in tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an judokitsik ani xi keet an atiklbtsik, yaba.
44011020	Por taltsik an belomtsik xi tl Chipre ani Sirene, ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Antioka ani in tiltsitsik jeye xi yabtsik u judo an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jess.
44011021	Nin chp an Ajtiklb kwajat kal jajtsik, pos yn xin jila nin weje belomtaltsik ani in belaichtsik an Ajtiklb.
44011022	Tam ti an belomtsik xi Jerusaln in acha jech, in aba na Bernab asta Antioka.
44011023	Tam ti na Bernab ulich Antioka, in chuu xan ti na Dios tin lbtajmal an belomtsik xi taja ani kulb tajat. In takiytsik ejtal abal kin ntsi kin belatsik an Ajtiklb kal jun in ejattal lujat.
44011024	Pos jech na Bernab, jaich jun i alwa inik, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u belom tajat. Ani anchan, yn i atiklbtsik in taja abal kin bela an Ajtiklb.
44011025	Tayl, na Bernab kale Tarso abal kin aliy na Sawlo. Tam tin ela, in jna Antioka.
44011026	Taja ti kwajaytsik kal an belomtsik jun i tamub ani yn i atiklbtsik in oktsi. Taja Antioka ti tujey jidhtal tajat ti bijyb an belomtsik, kristianotsik.
44011027	Tam ti jachan i kij, kale Jerusaln chb x i tiltsixtsik ani kaletsik Antioka.
44011028	Jn ti b xi jech an tiltsixtsik, xu bijyb ta Agabo, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajat an kidhblbtsik ani tin ijtsixtal an Tokat Ejattalb, in ulu abal neech ka watey jun i pulek kanab putlki an chabl. Anchan lejtal ti tmun, tam ti an lej pulek takix Klawdio kwajat ti takix Roma.
44011029	Tm, an belomtsik xi Antioka in ulu abal neech kin abtsitsik jun i tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Judea, xantiki kin ejtotsik kin pidhna juntsik ti b.
44011030	Anchan tin tajatsik, in abtsitsik jun i tolmixtalb an takix belomtsik xi Judea. Jech an tolmixtalb pidhan kin jna na Bernab ani na Sawlo.
44012001	Tam ti jachan i kij, an pulek takix Herodes in tuju kin ata taltsik an belomtsik.
44012002	In ulu ka chemdh kal i macht na Jakobo, nin kidhb na Juan
44012003	ani kom in chuu ke jech in kulbetna tajat an judotsik xi yab u belom, in abna jeye ka yakwan na Pedro. Jech tmun tam ti exom an ajib xowki tu kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye.
44012004	Tam ti yakwan na Pedro, abn ka balyat al wikaxte kal na Herodes, xon ti kwajay belkmte kal ch i kwene i soldadotsik, xi juntsik kwene, chetsik i soldado. In chalpayal kin kldha tin tamt an atiklbtsik tam watenekich an ajib.
44012005	Na Pedro u kyb balidh ban wikaxte belkmte tajat alwa, por an belomtsik in ntsaltsik kin kontsintsi na Pedro kal yantam i chplb.
44012006	Jachan an akal, tam ti neech ka tsudhch xowki na Herodes ti neech kin kldha na Pedro tin tamt an atiklbtsik, na Pedro kwajat ti wayal junax chejlidh kal chb i soldado ani wikats kal chb i patl ani belkmte nin wilbil an wikaxte kal chb x i soldadotsik.
44012007	Jun jiktowle ti ulich jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb ani tajkan jun i kamal ba jachan an wikaxte. Takan na Pedro bin chyl kal jachan an tokat abatwle, bakyat ani utsan ench: —Ki chakay jikatki. Wilkan tm an patltsik xi kl ti kwajat wikadh nin kubaktsik na Pedro
44012008	ani utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Ka wika na tsukul kal an t ani ka kwajba na pajab. Tam ti na Pedro okon kin taja jech, utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Ka wtna na wt ani ti kin wwna.
44012009	Kale tm na Pedro in wewkm an tokat abatwle, maske yab in chob max tsubax o yaba xowa kwajat in tajl an tokat abatwle. Jaj in chalpayal ke kwajat in chutal jun i xalkantsixtalb.
44012010	Por wateytsik ban jidhtal belkol ani bin chabtal jeye; tam ti ulichtsik ban patl wileb abal ka kalch ban bl xu kalel ban bitsow, an wileb kwetmtal ti jakpin. Kaletsik tm, ani tam tin belmalichtsik jun peje an bl, jilanich tm kwetm kal an tokat abatwle.
44012011	In exbch tm na Pedro ani in ulu ench: —Xo ojni u exbch ke Jaj an Ajtiklb in abmal nin tokat abatwlejil abal ti kin loo kal na Erodes ani kal ejtal xowa nu at kidhtaltsik xi yab u belom in l ti kin tajtsi.
44012012	In chalpm jech, na Pedro kale bin kim na Mara, nin nna na Juan, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos; taja, ta ti kwajat yn i atiklbtsik, jech junkunktsik abal ti l.
44012013	Tam tin teney an wileb xi kuxtl, jun i tsidhan xu bijyb Rode kale kin chuu xitam j nin tenyal an wileb.
44012014	Por tam tin exbay abal a Pedro na kwajat ti tawnax, yab in japiy an wileb, jlch alt kal i kulbxnich abal kin lna ke na Pedro ta ti kwajat ban wileb ti tawnax.
44012015	Utsan tm ench: —Tat i olmanal! Por an tsidhan in ulal abal tsubax. Jajtsik in ulal ench: —Yab jaj, i tokat abatwle xi kl tu beletnb.
44012016	Por na Pedro in ntsal kin teney an wileb, ani tam tin japiytsik an wileb ani in chuu, labantsik tajat.
44012017	Por jaj in utsatsik kal in kubakki abal yab ka kuchuntsik ani in tiltsitsik xan ti kldh ban wikaxte kal an Ajtiklb ani utsantsik jeye ench: —Ka tiltsitsik jech na Jakobo ani an kidhblbtsik. Kale tm ani kale pl.
44012018	Tam ti tsudhey, laban tajat an soldadotsik abal yab in chobtsik xanty tmnk kal na Pedro.
44012019	Na Erodes in abna ka alyat ani kom yab ejtowat ka elan na Pedro, ejtal an belkol wikaxte ljundh ani abn ka chemdhtsik. Tayl, na Erodes kale Judea ani kale ti kwajl Sesarea.
44012020	Na Erodes in chakuntsal an atiklbtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn, por jech an atiklbtsik in taja i kw abal ka kaletsik tin tamt na Erodes. In ejtotsik kin tantsi tin alwatal na Blasto, jun in awiltalbil an pulek takix Erodes ani kal jachanki, an pulek awiltalb in konoytsik i lejkintalb abal xi jechtsik tyki jeye tu tsidhantsbtsik an ti kapnl ban chabl xin takyal an pulek takix.
44012021	Bijtsin jun i kij kal na Erodes abal ka kaletsik. Jachan a kts, na Erodes in kwajba nin alwa kudhkmil, buxkan xon tu ljundhom ani kwin.
44012022	Tujey tm an atiklbtsik kin ulu kawidh ench: —Xita jech kwajat ti kw yab i inik, i dios!
44012023	Tmki jachan, jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb in yaundha na Erodes abal in walka ka kakn jelti max u Dios ani taja ti chemech kapudh kal i dhm.
44012024	Por nin kwintal na Dios dhubatki ti bukey putlki ani tki tki tu oktsixnb.
44012025	Tam ti na Bernab ani na Sawlo in pidhnmich an tolmixtalb, witsiytsik Antioka ani in jna kal jajtsik na Juan, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos.
44013001	Ban belomtsik xi kwajat Antioka ta ti kwajat i tiltsixtsik ani i oktsixtsik. Jaich na Bernab, na Simn (xu bijyb jeye Tunuy), na Lusio xi Sirene, na Manan (xi junax ti pubenek kal na Erodes, an pulek takix xi Galilea) ani na Sawlo.
44013002	Jun i kij, tam ti kwajat in kaknltsik an Ajtiklb ani ti kltsik, an Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Ti kin plmedhantsi an ta Bernab kal na Sawlo abal kin tajatsik an tojlb xowa u utsmaltsik kin taja.
44013003	Tam ti okonichtsik ti l ani ti kl, in kwajba nin kubaktsik bin b na Bernab ani na Sawlo ani in utsaichtsik tm ka kalch.
44013004	Ms tayl, na Bernab ani na Sawlo kaletsik Selewsia abal abantsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Taja, balintsik ban tan abal ka kale ban chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban pujal.
44013005	Tam ti ulichtsik ban kubtalb xi Salamina, in tujutsik kin tila nin kwintal na Dios ban attsik xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb. Na Juan ta jeye ti xeech kal jajtsik abal ti tolmix.
44013006	Xechintsik putlki ba jachan an chabl ani ulichtsik Pafos. In elatsik taja jun i judo xin bij ta Barjess ani jech an inik, u dhiman. U kambix tajat, pos in ulal ke jaj jaich jun i tiltsix.
44013007	Jech an dhiman, kwajat junax kal an pulek awiltalb xin bij Serjio Pawlo. Na Serjio Pawlo, jaich jun i inik xi chalpadh tajat. In abna ka kanyat na Bernab ani na Sawlo abal in l jeye tajat kin acha nin kwintal na Dios.
44013008	Por jachan an dhiman xin bij Barjess ani u bijyb jeye ta Elimas, yab in walkl na Sawlo ani na Bernab kin oktsi an pulek awiltalb, pos jaj yab in l kin chuu ka belmch an pulek awiltalb.
44013009	Na Sawlo, xu bijyb jeye ta Pablo, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, in teloloy tajat
44013010	ani in utsa ench: —Kambix, atax inik, xi chakmlb kal an lej atax ani xi yab a kulbetnl ejtal xowa lujat! Jantki ti yab a l ka jila ta ojtsix tin lujat blil an Ajtiklb?
44013011	Pos xo, an Ajtiklb neech ti ki pidha ti yajtsiktalb; neech ki jokolb ani yab neech ka ejto ka chutsi tin tajx na kts w i kij. Tmki tin chuu jikwchin ani yab chuxin; ani in ayal tm jun xita abal ka lotokn kl kom jaj yab u chuux.
44013012	Tam ti an pulek awiltalb in chuu jech, belmch, kom u labnal tajat kal an oktsixtalb xin achl kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.
44013013	Na Pablo ani nin juniktsik balin ban tan ban chabl xi Pafos ani kaletsik Perje ban chabl xi Panfilia; por jilantsik kal na Juan ani witsiy Jerusaln.
44013014	Tayl, na Pablo ani na Bernab, kale Perje abal ka kaletsik ban bitsow Antioka xi kwajat ban chabl xi Pisidia. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajattsik ani in bajaw nin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani buxkantsik.
44013015	Tam ti okonich ti ajyb nin takixtal an Dios xin jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss ani nin dhutsadh wil jeye an tiltsixtsik, an oklektsik xi ba jachan an at in abna ka utsantsik ench na Pablo ani na Bernab: —Kidhblbtsik, max a tsidhl jun i takixtalb abal an atiklbtsik, awil ka ulu.
44013016	Chakay tm na Pablo, in kontsi an atiklbtsik kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan ani in ulu ench: —Ka acha paylomlbtsik xi Israel ani tattsik teye xa exll ke na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja:
44013017	Ni Diosil xi waw xu Israel, in takuy ni weje pakliltsik ani in taja abal ka wenkon ti yejche bitsow tam ti bl kwajattsik jelti pl iniktsik ban chabl xi Ejipto. Tayl, in kldhatsik ba jachan an chabl kal nin awiltal.
44013018	&Na Dios in kuxuy chab inik i tamub ejtal xowa jajtsik in taja ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh
44013019	ani in kibdha bk i pakdha bitsow ban chabl xi Kann abal ka pidhantsik an ti chabl ni weje pakliltsik.
44013020	Ms tayl, ch i bo inik xna i tamub kal chab inik lju, in koytsik taknl kal i ljundhaxtsik, asta tam tin bajaw xowki ti kwajay an tiltsix Samuel.
44013021	In konoytsik tm abal in l ka kwajay taknl kal jun i pulek takix ani pidhantsik kal na Dios an ta Sal abal ti pulek takix chab inik xna i tamub. Jech na Sal, u chakmlb kal na Sis, jun i inik xi tl bin kidhtal na Benjamn.
44013022	Ms tayl, na Dios in wkoy ti pulek takix na Sal ani in kwajba na Dabid abal jaich ka kwajay tin pulek takxal an israelitatsik. Na Dios in ulu ench kal tin kwenta na Dabid: “U elmal na Dabid, nin chakmil na Isa, jun i inik xu kulbetnl tajat ani neech kin taja ejtal xowa Nan u l.”
44013023	Jn ti b xin kidhtaltsik jech na Dabid, jaich na Jess. Jech na Jess, jaich xi aban kal na Dios abal kin loo an israelitatsik jelt xan ti Jaj tin ulmal.
44013024	Tam ti yabl tsinek na Jess, na Juan xechin kin tiltsi ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Israel, in utsl abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani ka pujanichtsik.
44013025	Tam tu kunelich an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh na Juan, in ulu ench: “Yab nan xi tattsik a chalpayal ke nan u y; por tu kuxmats ta tl jn xi ms plek k nan. Plek tajat ke yab xata u y abal kin kutpan ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.”
44013026	Kidhblbtsik, xi chakmlb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham ani tattsik teye xa exll abal na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja: kal tattsik ta kwenta tu ulal jech an tsubaxtalb xi kal tin kwenta an loeltalb.
44013027	Pos xu kwajltsik Jerusaln ani nin oklkiltsik, yab in exla xitam j jeye na Jess, nibal in exbantsi tin kwintal an tiltsixtsik xu ajyb ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb tam in ktsjil an koyxnich. Jaxtm, tam ti jajtsik in pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh, in tajaichtsik abal ka tmun jelt xan tin ulmal an tiltsixtsik.
44013028	Ani maske na Jess yab eltsin ni jun in walab xantki ti ka chemdh, in kontsitsik na Pilato abal kin abna ka chemdh.
44013029	Tam ti okonich ti tajtsinal ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab kal Jaj tin kwenta, pabjich tm ban peltsidh te ani jolyat.
44013030	Por ejdh ti t kal na Dios.
44013031	Tam ti jachan i kij, ynl in xalka tinb na Jess abal ka chutat kal xi juniknadhtsik kl tam ti kale Galilea ani kale Jerusaln. Xo jaich jajtsik xi xeech in tiltsal an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
44013032	Jaxtm xo, waw exom tu ltsaltsik an ti alwa tilab xi na Dios in utsmal ni weje pakliltsik.
44013033	Pos waw, xu kidhtalb kal jajtsik, na Dios tu tajtsch xan tin ulmal abal in ejdha ti t na Jess jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin chabtsl an ajatlbtsik: “Tat tu Chakmil ani Nan tu pidhmal xo ti xechintalb.”
44013034	Na Dios in ulmal abal neech kin ejdha ti t abal yab ka kachey nin tul. Na Dios in ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Neech tu pidhatsik an ti lbtajaxtalb xu utsmal neech ku pidha na Dabid.”
44013035	Jaxtm tin ulu jeye ench ba jun i ajatlb: “Yab neech ka walka ka kachey nu tul.”
44013036	Tsubax kejle, na Dabid in tjontsi nin kidhtaltsik xi jachan i kij xan ti utsan kal na Dios, tayl chemech, jolyat xon ti jolidh nin ttatsik ani nin tul kachey.
44013037	Por nin tul na Jess, xi na Dios in ejdha ti t, yab ja kachey.
44013038	Kidhblbtsik, yejat ka chobna, ke an pakwlantsixtalb kal tin kwenta ni walastalbil, neech ki bachu kal tin kwentaki na Jess.
44013039	Yejat jeye ka chobnatsik ke xita kin belaich na Jess, neech ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios, pos tokot na Jess in ejtowal kin taja jech. Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss yab in ejtowal.
44013040	Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka tamu xowa in jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsixtsik, tam tin ulutsik ench:
44013041	Ka koytsik i kwenta, tattsik xa pojkl an tsubaxtalb, ki labantsik ani ki kibchontsik; pos Nan, xin Dios, neech ku taja ba na ktsjiltsik i pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb; jech xowa neech ku taja, max ti ki tiltsi jun xita yab neech ka belatsik.
44013042	Tam ti na Pablo ani nin juniktsik kalch ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb, pakabdh kal xi yabtsik u judo abal ka tiltsintsik jeye jech tam kin bajaw jun nin ktsjil an koyxnich.
44013043	Tam ti buklanichtsik xi ta ti junkunk ba jachan an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, wwn na Pablo ani na Bernab kal yn i judotsik ani xin bellichtsik jeye nin belomtal an judotsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb. Na Pablo ani na Bernab in takiytsik tajat abal yejat kin ntsi ka kwajaytsik bin alwatal na Dios.
44013044	Tam tin bajaw jun nin ktsjil an koyxnich, junkun jun wich xna ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow abal kin axtsi tin kwintal na Dios.
44013045	Por tam ti an judotsik xi yab u belom in chuu yn an atiklbtsik, tujey ti itixbltsik ani tujey ti tomnb na Pablo ani ti odhbijyb.
44013046	Na Pablo ani na Bernab, kwintsik tm kal yantam i awiltalb ani in utsatsik ench: —Tsubax kejle ke yejat ki ltsi okox an tin kwintal na Dios an judotsik xi jelti tattsik; por kom yab a l ka bachutsik, a xalklich abal yab a l ka bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jaxtm xo, u nechich abal ki tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo.
44013047	Pos anchan tu utsan kal an Ajtiklb tam tin ulu ench: Tat tu kwajbmal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani abal ka ltsi xan ti neech kin ejto ka loey ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl tech ti kayl.
44013048	Tam tin achatsik jech, xi yabtsik u judo kulb tajat ani in tujutsik kin ulu ke nin kwintal na Dios alwa tajat. Ejtal belmch xi kwajat takudhtsik abal kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
44013049	Anchan ti xechin ti tilnal nin kwintal na Dios putl jachan an chabl xi Pisidia.
44013050	Por an judotsik xi yab u belom, in pidhkwliy taltsik i mmlbtsik xin tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin belomtal ani u kaknbtsik tajat. Kwin jeye kal an ultalb iniktsik xi ba jachan an bitsow ani in utsatsik abal alwa kin kajna na Pablo ani na Bernab, asta kin kldhatsik ba jachan an chabl.
44013051	Na Pablo ani na Bernab, in tiniy tm an pojodh xi palenek ba nin akan abal kin chobna xi tajatsik ke yab alwa tin taja abal in pojkantsi tin kwintal na Dios ani kaletsik ban bitsow xin bij Ikonio.
44013052	Por an belomtsik kwajat kijidh ani teykmtetsik kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
44014001	Taja ban bitsow xi Ikonio, na Pablo ani na Bernab, ochichtsik ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb, tiltsixintsik lujat tajat, jaxtm ti yn belmchtsik, xu judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo.
44014002	Por an judotsik xi yab u belom in ojtsi tin chalab xi yabtsik u judo ani in taja abal kin chalpay xowa yab alwa kal jachan an kidhblbtsik.
44014003	Por blki kwajaytsik taja nakat i kij na Pablo ani na Bernab ani kwintsik kal yantam i awiltalb abal in chob ke an Ajtiklb kwajat kal jajtsik. An Ajtiklb in xalkl xowa jajtsik in ulal kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Dios ani u pidhnaltsik ti awiltalb abal kin taja i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik.
44014004	Por an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow, kxnktsik, taltsik in tolmintsal an judotsik xi yab u belom ani taltsik in tolmintsal an abatwletsik.
44014005	An judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo, in tajatsik tm i kw kal an awiltalbtsik abal kin odhbijiy ani kin tujbay an abatwletsik.
44014006	Por na Pablo ani na Bernab, tam tin chobnatsik, chinat kaletsik Listra ani Derbe, an bitsowtsik xi kwajat Likaonia ani putlki an kwentsaltsik xi taja wilill,
44014007	xon ti xechintsik jeye kin tila an alwa tilab.
