44014008	Ban bitsow xi Listra, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xi yab in ejtowal ti belal. Jech an inik kwajat buxl ani yab jayki belnek kom kejle anchan ti wachink ti chakam.
44014009	Kwajat in achl xowa na Pablo exom in ulal, na Pablo in teloloy jachan an inik ani in chuu abal in bell tajat ke neech ka jeldh.
44014010	Utsan tm kawidh ench kal na Pablo: —Ki kubey. Tikcholch tm an inik, kubey ani in tujch tm ti belal.
44014011	Tam ti chutat xowa in taja na Pablo, an atiklbtsik in tuju kin ulu kawidh ench kal i kwintalb xi Likaonia: —I diostsik xi jyki i inik painek asta tech xon tu kwajat!
44014012	In ulaltsik ke na Bernab, jaich an dios Jupiter ani ke na Pablo, jaich an dios Merkurio abal jaj nu kw.
44014013	Nin pleil na Jupiter, xin kool nin olb atjil bin wilbil an bitsow, in tsidha i torotsik ani i tidhats wich tin tamt an wilebtsik. An ple, junax kal an atiklbtsik in l kin chemdha an torotsik abal kin pikbantsi na Bernab ani na Pablo.
44014014	Por tam ti na Bernab ani na Pablo, xi jaich an abatwletsik in acha jech, in michnatsik nin kudhkmil, ochich xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik ani in ulutsik kawidh ench:
44014015	—Paylomlbtsik! Jantki ta tajltsik jech? Waw u iniktsik weye jelti tattsik ani u tsinek abal tu ltsitsik ke yejatich ka jila ejtal jech xi yab xata ti alwa. Ka belaichtsik na Dios xi ejat, xin tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach taja.
44014016	Ti wejeich, na Dios in jilmal kejle an atiklbtsik ka xechin xan ti jajkitsik kin lena.
44014017	Por blki in xalkl tinb na Dios xitam j jeye, kal an alwatalb xowa u tajtsinaltsik. Jaj tu uldhantsal an ti b, tu labedhantsal an ti kapnl, tu pidhl xowa i yntsal abal ki kapu ani abal ku kwajay kijidh.
44014018	Por maske in ulutsik ejtal jech, blki yab in ejto kin kubdha abal yab ka chemdhantsat an ti torotsik abal ka pikbantsat.
44014019	Ulich tm chb x i judotsik xi tl Antioka ani Ikonio. In pidhkwliy an atiklbtsik abal ka tujbaxintsik ani tujbayat na Pablo. Tam tin chalpaytsik in chemdhmalich, in kldhatsik bodhodhl ba jachan an bitsow.
44014020	Por tam ti an belomtsik junkun wilill xon ti kwajat na Pablo, jaj chakay ani ochich jun ba jachan an bitsow. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, kalch tm junax kal na Bernab ban bitsow xi Derbe.
44014021	Tam ti okonich kin tila an alwa tilab ba jachan an bitsow xi Derbe, xon ti belmch yn i atiklbtsik, witsiytsik jun Listra, Ikonio ani Antioka.
44014022	Ba jachan an chabltsik, in pakabdha tajat an belomtsik ani in utsa abal kin ntsitsik an belomtalb. In utsltsik jeye, ke abal kin ejto jun xita ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, yejat kin watna yn i yajtsiktalb.
44014023	Bijyat jeye putlki ban bitsowtsik xon ti waach i belomtsik, i takixtsik xi neech ti belkol an ti belomtsik. Tam ti okonichtsik ti l ani ti kl, in kawintsitsik abal ka beletn kal an Ajtiklb xu belomichtsik.
44014024	Tayl, wateytsik ban chabl xi Pisidia ani ulichtsik ban chabl xi Panfilia.
44014025	In tilatsik jeye an alwa tilab ban bitsow xi Perje ani tayl kaletsik ban bitsow xin bij Atalia.
44014026	Taja Atalia, balintsik ban tan ani kale Antioka, an bitsow xon ti kontsintsidhtsik an tin alwatal na Dios abal kin ejto kin tajatsik an tojlb xi xo in okch.
44014027	Tam ti ulichtsik Antioka, in junku an belomtsik ani in tiltsi ejtal xan ti ynktsik kal na Dios abal kin taja an tojlb xi punkuntsidh ani xan ti tolmiyat jeye kal na Dios xi yabtsik u judo abal ka belmchtsik.
44014028	Na Pablo ani na Bernab, kwajaytsik taja nakat i kij kal jajtsik.
44015001	Tam ti na Pablo ani na Bernab kwajattsik Antioka, ulich taltsik i iniktsik xi tl Judea. Jech an iniktsik, in tuju kin oktsi an kidhblbtsik ke abal kin ejto ka loeytsik, kool kin tajatsik an exl ba nin tul jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44015002	Na Pablo ani na Bernab in tujutsik jun i kwlxtalb kal jech an iniktsik ani kwlxintsik tajat. Jaxtm ti utsan na Pablo ani na Bernab ani taltsik an kidhblbtsik xi taja abal ka kaletsik Jerusaln kin lejkiy jech kal an abatwletsik ani an takixtsik xin beletnl an belomtsik.
44015003	Xi aban kal an belomtsik, watey ban chabl xi Fenisia ani xi Samaria. Taja, in tilltsik xan ti belmchtsik jeye an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik u kulbl tajat kal jech xowa in achl u tiltsinaltsik.
44015004	Tam ti ulichtsik Jerusaln, bachwat kal an belomtsik, kal an abatwletsik ani kal an takix belomtsik. In tiltsitsik xan ti ynktsik kal na Dios kal an tojlb xi punkuntsidh.
44015005	Por taltsik an fariseotsik xi belmmadhich jeye, kubeytsik ani in ulu ench: —An belomtsik xi yabtsik u judo, yejat ka tajtsin an ti exl ba nin tul ani kin wwnatsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44015006	Junkun tm an abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik abal kin chalpay xan ti neech kin ejto kin lejkiy jech.
44015007	Tam ti okonichtsik ynl ti kwlx, chakay na Pedro ani in utsatsik ench: —Kidhblbtsik, a chobichtsik abal na Dios tin takwymal, xi jaich jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal abal ku ltsitsik an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo ani ka belmchtsik jeye.
44015008	Ani na Dios, xin exlantsal tin ejattal ejtalkitsik, in xalka abal in bachu xi yabtsik u judo, tam tin pidhaichtsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb anlki jelt xan ti waw tu pidhmal.
44015009	Na Dios yab in pl kldha jajtsik kal waw, nibal waw yab tu pl kldha kal jajtsik, pos in tokedhantsitsik jeye an tin ejattal kal tin kwenta abal belmchtsik.
44015010	Ani xo, jantki ti yab a belltsik xowa na Dios in tajmal ani a l ka chuutsik kin taja jech an belomtsik xowa waw nibal ni weje pakliltsik in ejtmal kin taja?
44015011	Yab yejat ki taja anchan, tokot yejat ki chalpm abal u loodhich aniki kal nin alwatalbil ni Ajtik Jess jelt xan ti jajtsik loodh.
44015012	Chamkantsik tm ejtal ani in achatsik xan ti exmch ti tiltsinaltsik kal na Bernab ani na Pablo an exltsik ani an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin tajmal na Dios kal jajtsik ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.
44015013	Tam ti okonichtsik ti kw na Pablo ani na Bernab, na Jakobo in ulu ench: —Kidhblbtsik, ti kin axtsitsik:
44015014	Na Simn Pedro tu tiltsmalich xan ti na Dios tin tuju kin bachu jeye xi yabtsik u judo abal kin dhabalnaich.
44015015	Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab ench:
44015016	Tayl neech kin witsiy jun ku kwajba jun i Pulek Takix xin kidhtal na Dabid. Jech an Pulek Takix neech kin taja abal kin kakn jelt tam ti ejat na Dabid.
44015017	Anchan neech ku taja abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi bijidh Nan u dhabal ti kin aliytsik ani xi yabtsik u israelita jeye, xi kwajattsik putlki an kayl, ti kin exlatsik abal Nanich tin Okxlbil.
44015018	Anchan tin ulu an Okxlb, xin pidhnmal ka chobn ejtal jech asta ti weje.
44015019	Jaxtm, nan u ulal ke yab yejat ki itixbdha xi yabtsik u judo xin bellichtsik na Dios.
44015020	Lejat kal ki dhutsuntsi abal ki utsatsik ke yabich kin kapu i kapnl xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik, ke yabich ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal ani yabich kin kapu i konltsik xi kuchdhatski o putedhatski nibal kin kaputsik i xich.
44015021	Pos asta ti weje waach jun xita ban bitsowtsik xin oktsixnl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jech jaich xu ajyb echeki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
44015022	An abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik, junax kal ejtal an belomtsik, in ulu tm abal alwa kin takuy chb x xi jajtsik in kidhtal abal kin abatsik Antioka junax kal na Pablo ani na Bernab. Takwyat na Judas xu bijyb jeye Barsabs ani na Silas. Jech an paylomlbtsik, jaich xi kwajat ultalb tajat kal an kidhblbtsik
44015023	ani kal jajtsik, abn jech an dhutsadh w, xin ulal ench: “Waw xu kwajat tu abatwle junax kal an takix belomtsik ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik, i abnl i chapndhomtalb abal ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi yabtsik u judo xu kwajl Antioka ani xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Siria ani Silisia.
44015024	I chobnmalich ke taltsik i atiklbtsik xu kwajl tech, kalnektsik tachan, por yab waw i abmal. Jajtsik ti itixbdhmalichtsik kal nin oktsixtal ani ti ukpindhmalichtsik abal ti utsltsik ke yejat ka taja an exl ba na tul ani ka wwnatsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44015025	Jaxtm waw, i chalpay ejtal tu b ki takuy taltsik i kidhblbtsik xi waw i kidhtal abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik junax kal na Bernab ani na Pablo, an kidhblbtsik xi waw i kanidhl tajat.
44015026	Jech na Bernab ani na Pablo, jaich an kidhblbtsik xi yab tajat in ajyaltsik tinb maske ka chemdh kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
44015027	Jaxtm, j i abl na Judas ani na Silas xi takwymal, jajtsik neech ti kw kal tattsik abal ti ki wiltsitsik ejtal jech.
44015028	Pos an Tokat Ejattalb ani waw weye, i chuu abal alwa, ke yab ms xowa tu utsatsik ka taja, tokot jech xi ms yejat:
44015029	ke yab ka kaputsik xowa pikbantsidhich an chilabtsik, yab jeye ka kaputsik i xich, nibal nin tul an konltsik xi kuchdhatski ani yab ki junkuntsik kal xi yab a tomtal. Max yabich ka tajatsik jech, a tajlichtsik xowa alwa. Ki kwajaytsik alwa.”
44015030	Anchan p, tam ti abanichtsik, kaletsik Antioka. In junku taja an kidhblbtsik ani in pidha an ti dhutsadh w.
44015031	Tam tin ajay jech an dhutsadh w an kidhblbtsik, kulbtsik tajat kal jachan an takixtalb.
44015032	Kom na Judas ani na Silas i tiltsixtsik jeye, in takiy ani in pakabdha an kidhblbtsik kal yn i tilabtsik xin ulu.
44015033	Tayl, tam ti kwajch na Judas ani na Silas chb x a kts Antioka, chapndhjichtsik tm kal i kijidhtalb kal an kidhblbtsik abal ka witsch xon ti kwajattsik xi kl ti abnktsik.
44015034	Por na Silas in ulu abal neech ja ka jilkon taja.
44015035	Na Pablo ani na Bernab jilkon taja Antioka ani kal yn ms xi keettsik, in ntsi ti oktsixtsik ani ti tiltsixtsik an ti alwa tilab.
44015036	Tam ti ms taylich, na Pablo in utsa ench na Bernab: —Wana jun ki lna ti t an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat putlki an bitsowtsik xon ti tilmalich nin kwintal na Dios abal ki chuu xan ti kwajattsik.
44015037	Na Bernab in l kin jna na Juan kal jajtsik, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos;
44015038	por na Pablo in chalpayal abal yab alwa max kin jna, pos ms okox, jilnktsik Panfilia ani yab in ntsi an tojlb kal jajtsik.
44015039	Kwlxin kal jech tin kwenta ani yabtsik in koy i lejkintalb, jaxtm ti kejtsik ti kale. Na Bernab in jna na Markos. Balintsik ban tan ani kale ban chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban pujal.
44015040	Na Pablo in takuy na Silas abal ka junikn kl. Tam ti okonich ti kontsintsbtsik an tin alwatalbil na Dios kal an kidhblbtsik, kalchtsik tm.
44015041	Xechintsik Siria ani Silisia in punkuntsal an kidhblbtsik abal kin ntsaltsik an ti belom.
44016001	Na Pablo ani na Silas ulich ban bitsowtsik xin bij Derbe ani Listra, taja, in ela jun i belom xin bij ta Timoteo. Jech na Timoteo u chakmlb kal jun i mmlb judo xu belom, por nin tta i griego.
44016002	An kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Listra ani Ikonio in till abal jech na Timoteo, jaich jun i alwa inik.
44016003	Na Pablo in lena ka junikn kal na Timoteo, jaxtm tin tajtsi an ti exl bin tul, abal yab kin itixbdha an judotsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsowtsik. Pos kal ejtal ti chobte ke nin tta na Timoteo i griego.
44016004	Ba ejtal an bitsowtsik xon tu watel, in ltsal an kidhblbtsik an ti takixtalb xin pidhnmal an abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik xi kwajat Jerusaln abal anchan ti yejat ka tajan xan tin ulaltsik.
44016005	Anchan, an belomtsik u likedhantsb tin itsch ani in ntsaltsik ti belom. Tsudhl u tajkanal u yanel ms an belomtsik.
44016006	Yab walk kal an Tokat Ejattalb kin tilatsik an alwa tilab ban chabl xi Asia. Jaxtm, wateytsik ban chabl xi Frijia ani Galasia
44016007	ani ulichtsik bin wl an chabl xi Misia. Tam ti taja ti kwajattsik, in chalpay ka ochichtsik ban chabl xi Bitinia, por yab walk kin tajatsik anchan kal nin Ejattal na Jess.
44016008	Wateytsik in lujtalki ani yab ochich ban chabl xi Misia, kaletsik ban bitsow xi Troas.
44016009	Tam ti taja ti kwajattsik, jun i akal, na Pablo in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ban xalkantsixtalb, in chuu kubl jun i inik xu kwajl Masedonia ani u pakabdhb kl ench: “Ki watey Masedonia ani ti ku tolmiy.”
44016010	Tam ti na Pablo in chuu jachan an xalkantsixtalb, u tojojon abal ku kale Masedonia kom i chob alwa ke na Dios jaich xi kwajat tu utsl ku kale taja ki tiltsitsik jeye an ti alwa tilab.
44016011	Taja Troas, u balin ban tan ani u kale in lujtal Samotrasia, an chabl xi kwajat ban ja. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u ulich ban bitsow xin bij Nepolis.
44016012	Tam tu kwajatich Nepolis, u kale Filipos. Jech an bitsow Filipos, kwajat Masedonia, an bitsow xi ms ultalb ani Roma tu taknal. U kwajay taja chb x a kts.
44016013	Jun i kij, tam ti jaich in ktsjil an koyxnich, u kale ban bitsow ani u kale xon ti kwajat jun i walja, jun i kubtalb xon tu kalel tajat yn ti l. U buxkan taja ani u kwajay ki tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an mmlbtsik xi junkunk taja.
44016014	Jn ti b an mmlbtsik xin bij Lidia xu kwajl ban bitsow Tiatira, xin nujwal i kudhkumtsik xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn, ta ti kwajat ti ochwix. Jech an mmlb, in kaknl tajat na Dios ani palmdhantsat tin ejattal kal an Ajtiklb abal kin bela xowa kwajat in ulal na Pablo.
44016015	Pujyat tm, kl ejtal nin kidhtaltsik ani tayl tu pakabdha ench: —Max tattsik a chalpayal ke nan tsubax lejtal tu bellich an Ajtiklb, ki kaletsik tu kim abal ki koych taja. Ani tu tajtsi ti chplb abal ku koych bin kim.
44016016	Jun i kij, tam tu neech ban kubtalb xon tu kalel tu l, i ela jun i tsidhan xin kool jun i ejattalb xin witl kin exla xowakich. Jech an tsidhan in tl tajat yn i tumn abal nin ajtiktsik kom in witl kin exla xowakich.
44016017	Waw ani na Pablo u wwn kal an tsidhan ani kawidh in ulal ench: —Jech an paylomlbtsik, in tojnlil a Dios xi plek tajat ani ti ltsaltsik xan ti neech ki loey.
44016018	Yn a kts in taja anchan, asta ke jun i kij na Pablo, itixbdhjich, chawkilch ani in utsa ench an ejattalb xi ta ti kwajat ba jachan an tsidhan: —Tin bij na Jesukristo tu utsl abal ki kale ba jachan an tsidhan. Ani tmki ti kale jachan an ejattalb ban tsidhan.
44016019	Por tam ti nin ajtiktsik jachan an tsidhan in chuu abal yabich ms neech kin ejto kin tlomna, in yakwatsik na Pablo ani na Silas ani in jna chejel bitsow xon ti kwajat an awiltalbtsik.
44016020	Utwattsik ban awiltalbtsik ani in ulutsik ench xi yakwxink: —Jech an iniktsik, xi jaich i judotsik, exom in pjxlindhl an atiklbtsik xi tech ba ni bitswil
44016021	ani exom in oktsixnl xowa jajtsik in ujnmal in tajl, por waw yab alwa ki bachu nibal ki taja, kom u romano.
44016022	An atiklbtsik chakuy ani in adhk ti utey ba na Pablo ani na Silas. An awiltalbtsik in abna ka kotsin tin kudhkmil na Pablo ani na Silas ani ka kwadhantsik kal i wichate.
44016023	Tam ti okon ti kwadhnaltsik ynl, balyat ban wikaxte ani utsan an belkol wikaxte abal kin beletnatsik tajat alwa.
44016024	Tam ti an belkol wikaxte in acha utsan jech, in baliy asta tin okontalich in altjil an wikaxte ani in jila machbintsidhtsik tin akan kal i te.
44016025	Por tam ti chejelich i akal, na Pablo ani na Silas kwajattsik ti l ani in ajatnltsik i ajatlb abal a Dios. Xi keet an wiknltsik kwajat in achltsik.
44016026	Jun jiktowl ti lwkin chapik tajat an chabl ani in dhiya nin akanlbil an wikaxte. Tmki jachan, jakpin ejtal an wilebtsik ani wilkan an patltsik xi kl ti kwajat wikadh an wiknltsik.
44016027	Ejech an belkol wikaxte ani tam tin chuu abal ejtal nin wilbiltsik an wikaxte jakpink, in jixna nin machtil abal kin chemdha tinb kom in chalpayal ke jlmadh ejtal an wiknltsik.
44016028	Por tawn kawidh ench kal na Pablo: —Yab xata ka tajtsi tab, pos ejtal tech u kwajat.
44016029	In konoy tm jun i tajbaxtalb an belkol wikaxte, ochich adhik alt ani u wipipl kal i jkib tudhlan tin tamt na Pablo ani na Silas.
44016030	Kldhtsik tm elb kal an belkol wikaxte ani konyattsik ench: —Jabtsik, janty yejat ku taja abal kin loey neye?
44016031	Jajtsik in tkoy ench: —Ka bela an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani neech ki loey tat ani ejtal na kidhtaltsik.
44016032	Tiltsin tin kwintal an Ajtiklb ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik jachan an belkol wikaxte, tiltsintsik jeye.
44016033	Jachan i ora bl akal, an belkol wikaxte in jna na Pablo ani na Silas abal kin taktsi xon ti chojbdhats kal an wichate. Tayl, pujan an belkol wikaxte ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik.
44016034	Ms tayl, an belkol wikaxte in jnatsik tin kim ani in kapundha. An belkol wikaxte ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, u kulbl tajat abal in belaichtsik na Dios.
44016035	Tam ti tsudhey, an awiltalbtsik in aba dhajawe i ykwaltsik abal ka utsan an belkol wikaxte kin walkaichtsik.
44016036	Utsan tm ench na Pablo kal an belkol wikaxte: —An awiltalbtsik in ulal abal tu walkaichtsik; jaxtm, awil ki kalchtsik ani yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax.
44016037	Por na Pablo in ulu ench: —Waw xu romano, tu kwadha tin tamt an atiklbtsik maske yab in exbaymaltsik okox xanty i walmal, tu baliy ban wikaxte; ani xo tu walkl chinatki? Pos yaba! Ka tschtsik xo jajtsik ti ku kldha.
44016038	An ykwaltsik in tiltsi jech an awiltalbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik jikey tam tin chobnatsik abal na Pablo ani na Silas u romano.
44016039	Pos kale tm an awiltalbtsik abal kin kontsi ti pakwlantsixtalb na Pablo ani na Silas. Kldhjichtsik tm ani kontsin ti alwatalb abal ka kalchtsik ba jachan an bitsow.
44016040	Tam ti kalchtsik ban wikaxte, kale bin kim na Lidia. Tam tin lnaich an kidhblbtsik ani in utsaich abal yab kin jilatsik ti belom, kalchtsik tm.
44017001	Tam ti kalchtsik, na Pablo ani na Silas watey ban bitsowtsik xi Anfpolis, xi Apolonia ani ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Tesalnika. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb.
44017002	Na Pablo, kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl ani x i semana kwin kal jajtsik tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
44017003	Anlki xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, anchan tin wiltsaltsik ke an Kristo kool kin watna i yajtsiktalb, kool ka chemdh ani ka ejech ti t. In ulal ench: —Jech na Jess xin kwajat tu tiltsaltsik, jaich an Kristo.
44017004	Belmch tm taltsik an judotsik ani junkuntsik kal na Pablo ani na Silas. Belmch jeye yn i griego xin kaknltsik tajat na Dios ani yn i mmlb xi exlmtetsik tajat.
44017005	Por kal jech tin kwenta, an judotsik xi yab belmmadh, tujeytsik ti itixbl ani in junku chb x i iniktsik xi atax xi xeechkitsik ti bl yab xata in tojnl. In tujutsik ti pjex ani in itixbdha an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow. Kaletsik ti pjex bin kim na Jasn, in ayaltsik na Pablo ani na Silas abal kin kldhatsik ani kin pidhna ban atiklbtsik.
44017006	Por kom yab elantsik taja na Pablo ani na Silas, in jnatsik bodhodhl na Jasn ani taltsik i kidhblbtsik tin tamt an awiltalbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jech an iniktsik, xi xeech in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik putl an kayl, tsinekich jeye xo tech.
44017007	Jech na Jasn in koydhmal tin kim. Ejtal jajtsik in chikat tajtsal tin takixtalbil an lej pulek takix romano abal in ulaltsik ke waach t i Pulek Takix xu bijyb ta Jess.
44017008	Tam tin achatsik ejtal jech, an atiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik tujey ti itixbl.
44017009	Por na Jasn ani xi keettsik jeye, in pidhnatsik i jalbixtalb abal ka walktsik.
44017010	Jikatki ti utsantsik na Pablo ani na Silas kal an kidhblbtsik abal ka kale akal ani ka kalchtsik Berea. Tam ti ulichtsik taja, kaletsik ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb.
44017011	Jech an judotsik, alwa iniktsik ja ani yab jelti xi Tesalnika. In bachutsik an alwa tilab kal yantam i kulbtalb ani tsudhey ka tsudhey in ajyaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab abal kin chuu max tsubax lejtal xowa u ltsinaltsik kal na Pablo ani na Silas.
44017012	Jaxtm, yn belmch xi jajtsik ani an griegotsik jeye. Belmch jeye i mmlbtsik ani i iniktsik xi exlmtetsik tajat.
44017013	Por tam ti an judotsik xi Tesalnika in chobna abal na Pablo kwajat in till jeye nin kwintal na Dios ba jachan an bitsow xi Berea, kaletsik jeye taja ani in pjxlindha an atiklbtsik.
44017014	Por an kidhblbtsik in aba jikatki na Pablo abal ka kale bin waltsik an pujal. Na Silas ani na Timoteo, jilkontsik Berea.
44017015	Jn na Pablo kal nin juniktsik asta ban bitsow xin bij Atenas. Tam ti ulichtsik taja, an junkiltsik witsiy, por utsantsik kal na Pablo abal ka witsiy Berea ani kin utsa na Silas ani na Timoteo abal ka kaletsik dhubat xon ti kwajat na Pablo.
44017016	Lejat na Pablo kwajat Atenas in aytsm na Silas ani na Timoteo, u chalpax tajat abal in chutal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow in kaknltsik tajat i chilabtsik.
44017017	Jaxtm na Pablo, u kalel kin tila nin kwintal na Dios ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. U kwajl jeye ti kw kal taltsik xin kaknl a Dios ani tsudhey ka tsudhey in tiltsal tin kwintal na Dios junax chejel bitsow xitaki kin ela.
44017018	Taltsik an iniktsik xin wewkmtsal tin oktsixtalbil xu bijyb ti epikreos ani taltsik jeye xin wewkmtsal tin oktsixtalbil an estoikos, in tujutsik ti tiloll kal na Pablo. Taltsik in ulal ench: —Janty awil tu utsl jech an inik xu kw tajat? Ani taltsik in ulal jeye: —In junwal jelti max xeech in lnl i keet diostsik. Jech tin ulaltsik, jaich abal in achltsik ke na Pablo in till an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Jess ani abal neech ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik kal na Dios.
44017019	Jn tm ba jun i kubtalb xu bijyb ti Arepago, xon tin ujnmal u junkunal an takixtsik ani konyat ench: —Alwaxe ki chobna weye jech an t oktsixtalb xi tat a tsidhl?
44017020	Pos waw i achl a till xowa yab i exbayal ani i l weye ki exbay xanty in l kin ulu ejtal jech.
44017021	Pos ejtal xu kwajltsik Atenas ani an pl iniktsik jeye xu kwajltsik taja, yabtsik ms xowa in chalpayal, tokot kin acha ani kin tila an t tilabtsik xu tilnal taja.
44017022	Kubey tm na Pablo junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ban Arepago ani in ulu ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Atenas, nan u chutal ke tattsik a kaknl tajat a diosiltsik.
44017023	Abal tam tin xechin tin teloll xon ta tajltsik an kaknaxtalb, u ela ba jn xon ta kwajbltsik an pikbaxtalb i dhuslab xin ulal ench: “Abal na Dios xi yab i exll.” Pos jech na Dios xi tattsik a kaknl maske yab a exll, jaich na Dios xi nan tu tiltsaltsik.
44017024	Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal an kayl ani ejtal xowa waach; Jaj in dhabal an walki ani an kayl. Yab u kwajl ban pulek at xon ti Jaj u kaknb xi tajadh kal i iniktsik,
44017025	nibal in kyal i yejetalb xi neech ka ejtowat ka tajtsin kal i atiklbtsik. Pos Jaj tu pidhl an ti xechintalb, Jaj tu tajl ku dhtsumlch ani Jaj tu pidhl ejtal xowa i yntsal.
44017026	Kal jn tokot i inik tin tajmal ejtal an atiklbtsik abal ka kwajaytsik ba putl an chabl. In okox bijtsmalich an ti kij ani an ti chabl xon ti yejat ka kwajaytsik,
44017027	abal kin aliytsik na Dios, jelti max baludhki neech kin ejto kin elatsik, maske tsubax kejle na Dios yab w ti kwajat kal waw.
44017028	Pos kal tin awiltal na Dios tu xeech, tu yoynal ani tu ejat; jun i chalpadh inik xi tattsik a kidhtal in ulu ench: “Waw u kidhtalb kal a Dios.”
44017029	Max waw u kidhtalb kal a Dios, yab yejat ki chalpay ke na Dios in junwal jelti jun i chilab xi tajadh kal i oro, o kal i plata, o kal i tujub, xi tajnk kal i iniktsik xantiki jajtsik kin chalpay.
44017030	Na Dios in kuxuy xowa in taja an atiklbtsik xi ti wel chabki abal yab in chob xanty in tajltsik. Por xo, in utsl ejtal an atiklbtsik xi putlki abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom.
44017031	Pos na Dios in bijymalich jun i kij xowki neech kin ljundha ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl kal i lujattalb. Neech ka ljundhtsik kal jun i inik xi Jaj in takwymal ani jech, ejtalich in pidhmal kin chobna xita J tam ti Jaj in ejdha ti t.
44017032	Tam tin achatsik abal an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t, taltsik labdhnaxin ani taltsik in ulu ench: —Tayl jun neech ki ntsi ki acha jech xowa a till.
44017033	Jilanichtsik tm kal na Pablo.
44017034	Por wwn kal taltsik i atiklbtsik ani belmchtsik. Jn ti b xi jajtsik, jaich na Dionisio, xu kidhtalb jeye kal xu junkunaltsik ban Arepago. Belmch jeye jun i mmlb xu bijyb Dmaris ani yn ms xita.
44018001	Tam ti ms tayl, na Pablo kale Atenas ani kale ban bitsow xin bij Korinto.
44018002	Taja, in ela jun i judo xin bij Akila, xu chakam ban chabl xi Ponto. Na Akila ani nin tomtal Prisila tm tajat t ti ulnektsik Korinto. Jajtsik tl ban chabl xin bij Italia, kaletsik ban bitsow xi Roma abal an pulek takix Klawdio in ulu ke yejat ka kale Roma ejtal an judotsik. Na Pablo kale kin lna na Akila ani na Prisila
44018003	ani kom na Pablo in witl jeye kin taja xowa jajtsik in tajl, ke jaich an tojmch kudhkum at, kwajay kal jajtsik abal ka tjon junax.
44018004	Echeki tam in ktsjil an koyxnich, na Pablo u kalel ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, u kwajl kin tila taja an alwa tilab, in pakabdhl an judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo jeye.
44018005	Tam ti ulich na Silas ani na Timoteo xi tltsik Masedonia, na Pablo in ntsch tm kin tila an alwa tilab abal kin lej tsubkantsi an judotsik, ke na Jess, jaich an Kristo xi jajtsik kwajat in aytsm.
44018006	Por an judotsik tujey ti itixbl ani ti odhbijixtsik. In tiniy tm nin kudhkmil na Pablo jelti jun i exl abal kin xalkantsitsik ke yab alwa xan tin tajl ani in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik ta walab max ka kibdha na ejattal, nan yabich u kwenta. Xo in nechich abal ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo.
44018007	Kale tm ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kale bin kim jun i inik xin bij Justo. Jech an inik, in kaknl jeye na Dios ani u kwajl tin wl an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
44018008	Na Krispo, xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb kl ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, in belatsik an Ajtiklb. Belmch jeye yn i atiklbtsik xi taja Korinto tam tin achatsik jech an alwa tilab ani pujantsik.
44018009	Jun i akal, na Pablo in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb xon ti utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Yab ki jikey, ka ntsi ka tila nu kwintal ani yab ki chamkan.
44018010	Nan in kwajat kal tat ani yab xita neech kin ejto ti ki tajtsi jun xata yab alwa, pos u kool yn i atiklbtsik ba jech an bitsow xi neechtsik ti kin bela.
44018011	Anchan, na Pablo kwajay taja Korinto jun i tamub kal chejel, in oktsal an atiklbtsik an tin kwintal na Dios.
44018012	Por jachan i kij, tam ti na Galin kwajat ti pulek awiltalb Akaya, an judotsik junkun abal kin pjey na Pablo. Jn xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb
44018013	ani utsan ench an pulek awiltalb: —Jech an inik xeech in utsl an atiklbtsik ke yejat kin kakna na Dios kal jun i kaknaxtalb xi yab in junwal jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44018014	Nechich jeye tajat ka kwin na Pablo, tam ti na Galin in utsa ench an judotsik: —Judotsik, max jaichak jun i walastalb o jun i ataxtalb xowa in tajmal jech an inik, neech tu exbantsitsik xowa ka ulu;
44018015	por kom i tilabki ani i bijlbkitsik xowa a kwlxnl ani kal tin kwenta jeye na takixtalbiltsik, awil ka lejkiy tatkitsik, nan yab u l tin ljundhom kal jech xowa tattsik a kwlxnl.
44018016	Ani in utsa tm ka kalchtsik elb ejtal ti b.
44018017	Na Sstenes, an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb yakwan kal xi t ti kwajattsik ani chawat taja tin tamt an pulek awiltalb. Por na Galin yab in taja ti kij ejtal jech.
44018018	Na Pablo kwajay bl owat Korinto. Ms tayl, in utsaich tm an kidhblbtsik abal nechich ani balinich tm ban tan abal ka kale ban chabl xi Siria junax kal na Prisila ani na Akila. Ban bitsow xi Senkrea, tam ti yabl balnk ban tan, na Pablo olilin abal kin taja jun xata xowa in ulmal neech kin taja.
44018019	Tam ti ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Efeso, na Pablo in jila na Prisila ani na Akila. Kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kwin kal an judotsik xi taja u junkunal.
44018020	Pakabdh kal an judotsik xi taja abal ka kwajay nakat i kij kal jajtsik, por na Pablo yab in lena.
44018021	Chapndhomch tokot na Pablo abal nechich ani in utsatsik ench: —Kool kin kale Jerusaln abal ku ajbna an ajib xi exomich ti kunel; por neech jun kin witsiy abal tu lnatsik ti t, max na Dios anchan tin l. Tayl, na Pablo balin ban tan ani kale Efeso.
44018022	Tam ti ulich Sesarea, na Pablo paay ban tan ani kale Jerusaln abal kin chapndha an belomtsik. Tayl kale jeye Antioka.
44018023	Tam ti kwajch w i kij Antioka, kale jun ani xechin kin loniy juntsik ti juntsik an bitsowtsik xu taknal Galasia ani xi Frijia, in punkuntsaltsik abal yab kin jila ti belom.
44018024	Tam ti jachan i kij, ulich Efeso jun i judo xu bijyb ta Apolos, xu chakam ban bitsow xi Alejandra. Jech na Apolos, jaich jun i alwa tiltsix tin kwintal na Dios ani in exll tajat alwa an Tokat Dhuslab.
44018025	Jaj oktsidh tajat alwa tin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb, u tiltsix kal yantam i kulbtalb ani u oktsix kal yantam i tajaxtalb kal tin kwenta na Jess, maske jaj tokot in exll nin pujaxtalbil na Juan.
44018026	Na Apolos kwajay ti tiltsix ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb kal ni jun i jkib; por tam ti achan kal na Prisila ani na Akila, jn plki ani wiltsin ms tajax tin tsubaxtalbil na Dios.
44018027	Tayl, tam ti na Apolos in ulu abal neech ban chabl xi Akaya, tolmiyat kal an kidhblbtsik ani in abtsitsik jun i dhutsadh w abal an belomtsik xi taja, xon tin utsl abal kin bachutsik alwa na Apolos tam ka ulich. Tam ti ulich Akaya, in tolmiy tajat xi belmmadhichtsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Dios.
44018028	Na Apolos in xalkl tin tamt an atiklbtsik abal ukpink ti kwajat an judotsik kal tin kwenta na Jess. In xalkantsal kal jun i tsubaxtalb xi yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab ani ani in ltsaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke na Jess jaich an Kristo xi kwajattsik in aytsm.
44019001	Lejat na Apolos kwajat Korinto, na Pablo watey ban kwentsaltsik xi kwajat ban chnlom ani ulich Efeso, xon tin ela chb x i belomtsik.
44019002	Konyattsik ench kal na Pablo: —A bachutsikxe an Tokat Ejattalb tam ta belmch? Tkontsik ench: —Nibal i achmal ela max waach i Tokat Ejattalb.
44019003	Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Pablo: —Pos, jantom pujaxtalb a bachmaltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Waw u pujan jelt xan tin ulu na Juan.
44019004	Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pablo: —Ani kejle, na Juan in pujymal xin jillichtsik ti walablom, por in utsltsik abal yejat kin bela xi neech ka tsch ms tayl k jaj. Jech xi kwajat in till, jaich na Jess, an Kristo.
44019005	Tam tin achaichtsik jech, pujyattsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
44019006	In kwajba tm nin kubak na Pablo bin b jajtsik ani ulich an Tokat Ejattalb ba jajtsik. Kwintsik kal i keet kwintalb ani in tilltsik i tilab xu pidhnal kin ulu kal a Dios.
44019007	Lajuchb xna an iniktsik xin exbay xowa utsan kal na Pablo.
44019008	Tin nakl x a ch, na Pablo in ntsi ka kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Taja in will ani in till nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun i jkib. In pakabdhl an atiklbtsik abal kin exbay xan tu takix na Dios.
44019009	Por taltsik in chapikmdha nin itsch ani yab in lenatsik ti belom, tokot in atax tilltsik an t oktsixtalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Plm tm na Pablo kal jajtsik ani in jna an belomtsik ba jun i at xon tu tajnal i exblch. Jech an at, in dhabal jun in inik xin bij Tirano ani taja ti oktsixin na Pablo tsudhey ka tsudhey.
44019010	Anchan tin ntsi kin taja na Pablo tin nakl chb i tamub, jaxtm ti ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia, i judotsik ani i griegotsik, in acha nin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb Jess.
44019011	Na Dios in pidhl ti awiltalb na Pablo abal kin taja i pakdha labandhaxtalb.
44019012	Watats tajat, ke asta i panyuelotsik o i kudhkumtsik xin takmal o in wetnmal na Pablo, u jntsinal an yaultsik. Tam kin taka an yaultsik, u jell kal an yawlch xin kooltsik ani an atax ejattalbtsik u kalel jeye.
44019013	Por taltsik i judotsik xi xeech ti kldhax atax ejattalb ban atiklbtsik, in lena kin ntsi tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess abal kin kldhaxna. In utsl ench an atax ejattalbtsik: —Tin bij na Jess xi xeech in till na Pablo, tu utsl ki kaletsik.
44019014	Jech jaich in tajl xi bk an iniktsik xu chakmlbtsik kal na Eseba, jun i judo xi jaich jn ti b in oklkil an pletsik.
44019015	Por tam tin utsatsik anchan, tkoyat ench kal an atax ejattalb: —Na Jess u exll ani u exll jeye xitam j na Pablo; por tattsik, jitatsik teye?
44019016	Tmki jachan, an inik xon ti kwajat an atax ejattalb, tikchon xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani kom likat tajat, ttsik ejtal ti b. Chawattsik tajat, chojbdh ani chilim ti kaletsik ti dhil ba jachan an at.
44019017	Ejtal an judotsik ani an griegotsik xu kwajl taja Efeso, in chobna jech; jaxtm ti jikeytsik tajat ani in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
44019018	Anl jeye, yn xi belmmadhichtsik, u ulel kin lna an walastalb xin tajmaltsik ti wel chabki.
44019019	Xu dhimantsikwiik, in tsidhl nin dhutsadh wiltsik ani in tsikl tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Tam ti kldhantsat xatwa in jalbl jachan an dhutsadh wtsik, in bajaw nin jalbl, chab inik lju mil i tumn xi tajadh kal i plata.
44019020	Ani anchan, nin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb neech u bukel u bukel ani u xalkanal nin awiltal.
44019021	Tam ti ms tayl, na Pablo in ulu abal neech kin lna an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia ani xi Akaya ani kin ntsi an bl asta Jerusaln. In ulu jeye ke tam kin lnaich Jerusaln, kool ka kale jeye Roma.
44019022	In aba tm Masedonia chb nin tolmiwltsik, na Timoteo ani na Erasto, lejat jaj jilkon bl w i kij Asia.
44019023	Tam ti jachan i kij, wachin jun i kwlxtalb plek kal tin kwenta an t oktsixtalb.
44019024	Jachan an kwlxtalb, in taja jun i inik xin bij Demetrio xin tajl i chilabtsik kal i plata. Jech an inik in tajl i tsitsik chilab xin junwal jelti an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana ani yandha tajat in tl xu tojnaltsik kal jaj.
44019025	Pos in junku nin tojnliltsik kl xi keettsik xi jaychki jeye in tojlbil ani in utsatsik ench: —Jabtsik, a chobichtsik ke kal jech an tojlb i tl tajat an tumn;
44019026	por xo, a chutaltsik ani a achltsik, ke jech na Pablo xeech in ulal ke an chilabtsik xin tajl an iniktsik, yab i dios. Ynich i atiklbtsik in tajmal kin bela anchan, yab tokot techki Efeso, anl jeye putlki ban chabl xi Asia.
44019027	Jech yab tajat alwa abal neech ti ku ojtsi jech an ti tojlb xi kool. Yab tokot jechki, an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana, yabich jeye neech ka tajan ti kij tayl. Anchan, neech tm ka pojkantsatich tin publ jech an ajtiklb xu kaknb kal ejtal waw xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia ani kal xu kwajltsik jeye putlki an kayl.
44019028	Tam tin achatsik jech, chakuytsik tajat ani kawidh tin ulutsik ench: —Plek an ajtiklb Diana, xu kaknb kal waw xu kwajl tech Efeso!
44019029	Wachin tm i pjxtalb ba jachan an bitsow. Yakwan na Gayo ani na Aristarko, chb i iniktsik xu kwajl Masedonia xi junkmte kl na Pablo ani bodhodhl ti jntsik asta xon tin kyal an junkuntalb an atiklbtsik.
44019030	Na Pablo in lwiik ka ochich taja abal ka kwin kal an atiklbtsik, por yab walk kal an belomtsik.
44019031	Anl jeye, taltsik nin jab na Pablo xu awiltalbtsik Asia, in abna ka pakabdh na Pablo abal yab ka ochich taja.
44019032	Lejat ba jachan an junkuntalb, an atiklbtsik keetich keetich xanty in ulaltsik kawidh abal u chakltsik ani yn an atiklbtsik xi yab in chob xantki ti junkunk.
44019033	Por taltsik xi ta ti kwajat taja in ltsi na Alejandro xantki tin kwenta tin tajltsik anchan. Jech na Alejandro, jaich xi nixk ka ochich tin tamt an atiklbtsik kal an judotsik. Na Alejandro in utsa an atiklbtsik kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan kom jaj in l ti kw ani kin ulu ke yab jaj an judotsik in tujm jech.
44019034	Por tam ti chutat abal jaj u judo jeye, kwajaytsik ti dhajnal ench chb xna i ora: —Plek an ajtiklb Diana xu kaknb kal waw xu kwajl tech Efeso!
44019035	Tam ti an dhutsum xi ba jachan an bitsow in ejtch kin chamka an atiklbtsik, in ulu ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Efeso, putl an kayl in chob ke jech an bitsow xi Efeso kwajat punkudh abal kin beletna an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana ani ka beletnantsat jeye an tin chilbil xi tl ba na Jupiter.
44019036	Kom yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke jech yab ani, ki chamkantsik ani yab xata ka tajatsik max yab a chalpaymaltsik okox alwa.
44019037	Pos jech an iniktsik xi tattsik a tsidhmal, yab in odhbijymal nibal in atax tilmal ni ajtik Diana.
44019038	Max na Demetrio ani nin tojnliltsik waltsidh kal jun xita, jaxtmich ti waach i ljundhomtsik ban at xon tu tajnal i ljundhaxtalb; awil kin utsbiy taja ani ka lejkintsik alwa jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb.
44019039	Ani max a kool bl keet xanty ka lejkiytsik, yejat ka lejkiytsik ba jun i junkuntalb;
44019040	yab t ku utsan ke waw i tajl ka pjxin an atiklbtsik kal xowa tmun xo. Pos yab waach ni jun i tsubaxtalb xi neech ki ejto ki ulu max ku konyat xantki tin kwenta ti tjan jech.
44019041	Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, in utsa tm an atiklbtsik abal ka kalch.
44020001	Tam ti okonich an pjxtalb, na Pablo in kaniy an belomtsik abal kin pidha chb x ti takixtalb. Tayl, tam ti okonich kin pidhna jech an takixtalb, in chapndhaichtsik tm kal jun i muluknaxtalb ani kalch tm Masedonia.
44020002	In lna putlki an kwentsaltsik xi ba jachan an chabl, in pakabdhl tajat an kidhblbtsik kal nin kwintal ani ms tayl ulich Gresia.
44020003	Kwajay taja x a ch. Tam ti nechich tajat ka balin ban tan abal ka kale Siria, na Pablo in chobna xanty tu lenb ka tajtsin kal an judotsik abal u atnal. Jaxtm tin chalpay abal ms alwa ka witsiy belal ani watey jun Masedonia.
44020004	Junikn kal na Spater xu kwajl Berea xu chakmlb kal na Pirro, na Aristarko ani na Segundo xu kwajltsik Tesalnika, na Gayo xu kwajl Derbe, na Timoteo, na Tkiko ani na Trfimo xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia.
44020005	Jech an kidhblbtsik okxin ani tu aytsitsik ban bitsow xi Troas.
44020006	Tam ti okonich an ajib xowki tu kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, u kale Filipos kal i tan ani tin blb a kts, i bajawtsik ban bitsow xi Troas. U kwajay taja bk a kts.
44020007	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, u junkun abal ki pjchxna an pan ani na Pablo in oktsal an belomtsik. Kom tam jun tsudhelom neech ka kalch, in ntsi ti kw asta ti chejlan an akal.
44020008	Xon tu junkunk, jaich ba jun i alt xi kwajat ba jun i pntsx at xon ti kwajat letotl yn i tajbaxtalbtsik
44020009	ani jun i kwitl inik xu bijyb ta Ewtiko, buxl ban bentana. Kom na Pablo owch tajat ti oktsix, an kwitl in lena tajat ti wayal, wayich ukpidhki ani kwajlan ban pntsx at. Nin tekl, jaich in oxtal in puntsl jachan an at ani chemnek ti dhayan.
44020010	Paay tm na Pablo, kwachiy xon ti kwajat an kwitl, in mulukna ani in utsa ench an kidhblbtsik: —Yab ki jikeytsik, yab chemnek.
44020011	Kadhiy tm jun na Pablo, in peja an pan, in kaputsik ani in ntsi ti oktsix asta ti tsudhey. Tayl kalch tm.
44020012	An kwitl ejat ti jn ani ejtal u kulbltsik ti jilkon.
44020013	Waw u okxin ani u kale kal i tan asta Asn abal ki iki na Pablo abal anchan tin ulmal kom jaj belal tin lena ka kale.
44020014	Tam tu lxin Asn kal jaj, balin jeye ban tan kal waw ani u kale Mitilene.
44020015	U kale taja ani tam ti jun tsudhelom, u watey tin tamt an chabl xin bij Ko. Tam ti jun tsudhelom jun, u ulich Samos, xon tu kubltsik an tan. U koych Trojilio ani tam ti jun tsudhelom tam tu belch putl a kts, u ulich Mileto.
44020016	Anchan ti taja abal na Pablo yab ka kwajay nakat i kij Asia. Yab in lena ka kale Efeso, pos jaj in l ka ulich jikat Jerusaln ani max in ejtowalak ka ulich jikat, in l ka kwajay taja tam kin bajaw in ktsjil an Pentekosts.
44020017	Tam ti na Pablo kwajat Mileto, in abna ka kanyat an oklek belomtsik xi Efeso
44020018	ani tam ti ulichtsik, in utsa ench: —Tattsik a chob alwa xan tin kwajay asta tin ulichki tech Asia.
44020019	Echeki in kwajay kal tattsik u tjontsal an Ajtiklb kal yantam i chaattalb, kal yantam i ukil ani kal yantam i taktamixtalb xin tajtsin kal an judotsik abal in l ti kin tajtsitsik xowa yab alwa.
44020020	Por yab u jila tu tiltsitsik ni jun xata xowa alwa abal tattsik, tu oktsitsik yanl ta b ani ta kimki jeye.
44020021	Xu judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo, u utsmalichtsik ke yejatich kin jila ti walablom, kin alch na Dios ani kin belaichtsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
44020022	Pos xo, in neech Jerusaln kom anchan tin usnal kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab u chob xanty neech ku tamu taja.
44020023	Xowa tokot u chob, jaich ke putlki an bitsowtsik xon ti kin kale, an Tokat Ejattalb tin utsl abal in aytsmte kal i wikaxte ani kal yantam i yajtsiktalb.
44020024	Por nan yab in kwajat tin chalpax kal jech nibal u ajyal tub max kin chemdh. Tokot u l ku ejto ku okoy kal yantam i kulbtalb, an tojlb xi tin punkuntsmal an Ajtiklb Jess, xi jaich abal ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin kanidhaxtal na Dios.
44020025	Xo in kwajat u chalpayal ke ni jun xita xi tattsik, xi tu tiltsmalichtsik xan tu takix na Dios, yab neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik.
44020026	Jaxtm, tu utsltsik xo, ke yabich u kwenta max jun xita xi tattsik yab in bela,
44020027	pos tu tiltsmalichtsik ejtal xowa in l na Dios kin chuu ka chobnatsik ani yab tu chintsmaltsik ni jun xata.
44020028	Jaxtm tu utsltsik ka beletna tab. Ka beletnatsik jeye ejtal an belomtsik xon ta kwajbadh ta oklektsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka beletna an kidhblbtsik xin bellich an Ajtiklb, xi Jaj in chaymalich kal nin xichl.
44020029	Nan u chob alwa, ke tam kin kalch, neech ka tsch keettsik xi neech kin lena kin ojtsi tin chalab an belomtsik. Jechtsik, in junwal jelti an padhumtsik xin kapal an borrego.
44020030	Ani ba tattsik a kidhtal, neech ka kale taltsik xi neech kin oktsixna i kambixtalb abal jajtsik in l ka wwn kal an belomtsik.
44020031	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta, ka chalpay abal tin nakl x i tamub, akal i kij, yab u jilmal tu takiytsik juntsik ta b. Juntsikl asta kal i ukil in kwajl tu takiytsik.
44020032	Ani xo kidhblbtsik, tu kwajbltsik bin kubak na Dios ani bin tsubaxtalbil nin alwatal. Na Dios in kool in chp abal ti ki likedhatsik ani abal ti ki pidhatsik teye xowa in ulmal neech kin pidha xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj.
44020033	Yab u ltendhantsmal tin tumnal nibal tin kudhkmil jun xita, yab u tajmal anchan.
44020034	Tattsik a chob alwa ke nan in tjnk neye kal u kubak abal ku koy xowa u yntsal ani abal ku ejto jeye ku tolmiytsik xi kwajat kal nan.
44020035	Echeki tu oktsmaltsik ke anchan ti yejat ku tjon abal ki ejto ki tolmiy an chojontltsik. Ka chalpmtsik nin kwintal ni Ajtik Jess, tam tin ulu ench: “Ms tajat kijidh ki pidhna, ke ki bachu.”
44020036	Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, na Pablo tudhlan ani lan kal ejtal jajtsik.
44020037	Kal ejtal ti ukintsat tajat na Pablo, mulukn ani chuchbayat.
44020038	Tepintsik tajat abal in acha utsan ke yabich ms neech ka witsiytsik kin chuu. Tayl, juniknjich tm asta xon ti kwajat an tan.
44021001	Tam ti jilaich an kidhblbtsik, u balin ban tan ani u kale in lujtal Kos. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u kale Rodas ani tam ti tajaich tu kwajat, u kale Ptara.
44021002	Taja Ptara, i ela jun i tan xi neech Fenisia, u balin ba jachan an tan ani u kale.
44021003	Tam tu watelich, i chuu an chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban ja; u chawkin ti ejt ani i ntsi an belch asta Siria. Kom an tan neech kin akiy i kitlb ban bitsow xin bij Tiro, u ochich taja.
44021004	Taja Tiro, i ela an belomtsik ani u kwajay bk a kts kal jajtsik. Jajtsik, ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb, in utsatsik na Pablo abal yab alwa ka kale Jerusaln.
44021005	Por tam ti kidhch jachan xi bk a kts, u kale. Ejtal an belomtsik, kl nin tomtaltsik ani nin chakmiltsik, tu junikna asta tu kale ban bitsow. Taja tin wl an pujal, u tudhlan ani u lan.
44021006	U chpndhxin tm kal i muluknaxtalb, u kadhch ban tan ani jajtsik, witschtsik jeye tin kim.
44021007	U ulich Tolemayda xon ti okch an belch ban ja xi tuju Tiro. Taja Tolemayda, i chapndha an kidhblbtsik ani u kwajay kal jajtsik jun a kts.
44021008	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Pablo ani xi ta tu kwajat kal jaj, u kale ani u kale ban bitsow xin bij Sesarea. Tam ti tajaich tu kwajat, u kale bin kim na Felipe. Jech na Felipe, jaich an tiltsix alwa tilab ani jaj, jaich jeye jn ti b xi bk an tolmix belomtsik. Taja tu koych tin kim.
44021009	Na Felipe in kool ch in tsidhniltsik yab tomkidh, jachan an tsidhantsik in till i tsubaxtalbtsik xu ijtsinal kal a Dios.
44021010	Tam tu kwajinekich taja chb x a kts, ulich jun i tiltsix xi tl Judea xu bijyb ta Agabo.
44021011	Jech an tiltsix, tsinek abal ti ku lna. In tyna an t xi kl tin wikl nin tsukul na Pablo, in wika nin akan ani nin kubak jeye kal jachan an t ani in ulu ench: —An Tokat Ejattalb in ulal abal ench ti neech ka wikan kal an judotsik tuwa Jerusaln xin dhabal jech an t ani neech ka pidhn ban pl iniktsik.
44021012	Tam ti acha jech, waw ani xu kwajltsik Sesarea, i pakabdha na Pablo abal yab ka kale Jerusaln.
44021013	Por na Pablo tkon ench: —Jantki ta uknaltsik ani tin tepindhltsik? Pos nan u pidhnl tub yab tokotki abal kin wikan, asta abal kin chemdh jeye Jerusaln kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jess.
44021014	Kom yab i ejto ki tamkuy, yabich ms xata ti utsa. Tokot i utsa ench: —Ka tjan xan tin l an Ajtiklb.
44021015	Tam ti watch chb x a kts, u tojojon ani u kalch tm Jerusaln.
44021016	U junikn kal chb x i belomtsik xu kwajl Sesarea ani kal jajtsik, ta jeye ti neech jun i inik xi Chipre tu chakam xu bijyb Mnasn. Jech an inik, owenekich ti belmmadh ani taja ti neech ku koych bin kim.
44021017	Tam tu ulich Jerusaln, an kidhblbtsik tu bachu kal yantam i kulbtalb.
44021018	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Pablo junax kal waw, u kale ki lna na Jakobo ani ta jeye ti kwajat taja ejtal an oklek belomtsik.
44021019	Chapndhtsik kal na Pablo ani tiltsintsik ejtal xowa in tajmal na Dios kal jaj ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.
44021020	Tam tin achatsik, in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ani utsan ench na Pablo: —Alwaich at kidhb, a chutal ke wachich yn i mil i judotsik xu belomich, por ejtal jajtsik in ntsal kin ulu ke yejat ka ntsin ka wwn nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44021021	Usnkichtsik ke tat, a oktsal an judotsik xu kwajl ban pl bitsowtsik, ke yabich yejat kin wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Ke a utsltsik jeye ke yabich yejat kin exliy nin chakmiltsik nibal kin wwna xowa in ujnmal in tajl nin weje pakliltsik.
44021022	Janty a ulal kal jech? Pos an atiklbtsik neech ka junkun tam kin acha abal tech i ulnek.
44021023	Waw i chalpayal abal ms xo alwa ka taja ench: Waach tech kal waw ch i iniktsik xin lej tsubax utsmal a Dios ke neech kin taja xowa in ulmaltsik.
44021024	Ka jnatsik kal tat, ka tokedha tab junax kal jajtsik ani tat ka jalbiy xowa jajtsik neech kin paku. Tayl awil ka olilintsik. Anchan, ejtal neech kin chobna ke yab tsubax xowa usnktsik kal tat ta kwenta. Neech kin chuutsik abal a ntsal teye ka wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
44021025	Por kal tin kwenta xi yabtsik u judo xi belmmadhich jeye, i dhutsuntsmalich ke yab yejat ka kwajaytsik ti chalpax kal jech. Tokot yab kin kaputsik in tul i konltsik xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik, yab kin kaputsik i xich, yab kin kaputsik in tul an konltsik xi kuchdhatski ani yab xita ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal.
44021026	In jna tm na Pablo xi ch an iniktsik ani ti jun tsudhelom, in toko tinb junax kal jajtsik. Tayl ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal kin ulu xowki ti neech ka okon an tokeltalb. Jech, jaich xowki ti neech kin kwajbatsik an pikbantsixtalb juntsik ti b.
44021027	Por tam ti wich u kibel ka kidhey xi bk a kts, chutat na Pablo ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal chb x i judotsik xu kwajl Asia ani in pjxlindha an atiklbtsik. Yakwan na Pablo
44021028	ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi Israel, ti ku tolmiy! Jech an inik, jaich xi xeech putlki in oktsal an atiklbtsik abal kin pojka ni at kidhtal, nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Anl jeye, in dhmalich ba jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios chb x i griego ani anchan, in choyalich jech an tokat alt.
44021029	Jech tin ulutsik anchan, kom chuudh na Pablo ms okox ban bitsow junax kal na Trfimo, xu kwajl Efeso ani in chalpayaltsik ke na Pablo in dhmal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
44021030	Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow, chakay ani jikatki ti tschtsik. Yakwan na Pablo, bodhyat ka kale bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani jikatki ti mapyat an wilebtsik.
44021031	U lenbich tajat ka chemdh, tam tin chobna an pulek oklek soldadotsik abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow xi Jerusaln, u chakl ti kwajattsik.
44021032	Tam ti an pulek oklek soldadotsik in chobna abal u chakl an atiklbtsik, in junku an soldadotsik ani an oklek soldadotsik jeye ani adhik ti kaletsik xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik. Tam ti chutat an pulek oklek soldadotsik ani an soldadotsik jeye, in kubdhatsik ti pewex an ta Pablo.
44021033	Utey tm an pulek oklek soldadotsik, in yakwa na Pablo ani in ulu ka wikan kal chb i patl. Tayl konyatich tm xitam j jeye ani xanty in tajmal.
44021034	Por an atiklbtsik keetich keetich xanty in ulaltsik kawidh, jaxtm an pulek oklek soldadotsik yab xata in ejtowal kin exbay abal u xakwakwl tajat an atiklbtsik ani in abna ka jn na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.
44021035	Tam ti ulich bin koybil jachan an at, kitn na Pablo kal an soldadotsik abal an atiklbtsik u chauxichtsik tajat;
44021036	kom an atiklbtsik ejtal wwnaxnk ani kawidh in ulaltsik ench: —Ka chemdh!
44021037	Tam ti nechich ka dh na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik, in utsa ench an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Awilxe tu utsa jun xata? Tkoyat ench kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —A ejtowalxe ta kw griego?
44021038	Tm, yabxe p tat an inik xi Ejipto in chablil, xi jun i kij in tuju jun i pjxtalb ani in jna ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh che mil i chemdhax iniktsik?
44021039	In ulu tm ench na Pablo: —Nan in judo ani in chakam ban yejche bitsow xin bij Tarso. Jech an bitsow u taknal ban chabl xi Silisia. Por tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin walka ku tawna an atiklbtsik.
44021040	Walk tm ti kw kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik, kubey na Pablo ban koyob ani in utsa kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan an atiklbtsik. Tam ti chamkantsik, in tawnatsik tm kal i kwintalb xi ebreo ani in utsatsik ench:
44022001	—At kidhtaltsik ani ttalbtsik, ka acha xowa neech ku ulu abal ku loo tub.
44022002	Tam tin achatsik abal kwajat ti tawnb ebreo, chamkantsik ms ani utsantsik ench kal na Pablo:
44022003	—Nan in judo. In chakam ban bitsow xin bij Tarso xu taknal ban chabl xi Silisia, por tech tin pubenek Jerusaln ani tam tin exblomch, tin oktsi na Gamaliel. U exbna anchan jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik. Echeki u tajl an chplb kal ejtal nu ejattal abal ku tjontsi na Dios jelt xan ti tattsik a tajl xo.
44022004	Ti wel chabki, u atlwiik xin belltsik an t tsubaxtalb, u yakwl an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik abal ku baliy ban wikaxte ani taltsik asta u chemdhl.
44022005	Nin oklkil an pletsik ani ejtal nin oklkil an judotsik in chob jech. Pos jajtsik tin pidhmal jun i dhutsadh w abal ku pidha an awiltalbtsik xi Damasko ani anchan, ku ejto ku yakwa an belomtsik, ku tsidhatsik tech Jerusaln ani ki baliytsik ban wikaxte.
44022006	Por tam tin neech ti bl ani kunatich kin ulich Damasko, chejel kts xna, jun jiktowl tin wiliyat kal jun i tajaxtalb xi tl walki
44022007	ani in kwajlan chabl. U acha tm jun i kwintalb xi tin utsl ench: “Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl?”
44022008	U konoy tm ench: “Jita p teye, Jab?” Ani Jaj tin utsa ench: “Nan in Jess xi Nasaret, xi tat a atl.”
44022009	Xi ta ti kwajattsik kal nan, in chuu jeye an tajaxtalb ani jikeytsik, por yab in acha an kwintalb xi kwajat tin tawnl.
44022010	Nan u utsa tm ench: “Janty yejat ku taja Ajtik?” Ani an Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Ki chakay, ka ntsi an bl abal ki ulich Damasko ani taja, neech ki utsan ejtal xowa yejat ka taja.”
44022011	Kom tin jokolbdhmal an tajaxtalb, nu juniktsik tin lotokna asta tin ulich Damasko.
44022012	Taja Damasko, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xin bij ta Ananas. Jech an inik, in tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani exlmte tajat abal i alwa inik kal ejtal an judotsik xu kwajl taja.
44022013	Na Ananas, ulich ti kin lna ani tam ti ulich, tin utsa ench: “Kidhblb Sawlo, ki chuxinich jun.” Tmki jachan tin chuxin jun ani u ejto ku chuu jaj.
44022014	Tin utsa tm ench: “Nin Diosil ni weje pakliltsik, ti takwymal abal ti ki pidha ka chobna xanty in l, abal ka chuu an Ajtiklb ani abal ka axtsi tin kwintal.
44022015	Pos tat neech ka tila Jaj tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik ani neech ka tiltsitsik ejtal xowa a chumal ani a achmal.
44022016	Ani xo, janty bl a aytsal? Ki chakch, ki pujanich ani ka kontsi na Jess abal ti ki pakwlantsi an ta walastalbil.”
44022017	Tam tin witsiy Jerusaln, in kale tin l ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani lejat in kwajat tin l, u chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb.
44022018	Ban xalkantsixtalb u chuu an Ajtiklb ani tin utsa ench: “Ki kale jikatki Jerusaln, pos yab neech ki beltsin tech xowa ka tila kal Nan tu kwenta.”
44022019	U utsa neye tm ench: “Ajtik, jajtsik in chob abal nan in kalel ba ejtal an attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, u jnltsik ti wiknl xi ti bell ani u chawaltsik.
44022020	Tam ti chemdh jeye na Esteban, na tjontsixil xi ti till, ta neye tin kubat taja kunat ani u ulu abal alwa ka chemdh. Asta u beletnantsmal tin kudhkmil an iniktsik xi chemdhaxin.”
44022021	Por an Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Ki kalch, pos Nan neech tu aba w xon tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo abal ka tiltsi an ti alwa tilab.”
44022022	Ejtal jech, jaich tokot axtsin ani in tujutsik jun ti dhajnal kawidh ench: —Ka chemdh jachan an inik! Yab in tomnl ka kwajay ejat!
44022023	Kom in ntsal ti dhajnaltsik, ti petnax tin kudhkmil ani ti kpul pojodh,
44022024	an pulek oklek soldadotsik in ulu ka dh na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik ani in abna ka kwadhan abal kin lna xantki tu atnal anchan kal an atiklbtsik.
44022025	Por tam ti wikadhich tu kyb abal neech ti kwadhnal, na Pablo in utsa ench an oklek soldadotsik xi ta ti kwajat taja: —A kooltsikxe i awiltalb ka kwadha jun i romano tam yabl a ljundhmal?
44022026	Tam tin acha jech an oklek soldadotsik, kale kin utsa ench an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Janty neech ka taja? Pos jech an inik jaich jun romano.
44022027	Utey tm an pulek oklek soldadotsik ba na Pablo ani in konoy ench: —Tsubaxxe kwa lejtal ke tat i romano? Tkoyat ench kal na Pablo: —Tsubax.
44022028	Utsan tm ench kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Nan yn tajat i tumn u pakmal abal kin jin neye tin romano. Ani na Pablo in ulu ench: —Pos nan in romano na asta tin chakam.
44022029	Tam tin acha jech xi neechtsik ti kwadhax an ta Pablo, wmtsik; asta an pulek oklek soldadotsik jeye. Tam tin exbchtsik abal na Pablo i romano, jikeytsik abal in wikmal kal i patl.
44022030	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an pulek oklek soldadotsik, kom in l kin exbay xantki tu atnal na Pablo kal an judotsik, in wixkintsi an ti patltsik ani in abna ka junkuwat nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani ejtal an Junkulom Awiltalb. In kldha tm na Pablo ani in kwajba tin tamt jajtsik.
44023001	Na Pablo in teloloy an Junkulom Awiltalb ani in utsatsik ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan in kwajinek asta xo tsububudh u itsch tin tamt na Dios.
44023002	Na Ananas, xi jaich nin oklkil an pletsik, in utsatsik tm xi ta ti kwajat kunat ba na Pablo abal kin chaaw bin wi.
44023003	Por tkoyat ench kal na Pablo: —Kambix inik, na Dios neech ti ki chaaw tat! I buxl tachan abal ti kin ljundha jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb. Max anchan, jantki p tm ta chikat tajl an takixtalb abal a ulal kin chawat?
44023004	Utsan ench na Pablo kal xi ta ti kwajattsik taja: —Jantki ta odhbijyal anchan nin oklek pleil na Dios?
44023005	Na Pablo in ulu ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan yab u chob max jaj i oklek pletsik; pos ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab yejat ka atax kawintsi jun xita xu takix ba na bitswil.”
44023006	Tam ti na Pablo in chuu abal taltsik xi kwajat ban Junkulom Awiltalb, jaich in kidhtal an saduseotsik ani taltsik, in kidhtal i fariseotsik, in ulu kawidh ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan in fariseo neye, in kidhtalb kal i fariseotsik ani exomtsik tin ljundhl abal u bell ke an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t.
44023007	Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, an fariseotsik ani an saduseotsik in tuju ti kwlx ani kxin xi ta ti junkunk.
44023008	Pos an saduseotsik in ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, nibal waach i tokat abatwletsik nibal i ejattalbtsik; por an fariseotsik, in bell ja abal waach ejtal jech.
44023009	Tujey ti dhajnaltsik kawidh. Chakay tm chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xu tolmintsb kl an fariseotsik ani in ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik yab in tajmal ni jun xata walats ani max tawnadh kal jun i ejattalb o kal jun i tokat abatwle, yab yejat ki tomna na Dios.
44023010	Kom an kwlxtalb ms chapikmch, an pulek oklek soldadotsik in chalpay max ka atax tajtsin na Pablo. Jaxtm tin aba i soldadotsik abal kin kldha na Pablo xon ti kwajat ani kin jna jun ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.
44023011	Jun tsudhelom, tam ti jikwchinich, an Ajtiklb in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Pablo ani utsan ench na Pablo: —Pablo, ka pubdha na ejattal, pos anchan jelt xan ta tiltsi an atiklbtsik xi tech Jerusaln kal Nan tu kwenta, anchan jeye yejat ka taja Roma.
44023012	Tam ti tsudhey, taltsik an judotsik in taja i kw xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha na Pablo. In lej tsubax ulutsik kal i ataxtalb abal yab neech kin kaputsik nibal kin ucha xata asta kin chemdha okox.
44023013	Watats xna chab inik i iniktsik xin ulu anchan.
44023014	Pos jechtsik kale ban oklek pletsik ani bin oklkil an judotsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Waw i lej tsubax ulmal kal i ataxtalb, ke yab neech ki kapu ni jun xata asta ki chemdha okox na Pablo.
44023015	Ani xo tattsik, junax kal an Junkulom Awiltalb, ka kontsitsik an pulek oklek soldadotsik abal kalm kin tsidha na Pablo ta tamt tattsik. Ka utsatsik abal a l ka ljundha kal ms i kwenta ani waw neech ku kwajay tojojodh abal ki chemdha ti bl tam u tsidhbich.
44023016	Por nin chakmil nin ixm na Pablo in chobna jech ani kale kin ltsi na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.
44023017	In tawna tm na Pablo jn ti b an oklek soldadotsik ani in utsa ench: —Ka jna jech an kwitl ban pulek oklek soldadotsik, pos jaj in tsidhl jun xata xanty in l kin utsa.
44023018	An oklek soldadotsik in jna tm an kwitl ban pulek oklek soldadotsik ani in utsa ench: —An wiknl xin bij Pablo, tin tawna ani tin pakabdha abal tu tsidhantsi jech an ti kwitl, pos an kwitl in kool jun xata xanty in l ti ki utsa.
44023019	Lotokn tm an kwitl kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik, jn plki ani konyat ench: —Janty a l ti kin utsa?
44023020	Utsan tm ench kal an kwitl: —An judotsik in tajmal i kw abal ki pakabdh ka jna kalm na Pablo ban Junkulom Awiltalb. In ulaltsik abal neech ti ki utsa ke in l kin ljundha kal ms i kwenta.
44023021	Por yab ka beltsitsik, pos watats xna chab inik i iniktsik xi jajtsik in kidhtal neech ka kwajay ti aytsix chinat. Jajtsik in lej tsubax ulmal kal i ataxtalb abal yab neech kin kaputsik nibal kin uchatsik xata asta kin chemdha okox na Pablo. Ani xo, tokot kwajat in aytsmtsik xanty ka ulu.
44023022	Tam tin achaich jech, an pulek oklek soldadotsik, in abaich tm ka kale an kwitl; por in utsa abal yab kin tiltsi ni jun xita max an pulek oklek soldadotsik ltsidh jech.
44023023	An pulek oklek soldadotsik in kaniy tm chb i oklek soldadotsik jeye ani in utsatsik abal kin tojojoy chb i bo inik i soldadotsik xi kal in akanki, ox inik lju xi kal i bitsim ani chb i bo inik xi kal i chupidh patltsik abal ka kaletsik Sesarea tam jaykich belju i akal.
44023024	In ulu jeye abal ka tojojoyat i bitsim xi neech kin pna na Pablo. In ulu abal ka beletn alwa ani ka uldh alwa asta ban pulek awiltalb Flix.
44023025	Ani in abna jech an dhutsadh w kal jajtsik xin ulal ench:
44023026	“Nan, xu bij Klawdio Lisias, tu abtsal ti chapndhomtalb. Tu abtsal jech an ti dhutsadh w, pulek awiltalb Flix.
44023027	An judotsik in yakwmal jech an inik ani neechwiik kin chemdha, por tam ti nan u chobna abal jaj i romano, in kale kal nu soldadojiltsik ani u loo.
44023028	Kom u lena ku chobna xantki tu atnal, u jna bin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
44023029	Taja u acha ke u atnal abal in chikat tajl nin takixtalbil an judotsik, por yab in tajmal ni jun xata xin tomnl kin jalbiy kal i cheml, nibal abal ka kwajay balidh ban wikaxte.
44023030	Por kom u chobna abal an judotsik in kool chalpadh kin chemdha, j tu abtsal ani u kontsmal jeye xi kl tu atnal abal ka kale tachan kin lejkiytsik xanty in kool kal jaj.”
44023031	Tam ti an soldadotsik in achaich xan ti utsan, in kldha na Pablo ani jikwax tin jnatsik asta Antpatris.
44023032	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an soldadotsik xi belal, witsiy ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani xi punattsik kal an bitsim, in ntsi an bl junax kal na Pablo.
44023033	Tam ti ulichtsik Sesarea, in pidhatsik an ti dhutsadh w an pulek awiltalb ani in pidha jeye an ta Pablo.
44023034	Tam ti an pulek awiltalb okon kin ajay an dhutsadh w, in konoy xon tu kwajl na Pablo. Tam tin chobnaich abal Silisia u kwajl,
44023035	in utsa ench: —Neech tu ljundha asta tam ka tsch xi ti utsbiyaltsik. An pulek awiltalb, in ulu tm abal ka beletn na Pablo ban at xon tu ljundhom na Erodes.
44024001	B a kts ms tayl, ulich Sesarea na Ananas, nin oklkil an pletsik. Ulich jeye kal jaj chb x in oklkil an judotsik ani jun i kawintsix xin bij Trtulo. Jechtsik, kale tin tamt an pulek awiltalb abal kin utsbiy na Pablo.
44024002	Tam ti uldh na Pablo, na Trtulo, tujey kin lna ban pulek awiltalb. Ench tin utsa na Flix: —Juntam jalbintsch tajat pulek awiltalb abal u kwajat kijidh ani yab u kwajat tu pjx. Ejtal kwajat belkmte alwa kal tat na chalpadhtal.
44024003	Pulek awiltalb Flix, ejtal jech echeki i bachwal putlki kal yantam i jalbintsixtalb.
44024004	Por abal yab ms tu lej tojliy owat, tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti ku exbantsi junw xowa neech ki ulu.
44024005	Pos waw i chumalich abal jech an inik, exom in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik. Putlki tech an chabl exom in tajl ka kxin an judotsik ani jaj, u oklek kal an junkunltsik xu bijyb ti nasareno.
44024006	Asta in lenmal kin chikat taja an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jaxtm ti yakwa ani i lena ki ljundha jelt xan tin ulal ni takixtalbil;
44024007	por ochich an pulek oklek soldadotsik xin bij Lisias ani tu kntsi kal yantam i chplb.
44024008	In ulu abal an utsbixtsik yejat ka tsch tech kal tat. Tat neech ka ejto ka ljundha ani ka chobna xantki tin kwenta ti utsbiyal.
44024009	An judotsik xi ta jeye ti kwajat, in ulal abal ejtal jech tsubax.
44024010	An pulek awiltalb in utsa tm na Pablo kal in kubakki abal ka kwin ani na Pablo in ulu ench: —Kal yantam i kulbtalb neech kin kwin ta tamt abal ku loo tub, pos u chob abal ynich i tamub ta ljundhom ba jech an chabl.
44024011	Pos jelt xan ti neech ka acha, in koolich lajuchb a kts, in kale Jerusaln abal ku kakna na Dios.
44024012	Yab in elnk tin kwlx kal ni jun xita, nibal u pjxlindhmal an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, nibal ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, nibal ba jachan an bitsow.
44024013	Yab jeye neech kin ejto kin ulutsik ke tsubax xowa tin utsltsik u tajmal.
44024014	Por xowa neech tu utsa jaich jech: Nan u tjontsal nin Diosil nu weje paklil jelt xan tin ulal an t tsubaxtalb xi jajtsik in utsl ke yab tsubax. Pos nan, u bell ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb ani xowa in dhutsmal jeye an tiltsixtsik.
44024015	Nan jaychki neye u bell xowa jajtsik in bell, ke na Dios neech kin ejdha ti t an chemlomtsik, xi alwa iniktsik ani xi yab alwa iniktsik.
44024016	Jaxtm tu l ku koy tsububudh nu itsch echeki tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt an iniktsik.
44024017	Tam tin xechinich chb x i tamub pl chabl, in witsiy ba nu chablil abal ku pidhna i tolmixtalb ani i pikbantsixtalb.
44024018	Jaich in kwajat u tajl jech, tam tin elan ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal chb x i judotsik xi tl Asia. Jechtsik, tin ela tam tin oknkich ku taja an tokeltalb jelt xan ti yejat ka tajan. Por yab kal yn i atiklbtsik nibal kal i pjxtalb.
44024019	Jaich jachan xi yejat ka tschtsik ani ka utey kin ulu max ani lejtal tu waltsmaltsik.
44024020	Ani max yaba, ke xi jech kwajattsik kin ulu max in eltsin tu walab tam tin ljundh tin tamt nin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
44024021	Nan tokot u ulmal kawidh ench: “Tattsik exom tin ljundhl abal u bell ke an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t.”
44024022	Tam tin achaich na Flix ejtal jech, kom ltsidhich alwa xan ti kwajat jech an t tsubaxtalb, in jila jech abal kin lejkiy tayl ani in utsatsik ench: —Tam ka tsch na Lisias, nin pulek oklkil an soldadotsik, tm neech ku okoy tu lejkintsitsik an ti utsbixtalb xa tsidhl.
44024023	Utsan tm an oklek soldadotsik kal na Flix abal yab kin walka na Pablo ani kin belkm, por kin walka ka ln ani ka tolmiyat kal nin jabtsik.
44024024	Tam ti watenekich chb x a kts, ulich jun na Flix, junax kal na Drusila, nin tomtal. Jech na Drusila, i judo jeye. Na Flix in abna ka kanyat na Pablo abal ka tiltsin an ti belomtalb kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo.
44024025	Por tam ti na Pablo in tiltsi abal yejattsik kin tajl echeki xowa alwa, kin kuxyal xowa in lenl nin tul ani kal tin kwenta jeye an ljundhaxtalb xi neech ka wachin tin okontal an kij, jikey tajat na Flix ani in utsa ench na Pablo: —Xo ki kalch. Tam kin jolkan, tm jun neech ku abna ki kanyat.
44024026	Na Flix ynl tajat in abna ka kanyat na Pablo ani u kw kal jaj abal in l kin chuu max ka pidhan ti tumn kal na Pablo ani anchan, ka walk na Pablo.
44024027	Chb i tamub ms tayl, kale ti pulek awiltalb na Flix ani ochich na Porsio Festo. Kom na Flix in l ka jilkon alwa kal an judotsik, yab in walka na Pablo.
44025001	Ulich tm na Festo ban chabl xi Sesarea abal ka ochichich an ti pulek awiltalb ani x a kts ms tayl, kale Sesarea abal ka kale Jerusaln.
44025002	Taja Jerusaln, an oklek pletsik ani an judotsik xi ms ultalb, kaletsik ba na Festo kin kwajba jun i utsbixtalb abal na Pablo.
44025003	Pakabdh na Festo abal kin abna ka iktat na Pablo ani ka tsidh Jerusaln. Por xowa jajtsik in kool chalpadh, jaich ke in l kin abna ka chemdh ti bl na Pablo.
44025004	Na Festo in tkoytsik abal na Pablo kwajat ti wiknl Sesarea ani ke jaj neech ka kale taja kunat i kij.
44025005	In utsatsik jeye ench: —An awiltalbtsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, awil ka kale Sesarea kal nan xita kin ejto ani max jachan an inik in walm, awiltsik ka utsbiy taja.
44025006	Na Festo kwajay Jerusaln waxik o lju xna a kts ani tayl, witsiy Sesarea. Tam ti jun tsudhelom ti ulnek Sesarea, buxkan ban kwajtalb xon tu buxkanal an ljundhom ani in abna ka iktat na Pablo.
44025007	Tam ti ochich na Pablo, utey an judotsik xi tl Jerusaln ani in ulutsik abal na Pablo yn i pakdha walastalb in tajmal. Por ni jun xata xowa kwajattsik in ulal, yab in ejto kin xalka max tsubax.
44025008	Na Pablo in ulu tm ench abal kin loo tinb: —Nan yab u tajmal ni jun xata walats ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Yab u chikat tajmal nin takixtalbil an judotsik, nibal nin takixtal an lej pulek takix romano.
44025009	Por kom na Festo in l ka jilkon alwa kal an judotsik, in konoy ench na Pablo: —A lxe ki kale Jerusaln abal tu ljundha taja?
44025010	Na Pablo tkon ench: —In kwajatich tin tamt an awiltalb xu taknal kal an lej pulek takix romano xon ti yejat kin ljundh. Pos jelt xan ta a chobich alwa, nan yab u waltsmal ni jun xata nu at kidhtaltsik.
44025011	Max u tajmalak jun i walastalb xi yejat ku jalbiy kal i cheml, awil kin chemdh; por xo, kom yab tsubax xowa kwajat tin usnal, ni jun xita yab in kool i awiltalb ti kin pidhna kal jajtsik. Nan u l ke jaj tajat an lej pulek takix romano ti kin ljundha.
44025012	Na Festo in konoy tm okox nin tolmiwltsik xanty kin taja. Tam ti okon ti tilolltsik, in utsa ench na Pablo: —Kom a konyal abal a l ki ljundh kal jaj tajat an lej pulek takix romano, pos taja neech tu aba.
44025013	Chb x a kts ms tayl, an pulek takix Agripa ani na Berenise, ulichtsik Sesarea abal kin chapndha na Festo.
44025014	Kom kwajaytsik taja yn a kts, na Festo in tiltsi an pulek takix romano xowa waach kal tin kwenta na Pablo. Ench tin utsa: —Tech kwajat jun i inik ti wiknl xi jiladh al wikaxte kal na Flix.
44025015	Tam tin kale Jerusaln, an oklek pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik tin kwajbantsitsik jun i utsbixtalb kal tin kwenta jech an inik, tin utsltsik abal ku ulu ka chemdh.
44025016	Nan u tkoytsik ke an awiltalb xi Roma yab in ujnmal kin pidhna ka chemdh ni jun xita, max yab ka walk okox kin loo tinb tin tamt an utsbixtsik kal tin kwenta xantokl tu utsbiyb.
44025017	Jaxtm, tam ti jajtsik tsch tech, yab in kwajay owat tin chalpax. Tmki jun tsudhelom tin buxkan ban kwajtalb xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani u abna ka iktat jachan an inik.
44025018	Por xi ulichtsik ti utsbix, yab in ulu ni jun xata xi kalpidhich tajat ti walats jelt xan ti nan u chalpaymal.
44025019	Xowa tokot in ulaltsik, jaich kal tin kwenta in belomtaltsik ani in tilltsik jun i inik xin bij ta Jess xi chemnekich, por na Pablo in ulal abal ta kwajat ejat.
44025020	Kom yab u chob xanty ku taja kal jun xata jelti jech, u konoy na Pablo max in l ka kale Jerusaln abal ka ljundh taja kal jech tin kwenta.
44025021	Por kom na Pablo in konoy abal in l ka ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano Awgusto, u ulu abal ka kyat ban wikaxte asta ku abna taja.
44025022	Utsan tm ench na Festo kal na Agripa: —U l neye ku acha xanty in ulal jachan an inik. Tkoyat ench kal na Festo: —Kalm neech ka acha.
44025023	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Agripa ani na Berenise ulichtsik tojojodh ani ochich ban alt junax kal nin oklkiltsik an soldadotsik ani kal an ultalb iniktsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow. Na Festo in abna ka iktat na Pablo
44025024	ani in ulu tm ench: —Pulek takix Agripa ani paylomlbtsik xi junkunk tech kal waw, j kwajat jech an inik. Yn an judotsik tin utsl ke jaj yab i alwa inik. Anchan in ulal an judotsik xu kwajl Jerusaln ani xi techtsik Sesarea. Yab in kubdhltsik kin ulu ke yejat ka chemdh jech an inik.
44025025	Por nan yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb plek xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml. Kom tin kontsmal abal in l ka ljundh kal na Awgusto, an lej pulek takix romano, u ulmalich abal neech ku abna taja.
44025026	Ani kom yab u kool chalpadh xanty ku dhutsuntsi nu ajtik an lej pulek takix romano kal tin kwenta na Pablo, u tsidhmal ta tamttsik. Tat, pulek takix Agripa, awil ka ljundha abal ku chuu max anchan ku ela jun xata xanty ku dhutsuntsi an lej pulek takix romano.
44025027	Pos yab u achl alwa ku abna jun i wiknl, max yab ku dhutsa xantom walastalb in tajmal.
44026001	Utsan tm ench na Pablo kal na Agripa: —Awil ki kwin abal ka loo tab. In dhaya tm nin kubak na Pablo ani in tuju ti kw ench abal kin loo tinb:
44026002	—In kulbl tajat abal neech ku ejto tin kw ta tamt pulek takix Agripa abal ku ejto ku loo tub kal ejtal xowa in usnal kal nu at kidhtaltsik.
44026003	Pos tat a exll ejtal xowa in ujnmal kin taja an judotsik ani kal tin kwenta jeye xowa u kwajat xo i kwlxnl. Jaxtm tu kontsal abal ti kin axtsi kal i kaymtalb.
44026004	Ejtal an judotsik, xi jaich nu kidhtaltsik, in chob xan tin xechink ba nu chablil ani Jerusaln tam tin kwitle.
44026005	In chobtsik jeye jech ani neech kin ejto kin ulu abal tsubax, max in l. Ke nan in fariseo neye asta tin kwitle ani in kidhtalbwiik kal an junkunl xi ms lujattsik tin beldhl an belomtalb.
44026006	Xo in tsidhats tech abal kin ljundh kal tin kwenta abal u bell ke na Dios neech kin ejdha ti t an chemlomtsik, jelt xan tin utsmal ni weje pakliltsik.
44026007	Xi lajuchb an kidhtalb xi Israel xi waw i kidhtal, in aytsm kin taja na Dios xan tin ulmal. Jaxtm tin kaknltsik na Dios ani in tjontsal akal i kij. Jaich kal jech an aytsixtalb, pulek takix Agripa, tin utsbiyaltsik xo nu at kidhtaltsik.
44026008	Awxe tattsik yab a bell ke na Dios in ejdhl ti t an chemlomtsik?
44026009	Nan u chalpayalwiik ke yejat ku taja yn xata abal ku tamkuy xin bellichtsik na Jess xi Nasaret.
44026010	Jech u taja jeye anchan ban bitsow Jerusaln. Kal tin takixtal an oklek pletsik, yn i belom u baliy al wikaxte. Tam u chemdhb an belomtsik, u ulal neye abal alwa.
44026011	Ynl u atax tajtsmaltsik abal u l ku taja kin odhbijiy na Jess. Jech u tajmal putlki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani u atltsik tajat ke asta in kalel ku aliy pl bitsow abal ku atax tajtsitsik.
44026012	Kal jech tin kwenta tin neech ban bitsow xi Damasko, in abnk ani in pidhnk ti awiltalb kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik.
44026013	Por ti bl, pulek takix Agripa, tam ti chejelich xna a kts, u chuu jun i tajaxtalb xi tl walki. Jech an tajaxtalb ms tajax ke nin tajx na kts ani tu wiliy kal nin tajx.
44026014	Ejtal tu b u kwajlan chabl ani u acha tin tawnb ench kal jun i kwintalb xi ebreo: “Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl? Exom a yajlombdhl tatki tab, jelt xan tin tajl an konl tam in chochbiyal an chupidh patl.”
44026015	U ulu tm ench: “Jita p teye, Jab?” An Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Nan nin Jess, xi tat a atl.
44026016	Por ki chakch ani ki kubey, pos Nan u xalkm tub ti kin chuu abal tu utsa ti kin tjontsi ani ka tila xowa exom a chutal xo ani xowa neech jeye ka chuu ku taja ms tayl.
44026017	Xo neech tu aba ka tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo an ti tsubaxtalb xi kal Nan tu kwenta. Neech tu beletna abal yab xata ki tajtsin kal an judotsik ani kal xi yabtsik u judo jeye.
44026018	Tu abl taja abal ka lamtsitsik an tin wal ani yabich ms ka xechintsik ban jikwaxtalb. Ka xechinichtsik jeye ban tajaxtalb abal kin belaichtsik na Dios ani yabich ka kwajaytsik teykmte kal nin chp an lej atax. Ti kin belaichtsik abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbil ani kin bachutsik jeye xowa neech ka pidhan kal na Dios junax kal xu dhabalbich kal Jaj.”
44026019	Jaxtm, pulek takix Agripa, yab u chikat taja xowa in utsan kal an Ajtiklb ban xalkantsixtalb xi tsch walki.
44026020	Okox tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Damasko. Tayl u tiltsitsik xi Jerusaln, xi putlki ban chabl xi Judea ani xi yabtsik u judo jeye. U utsltsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani kin belaich na Dios, kin tajaichtsik xowa alwa abal kin xalka ke in jilmalichtsik ti walablom.
44026021	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta nu at kidhtaltsik tin yakwmal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in ltsik ti kin chemdha.
44026022	Por kal tin tolmintsixtal na Dios u ntsal ku tila jech asta xo. Ejtalkitsik u tiltsal an ti alwa tilab, tsitsik ani pakdha. Yab u jalkuntsal ni jun xata xowa an tiltsixtsik ani na Moiss in ulmaltsik ke neech ka tmun.
44026023	Jajtsik jaich nin ulmal ke an Kristo neech ka chemdh ani ke jaich xi neech ka okxin ka ejech ti t abal kin tiltsi xan ti neech ka loey ni kidhtaltsik ani xi keet jeye an atiklbtsik.
44026024	Tam ti na Pablo in ulu ejtal jech abal kin loo tinb, na Festo kawidh tin ulu ench: —Pablo, Tat i olmanal! A ntsmalich tajat ta exbal, jaxtm ta olmankich.
44026025	Por na Pablo tkon ench: —Yab in olmanal, pulek awiltalb Festo; lujat ani tsubax xowa in kwajat u ulal.
44026026	J kwajat an pulek takix Agripa, xin exll alwa ejtal jech. Jaxtm tin kwajat tin kw tin tamt jaj kal ni jun i jkib. U chob alwa ke jaj in chob alwa ejtal jech, pos yab chinat ti tmnk.
44026027	Pulek takix Agripa, a bellxe jech xowa in ulmal an tiltsixtsik? Nan u chob alwa abal a bell.
44026028	Utsan tm ench kal na Agripa: —Wichwiik tajat ti kin taja ku bela neye na Kristo.
44026029	In ulu tm ench na Pablo: —Pos max wich o yaba, u lak max na Dios kin lena ke yab tatki, ejtal xi kwajat in achl xowa u ulal, ka belmchaktsik jeye jelti nan maske yabtsik ja wikadh kal jelti jech an patltsik.
44026030	Tam ti na Pablo in okoy kin ulu jech, chakay an pulek takix ani an pulek awiltalb jeye. Chakay jeye na Berenise ani ejtal xi t ti buxutsik,
44026031	kale pl abal kin tilatsik jech. Ani u tsxtsik ench jajkitsik: —Jech an inik yab in tajmal ni jun xata xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml, nibal ela yejat ka kyat balidh ban wikaxte.
44026032	Ani na Agripa in utsa ench na Festo: —Awilichakwiik ka walk jech an inik max yabak in konymal ka ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano.
44027001	Tam ti ulwatich abal neech ku abn Italia, na Pablo ani xi keet jeye an wiknltsik, pidhn ba jun i oklek soldadotsik xu bijyb ta Julio, xin takyal jun kwene i soldadotsik. Jech jun kwene an soldadotsik, u bijyb Awgusto.
44027002	Pos u balin ba jun i tan xi tl ban bitsow xu bijyb Adramitio, xi neech ban bitsowtsik xi Asia. T jeye ti kwajat na Aristarko kal waw, jaj u kwajl Tesalnika, an bitsow xu taknal Masedonia.
44027003	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u ulich ban bitsow xi Sidn. Taja, kyat na Pablo kal na Julio kal yantam i kaknaxtalb, pos walk ka kale kin lna nin jabtsik abal ka tolmiyat kal jajtsik.
44027004	Tam tu kalch Sidn, i jila ti kwatab an chabl xi Chipre kom an ik, ti tamt tu wawnal.
44027005	I watna an pujal tin tamt in waltsik an ja xi Silisia ani xi Panfilia ani u ulich ban bitsow xin bij Mira, jun i bitsow xu taknal Lisia.
44027006	An oklek soldadotsik in ela taja jun i tan xi tl Alejandra ani neech Italia. Taja tu utsa ku balin abal ki ntsi an bl.
44027007	Yn a kts tu belal kaymki ani kal yantam i tojlb tu ulich tin tamt an bitsow xi Gnido. Kom bl ti tamt tu wawnal an ik, u watey tin tamt Salmn ani i malintsi an chabl xi Kreta.
44027008	I ntsi tu belal kal i chplb tin waltsik an ja, u ulich ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Buenos Puertos, kunat ban bitsow xi Lasea.
44027009	Kom i kibdhmalich tajat yn i kij ani kakadhich tajat ku beley ban pujal abal exomich ti kunel nin chamy, jaxtm na Pablo in takiytsik
44027010	ani in utsatsik ench: —Jabtsik, nan u chutal abal jech an belch neech tajat ka kakadhm, neech ki kibdha an tan ani an kitlbtsik. Yab tokot jki, asta t weye ku chemech.
44027011	Por an oklek soldadotsik ms in exbantsi an dhabal tan ani an beldhom k xowa in ulu na Pablo.
44027012	Kom ba jachan an kubtalb yab alwa abal kin watna taja nin chamy, yn an atiklbtsik xin chalpay abal ms alwa ku kale taja ani ki chuu max ki ejto ku ulich Fenise, jun i kubtalb xi Kreta xi kwajat in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts ani ki watna taja nin chamy.
44027013	Kom tujey tm ti wawnal kaym an ik xi tl all, in chalpaytsik abal alwa ki ntsi an belch. Pos u kale ani i ntsi tu belal tin waltsik an ja xi Kreta.
44027014	Por lej w ms tayl, tujey ti wawyb an tan kal jun i chapik ik xu bijyb Ewroklidn, xi tl ebl.
44027015	Jech an ik, tujey kin jna an tan. Kom yab i ejtowal ku beley abal tu tamkuyal an ik, i walka ti ku jna.
44027016	U watey tin kx jun i chakam chabl xu bijyb Klawda, taja yab lej kalpidh chapik ti waudh an ik ani kal yn i tojlb ti ejto ki kadhba an chakam tan xu tl i kinkm.
44027017	Tam tu okonich ki kadhba an chakam tan, malyat an tan abal ka likey ani yab ka pakchun. Kom i chejnl ka xakpan an tan ban kidhiblom xu bijyb Sirte, pabantsat an ti kudhkum xi kl tu beldhb an tan ani in walkatsik ka jn kal an ik.
44027018	Tam ti jun tsudhelom, kom bl tajat chapik an ikladh b, in tujutsik kin petna ban pujal an kitlb xin nedhl an tan.
44027019	Tin xlb a kts, i petna jeye kal i kubak ejtal xowa u ynb ban tan.
44027020	Owch tajat yab u xalkanal na kts nibal na ttsik ani kom in ntsal an ikladh b, yabich i chalpayal max neech ki ejto ku loey.
44027021	Kom nakatich i kij yab xata i kapmal, kubey na Pablo junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani in ulu ench: —Jabtsik, msakwiik alwa max tin exbantsmalaktsik ani u jilkonkak Kreta. Anchan yabak i tammal ejtal jech, nibalak i kibdhmal an kitlb.
44027022	Por xo, tu utsltsik abal yab ka jila tab, pos ni jun xita xi tattsik yab neech ka chemech, tokot neech ka kibchon an tan.
44027023	Pos jech i akal, u chuu jun in tokat abatwlejil na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi nan u kaknl ani u tjontsal.
44027024	An tokat abatwle tin utsa ench: “Pablo, yab ki jikey, pos tat kool ki utey ban lej pulek takix romano ani kal tatki ta kwenta, na Dios yab neech kin walka ka chemech ni jun xita xi kwajat junax kal tat ban tan.”
44027025	Jabtsik, jaxtm tu utsltsik abal yab ka jila tab, pos nan u beltsal xowa in ulal na Dios ani u chob alwa abal anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan tin utsa an tokat abatwle.
44027026	Kool ki ela jun i chakam chabl tech ban pujal.
44027027	Jun i akal, tam tin chblbich i semana tu belal, u kwajat ban pujal xu bijyb Adritico ani u jnb tki tki kal an ik. Tam ti chejelich i akal, an iniktsik xu tojnal taja ban tan in chuutsik abal exomich tu ulel ba jun i chabl.
44027028	In lejbantsitsik nin wtsk an ja ani in chuu abal jun inik lajuakak i metro in kool. Ms tayl in lejbantsitsik jun ani in chuu abal jun inik bkich tm i metro in kool.
44027029	Kom in chejnltsik kin tamu an pakdha tujub, in baliy ban ja tin kx an tan, ch i patltsik xin kubdhl kl an tan ani kom u jikltsik, in lich tajat kin chuutsik ka tsudhey.
44027030	Por an iniktsik xi taja u tojnal ban tan, in chalpayaltsik ka jlch, jaxtm tin tujutsik kin paba an chakam tan ban ja, in wynltsik jelti max exom in balyal an patltsik xi okox xi kl tin kubdhl an tan.
44027031	Por na Pablo in ltsi an oklek soldadotsik ani an soldadotsik jeye. Ench tin utsatsik: —Max jechtsik ka kale, yab neech ka ejto ki loeytsik.
