44027032	An soldadotsik in kotsi tm tin wikb an chakam tan ani in walka ka kwajlan ban ja.
44027033	Tam ti exomich ti tsudhl, na Pablo in utsatsik ejtal abal ka kapch. Ench tin ulu: —In koolich chb i semana ke tattsik yab i wayal nibal a kapmaltsik xata.
44027034	Jaxtm, tu kontsaltsik ti alwatalb abal ka kapu ela wetsik i kapnl abal tattsik ta alwabl. Pos ni jun xita yab neech kin kibdha ni jun in xil xin kool bin k.
44027035	Tam ti na Pablo in ulu jech, in tyna an pan ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tin tamt ejtal xi ta ti kwajattsik. In pejaich tm ani in tuju kin kapu.
44027036	Ejtal in pubdhatsik nin ejattal ani kapchtsik jeye.
44027037	Nin yanl xi taja tu kwajat ba jachan an tan, chb i bo inik kal ox inik lajuakak i atiklbtsik.
44027038	Tam ti ajwchtsik, in petnatsik an trigo ban pujal abal ka ikowm an tan.
44027039	Tam ti tsudhey, an iniktsik xu tojnal ban tan, yab in exlatsik an chabl xin chutal. Por in chuutsik jun i kubtalb ba jachan an ja xon ti yab lej owtsik ani in ulu abal neech kin chuutsik max kin ejto kin utu taja an tan.
44027040	In kotsi tm tin wikb an patl xin kubdhl kl an tan ani taja tin jilatsik alkidh ban ja. In polkantsi an ti xaltsixtalb xu ynal abal ka beldh kl an tan. In paltsi jeye tekat an tan an ti kudhkum xi okox abal ka wawyat kal an ik ani in tujch tm ka utey an tan xon ti yab owtsik an ja.
44027041	Por ulich asta xon tu tmx an ja xu dhil ani taja ti xakpan ban kidhiblom. Nin k an tan jilkon xapat ban kidhiblom, nibal ela u ejtowb ka yoywat ani nin kx, tujch ti pakwb kal in chp an mlk ja.
44027042	An soldadotsik in lena tm kin chemdha an wiknltsik abal yab ka jlchtsik kowal.
44027043	Por an oklek soldadotsik, kom in l kin loo na Pablo, yab in walka kin tajatsik anchan, tokot in ulu ke xin witltsik ti kowal, ka okxintsik kin petna tinb ban ja abal ka ulich kowal asta ban chabl.
44027044	Ani xi yab in witltsik ti kowal, in utsa ka puneytsik ba okcha o bin pejmats an tan. Anchan ti ulichtsik ejtal juntam aniki ban chabl.
44028001	Tam tu loenekich ejtal tu b, i chobna ke jachan an chabl in bij Malta.
44028002	An kwajltsik xi taja, tu bachutsik tajat alwa; pos in jokpatsik i kamal abal exom an b ani chamay ani tu kaniy ejtal tu b ku utey tu dhilal.
44028003	In pena tm na Pablo w i waynek dhi ani kwajat in umtsal an kamal, por jun jiktowl ti kale jun i chan kal in kkl an kamal ani palkan bin kubak na Pablo.
44028004	Tam ti an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja in chuu palat an chan bin kubak na Pablo, tsxintsik ench: —Jech an inik i chemdhax inik xna, pos maske in jeka an cheml ban pujal, blki neech ka chemech abal chikan kal an chan.
44028005	Por in tinna an chan ban kamal ani na Pablo yab xata in tamu.
44028006	Ejtaltsik kwajat in aytsm kin chuu ka mlin o jun jiktowl ka kwajlan chemnek; por tam ti owch ti aytsixtsik ani in chuu abal yab xata in tamu, in jalkuytsik nin chalab ani in tuju kin ulutsik ke na Pablo jaich jun i dios.
44028007	Kunat ba jachan an kubtalb xon tu kwajat, ta ti kwajat nin chablil na Publio, an ultalb inik xi ba jachan an chabl xi Malta. Jaj tu bachu ani tu koydha x a kts tin kim.
44028008	Tam ti jachan i kij, nin tta na Publio ta ti kwachat abal u kakl ani in kool i kotox tsukl. Kale ti lnb kal na Pablo; tam ti na Pablo okon kin kontsintsi, in kwajba nin kubak bin b an yaul ani in jeldha.
44028009	Tam ti an atiklbtsik in acha jech, ulich jeye ba na Pablo an yaultsik xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl ani jeldhtsik.
44028010	Yn xowa alwa u tajtsin kal jachan an atiklbtsik. Ms tayl, tam tu balinich jun ban tan, u pidhan kidhat xowa neech ki yntsi abal an belch.
44028011	Tam tu kwajch x a ch ba jachan an chabl, u balin ba jun i tan xin watnmal taja nin chamy; jachan an tan, jaich jun i tan xi Alejandra ti tl ani in kool chilbadh an diostsik xu bijyb Kstor ani Plux.
44028012	Tam tu ulich ban bitsow xi Sirakusa, u kwajay taja x a kts.
44028013	Tam tu kale Sirakusa, i ntsi an belch tin waltsik an ja asta tu ulich Rejio. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, waun an ik xi tl all ani tin chblb a kts u ulich Puteoli.
44028014	Taja, i ela chb x i kidhblbtsik xi tu pakabdha abal ku kwajay kal jajtsik jun i semana; ms tayl, u kalch tm Roma.
44028015	An kidhblbtsik xi Roma, in achmalichtsik abal neech ku ulich; jaxtm ti kaletsik abal ti ku tamu ban bitsow xin bij Foro de Apio ani ban kubtalb jeye xu bijyb Tres Tabernas. Tam ti na Pablo in chuutsik, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in acha abal likedhantsat tajat tin ejattal.
44028016	Tam tu ulich Roma, an oklek soldadotsik in pidhna an wiknltsik bin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti wikaxte, por na Pablo walk ja ka kwajay pl, belkmte kal jun i soldado.
44028017	Tam tin xlbich a kts ti ulnek na Pablo, in abna ka kanyat an judotsik xi ms ultalb xi taja Roma ani tam ti junkuntsik, in utsa ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan yab xata tu waltsmal an judotsik nibal u chikat tajtsmal tin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik, por in pidhn Jerusaln abal kin wikan kal an romanotsik.
44028018	Tam ti okon ti kin ljundhatsik, in lwiik ti kin walka abal yab tin eltsitsik ni jun i walastalb xi yejat ku jalbiy kal i cheml.
44028019	Por an judotsik yab in lena. Jaxtm tu konoy abal kin ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano, por yab abal u kool jun xata xantokl ti ku utsbiy nu kidhtaltsik.
44028020	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu kanymaltsik. Abal tu chuutsik ani abal ku tilololch. Pos tech in kwajat wikadh kal i patl kal tin kwentaki an aytsixtalb xi kool, waw xu israelita.
44028021	Utsan tm ench: —Waw yab i bachmal ni jun i dhutsadh w xi tl Judea abal ku ltsin xanty waach kal tat ta kwenta, nibal tsinek ni jun i judo xi tuwa abal ti ku tiltsi max tat i utsbidh.
44028022	Por i l ki acha xanty a chalpayal kal tin kwenta jech an t junkuntalb, pos i achmalich abal putlki tu atnal.
44028023	Anchan p, bijtsin jun i kij xowki ti neech ka tiltsin xowa nin l kin chobnatsik ani junkun yn i a atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Pablo. Dhajaw tin tuju ti tiltsix kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios asta dhamuy. In tiltsaltsik an ta Jess ani in ltsaltsik xan tu tilnal bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani bin dhuslbil an tiltsixtsik.
44028024	Taltsik in bell xowa in ulal na Pablo ani taltsik, yaba.
44028025	Ani kom yabtsik jununl nin chalab, in tuju ti kaleltsik. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pablo: —Tsubax tajat ti utsan kal an Tokat Ejattalb ni weje pakliltsik, tam ti utsantsik ench kal an tiltsix Isaas:
44028026	Ki kale ani ka utsa ench n na at kidhtaltsik: Neech ka achatsik, por yab neech ka exbay; neech ka chuutsik, por jelti max yab a chutal.
44028027	Abal nin itsch jech an atiklbtsik, in chapikmdhmal tajat, wetsik tajat tin achltsik kal nin ochoxtal. Mututsik tin kool nin wal; abal yab ka chuxintsik kal nin wal, nibal ka ochxintsik kal nin ochoxtal. Yab kin exbaytsik kal in itsch, nibal ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku jeldha.
44028028	Ka chobnatsik p, ke xo, jech nin looxtalbil na Dios neech ka tiltsin xi yabtsik u judo ani neech ja kin exbaytsik.
44028029	Tam ti na Pablo in okoy kin ulu jech, kale an judotsik ani u kwlxtsik tajat jajkitsik.
44028030	Kwajay na Pablo ba jachan an matidh at, chb i tamub ani in bachwal ejtaltsik xu ulel ti lnax.
44028031	Kal ni jun i jkib tin ltsal an atiklbtsik xan tu takix na Dios, in oktsaltsik kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani yab u tamkuyb kal ni jun xita.
45001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo. Na Dios tin kanymal ani tin plmdhmal abal ti kin kwajba tin abatwlejil. In taja anchan abal ku tila nin alwa tilbil.
45001002	Na Dios in pidhnmal ka chobn jech an tsubaxtalb asta ti weje. Jech in pidhna ka chobn ban Tokat Dhuslab kal nin tiltsxiltsik.
45001003	Jech an alwa tilab, jaich kl tu tilnal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios. Jaj na Jesukristo in koy jeye in tul jelti waw, u kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
45001004	Kal tin kwenta nin tokattal ani tam ti ejdh ti t, tmich ti xalk abal tsubax lejtal u Chakmlb kal na Dios ani pidhan ti chplb.
45001005	Kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, i bachu an alwatalb ani u pidhan kal na Dios ku kwajay tu abatwle. U pidhan ku kwajay tu abatwle abal ki oktsi an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl abal kin bela na Jesukristo ani yab kin chikat taja na Dios.
45001006	Kal jech an atiklbtsik, ta teye ta kwajat, tattsik xi kwajl Roma. Na Dios ti kanidhltsik, ti kanymaltsik abal ki kwajch kal na Jesukristo ani abal ki kwajchtsik i tokat. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ni ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45001008	Okox, u l tu utsatsik abal u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an jalbintsixtalb u pidhnl kal tattsik ta kwenta abal putlki tu tilnal xan ta belltsik na Jesukristo.
45001009	Na Dios, xi nan in kwajat u tjontsal kal ejtal nu ejattal abal ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil, in chob alwa abal tu kontsintsaltsik tajat tam in l.
45001010	Echeki u pakabdhl na Dios abal ku ejto kin kale tu lnatsik, max Jaj anchan tin l.
45001011	Pos nan u l tu chuutsik ani tu tolmiytsik ka bachu xowa in l ti pidha an Tokat Ejattalb ani anchan ki belmchtsik ms
45001012	abal ku lkdhntsxin ti itsch jn ani jn kal an belomtalb xi kool.
45001013	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik abal ynlich tajat u lenmal kin kale tu lnatsik, por asta xo yab u ejtmal kin kale. U lenl kin kale tachan abal kin tjon ani ka wachin ms i belom kal tattsik, jelt xan ti tmnk kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u judo xi kwajattsik pl bitsow.
45001014	Pos nan kool ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab an griegotsik ani xi yab u griegotsik, xi chalpadhtsik ani xi yab chalpadhtsik.
45001015	Jaxtm, nan u lenl tajat kin kale tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, tattsik xi kwajl Roma.
45001016	Yab u tidhenl ku tila an alwa tilab, pos an alwa tilab, in chp na Dios. Jech an alwa tilab, kl tu tilnal na Jesukristo; ani xita kin bela na Jesukristo, neech ka loey. Jech an alwa tilab okox ti tiltsin an judotsik ani tayl xi yabtsik u judo.
45001017	Pos ban alwa tilab, na Dios tu xalkantsalich xan tu kwajbl alwa kal Jaj kal an belomtalb ani tokot kal an belomtalbki. Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech.”
45001018	Nin kakadh yajtsiktalbil na Dios tl walki abal ejtalki xin tajl xowa yab alwa. Kal nin ataxtal, jech an atiklbtsik yab in walkl ka exl an tsubaxtalb.
45001019	In exllichtsik alwa xowa u exlantsb na Dios, kom xalkantsidhichtsik kal na Dios.
45001020	Na Dios yab tejwa, por in xalkl xan ti jeye Jaj kal xowa in tajmal. Tam tin taja an walki ani an chabl, in xalka ke Jaj tsubax lejtal u Dios ani in kool in chp xi yab jayki in kool in okontal. Jaxtm, an atiklbtsik xin tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab in exll.
45001021	Maske in exlltsik na Dios, yab in kaknmaltsik xan tu kaknb na Dios, nibal in pidhmaltsik ti jalbintsixtalb. In ntsal tokot kin chalpaytsik xowa yab xata in jalbl ani nin itsch xi yab tajat xata in l kin exbay, jilkonk jelti max ban jikwaxtalb.
45001022	Jilkontsik yab xata in exbayal abal in chalpay ke jajtsik chalpadh tajat.
45001023	In jalmaltsik nin labidh tokt na Dios xi yab jayki u chemel, kal in chilbil i iniktsik xu chemel, kal in chilbil i chichintsik, i chantsik ani kal i konltsik xi ch in akan.
45001024	Jaxtm na Dios tin walkmalichtsik kin ntsi kin taja xowa atax, xowa in kulbetnltsik tin itsch ani anchan, in tajtsalich nin tul xowa yab alwa jajkitsik tinb.
45001025	In jalmaltsik nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios kal i kambixtalb, in kaknmaltsik ani in lantsmaltsik xowa na Dios in tajmal. Na Dios jaich nin tomnl ka kakn malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
45001026	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti walktsik kal na Dios kin taja xowa tidhetl; pos asta an mmlbtsik in jalkuy nin chalab, yabich u kwajl xan ti yejat ka kwajay, u junkunal i mmlb kal in at mmlb.
45001027	Anl jeye an iniktsik, in jila ti kwajltsik kal i mmlb; in jalkuytsik nin chalab ani in taja xowa tidhetl. Junkun i inik kal in at inik ani anchan in bachwaltsik i yajtsiktalb bin tul kal tin kwenta xowa in tajltsik.
45001028	Kom yabich in lena kin exbantsitsik na Dios, jaxtm ti walktsik kal na Dios kin koy i chalab xi yab alwa abal kin tajatsik xowa yab yejat kin taja.
45001029	In tajltsik tajat xowa yab lujat, u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, in tajltsik xowa atax ani chenetsik tajat. In chakuntsaltsik xitakichki kal tin kwenta xowa in chutal in kool, u chemdhaxtsik, u pjextsik ani u kambixtsik.
45001030	In till yab alwa xi keettsik, in janwaltsik i kw, in atltsik na Dios, u odhbijixtsik ani in tekltsik tinb. In kldhltsik i chalab xi yab alwa, in chikat tajltsik nin tta ani nin nna.
45001031	Yabtsik jeye in l kin exbay xata, yabtsik in tajl xowa lujat, yabtsik xita in kanidhl ani yabtsik in kool i yajnantsixtalb.
45001032	Jajtsik, maske in chobich abal neech ti ljundhbtsik kal na Dios ani in chobtsik jeye ke xita nin tajltsik ejtal jech in tomnl ka chemdh, blki in ntsal kin tajatsik ani asta alwa in achl tam kin chuu ke jun xita in tajl jeye anchan.
45002001	Jaxtm tat, xa teltsal xanty in tajl xi keettsik, yab a kool i pakwlantsixtalb, yab neech ka dh ti kwenta xitam j teye. Pos tam i kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl jun xita, a walbindhl tab, pos tat xi kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl xi keet, jaych teye a tajl.
45002002	Por i chob abal na Dios u ljundhax kal i lujattalb tam in ulal ke walbidhtsik xin tajltsik jech.
45002003	Ani tat, xi kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl xi keettsik ani jaychki teye a tajl, a chalpayalxe ke neech ka ejto ka chinkontsi nin ljundhaxtal na Dios?
45002004	O a pojkantsal nin pulek alwatal ani nin chaattalbil na Dios ani yab a chutal abal jaich nin alwatalbil xi exom ti tajl ka jila ta walablom?
45002005	Por tat, kom watats ti chapik na itsch ani yab a l ka jila ta walablom, jaxtm ti exom a yanedhl abal ka bachu ms yn i yajtsiktalb tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka chakuy na Dios. Jachan i kij, tm neech ka xalkan ke na Dios u ljundhom in lujtalki.
45002006	Tm jeye ti neech ka pidhan an atiklbtsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmaltsik.
45002007	Neech kin pidhatsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xita in tajmal xowa alwa abal kin bachu an labidh tokattalb, an kaknaxtalb ani ejtal xowa yab in kool in okontal.
45002008	Por neech kin pidhatsik ti kakadh yajtsiktalb xita in tajltsik i pjxtalb ani yab in tajltsik ti kij an tsubaxtalb, tokot in tajltsik xowa yab lujat.
45002009	Neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios ti kakadh yajtsiktalb ejtalki xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, okox abal an judotsik ani tayl abal xi yabtsik u judo.
45002010	Por xita in tajltsik xowa alwa, neech ka pidhan kal na Dios ti labidh tokattalb, ti kaknaxtalb ani ti kijidhtalb, okox abal an judotsik ani tayl, abal xi yabtsik u judo.
45002011	Pos na Dios yab in dhl ti kwenta xitam j kin wala o kin taja xowa alwa.
45002012	Ejtal xu walbinaltsik maske yab in exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, neech ka kibey maske yabtsik in exll jachan an takixtalb. Ani xu walbinaltsik maske in exll jech an takixtalb, neech ka ljundh anchan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an takixtalb.
45002013	Pos yabtsik kwajat alwa kal na Dios xin achlkitsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tokot kwajattsik alwa kal na Dios, xin tajltsik xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb.
45002014	Tam xi yabtsik u judo, xi yabtsik in exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kin taja jajki tin chalab xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb, u kalelich jelti max in exll.
45002015	Kal xowa in tajltsik, in xalkl ke in kooltsik an takixtalb tin itsch. Kal xowa in chalpayal, kl tu xalkanal jech. Ani kal xowa in achl tin ejattal, kl ti neech ka walbiyat o ka lowat.
45002016	Tam kin bajaw an kij, na Dios neech kin ljundha kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo xowa in chinat chalpayal tin ejattal an atiklbtsik. Anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan tu utsmaltsik in ulal an alwa tilab.
45002017	Tat a ulal abal i judo, a ynl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani a tekl tab abal a ulal i exlmte kal a Dios.
45002018	A exll xowa in l na Dios ani jech an takixtalb, ti oktsal ka takuy xowa ms alwa.
45002019	A chalpayal tajat abal neech ka ejto ka oktsi xi keet, xi kwajattsik jelti max u jokol ani a chalpayal ke a tajbayal xi kwajat ban jikwaxtalb jelti max tat i tajaxtalb.
45002020	A chalpayal ke a chob xan ti neech ka takiy xi yab u witomtsik ani xan ti neech ka oktsi xi yabtsik bl in lej exlmal nin kwintal na Dios. A tajl anchan abal a kool ban takixtalb an chalpadhtalb ani an tsubaxtalb xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
45002021	Pos max tat a oktsal xi keettsik, jantki ti yab a oktsal tab? Max a ulal ke yab yejat xita ka kwlch, jantki ta kw?
45002022	Max a ulal ke yab xita yejat ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal, jantki ta junkunal kal xi yab a tomtal? Max a atl tajat an chilabtsik, jantki ta kwyal xowa u pikbantsb ban at xon tu kaknb jech an chilabtsik?
45002023	A tekl tab abal a ulal a exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por a chikat tajl na Dios abal yab a tajl xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb.
45002024	Jaxtm tin ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “U odhbijyb na Dios kal xi yabtsik u judo kal tatkitsik ta walab.”
45002025	Tsubax kejle ke an exl xin tajl an israelitatsik bin tul, alwa, max kin taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; por max yab kin taja ti kij jachan an takixtalb, jyki max yab in kool jachan an exl bin tul.
45002026	Por xi yab in kool an exl bin tul ani in tajl xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, u kalelich tm jelti max jaj in kool jachan an exl.
45002027	Xi yab in kool an exl bin tul, por in tajl xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech kin chuu ke yab alwa xowa in tajl an israelitatsik. An israelitatsik in kool an exl bin tul ani in exll an takixtalb, por yab in tajl xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb.
45002028	Jun i judo yab jaich ti exlmte kal na Dios abalki u judo, nibal abal in kool an exl bin tul.
45002029	Exlmte kal na Dios, xita tsubax lejtal tin tajl xowa in l na Dios ani exlidhich kal an Tokat Ejattalb bin itsch, yab xan tin ulalki an takixtalb. An kaknaxtalb xi neech kin bachu xi kwajattsik anchan, yab tl ban iniktsik, tl ba Dios.
45003001	Jant ti alwa max jn u judo o jant tu ynal max in kool an exl bin tul?
45003002	Kal yn xowa tu ynal. Jidhtal, pidhan an judotsik kal na Dios an ti takixtalb.
45003003	Ani jant jeye max taltsik xi jajtsik yab u belom? Abal yab u belom, neechxe kin taja ka kwajay yab lujat na Dios? Yaba!
45003004	Na Dios echeki in tajl xowa lujat ani ejtal an iniktsik u kambix; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Abal ki xalk i lujat kal xowa a ulal ani ka ta tam ki ljundh.
45003005	Ani max kal xowa yab alwa i tajl, i xalkl ke na Dios lujat, janty neech ki chalpay? Ke na Dios yab lujat xowa in tajl tam in pidhnl an yajtsiktalb? (Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun i ani inik.)
45003006	Pos max na Dios yabak lujat, jan ti neech kin ejto kin ljundha xi kwajattsik ban kayl?
45003007	Por max nu kambixtal alwa abal kin xalka ms nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani anchan kin koy ms nin labidh tokt, jantki p tm na Dios tin chutal ke in walablom tam kin kambixin?
45003008	Max anchanak, jantki ti yab i tajl xowa yab alwa abal ki bachu xowa alwa? Jech jaich xowa taltsik in ulal, ke nan u oktsixnl abal ti kin walbindha. Jachan an atiklbtsik in tomnl ka kwajb abal ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb.
45003009	Awxe ki ulu ke waw xu judo ms wa u alwa k xi yabtsik u judo? Yaba! Pos i chobnmalich ke maske i judo o yab i judo, walbidhtsik.
45003010	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Yab waach ni jun xita lujat, nibal ela jn;
45003011	yab waach ni jun xita xin exbayal, yab waach ni jun xita xin ayal a Dios.
45003012	Ejtaltsik in yakwa i bl xi yab alwa, ejtaltsik in taja xowa atax. Yab waach ni jun xita xin tajl xowa alwa, yab waach nibal ela jn.
45003013	Atax tajat xowa in ulal, in junwal jelt in kaxy i chemlom; u kambixtsik tajat. Atax ejtal xowa in ulaltsik, in junwal jelt in itlbil i chan.
45003014	U odhbijixtsik tajat ani in ulaltsik tajat i kw xi atax.
45003015	U dhiltsik abal ka kale kin chemdha in at inik;
45003016	in tajltsik i cheml ani in wachindhltsik i chojontltalb xon ti xeechtsik
45003017	ani yabtsik in exll an kijidhtalb.
45003018	Nibal in chalpayal kin jiknatsik na Dios.
45003019	I chob ke ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ulal abal xi kwajattsik taknl kal jech an takixtalb. Jech tin ulal, jaich abal ejtal ka chamkantsik ani ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios.
45003020	Ni jun xita yab neech ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios abal in tajmalki xowa in ulal an takixtalb, pos an takixtalb tokot alwa abal ti ku xalkantsi ke waw u walablom.
45003021	Por xo, maske i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, na Dios tu xalkantsi xan ti neech ku kwajay alwa kal Jaj. Jech ln kal an takixtalb ani kal an tiltsixtsik.
45003022	Na Dios tu kwajblich alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Jesukristo; pos na Dios yab kwajat ti takukl xita neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj.
45003023	Kom ejtal walbidh, yabtsik kwajat kal nin labidh tokt na Dios.
45003024	Na Dios u kwajbax alwa kal Jaj aniki, kal nin alwatalki, kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna na Kristo.
45003025	Na Dios in taja ke nin xichl na Kristo, xin wakla tam ti chemdh, ka kwajay jelti jun i jalbixtalb abal ku pakwlantsat. Jech an pakwlantsixtalb neech ki bachu max ku belmch ani in xalkl ke na Dios lujat. Ani max in pakwlantsi xita in walmaltsik ti weje,
45003026	jaich abal Jaj yab jikpadh. In xalkl jeye ke na Dios lujat xo ani echeki lujat, abal in pakwlantsmalich xin bellichtsik na Jess.
45003027	Jn ti jilkon xin ynl an atiklbtsik abal kin teka tinb? Wixkiyat. Kal jowa takixtalb? Kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Yaba! Wixkiyat kal an belomtalb xin kool kal na Kristo.
45003028	Pos tm, i chuch ke na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj xita xu belomich ani yab in dhl ti kwenta max in tajmal o yaba xowa in ulal an takixtalb.
45003029	Awxe na Dios tokotki u Dios abal an judotsik ani yab abal xi yabtsik u judo? Yaba! U Dios jeye abal xi yabtsik u judo.
45003030	Jn tokot a Dios waach; ani jech na Dios, jaich xin kwajblich alwa kal Jaj xita kin bela na Kristo, yab in dhl ti kwenta max in kool an exl bin tul o yaba.
45003031	Tm, exomxe i ynl an belomtalb abal ki jila yab xata in jalbl an takixtalb? Yaba! Exom i xalkl abal an takixtalb in jalbl tajat.
45004001	Janty neech ki ulu kal tin kwenta na Abraham, ni weje paklil?
45004002	Max na Abraham kwajbadhak alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki xowa in taja, neech kin ejto kin teka tinb, por yab tin tamt na Dios.
45004003	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.”
45004004	Por max jun xita kin taja jun i tojlb, an jalbixtalb yab u pidhnal jelti jun i chejwalixtalb, u pidhnal jelti jun xata xu jntsinal.
45004005	Por max jun xita, maske yab xata in tajmal, kin bela abal na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj an walablomtsik, u kwajbbich alwa kal na Dios kal nin belomtalki.
45004006	Na Dabid in tila an kijidhtalb xin bachwal jun xita tam ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios, maske yab xata in tajmal abal ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios.
45004007	Ench tin ulu: Kijidh abal xita xu pakwlantsb tin walab kal na Dios.
45004008	Kijidh abal xita xi yab u dhantsb ti kwenta kal an Okxlb xantom walastalb in tajmal.
45004009	Awxe jech an kijidhtalb tokot neech kin ejto kin bachutsik xin kool an exl bin tul, o neech jeye kin bachutsik xi yab in kool jech an exl? Pos i ulal abal na Dios in bachmal na Abraham ti lujat inik kal nin belomtalki.
45004010	Chutatxe na Abraham ti lujat inik kal na Dios tam ti tajtsidhich an ti exl bin tul, o tam ti yabl tajtsidh? Yaba! Chutat ti lujat inik, tam ti yabl tajtsidh an ti exl.
45004011	Tajtsin na Abraham an ti exl bin tul, jelti jun i chomaxtalb; jelti jun i exl abal bachudhich kal na Dios ti lujat inik kom belmch tam ti yabl in kool an exl. Anchan, na Abraham jilkonich tm jelti ttalb kal ejtal xu belomich maske yab in kooltsik an exl bin tul; abal anchan, ka kwajbjichtsik jeye alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
45004012	Na Abraham u ttalb jeye kal xin kooltsik an exl bin tul ani u belomtsik. U belomtsik jelt xan ti belmch ni weje paklil Abraham tam ti yabl tajtsidh an exl bin tul.
45004013	Pos na Dios in utsmal na Abraham ani nin kidhtaltsik ke neech kin bachutsik an chabl ti jiltsixtalb; por jech xowa utsan na Abraham, utsan abal in bela na Dios ani bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik, yab abal yab in chikat taja an takixtalb.
45004014	Pos max xin tajltsik xowa in ulal an takixtalb, jaichkijak in bachwaltsik xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna, tm, an belomtalb yab xata ti neech ka yan ani xowa in ulmal na Dios, yab xata neech kin jalblna.
45004015	An takixtalb, in tajl i chkub; por xon ti yab waach i takixtalb, yab u xalkanal an walastalb.
45004016	Jaxtm, kom i bell na Dios ani kal tin kwenta nin alwatal, tu pidhl xowa in ulmal ke neech ti ku pidha. I bachwal, max i bell na Dios jelt xan ti belmch na Abraham ani nin kidhtaltsik. Jech xowa in ulmal na Dios neech kin pidhna, yab tokotki neech kin bachu xin tajltsik xan tin ulal an takixtalb, neech jeye kin bachutsik xu belom jelt xan ti belmch na Abraham. Na Abraham u ttalb kal ejtal waw,
45004017	jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Tu tajmal ki kwajay ta ttalb kal yn i atiklbtsik.” Kwajb na Abraham kal na Dios jelti ttalb, abal belmch. Jech na Dios, jaich nin ejdhl an chemlomtsik ani in bijyal xowa yab waach jelti max wachich.
45004018	Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani in koy i aytsixtalb maske yabich waach ni jun i aytsixtalb. Anchan tin bajaw ka kwajay jelti “ttalb kal yn i atiklbtsik”, jelt xan ti usnk ench: “Yn neech ka koy a kidhtaltsik.”
45004019	Maske na Abraham in koolich kunat bo inik i tamub ani kwajat jelti max chemnekich, ani na Sara uxkweich ani yab u knal, na Abraham yab in jila kin bela xowa utsan kal na Dios.
45004020	Na Abraham yab kwajay ti chalpax, tokot in bela xowa utsan kal na Dios, in likedha nin ejattal kal nin belomtal ani in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
45004021	Anchan tin taja abal in chob alwa ke na Dios in kool i awiltalb kin taja ejtal xowa in ulmal.
45004022	Jaxtm, kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.
45004023	Jech xowa dhutsan kal tin kwenta na Abraham, ke jaj bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik, yab dhutsan kal jajki tin kwenta;
45004024	dhutsan jeye kal waw ti kwenta. Pos kal tin kwentaki abal i bellich na Dios, tu bachwalich weye tu lujat inik. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ni Ajtik Jess tam ti chemdh.
45004025	Na Jess jaich xi pidhn ka chemdh kal tin kwentaki ni walab ani ejdh abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
45005001	Kom na Dios tu kwajbmich alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwentaki ni belomtal, u kwajatich kijidh kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45005002	Kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani abal u belomich, i ejtowalich ku utey ba na Dios ani u kwajatich junini bin alwatal. U kulbl abal i kool an aytsixtalb ke neech ku kwajay bin labidh tokt na Dios.
45005003	Ani yab tokot kal jechki, u kulbl jeye kal an yajtsiktalb xi bachwal; pos i chob ke an yajtsiktalb, tu tolmiyal ki koy i chaattalb.
45005004	An chaattalb in xalkl abal likat ni ejattal ani max likat ni ejattal, i kool an aytsixtalb ke neech ku kwajay xan ti kwajat na Dios.
45005005	Ani jech an aytsixtalb xi kool, yab aniki, pos i chob abal neech ku kwajay kal na Dios, kom Jaj yab u kambix. Pos na Dios in xalkl abal tu kanidhl tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb xi tu pidhmal.
45005006	Kom waw yab neech ki ejto ki loo tib, tam tin bajaw an kij, na Kristo in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal tin kwenta an walablomtsik.
45005007	Yab junwki neech kin lena ka chemdh jun xita abal kin loo keet, nibal abal kin loo jun xita xi lujat tajat; por abal kin loo jun xita xin tajl tajat xowa alwa, t xna kejle kwajat xi neech kin pidhna tinb ka chemdh.
45005008	Por na Dios in xalkl abal tu kanidhl, pos na Kristo chemech kal waw ti kwenta maske tam ti jachan i kij, waw bl u walablom.
45005009	Ani xo, kom u kwajbadhich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna na Kristo, ms xo neech ku lowatich kal na Kristo tam ka tsch an kakadh yajtsiktalb, tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
45005010	Tam ti waw yab u kwajat alwa kal na Dios, tu kwajba alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwentaki nin chemtal nin Chakmil. Max in taja anchan, xo kom u kwajatich alwa kal Jaj, ms neech ku lowatich kom na Kristo ejech ti t.
45005011	Ani yab tokot jechki, u kulbl jeye kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo; pos kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, u kwajatich alwa kal na Dios.
45005012	Kal jnki i inik ti tujey an walastalb tech ban kayl ani kal tin kwenta an walastalb, wachin an cheml. Kom ejtal walbin, jaxtm xo ti ejtal u chemel.
45005013	Tam ti yabl waach nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kejle wachich an walastalb ban kayl; por xon ti yab waach an takixtalb, yab u walbiyb ni jun xita maske walbidh.
45005014	Por an cheml kejle waach asta tam ti xechin na Adn, asta ti wachin na Moiss. U chemel xitakichki ka walbin jelt xan ti walbin na Adn. Anchan xan ti na Adn in wala ani wachin an cheml, anchan jeye ti tsch na Kristo abal kin pidhna an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
45005015	Nin chejwalixtal na Dios yab in junwal jelti nin walab na Adn. Pos max kal nin walab jachan jn an inik, yn chemech, nin alwatal ani nin chejwalixtal na Dios yaney tajat ani yn xita nin bachu kal nin alwatalki jun i inik, na Jesukristo.
45005016	Nin walab xi jech jn an inik, yab in junwal nin chejwalixtal na Dios. Pos kal jun an walastalb, wachin an kibeltalb; por nin chejwalixtal na Dios, kl tu ejtowbich ka kwajb alwa an inik kal na Dios, maske in tajmal yn i walastalb.
45005017	Pos max kal nin walab jachan jn an inik wachin an cheml, ms tajat neech ka kwajay ejat kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo xita xin bachwaltsik tajat an alwatalb ani an chejwalixtalb abal ka kwajch alwa kal na Dios.
45005018	Pos anchan, kal tin kwentaki nin walab jun i inik, jilkon walbidh ejtal an atiklbtsik, anchan jeye kal tin kwentaki xowa lujat in taja na Jesukristo, tjan ke ejtal an atiklbtsik kin ejtch ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios ani kin kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
45005019	Anchan, kal tin jekomtalki jun i inik, ejtal an atiklbtsik xalkan u walablom tin tamt na Dios; anchan jeye, kal tin kwentaki abal na Jesukristo in taja xowa in l na Dios, ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
45005020	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kwajb abal ka xalkan ke waach tajat an walastalb; por tam ti xalkan ke waach tajat an walastalb, ms tajat wachin nin alwatal na Dios.
45005021	Pos anchan xan ti an walastalb in tajl abal ka chemech an atiklbtsik, anchan jeye nin alwatal na Dios tu kwajblich alwa kal na Dios abal ki kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech u tmnal kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45006001	Tm, janty neech ki ulu? Neechxe ki ntsi ki wala abal na Dios ti ku xalkantsi ms tin alwatal? Yaba!
45006002	Pos xu kwajatich jelti max chemnek abal an walastalb, jantki ti kool ku kwajay bl i wall?
45006003	Yabxe a chobtsik ke tam ti bachu na Kristo Jess, in junwal jelti max u chemech junax kal Jaj tam tu pujan?
45006004	Tam tu pujan, i junwal jelti max u chemech ani u jolyat junax kal na Kristo. Pos anchan xan ti na Kristo ejech ti t abal kin xalkantsi tin labidh tokt an Ttalb, anchan weye waw yejat ku xechinich lujat ani yabich ki tajl i walastalb.
45006005	Kom jelti max u chemech junax kal na Kristo, anchan jeye ti neech ku ejech ti t jelt xan ti Jaj ejech.
45006006	I chobich ke an weje chalab xi koolwiik, jelti max pajkiyat jeye junax kal na Kristo. Anchan ti tmun abal ka wixkiyat an walastalb, xi kwajat jelti max i ajtiklb. Anchan yabich yejat ki wala jelti max exom i tjontsal bl jech an ajtiklb.
45006007	Pos xi chemnekich, yabich neech ka ejtowat ka kyat taknl kal an walastalb.
45006008	Kom jelti max u chemech junax kal na Kristo, i chob jeye ke neech ku kwajay ejat kal Jaj.
45006009	I chobich ke tam ti na Kristo ejdhjich ti t, yabich jayki neech ka chemech; an cheml yabich in kool i awiltalb kal Jaj.
45006010	Pos tam ti chemech na Kristo, chemech kal tin kwenta an walastalb jnlki abal echekijich; por tam ti ejdh ti t, ejdh abal ka kwajay ejat abal a Dios.
45006011	Anchan teye tattsik, ki kwajaytsik jelti max i chemnek abal an walastalb, por i ejattsik abal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45006012	Jaxtm, yabich ka walkatsik kin koy i awiltalb an walastalb ba na tul xu chemel. Yabich ka tajl xowa in kulbetnl na tul.
45006013	Yab ka pidhnatsik tab ki yntsik kal an walastalb abal ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, ka pidhnatsik tab ba na Dios, jelti jun xita xi chemnekich ani ejdhatsich ti t. Ka pidhnatsik tab ba na Dios abal ki yntsik ka taja xowa lujat.
45006014	Yabich ki kwajaytsik taknl kal an walastalb, pos yabich i kwajattsik taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, i kwajattsik bin alwatal na Dios.
45006015	Janty ki taja? Ki ntsi ki wala abal u kwajatich bin alwatal na Dios ani yabich u kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Yaba!
45006016	A chobtsik alwa ke max ka pidhna tab abal ki kwajay ta jolib ba jun i ajtiklb, kool ka taja xowa kin ulu jachan an ajtiklb. Ani anchan, max i kwajat a tjontsal an walastalb jelti jun i ajtiklb, jech neech ti ki jna ban kibeltalb; por max a tjontsal na Dios, neech ki kwajay lujat.
45006017	Por u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta, xi kwajattsikwiik jelti max i jolib kal an walastalb ani xo a exbaymalichtsik kal yantam a itsch an alwa tilab xi oktsidhichtsik.
45006018	Tam ta kldhjichtsik ta jolib ban an walastalb, i kwajbjichtsik abal ka tajl xowa lujat.
45006019	(Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun i inik xi tech ti kayl, kom tattsik yab a lej ejtowal ka exbaytsik alwa jech.) Anchan jelt xan ta pidhnmaltsik tab ki yn kal an ataxtalb ani kal xowa yab alwa, anchan jeye xo ti ka pidhnatsik tab abal ki tokedhjichtsik ani anchan ka tajlichtsik xowa lujat.
45006020	Tam ta kybtsik ta jolib kal an walastalb, yab a tajltsik xowa lujat;
45006021	por jantom alwatalb a kymaltsik kal jachan xowa yab alwa a tajmaltsik ani xo bl ti tidhebdhltsik? Pos tokot u jnax ban kibeltalb.
45006022	Por xo, kom i kldhatsichtsik ta jolib ban walastalb ani i kwajbadhichtsik abal ka tjontsi na Dios, a koolichtsik an tokattalb ani anchan, a koolichtsik jeye an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
45006023	Xita in tajl i walastalb, tayl neech ban kibeltalb; por nin chejwalixtal na Dios, jaich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45007001	Neech tin kw kal xin exlltsik an takixtalb. Kidhblbtsik, yabxe a chobtsik ke an takixtalb in kool i awiltalb ba jun i inik tam jachan an inik bl kwajat ejat?
45007002	An mmlb xi tomkidh, jyki max wikadh tu kyb kal an takixtalb bin tomkl, lejat nin tomkl kwajat ejat; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb u jilkonalich walkadh kal an takixtalb xi kl tu kyb jelti max wikadh bin tomkl.
45007003	Jaxtm, max an mmlb ka junkun kal i keet inik tam bl ejat nin tomkl, u wenkonalich tm ti junkux inik; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb u jilkonalich tm walkadh kal jech an takixtalb. Ani max ka tomkin kal keet i inik, yabich u kalel i junkux inik.
45007004	Kidhblbtsik, anchan teye tattsik, tam ta bachu na Kristo, jelti max i chemechtsik abal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Anchan yabich i kwajat taknl kal jech an takixtalb, i kwajatich taknl kal na Kristo xi chemdh ani ejech ti t abal ka tajlich xowa in l na Dios.
45007005	Tam tu kwajatwiik tokot i tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, i tajl xowa yab alwa. Jech an atax chalab u ejdhantsat kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Ejtal jech an atax chalab xi tajl kal ni tul, tu jnl ban kibeltalb.
45007006	Por xo, yabich u kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kom u kwajatich jelti max chemnek abal jech an takixtalb xi tu takyalwiik. Jaxtm, kom yabich xo u kwajat taknl kal jech an takixtalb, ki tjontsch an Tokat Ejattalb xi xo u takix ani yabich ki tjontsi an weje takixtalb xi tu takyalwiik.
45007007	Tm, janty neech ki ulu? Ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, i walastalb? Yaba! Por max yabak wachink jech an takixtalb, yabak u exlmal an walastalb. Yabak u exlmal max walats ku ltendha xowa in kool keet, max an takixtalb yabak in ulmal ench: “Yab neech ka ltendha xowa in kool keet.”
45007008	Por an walastalb in yna an takixtalb abal ti kin kwajbantsi bu chalab an ti ltendhaxtalb. Pos max yabak waach an takixtalb, yabak jeye waach an walastalb.
45007009	Tam ti yab u exll an takixtalb, u chalpay abal neech kin kwajay ejat kal na Dios; por tam tu exla an takixtalb, u chuu abal in walbidh ani u chobna abal yab neech ku ejto kin kwajay kal na Dios.
45007010	U chobna ke an takixtalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb, tin xalkantsi abal in neech ban kibeltalb.
45007011	Por an walastalb in yna an takixtalb abal ti kin kambiy ani u chobna abal neech kin kale ban kibeltalb.
45007012	Tsubax kejle ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tokat; ani xowa in ulal ka tajan, tokat, lujat ani alwa.
45007013	Tm, jech an takixtalb xin ulal ka tajan xowa alwa, neech ti kin jna ban kibeltalb? Yaba! An walastalb, abal ka xalkan ke yab alwa, tin xalkantsi abal in neech ban kibeltalb kal xowa alwa in ulal ka tajan jech an takixtalb. Anchan, an takixtalb in xalka ke an walastalb yab tajat alwa.
45007014	I chob ke an takixtalb a Dios tu pidhm, por yab u ejto ku taja xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb kom in kwajat taknl kal an walastalb.
45007015	Yab u chob xanty u tamwal, pos yab u ejto ku taja xowa u l ku taja, tokot u tajl xowa u pojkl.
45007016	Ani max tokot u tajl xowa yab u l ku taja, u ulalich tm ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, alwa.
45007017	Anchan, yabich nan nu tajl an walastalb; xita nin tajl, jaich an walastalb xu kokm tin kwajat.
45007018	U chob ke ba nan, yab waach xata alwa; pos u l ku taja xowa alwa, por yab u ejtowal ku taja.
45007019	Pos yab u tajl xowa alwa xu l ku taja, tokot u tajl xowa yab alwa xi yab u l ku taja.
45007020	Ani max u tajl xowa yab u l, yabich nan u tajl; in tajl an walastalb xu kokm.
45007021	Anchan p, tam u l ku taja xowa alwa, tokot u tajl xowa yab alwa xu kokm.
45007022	Tu ejattal, u kulbetnl ku taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
45007023	U l ku taja xowa in ulal ka tajan nin takixtal na Dios, por waach bu tul nin chp an walastalb xi tin tamkuyal. Jech nin chp an walastalb xi kwajat bu tul, jaich tin tajl ku wala.
45007024	Chojontl u chubl! Jita neech ti kin wixkintsi an ti walastalb xu tajl bu tul xi tin nedhl ban kibeltalb?
45007025	U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, ke tokot ni Ajtik Jesukristo neech kin ejto tin wixkintsi an ti walastalb. Jaxtm, kal nu chalab u tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios, por kal nu tul, u tajl an walastalb.
45008001	Pos xo, yabich waach ni jun i walbixtalb abal xi kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, yabich waach ni jun i walbixtalb, kal xi kwajatichtsik xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab xan tin kulbetnl nin tul.
45008002	Pos nin takixtal an Tokat Ejattalb xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess, tin kldhmalich bin takixtal an walastalb ani ban kibeltalb.
45008003	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab in ejto kin wkoy an walastalb xi tajl kal ni tul, kom yab in kool in chp. Jaxtm na Dios tin aba nin Chakmil jelti jun i inik xu walablom kal tin kwentaki an walastalb abal ti ku wkontsi an ti walastalb xi tajl kal ni tul.
45008004	Jech in taja abal ka xalkan jelti max i tajlich xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, pos waw yabich u kwajat jelt xan tin kulbetnl ni tul, u kwajat jelt xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb.
45008005	Xin tajltsik tokotki xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, tokot in chalpmtsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul; por xin tajltsik xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, tokot in chalpmtsik xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb.
45008006	Max ki chalpm tokot ki tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, neech ku kale ban kibeltalb; por max ki tajl tokot xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani an kijidhtalb.
45008007	Xin chalpmtsik tokot kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, u kalelich in pojkl na Dios; pos yabtsik in l nibal in ejtowal kin taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
45008008	Jaxtm, xi kwajattsik tokot in tajl xowa in kulbetnlki nin tul, yab neech kin ejto kin tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.
45008009	Por tattsik yabich i kwajat xan tin kulbetnl na tul, i kwajatichtsik xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb, max nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios kwajatich kal tattsik. Xita yab in kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Kristo, yab u dhabalb kal na Kristo.
45008010	Por max na Kristo kwajatich kal tattsik, ni ejattal in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal abal u kwajbadhich alwa kal na Dios; por ni tul kwajat jelti max chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb.
45008011	Ani max nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, xin ejdha ti t na Jess, kwajat kal tattsik, jaychki jech na Dios neech kin pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal na tul xu chemel, kal tin kwentaki abal nin Tokat Ejattal kwajat kal tattsik.
45008012	Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, kool ku kwajay jelt xan tin l na Dios ani yab jelt xan tin kulbetnl ni tul.
45008013	Pos max tattsik tokot i kwajltsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul, neech ki kaletsik ban kibeltalb, por max kal tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb, ka jilatsik ka taja xowa in kulbetnl na tul, neech ka koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
45008014	Ejtal xi kwajattsik taknl kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, u chakmlb kal na Dios.
45008015	Pos an Tokat Ejattalb xa bachmal, xi xo kwajat a tjontsaltsik, yab jaich abal ki kwajaytsik jun i jikl. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb ti tajl ki kwajch ta chakmlb kal na Dios. Jaxtm ti neech ki ejto ki kawidh ulu ench kal ni jun i jkib: “Tat tu Tta.”
45008016	Jech an Tokat Ejattalb in xalkantsal ni ejattal ke waw u chakmlb kal na Dios.
45008017	Max u chakmlbich kal na Dios, neech ki bachu xowa u bijtsidh neech ku pidhan. Neech ki bachu xowa in ulmal na Dios neech ti ku pidha ani neech ki koy xowa na Kristo in kool. Anchan neech ka tmun, max ki watna an yajtsiktalb jelti xin watna na Kristo ani max ki watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ki koy an labidh tokattalb jelti xin kool na Kristo.
45008018	Nan u chob ke an yajtsiktalb xi xo i achl, yab neech kin junu jelti an labidh tokattalb xi neech ku tejwamdhantsat tayl.
45008019	Ejtal xowa in tajmal na Dios xi kwajat walki ani chabl, in aytsm tajat kin bajaw xowki neech ka tejwamdhantsat an ti labidh tokattalb nin chakmiltsik na Dios.
45008020	Ejtal xowa na Dios in taja, jilkon jelti max yab xata ti alwa, por yab abal xowa xi tajadh, anchan tin lena. Anchan ti tjan kom na Dios anchan tin lena ani kom in chob ke tayl neech jun kin lejkiy.
45008021	Ejtal xowa tajadh kal na Dios, neech ka kldh abal yabich ka kwajay xon ti yab alwa ani abal kin bachu jeye an labidh tokattalb tam ka tejwamdhantsat tin labidh tokt nin chakmiltsik na Dios.
45008022	I chob alwa ke xowa na Dios in tajm, asta xo jelti max u ejl jelti tam jun i mmlb in achl i chukuxtalb tam nechich kin wachiy jun i chakam.
45008023	Anl weye waw, xi koolich an Tokat Ejattalb jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal tin kwenta xowa neech ki bachu ms tayl, u ejl weye ti itsch. U kwajat i aytsm xowki na Dios neech tu kwajba tu okodh chakmlb kal Jaj ani anchan, tu kldhaich bin takixtal an walastalb.
45008024	Tam ti na Dios tu loo, i tuju ki aytsi xowa in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Max ki chuch xowa i aytsal ki chuu, jant bl ku kwajay ki aytsm ki chuu?
45008025	Por max u kwajat i aytsm xowa yabl i chutal, i aytsm kal i kaymtalb.
45008026	An Tokat Ejattalb jaich xi tu tolmintsal an ti ejattal tam u l. Tam yab i chob xan ti ku lan, an Tokat Ejattalb jaich xi tu kontsintsal xowa i yntsal kal jun i kwintalb xi tokotki na Dios in exbayal.
45008027	Por na Dios, xi tu exlantsal an ti itsch, in chob xanty in ulal an Tokat Ejattalb. Pos an Tokat Ejattalb in kontsintsal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xantiki tin kulbetnl na Dios.
45008028	I chob ke xita in kaknlich na Dios, ejtal xowa in tamwal, u tolmiyb kl abal ka likey ms nin itsch. Anchan u tmnal kal xita kanidhtsik xantiki tin lenmal na Dios.
45008029	Xita in okox takuy, in okox bijtsi abal ka kwajay jelti nin Chakmil Jesukristo. In taja anchan, abal jech na Jesukristo, ka kwajay ti jidhtal Chakmlb.
45008030	Xita nin takuy, jaich nin okox bijtsi abal ka kwajch jelti nin Chakmil ani xita nin takuy, in kwajba abal ka kwajch alwa kal Jaj. Ani xita in kwajba abal ka kwajch alwa kal Jaj, in pidha ti awiltalb abal kin bachutsik an labidh tokattalb.
45008031	Pos janty neech ki ulu kal jech tin kwenta? Max na Dios kwajat kal waw, jita neech kin ejto ti ku tajtsi xowa yab alwa?
45008032	Max na Dios yab in kanidha kin pidhna nin Chakmil abal ka chemdh kal waw ti kwenta, awxe yab neech ti ku pidha kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ejtal xowa i yntsal?
45008033	Jita kl ti neech ka walbiyat xi takudhtsik kal na Dios? Na Dios jaich nin ulal abal yab walbidhtsik;
45008034	jita neech ti walbix? Na Kristo jaich na chemech ani ejech ti t. Jaich xi kwajat tin ejt na Dios ani jaich jeye xi kwajat tu kawintsal.
45008035	Pos jita neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Kristo? Awxe neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Kristo an yajtsiktalb, an tepintalb, an odhbijixtalb, an kanab, an chojontltalb, an kakadhtalb, o an cheml?
45008036	An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kal tatki ta kwenta u aytsmte kal an cheml putl a kts; u tajtsinal jelt xan tu tajtsinal an borregotsik tam u jnb xon tu chemdhb.
45008037	Por kal ejtal jech, i tmalich tu kwajat kal tin kwentaki na Kristo xi tu kanidhmal tajat.
45008038	Jaxtm, nan u chob alwa ke yab waach ni jun xata xi neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Dios. Nibal an cheml, nibal an xechintalb, nibal an tokat abatwletsik, nibal an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki, nibal an chplbtsik, nibal xi xo, nibal xi tayl,
45008039	nibal xi tekat, nibal xi owtsik. Ni jun xata xowa tajadh kal a Dios neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45009001	Tsubax in kw kom u bellich na Kristo ani yab in kambix; pos nu chalab, kom teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, tin ltsal abal tsubax xowa neech ku ulu.
45009002	In tepinal tajat tin kwajat ani echeki u achl i yajal tu itsch kal tin kwenta nu at kidhtal.
45009003	Pos asta nan u lak max in bijtsidh kin kale ban kibeltalb ani yabak ku bela na Kristo, max jech alwaak abal nu at kidhtaltsik.
45009004	An israelitatsik, xi jaich nu at kidhtaltsik, jaich xi kwajattsik ti chakmlb kal na Dios. Jaich jeye xi neech kin bachutsik an labidh tokattalb, an lejkintalb ani nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. An israelitatsik jaich punkuntsidh kin tjontsi na Dios ban at xon ti Jaj u kaknb ani jaich jeye xi usnktsik ke neech kin bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna.
45009005	An okox ttalbtsik, u kidhtalb jeye kal an israelitatsik ani na Kristo, xi wachin jelt xan tu wachinal jun xita tech ti chabl, u kidhtalb jeye kal an okox ttalbtsik. Jech na Kristo, jaich na Dios xin takyal ejtal xowa waach, lbtajadh ti kwajat malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
45009006	Yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke nin kwintal na Dios yab tjan xan tin ulal, pos yab ejtal xu wachinal ban israelitatsik u israelita.
45009007	Yab ejtal nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham u chakmlbtsik kal jaj; pos usnk kal na Dios ench: “Kal na Isk, yn tajat neech ka koy a kidhtaltsik.”
45009008	Jech tu tolmiyal ki exbay ke ni jun xita yab u chakmlb kal a Dios kal tin kwentaki an kidhtalb xon tu wachinal; u chakmlbtsik kal na Dios xita nu wachinal xantiki na Dios tin ulmal.
45009009	Pos xowa utsan na Abraham kal na Dios jaich jech: “Tam kin bajaw an kij, neech kin tsch ani na Sara, neech kin wachiy jun i chakam.”
45009010	Ani yab tokot jki jech. Chablam nin chakmil na Rebeka, u chakmlbtsik kal jnki tokot i inik xi jaich ni weje paklil Isk.
45009011	Tam ti xi jech chb an chakamtsik yabl wachink ti chakam ani nibal bl in tajltsik xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa, utsan ench na Rebeka kal na Dios: “Xi okox neech kin tjontsi xi tayl.” Jech anlki jeye tu kalel xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “U kanidha na Jakob, por u pojka na Esa.” Anchan, xalkanich abal na Dios in kool i awiltalb kin takuy xita Jaj in kulbetnl; xita Jaj in l kin kaniy ani yab in dhl ti kwenta xanty in tajmaltsik.
45009014	Pos janty neech ki ulu? Ke na Dios yab lujat? Yaba!
45009015	Pos utsan ench na Moiss kal na Dios: “Neech ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xita Nan u l ku kontsi ani neech ku kontsi ti kaknaxtalb xita Nan u l ku kontsi.”
45009016	Anchan p, yab jaich abal wawki ki lena o ki taja i chplb, tokot na Dios xu kontsix ti yajnantsixtalb, jaich nin chob.
45009017	Pos ban Tokat Dhuslab, na Dios in utsa ench an pulek takix xi Ejipto: “Tu kwajbmal ta pulek takix abal ku xalka ba tat nu chp ani abal kin exlomn putlki an chabl.”
45009018	Jaxtm tu xalkanalich ke na Dios in kontsal ti yajnantsixtalb xita Jaj in l kin kontsi ani in chapikmdhantsal tin itsch xita in l kin chapikmdhantsi.
45009019	Por tm neech ti kin utsa ench: “Max anchan, jantki p tm na Dios tin walbiyal an iniktsik? Pos, jita neech kin ejto kin tomna na Dios?”
45009020	Por paylomlb! Janty teye a y abal ki kwajay ta kwlx kal a Dios? Awxe an pats neech kin ejto kin utsa ench xi kl ti tajadh?: “Jantki tin tajmal anchan?”
45009021	Pos an tojom in kool i awiltalb kin taja kal an kut xan ti jaj kin lena; neech kin ejto kin taja kal jachan an kut jun i pats xi exbadhki ti neech ti ynal ani jn, xi neech ti ynal echeki.
45009022	Ani jant max na Dios, abal kin xalka w an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna ani kin xalka nin chp, in kuxuy kal yantam i chaattalb xowa in tajl xin tomnltsik kin bachu an yajtsiktalb ani ka kibdhtsik?
45009023	Pos in taja anchan abal kin pidhna ka exlantsat tin publ nin labidh tokt, jelt xan ti tmun kal waw. Jaj tu kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ani tu tojojoy abal ki ejto weye ki bachu jachan an labidh tokattalb.
45009024	Jech xita na Dios in takwymal, jaich wawich, yab i judokitsik, in takwymal jeye xi yabtsik u judo.
45009025	Pos na Dios in ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab xin dhutsm na Osas: An atiklbtsik xi yabwiik u dhabal, neech ku ulu ke u dhabal; ani xi yabwiik u kanidhl, neech ku ulu ke u kanidhl.
45009026	Ani tyki xon ti utsantsik ench: “Tattsik yab i dhabalb kal Nan”, taja neech ki bijyattsik ta chakmlb kal na Dios xi ejat.
45009027	Por kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, na Isaas in ulu ench: “Maske nin kidhtal an israelitatsik yn tajat jelti an kidhib xi waach ban pujal, tokot neech ka jilkon jun kwene xi neech ka lowat,
45009028	pos an Okxlb neech kin taja tech ban chabl xan tin ulmal, neech kin taja kidhat ani jikat.”
45009029	Jelt xan tin ulmal ms okox na Isaas ench: Max an Okxlb yabak tu jiltsmal ti kidhtaltsik, i tammalak weye jelt xan ti okodh kibdh an atiklbtsik xi Sodoma ani xi Gomorra.
45009030	Janty neech ki ulu? I ulal ke xi yabtsik u judo, xi yab in ayaltsik ka kwajbjichtsik alwa kal na Dios, in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
45009031	Por an israelitatsik, xin wwnmaltsik jun i takixtalb xin chalpayaltsik ke kl ti neech ka kwajbtsik alwa kal na Dios, yab in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios.
45009032	Jantki ti yab in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios? Abal in ayaltsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios kal xowa in tajl ani yab abal u belom. In junwal jelti max tadhkun kal jun i tujub; jech xin junwal jelti an tujub, jaich na Kristo.
45009033	Ban Tokat Dhuslab kwajat dhutsadh ench: Neech ku kwajba Sin jun xita xin junwal jelti jun i tujub xu tadhkundhax ani u kwajlax; xita kl ti ka belan Jaj, yab neech ka tidhebdh.
45010001	Kidhblbtsik, xowa u l tu itsch ani xowa u kontsal na Dios kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, jaich ke ka loeytsik jeye.
45010002	Nan u ulal ke jajtsik in l kin taja xan tin ulal na Dios, por yabtsik in tajl xan ti yejat.
45010003	Kom yabtsik in chob xan ti na Dios tu kwajbax alwa kal Jaj ani kom yabtsik in tajl xan ti na Dios tin ulal, jaxtm ti tokot in ayal jajkitsik xan ti ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
45010004	Ejtal xita kin bela na Kristo, u kwajbbich alwa kal na Dios ani yabich yejat kin taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
45010005	Por kal tin kwenta abal jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal a Dios kal an takixtalbki, na Moiss in dhutsa ench: “Xita kin ejto kin taja ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay alwa.”
45010006	Por kal tin kwenta abal jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki abal u belom, in ulal ench: “Yab ka ulu ench ta ejattal”, jita neech ka kadhiy walki abal kin utsa ka paay na Kristo?
45010007	O jita neech ka paay asta chaat xon ti kwajat an chemlomtsik abal kin utsa ka kale na Kristo?
45010008	Pos, janty p tm nin ulal? “An alwa tilab kunat ti kwajat, kunat ti kwajat ba na wi ani ba na itsch.” Jech an alwa tilab, jaich ni till abal ka belan.
45010009	Max ka ulu kal na wi ke na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb ani ka bela ta itsch ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t tam ti chemdh, neech ki loey.
45010010	Pos kal ni itsch ti yejat ku belmch abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios ani kal ni wi ti yejat ki ulu ke na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb abal ku loch.
45010011	An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ni jun xita xi kl ti ka belan yab neech ka tidhebdh.”
45010012	Pos na Dios yab in dhl ti kwenta max i judo o yaba; pos Jaj xu Ajtiklb kal ejtalki, alwa tajat kal xitakichki ti ka tawn.
45010013	“Ejtal xita kl ti ka tawn an Ajtiklb neech ka loey.”
45010014	Por, jan ti neech kin tawnatsik an Ajtiklb max yab in belmal? Jan ti neech kin bela max yab tiltsidhtsik? Jan ti neech kin achatsik an alwa tilab max yab waach xita kl ti ka tiltsintsik?
45010015	Ani jan ti neech ka kale jun xita kin tila an alwa tilab max yab ka aban? An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Kijidh tajat tam ka ulich jun xita xin tsidhl an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an kijidhtalb!”
45010016	Por yab ejtalki in bachwal an alwa tilab abal kin taja xan tin ulal, pos na Isaas in ulal ench: “Okxlb, jita in belm xowa i lnmal?”
45010017	Pos anchan, xowa i bell jaich xowa i achl, xowa i achl jaich in kwintal a Dios.
45010018	Por nan u konyal: Awxe yab in achmaltsik an tsubaxtalb? In achmaltsik! An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Nin kwintal an tiltsixtsik achatmenek putl an chabl ani nin tilbiltsik, in bajmal putlki xon ti kwajtsidh an chabl.
45010019	Por u konyal jun: Awxe an israelitatsik yabl in exbaymal? Por na Moiss in ulal ench tin jidhtal: Neech ku taja ki itixbtsik kal tin kwenta i atiklbtsik xi yab u takwymal; neech ku taja ki chakuytsik kal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll nu kwintal.
45010020	Ani ms tayl, na Isaas in taja jeye kin ulu ench: Xi yab tin ayaltsik, tin ela; ani u xalka tub abal kin chutat kal xi yab xeech tin konwiyaltsik.
45010021	Por kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, in ulu ench: “Putl a kts in kwajay tin tawnax an ti atiklbtsik xi yab u tajax ti kij ani u tomnax.”
45011001	Pos xo u ulal ench: Awxe na Dios in okodh pojkmalich an israelitatsik, an atiklbtsik xi Jaj in takwymal? Yaba! Pos nan in israelita neye, u kidhtal na Abraham ani in kidhtalb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn.
45011002	Na Dios yab in okodh pojkmal an israelitatsik. Jech an israelitatsik, jaich xi Jaj in okox takwymal. Yabxe a chobtsik xanty in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab kal tin kwenta an tiltsix Elas, tam ti jaj in lna ba na Dios, an israelitatsik? Ench tin utsa na Dios:
45011003	“Okxlb, an israelitatsik in chemdhmal na tiltsxiltsik ani in pakmal xon ta kwajbantsb an ti pikbantsixtalb; tokotich nan in jilkonal ani in lenb neye kin chemdh.”
45011004	Por tkoyat ench kal na Dios: “U plmdhmalich abal Nan buk mil i iniktsik xi yab tudhenektsik abal kin kakna nin chilbil an dios Baal.”
45011005	Anlki jeye xo jech i kij jilkonk jun kwene an israelitatsik xin takwymal na Dios kal nin alwatal.
45011006	Ani max takudh kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal na Dios, yabich jaich tin kwenta kal xowa jn in tajl; pos max anchanak, nin alwatal na Dios, yabich tm u kalel i alwatalb.
45011007	Pos janty neech ki ulu? Yab ejtal an israelitatsik in bajaw ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios, tokot in bajawtsik ka kwajat alwa kal na Dios, xi takudh. Xi keettsik chapikmdhantsattsik tin itsch,
45011008	jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Pidhantsik kal na Dios tin ejattal xi yab tajat xata in exbayal, tin wal xi jelti max yab u chuux ani tin xuchun xi jelti max yab u ochox. Asta xo, anchan ti kwajattsik.”
45011009	Na Dabid in ulal ench: Ke nin ajbaltsik ka wenkon jelti paltsixtalb, ani jelti max ka tadhkuntsik kl ani taja kin bachutsik nin jalbl nin walab.
45011010	Ka kwajaytsik jelti max jokolbdhats abal yab ka chuxin ani ka ktandhatsik abal echekijich.
45011011	Pos xo u ulal ench: Awxe tam ti an israelitatsik in chikat taja na Dios, okodh pojktsik kal na Dios? Yaba! Por kal tin kwentaki nin walab, lowat xi yabtsik u judo abal an israelitatsik kin lena jeye ka lowat.
45011012	Kal tin kwentaki nin walab an judotsik, lowat an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl. Ani tam ti pojk an judotsik kal na Dios, lowat xi yabtsik u judo. Jaxtm, tam ka bachwat jun an judotsik kal na Dios, ms plek an lbtajaxtalb neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik.
45011013	Neech tu utsatsik jun xata tattsik xi yabtsik i judo: Nan in kwajat tin abatwle abal xi yabtsik u judo ani in tojnal chapik abal ku taja jech an tojlb.
45011014	Anchan tu tajl abal nu at kidhtaltsik kin lena jeye ka lowattsik, jelt xan ti tattsik i loodh.
45011015	Pos max tam ti pojk an judotsik kal na Dios, kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl, janty neech ka tmun tam an judotsik ka bachwattsik jun? Neech ka pidhantsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xi kwajattsik jelti max chemnek.
45011016	Max an jidhtal pan xu tajnal jaich abal a Dios, ejtal an xokadh cheedh trigo, jaich jeye abal Jaj. Ani max an iblab jaich abal a Dios, ejtal an kwelek, jaich jeye abal Jaj.
45011017	An judotsik, in junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo ani xi yabtsik u judo, in junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo. Taltsik an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, wkoyat ani tat, xa junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo, i chatan xon ti jajtsik wkoyat. Anchan, a bajawtsik ki kwajay teykmte kal nin ibl ani nin xichl an lej olibo.
45011018	Yab ka ulu ke tattsik ms i alwa ke an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo. Yab ka ulutsik anchan, pos yab tattsik a teykm nin ibl jachan an lej olibo, tattsik ni teykmte kl.
45011019	Neech xna ka ulu ench: “Ani kejle, por an kwelabtsik takyat abal kin chatan nan ba jachan an lej olibo.”
45011020	Ani kejle; por an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, wkoyattsik abal yab u belom ani tattsik, i chatan xon ti jajtsik wkoyat kal tin kwentaki abal i belom. Yab ka tekatsik tab abal anchan, tokot ka koytsik i kwenta.
45011021	Pos max na Dios yab in pakwlantsi an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, yab teye neech ti ki pakwlantsitsik.
45011022	Na Dios i alwa inik tajat, por chapik jeye tajat u tawnax. Chapik tajat in tawnl an judotsik xin jila ti belom; por kal tattsik, alwa inik tajat max ka ntsi ki kwajay bin alwatal, max yab ka ntsi ki kwajay bin alwatal, neech teye ki wkoyat.
45011023	Max ka belmchtsik jun an judotsik, neechtsik jun ka chatan xon ti wkodh; pos na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal kin chatatsik jun xon ti wkodh.
45011024	Tattsik xi yab i judo, xa junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo, na Dios ti chata ban lej olibo maske yab in tomnl. Max na Dios in taja anchan kal tattsik, an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, ms ja in tomnl ka chatan ban lej olibo.
45011025	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik xowa na Dios in koolwiik yab tejwa abal yab ka ulu ke tattsik i chalpadh tajat: na Dios in chapikmdhantsi tin itsch taltsik an israelitatsik, por yab abal echeki, tokot asta tam ka loch xi yab u israelitatsik xi kwajat takudh abal ka loey.
45011026	Tayl, tam ka loch xi yab u israelitatsik xi kwajat takudh abal ka loey, ejtal an israelitatsik neech ka lowat; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ban bitsow Sin ti neech ka tsch an Loox. Neech kin wkontsi ejtal an ti walastalb nin kidhtaltsik na Jakob.
45011027	Ani jech jaich an lejkintalb xi neech ku koy kal jajtsik, tam Nan ku wkontsi an tin walastalbiltsik.
45011028	An israelitatsik in pojkl an alwa tilab ani anchan in pojklich na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta. Por u kanidhbtsik kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin weje pakliltsik xi takudh kal na Dios abal ka dhabalntsik kal Jaj.
45011029	Pos xowa na Dios in pidhnl, yab in kniyal ani yab in jalkuyal nin chalab tam kin takuy jun xita abal kin dhabalnaich.
45011030	Ti wel chabki a chikat tajltsik na Dios, por xo, i kontsidhichtsik ti yajnantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal an israelitatsik in chikat taja na Dios.
45011031	Anchan jeye xo, an israelitatsik in chikat tajmal na Dios abal kal tin kwentaki an yajnantsixtalb xi kontsattsik, ka kontsattsik jeye.
45011032	Pos na Dios in walka ke ejtal ka chikat tajxin abal kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ejtalkitsik.
45011033	Yn tajat nin alwatal na Dios ani nin chalpadhtal! Na Dios xowakichki in exbayal. Yab i ejtowal ki wila xowa Jaj in ulal, nibal i ejtowal ki exbantsi xowa in tajl.
45011034	Pos, “jita in exbantsmal xowa in chalpayal an Okxlb? O jita kl ti takidh?
45011035	Jita in pidhmal okox jun xata an Okxlb abal tayl ka pidhan jun xata jelti jun i jalbintsixtalb?”
45011036	Pos ejtal xowakich ba Dios ti tl, kal Jaj ti tajadh ani abal Jaj. Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
45012001	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhl kal tin yajnantsixtal na Dios abal ka pidhnatsik tab jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb xi ejat ani tokat, xan tin kulbetnl na Dios. Jech jaich an tsubax kaknaxtalb.
45012002	Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tu kwajl xi yab u belom; ka jalkchtsik na xechintal kal tin kwentaki abal i tmdhantsidhich an ta chalab. Anchan neech tm ka bajawtsik ka chuu alwa xowa j in l na Dios, xowa in kulbetnl ani xowa lujat.
45012003	Kal an punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatal, tu utsltsik ke ni jun xita yab yejat kin teka tinb, tokot ka kwajay xan ti yejat. Ms alwa ke juntsik ta b ka ynatsik an alwa chalab, xantiki ta pidhnktsik ki belmch kal na Dios.
45012004	Pos anchan jelti ni tul yn i pejetsik in kool ani keetich keetich xanty in tajl,
45012005	anchan weye waw, maske yn tu b, jun tokot tu ynal jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo. Juntsik tu b i junwal jelti jun peje nin tul na Kristo.
45012006	Na Dios tu pidhmal ti awiltalb juntsik tu b, xantiki Jaj tin lenmal kal nin alwatal, por yejat ki yna alwa xowa tu pidhmal. Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb kal na Dios ti tiltsix, kin taja jech an tojlb xantiki ti pidhnk kin bela.
45012007	Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti tjontsix, ka tjontsixin alwa; xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti oktsix, ka oktsixin alwa.
45012008	Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti takix, ka takxin xan ti yejat; xita in pidhnl xata, kin taja kal yantam i kulbtalb. Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti oklek belomtsik, yejat kin taja kal yantam i kwenta ani xita pidhnk ti awiltalb kin tolmiy an chojontltsik, kin taja kal yantam i kulbtalb.
45012009	Yab ki kndhxintsik eb itschki. Yab ka tajltsik xowa yab alwa, tokot ka tajltsik xowa alwa.
45012010	Ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti yejat ka kndhxin xin bellichtsik na Kristo. Kal tin kwenta an kknxtalb, ki kknxintsik jn ani jn xan ti yejat.
45012011	Ka tajltsik xowa yejat ka taja, yab ka betna. Ka tjontsaltsik an Ajtiklb kal yantam a ejattal.
45012012	Ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xa kooltsik; ka kuxyal kal i chaattalb xowakichki an yajtsiktalb ka tamu ani ki lantsik echeki.
45012013	Ka tolmiyal an belomtsik kal xowa in yntsal; ka bachwaltsik alwa xita u ulel ti ki lna.
45012014	Ka lbtajltsik xi ti atl. Ki lbtajxintsik ani yab ki odhbijxintsik.
45012015	Ki kulbtsik teye kal xu kulbltsik ani ki ukintsik teye kal xu uknaltsik.
45012016	Ka koytsik junini na chalab jn ani jn. Yab ka tekltsik tab, ki junkuntsik kal xi chojontltsik. Yab ka wyna ke i chalpadhtsik tajat.
45012017	Max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi. Ka tajtsal echeki xowa alwa an atiklbtsik.
45012018	Ka tajltsik an chplb asta xon ti ka ejto abal ki kwajay kijidh kal ejtalkitsik.
45012019	Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi, ka jila abal ka pidhan an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb kal na Dios; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nan u lujyal tin ljundhax, Nan neech ku pidha xowa in lujyal kin bachu. Anchan in ulal an Okxlb.”
45012020	Ani in ulal jeye ench: “Max xi ti atl, ka kaay, ka kapundha; ani max ka tsikey, ka pidha ti ja kin ucha. Pos max ka taja anchan, neech ka tidhebdha tajat.”
45012021	Yab ka walka ki t kal xowa yab alwa, ka ta xi yab alwa kal xowa alwa.
45013001	Ni jun xita yab yejat kin chikat tajl an awiltalbtsik. Pos yab waach ni jun i awiltalb xi yab kal a Dios ti kwajbadh; ejtal an awiltalbtsik xi waach, kal a Dios ti kwajbadh.
45013002	Jaxtm, xita kin tomna an awiltalb, u kalelich in tomnl na Dios. Ani xu tomnaxtsik, jajich in ayal xan ti kin walbindha tinb.
45013003	Xita in tajl xowa alwa, yab in chejnl an awiltalbtsik; por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, in chejnl an awiltalbtsik. Max yab a l ka chejna an awiltalbtsik, ka tajl xowa alwa. Anchan, neech tm ki chutat kal an awiltalbtsik ke i alwa inik.
45013004	Pos an awiltalbtsik kwajat in tjontsal na Dios abal tattsik ta alwabl. Por max a tajl xowa yab alwa, ka chejna; pos yab aniki tin kool an awiltalb abal ti ki yajlombdha. Pos jajtsik kwajat in tjontsal a Dios abal kin ljundha ani kin yajlombdha xin walltsik.
45013005	Jaxtm, yejat ki exbantsal xowa kin ulu an awiltalbtsik, yab abal yabki ku yajlombdh, ki taja anchan abal yab ki acha ke u walbidh.
45013006	Jaich jeye kal jech tin kwenta ta pidhnltsik an jalbixtalbtsik, pos an awiltalbtsik kwajat in tjontsal a Dios ani jaich jech nin tojlbiltsik.
45013007	Ka pidha an awiltalbtsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu. Ka pidhl ti jalbixtalb an awiltalbtsik, xin lujyal kin bachu i jalbixtalb; ka kaknl jeye an awiltalbtsik xan ti yejat ka kakn.
45013008	Yab ki kwajay a jntsal ni jun xita, tokot yejat ki kwajay i kndhx jn ani jn; pos xita in kanidhl xi keet, in tajlich xan tin ulal an takixtalb.
45013009	Jech an takixtalb in ulal ench: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita, nibal ka ltendha xowa a chutal in kool keet”; pos jech ani xi keet jeye an takixtalb, tokot enchki tu exbayb: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
45013010	Xita in kanidhl xi keet, yab in tajtsal xowa yab alwa; jaxtm, xita in kanidhl xi keet, in tajlich xan tin ulal an takixtalb.
45013011	Ka tajatsik ejtal jech a chalpm ke u kunelich xowki ti neech ka tsch na Kristo. Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelti max i wayal, pos ms xo kunatich ti kwajat an loeltalb k tam tu belmch.
45013012	Xo exomich tajat ti kunel an kij jelti max akalich tajat tu kwajat ani jelti max nechich ka tsudhch, kom nechich ka tsch na Kristo. Jaxtm ti yejatich ki jila ki taja xowa yab alwa ani ki tajaich xowa alwa.
45013013	Ku xechin alwa, xan ti yejat ku xechin. Yab ki bela tu ajblom nibal tu uchl. Yab ku junkun kal xi yab i tomtal nibal ki taja xowaki i kulbetnl. Yab ku kwajay tu pjx nibal tu tx.
45013014	Tokot, ku kwajay u mkmte kal ni Ajtik Jesukristo jelti max Jaj u xeketlb ani yab ki chalpm ki taja xowaki in kulbetnl ni tul.
45014001	Max jun xita yabl u lej belom, ka bachutsik ani yab ki kwajay ka kwlxnatsik xata.
45014002	Waach taltsik xin chalpayal ke alwa ka kapat kidhat; por waach taltsik xi yabtsik u lej belom, xi tokot in kapal i akwl.
45014003	Xita in kapal kidhat, yab yejat kin pojka xi yab in kapal kidhat ani xi yab in kapal kidhat, yab jeye yejat kin lbna xin kapal kidhat, pos na Dios in bachmalich chablamki.
45014004	Pos tat janty a y abal ki kwajay ka lbna xi kwajat in tjontsal jun xita? Max kin taja xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa, yab tat a kwenta, in kwenta xi kwajat in tjontsal. Por yab neech kin taja xowa yab alwa, pos an Ajtiklb in kool i awiltalb abal kin tolmiy kin taja xowa alwa.
45014005	Waach taltsik xin ulal ke waach taltsik a kts ms uluts ke xi keet ani waach jeye taltsik xin ulal ke jaychki ejtal na ktstsik. Juntsik tu b yejat ki chobna alwa max alwaich xan ti chalpayal.
45014006	Xin pakwlantsal taltsik a kts, in tajl abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb ani xin ulal ke jaychki ejtal na ktstsik, in tajl jeye abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb. Xita u kapul, in tajl abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb, pos in pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani xita yab u kapul, in tajl jeye abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb, pos in pidhl jeye ti jalbintsixtalb an Ajtiklb.
45014007	Ni jun xita xi waw yab kwajat ejat abal jajki in l ka kwajay ejat ani ni jun xita yab u chemel, abal jajki in l ka chemech.
45014008	Pos max u kwajat ejat, u ejat abal an Ajtiklb ani max ku chemech, u chemel abal an Ajtiklb. Anchan p, max u kwajat ejat o u chemnek, u dhabalb kal an Ajtiklb.
45014009	Na Kristo chemech ani ejech jun abal ka kwajay ti Ajtiklb kal xi chemnektsik ani kal xi ejattsik.
45014010	Por tat, jantki ta lbnl na at kidhb? O jantki ta pojkl? Pos ejtal neech ku utey xon ti na Kristo neech ti ljundhom.
45014011	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Anchan jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat ejat abal echeki, tsubax u ulal ke ejtal an atiklbtsik neech ka tudhlan tu tamt ani ejtal neech kin ulutsik ke Nanich nin Dios.
45014012	Anchan p, juntsik tu b neech ki ltsi na Dios xanty i tajmal.
45014013	Jaxtm, yabich yejat ku lbnxin jn ani jn. Tokot, ki aliy xan ti ki uwa abal yab ki taja ka walbin ni at kidhb.
45014014	Nan u chob alwa tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess, ke yab waach ni jun xata atax. Xita xin chalpayal ke atax jun xata, atax abal jaj.
45014015	Por max kal tin kwenta xowa a kapal, a tepindhl na at kidhb, tm, u kalelich jelti max yab a kanidhl. Yab ka taja ke kal tin kwentaki xowa a kapal, kin jila ti belom jun xita xi loodhich tam ti chemech na Kristo.
45014016	Yab p ki taja ka tilan yab alwa an walkadhtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Kristo.
45014017	Pos xon tu takix na Dios, yab u dhb ti kwenta xanty u kapnal o xanty u uxnal. Xon tu takix na Dios tokot u dhb ti kwenta an lujattalb, an kijidhtalb ani an kulbtalb xi kool kal tin kwenta an Tokat Ejattalb.
45014018	Xita in tjontsal anchan na Kristo, in tajlich xowa in l na Dios ani u kldhb ti alwa kal an atiklbtsik.
45014019	Anchan p, ki ntsi ki taja xowa tu tolmiyal abal ku kwajay kijidh ani anchan, ku tlmxin jn ani jn abal ku belmch ms.
45014020	Yab ki odhiy xowa in tajl na Dios kal tin kwentaki xowa i kapal. Tsubax kejle ke ejtal an kapnl, tokat; por xowa yab alwa, jaich tam ki kapu jun xata ani ki taja kl kin jila ti belom xi keettsik.
45014021	Ms alwa yab ki kapu i tulek, nibal ki ucha i yajtsik uxnl, abal yab ki itixbdha kl, nibal ki taja kin weka ti belom o kin jila ti belom ni at kidhb.
45014022	Max a bell ke alwa xowa a tajl, anchan ti ka bela tin tamt na Dios. Kijidh tajat abal jun xita xi yab in walbindhl tinb kal tin kwenta xowa in tajl!
45014023	Por xita xin kapal jun xata ani u jilkonal ti chalpax, jajki in walbindhl tinb abal yab tsububudh in itsch tin kapal. Ejtal xowa ki taja yab tsububudh i itsch, walats.
45015001	Max u belomich lejtal tajat, yejat ki tolmiy an kidhblbtsik xi yab u lej belom ani yab ki tajl xowa wawki i kulbetnl.
45015002	Juntsik tu b xi waw, yejat ki tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni at kidhb ani anchan, ki tolmiy ka belmch ms.
45015003	Pos nibal na Kristo yab in taja xowa Jajki in l; yab in taja anchan, tokot in tamu jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Nin odhbijixtal xi ti odhbijyaltsik, Nan u bachu.”
45015004	Pos ejtal xowa dhutsadh ms okox ban Tokat Dhuslab, dhutsan abal ki chobna. Ani kal tin kwenta an chaattalb ani an kijidhtalb xi ell ban Tokat Dhuslab, ki koy i aytsixtalb.
45015005	Ke na Dios, xin pidhnl an chaattalb ani an kijidhtalb, ti ki tolmiytsik abal ki kwajay alwa jn ani jn jelt xan tin l na Kristo Jess.
45015006	Ani anchan, ejtal junini, kal jnki tokot i kwintalb ka ajtintsitsik na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45015007	Anchan p, ku bchxin jn ani jn, jelt xan ti na Kristo tu bachmal, max ki taja anchan, neech tm ka pubdhantsat tin bij na Dios.
45015008	Pos xowa nan u ulal, jaich ke na Kristo tsch abal kin tjontsi an judotsik ani ka tjan xan ti usnk ni weje pakliltsik ani abal ka xalkan jeye ke na Dios tsubax xowa in ulal.
45015009	Tsinek jeye abal kin taja ke xi yab i judotsik kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin yajnantsixtalbil, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech tu tila ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani neech ku ajatna i ajatlbtsik abal tat ta alwabl.
45015010	Ani pl in ulal jeye ench: Ki kulb atiklbtsik xi yab i judo, kal xu dhabalbtsik kal na Dios.
45015011	Ani pl in ulal jun ench: Ka kakn an Okxlb kal ejtal xi yabtsik u judo ani ka pubdhantsat tin bij kal ejtal an atiklbtsik.
45015012	Na Isaas in dhutsmal jeye ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Neech ka wachin jun xita xu kidhtalb kal na Isa, neech ka kwajay ti Pulek Takix kal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo; jajtsik neech kin koy an aytsixtalb kom neech ka lowattsik kal Jaj.
45015013	Na Dios, xi tu tajl ki koy an aytsixtalb abal ki bachu xowa in ulmal neech ti ku pidha, ti ki pidhatsik tajat ti kulbtalb ani ti kijidhtalb abal i belomich. Anchan neech ka koytsik ms i aytsixtalb kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
45015014	Kidhblbtsik, u chob alwa ke i alwa inikichtsik tajat, i chalpadhichtsik tajat ani neech ka ejtch ki tkxin jn ani jn.
45015015	Ba jech an w xi tu dhutsuntsaltsik, tu dhutsuntsmal taltsik an takixtalbtsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb ani yab tu chintsmaltsik ni jun xata. U taja anchan abal yab ka uktsitsik xowa tu oktsmal. Jech u tajl kal tin kwenta nin punkuntsixtal na Dios xi tin pidhmal kal nin alwatal
45015016	abal ku tjontsi na Jesukristo ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo. An tojlb xu tajl, jaich ku tiltsi an tin alwa tilbil na Dios xi yabtsik u judo. Jech u tajl abal ku ututsik ba na Dios xi yabtsik u judo jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb xi Jaj kin kulbetna, xi tokodh kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
45015017	Abal u bellich na Kristo Jess u kool tajat xantokl ti kin kulb abal in kwajat u tjontsal na Dios,
45015018	pos tokot u l ku tila xan ti na Kristo tin ynmal abal kin taja jeye xowa in l na Dios xi yabtsik u judo. Jech tjan kal xowa u ulmal ani xowa u tajmal,
45015019	kal an pakdha exl ani an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xu taja kal tin kwentaki nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Anchan tu tila putlki nin alwa tilbil na Kristo, u tuju Jerusaln ani u bajaw asta ban chabl xi Ilriko.
45015020	Anchan tin xechin ku tila an alwa tilab xon ti yabl jayki tiladh na Kristo abal yab kin xechin tin oktsix xon ti oktsixnkich keet.
45015021	Yab u taja anchan, u taja jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Neech ka chutat kal xi yab jayki usnktsik xata kal tin kwenta na Kristo; ani neech ka exl kal xi yab jayki in achmal ti tilnal.
45015022	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab u ejtmal kin kale tu lnatsik, maske ynlich tajat u lenmal kin kale.
45015023	Por xo, kom u okch nu tojlbil ba jech an chabltsik ani kom ynich tajat i tamub tin exl kin kale tu lnatsik,
45015024	neech ku chuu max ku ejto kin watey tu lnatsik tam kin kale Espanya. Ani tam tu chuchtsik, u lak max ti kin tolmiytsik abal kin kale na Espanya.
45015025	Por xo in neech Jerusaln, u nedhl w i tolmixtalb abal an kidhblbtsik xi taja.
45015026	Pos an kidhblbtsik xi Masedonia ani Akaya, in chalpaymaltsik kin junku i tolmixtalb abal kin abtsi an kidhblbtsik xi chojontl xu kwajltsik Jerusaln.
45015027	Jajtsik in chalpaymal abal alwa kin tajatsik jech; ani alwa tajat, pos in tomnl xna kejle kin tolmiy kal xowa in yntsaltsik jelt xan ti jajtsik xi yabtsik u judo, tolmiyat ka belmch.
45015028	Jaxtm, tam ku pidhnaich jech an tolmixtalb xin punkuntsidh ku akiy, neech ku ntsi an bl abal Espanya, por okox neech kin watey tu lnatsik.
45015029	Nan u chob alwa ke tam kin ulich tachan, neech tajat ki bachu an lbtajaxtalb kal tin kwenta nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.
45015030	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani kal tin kanidhaxtal an Tokat Ejattalb, ki lantsik teye kal nan abal ki kontsi na Dios ti kin tolmiy.
45015031	Ka kontsitsik na Dios abal ti kin loo kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom xu kwajltsik Judea. Ani ke jech an tolmixtalb xu nedhantsal an kidhblbtsik xi Jerusaln, ka bachwat alwa.
45015032	Max na Dios anchan tin l, neech kin ulich kijidh ani neech kin koych tachan kal tattsik.
45015033	Ke na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.
45016001	Tu punkuntsaltsik ka bachu ani ka tolmiy an kidhblb xin bij Febe. Jech an mmlb, kwajat in tjontsal an belomtsik xu kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Senkrea.
45016002	Ka bachutsik tin bij an Ajtiklb, jelt xan ti yejat ka bachwat kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Ka tolmiytsik kal xowakich kin yntsi, pos jaj ynich tajat xita in tolmiymal, asta nan neye tin tolmiymal.
45016003	Ka chapndhatsik na Prisila ani na Akila, xi tin tolmiyaltsik ku tjontsi na Kristo Jess.
45016004	Jajtsik yab in ajymal tinb abal ti kin tolmiy; jaxtm tu pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb. Yab tokot nanki, u pidhnal jeye ti jalbintsixtalb kal ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.
45016005	Ka chapndhatsik jeye an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim na Prisila ani na Akila. Ti kin chapndhantsi an ta Epeneto, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat. Jech an kidhblb u kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Akaya ani jaich xin jidhtal tajat in bela na Kristo.
45016006	Ka chapndha na Mara, xi tjnkich tajat kal tattsik.
45016007	Ka chapndhatsik nu at kidhtaltsik xin bij ta Andrniko ani ta Junias, xu kwajinek junax ban wikaxte. Jajtsik u kanidhbtsik tajat, u abatwletsik ani okox tin belmaltsik na Kristo k nan.
45016008	Ka chapndha na Amplias, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat abal in bellich an Ajtiklb.
45016009	Ka chapndha na Urbano, an kidhblb xi tu tolmiyal ki tjontsi na Kristo Jess ani na Estakis jeye, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat.
45016010	Ka chapndha na Apeles, xi tsubax lejtal tin bell na Kristo. Ka chapndhatsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Aristbulo.
45016011	Ka chapndha nu at kidhtal xin bij ta Erodin. Ka chapndhatsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Narsiso xin bellichtsik an Ajtiklb.
45016012	Ka chapndhatsik na Trifena ani na Trifosa, xi kwajat in tjontsaltsik chapik an Ajtiklb. Ka chapndha an kidhblb Prsida, an mmlb xin tjontsmalich tajat an Ajtiklb.
45016013	Ka chapndha na Rufo, an kidhblb xi takudh abal kin bela an Ajtiklb. Ka chapndha jeye nin nna, xi kwajat jelti max u nna neye.
45016014	Ka chapndhatsik na Asnkrito, na Flegonte, na Ermas, na Patrobas, na Ermes ani an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat kal jajtsik.
45016015	Ka chapndhatsik na Fillogo, na Julia, na Nereo ani nin ixm; ka chapndha jeye na Olimpas ani ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xi kwajat kal jajtsik.
45016016	Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb. Ejtal xin bellichtsik na Kristo, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
45016017	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhl abal ka chuutsik xitam j nin tajltsik i kxtalb ani in tajl ke taltsik kin jila kin bela an tsubaxtalb xi tattsik i oktsidh. Yab ki junkun kal xin tajltsik anchan,
45016018	pos jech an atiklbtsik yab kwajat in tjontsal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Jajtsik tokot in tajl xowa jajki in kulbetnltsik ani in kambiyaltsik kal i labidh tilab an atiklbtsik xi yab u lej belom.
45016019	Kal ejtal ti chobte ke a tajltsik xan tin ulal nin kwintal na Dios; jaxtm tin kulbl ani u l ku chuu ka witatsik ms ka taja xowa alwa ani yab, xowa yab alwa.
45016020	Na Dios neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal ka okodh ta an lej atax. Jech na Dios, jaich nin pidhnl an kijidhtalb. Ka bachutsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
45016021	Ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb na Timoteo, an kidhblb xi tin tolmiyal kal jech an tojlb. Ti chapndhltsik jeye nu at kidhtal xin bij ta Lusio, na Jasn ani na Sospater.
45016022	Nan, xu bij Tersio, xin kwajbadh ku dhutsa jech an w, tu abtsal neye ti chapndhomtalb tin bij an Ajtiklb.
45016023	Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb an kidhblb xin bij Gayo. Jech na Gayo, jaich xi tin matintsmal jun i alt xon ti kin koych ani jaich jeye xin matintsal ti alt an kidhblbtsik tam u junkunal. Ti chapndhltsik jeye na Erasto, xin kool an punkuntsixtalb ti tapax tumn ba jech an bitsow. Ti chapndhltsik jeye an kidhblb xin bij Kwarto.
