45016024	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
45016025	Ani xo, ki pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios, xin ejtowal ti ki likedhantsitsik ta itsch abal yab ka jilatsik ta belom, jelt xan tin ulal an alwa tilab xi nan u lnl ani an tiltsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an alwa tilab, jaich xi na Dios in koolwiik chinat asta ti weje.
45016026	Por xo in pidhnmalich ka chobn kal an Tokat Dhuslab xin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik xantiki ti utsan kal na Dios xi kwajat ejat malill i kij. Jech xowa na Dios in koolwiik chinat, pidhnatsich xo ka chobn abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik kin bela ani kin taja xan tin ulal jech an alwa tilab.
45016027	Ke na Dios, xi junkax ani chalpadh, kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo! Anchan ka tjan.
46001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, in takudh abal kin kwajay tin abatwle kal na Jesukristo. Tin takuy na Dios kom Jaj anchan tin lena.
46001002	Nan ani an kidhblb Sstenes, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w xu kwajltsik Korinto xin bellich na Dios. Jechtsik u dhabalbich kal na Dios abal kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess. Takudhichtsik kal na Dios abal ka kwajch tokat junax kal ejtal xi kwajattsik tki tki xin tawnltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Jech na Jesukristo jaich ni Ajtik ani in Ajtiktsik jeye.
46001003	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
46001004	Echeki u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta jeye an lbtajaxtalb xi ti pidhltsik. Jech an lbtajaxtalb, ti pidhltsik na Dios kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.
46001005	Pos abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, na Dios ti pidhmalichtsik xowakichki ti alwatalb. Na Dios ti pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb abal ka ejtotsik ka exbantsi alwa an tin kwintal ani abal ka ejtotsik ka wila.
46001006	Anchan p, xowa u tilnal kal tin kwenta na Kristo, xalkankich ba tattsik abal tsubax.
46001007	Jaxtm ti ejtal a ejtowaltsik ka taja xowa in l na Dios. Jaich ka tajltsik lejat i kwajat a aytsm kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
46001008	Jaj jaich xi neech ti ki kontsitsik junini an ta chalab asta tin okontal an kij abal yab xita ti ki walbindha kal ni jun xata tam ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
46001009	Na Dios echeki in tajl xowa kin ulu. Jaj jaich xi ti kanymaltsik abal ki kwajch junax kal nin Chakmil Jesukristo, xi jaich ni Ajtik.
46001010	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo abal ka koytsik junini na chalab ani yab ki kwajay ta kxtsik. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, tokot ka koytsik juniniki na chalab.
46001011	Kidhblbtsik, u ulal jech kom tin tiltsmal xu kwajltsik bin kim na Klo ke a kyaltsik tajat i kxtalb.
46001012	Kal jech u l ku ulu, ke juntsik ta b keetich keetich xowa a ulaltsik; taltsik in ulal ench: “Nan u wwnl a Pablo”; taltsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Apolos”; xi keettsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Pedro”; ani xi keettsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Kristo.”
46001013	Awxe peje ti peje ti kwajat na Kristo? Awxe pajkiyat na Pablo ban peltsidh te abal tattsik ta alwabl? O i pujadhtsikxe tin bij na Pablo?
46001014	U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, ke nan yab u pujymal ni jun xita xi tattsik, tokot u pujymal na Krispo ani na Gayo;
46001015	pos anchan, yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke pujadh kal nan tu bij.
46001016	U pujymaltsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Estfanas, por yab u chalpayal max u pujymal jun xita ms.
46001017	Pos na Kristo yab tin abmal tin pjal. Tin abmal abal ku tila an alwa tilab, por yab kal i chalab xi techki ti kayl abal yab ka kale yab xata in jalbl an cheml xin watna na Kristo ban peltsidh te.
46001018	An atiklbtsik xi neech ban kibeltalb, in achltsik jelti max i tntotalb an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta nin chemtal na Kristo ban peltsidh te; por abal waw xu loenekich, i chobich ke jech an tsubaxtalb, in chp a Dios.
46001019	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech ku kibdhantsi tin chalpadhtal an chalpadhtsik, ani neech ku taxkantsi tin witomtal an witomtsik.
46001020	Jn xo ti kwajat an chalpadhtsik? Jn xo ti kwajat xin willtsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Jn xo ti kwajat xin witltsik kin kwlxna xowakichki xi tech ti kayl? Yabxe ojtsidh kal na Dios tin chalab an chalpadhtsik xi tech ti kayl?
46001021	Na Dios, xin chob xanty in tajl, yab in walka ka exl kal xi techtsik ti kayl kal jajkitsik tin kwetm chalab. Xowa Jaj in lena, jaich kin loo an belomtsik kal tin kwentaki nin chemtal na Kristo, maske jech xowa in taja na Dios, u chutb jelti jun i tntotalb.
46001022	An judotsik in l kin chuu i labidh exltsik ani an griegotsik in ayal i chalpadhtalb;
46001023	por waw i till a Kristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Abal an judotsik, jech jaich jelti jun i tamkuntalb abal yab ka loeytsik ani abal an griegotsik, in achl jelti jun i tntotalb.
46001024	Por abal xi takudhtsik kal na Dios, i judotsik o i griegotsik, na Kristo jaich nin chp ani nin chalpadhtal na Dios.
46001025	Pos xowa an iniktsik in chutal jelt in tonto chalbil a Dios, ms ja tekat an chalab k in chalab an iniktsik; ani xowa in chutaltsik yab likat, ms ja likat k nin chp an iniktsik.
46001026	Kidhblbtsik, yejat ka exbaytsik ke na Dios ti takwymaltsik maske w tajat xi chalpadhtsik, jelt xan tin ulal xi yabtsik u belom. W jeye xin kooltsik i awiltalb o u kidhtalbtsik kal i ultalb kidhtalb.
46001027	Por na Dios in takwymal xu chutbtsik yab chalpadh kal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal kin tidhebdha xi chalpadhtsik; ani in takwymal xu chutbtsik yab likdha kal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal kin tidhebdha xi likdhatsik.
46001028	Na Dios in takwymal xu chutb kal xi techtsik ti kayl ke yab xata in jalbl ani pojkantltsik. Na Dios in takwymal jechtsik abal kin kwajbantsi tin okontal xu usnal ke ultalbtsik.
46001029	Anchan, yab xita neech kin ejto kin teka tinb tin tamt na Dios.
46001030	Por Jaj tajat na Dios ti tajmaltsik ki kwajay kal na Kristo Jess. In tajmal jeye ke na Kristo ka kwajay jelti ni chalpadhtal ani ke kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios. Ku kwajch juniniki abal na Dios ani loenekich.
46001031	Anchan p, kom anchanich tu kwajat kal an Ajtiklb, ki tajlich jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Max jun xita in l kin teka tinb, kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.”
46002001	Kidhblbtsik, por tam ti nan in kale abal tu tiltsitsik tin tsubaxtalbil na Dios, yab in kwin jelt xan tu kw jun i chalpadh inik, nibal kal i tekdha tilabtsik.
46002002	Pos tam tin kwajay kal tattsik, yab xata u lena ms ku chobna, tokot na Jesukristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
46002003	Tam tin ulich kal tattsik abal tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, yab in likat ani in wipipl kal i jkib.
46002004	Ani tam tu tawnatsik ani tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, yab u lena tu tantsitsik ta ejattal kal i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw i chalpadh iniktsik abal ki belmch. Yab u taja anchan, tu tantsitsik an ta ejattal kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal nin chp a Dios.
46002005	Anchan tu taja abal na belomtal ka kwajay teykmte kal in chp na Dios ani yab kal in chalab i iniktsik.
46002006	Por kal an atiklbtsik xu belomich tajat, i ynl ja i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw i chalpadh iniktsik. Por jech an chalpadhtalb, yab j xi tech ti kayl, nibal in chalab i takixtsik xi tech ti kayl xu kibchonal.
46002007	Xowa waw i till, jaich chalpadhtal na Dios xi yab tejwa, xin kool chalpadh tam ti yabl in tajmal an kayl abal ki bachu an labidh tokattalb.
46002008	Ni jun i takix xi tech ti kayl yab in ejtmal kin exbay jech; pos max in exbaymalak, yabak in chemdhmaltsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te an labidh tokat Ajtiklb.
46002009	Por tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Na Dios in tojojoymal yn xata abal xi kltsik tu kaknb. Jech xowa in tojojoymal, yab xita in chumal, yab xita in achmal, nibal ela in chalpaymal.
46002010	Jech jaich xowa na Dios tu pidhmal ki chobna kal nin Tokat Ejattalki, pos an Tokat Ejattalb, ejtal in ejtowal kin chuu, asta xowa na Dios in kool ms chinat.
46002011	Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin chobna xanty waach bin itsch jun i inik, tokot an ejattalb xi kwajat ba jachan an inik. Anchan jeye, ni jun xita yab in chob xowa in kool chinat na Dios, tokot nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
46002012	Ani waw yab i bachmal an ejattalb xi tech ti kayl, i bachmal an Tokat Ejattalb xi tl ba na Dios abal ki chobna xanty tu pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatal.
46002013	Waw i till ejtal jech kal an tilabtsik xi tu oktsmal an Tokat Ejattalb, yab kal i tilabtsik xi witmal kal wawki ti kwetm chalab. Anchan ti wiltsaltsik xowa yab tejwa xin koolichtsik an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch.
46002014	Xita yab in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, yab in ejtowal kin bachu xowa tl bin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, pos jaj in chalpayal ke i tntotalb. Yab in ejtowal kin exbay, pos jech tokot in exbayal xita in koolich an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch.
46002015	Por xita in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, in ejtowal kin exbay xowakich. Ani yab xita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka utsan ke yab alwa xowa in tajl.
46002016	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Jita in exbaymal xowa in chalpayal an Okxlb? Jita neech kin ejto kin oktsi?” Por waw i kool nin chalab na Kristo.
46003001	Kidhblbtsik, yab u ejto tu tawnatsik jelt xita xin koolich an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, tokot tu tawnatsik jelt xita yab in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch. Tu tiltsitsik an ta Kristo jelt xan tin tomnl ka tiltsin i chakamtsik.
46003002	Tu oktsitsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo xowa xi yab lej tojlb, jelt xan ti jun i chakam u tsutsdhbki ani yab u pidhnal ti kapnl xin kapal xi pakdhaichtsik. Abal tam ti jachan, yab neech ka ejtotsik ka exbay xowa xi tojlb kal tin kwenta na Kristo, jelt xan ti jun i chakam yab jeye neech kin ejto kin kapu i kapnl xin kapal xi pakdhaich. Ani asta xo, yab a ejtotsik,
46003003	kom yabtsik bl a walkl ki takyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Max bl waach kal tattsik i txtalb, i pjxtalb ani i kxtalb, jaich abal yabtsik a walkl ki takyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani bl i kwajattsik jelt xan tu kwajl an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.
46003004	Abal tam jun xita kin ulu ench: “Nan u wwnl na Pablo” ani jn kin ulu: “Nan u wwnl na Apolos”, yabxe exomich a tajltsik jelti xi yabtsik in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch?
46003005	Pos, janty u y nan ani janty in y na Apolos? Waw i tjontsalki na Dios, ani kal waw ta tiltsintsik an ti tsubaxtalb abal ki belmch. Ani juntsik tu b, i taja an tojlb xantiki tu pidha ti awiltalb an Ajtiklb.
46003006	Nan tu tiltsitsik an ti tsubaxtalb jelt xan ti jun i m in tayl an iyalb, na Apolos ti tolmiytsik abal ka exbay jelt xan ti jun xita xin waktsal an tayablb; por na Dios jaich ti tajatsik ki belmch ms, jelt xan tin pakedhl an tayablb.
46003007	Jaxtm, nibal xu m, nibal xu waktsix, yab xata in y; pos na Dios jaich nin tajl ejtal, Jaj nin pubedhl an tayablb.
46003008	Xu m ani xu waktsix, u tojnalkitsik, maske juntsik ti b neech kin bachu tayl xowa in lujyal kal tin kwenta an tojlb xowa in tajmal.
46003009	Pos waw i tjontsalki na Dios ani tattsik, a junwal jelti an chabl xon ti na Dios exom ti tojnal. A junwaltsik jeye jelti jun i yejche at xi exom in kubl na Dios.
46003010	Nanich nin kwajat jelti an kbal at xi na Dios kal nin alwatal, tin walka ku kubtsi tin akan jech an at, ani keet exom in tekbl. Por juntsik tu b yejat ki chuu xan ti exom i tekbl jech an at.
46003011	Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin kwajbantsi keet tin akan k xi kwajbantsidhich. Jech xi kwajat jelti nin akan an at, jaich na Jesukristo.
46003012	Por neech ka ejtowat ka tekb jech an at kal i oro, kal i plata, kal i labidh tujubtsik, o kal i te, kal i kudhey ani kal i waynek chojl.
46003013	An tojlb xi jun xita kin taja, neech ka chutat max alwa; pos tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, kal i kamal ti neech ka chutat max alwa. Xowakich an tojlb xi jun xita in tajmal, kal i kamal ti neech ka chutat max alwa.
46003014	Max yab ka taay an tojlb xi jun xita in tajmal, neech kin bachu xowa in lujyal.
46003015	Por max ka taay xowa in tajmal, neech kin kibdha xowa in tajmal, maske jaj ka loey, jelti jun xita xu kalel adhik abal yab ka taay.
46003016	Yabxe a chobtsik ke a junwal jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ke nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, kwajat ba tattsik?
46003017	Max jun xita kin paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, jech xita kin taja anchan, neech ka kibdh kal na Dios; pos an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, tokat ani jachan an pulek at, jaich tatichtsik.
46003018	Yab xita kin kambiy tinb. Max jun xita in chalpayal ke chalpadh kal an chalpadhtalb xi tech ti kayl, kin taja jelti max yab xata in chob ani anchan, neech tm kin bajaw kin koy an chalpadhtalb xi tsubax.
46003019	An chalpadhtalb xi tech ti kayl, i tntotalb abal na Dios, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Dios in tajl ke an chalpadhtsik ka kwajl kal nin chalpadhtal.”
46003020	In ulal jeye: “An Okxlb in chob abal nin chalab an chalpadhtsik, yab xata in jalbl.”
46003021	Jaxtm, yab xita yejat kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta xita in wwnl; pos ejtal xowa waach, tattsik a dhabal.
46003022	Nan, na Apolos ani na Pedro, u dhabalb kal tattsik. An kayl, an xechintalb, an cheml, xi xo, xi tayl, ejtal tattsik a dhabal.
46003023	Ani tattsik, kal na Kristo ta dhabalbtsik ani na Kristo, kal a Dios tu dhabalb.
46004001	Jaxtm, an atiklbtsik yejat kin chalpay ke waw i tjontsal na Kristo ani u punkuntsidh abal ki tila xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios.
46004002	Pos alwaich, xin kool jun i punkuntsixtalb, yejat kin xalka ke neech lejtal kin taja xowa u punkuntsb.
46004003	Nan yab u dhl ti kwenta xanty ti kin chalpantsitsik, nibal xowa ti kin utsa jun i awiltalb xi tech ti kayl. Nibal in kwajat u tell tub.
46004004	Maske in kwajat tsububudh u itsch, jech yab in l kin ulu ke in lujatich tajat. An Ajtiklb jaich nin chob xan tin kwajat.
46004005	Jaxtm, yab ti kin okox chalpantsitsik max in alwa tojnal o yaba, ka aytsitsik asta ka tsch an Ajtiklb. Jaj, jaich xi neech kin xalka xowa kwajat chinat ban jikwaxtalb ani kin xalka xanty i chalpayal ti itsch. Jachan i kij, na Dios neech tm kin ulch max alwa o yab alwa xowa i tajmal.
46004006	Kidhblbtsik, tu tiltsaltsik jech abal tattsik ta alwabl, u kwajbl jelti ltsixtalb na Apolos ani nan neye. U ulal jech abal kal ni oktsixtalki, ka chobnatsik ke yab ms yejat xowa ka taja, tokot xowa kwajat dhutsadh ani abal ni jun xita yab kin teka tinb kal tin kwentaki xita in wwnl ani kin pojka keet.
46004007	Pos, jita ti tajl ki kwajay ms alwa k xi keettsik? Janty a kool ke yab kal a Dios ta pidhnk? Ani max Jaj ti pidhmal, jantki ta tekl tab jelti max xowa a kool tatki a bajmal ka koy ta kwetm chalab?
46004008	Xo i kwajatichtsik tajat alwa jelti max a kooltsik kidhat. A achltsik jelti max i pakdha takixich ani waw yabich tu tajl ti kij. I lak lejtal max i pakdha takixich abal ku takxin weye junax kal tattsik!
46004009	Pos u chutal ke waw xu kwajat tu abatwle, na Dios tu tajmal jelti max yab u lej uluts. I junwal jelt xita xi bijtsidhich ke neech ti chemdhb; i bajmalich ku kwajay jelti jun xata labidh xu telnal kl an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl. Anchan tu chutb kal an atiklbtsik ani kal an tokat abatwletsik.
46004010	U usnal ke waw yab u chalpadh abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo ani ke tattsik a exbayal xowakichki xi kal tin kwenta na Kristo. U usnal ke yab u likat ani ke tattsik, i likat tajat; waw u atnal kal an atiklbtsik ani tattsik i kaknb tajat.
46004011	Asta xo i watnl i kanab ani i tsiknib; i yntsal i kudhkmil, u atax tajtsinal, yab i kool i kim
46004012	ani u chekel tu tojnal kal ni kubak. U odhbijyb kal an atiklbtsik, por waw i lbtajltsik. U atnal, por i kuxyal.
46004013	U jantsinal ti kw, por waw yab u tknal kal i chkub. Asta xo, u tajnal jelti max u aml ani jelti max u jilkomastalb.
46004014	Yab tu dhutsuntsaltsik anchan abal tu tidhebdhatsik, tu dhutsuntsaltsik abal tu pidhatsik jun i takixtalb jelt u chakmiltsik xu kanidhl tajat.
46004015	Maske tattsik ka koy lju i mil i oktsixtsik xi ti oktsitsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo, yab yn a ttatsik a kool. Kom nan tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an loeltalb, jyki max tin ttatsik kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xa kooltsik ba na Kristo Jess.
46004016	Anchan p, tu pakabdhltsik abal ti kin wwnantsi an tu oktsixtal.
46004017	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu abtsaltsik an ta Timoteo, xu kanidhl tajat ani u chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta abal i bellich an Ajtiklb. Jaj, neech ti ki chalpantsitsik xan tin kwajl neye abal u bellich na Kristo, anchan xan tin oktsix putlki xon ti waach i belomtsik.
46004018	Taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, in tekltsik tajat tinb abal in chalpayal ke yabich neech kin kale tu lnatsik.
46004019	Por u chalpayal kin kale jikat tu lnatsik, max an Ajtiklb anchan tin l. Neech tm ku chuu xanty in ejtowaltsik kin taja jachan xin tekltsik tajat tinb ani yab tokotki xowa in ulaltsik.
46004020	Pos xan tu takix na Dios, yab kal i tilabki; u takix kal in chp.
46004021	Janty a kulbetnltsik ms? Kin kale tu lna abal tu kwiyatsik, o kin kale tu lna abal tu tawnatsik kal i kanidhaxtalb ani i chaattalb?
46005001	U tilnal ke jn ti b xi tattsik, in kool tin tomtal nin chab nna. Jech jaich jun i walastalb plek ke nibal ela tomnl ka tajan kal xi yabtsik in exll na Dios.
46005002	Maske anchan ta kwajattsik, blki tajat a tekltsik tab! Yabxe ms in tomnl ki kwajaytsik i tepinal jelti max chemnek jun xita? An inik xin tajmal jech, yabich yejat ka walkatsik ka junkun kal tattsik.
46005003	Maske yab in kwajat nan tajat kal tattsik, in kwajat kal u ejattalki; ani u ulmalich abal walats xowa in tajl jachan an inik, jelti max ta tin kwajat kal tattsik.
46005004	Tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ki junkun tatkitsik ani nan neech neye kin kwajay kal tattsik kal nu ejattalki. Kal tin chp an Ajtiklb Jesukristo,
46005005	ka pidhnatsik jachan an inik ban lej atax abal ka yajlombdhantsat tin tul ani yabich kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul. Max kin jila kin taja jech an walastalb, neech tm ka lowat tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb Jess.
46005006	Yab in tomnl ka tekatsik tab abal a chalpayaltsik ke i tokat. Yabxe a chobtsik ke w i jilbdhaxtalb koye in jilbdhl yn i koye max ka xukyat?
46005007	Ka ajatsik p jachan an inik xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ki kwajaytsik i tokat jelti an t koye. Tattsik a junwal jelti an pan xi yab u jilbdhb xu kapnal tam u ajbnb an paskwa. Na Kristo chemdh abal ka pikb kal waw ti kwenta. Jaj in junwal jelti an borrego xin chemdhl an israelitatsik tam in ajbnl an paskwa.
46005008	Jaxtm ti yejatich ki ajbna an paskwa kal i lujattalb ani i tsubaxtalb, xin junwal jelti an pan xi yab jilbdhats; yab ki ajbna kal i ataxtalb nibal kal xowa yab alwa, xin junwal jelti an weje jilbdhaxtalb koye.
46005009	Ban jidhtal dhutsadh w xi tu abtsitsik, tu utsa abal yab ki junkun kal xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal.
46005010	Yab exom tu utsltsik ke yabich ki junkun kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom xi kwajattsik tech ti kayl, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xi chenetsik, xu kwtsik, o xin kaknltsik i chilab. Yab jaich exom tu utsltsik, pos abal yabich tajat ki junkun kal jajtsik, kool ki wkontsik tech ti kayl.
46005011	Xowa tu utsltsik, jaich ke yab ki junkun kal xin ulal ke u kidhblb ani u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal, chene, in kaknl i chilab, tilma, u uchal ani u kw. Kal xi anchan ti kwajat, yab yejat nibal ki kapch kal jaj.
46005012	Pos yab nan u lujyal ku chuu xanty in tajl xi yabtsik u belom, kal na Dios ti neech ka ljundhtsik. Por tattsik, kool ka chuu xanty in tajl xu belomtsik. Jaxtm, ka aja jachan an walablom xi kwajat kal tattsik.
46006001	Tam jun xita xi tattsik ka waltsin ani kool ka kale ti utsbix, jantki tu kalel ti utsbix ba jun i awiltalb xi yab u belom? Jantki ti yab in konyal ka tajtsin ti lejkintalb kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios?
46006002	Yabxe a chobtsik ke xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, jaich neech kin ljundha an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom? Ani max an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tattsik neech ka ljundha, yabxe neech ka ejtotsik ka lejkiy xowa yab lej kalpidh tojlb?
46006003	Yabxe a chobtsik ke waw xu dhabalbich kal na Dios, neech ki ljundha an tokat abatwletsik? Pos max anchan, neech ki ejto ki lejkiy xowakichki xi tech ti kayl!
46006004	Pos max a pjxnltsik jun xata tech ti kayl, jantki ta kwajbltsik kin lejkiy xi yabtsik u belom?
46006005	Jech u ulal abal ki tidhebtsik. Awxe yab waach ni jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal xi neech kin ejto kin lejkiy jun xata kal nin at kidhbtsik?
46006006	Awxe in tomnl ke jun i kidhblb ka kale kin utsbiy in at kidhb ba jun i awiltalb xi yab u belom?
46006007	Pos max i pjxtsik kal na at kidhb, walatsich xowa a tajltsik. Yabxe ms alwa ka kuxuy max i atax tajtsinaltsik? Yabxe ms alwa ka kuxuy max i kwybtsik?
46006008	Por tattsik yab anchan ta tajl, tokot a tajtsaltsik xowa yab alwa ani a kwyaltsik na at kidhb.
46006009	Yabxe a chobtsik ke xin tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios? Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik, pos yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, xu xechinaltsik yab exbadh, xin kaknltsik i chilab, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, i iniktsik xu junkunal kal in at inik ani i uxumtsik xu junkunal kal in at uxum. Yab jeye neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, an kwtsik, an chenetsik, an uchltsik, an odhbijixtsik ani an kambixtsik.
46006011	Anchanwiik ti kwajat taltsik xi tattsik; por xo, i pakwlantsidhichtsik ani i tokodhichtsik. I kwajbadhichtsik alwa kal na Dios tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess ani kal nin Tokat Ejattal ni Diosil.
46006012	Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal alwa. Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab neech ku walka ti kin ta xowa u tajl.
46006013	An kapnl jaich abal ni tsukul ani ni tsukul abal an kapnl; por chablam jech, neech kin wixka na Dios. Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti tul, por yab abal ku kwajay yab exbadh. Tu pidhmal an ti tul abal ki ejto ki tjontsi kl an Ajtiklb; ani an Ajtiklb, jaich tu belkmtsal an ti tul.
46006014	Ani anchan xan ti na Dios tin ejdha ti t an Ajtiklb, anchan weye ti neech ti ku ejdha ti t kal nin chp.
46006015	Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni tul kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo? Awxe alwa ku ntsi jun peje tin tul na Kristo abal ku chatbiy kal in tul jun i junkux inik uxum? Yaba!
46006016	O yab a chobtsik ke tam jun i inik ka junkun kal jun i junkux inik uxum, jech chablam jnkijich in tul tu ynal? Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
46006017	Por xita kwajatich kal an Ajtiklb, xi jech chb, jnkijich in ejattal tu ynal.
46006018	Yabtsik p ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal. Xowakichki i walastalb xi kin taja jun xita, yab in waltsal nin tul; por xita xu junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal, in waltsal nin tul.
46006019	Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni tul yab waw i dhabal? Jech ni tul kwajat jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xon tu kwajl jeye an Tokat Ejattalb. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba ni itsch, a Dios tu pidhmal.
46006020	Pos kajbidh tu chaidh kal na Dios. Jaxtm, yejat ki kakna na Dios kal ni tul ani kal ni ejattal abal chablam jech, kal a Dios tu dhabalb.
46007001	Kal tin kwenta an konoxtalb xi tin tajtsitsik tam tin abtsi an dhutsadh w, neech tu utsatsik. Alwa tajat max jun i inik yab ka tomkin;
46007002	por kom waach tajat xin kulbetnltsik ka xechin yab exbadh, jaxtm ti ms alwa ka tomkin an iniktsik ani an mmlbtsik.
46007003	An inik xi tomkidh, yejat ka kwajay alwa kal nin tomtal. Ani an mmlb xi tomkidh, yejat ka kwajay alwa kal nin tomkl.
46007004	An mmlb xi tomkidh, yabich jaj in dhabal nin tul, u dhabalb kal nin tomkl. Anl jeye, an inik xi tomkidh, yabich jeye jaj in dhabal nin tul, u dhabalb kal nin tomtal.
46007005	Yab ki kejtsikmtsik kal na tomtal. Ki kejtsikmtsik, max ka tajatsik i kw ke yab neech ki junkun w i kij abal jachan an kij, ka ynatsik abal ka ntsi ta l. Tayl ki junkuntsik jun abal t yab ka kuxuytsik ani ti ki walbindhatsik an lej atax.
46007006	Jech an takixtalb tu pidhltsik kal nanki tu kwetm chalab, yab in takixtal an Ajtiklb.
46007007	Nan u lak max ejtal ka kwajaytsik jelti nan; por na Dios keetich keetich tin pidhmaltsik an ti awiltalb, taltsik in pidhmal ti awiltalb ka tomkin ani taltsik, in pidhmal ti awiltalb abal kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm.
46007008	An kwetm iniktsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, u utsltsik abal alwa tajat max yab ka tomkintsik.
46007009	Por max yabtsik in achl neech kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm, awil ka tomkin; pos ms alwa ka tomkin k ka kwajay in kuxyalki.
46007010	An mmlbtsik xi tomkidh, u utsltsik abal yab kin jila nin tomkl. Jech an takixtalb, yab nanki u kldhmal tu kwetm chalab, in ulal an Ajtiklb.
46007011	Por max jun i mmlb xi tomkidh kin jila nin tomkl, yab yejat ka tomkin ti t ani max yab in l ka kwajay kwetm, ka pkwlntsxin ani ka junkuntsik jun. Anchan jeye, an inik xi tomkidh, yab jeye yejat kin jila nin tomtal.
46007012	Xi keettsik u utsltsik jech kal nanki tu kwetm chalab, yab kal tin takixtal an Ajtiklb. Max jun i inik xu belom in kool in tomtal yab u belom, por kwajat alwa kal jaj, yab yejat kin jila.
46007013	Ani max jun i mmlb xu belom in kool in tomkl yab u belom, por kwajat alwa kal jaj, yab yejat kin jila.
46007014	Pos an inik xi yab u belom, neech ka tolmiyat ka belmch kal nin tomtal; ani an mmlb xi yab u belom, neech ka tolmiyat ka belmch kal nin tomkl. Max yabak anchan, nin chakmiltsik neech kin junu jelti xi yabtsik u belom; por xo, kwajattsik tokodh kal na Dios.
46007015	Por max in l ti jilax xi yab u belom, awil ka jilxin. Pos yab yejat ka kwajay junax kal i chplb an mmlb o an inik xu belom, pos na Dios tu kanymal abal ku kwajay kijidh.
46007016	Pos mmlb xi belom, a chobxe max neech ka ejto ka tolmiy ka loey na tomkl? O inik xi belom, a chobxe max neech ka ejto ka tolmiy ka loey na tomtal?
46007017	Juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajay xantiki ti pidhmal ki kwajay an Ajtiklb ani anchan xan ta kwajatwiik tam ti na Dios ti kaniy. Jech jaich u takixnl putlki xon ti waach i belomtsik.
46007018	Max na Dios kin kaniy jun xita xin kool an exl bin tul, yejat ka kwajay anchan ani max kin kaniy jun xita xi yab in kool an exl bin tul, yab yejat kin taja an exl bin tul.
46007019	Yab xata tu ynal max in kool an exl bin tul o yaba; xowa na yejat, kin tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
46007020	Juntsik ta b, yejat ki kwajay anchan xan ta kwajattsikwiik tam ti na Dios ti kaniy.
46007021	Max i jolib ta kwajat, yab ki kwajay ta chalpax; por max ka ela xan ti ka uwa abal ka ejto teye ki kwajay yab i jolib, awil ka jila ta jolib.
46007022	Pos xi kwajat ti jolib tam ti kanyat abal kin belaich an Ajtiklb, xo kwajatich walkadh abal in bellich an Ajtiklb; anchan jeye, xi yab u jolib tam ti kanyat abal kin belaich an Ajtiklb, xo u jolibich abal na Kristo.
46007023	Na Dios kajbidh ti chaymaltsik; yab ki kwajaytsik ta jolib abal an atiklbtsik.
46007024	Kidhblbtsik, juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajay jelt xan ta kwajatwiik tam ta kanyattsik kal na Dios.
46007025	Kal tin kwenta xi yab tomkinktsik, yab u kool ni jun i takixtalb xi tl ban Ajtiklb. Kom u bajmalich neye kin kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal an Ajtiklb ani u chalpayal abal in tomnl neye kin beltsin, neech neye ku ulu xowa u chalpayal kal jech tin kwenta.
46007026	Nan u chalpayal ke ms alwa max an inik yab ka tomkin kal tin kwenta an yajtsiktalb xi waach jech i kij.
46007027	Max i tomkidhich ta kwajat, yab ki jlxin. Ani max yab i tomkidh, yab ki tomkin.
46007028	Por max jun i kwitl ka tomkin, yab walats. Ani max jun i tsidhan ka tomkin, yab jeye walats xowa in tajl. Por xu tomkinaltsik, neech kin watna i yajtsiktalb ba jech an xechintalb ani nan u lak ku chuu max yab ka tomkintsik abal yab kin watnatsik jech an yajtsiktalb.
46007029	Kidhblbtsik, neech tu utsatsik jech: Wich tajat an kij i kool. Jaxtm, xita kwajattsik tomkidh, yejat ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab tomkidh.
46007030	Kom wich tajat an kij i kool, xu uknaltsik, yejat ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab u uknal; xu kulbltsik, jelti max yabtsik u kulbl ani xu chaumtsik, jelti max yab jajtsik in dhabal xowa in chaymal.
46007031	Xita in kulbetnltsik xowa waach tech ti kayl, ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab in kulbetnltsik; pos ejtal xowa waach tech ti kayl, neech ka taley.
46007032	U lak ku chuu max yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal ni jun xata. Tam jun i inik yab tomkidh, tokot in chalpm kin tjontsi ani kin taja xowa in l an Ajtiklb.
46007033	Por xi tomkidh, in chalpm tokot xowakich xi tech ti kayl ani xan ti kin kulbdha nin tomtal.
46007034	Anchan jeye u tmnal kal an mmlb xi tomkidh ani kal an tsidhan. An tsidhan, tokot in chalpm kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb abal ka kwajay tokat nin tul ani nin ejattal; por xi tomkidh, tokot in chalpm xowakich xi tech ti kayl ani xan ti kin kulbdha nin tomkl.
46007035	Tu utsltsik jech abal tattsik ta alwabl, yab abal nanki u l ku chuu yab ki tomkintsik. Jech tu utsltsik abal ka taja xowa alwa ani lujat. Ani abal ka ejtotsik ka exla ms alwa an Ajtiklb.
46007036	Por max jun xita in kool jun in tsidhnil ani in chalpayal abal exomich ti watel in tambil abal ka tomkin ani in chalpayal ke yejat kin tomkiy, yab walats max kin tomkiy.
46007037	Anl jeye, max jun xita in kool jun in tsidhnil ani in chalpaymalich junax ke ms alwa yab ka tomkin an tsidhan, alwa max yab kin tomkiy.
46007038	Jaxtm, xin pidhnl nin tsidhnil abal ka tomkin, alwa xowa in tajl. Ani xi yab kin pidhna, ms alwa xowa in tajl.
46007039	An mmlb xi tomkidh, u kyb kal an takixtalb jelti max wikats bin tomkl, lejat nin tomkl kwajat ejat; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb awil ka tomkin ti t xita kl kin lena, tokot yejat kin chuu ke jachan an inik, u belom jeye.
46007040	Por nan u ulal ke ms kijidh neech ka kwajay an mmlb max yabich ka tomkin ti t. Anchan tu ulal kom u chalpayal ke u koolich tu itsch nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
46008001	Kal tin kwenta an kapnl xu pikbantsb an chilabtsik, u chalpayal abal i chobich xanty yejat ki taja. An chalpadhtalb kal tin kwenta jech an kapnl, tu tajl ki teka tib, por an kanidhaxtalb, tu tolmiyal abal ku belmch ms.
46008002	Ani max jun xita in chalpayal ke in chob jun xata, yabl in bajmal kin chobna xan ti yejat kin chobna.
46008003	Por max jun xita in kaknl na Dios, u exlb kal na Dios.
46008004	Kal tin kwenta an konoxtalb xi tin tajtsitsik max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat an kapnl xu pikbantsb an chilabtsik, neech tu utsatsik. Jun i chilab xu kaknb jelti a Dios, yab xata in y tech ti kayl. Pos i chobich ke jn tokot a Dios waach.
46008005	Maske waach ban walki ani ban chabl taltsik xu bijyb ti diostsik (jelt xan ti chobich ke yn i diostsik ani i ajtiklbtsik waach),
46008006	abal waw, jn tokot a Dios waach. Jech na Dios, jaich an Ttalb xon ti tl ejtal xowa waach ani waw, taja weye tu tl. Jn jeye tokot i Ajtiklb waach, xi jaich na Jesukristo. Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xin tajmal ejtal xowa waach, asta waw weye.
46008007	Por yab ejtalki in chob jech. Taltsik, xin kaknlwiik an chilabtsik, in kapaltsik an kapnl jelti max pikbantsidh an chilabtsik; ani kom yabtsik u lej belom, in chalpayaltsik ke u walbinal kal xowa in kapal.
46008008	An kapnl yab in tajl abal ku kwajch ms kunat kal na Dios; pos yab neech ki ejto ki tokedha ms tib max ku kapch, nibal neech ki walbindha tib max yab ku kapch.
46008009	Por ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka walbindha xi yabtsik u lej belom, pos a chobichtsik ke an kapnl yab tu tokedhl nibal tu walbindhl.
46008010	Pos ka achatsik jech. Max tat xa chob jech, ki buxkan ta kapul xon tu pikbantsb xata an chilabtsik ani ki chutat taja kal jun i kidhblb xi yabl u lej belom, yabxe neech kin lena jeye kin kapu xowa u pikbantsb an chilabtsik?
46008011	Ani anchan, tat xa chobich ke an kapnl yab tu tokwal nibal tu waltsal, a tajlich ka kibchon na at kidhb xi yabl u lej belom. Pos na Kristo chemech abal ka loey jeye jech an kidhblb.
46008012	Pos anchan, tam ka ojtsitsik an tin chalab an kidhblbtsik xi yabl u lej belom, a waltsalich na Kristo.
46008013	Jaxtm, max u walbindhl nu at kidhb kal tin kwentaki xowa u kapal, ms xna alwa ke yabich jayki ku kapu i tulek abal yab ku walbindha.
46009001	Nan yab in kwajat taknl kal i iniktsik, u kool i awiltalb xin kool jun i abatwle. Pos u chumal na Jess ni Ajtik ani tattsik a xalklich abal in kwajat u tjontsal an Ajtiklb.
46009002	Max taltsik yab tin chutal tin abatwle, abal tattsik in abatwle; pos kom tattsik a bellich an Ajtiklb, jaich nin xalkl ke nan tsubax lejtal in abatwle.
46009003	Jech jaich xowa neech ku utsa xi tin kawyaltsik:
46009004	Yabxe in tomnl ku kapundh ani ku pidhan xowa ki ucha kal an belomtsik?
46009005	Yabxe in tomnl ku tomkin weye kal jun i mmlb xu belom jelti xi keet an abatwletsik, nin kidhbtsik an Ajtiklb ani na Pedro?
46009006	O a chalpayaltsik ke tokot nan ani na Bernab yab yejat ku koych tu tojnal?
46009007	Jita kwajat ti soldado ani jaj in chayal ejtal xowa in yntsal? Jita in tayl i uba ani yab in kaptsal tin wall? Jita in beletnl i borregotsik ani yab in uchl i leche xin watsal?
46009008	Nankixe tu kwetm chalab tu ulal jech? Yabxe jaich in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss?
46009009	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal ench: “Yab ka busliy an konl xi exom ti kwdhal.” Na Dios yab in ulmal jech abal tin alwabl an konltsik,
46009010	jech tin ulal abal ki chobna ke xi xeech in till an alwa tilab, yejat ka tolmintsat kal xin tiltsaltsik. Anchan jelt xan ti jun xita u tojnal bin ale in aytsm ka labey xowa in tayl.
46009011	Max waw i tilmal an alwa tilab ba tattsik, yabxe in tomnl ti ku pidha weye xowa i yntsal tech ti chabl?
46009012	Max a tolmiyaltsik xi keet, xi xeechtsik in till an alwa tilab, yabxe ms in tomnl ti ku tolmiy waw? Por yab i tajmal anchan, tokot exom i kuxyal ejtal abal ka belan nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.
46009013	Yabxe a chobtsik ke xu tojnal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ke tajaich jeye tu kalel abal ka kapch? O yabxe a chobtsik ke xu tojnal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, jachich jeye in kapal xowa u pikbantsb na Dios?
46009014	Anchan jeye, an Ajtiklb in ulu ench: Xita xeech in till an alwa tilab, taja jeye ti yejat ka kale abal ka kapch.
46009015	Por nan yab jayki u tajmal anchan kal tattsik, nibal exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech abal ka tajatsik anchan kal nan. Ms alwa kin chemech k ti kin kntsi jun xita jech an kijidhtalb xu kool!
46009016	Pos nan yab u achl ku teka tub abalki in xeech u till an alwa tilab, pos yejat ku tila. Chojontl u chubl max yab ku tila jech an alwa tilab!
46009017	Jaxtm, max u tajl jech kal yantam u kulbtal, neech ku bachu an jalbixtalb; por max u tajl kal i chplb, blki jaich jun i punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios.
46009018	Anchan p, an jalbixtalb xu bachwal, jaich an kulbtalb xu achl abal in xeech u till jech an alwa tilab ani yab in tlom. Neech ku ejto ku konoy kin tolmiyat abal in xeech u till an alwa tilab, por yab u tajl anchan.
46009019	Maske yab in kwajat taknl kal i iniktsik, u lenmal ku tjontsitsik abal ku ejto ku taja ke yn kin belatsik na Kristo.
46009020	Tam in kwajat ban judotsik, in wenkonal jelti an judotsik, abal ku ejto ku taja ka belmchtsik. Tam in kwajat kal xi taknltsik kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kwajl jelti jajtsik, abal ku ejto ku taja ka belmchtsik. Maske nan yab in taknl kal jech an takixtalb.
46009021	Tam in kwajat kal xi yab taknltsik kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kwajl jelti jajtsik abal ku taja ka belmchtsik. Maske in kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios, abal in kwajatich bin takixtal na Kristo.
46009022	Tam in kwajat kal xi yab u lej belomtsik, in kwajl jelti jajtsik abal ku tajatsik ka belmch ms. Kal ejtalki in kwajl jelt xan tu kwajltsik abal ku ejto ku tiltsi taltsik xan ti neech ka loey.
46009023	Ejtal jech u tajl kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab abal ku bachu neye an alwatalb xin kool jech an alwa tilab.
46009024	Tattsik a chobich ke tam an ubttsik u dhil abal ti tx, ejtaltsik u dhil; por jn tokot xi neech kin ta xowa u tb. Ki jlchtsik p abal ka ejtotsik ka bachu xowa u tb.
46009025	Ejtal xu exbaltsik abal ti tx ba jun i ubtnich, yab in tajl xata xowa in chalpayal ke neech ka waltsin kl. Jajtsik in tajl anchan abal kin ejto kin ta jun i kwetsotsl dhipadh chojl xu kachel. Por waw i tajl an chplb abal ki ta jun xata xi yab jayki neech ka kachey.
46009026	Nan, yab in dhil jelti max mututsik u wal; yab in knx jelti max in kwajat u wiwl nu kubak aniki.
46009027	Yab u tajl anchan, nan u yajlombdhl tub ani in kwajl tin tjontsix, kom yab u l ke tayl, ka kale yab xata in jalbl nu tojlbil.
46010001	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik, ke ni weje pakliltsik kwajinek tin l jachan an tokow ani ejtaltsik in watna an Chak Pujal.
46010002	Anchan, jelti max pujyattsik ejtal ban tokow ani ban pujal junax kal na Moiss.
46010003	Ejtaltsik jeye in kapu an kapnl xi tsch walki.
46010004	Ani ejtaltsik in ucha an ja xi kldhantsat ban tujub kal na Dios. Pos in uchmaltsik an ja xi kldhantsat kal na Dios ban tujub xi kl ti wewkmtetsik. Jech an tujub, jaich na Kristo.
46010005	Por yn an israelitatsik yab in taja xowa in l na Dios ani jaxtm ti jilkontsik chemnek ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
46010006	Ejtal jech, tmun jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal waw abal yab ki ltendha xowakich xi yab alwa, jelt xan ti jajtsik in ltendha.
46010007	Yab ka kaknatsik i chilab jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik, xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “An atiklbtsik buxkan ti kapul ani ti uchal ani tayl, in tajatsik i ajib.”
46010008	Yab ku junkun kal xi yab i tomtal, jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemech jun inik ox mil i atiklbtsik xi jnki a kts.
46010009	Yab ki taktamiy an Okxlb jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemech chikadh kal i chan.
46010010	Nibal ki itixbtsik kal na Dios jelt xan tin tajmal taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemdhtsik kal an abatwle xu chemdhax.
46010011	Ejtal jech xowa in tamu ni weje pakliltsik, tmun abal ka kwajay jelti jun i oktsixtalb. Ani kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab abal ti ku tawna, waw xu kwajat jech tin okontalich an kij.
46010012	Anchan p, xin chalpayal ke kwajat alwa kal na Dios, kin koy tajat i kwenta abal yab kin wala.
46010013	An taktamixtalb xa achltsik, jaychki an taktamixtalb xin achl xitakichki. Por yejat ka belatsik na Dios, pos Jaj yab neech kin walka ka koytsik ms plek i taktamixtalb, tokotki xowa neech ka ejto ka kuxuytsik. Tam ki taktamiyat, na Dios neech ti ki ltsi xan ti ka uwa abal ka watna ani ka ejto ka kuxuy jech an taktamixtalb.
46010014	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhl tajat, yab ka kaknatsik i chilab.
46010015	Exom tu tawnl jelti atiklbtsik xi chalpadh ani ka chalpaytsik max alwa o yab alwa xowa tu utsltsik.
46010016	Tam i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an yajtsik uxnl, yabxe jaich abal ki junkulom ucha jech an yajtsik uxnl jelti nin xichl na Kristo? Ani an pan jeye xi pjchxnl, yabxe jaich abal ki junkulom kapu jelti nin tul na Kristo?
46010017	Jn tokot an pan xi muwal ani yn tu b ti kapal, ejtal waw yn tu b, por jelti max jn tokot tu kwajat, jelti nin tul na Kristo.
46010018	Ka chuu an atiklbtsik xi Israel; tam in kapaltsik xowa u pikbantsb na Dios, yabxe u junkunalich kal xon tu kwajbantsb ti pikbantsixtalb na Dios?
46010019	Yab exom u ulal ke an chilab in kool jeye in y, nibal exom u ulal ke an tulek xi pikbantsidh jun i chilab, ms alwa k keet i tulek.
46010020	Xowa exom u ulal, jaich ke tam xi yab in exlltsik na Dios in pikbl jun xata, in pikbantsal an atax ejattalbtsik ani yab a Dios. Yab u l ku chuu ka koytsik i junaxtalb kal an atax ejattalbtsik.
46010021	Yab neech ka ejto ka uxtsitsik an ti yajtsik uxnl xin pidhnl an Ajtiklb ani ka uxtsitsik jeye an ti yajtsik uxnl an atax ejattalbtsik. Yab neech ka ejto ki kapchtsik bin mesajil an Ajtiklb ani ki kapchtsik jeye bin mesajil an atax ejattalbtsik.
46010022	O a l ki chakdha an Ajtiklb? Awxe ms wa u likat k Jaj?
46010023	Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal alwa. Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal u tolmix abal kin belmch ms.
46010024	Ki taja xowa alwa abal tin alwabl xi keettsik, yab abal wawki ti alwabl.
46010025	Ka kaputsik xowakichki an tulek xu nujnal, yab ki kwajay ka konkomiy max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat;
46010026	pos an chabl ani ejtal xowa waach taja, kal an Ajtiklb tu dhabalb.
46010027	Max ki kanyat ta kapul kal jun xita xi yab u belom ani a ltsik ki kale, ka kaputsik ejtal xowa ki pidhan. Yab ki kwajaytsik ka konkomiy max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat.
46010028	Por max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Jech an tulek pikbantsidh an chilabtsik”, max anchan, yab ka kaputsik abal yab ka walbindha xin ulal anchan ani yab ka jilkon ti chalpax.
46010029	Exom u till xowa neech kin chalpay na jn, yab xowa tat neech ka chalpay. Pos jantki ti yejat ki exbantsi jun xita kal tin kwenta max alwa o yab alwa xowa i kapal?
46010030	Ani max u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa u kapal, jantki tin kawyb abal u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an kapnl?
46010031	Pos max i kapultsik, o a uchltsik xata, o a tajltsik keet xowa, ka taja ejtal abal tin kaknabl na Dios.
46010032	Yab ka tajatsik ka walbin an judotsik, nibal xi yabtsik u judo, nibal xin bellichtsik na Dios.
46010033	Anchan neye nan, yab u tajl xowa yab in kulbetnl an atiklbtsik, nibal u tajl xowa nanki neech ti kin tolmintsi. U tajl xowa kl ti neech ka tolmintsat an atiklbtsik abal kin ejtotsik jeye ka loey.
46011001	Ki kwajaytsik teye jelt xan ti nan in kwajat, anchan xan ti nan in kwajat jelt xan ti kwajay na Kristo.
46011002	Kidhblbtsik, tu kaknltsik tajat abal echeki tin chalpayaltsik ani abal a ntsal ka wwnatsik an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik.
46011003	Por u l ka exbaytsik ke na Kristo, jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an inik; an inik, jelti nin k nin tomtal ani na Dios kwajat jelti nin k na Kristo.
46011004	Max jun i inik kin putsuy nin k tam u l o tam exom in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios, tidhetl abal jaj.
46011005	Por max jun i mmlb yab kin putsuy nin k tam u l o tam exom in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios, tidhetl abal jaj; in junwal jelti max kaxudh.
46011006	Max jun i mmlb yab kin putsuy nin k, tm, ms alwa ka kaxun. Por max in achl tidhetl ka kaxun o ka olin, kin putsuy nin k.
46011007	An inik yab yejat kin putsuy nin k, pos jaj in junwal jelt xan ti jeye na Dios ani u takix jeye jelt xan ti na Dios u takix. Kom an inik in takyal an mmlb, jaich tu xalkanal abal an inik in kool i awiltalb.
46011008	Pos tam ti na Dios in taja an inik, yab in kldha ban mmlb, an mmlb jaich na kldh ban inik.
46011009	Ani yab jeye tajan an inik abal tin kwenta an mmlb, an mmlb jaich na tajan abal tin kwenta an inik.
46011010	Jaxtm, an mmlb yejat kin putsuy nin k abal kin xalkantsi an tokat abatwletsik ke jaj kwajat taknl kal an inik.
46011011	Jaxtm, waw xi bellich an Ajtiklb, i chob ke an inik in yntsal an mmlb ani an mmlb in yntsal an inik.
46011012	Pos anchan xan ti an mmlb ban inik ti kldhats, anchan jeye, an inik ban mmlb tu wachinal, por ejtal jech, ba Dios ti tl.
46011013	Ka ulu tattsik max in tomnl ke an mmlbtsik ka lan yab putsudh in k.
46011014	Ni chalab tu utsl abal tidhetl ke jun i inik kin walka ka nakey nin xil.
46011015	Por labidh u xalkanal max jun i mmlb nakdha in xil; pos jaich ti pidhnk kin koy nakdha nin xil abal kin putsuy kl nin k.
46011016	Por max jun xita in l kin kwlxna jech, yejat kin chobna ke ejtal xin bellichtsik na Dios, i ujnmalich ke an mmlbtsik kin putsuy nin k tam u l ani tam in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios.
46011017	Por kal jech xowa neech tu utsatsik, yab jaich abal tu kldhatsik ta alwa, pos tam a kyaltsik an junkuntalb, yab i junkunaltsik abal ka taja xowa alwa, i junkunaltsik abal ka taja xowa yab alwa.
46011018	Pos jidhtal, neech tu utsatsik jech: In usnal ke tam ki junkuntsik ta l, u wachinal i kxtalb ani u chalpayal ke tsubax xna xowa in usnal.
46011019	Pos, in tomnl xna kejle ki kxintsik abal ka xalkan xita j na tsubax lejtal tu belom.
46011020	Xowa u tmnal kal jech an kxtalb, yabich i junkunaltsik abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb.
46011021	Pos tam i junkunaltsik abal ki kapch junini, xi keet u okxinal ti kapul ani lejat taltsik u jilkonal ti kal, taltsik asta u itelml.
46011022	Yabxe a kooltsik a kim xon ti ki kapch ani ki uchch? Tam a tajltsik anchan, a pojklichtsik xin bellich na Dios ani a tidhebdhlichtsik xi yab xata in kool. Janty yejat tu utsatsik? Yejatxe tu kldhatsik ta alwa abal a tajltsik anchan? Yaba!
46011023	Pos nan ban Ajtiklb tu bachmal jech an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik: Ke jachan i akal tam ti an Ajtiklb Jess pidhn abal ka chemdh, in tyna an pan
46011024	ani tam tin pidhmalich ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja ani in ulu ench: “Ka bachu ani ka kapu, jech jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna ka chemdh abal tattsik ta alwabl. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.”
46011025	Anchan jeye, tam ti okonich an kapch, in tyna jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl ani in ulu ench: “Jech an yajtsik uxnl, jaich nu xichl xi neech ku wakla ban peltsidh te. Kal tin kwenta nu xichl, na Dios neech kin taja jun i t lejkintalb kal an atiklbtsik. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.”
46011026	Jaxtm, tam a kapaltsik jech an pan ani tam a uchltsik jech an yajtsik uxnl, a chalpayaltsik xan ti chemdh an Ajtiklb. Ka tajltsik jech asta kin bajaw xowki ti ka tsch jun.
46011027	Anchan p, xita kin kapu an pan o kin ucha an yajtsik uxnl xin pidhnl an Ajtiklb ani yab kwajat alwa tin ejattal, in waltsalich nin tul ani nin xichl an Ajtiklb.
46011028	Jaxtm, xita neech kin kapu jech an pan ani kin ucha jech an yajtsik uxnl, yejat kin chalpay okox max kwajat alwa tin ejattal.
46011029	Xita kin ani kapuki jech an pan ani kin ani uchaki jech an yajtsik uxnl ani yab kin chalpay ke jaich nin tul an Ajtiklb, in kapal ani in uchl jech abal kin bachu i yajtsiktalb.
46011030	Jaxtm, yn xi tattsik a kidhtal u yaultsik, yn xi yabtsik likdha ani yn xi chemnekichtsik.
46011031	Por max waw ki chuu okox max u kwajat alwa ti ejattal, yab neech ku pidhan ti yajtsiktalb kal an Ajtiklb.
46011032	Por an Ajtiklb tu chutsal xowa i tajl ani max tu pidhl ti yajtsiktalb, jaich abal yab ku kale ban kibeltalb junax kal xi yabtsik u belom.
46011033	Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, tam ki junkuntsik abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb, ki ytsxintsik jn ani jn.
46011034	Max jun xita u kal, ka kapch okox tin kim abal yab ki walbintsik tam i junkunal abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb. Ejtal xowa bl u kibel ku lejkiy, neech ku lejkiy tam kin kale tu lnatsik.
46012001	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik ke juntsik tu b u pidhnk kal an Tokat Ejattalb ti awiltalb abal ki taja jun xata.
46012002	A chobtsik alwa ke tam ti yabl i belomtsik, a wwnltsik i chilab xi yab u kw.
46012003	Jaxtm, xo u l ka chobnatsik ke ni jun xita xin ulal ke “na Jess yab tajat i alwa inik”, kwajat ti kw kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Ani ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin ulu ke “na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb”, max yab kwajat ti kw kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
46012004	Keetich keetich an awiltalb xu pidhnal juntsik tu b, por an Tokat Ejattalb xin pidhnl an awiltalb, jn tokot.
46012005	Yn waach xan ti ki tjontsi an Ajtiklb, por an Ajtiklb, jn tokot.
46012006	Ani yn waach xan ti ki taja jech an tojlb, por na Dios, xi tu tolmiyal abal ki taja jech an tojlb, jn tokot.
46012007	Juntsik tu b u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal ki ejto ki taja xata ani kl tu xalkanal abal i koolich an Tokat Ejattalb ti itsch. Jech an awiltalb, tu pidhl abal tin alwabl ejtalki.
46012008	Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb, abal ka kwin kal i tekdha chalab. Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin exbay xowakichki, xantiki tin l an Tokat Ejattalb.
46012009	Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka belmch ms ani taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin jeldha i yaultsik.
46012010	Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb ani taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios. Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin exla i ejattalbtsik xi alwa ani xi yab alwa. Taltsik, u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb ani taltsik, u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin wila xowakichki i kwintalb.
46012011	Por ejtal jech, tokot Jajki an Tokat Ejattalb in tajl. Juntsik tu b, tu pidhl an ti awiltalb xan ti Jaj in l.
46012012	Anchan jelt xan ti ni tul yn i peje ti kwajat por jn tokot tu ynal, anchan jeye, ejtal waw xu belomich, jnki tokot tu ynal kom i bellich na Kristo.
46012013	Pos ejtal waw, maske u judo o u griego, u jolib o yaba, tam ku pujyatich, i bajwalich ku kwajay jelti max jnki tokot, kom jn tokot an Tokat Ejattalb ani ejtal waw, jaychki an Tokat Ejattalb i kool ti itsch.
46012014	Ni tul yn i peje ti kwajat, yab jnki.
46012015	Max ni akan kin ulu ke yab u kubaklek, kal jech, yab exom in ulal ke ni akan yab u kidhtalb kal ni tul.
46012016	O max ni xuchun kin ulu ke yab u walek, kal jech, yab exom in ulal ke ni xuchun yab u kidhtalb kal ni tul.
46012017	Pos max ejtalak ni tul u walek, jan ti neech ku ochxin? O max ejtalak ni tul u xuchunlek, jan ti neech ku jikxin?
46012018	Por na Dios in taja ni tul xan ti Jaj in lena.
46012019	Max jnkijak i peje ti kwajat ni tul, yab neech ka xalkan ke jaich in tul jun i inik.
46012020	Por xo, maske yn i peje in kool ni tul, jn tokot tu ynal.
46012021	Ni wal yab neech kin ejto kin utsa ni kubak ke yab in yntsal; nibal ni k yab neech kin ejto kin utsa ni akan ke yab in yntsal.
46012022	Yab anchan ti kwajat, nin pejtal ni tul xu xalkanal ms yab likat, jaich na ms i yntsal.
46012023	Nin pejtal ni tul xu xalkanal ke yab i lej yntsal, jaich ni kudhkumliyal ms alwa. Ani nin pejtal ni tul xi yab lej alabl, jaich na ms i beletnl alwa.
46012024	Nin pejtal ni tul xi alabl, jaich na ms yab i beletnl alwa. Anchan tin lejkiy na Dios ni tul abal xi yab i lej kanidhl, ka kwajay ms ultalb.
46012025	In taja anchan, abal yab ka wachin i kxtalb ba ni tul, tokot ka tlmxintsik jn ani jn.
46012026	Max jun peje ni tul in achl i yajtsiktalb, ejtal xi ms in achltsik jeye ani max jun peje ni tul u kaknb, ejtal xi ms u kulbltsik jeye.
46012027	Anchan jeye, ejtal waw xi bellich na Kristo, u kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani juntsik tu b i junwal jelti jun peje nin tul na Kristo.
46012028	Na Dios in takwymal taltsik ban belomtsik abal kin pidha ti awiltalb: Jidhtal, in kwajbmal i abatwletsik; in chabtal, i tiltsixtsik; in oxtal, xin oktsixnltsik nin kwintal na Dios. Taltsik in pidhmal ti awiltalb abal kin tajatsik i labidh labandhaxtalb ani taltsik abal kin jeldha i yaultsik. In jilmal jeye xu tolmixtsik, xu oklektsik ani xin bachmal i awiltalb ti kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
46012029	Yab ejtalki i abatwletsik, nibal ejtalki i tiltsixtsik. Yab ejtalki in oktsixnl nin kwintal na Dios, nibal ejtalki in ejtowal kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb.
46012030	Yab ejtalki in kool i awiltalb kin jeldha i yaultsik, nibal ejtalki in kool i awiltalb ti kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb. Yab ejtalki in ejtowal kin wila xowa in ulal jun xita tam ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
46012031	Pos ka aliytsik p xan ti ka uwa abal ka ejto ka bachutsik an awiltalb xi ms alwa. Xo, tu ltsaltsik jun i bl xi ms alwa.
46013001	Max u witlak tin kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb xi tech ti chabl ani xi walki, por yab in kanidhax, u junwal jelti nukub xu tenyb o jelti patl xu tsimbix.
46013002	Max u koolak i awiltalb ku lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, max u exbayalak ani u chobak ejtal xowa kwajat yab tejwa ani max in belomak tajat ke asta u utsl an chntsik ka yoyon, por yab in kanidhax, yab xata u y.
46013003	Max ku pidha ejtal xowa u kool an chojontltsik, o ku pidhna tub kin tsikan kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, por yab in kanidhax, ejtal jech, yab xata ti alwa.
46013004	Xita u kanidhax, in kool i chaattalb, alwa inik, yab in chakuntsal ni jun xita kal tin kwenta xowa in kool ani yab in tekl tinb.
46013005	In lujtalki u kw ani yab in ayal xata abal jajki tin alwabl; yab u chakulom nibal u jilkonal ti chakl max ka tajtsin xata yab alwa.
46013006	Yab u kulbl max kin chuu jun xita in wall, u kulbl tam kin chuu u tajnal xowa alwa.
46013007	Xita u kanidhax, in kontsal ti chaattalb xi keet; in bell xowa ka utsan ani in aytsal kin jila kin taja xowa yab alwa xi keettsik. In kuxyal jeye ejtal max ka tajtsin xata yab alwa.
46013008	An kanidhaxtalb yab jayki in kool in okontal. Neech kin bajaw an kij tam yabich neech ka ln i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, nibal xita neech ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb ani yabich jeye neech ka yntsin i chalpadhtalb.
46013009	Pos ejtal jech, w ti exll ani w jeye ti lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios;
46013010	por tam ki exlaich ejtal, xi w, neech ka wkon.
46013011	Tam ti nan in chipl, in kw, in chalpax ani u tajl xowakich jelti jun i chakam; por tam tin inikbch, u jila tu kx ejtal xowa u tajl tam tin chipl.
46013012	Anchan jeye, xo i tell na Dios, por jelti max yab i chutal alwa. I chutal jelti jun xata xu xalkanal ba jun i podhenek lam, por neech kin bajaw xowki neech ki chuu alwa. Xo tokot w u exll, por neech ku exla alwa, jelt xan ti na Dios tin exll nan.
46013013	Anchan p, an belomtalb, an aytsixtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, neech ka kwajay echeki; por xowa ms plek kal xi jech x, jaich an kanidhaxtalb.
46014001	Yab ka jilatsik ta kndhx jn ani jn ani ka kontsitsik na Dios ti ki pidha ti awiltalb abal ka ejto ka taja xowakichki. Ka kontsitsik ms abal ti ki pidha ti awiltalb ka ejto ka lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Jaj.
46014002	Xita u kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, a Dios in tawnl, yab i atiklbtsik; pos yab u exbantsb kal ni jun xita. Xowa in ulal, kal an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhnal kin ulu ani jaich xowa yabl tejwa.
46014003	Por xin lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, yab ja anchan; in tawnl xi keettsik abal kin tolmiy ka belmchtsik ms, abal kin takiytsik ani abal kin kijidhmdhatsik.
46014004	Xu kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, jajki in tolmiyal tinb abal ka belmch ms, por xin lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, in tolmiyal an belomtsik abal ka belmch ms.
46014005	Nan u lak ke ejtal tattsik ka koy i awiltalb ta kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, por ms u l ka koytsik i awiltalb abal ka lnatsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios. Ms alwa ka koytsik jech an awiltalb k ki kwintsik kal xowakichki i kwintalb. Alwa kejle ki kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb, por max neech ka wilan xanty a ulal; abal anchan, ka tolmiy an belomtsik ka belmch ms.
46014006	Kidhblbtsik, yab neech ti ki tolmiy max tu tawnatsik kal keet i kwintalb xi yab a exbayal tam kin kale tu lnatsik. Ms neech ti ki tolmiytsik, max tu tiltsitsik xowa tin xalkantsmal na Dios ani tu ltsitsik an ti tsubaxtalb. Neech jeye ti ki tolmiytsik max tu ltsitsik ti tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani max tu oktsitsik an tin kwintal na Dios. Ejtal jech, jaich neech ti ki tolmiytsik.
46014007	Ki kwajba ti oktsixtalb xowa u tenyb xi yab ejat, jelti an chl o an arpa; max yab ka tenyat xan ti yejat, yab xita neech kin exbay xanty u tenyb.
46014008	Tam waach i pjxtalb, max yab ka jutsyat an korneta xan ti yejat, yab xita neech ka tojojon abal ka kale ti pjx.
46014009	Anchan jeye u tmnal kal tattsik: max kal an kwintalb xa ynl, ka ulu i tilabtsik xi yab exbantl, jan ti neech ki exbantsat xanty i kwajat a ulaltsik? In junwal jelti max aniki i kwajat ta tilomtsik!
46014010	Yn i kwintalb waach tech ti kayl ani ejtal exbantl.
46014011	Por max yab u exbayal xan ti kwajat ti kw jun xita, abal nan, in junwal jelti max pl chabl ti tl ani jaj, anlki jeye ti neech ti kin chuu.
46014012	Anchan p, kom tattsik a l tajat ka bachu i awiltalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka ejto ka taja xowakichki, ka tajatsik an chplb abal ka ejto ka koy ms i awiltalb xowa kl ti ka ejto ka tolmiy ka belmch ms xu belomich.
46014013	Jaxtm, xita xu kw kal jun i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, kin kontsi na Dios abal ka pidhan ti awiltalb kin wila xowa in ulal kal jachan an kwintalb.
46014014	Pos max kin lan kal i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, u ejattalki u l, yab xata neech ku exbay.
46014015	Pos janty p tm yejat ku taja? Yejat kin lan kal nu ejattal, por ku exbay xanty u ulal. Yejat ku ajatna i ajatlbtsik kal nu ejattal, por ku exbay xanty u ajatnl.
46014016	Abal max i kwajat a pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal na ejattalki, an kidhblb xi kwajat ta wl, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu “anchan ka tjan” kom yab in exbayal xanty a ulal.
46014017	Alwa xna kejle tajat xan ta pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, por an kidhblb xi kwajat ta wl, yab u tolmiyb abal ka belmch ms.
46014018	U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal ms na u ejtowal tin kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb k tattsik.
46014019	Por ban junkuntalb xon tu junkunal an belomtsik, ms u achl in tomnl ku ulu b i kw xi exbantl, abal ku oktsitsik jeye xi keettsik k ku ulu, lju i mil i kw xi yab exbantl.
46014020	Kidhblbtsik, ka koytsik na chalab jelti jun xita xi plekich, yab jelti jun i chakam. Kal xowa yab alwa, ka junu jelti an chakamtsik; por kal xowa alwa, ka junu jelti xi pakdha.
46014021	An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Neech ku yna i pl iniktsik abal ku tawna an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij kal i kwintalb xi yab in exbayal, por nibal anchan yab neech ti kin exbantsitsik. Anchan tin ulu an Okxlb.”
46014022	Jaxtm, an awiltalb xu pidhnal jun xita abal ti kw kal jun i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, alwa abal ti exl kal xi yabtsik u belom ani yaba, abal xu belomichtsik. Por an awiltalb xu pidhnal jun xita abal kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, alwa abal ti exl kal xu belomtsik ani yaba, abal xi yabtsik u belom.
46014023	Max tam ka junkun an belomtsik, ejtal ka kwin keetich keetich, ani ka ochich jun xita xi yab xata in chob o yab u belom, yabxe neech kin ulu ke i olmanaltsik?
46014024	Por max ejtaltsik kwajat in lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani ka ochich jun xita xi yab xata in chob o yab u belom, neech kin acha abal walbidh ti kwajat. Ani neech kin chalpay tin itsch xan ti kwajat, tam kin acha xowa i kwajattsik a ulal.
46014025	Anchan, xowa in kool chinat tin itsch, neech ka xalkan, neech ka tudhlan kin kakna na Dios ani neech kin ulu ke na Dios tsubax lejtal kwajat kal tattsik.
46014026	Kidhblbtsik, tam i junkunaltsik, max jun xita in l kin ajatna jun i ajatlb, o in kool jun i oktsixtalb, o in l kin lna jun xata xi pidhnk kin chobna kal na Dios, o in l ti kw kal i keet kwintalb, o in l kin wila xowa u ulwb kal jech an kwintalb, alwa tajat. Por ejtal jech, ka yan abal ka tolmiyat ka belmch ms an belomtsik.
46014027	Tam u kw xita kal i keet kwintalb, ka kwin chb o asta x; ani yab junaxki ka kwin, kejtsik. Tm jun, yejat ke jun xita kin wila xowa u ulwb kal jachan an kwintalb.
46014028	Por max yab waach ni jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin wila, ms alwa yab xata ka ulwat kal i keet kwintalb ban junkuntalb, tokot ki kwin kal i keet kwintalb abal tatki ani abal na Dios.
46014029	Anchan jeye, max neech ka ln i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, ka kwin chb o x; ani xi keettsik, kin exbay xanty u ulwb.
46014030	Por max jun i kidhblb xi kwajat buxl, ka pidhan kin chobna jun xata kal na Dios, xi jidhtal, yejat tm kin kubdha ti tilom abal ka kwin jech an kidhblb.
46014031	Anchan ejtal tattsik xa bachwal i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, neech ka ejtotsik ta kw juntsik ti juntsik abal ejtaltsik kin wita ani ka tolmiyattsik ka belmch ms.
46014032	Xin lnltsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, yejat kin ejto kin kubdha tinb ani kin aytsi asta xowki in lujyal ka kwin.
46014033	Pos na Dios, yab u ukpindhax, tokot in pidhnl i kijidhtalb. Ka tajatsik xan tin tajl ejtalki xu dhabalbich kal na Dios.
46014034	Ke an mmlbtsik yab ka kwin xon tu junkunal an kidhblbtsik ti l, pos jech yab in tomnl kin taja. Yejat kin tajatsik xowa ka utsan, jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
46014035	Max in l kin chobna jun xata, kin konoy nin tomkl, por tin kim; pos yab u xalkanal alwa ke jun i mmlb, ka kwin xon tu junkunal an kidhblbtsik ti l.
46014036	Yejat ki chobna ke nin kwintal na Dios yab kal tattsik ti tujenek, nibal tatkitsik a bachmal.
46014037	Max jun xita in chalpayal ke in kool i awiltalb kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, o in chalpayal ke teykmte tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb, yejat kin chobna ke xowa in kwajat tu dhutsuntsaltsik, in takixtal an Ajtiklb.
46014038	Por max yab in l kin exbay ke jaich in takixtal a Dios, jila kwajat.
46014039	Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, ka aliytsik xan ti ka uwa abal ka koy i awiltalb ka lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani yab ka taxkantsitsik xu kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
46014040	Por ka tajatsik ejtal in tsubtalki ani in lujtalki.
46015001	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chalpaytsik an alwa tilab xi tu tiltsmaltsik. Jech jaich an alwa tilab xa bachmalichtsik ani jaich xa ntsaltsik ka bela.
46015002	Anl jeye, kal tin kwentaki jech an alwa tilab, i loodhichtsik. I loodhichtsik max ka ntsi ka bela xowa tu tiltsmaltsik ani max yab i ani belmmadhki.
46015003	Tin jidhtal, tu oktsitsik xowa nan in oktsink. Tu oktsitsik ke na Kristo chemech kal tin kwenta ni walab, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab.
46015004	In ulal jeye an Tokat Dhuslab, ke jolyat ani ke tin xlb a kts, ejech ti t;
46015005	ke in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Pedro ani tayl abal ka chutat kal xi ms an abatwletsik.
46015006	Tayl in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal b i bo inik i kidhblbtsik jun kallki ani yn xi jachan an kidhblbtsik, xo bl kwajat ejattsik, por taltsik chemnekich.
46015007	Tayl in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Jakobo ani ms tayl abal ka chutat kal xi ms an abatwletsik.
46015008	Tin okontal, tam ti ejtal jech in chumalichtsik, in xalka tinb abal ku chuu neye ani ku bela maske taylich. Jelt xan ti jun i chakam xu wachinal tam watenekich i kij.
46015009	Pos nan jaich xi ms kuxlek kal an abatwletsik ani nibal in tomnl kin bijyat tin abatwle, pos u atax tajtsmaltsik tajat xin belltsik na Dios.
46015010	Por xo, u bajmalich kin kwajay xan tin kwajat kal nin alwatalki na Dios; ani an alwatalb xi tin kontsi, yab jilkon jelti max yab xata in jalbl. Nan ms in tjnk k xi ms an abatwletsik; maske xowa u tajmal, yab kal nanki u chp tu tajmal, na Dios, xi kwajat kal nan, jaich nin tajmal kal nin alwatal.
46015011	Por yab yejat ki dha ti kwenta xita tjnk, max nan o jajtsik; xowa na uluts, jaich ke i tilmal an alwa tilab ba tattsik ani a belmalichtsik.
46015012	Por max waw i oktsixnl ke na Kristo ejnek ti t, jantki p tm taltsik xi tattsik in ulal abal yabich u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik?
46015013	Pos max an chemlomtsik yabak u ejeltsik ti t, yabichak jeye ejnek ti t na Kristo.
46015014	Ani max na Kristo yab ejnek ti t, u kalelich jelti max yab xata in jalbl xowa i oktsixnl ani xowa a belltsik jeye.
46015015	Max anchan, u kalelich tm yab tsubax xowa i oktsixnl kal tin kwenta xowa na Dios in tajm. Pos in ulal ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t na Kristo ani max yabich u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik, u kalelich tm yab tsubax ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t na Kristo.
46015016	Max an chemlomtsik yabichak u ejel ti t, nibal na Kristo yabichak ejnek ti t;
46015017	ani max na Kristo yab ejnek ti t, an belomtalb xa kooltsik yab xata in jalbl, blki i walbidhtsik ta kwajat.
46015018	Ani max anchan, xi chemnekichtsik ani in belmal na Kristo, kibchonk jeye ti kwajattsik.
46015019	Max tokotki tam tech u kwajat ejat ti kool an aytsixtalb ba na Kristo, ms wa chojontl i chubl k xi keettsik.
46015020	Por xowa tmnk, jaich ke na Kristo ejech ti t tam ti chemdh; Jaj jaich na jidhtal xi ejech ti t abal kin xalka ke xi chemnektsik neech ka ejech ti t. Anchan, in junwalich jelti nin jidhtal wall jun i tayablb.
46015021	Pos anchan xan ti an cheml kal tin kwentaki jun i inik ti tujey ban kayl, anchan jeye kal tin kwentaki jun i inik ti neech ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik.
46015022	Anchan jelti ejtal xu kidhtalb kal na Adn u chemel, anchan jeye, ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo neech ka ejdh ti t.
46015023	Neech ka ejdh an chemlomtsik xowki tin lujyal ka ejdh. Okox ejdh na Kristo abal ka kwajay jelti nin jidhtal wall jun i tayablb; ani tayl, tam ka tsch na Kristo, neech ka ejdh xu dhabalbtsik kal Jaj.
46015024	Tam na Kristo kin wkch ejtal an takixtsik, an awiltalbtsik, an chplbtsik ani tam kin watbantsch ti takix na Dios an Ttalb, tm neech ka tsch an pakwenib.
46015025	Pos na Kristo neech ti takix tam ka tantsatich kal na Dios xita kl tu atnal.
46015026	Xi neech ka wixk tin okontalich, jaich an cheml.
46015027	Pos na Dios in kwajbmalich ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo. Por tam an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke ejtalich kwajbadh abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo, jech yab in l kin ulu ke na Dios kwajat jeye taknl kal na Kristo. Pos Jaj jaich nin kwajbmal ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo.
46015028	Por tam ejtalich kwajat taknl kal na Kristo, Jaj, xu Chakmlb kal na Dios, neech jeye tm ka kwajch abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, abal na Dios ka kwajay kal ejtalki ani abal ejtalki. Jech na Dios, jaich nin kwajbmal ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo.
46015029	Anl jeye, waach taltsik xu pujnaltsik kal tin kwenta xi chemnekichtsik, jantki tin tajltsik jech? Max an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, jantki tu pujnaltsik kal jajtsik tin kwenta?
46015030	Max an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, jolatki i watnl i yajtsiktalb.
46015031	Kidhblbtsik, tsudhey ka tsudhey i tametnl an cheml. Jech tsubax tajat, jelti an kijidhtalb xu achl kal tin kwenta abal a bellichtsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
46015032	Tam tin kwajat Efeso, in pjxnk kal an iniktsik xi ataxtsik tajat, xin junwal jelti an padhumtsik; por, janty u tmal kal jech? Max tsubax lejtal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, u kalelich tm tsubax xin ulaltsik ench: “Wana tu kapul ani tu uchal, ke kalm neech ku chemech.”
46015033	Yab ka kambiytsik tab, xita u junkunal kal xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, neech jeye ka chilkoyat.
46015034	Ka koytsik na chalab alwa ani lujat, yabich ka walatsik. Pos taltsik xi tattsik yab in exll na Dios, u ulal jech abal ki tidhebtsik.
46015035	Por neech xna ka konoxin jun xita ench: “Jan tu ejel ti t an chemlomtsik? Janti uwats nin tul neech kin koy?”
46015036	Xita in konyal anchan, yab lej chalpadh, pos tam u taynal jun i iyalb, jachan an iyalb kool ka chemech abal ka ixkan.
46015037	Max ka tayan i idhidh, yab jaich an idhidh neech ka kale, neech ka kale an m o xowa ka tayan.
46015038	Por na Dios in pidhl tin akan an tayablb xan ti Jaj na Dios tin l; ani ejtal an iyalbtsik, keetich keetich in akan u pidhnal.
46015039	Ejtal xin kool in tul tech ti chabl, yab jununl ani; nin tul an iniktsik, keetich jeye; nin tul an konltsik, keetich jeye; nin tul an tooltsik, keetich jeye ani nin tul an chichintsik, keetich jeye.
46015040	Waach xin kool in tul abal ka kwajay walki ani waach xin kool in tul abal ka kwajay tech ti chabl; por keetich jeye nin labdh xi walki ani keetich jeye nin labdh xi tech ti chabl.
46015041	Nin tajx na kts, yab in junwal jelti nin tajx na ch, nibal in junwal jelti nin tajx na ttsik. Na ttsik, keetich keetich tin kool nin tajx.
46015042	Anchan jeye u tmnal tam u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik. U jolyb i tul xu kachel ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi yabich u kachel.
46015043	U jolyb i tul xi pojkantl ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi labidh. U jolyb i tul xi yab likat ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi likat.
46015044	U jolyb i tul xu pidhnk abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay walki. Max waach i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl, waach jeye i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay walki.
46015045	An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke an jidhtal inik xin bij Adn, tajan ani pidhan tin ejattal. Por na Kristo, xin junwal jeye jelti na Adn, in kool in ejattal xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
46015046	Na Dios tu pidhmal okox ti tul abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl ani tayl neech ti ku pidha ti tul abal ku kwajay walki.
46015047	An jidhtal inik xi tajadh kal i kut, techki ja ti chabl; in chabtal an inik, xi jaich an Ajtiklb, walki Ja ti tl.
46015048	Nin tul an iniktsik xi tech ti chabl, in junwal jelti an inik xi tajadh kal i kut; por xita kin bela na Kristo, neech kin koy in tul jelti na Kristo.
46015049	Anchan xan ti kool ni tul xi tech ti chabl, anchan jeye ti neech ki koy ni tul xi tl walki.
46015050	Kidhblbtsik, tu utsltsik, ke ni tul yab neech ka ochich xon tu takix na Dios; pos xu kachel yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay xon ti kwajat xi yab jayki u kachel.
46015051	Neech tu utsatsik jun xata xi kwajat yab tejwa: Yab ejtal neech ku chemech; por ejtal neech ku jalkuyat.
46015052	Neech ku jalkuyat jikatki tajat, jelt tam ki mutna ani ki lamna ni wal, tam ka achatm ti jutsyb an korneta tin okontal. Neech ka jutsyat an korneta ani an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh abal yabich ms jayki ka chemech ani waw, neech ku jalkuyat.
46015053	Pos ni tul xu kachel, kool ka jalkuyat kal xi yab jayki u kachel; ani ni tul xu chemel, neech ka jalkuyat kal xi yab jayki u chemel.
46015054	Tam ni tul xu kachel ka jalkuyatich kal xi yab jayki u kachel ani tam ni tul xu chemel, ka jalkuyatich kal xi yab jayki u chemel, tmunich tm xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench: “Wkontsat tin awiltal an cheml.
46015055	An cheml yabich xo in kool in awiltal abal ti ku yajlombdha ani yabich jayki neech kin ejto ti ku ta.”
46015056	Xowa kl tu pidhnal ti awiltalb an cheml abal ti ku yajlombdha, jaich kal an walastalb. Ani an walastalb, u pidhnal tin chp kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
46015057	Por ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, xi tu tolmiyal ki ta jech kal tin kwenta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
46015058	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka jilatsik ka bela an Ajtiklb ani yab ka jlkkliytsik na chalab. Ka ntsitsik ka tjontsi echeki an Ajtiklb, pos a chobichtsik ke an tojlb xa tajl abal an Ajtiklb, yab jolatki.
46016001	Kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb abal an belomtsik xi chojontl, ka tajatsik anlki jelt xan tu utsmaltsik an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Galasia.
46016002	Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, juntsik ta b yejat ka plmdhl w an tolmixtalb. Ka plmdhl w, xantiki ta tmaltsik; ka tapatsik, abal yab tam kin kale tu lnatsik, tm ka junkutsik i tolmixtalb.
46016003	Tam kin ulich tachan, neech ku aba Jerusaln an kidhblbtsik xi tattsik a takwym. Neech ku abatsik abal kin jntsi an ti tolmixtalb ani ti dhutsadh w, an kidhblbtsik xi taja.
46016004	Ani max yejat neye kin kale, in neech neye kal jajtsik.
46016005	Tam kin kale tachan Korinto, neech kin watey ban chabltsik xi Masedonia ani tayl, tm neech kin ulich kal tattsik.
46016006	Yab u chob max kin jilkon w i kij kal tattsik o tachan ku watna nin chamy, ani tayl ti kin tolmiytsik abal ku ntsi an bl xon ti yejat kin kale.
46016007	Yab u l kin kale tu lnatsik junwki, u l kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik, max an Ajtiklb anchan kin lena.
46016008	Por neech kin kwajay tech Efeso asta ka watey nin ajb an Pentekosts.
46016009	Pos u chutal ke alwa tajat ku taja nin tojlbil an Ajtiklb ani neech tajat ka kale alwa, maske yn tajat waach xu tamkuxtsik abal yab ki taja jech an tojlb.
46016010	Max ka ulich tachan na Timoteo, ka bachutsik alwa abal ka kwajay kijidh ani yab ka kwajay u chalpax, pos jaj in tjontsal jeye an Ajtiklb jelti nan.
46016011	Jaxtm, yab ka pojkatsik, ka tolmiytsik tokot abal ka tsch kijidh xon tin kwajat, pos in kwajat u aytsm junax kal xi ms an kidhblbtsik.
46016012	Kal tin kwenta an kidhblb Apolos, u pakabdha tajat abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik junax kal an kidhblbtsik, por yab in lena ka kale xo; por neech ka kale tam ka jolkan.
46016013	Yabtsik ki kwajay ukpipidh ani yabtsik ka jila ta belom. Ka likedhatsik tab.
46016014	Ejtal xowa ka tajatsik, ka tajatsik kal i kanidhaxtalb.
46016015	Kidhblbtsik, a chobichtsik ke nin kidhtaltsik na Estfanas, jaich xi okox ti belmchtsik. Jajtsik u kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya ani xo, kwajatichtsik in tjontsal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
46016016	Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka exbantsi xowa ti ki utsatsik. Yab tokot jajkitsik, ka exbantsitsik jeye xin junwal jelti jajtsik, xi ti tolmiyaltsik ani ti tjontsaltsik.
46016017	In kulb tajat abal tsch na Estfanas, na Fortunato ani na Akaiko, pos jajtsik in tajmal xowa yab a ejtowaltsik ka taja, kom yabtsik tech i kwajat.
46016018	Jajtsik tin likedhantsitsik an tu ejattal ani ti likedhantsitsik teye. Jelti jech an kidhblbtsik, yejat ki kanidha.
46016019	An belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Na Akila ani na Prisila, ani an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim, ti abtsaltsik tajat ti chapndhomtalb tin bij an Ajtiklb.
46016020	Ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb ejtal an kidhblbtsik. Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb.
46016021	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti chapndhomtalb kal nan tajat u kubak.
46016022	Max jun xita yab in kaknl an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb. Ajtik, ki tschich!
46016023	Ke nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik.
46016024	Ejtal tattsik tu kanidhltsik tajat tin bij na Kristo Jess. Anchan ka tjan.
47001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lenmal. Nan ani an kidhblb Timoteo, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w xu kwajltsik Korinto xin bellich na Dios ani ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xu kwajltsik putl ban chabl xi Akaya.
47001002	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
47001003	Ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, pos Jaj, jaich ni Tta Dios xi tu kontsal an ti yajnantsixtalb ani xi echeki tu kijidhmdhl.
47001004	Na Dios tu kijidhmdhl tam i watnl xowakichki i yajtsiktalb abal ki ejto weye ki kijidhmdha xi exom in watnltsik xowakichki i yajtsiktalb. Ki kijidhmdha kal jaychki an kijidhtalb xu pidhnal kal na Dios.
47001005	Anchan xan ti watnl yn i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Kristo, anchan jeye ti bachwal yn i kijidhtalb abal i bellich na Kristo.
47001006	Por max waw i watnl i yajtsiktalb, jaich abal ki kijidhmdhtsik ani ki lowat; max u kijidhmdhb, jaich abal ki kijidhmdhtsik ani ki lowat. Anchan, neech ka ejto ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb jelti xi waw i watnl.
47001007	Ke anchan jelt xan ta bachwaltsik an yajtsiktalb jelti waw, anchan jeye ti neech ki kijidhmdhtsik.
47001008	Kidhblbtsik, i l ka chobna ke i watna tajat i yajtsiktalb ban chabl xi Asia. Plek tajat an yajtsiktalb xi watna ke nibalich i achl max neech ki ejto ki kuxuy; ani i chalpay ke yabich neech ki ejto ku kale ejat taja.
47001009	I acha jelti max u bijtsidhich ke neech tu chemel. I tamu anchan, abal ki kwajba ni itsch ba na Dios ani yab ki chalpay ke neech ki ejto ki watna kal wawki i chp. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdhl ti t an chemlomtsik.
47001010	Na Dios tu loo tam ti walmich ku chemdh. Max tu loo tam ti tamu anchan, neech kin ntsi ti ku loo.
47001011	Na Dios neech kin ntsi ti ku loo, kom tattsik i l kal waw ti kwenta. Ani kom yn xita tu kontsintsal, kal yn jeye ti neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhl.
47001012	Xantki tu kulbl, jaich kal jech tin kwenta: I chob abal u xechink lujat tin tamt na Dios ani yab i tekmal tib; anchan tu xechink kal ejtalki ani ms kal tattsik. Yab i ynmal wawki i chalab, i ynmal nin alwatal na Dios.
47001013	Kal tin kwenta xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik, yab tu dhutsuntsaltsik keet, tokot xowa a ajyal ani a exbayaltsik; ani u l ka exbay alwa asta tin okontal xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik.
47001014	Anchan xan ta exbaymalichtsik ban w xi tu dhutsuntsmal, ke tattsik i kwajat i kulbl kal waw ti kwenta, anchan weye ti neech ku kwajay u kulbl kal tattsik ta kwenta, tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jess.
47001015	Kom nan u chalpayal ke anchan ta kwajattsik, u chalpayal kin kale okox tu lnatsik ani ki kulbtsik abal tu lnmaltsik chbl.
47001016	U chalpaymwiik kin kale tu lnatsik tam kin kale Masedonia ani tayl, tam kin witsiy na Masedonia, kin watey jun tu lnatsik ti t. Anchan, neech ka ejtotsik ti kin tolmiy ku ntsi an bl abal Judea.
47001017	Awxe yabki u chalpaymal alwa tam tu chalpay jech? O a chalpayaltsik ke xowa u chalpayal ku taja, nanki u chalpayal tu kwetm chalab abal u ulal “neech” ani tayl “yaba”?
47001018	Por na Dios in chob alwa ke yab i jlkkliyal ni chalab kal xowa tu utsltsik.
47001019	Pos na Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios, xi na Silbano, na Timoteo ani nan i tilmal ba tattsik, yab in jlkkliymal nin chalab. Ejtal xowa in ulmal, ejtal tsubax.
47001020	Pos kal Jajki na Kristo tu tjnal ejtal xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin taja. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tam i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios, i ulal “anchan ka tjan”, tin bij na Jesukristo.
47001021	Na Dios jaich xi tu takwymal ani xi tu tajl abal ku kwajch kal na Kristo.
47001022	Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu exliymalich ani tu kwajbantsmalich an ti Tokat Ejattalb ba ni itsch jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal xowa neech ki bachu.
47001023	Por max yabl in kalnek Korinto jelt xan tu chalpaymal, na Dios in chob alwa ke jaich abal tattsik ta alwabl. Max in kambix, u pidhnl tub abal kin chemdh.
47001024	Yab abal ka chalpaytsik ke i l tu tajtsitsik ti chplb kal xowa yejat ka bela, pos alwaich xan ta belomichtsik. Xowa i l, jaich ke tattsik ki kwajay ms kijidh.
47002001	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab u lena kin kale tu lnatsik abal yab u l tu tepindha.
47002002	Pos max tu tepindhatsik, tm, jita neech ti kin kijidhmdha? Tokot tattsik, xi tu tepindhmal.
47002003	Jaxtm tu dhutsuntsitsik, pos yab u lena kin kale tu lnatsik abal ti kin tepindha. U l tu lnatsik abal ti kin kijidhmdha, pos u chob alwa ke max nan in kwajat kijidh, ejtal tattsik neech teye ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
47002004	Tam tu dhutsuntsitsik jech an ti w, in uknal tin kwajat kal tin kwenta an tepintalb xu achl tu itsch. Yab tu dhutsuntsitsik abal ki tepin, tu dhutsuntsitsik abal ka chobna ke tu kanidhltsik tajat.
47002005	Por max jun xita tin tepindhmal, yab nanki tin tepindhmal, ti tepindhmaltsik teye w. U ulal “w”, abal yab ka lej achatsik kalpidh.
47002006	An kwiyaxtalb xi tattsik a pidhmal ban junkuntalb jachan xin walmal, lejat kl.
47002007	Jaxtm, awilichtsik ka pakwlantsi ani ka tolmintsi abal yab ka lej tepin ani ka ukpindh kal jachan an tepintalb.
47002008	Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka xalkantsi ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhltsik.
47002009	Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jeye jech, abal u l ku chuu max a tajltsik lejtal xowa tu utsa.
47002010	Xita tattsik ka pakwlantsi, u pakwlantsal neye. Pos xita u pakwlantsmalich, u pakwlantsmalich tin tamt na Kristo abal tattsik ta alwabl.
47002011	Anchan ti yejat ki taja abal an lej atax yab ti ku ta, pos i chobich xan tu kambix.
47002012	Tam tin ulich ban bitsow xi Troas abal ku tila nin alwa tilbil na Kristo, in tolmiyat tajat kal an Ajtiklb ku taja jech an tojlb kal ni jun i tamkuxtalb.
47002013	Maske anchan ti tmun, blki yab tsubax nu ejattal abal yab u ela an kidhblb Tito. Jaxtm, u utsatsik abal in nechich ani in kale ban chabl xi Masedonia.
47002014	Por i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, xi echeki tu tolmiyal ki ta xowa yab alwa, kom u kwajatich kal na Jesukristo. Na Dios tu ynl abal ki buku an alwa tilab, jelt xan tu bukel in niwy jun i niwiytalb.
47002015	Pos waw i junwal jelti jun i niwiytalb xi na Kristo in pidhl na Dios ani u bukel putlki xon ti kwajat xi loodhichtsik ani xi kibchonkichtsik.
47002016	Abal xi kibchonkichtsik, jech an niwiytalb in junwal jelti max jaich jun i niwiytalb xu chemdhax; por abal xi loodhichtsik, in achltsik jelti max jaich jun i niwiytalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb. Ani abal ki taja jech, jita kwajat tojojodh?
47002017	Waw yab i junwal jelti xi xeechtsik in janwal an alwa tilab abal kin ejto kin tlomna. Yab i tajl anchan, waw u kw kal yantam i tsubaxtalb tin tamt na Dios, kom tu abatwlejil na Dios ani tu tojnlil na Kristo.
47003001	Tam i ulal jech, a chalpayaltsikxe ke i tujwalich jun ki tila tib alwa? O yejat tu ltsitsik jun i dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa o tu kontsitsik jelti jech an dhutsadh w jelt xan tin tajl taltsik? Yaba!
47003002	Pos tatichtsik ni kwajat jelti an dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa, xi waw i yntsal; i kwajattsik ba ni itsch jelti max i dhutsadh. Ani ejtalki neech kin ejto kin exbay ani kin chuu ke anchan, kal tin kwentaki xan ta kwajattsik.
47003003	Tattsik jaich an dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa xin dhutsmal na Kristo, tam ti waw i tila an alwa tilab ba tattsik. Jech an dhutsadh w, dhutsadh kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios xi kwajat ejat, yab dhutsadh kal i dhutsumtalb; yab dhutsadh ba tujub, dhutsadh bin itsch an iniktsik.
47003004	I chob alwa ke na Dios in chutal abal alwa xowa i tajl, kom na Kristo tu tolmiyal.
47003005	Yab ki ulu ke waw u awil ki taja jun xata kal wawki ti kwetm chalab; pos yab ani, ejtal xowa i tajl, a Dios tu tolmiyal ki taja.
