47003006	Na Dios tu pidha ti awiltalb abal ki tila jun i t lejkintalb xi yab kwajat dhutsadh; jech an t lejkintalb tl ban Tokat Ejattalb. Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab in pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, an Tokat Ejattalb jaich nin pidhnl.
47003007	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, dhutsan ba lemdha tujubtsik. Tam ti na Moiss kale kin bachu jech an takixtalb, chaxixl tajat ti witsiy ke nibal u ejtowb ka teltsin tin wal kal an israelitatsik. Por jachan an chaxixltalb potey kaym ti kaym. Pos max ulich kal yantam i labidh tokattalb jachan an takixtalb xi yab in pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal,
47003008	awxe yab ms plek nin labidh tokt neech kin koy an tsubaxtalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb?
47003009	Max nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xi tu xalkantsal ke u walbidh, ulich kal i labidh tokattalb, ms plek an labidh tokattalb neech kin xalka na Dios tam tu kwajbaich alwa kal Jaj.
47003010	Pos an okox takixtalb in kool jeye nin labidh tokt. Por jech an labidh tokattalb, yab in junwal jelti nin labidh tokt an t lejkintalb.
47003011	Jaxtm, max xi yab neech ka owey, in koy in labidh tokt, ms ja plek nin labidh tokt in kool, xi neech ka kwajay malill i kij.
47003012	Kom i chob ke jech an t lejkintalb neech ka kwajay malill i kij, jaxtm ti till kal ni jun i jkib.
47003013	Yab jelti na Moiss, xin putsuy nin wal kal jun i kudhkum abal an israelitatsik yab kin chuu ti tepel jachan xi yab neech ka owey.
47003014	Por an israelitatsik yab in exbay, pos asta xo, tam kin ajaytsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in junwal jelti max putsudh nin wal kal an kudhkum xin yna na Moiss. Jachan an putsuxtalb yab wkontsidh, pos tokot u wkoyb kal na Kristo.
47003015	Asta xo, tam kin ajaytsik nin dhutsadh wil na Moiss, yab in exbayaltsik; pos kwajattsik jelti max putsudh nin chalab kal jun i putsuxtalb.
47003016	Por tam kin belaichtsik an Ajtiklb, u wixkintsbich jachan an ti putsuxtalb.
47003017	Ani an Ajtiklb, jaich an Tokat Ejattalb; ani xita in koolich tin itsch an Tokat Ejattalb, kldhatsich ban walastalb.
47003018	Jaxtm, ejtal waw, kom yabich putsudh ni wal kal an putsuxtalb, i junwal jelti jun i lam xin xalkl nin labidh tokt an Ajtiklb. Anchan, kaym ti kaym exomich i bajwal ku kwajay jelt xan ti na Kristo jeye. Jech jaich nin tajl an Ajtiklb, xi jaich an Tokat Ejattalb.
47004001	Jaxtm, yab jayki i jill tib, pos na Dios kal nin kanidhaxtal tu punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb.
47004002	Yabich i tajl xowa u tajnal chinat ani xowa xi tidhetl; yab u xeech tu kambix nibal i jalkuyal nin kwintal na Dios. Yab i tajl anchan; tin tamt na Dios, ejtaltsik in chob ke tokot i ulal xowa tsubax.
47004003	Max taltsik yab in exbayal an alwa tilab xi till, jaich abal neechtsik ban kibeltalb.
47004004	Pos kom jajtsik yab u belom, jelti max paxkintsidhichtsik tin chalab kal an lej atax xu takix jech i kij. Anchan ti tajtsintsik kal an lej atax abal yab kin chutsi tin tajx an alwa tilab xon tu tilnal nin labidh tokt na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, jaich nin xalkl xan ti jeye na Dios.
47004005	Tam i till an alwa tilab, yab u xeech i till tib, tokot i till na Jesukristo ke jaich an Ajtiklb. Pos waw, u kwajat tu tjontsix abal tattsik ta alwabl, kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Jesukristo.
47004006	Na Dios, xin taja ka wachin i tajaxtalb ban jikwaxtalb, jaich jeye xi jelti max in taja ka wachin i tajaxtalb ba ni itsch. Anchan tin taja abal ki ejto ki chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios xi kwajat bin wal na Kristo.
47004007	I kool nin tajx na Dios ba ni itsch jelti max balidh ba jun i balixtalb xi tajadh kal i kut. Jech jaich abal ka xalkan ke an pulek chplb tl ba na Dios ani yab wawki i chp.
47004008	I kyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb, por yab u jikl; i kyal xowakichki i yejetalb, por yab u chalpax.
47004009	U atnal, por yab u walbadh; u kwajladh, por yab u kibdhats.
47004010	Xontiki ku kale, u lenb ku chemdh jelt xan ti chemdh na Jess; kom na Jess tu beletnl, u xalkanalich ke Jaj kwajat ejat.
47004011	Lejat tech u kwajat ejat, echeki waach xita in l ti ku chemdha kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Jess. Jech u tmnal anchan abal ka xalkan ba ni tul xu chemel, ke na Jess kwajat ejat.
47004012	Echeki i tametnl an cheml kal tin kwenta abal i till an alwa tilab ani tattsik, a koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwenta abal a bachwaltsik an alwa tilab.
47004013	I till an alwa tilab kom tsubax ti bell. I till jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “U bela, jaxtm tu tila”; anchan weye waw, kom tsubax ti bell, jaxtm ti till.
47004014	Ani i chob ke na Dios, xin ejdha ti t ni Ajtik Jesukristo, neech weye ti ku ejdha ti t kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo; ani neech ti ku jna tin tamt junax kal tattsik.
47004015	Ejtal jech xowa i tamwal, jaich abal tattsik ta alwabl. Pos tam yn xi kin bachutsik nin alwatal na Dios, kal ms yn ti neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani neech ka pubdhantsat tin bij.
47004016	Jaxtm, yab jayki i jill tib. Pos maske ni tul u kejmlich, ni ejattal u tmdhb tsudhl u tajkanal.
47004017	Pos an yajtsiktalb xi achl tech ti kayl yab lej kalpidh ani jikat u watel; ani kal tin kwenta jech an yajtsiktalb, i tlich jun i pulek labidh tokattalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal.
47004018	Yab ki aliy xowa xi tejwa, ki aliy xowa xi yab tejwa. Pos xowa xi tejwa, yab in kuxyal owat; por xi yab tejwa, yab jayki in kool in okontal.
47005001	I chobich ke max ka kibchonich ni tul, xin junwal jelti jun i at xi jikat u pakchunal xon ti kwajat ni ejattal, na Dios tu kontsalich tojojodh t walki jun i at xi yab jayki neech ka pakchun. Jech an at yab tajadh kal i iniktsik, tajadh kal a Dios.
47005002	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu itixbdhl ni tul xi kool tech ti chabl ani i lakich max na Dios ti ku jalkuntsch an ti tul kal xi tl walki.
47005003	Jech ni tul xi tl walki, jaich xon ti neech ka kwajay ni ejattal abal yab ka kwajay anchanki.
47005004	Pos anchan p, xu kwajat ba jech ni tul xin junwal jelti jun i at, u itixbl ani u tepinal. I lak max yab ku wkontsat jech an ti tul, por i l jeye ku pidhanich an ti tul xi tl walki abal anchan, ka wixkiyatich ni tul xu chemel ani ki kch ni tul xi neech ka kwajay malill i kij.
47005005	Na Dios tu tajmal anchan abal ki ejto ki bachu ni t tul xi tl walki ani tu pidhmalich an ti Tokat Ejattalb jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal xowa neech ki bachu tayl.
47005006	Anchan p, echeki u kwajat tsububudh i itsch. I chob ke lejat u kwajat ba jech ni tul, yabl u kwajat xon ti kwajat an Ajtiklb;
47005007	ani jech i chob abal anchan, kom i bell, yab kal xowaki i chutal.
47005008	Por u kwajat tsububudh i itsch ani i lakich max ki jilaich jech ni tul xu chemel abal ku kalch tu kwajl kal an Ajtiklb.
47005009	Jaxtm, maske u kwajat ba ni tul o u kwajat kal an Ajtiklb, ki tajl echeki xowa Jaj in l.
47005010	Pos ejtal waw, kool ku utey xon ti na Kristo neech ti ljundhom. Pos juntsik tu b, kool ki bachu xowa i lujyal kal tin kwenta xowa alwa o yab alwa i tajmal tam tu kwajat ba ni tul.
47005011	Jaxtm, kom i kontsal jun i pulek kaknaxtalb an Ajtiklb, i pakabdhl an atiklbtsik abal kin bela an alwa tilab. I chob alwa ke na Dios in chob xanty i y ani i l ka chobnatsik teye xanty i y.
47005012	Yab exom i tujwal ki tila tib alwa, xowa i tajl, jaich abal ka ejtotsik ka exla xanty i y ani ki kulbtsik kal jech. Anchan, neech tm ka ejto ka tkoytsik xin tekltsik tinb kal xowaki in chutal ani yab kal xowa waach tin itsch.
47005013	Max u kwajat jelti max yab u chalpadh, u kwajat anchan abal a Dios; max u chalpadh, u kwajat anchan abal tattsik ta alwabl.
47005014	Ejtal xowa i tajl, i tajl kom tu kanidhl na Kristo. Pos i chalpayal jech: ke max jn chemech abal ejtalkijich, tm, jelti max ejtal chemech.
47005015	Na Kristo chemech abal xi xo kwajattsik ejat, yabich ka kwajaytsik ejat abal jajki, ka kwajaytsik ejat abal na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, jaich xi chemech ani ejech ti t abal jajtsik tin alwabl.
47005016	Jaxtm, xo yabich i chutal ni jun xita jelt xan tu chutb techki ti kayl; ani max na Kristo i exlmal xantiki tu exlb jun xita xi techki ti kayl, xo yabich anchan ti exll.
47005017	Jaxtm, max jun xita kwajatich kal na Kristo, in junwal jelti max wachinkich ti t: Ejtal xan ti xeechwiik, xo yabich anchan ti xeech. Xo, tich i xechintalb in kool.
47005018	Ejtal jech, a Dios in tajl. Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu kwajba alwa kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani tu punkuntsi abal ki ltsi an atiklbtsik xan ti neech kin ejto ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios.
47005019	Na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj an atiklbtsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani yab in dhantsal ti kwenta nin walastalbiltsik. Jech na Dios, tu punkuntsmal abal ki ltsi jech an ti kw an atiklbtsik abal ka kwajchtsik alwa kal Jaj.
47005020	Waw u tl jelti jun xita xi abadh kal na Kristo, jelti max Jaj tajat na Dios ti pakabdhltsik kal tin kwenta xowa i lnl. Tu pakabdhltsik tin bij na Kristo abal ki kwajaytsik alwa kal na Dios.
47005021	Na Kristo yab in tajmal ni jun i walastalb; por kal wawki ti kwenta, tajan kin kitna kal na Dios ejtal ni walastalbil abal tam ku kwajch kal na Kristo, ku kwajch alwa kal na Dios tin kwentaki na Kristo.
47006001	Kom i tjontsalich na Dios, tu pakabdhltsik jeye abal yab ka tajatsik jelti max yab xata in jalbl nin alwatal na Dios xa bachwaltsik.
47006002	Pos Jaj in ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Tam tin bajaw an kij, tu axtsi; tam tin bajaw xowki neech tu lootsik, tu tolmiy. Xo jachich jech an kij; xo jachich xowki na Dios tu loox.
47006003	Yab i kwajbantsal ni jun xita ti tojlixtalb abal yab ka tilan ke yab alwa xowa i tajl.
47006004	Tokot i l ki xalka kal ejtal xowa i tajl abal u kwajat i tjontsal a Dios. Pos kal yantam i chaattalb ti kuxyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb. I kuxyal jeye tam i kool xowakichki i yejetalb ani i tepintalb.
47006005	Waw u lekbadh ani u balidh al wikaxte, i tametnmal i pjxtalb ani i altsik tojlb, i ejmal i akal ani i watnmal i kanab.
47006006	I xalkl ke i tjontsal na Dios, abal u xechich tokat ani abal i exll an tsubaxtalb. Abal i kool i chaattalb ani i alwatalb. Anl jeye, abal tsubax lejtal ti kanidhl ejtalki ani abal i koolich an Tokat Ejattalb ti itsch.
47006007	I till an alwa tilab kal tin chp na Dios. I ynl an lujattalb jelti jun xata xu ynal abal tu pjx. I ynl abal ku pjxin ani abal ki loo tib.
47006008	Juntsikl i bachwal i kaknaxtalb ani juntsikl i odhbijixtalb; juntsikl u tilnal alwa ani juntsikl u tilnal yab alwa. Juntsikl u usnal abal u kambix maske tsubax xowa i ulal.
47006009	Juntsikl u tajnal jelti max yab u exlb ani juntsikl jelti max u exlb; juntsikl i kunuknlich tajat an cheml, por yab xata i tamwal; u tajnal ki watna i yajtsiktalb, por yab u chemdhb.
47006010	Maske i watnl i tepintalb, por echeki u kwajat u kulbl; maske u chojontl, por yn xita i tajl kin bachu i lbtajaxtalb tam ki tiltsi an ti alwa tilab; maske yab xata i kool, jyki max kidhat i kool.
47006011	Kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Korinto, tu tawnmalichtsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb; tu pidhmalichtsik ka chobna xan ti waw tu kwajat.
47006012	Tattsik a chob alwa ke tu kanidhltsik, por tattsik yab anchan ta kwajat kal waw.
47006013	Tu pakabdhltsik jelt xan ti jun i ttalb in pakabdhl nin chakmiltsik. Ti kin ltsi xan ta kwajattsik teye jelt xan ti nan u tajl kal tattsik.
47006014	Yabtsik ka koy i junaxtalb kal xi yabtsik u belom, pos jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy xi lujat kal xi yab lujat? Neechxe kin ejto ka kwajay junax an tajaxtalb kal an jikwaxtalb?
47006015	Jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy na Kristo kal an lej atax? O jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy jun i belom kal xi yab u belom?
47006016	Awxe neech kin ejto kin koy i junaxtalb an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal an chilabtsik? Pos tattsik i kwajat jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xi ejat, jelt xan ti na Dios in ulu ench: Neech kin kwajay ani neech kin xechin kal jajtsik; Nan neech tin Dios kal jajtsik ani Nan neech ku dhabalnatsik.
47006017	Jaxtm, in ulal jeye ench an Okxlb: Yabich ka koytsik i junaxtalb kal jajtsik, yabich ka tajltsik jaich, yabich ka takatsik xowa atax; ani neech tm tu bachch abal tu dhabalnaichtsik,
47006018	neech kin kwajay tin Ttalb kal tattsik ani tattsik neech ki kwajay ta chakmlb kal Nan. Anchan tin ulal an Okxlb xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
47007001	Anchan p, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, jech jaich xowa u usnk neech ki bachu. Jaxtm ti yejatich ki jila xowa tu walbindhl, ki jilaich xowa yab alwa xi tajl kal ni tul o kal ni ejattal. Ani kal tin kwenta abal i kaknl na Dios, ki ntsi ki tokedha tib abal ku dhabalnjich kal Jaj.
47007002	Yabich ti ku chakuntsi, ti ku kanidhaich. Pos yab xita i waltsmal, yab xita i tajtsmal xowa atax ani yab xita i kambiymal.
47007003	Yab exom tu utsltsik jech abal tu walbiy. Pos tu utsmalichtsik abal i kwajat ba ni itsch. Yab neech tu uktsitsik, maske u kwajat ejat o u chemnek, echeki neech ki kwajaytsik ba ni itsch.
47007004	U chob alwa ke i alwa iniktsik; nan tu tilltsik alwa tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Kijidh tajat tin kwajat ani in kulbl tajat maske u watnl i yajtsiktalb.
47007005	Asta tu ulnek Masedonia, yab i ejtmal tu koyol, pos i tametnl tajat i yajtsiktalb. I watnmal i pjxtalb ani i kymal i jkib ti itsch.
47007006	Por na Dios, xin kijidhmdhl xin chakltsik tinb, tu kijidhmdha kal tin kwenta abal ulich na Tito.
47007007	Yab tokot u kijidhm abal ulich na Tito, u kijidhm abal i acha ke tattsik a kijidhmdhmal jaj. Jaj tu ltsi abal a ltsik tajat ti ku chuu, tu ltsi abal i tepinaltsik ani abal i chalpaxtsik kal waw ti kwenta. Tam tu acha jech, ms in kulb tajat.
47007008	Maske an dhutsadh w xi tu abtsi ti tepindhatsik, yab in kwajat tin chalpax. Ani max in kwajay tin chalpax ti okox, abal u chuu ke jachan an dhutsadh w ti tepindhatsik w i kij,
47007009	xo in kulbl; yab abal i tepinktsik, in kulbl abal jachan an tepintalb ti tajatsik ka jilaichtsik ta walablom. An tepintalb xi tattsik a watna, jaich abal na Dios anchan tin lena, yab a watnatsik jech, abal wawki i l ki chuu ka watna.
47007010	Tam jun xita in watnl i tepintalb abal na Dios anchan tin l, u tajnal kl abal kin jilaich ti walablom ani in bajwalich an loeltalb; tam ki tamu anchan, yab yejat ku kwajay tu chalpax. Por an tepintalb xi yab Jaj na Dios in l kin chuu ki watna, u jnax ban kibeltalb.
47007011	Tattsik a kuxuy an tepintalb xi na Dios in lena kin chuu ka watna ani, ka chuutsik xo xanty tmun! Ti tajatsik ka chalpay alwa jech ani ka lna xanty a tajmaltsik; ti chakdhatsik ani ti jikdhatsik jeye. Tayl a lenatsik ti kin chuu ani a ulutsik abal neech ka yajlombdha xita nin walmal. Kal ejtal jech, tattsik a xalka ke yab a kooltsik a walab kal jech.
47007012	Anchan p, tam tu dhutsuntsitsik jachan an ti w, yab jaich abal in kwajat u chalpm jachan xita nin walmal o xita xi waltsidh; u taja anchan abal ka xalkan tin tamt na Dios, ke tattsik i chalpax tajat kal waw ti kwenta.
47007013	Jaxtm ti achl u kijidh. Yab tokotki u kulb kal jech tin kwenta, u kulb jeye tam ti chuu abal u kulbl tajat na Tito; pos tattsik a tajmal abal ka kwajay tsububudh in ejattal.
47007014	Yab in kale yab alwa tam tu utsa na Tito, ke tattsik i alwa inik. Anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik ke tokot tu utsltsik xowa tsubax, anchan jeye ti kale tsubax xowa u utsa na Tito kal tattsik ta kwenta.
47007015	Ani jaj, ms tajat ti kanidhltsik tam in chalpayal abal a tajatsik xowa jaj ti utsa; ani xan ta bachutsik kal i chaattalb ani kal i kaknaxtalb.
47007016	In kulbl tajat abal u chob alwa ke tattsik i alwa inik kal xowakichki.
47008001	Kidhblbtsik, i l tu tiltsitsik xan tin xalkmal nin alwatal na Dios ban belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia.
47008002	Maske pakdha i yajtsiktalb in watnmaltsik, blki kijidh tajat ti kwajattsik; ani maske chojontltsik tajat, in pidhnltsik xowa in kool kal yantam i kulbtalb jelti max jajtsik tumnladh tajat.
47008003	Nan u chumal, ke kal yantam i kulbtalb tin pidhnltsik i tolmixtalb; ani juntsikl, yandha tajat in pidhnl maske jajtsik ka jilkon yab xata in kool.
47008004	U pakabdh tajat kal an kidhblbtsik xi Masedonia abal ki walkatsik jeye kin pidha ti tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik xi chojontl xu kwajl Jerusaln.
47008005	In tajatsik ms k xowa i chalpaymal, pos okox, in pidhnatsik tinb abal kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb xan ti yejat; ani tayl, in pidhnatsik tinb kal waw abal ka tolmixintsik jeye kom na Dios anchan tin l.
47008006	Jaxtm ti pakabdhmal na Tito abal ka kale tachan kal tattsik kin junku an tolmixtalb xin tujmal kin junku ms okox.
47008007	Tattsik i tax tajat kal xowakichki: i belomtsik tajat, i awiltsik tajat ta oktsix, i chalpadhtsik tajat; i ikaxtsik tajat ka tjontsi an Ajtiklb ani a kooltsik tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal waw. Anchan jeye ti ka tajatsik kal an tolmixtalb.
47008008	Yab exom tu utsltsik jech abal ka tajatsik kal i chplb. Tu utsltsik jech abal ka chobna ke xi keettsik in pidhnl an tolmixtalb kal yantam i kulbtalb. Anchan teye ti ka tajatsik abal ka xalkan ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhaxtsik.
47008009	Tattsik a exlantsmalich an tin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Kom ti kanidhltsik tajat, in jila ejtal xowa in kool t walki ani tsch chojontl tech ti chabl. Jaj chojontlb abal tattsik ka bachu yn i alwatalb.
47008010	Neech tu utsatsik xanty u chalpayal kal jech tin kwenta abal tattsik ta alwabl. Tattsik alwa ta tujutsik ti jun tamub, yab tokotki abal a junkuwaltsik jech an tolmixtalb, anl jeye abal a tajltsik kal i kulbtalb.
47008011	Pos xo, ka ntsitsik asta ka okoy kal jaychki an kulbtalb xa koytsik tam ta tuju, ka pidhnltsik xantiki ta kool.
47008012	Abal max jun xita tsubax lejtal tin lenl kin pidhna i tolmixtalb, na Dios in bachwal an tolmixtalb xantiki jn tin kool; Jaj yab in konyal xowa jn yab in kool.
47008013	Yab ka ulutsik ke waw i l ki chuu ka watnatsik i kanab kal tin kwentaki abal a pidhnl i tolmixtalb.
47008014	Yab jaich i l, xowa i l, jaich ke ki kwajaytsik junax aniki. Xo tattsik a kool abal ka pidha xowa jajtsik in yntsal; tayl jajtsik jeye neech ti ki pidha xowa tattsik ka yntsi. Ani anchan jununlich tm neech ki kwajaytsik,
47008015	jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Xita in koy yn, yab in jila; ani xita in koy w, yab in watna i yejetalb.”
47008016	U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal in kwajbantsi bin itsch na Tito jaychki an kanidhaxtalb jelti xi nan u kool kal tattsik.
47008017	Jaj neech ti ki lnatsik, por yab abal nanki u abmal; kom ti kanidhltsik tajat, jaxtm ti neech ti ki lnatsik, por kal jajki tin kwetm chalab.
47008018	I aba jeye junax kal na Tito jun i kidhblb xu exlb kal an belomtsik abal alwa inik tajat. Jaj exom tajat ti tojnal alwa abal kin tila an alwa tilab.
47008019	Ani yab tokot jechki, takwyat jech an kidhblb kal an belomtsik abal ka kale kal waw ani ka tolmixin kal jech an tojlb. Exom i tajl jech an tojlb abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb ani abal ki xalka ke tattsik a kulbetnl tajat ta tolmix.
47008020	Max ka kale jun xita kal waw, yabich tm xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab i kidhat pidhnmal an tolmixtalb.
47008021	Pos exom i tajl jech in lujtalki, yab tokotki tin tamt an Ajtiklb, tin tamt jeye an atiklbtsik.
47008022	I aba jeye kal jajtsik jun i kidhblb, xin kulbetnl tajat kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb kal xowakichki. Jaj in kulbetna tajat ka kale ti ki lnatsik kom in chob abal neech ka pidhnatsik an tolmixtalb.
47008023	Max jun xita ti ki konoytsik xitam j jeye na Tito, ka utsatsik abal nan u junik ani u tolmiwl abal tu tjontsitsik. O max jun xita ti ki konoytsik kal tin kwenta xi keet an kidhblbtsik, ka utsatsik abal abnkki kal an belomtsik ani in kaknltsik jeye na Kristo.
47008024	Jaxtm, ka bachutsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb abal anchan, ka xalkantsi an belomtsik ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhaxtsik jelt xan ti waw ti tiltsmaltsik.
47009001	Kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb abal an kidhblbtsik, yabich xna yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik;
47009002	pos tu exlantsalichtsik an ta alwa ejattal. Echeki u utsl an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia, ke tattsik xi kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya i kwajatich tojojodhtsik asta ti jun tamub abal ka pidhnatsik an tolmixtalb. Kal jech tin kwenta ti yn xu kwajltsik Masedonia in lenmaltsik ti tolmix tam tin acha ke tattsik i tolmix kal yantam i kulbtalb.
47009003	Por blki u abl jech an kidhblbtsik abal yab t ka kale yab tsubax xan tu tilmaltsik kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb. U abl jech an kidhblbtsik abal kin chuu max tsubax lejtal i kwajat tojojodhichtsik jelt xan tu ulmal;
47009004	yab telab ke taltsik xi Masedonia ka kale kal nan ani yabtsik tojojodh ki elan. Max yab ki elan i tojojodhtsik, tidhetlich tm abal waw ani abal tattsik teye, kom i ulmalich ke i kwajat tojojodhichtsik.
47009005	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu utsa an kidhblbtsik ke yejat ka okxin abal ti ki tolmiytsik ka tojojoy an tolmixtalb xa ulmaltsik ti okox ke neech ka pidhna. U l ke jech an tolmixtalb xi tattsik neech ka pidhna, ka pidhnatsik abal tsubax ta l ta tolmixtsik ani yab kal i chplb.
47009006	Tu utsltsik jech: Xita w kin taya, w jeye neech kin junku; ani xita yn kin taya, yn jeye neech kin junku.
47009007	Juntsik ta b yejat ka pidhna xan ta chalpayal ta itsch; yab kal i tepintalb nibal kal i chplb, pos na Dios in kanidhl xin pidhnl kal i kulbtalb.
47009008	Na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki pidha yandha xowakich i alwatalb. Anchan, neech tm ka koytsik echeki xowa a yntsal ani neech jeye ka koytsik tajat abal ki tolmixin kal xowakichki i yejetalb.
47009009	An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: In pidhmal yn an chojontltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb ani xowa in tajl lujat, u jilkonalich abal echeki.
47009010	Na Dios, xin pidhl ti iyalb an m, in pidhl jeye ti kapnl abal kin kapu. Anchan jeye neech kin taja kal tattsik, neech ti ki pidhatsik yn xowa ka chejwalixna jelt xan tu pidhnal yn ti iyalb jun i m; ani neech ti ki yanedhantsi an ti chejwalixtalb, jelti tam an m kin junkch xowa in taymal.
47009011	Anchan, neech ka koytsik yn xowakichki abal ka ejto ka pidhnatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb. Ani kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb xa junkmaltsik abal ki jntsi an kidhblbtsik, neech kin pidhatsik ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tam kin bachu.
47009012	Abal tam ki pidhaichtsik jech an ti tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik, yab tokotki i pidhl xowa in yntsaltsik, i tajlich jeye abal jajtsik kin pidha tajat ti jalbintsixtalb a Dios.
47009013	Jajtsik neech kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios, pos kal jech an tolmixtalb, u xalkantsbichtsik abal a tajl xan tin ulal nin alwa tilbil na Kristo. Neech jeye kin pubdhantsitsik tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb xi tattsik ka pidhna abal jajtsik ani abal ejtalkitsik.
47009014	Ani jajtsik neech ti ki kontsintsitsik ani neech ti ki kanidhatsik tajat kal tin kwenta abal i kwajatichtsik tajat bin alwatal na Dios. Kom i kwajatichtsik bin alwatal na Dios, jaxtm ta tolmixtsik.
47009015	I pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhl xi yab neech ki ejto ki wila!
47010001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu pakabdhltsik kal nin chaattalbil ani nin alwatal na Kristo. In usnal ke u chakl tajat tub tam in kwajat kal tattsik, por in pojkax kwa tajat tam in kwajat w.
47010002	Pos tu pakabdhltsik abal tam kin kale tachan, yab ti kin tajatsik ku yna an pojkaxtalb kal taltsik na kidhtaltsik xi tin utsl ke xowa u tajl, nanki u tajl tu kwetm chalab; pos yab u jiknl ku tametna xin ulaltsik anchan.
47010003	Tsubax kejle ke waw u inik weye, por yab u pjx jelt xan tu pjx xi techtsik ti kayl.
47010004	Pos an ylbtsik xi ynl tu pjx, yab j jelti xi waach tech ti kayl. An ylbtsik xi ynl, in kool in chp na Dios abal kin ta xowakichki i tamkuxtalb.
47010005	Kal jech an ylb, i pakwal xowakichki i chalab ani i tamkuxtalb, xin kwajbl xin tekltsik tinb abal yab ka exl na Dios. I kwajbl jeye ba na Kristo xowakichki in chalab an iniktsik abal kin tajatsik xowa in l na Kristo
47010006	ani tam ka tajlichtsik xowa in l na Kristo, waw u kwajat tojojodh abal ki pidha ti yajtsiktalb xita kin chikat taja na Kristo.
47010007	Tattsik a tell jun xata xantiki ti tejwa. Max jun xita in achl abal kwajatich kal na Kristo, yejat jeye kin chalpay ke waw u kwajatich weye kal na Kristo.
47010008	Maske ku teka w tub kal tin kwenta an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb, yab u kool xantki ti kin tidheb; pos an Ajtiklb tu pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb abal tu tolmiy ki belmchtsik ms ani yab abal ki kaletsik ban kibeltalb.
47010009	Yab u l ka chalpaytsik ke u l tu jikdha kal i dhutsadh w.
47010010	In usnal ke tam u abnl i dhutsadh w, chapik kwa tajat in tawnax ani in kwiyax; por nan tajat, in chaatki kwa tajat ani pojkantl kwa tajat in kw.
47010011	Por xita in ulal jech, yejat kin chobna ke anchan xan ti dhutsl an tilab tam u kwajat w, anlki jeye neech ki taja tam u kwajat kal tattsik.
47010012	Waw yab i ulal ke i junwal nibal i junbayal tib kal taltsik xin kulbetnl kin tila alwa tinb. Jajtsik in xalkl ke yab chalpadh abal in tilltsik alwa tinb ani abal in jnbxliyaltsik tinb kal xi keettsik.
47010013	Waw yab neech ki lej teka tib kal tin kwenta an tojlb xi tajl. Na Dios jaich nin lnl xon talat in bajwal ni tojlbil ani Jaj tu walkmal ku ulich Korinto asta xon ti tattsik i kwajat.
47010014	Jaxtm, yab exom tu kalel xon talat i lujyal tu tojnal. Max yabakwiik bl u ulnek kal tattsik, jeltich tm max exomich tu kalel xon talat i lujyal tu tojnal. Por yab anchan, pos waw u okxink ki jna nin alwa tilbil na Kristo asta xon ta kwajattsik.
47010015	Yab exom tu kalel xon talat u bijtsidh ku tjon, nibal i ulal ke waw u tjnk xon ti keet tjnk. Yab anchan, tokot i l ki chuu ki belmchtsik ms abal ki ejto ku tjon ms kal tattsik.
47010016	Tayl i l ki tila pl an alwa tilab ms w k xon ti tattsik i kwajat. Por yab i l ki taja jech an tojlb xon ti exomich ti tojnal keet, nibal i l ki teka tib kal tin kwenta i tojlb xi keet in tajmal.
47010017	Max jun xita in tekl tinb, kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.
47010018	Abal an inik xu kldhb ti alwa, yab jaich xi jajki in till tinb alwa, an inik xu kldhb ti alwa, jaich xu chutb ti alwa inik kal an Ajtiklb.
47011001	U lak max ti kin axtsitsik w xowa neech ku ulu xu usnal ke i tntotalb! Ti kin axtsitsik.
47011002	Nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, kal jun i kanidhaxtalb xi tl ba Dios; pos tu pidhnmalichtsik ba na Kristo ani u l tu ututsik kal Jaj, jelti jun i tsidhan xi neech ka tomkin kal jnki tokot i inik.
47011003	Por u chejnl ki kambiyattsik jelt xan ti kambiyat na Eba kal an chan ani ki plmdhantsattsik an ta chalab abal yabich ka ntsi ka bela na Kristo in lujtalki.
47011004	Pos tattsik a bachwal max jun xita ka ulich in till keet a Jess k xi waw i tilmal ba tattsik. A bachwaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb jun i ejattalb xi yab jaich an Tokat Ejattalb xa bachmalichtsik; ani a bachwaltsik jeye jun i oktsixtalb xi yab jaich xa bachmalichtsik.
47011005	U chalpayal ke nan yab ms w u jalbl k jachan xu bijyb ti “pakdha abatwle.”
47011006	Maske yab u lej ejtowal tin kw alwa, por u kool an chalab; jelt xan ti xalkmalich kal ejtalki ani xantikichki.
47011007	Awxe walats xowa u taja tam tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab ani yab tu utsatsik ti kin jalbiy? Yab walats xowa u taja tam ti nan u chaka tub abal tattsik ki tekb.
47011008	U bachkuntsmal ti tumn keet an belomtsik abal ku koy xowa u yntsal; ani anchan, ku ejto tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab.
47011009	Tam tin kwajay kal tattsik ani u koy i yejetalb, yab u kontsi xata ni jun xita. Pos an kidhblbtsik xi ulich xi tl Masedonia, tin pidhatsik xowa u yntsal. Yab tu kontsitsik xata, nibal jayki neech tu kontsitsik.
47011010	Anchan jelt xan ta chobich alwa ke u exllich nin tsubaxtalbil na Kristo, anchan jeye tu chob ke ni jun xita xu kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wixkintsi jech an ti kijidhtalb xu kool.
47011011	Jantki tin kw anchan? Awxe yab tu kanidhltsik? Na Dios in chob alwa abal tu kanidhltsik.
47011012	Por neech ku ntsi ku taja xowa u tajl abal yab ku walkatsik xi xeech in ayal xan ti kin koytsik jun i kijidhtalb jelti xi waw i kool.
47011013	Pos jechtsik i kambix abatwletsik, u kambixtsik. In wynltsik ke u abatwle kal na Kristo.
47011014	Ani jech yab yejat ki lbna, pos an lej atax u xechinal jeye jelti tokat abatwle xu dhabalb kal a Dios.
47011015	Jaxtm ti yab yejat ki lbna, ke nin tojnliltsik u xechinal jeye jelti iniktsik xin tajl xowa lujat. Por tam kin bajaw an kij, neech kin bachutsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
47011016	U witskowal jun ku ulu jech: ke ni jun xita kin chalpay ke nan yab in chalpadh, por max anchan ta chalpayaltsik, ti kin walkatsik tin kw jelti max yab in chalpadh abal ku ejto neye ku teka w tub.
47011017	Xowa neech ku ulu yab Jaj an Ajtiklb tin pidhl ku ulu, jech u ulal jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh ani in l kin teka tinb.
47011018	Pos kom yn waach xin tekltsik tinb kal jajki tin kwetm chalab, neech neye ku teka tub.
47011019	Kom a chalpayal ke i chalpadhtsik tajat, a kuxyaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb xi yabtsik chalpadh.
47011020	Pos a kuxyaltsik max jun xita ti ki jolibna, max ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa ani max ti ki kwey. A kuxyaltsik jeye max ki tajan jelti max yab xata a jalbl ani maske ki pikyat.
47011021	Maske tidhetl ku ulu, waw yab tajat i toknmal ki taja xowa in tajl taltsik! Por xowa keettsik in toknl kin taja, neech neye ku tokna ku taja, maske jech xowa u ulal, u ulal jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh.
47011022	Jajtsik u ebreo? Nan neye. U israelitatsik? Nan neye. U kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham? Nan neye.
47011023	U tjontsixtsik ta Kristo? Nan ms k jajtsik. Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh. Pos nan ms in tjnkich k jajtsik, ms in kwadhnkich k jajtsik, ms ynlich tin balyb ban wikaxte ani yantalich tajat u tametnmal an cheml k jajtsik.
47011024	Botalich u bachwal jun inik lajubelju i wichate tam in lekbayb kal an judotsik.
47011025	Oxtalich in wisidh kal i te ani juntal, in tujbadh. Oxtalich tin luychinal kal i tan ani jun i kij u watna jun i akal ani jun a kts chejel pujal.
47011026	In belnekich tajat ynl; u watnmalich tajat i kakadhtalb ban waljatsik ani i kakadhtalb kal i kwtsik. In kajnadh kal nu at kidhtaltsik ani kal xi yab u at kidhtaltsik. U watnmalich i kakadhtalb ban bitsow, ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ban pujal ani in tajtsidh xowa yab alwa kal xin kambixnltsik ke u belom.
47011027	U kymal tajat i tojlb ani in chekenek; ynlich tajat u ejmal i akal; u watnmal i kanab ani i tsiknib; ynlich tajat in klnk; u watnmal in chamy ani u yntsmal u kudhkmil.
47011028	Ani yab tokot jki u watnmal jech, tsudhey ka tsudhey in chalpax kal tin kwenta ejtal an belomtsik.
47011029	Max jun xita kwajat yab lej likat, jyki max nan na yab in likat. Max ka walbindh jun xita, tidhetl u achl ani in chaklml kal xu walbindhax.
47011030	Max yejat ki teka tib, nan neech ku teka tub kal tin kwenta tam tu acha yab in likat.
47011031	Na Dios, nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xin tomnl ka kakn malill i kij, in chob abal tsubax xowa u ulal.
47011032	Tam tin kwajay Damasko, an pulek awiltalb xi kwajat in tjontsal an pulek takix xin bij Aretas, in kwajba i belkoltsik bin wilbil an bitsow abal kin yakwan ani kin jn tin wiknl;
47011033	por in pab kal jun i toknal bin bentanajil in mapl an bitsow ani anchan tu ejto ku chinkontsi.
47012001	Yab xata neech ku ta max kin xechin ku tila alwa tub. Por neech ku tila an xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidhmal ku chuu an Ajtiklb.
47012002	U exll jun i inik xin bell na Kristo. In koolich lajuch i tamub, jech an inik jn asta tin xlb an walki. Yab u chob max jn kl in tul o yaba; por na Dios in chob.
47012003	Por u chob abal jachan an inik, kl in tul o yaba, jachan yab u chob, tokot na Dios in chob,
47012004	jn ban kijidhtalb xon tin acha i tilabtsik xi yab xita in achmal jayki ani yab u walkb ke jun xita kin ulu.
47012005	Nan neech ku ejto ku tila alwa jech an inik, por nan yab neech ku ejto ku teka tub, tokot neech ku ejto ku teka tub kal tin kwenta tam ku acha yab in likat.
47012006	Por max nan u l ku teka tub, jachan, yab jaich jun i tntotalb, pos tokot neech ku ulu xowa tsubax; por yab u tajl anchan abal ni jun xita yab kin chalpay ke nan ms in plek tin kwajat k xan tin chutaltsik o xowa in achltsik u ulal.
47012007	Na Dios tin xalkantsi yn xata labidh, por abal yab ku lej teka tub, in yajlombdh kal jun i yajal xi jyki jelti max in xikan kal jun i kdh bu tul. Jech, tsch jelti jun in yamtal an lej atax abal ti kin yajlombdha.
47012008	Oxtalich u pakabdhmal an Ajtiklb abal ti kin wixkintsi jech an ti yajal;
47012009	por an Ajtiklb tin utsmal ench: “Nu alwatal jaich tokot na yntsal; pos nu chp u xalkanal ms alwa tam jun xita yab lej likat.” Jaxtm tin kulbl tajat kom yab in lej likat abal ka xalkan ba nan nin chp na Kristo.
47012010	Jaxtm, kal tin kwentaki abal u bellich na Kristo, in kulbl tajat abal yab in lej likat. In kulbl tam in odhbijyb, tam u kool i yejetalb, tam in atnal ani tam in tepinal. Abal tam ku acha yab in likat, tmich ti ms in likat.
47012011	Nan u junwal jelti jun xita xi yab chalpadh abal in kwajay ku teka tub, por tattsik tin tajmal ku taja anchan. Pos tattsik nin tomnl ti kin tila alwa; pos kal ni jun xata ti w u jalbl k jachan xin ulal ke jajtsik u pakdha abatwle maske nan yab xata u jalbl.
47012012	Kal an tojlb xu taja kal tattsik kal yantam i kaymtalb, xalkan kal i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ke tsubax lejtal tin abatwle.
47012013	Kal jantokl tu tajmal ms w a jalbl k xi keet an belomtsik? Tokot abal yab tu kontsmaltsik ti kin tolmiy. Ti kin pakwlantsi abal yab tu kontsitsik ti kin tolmiy!
47012014	Xo in kwajatich tojojodh abal kin kale tu lnatsik tin oxtsl ani yab in neech abal tu tojliytsik. Pos yab u ayal xowa a kooltsik, tu ayal tattsik; pos an ttalbtsik jaich na yejat kin junku an tumn abal an chakamtsik ani yab an chakamtsik abal an ttalbtsik.
47012015	Nan neech ku paku kal yantam i kulbtalb xowa u kool, asta neech ku pidhna tub kal tin alwabl na ejattaltsik; maske lejat nan tu kanidhltsik ms, tattsik ms wich tin kanidhltsik.
47012016	Por taltsik, maske in chob abal yab xata tu kontsmaltsik, in ulaltsik ke nan tu kambiymaltsik.
47012017	Awxe u ynmal jun xita xu abmal abal tu kambiytsik?
47012018	U pakabdha na Tito abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik ani u aba jeye kal jaj na jn an kidhblb. Awxe ti kambiytsik na Tito? Yabxe tsubax ke nan ani na Tito, jaychki an chalab i kool ani jaychki ni ejattal?
47012019	Kal jech xowa i ulal, a chalpayaltsikxe ke i l ki kldha tib tu alwa kal tattsik? Yaba! Exom tu kw tin tamt na Dios tin bij na Kristo. Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, ejtal jech xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik, jaich abal ki belmchtsik ms.
47012020	Abal u chejnl ke tam kin kale tu lnatsik, t yab tu elatsik xan ti nan u l ani tattsik, yab teye ti kin chuu xan ti tattsik a l. U chejnl max ku ela i pjxtalb, i tlxtalb, i chkxtalb, i kxtalb, i dhbjxtalb ani i tlxtalb. U chejnl tu elatsik yab i kwajajadh alwa ani ka tekltsik tab.
47012021	U chejnl jeye ke tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, na Dios ti kin tidhebdha kal tattsik ta kwenta; ani kin ukin kal tin kwenta xi yn xi tattsik xin walmtsik ms okox ani asta xo yab in jilmaltsik ti kwajl yab exbadh. Bl u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal ani in ntsal kin tajatsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul.
47013001	Jech jaich tin oxtalich tin neech tu lnatsik. Ejtal neech ka lejkin kal tin kwintal chb o x i lnaxtsik.
47013002	Tam tin kwajat kal tattsik, u utsa xin walltsik ani xo u utsltsik jun ani xi keettsik jeye, ke tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, yab neech tu kontsitsik ti yajnantsixtalb.
47013003	Anchan, neech tm ka chuchtsik ke na Kristo xi kwajat tu itsch, jaich nu kw. Ani na Kristo neech Ja ti ki tawnatsik chapik, pos Jaj yab Ja neech ti ki tawnatsik kal i chaattalb.
47013004	Na Jesukristo pajkiyat ban peltsidh te tam ti xechin kal in tul jelti xi waw i kool; por xo, kwajat ejat kal tin chp na Dios. Anchan weye waw, i junwal jelti Jaj tam ti pajkiyat ban peltsidh te, por u kwajat ejat jelti Jaj kal tin chp na Dios abal tu tolmiytsik.
47013005	Ka chuutsik tab max tsubax lejtal ta belomich, ka exlatsik alwa tab. Yabxe a chobtsik ke na Jesukristo kwajat ba tattsik, max tsubax lejtal ta belomtsik?
47013006	Nan u l ku chuu ka exbaytsik ke waw yab u kambix.
47013007	I kontsal na Dios abal yab ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa, yab abal waw ku kldh tu alwa, i tajl anchan abal ka tajatsik xowa alwa, maske waw yab ku kldh tu alwa.
47013008	Pos yab neech ki ejto ki tomna xowa in ulal an tsubaxtalb, tokot neech ki ejto ki tolmiy abal ka tajan xowa in ulal.
47013009	Jaxtm tu kulbl tam i achl yab u likat abal tattsik ki likey; ani neech ki ntsi ki kontsi na Dios abal ka lujkutsik ms tab.
47013010	Tu abtsaltsik okox jech an ti w abal ka lejkiytsik tab. U tajl anchan abal tam kin kale tu lnatsik, yab tu chapik tawnatsik kal an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb. Jech an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb, jaich abal tu tolmiytsik ms ki belmch ani yab abal tu kibdhatsik.
47013011	Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ki kwajaytsik i kulbl, ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay ms lujat, ki kjdhmdhxin, ka koytsik junini na chalab ani ki kwajaytsik kijidh. Ani na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, neech ka kwajay kal tattsik.
47013012	Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb.
47013013	Ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
47013014	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani nin kanidhaxtal na Dios. Ani ke an Tokat Ejattalb ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.
48001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, in abatwle, yab in abnk nibal in bijidh kal i iniktsik; in bijidh ani in abnk kal Jaj tajat na Jesukristo ani kal na Dios an Ttalb. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo tam ti chemdh.
48001002	Nan ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat kal nan, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xin bij Galasia.
48001003	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios an Ttalb ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
48001004	Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xin pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil ani ti ku loo kal xowa yab alwa xi waach tajat xo jech i kij. Anchan ti tjan kom ni Tta Dios anchan tin lena.
48001005	Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
48001006	In labnal tajat abal exom a jilltsik jikat na Dios, xi ti kanymaltsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Kristo ani exom a wwnltsik jun i keet oktsixtalb.
48001007	Yab abal ki ulu ke waach keet i alwa tilab. Xowa u tmnal, jaich ke waach taltsik xi ti ojtsaltsik ta chalab ani in ltsik kin jalkuy nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.
48001008	Por max jun xita ti ki oktsi jun i oktsixtalb ani ka achatsik abal yab j an alwa tilab xa achmalichtsik, ke jachan an inik ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb, yab ka dhatsik ti kwenta maske jachan an inik jaich nan o jun i tokat abatwle xi tl walki.
48001009	Jelt xan ti ulmalich okox, xo i witskowal jun ki ulu: Max jun xita ti ki oktsitsik jun i oktsixtalb ani yab j xa bachmalichtsik, ke jachan an inik ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb.
48001010	Tam u ulal jech, awxe jaich abal u l kin kldh tin alwa kal an atiklbtsik o abal u l kin kldh tin alwa kal na Dios? Awxe jaich abal u l kin jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik? Yaba! Max u lenlkijak lejtal kin jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik, yab neech ku ejto ku tjontsi na Kristo.
48001011	Kidhblbtsik, ka chobna ke an alwa tilab xu till, yab in chalab i iniktsik.
48001012	Yab u bachmal nibal in oktsidh kal ni jun i inik; xita tin oktsmal, jaich na Jesukristo.
48001013	Tattsik a achmal xan tin kwajatwiik tam ti nan u wewkmtsal tin belomtal an judotsik. Ani a chobichtsik jeye xan tu atax tajtsmal xin belltsik na Dios abal u lenl ku taxkantsi an ti belomtalb xin kool.
48001014	Kal nin belomtal an judotsik, nanwiik na ms okox tajat tin kwajat tam ti jachan i kij k nu kidhtaltsik; pos nan mswiik u kulbetnl tajat ku taja alwa xowa tu jiltsmal ki taja ni weje pakliltsik.
48001015	Por na Dios tin takwymal tam ti yabl in wachink tin chakam ani Jaj tin kanymal kal tin kwenta nin alwatal. Jaxtm, tam ti Jaj anchan tin lena,
48001016	tin taja ku exlantsi an tin Chakmil abal kin xechin ku tila ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo. Tam ti nan u tamu jech, yab in kale ku konoy ni jun xita xanty yejat ku taja,
48001017	nibal in kale Jerusaln abal ku chuu xi kejle u abatwlejichtsik tam ti nan yabl. Tokot in kale ban chabl xu bijyb Arabia ani tayl in witsiy jun Damasko.
48001018	Tayl, tam ti watenekich x i tamub, tm tin kale Jerusaln; u exla na Pedro ani in kwajay kal jaj lajub a kts.
48001019	Por yab u chuu ni jun xita ms xu abatwletsik jeye, tokot u chuu na Jakobo, nin kidhb an Ajtiklb.
48001020	Tu utsltsik tsubax tin tamt na Dios, ke jech xowa exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik, ejtal tsubax.
48001021	Ms tayl, in kale ban chabl xin bij Siria ani ban chabl xin bij Silisia.
48001022	Xin bellichtsik na Kristo, xu kwajltsik ban chabl xin bij Judea, yabtsik tin exll.
48001023	Tokot in achltsik u tilnal ench: “Xi tu kajnlwiik tajat abal ti ku atax tajtsi, xo jaj xeech in ulal ke yejat ka belan na Kristo. Jech xi xo in ulal anchan, jaich xi ti wel chabki in lenlwiik kin taxka an belomtalb.”
48001024	Ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios tam tin achatsik xanty in tajmal kal nan.
48002001	Tam ti nan u belaich na Jesukristo ani watch lajuch i tamub, in kale jun Jerusaln kal na Bernab ani u jna jeye na Tito kal nan.
48002002	In kale taja, abal na Dios tin ltsi kin kale. Taja Jerusaln, u junkun wawki kal an ultalb abatwletsik xi exlmte ti oklektsik ani u ltsitsik an ti alwa tilab xu tiltsal xi yabtsik u judo. U taja jech abal yab u l ke xowa u tajmalich ani xowa in kwajat u tajl, ka jilkon jelti jun xata xi yab in jalbl.
48002003	Por nibal na Tito, xi ta jeye ti kwajat kal nan, maske u griego, yab tajtsin ti chplb abal kin taja an exl bin tul jelt xan tin tajl an israelitatsik.
48002004	T jeye kejle ti kwajat xin ani ulal ke u kidhblbtsik, xi ochenektsik chinatki kal waw. Jechtsik in l kin chuu xantki ti yabich i wwnl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, pos jajtsik in l kin chuu ku jolibn kal jachan an takixtalb.
48002005	Por yab i walka nw ti ku kambiytsik kom yab i l ki chuu ka kibdhatsik an tsubaxtalb xa bachmalich kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab.
48002006	Por yab tin pidhatsik ni jun i t chalab xi kwajattsik exlmte ti ultalb abatwletsik; (maske nan yab kejle xata ku yna xanty in y jajtsik, pos na Dios yab kwajat in tell max jun xita ms ultalb o yaba).
48002007	Jajtsik yab in ejto ti kin pidhatsik t ti chalab, tokot in exbaytsik abal a Dios tin punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb abal kin xechin ku tiltsi jech an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo, jelt xan ti na Pedro punkuntsidh abal kin taja jech an tojlb ban judotsik.
48002008	Jech na Dios xin kwajbmal na Pedro ti abatwle ban judotsik, jaychki xi tin kwajbmal neye tin abatwle abal xi yabtsik u judo.
48002009	Jaxtm, na Jakobo, na Pedro ani na Juan, xu bijyb kal an belomtsik ti oklek, in exbaytsik abal a Dios tin pidhmal jech an ti alwatalb. Nan ani na Bernab u chapndha kal jajtsik jelti jun i exl abal ki chuu ke jajtsik tu kulbetnl weye tin at abatwle ani in ulutsik abal alwa ku xechin ki tiltsi an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo, lejat jajtsik neech kin taja jech an tojlb ban judotsik.
48002010	Tokot tu punkuntsitsik abal yab ki uktsi ki tolmiy an chojontltsik; ani anchan u tajl, yab u uktsal an chojontltsik.
48002011	Por tam ti na Pedro tsch ban bitsow xin bij Antioka, u kwiya tin tamt abal xowa xin taja, yab alwa.
48002012	Pos jidhtal, jaj u kapulwiik kal xi yabtsik u judo, por tam ti ulich chb x i iniktsik xi abnk kal na Jakobo, in tuju tm ti wml ani in jila ti kapul kal xi yabtsik u judo. Pos in jiknl jachan an iniktsik xin kool an exl bin tul kom u judotsik.
48002013	Tam ti na Pedro chutat in tajl anchan, in taja jeye xi keet an judotsik xu belomich, asta na Bernab in taja jeye anchan.
48002014	Por tam ti nan u chuu abal yab in tajl xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat ban alwa tilab, u utsa ench na Pedro tin tamt ejtal an belomtsik: “Max tat, xi jaich jun i judo, i kwajl jelt xan tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo, jantki ta utsltsik ka kwajay jelti judo xi yabtsik u judo?”
48002015	Waw kejle u judo asta tu chakam ani yab u lej walablom jelt xi keet an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.
48002016	Por i chobich alwa ke na Dios yab neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj ni jun xita, abalki in tajmal xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; tokot neech kin kwajbl alwa kal Jaj, xita kin bela na Jesukristo. Jaxtm waw, i belmalich weye na Jesukristo abal ti ku kwajbaich alwa na Dios kal Jaj tin kwentaki jech an belomtalb ani yab abalki yab i chikat tajmal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Pos na Dios, yab neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj ni jun xita abalki yab in chikat tajmal jech an takixtalb.
48002017	Ani xo, max waw ki lena ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, u xalkanalich tm jelti max waw weye u walbinalich, awxe jech in l kin ulu ke na Kristo tu tajl ku walbin? Yaba!
48002018	Pos max ku paku jun xata ani tm ku taja jun, in kalelich tm in walbidh.
48002019	Abal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tin taja kin chemech ani xo yabich neech kin ejto tin takiy jachan an takixtalb; xo, neech ku ejtch kin kwajay ejat ani tokot ku tjontsal na Dios.
48002020	Nan in kwajat jelti max in chemnekich pajkidh ban peltsidh te junax kal na Kristo. Jaxtm, xi xo kwajat ejat, yabich nan; jaich na Kristo xi kwajat ejat ba nu ejattal. Ani xi xo kwajat ejat ba nu tul, jaich an xechintalb xu bachu tam tu belaich nin Chakmil na Dios. Jech nin Chakmil na Dios, jaich xi tin kanidhl tajat ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal nan tu kwenta.
48002021	Yab u l ku pojkantsi tin alwatal na Dios; pos max jun xita neechak kin ejto ka kwajch alwa kal na Dios abalki yab in chikat tajmal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tm, yabich xata ti neech ka yan an cheml xin watna na Kristo.
48003001	Chojontl a chubl atiklbtsik xi Galasia, yabtsik tajat a exbayal! Awxe jun xita ti dhimkaymaltsik abal yabich ka ejto ka exbaytsik an tsubaxtalb? Kal an tiltsixtalb xi waw i tajmal, tu ltsmalichtsik ta tamt, Jaj tajat na Jesukristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
48003002	Ti kin utsatsik p xo jech: A bachmaltsikxe an Tokat Ejattalb abal yab a chikat tajmaltsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss o abal a belmal xowa a achmaltsik?
48003003	Jantki awil ti yabtsik tajat a exbayal? A chalpayaltsikxe ka kidhbay kal tatkitsik a chp xowa a tujmaltsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb?
48003004	Yn i yajtsiktalb a watnmaltsik kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, ani yab xata ta ynmaltsik? Yabich tajat in tomnl max anchan!
48003005	Tam na Dios ti ki pidhatsik an tin Tokat Ejattal ani kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb ba tattsik, jantki tin tajl? Yab in tajl abal yabtsik a chikat tajl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tajl, abal a belltsik xowa a achmal.
48003006	Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.
48003007	Jaxtm, yejat ka chobnatsik ke xu kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham, jaich xu belomtsik.
48003008	Dhutsadh ti kwajat ban Tokat Dhuslab ke na Dios neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj xi yabtsik u judo kal nin belomtalki, jaxtm na Dios tin okxintsm kin utsa jech an ti alwa tilab na Abraham: “Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl, neech ka lbtjan kal tatki ta kwenta.”
48003009	Jaxtm, xita ka belmch, u lbtjnalich jeye tm junax kal na Abraham xi belmmadh.
48003010	Xin kwajbltsik nin belomtal bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kibchonktsik ti kwajat. Abal an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Xita yab kin taja ejtal xowa kwajat bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kibchonktsik ti kwajat.”
48003011	Tejwaich p tajat, ke ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios abalki in tajmal xowa kwajat bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech.”
48003012	Ani nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab jaich abal ki kwajba taja ni belomtal, tokot in ulal ench: “Xita kin ejto kin taja ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay alwa.”
48003013	Na Kristo tu loo kal nin xichl abal yabich ku kwajay ban kibeltalb xin pidhnl jachan an takixtalb, pos na Kristo, tajan jelti jun xata kibenek kal wawki ti kwenta, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Kibenek tajat xita ka pajkiyat ba jun i te.”
48003014	Jech tmun abal kin bachutsik an lbtajaxtalb xi yabtsik u judo xi usnk neech ka pidhan na Abraham kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess ani ki ejto jeye ki bachu ejtal tu b, an Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal na Dios neech ti ku pidha kal tin kwentaki ni belomtal.
48003015	Kidhblbtsik, tu kwajbantsal jun i ltsixtalb xi kldhats ban xechintalb xi techki ti kayl: Tam jun i inik kin taja jun i lejkintalb ani kin jila dhutsadh nin bij, ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin paku nibal kin puntsiy jachan an lejkintalb.
48003016	Pos xo, xowa na Dios in utsm neech kin pidha na Abraham, utsan jeye nin kidhtal. An Tokat Dhuslab yab in ulal: “kidhtalbtsik” jelti max yn i atiklbtsik, tokot in ulal: “ani na kidhtal.” Jech in l kin ulu jnki tokot i inik, jaich na Kristo.
48003017	Xowa u ulal jaich jech: Na Dios in tajm jun i lejkintalb kal na Abraham ani in lej tsubka. Jaxtm nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, xi ulich ch i bo inik kal jun inik lju i tamub ms tayl, yab neech kin ejto kin wkoy jachan an lejkintalb ani kin jila yab xata in jalbl xowa in ulmal na Dios.
48003018	Pos max an jiltsixtalb xi neech ku pidhan kal na Dios, tokot neech ku pidhan abalki i tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tm, yabich neech ki bachu abalki i bell xowa na Dios in ulmal; por na Abraham pidhan aniki tajat jachan an jiltsixtalb kal na Dios tam tin bela xowa utsan kal Jaj.
48003019	Pos tm, jant ti alwa nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Kwajb taylich abal ka xalk an walastalb xin tajl an atiklbtsik. Tokotki neech ti ynal asta ka ulich jachan an “kidhtalb” xi usnk neech ka pidhan xowa in ulmal na Dios. An takixtalb tiladh kal i tokat abatwletsik ani na Moiss yn abal kin ltsi jachan an takixtalb an atiklbtsik.
48003020	Por yab yejat ni jun i ltsix tam jnki tokot i inik, pos na Dios, jn tokot.
48003021	Awxe jech in l kin ulu ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss yab in junwal kal xowa in ulmal na Dios? Yaba! Pos max pidhnatsak jun i takixtalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, neech tm ki ejto ku utey abal ku kwajch alwa kal na Dios abalki i tajl xowa in ulal an takixtalb.
48003022	Por xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab jaich jech: ejtal i wiknl ta kwajat kal an walastalb; anchan tin ulal abal an belomtsik kin ejto kin bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna, kal tokotki kin bela na Jesukristo.
48003023	Tam ti yabl ulnek an belomtalb, u wiknl tu kyb kal an takixtalb, i aytsm ka pidhn ka chobn an belomtalb.
48003024	Jaxtm waw, u kwajatwiik u belkmte kal an takixtalb jelti max u tsitsik chakam abal ti ku oktsi asta tam ka ulich na Jesukristo ani kal tokot ki bela Jaj, ki ejto ku utey abal ku kwajch alwa kal a Dios.
48003025	Ani xo, kom ulnekich an belomtalb, yabich u kwajat bin takixtal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
48003026	Pos kal tin kwentaki abal i belomich, ejtal tattsik i chakmlbich kal na Dios abal i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
48003027	Ejtal tattsik xi kwajatich kal na Kristo abal i pujadhichtsik, i kwajatich i mkmte kal Jaj jelti max Jaj, u xeketlb.
48003028	Yabich yejat max u judo o u griego, u jolib o yaba, inik o i uxum; pos max i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, ejtal tattsik jn tokot ta ynal.
48003029	Ani max i dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo, tm, i kidhtalbichtsik teye kal na Abraham ani neech ka bachutsik jelti jun i jiltsixtalb xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna.
48004001	Xowa u l ku ulu jaich jech: Max jun i chakam xi neech kin bachu jun i jiltsixtalb chipl bl, in junwal jelti jun i jolib xi kwajat ti tjontsix ba jun i at maske jaj in dhabal ejtal xowa waach taja ba jachan an at.
48004002	Waach taltsik xin beletnl i chakamtsik ani in beletnl jeye xowa neech ka jiltsin asta xowki kin ulu an ttalb abal ka pidhanich.
48004003	Anchan jeye u tmnal kal waw. Tam ti waw u xeech jelti max u tsitsik chakam, u kwajinek belkmte kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal xowakich an belomtalb xi waach tech ti kayl.
48004004	Por tam tin bajaw xowki na Dios tin ulmal, in aba nin Chakmil, xi wachin ba jun i tsidhan mmlb ani ulich jelti jun i judo, taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
48004005	Nin Chakmil na Dios, tsch abal ti ku kldha bin takixtal jachan an takixtalb ani ti ku bachch na Dios jelti max tu chakmil.
48004006	Ani abal ti ki xalkantsitsik ke i chakmlbich kal Jaj, na Dios ti abtsi an tin Tokat Ejattal nin Chakmil ba na itsch. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba na itsch in ulal kawidh ench: “Tat tu Tta!”
48004007	Anchan p, tat jaich jn xu chakmlbich kal na Dios ani yabich i jolib. Kom i chakmlbich kal Jaj, na Dios neech ti ki pidha an ti jiltsixtalb xin ulmal neech kin pidhna.
48004008	Ti wel chabki, tam ti yabltsik a exll na Dios, i kyb ta jolib kal i chilabtsik.
48004009	Por xo, kom a exllichtsik na Dios, o ms alwa ki ulu, ke na Dios ti exllichtsik xo, jantki bl ta chalpayaltsik ki witsiy kal jachan an chalab xi yab xata in jalbl ani yab alwa abal ki kyattsik jun kal jachan an takixtalb jelti jun i jolib?
48004010	Tattsik bl a pakwlantsal taltsik a kts, a ch, in ajumtal a ch ani i tamubtsik.
48004011	In kwajl tajat tin chalpax abal u chejnl max an tojlb xu tajmal ba tattsik, yab xata in jalblnmal.
48004012	Kidhblbtsik, tu punkuntsal abal ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ti nan in kwajat; pos nan in kwajatwiik in taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por xo yabich, xo in wenkonkich jelti jn ti b xi tattsik. Yab abal ki ulu ke tattsik tin tajtsmal jun xata yab alwa.
48004013	Pos jelt xan ta chobichtsik, tam ti jidhtal tu tiltsitsik jech an alwa tilab, jaich abal in yawlch.
48004014	Ani jachan an yawlch xu koy, jaich abal ki chutat xantitsik teye; por ibch abal a chuutsik anchan, tin pojkmalak o yabak tin bachmaltsik. Yab a dhatsik ti kwenta max anchan, ms tokot tin bachutsik alwa jelti max nan tin tokat abatwlejil a Dios, jelti max nanich nin Jesukristo.
48004015	Janty tmun kal jachan an kijidhtalb xa achatsik? Tsubax u ulal, ke max a ejtowalaktsik ka jixa na wal, a jixmalaktsik ani tin pidhmalak.
48004016	Ani xo, awxe ka ulutsik tu atlki abal tu ltsaltsik an ti tsubaxtalb?
48004017	Jachan an atiklbtsik in l tajat kin chuu ki junkun kal jajtsik, por yab abal ta alwabltsik. Xowa jajtsik in l, in l kin chuu ki wkon kal waw ani ki kaletsik kal jaj.
48004018	Pos alwaich, alwa kejle ki kaniy jun xita abal ka junkun kal waw, por ki taja abal tin alwabl ani echeki, yab tamki nan in kwajat kal tattsik.
48004019	Tsitsik chakmil, u achl jun i yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta kwenta jelti an yajal xin achl jun i nnalb tam nechich kin wachiy jun i chakam; ani neech ku ntsi ku acha jech an yajal, asta ku chuu ke a junwalichtsik jelti na Kristo.
48004020	U lak max in kwajat xo kal tattsik abal ku ejto tu tawnatsik alwa; pos yabich u chob xanty ku chalpay kal tattsik ta kwenta!
48004021	Tattsik, xa lenl ka ntsi ka wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, ti kin utsatsik jech: Yabxe a achmaltsik xowa in ulal jachan an takixtalb?
48004022	Pos in ulal ke na Abraham in kymal chb in chakmiltsik: jn kal nin jolbal ani jn kal nin tomtal; nin tomtal, yab ja i jolib.
48004023	Nin chakmil nin jolbal, wachin jeye ti chakam jelt xan tu wachinal ejtalkitsik ti chakam; por an chakam xin koy nin tomtal na Abraham, wachin ti chakam abal ka tjan xowa in ulmal na Dios.
48004024	Jech jaich jelti jun i ltsixtalb. Xi jech chb an mmlbtsik, in l kin ulu xi chb an lejkintalb. Xi jn an lejkintalb, jaich xi tajan ban chn xu bijyb Sina ani jaich nin l kin ulu na Agar; xu wachinaltsik kal jachan an lejkintalb, u wachinal tech ti kayl abal ti jolibtsik.
48004025	Pos na Agar jaich in l kin ulu an chn xu bijyb Sina xi kwajat Arabia ani jech, jaich an Jerusaln xi xo, pos jech an bitsow ani nin atiklbiltsik, kwajat jelti jolibtsik.
48004026	Por an Jerusaln xi walki, yab ja u jolib ani waw kl tu chakmlb.
48004027	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ki kulb, mmlb xi yab i knal; ki dhjan kal i kulbtalb, tat xi yab jayki a achmal ni jun i yajal xu axnal tam u wachiyb jun i chakam. Abal an mmlb xi jilnk, neech kin koy ms in chakmiltsik k an mmlb xi kwajat kal in tomkl.
48004028	Kidhblbtsik, tattsik a junwal jelti na Isk; tattsik jaich an chakmlbtsik xi na Dios in ulmal.
48004029	Por anchan jelt tam ti jachan i kij, an chakam xi wachin jelt xan tu wachinal ejtalki an chakamtsik in atl an chakam xi wachindh kal an Tokat Ejattalb, anlki jeye xo tu tmnal.
48004030	Por janty in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab? In ulal ench: “Ka aja an jolib kl nin chakmil, pos nin chakmil an jolib, yab ja neech kin bachu xowa neech kin bachu nin chakmil an mmlb xi yab u jolib.”
48004031	Anchan p kidhblbtsik, waw yab i junwal jelti nin chakmil an mmlb xu jolib, waw i junwal jelti nin chakmil an mmlb xi yab u jolib.
48005001	Na Kristo tu kldha abal yabich ku kwajay taknl kal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss abal ku kwajch walkadh. Pos ka ntsitsik p ki kwajay ba jachan an walkadhtalb ani yabich ka witsintsitsik ki kyat jelti jolib kal jachan an takixtalb.
48005002	Ti kin axtsitsik. Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu utsltsik ke max ka walkatsik ki tajtsin an ti exl ba na tul, yabich tm xata ti neech ka yna na Kristo.
48005003	U ulal jun, max jun i inik ka tajtsin an ti exl bin tul, jachan an inik, kool tm kin taja ejtal xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
48005004	Tattsik xa ulal abal i kwajatich alwa kal na Dios abal a tajltsik xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb, i wmenekich kal na Kristo; yabich i kwajat bin kanidhaxtal na Dios.
48005005	Pos waw, tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb ani an belomtalb xi kool, i kool jun i aytsixtalb abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
48005006	Max u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, yabich tm xata ti neech ka yn max i kool an exl o yaba. Xowa nin jalbl, jaich ku belmch ani ke jech ni belomtal, kin taja ku kwajay u kndhx jn ani jn.
48005007	Alwaichwiik tajat ta neechtsik. Jita p ti tajatsik abal ka chikat taja an tsubaxtalb?
48005008	Na Dios xi ti kanymaltsik, yab Jaj ti tajmal ka jila ka bela an tsubaxtalb.
48005009	Yab ka uktsitsik ke “w i jilbdhaxtalb koye in jilbdhl yn i koye max ka xukyat.”
48005010	Nan u chob alwa ke an Ajtiklb yab neech ti ki walkatsik ka jalkuy na chalab; por na Dios neech kin pidha ti yajtsiktalb jachan an atiklbtsik xi xeech ti kambiyal ani yab neech kin dha ti kwenta xitam j.
48005011	Kidhblbtsik, max nan blak u ulal ka tajan an exl ba ni tul, an judotsik yabak tin atl; max anchanak, an tsubaxtalb xu till kal tin kwenta an peltsidh te xon ti pajkiyat na Kristo, yabak neech ka chakdhtsik kl.
48005012	Por xi xeechtsik ti itixbdhl kal tin kwenta an exl ba na tul, alwaak kin taj kotna nin tul!
48005013	Kidhblbtsik, tattsik i kanidh abal ki kwajay walkadh. Tokotki, maske i kwajattsik walkadh, yab ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul; ms alwa ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn abal i kndhxichtsik.
48005014	Abal ejtal an takixtalb, ench tokot tu exbayb: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
48005015	Por max ki tujeytsik ta pjx ani ki ktxintsik jn ani jn jelti an konltsik, ka koy i kwenta abal yab t ki kbdhxin tatkitsik.
48005016	Xowa tu utsltsik jaich jech: Ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul.
48005017	Abal xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, yab alwa abal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios ani an Tokat Ejattalb, in pojkl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul. Yab u kalel alwa ki taja chablamki, jaxtm yabich neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa tatkitsik a kulbetnl.
48005018	Por max jachich an Tokat Ejattalb xi ti junkmtsik, yabich tm i kwajattsik i teykmte kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
48005019	Yab tojlb ki exla xowa in tajl xi tokot in tajltsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul: u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, u ani junkunalkitsik maske yab tomkidh, in tajltsik xowa yab alwa ani xowakich xi tidhetl,
48005020	in kaknltsik xowakich i chilabtsik ani u dhimkaxtsik. U txtsik tajat, u pjxtsik ani tokot jajki in l ka kakn kal xi keettsik. Jikatki tajat u chakltsik, yab in l kin chuu ka tajan xowa in l xi keettsik ani in kxliyal i atiklbtsik.
48005021	In chakuntsal xi keettsik kal xowaki kin chuu in kool, u uchaltsik, in tajltsik xowa yab alwa ba jun i ajib ani yn ms xowa in tajltsik jelti jech. Tu ltsaltsik jun jelt xan tu utsmalich okox, ke xin tajltsik jelti jech, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
48005022	Por xowa in pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich an kanidhaxtalb, an kulbtalb, an kijidhtalb, an kaymtalb, an alwatalb, an belomtalb,
48005023	an chaattalb ani ki ejto ki kuxuy abal yab ki taja xowa yab alwa. Yab waach ni jun i takixtalb xi neech kin ejto kin ulu ke ejtal jech, yab alwa.
48005024	Por xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Jesukristo, in junwal jelti max chemnekich nin tul pajkidh ban peltsidh te junax kal Jaj; ani xo yabich in tajltsik xowa yab alwa xin kulbetnl nin tul.
48005025	Anchan xan tu kwajatich kal an Tokat Ejattalb, anlki jeye ti yejat ki exbantsi an Tokat Ejattalb xowa ti ku utsa ki taja.
48005026	Yab yejat ku kwajay jelti pojkax atiklbtsik, chkntsx jn ani jn ani yab ku kwajay ki chakuntsi xi keettsik kal xowaki i chutal in kool.
48006001	Kidhblbtsik, max ka chuu jun a at kidhb kwajlank kal i walastalb, tattsik xi teykmtejich kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, yejat ka tolmiy abal yabich ms kin wala. Por yejat ka tajatsik kal i chaattalb ani ka koytsik i kwenta, yab telab t teye ka tamu anlki.
48006002	Ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn kal xowakichki jelt xan ti tajl tam i dhayl jun xata altsik. Max ka tajaichtsik anchan, a tajlichtsik tm jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb xin jilm na Kristo.
48006003	Max jun xita in ulal ke plek ti kwajat ani yab xata in y, jajki in kambiyal tinb.
48006004	Juntsik tu b kool ki chalpay max alwa xowa i tajl, max alwa xowa i tajl, awilich tm ku kulb kal xowa i tajl ani yab yejat ki chuu max xowa i tajl ms alwa k xowa in tajl xi keettsik.
48006005	Pos juntsik tu b kool ki kuxuy ejtal xowa yejat ki watna.
48006006	Xita in bachwal jun i oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, yejat jeye kin pidha nin oktsxal wetsik xowa jaj in kool.
48006007	Yab ka kambiytsik tab, yab xita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka ubtn na Dios. Xowa kin taja an inik, jaich neech kin chuu.
48006008	Max jun xita kin taja tokot xowa jajki in kulbetnl, kal jachan xowa in tajl, kl ti neech ka jn ban kibeltalb. Por max kin taja xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ka pidhan kal an Tokat Ejattalb an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
48006009	Yab ki jila ki taja xowa alwa; pos max yab ki jila ki taja xowa alwa, tam kin bajaw an kij, neech weye ki bachu mapal alwatalb.
48006010	Jaxtm, tam yejat ki taja, ki tajtsi ti alwatalb ejtalkitsik ani ms xu belomichtsik jeye jelti waw.
48006011	Ka telatsik kal xowa i pakdha dhuslab ti exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik kal nan tajat u kubak.
48006012	Xita xin l ti ki tajtsitsik ti chplb abal ka taja an exl ba na tul, in tajltsik abal ka jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik ani yabtsik in l ka atan kal tin kwenta na Kristo xi chemdhats pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
48006013	Pos nibal xin kooltsik an exl bin tul in tajltsik ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Por in ltsik kin chuu ke tattsik ka koy teye an exl ba na tul abal in l ka utsan ke pakdhatsik ti kwajat, abalki ti tajmaltsik ka koy an exl ba na tul jelti an israelitatsik.
48006014	Por nan, yab u ulal ke in plek tin kwajat kal jun xowa, tokot in plek tin kwajat kal an cheml xin tamu na Kristo ban peltsidh te. Pos kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin tamu na Kristo ban peltsidh te, ejtal xowa yab alwa xu tajlwiik, chemech jeye pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Ani nan, jyki neye max yabich tech in kwajat ban kayl.
48006015	Pos max u kwajatich junax kal na Kristo Jess, yabich xata in jalbl max i tajmal an exl ba ni tul o yaba; xowa in jalbl, jaich ke waw i bellich na Kristo ani jyki jelti max tich tu wachink.
48006016	Pos ka bachch p an kijidhtalb ani an yajnantsixtalb ejtal xi kwajatichtsik jelt xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb ani ejtal jeye, xi na Dios in chutal jelti an lej bitsow Israel.
48006017	Ani xo, nibal tayl, yabich u l ke ni jun xita ti kin pidha jun i tojlixtalb; pos xowa xin tajtsidh yab alwa ba nu tul, in xalkl abal nan in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo.
48006018	Kidhblbtsik, ka bachwaltsik echeki ni alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
49001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lena. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl ban bitsow xi Efeso, xa bellichtsik na Kristo Jess ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
49001002	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
49001003	Ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, pos kom u kwajatich junax kal na Kristo, na Dios tu lbtajmalich kal i tokat lbtajaxtalb xi tl walki.
49001004	Na Dios tu takwymal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo tam ti yabl in tajmal an walki ani an chabl abal ku utey tin tamt u tokat ani yab u walbidh.
49001005	Kal nin kanidhaxtal tu takwymalich asta ti weje abal ku kwajch jelti max u chakmlbich kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, anchan xan ti Jaj tin kulbetna kin taja.
49001006	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti echeki i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin tokat labidh kanidhaxtal, xi kl tu lbtajl tam ku kwajch kal nin Chakmil xin kanidhl tajat.
49001007	Na Kristo tu jalbintsi an ti walab kal nin xichl xin wakla tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani tu pakwlantsi ejtal an ti walastalbil, kom plek tajat nin alwatal.
49001008	In taja abal ki bachu tajat i alwatalb kal yantam i chalpadhtalb.
49001009	Tu pidhmalich ki exla xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa, jaich xowa Jaj in kool chalpadh ke neech kin taja kal nin alwatal.
49001010	Jech xowa na Dios in kool chalpadh, jaich ke kin pidha na Kristo kin takiy ejtal xowa waach walki ani xowa waach ban kayl tam kin bajaw an kij.
49001011	Na Dios tu takwymal asta ti weje abal ku kwajch kal na Kristo ani anchan, ki bachu an chejwalixtalb xi na Dios neech kin pidhna. Ejtal jech, anchan tin taja kom anchan tin chuu alwa.
49001012	Anchan tin taja abal waw xu judo, xu okxin ki bela na Kristo, ku kwajay i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kom Jaj plek Ja tajat.
49001013	Anl teye tattsik xi yab i judo, tam ta achatsik an tsubaxtalb, tam ta tiltsintsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an loeltalb ani a belatsik na Kristo, i exliyattsik abal i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Jech an exlixtalb, jaich an Tokat Ejattalb xi na Dios in ulmal ke neech ka bachutsik.
49001014	Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ki chobna ke neech lejtal ki bachu an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Jech an chejwalixtalb neech ti ku pidha, tam kin okch kin kldha ban walastalb an atiklbtsik xi Jaj in dhabal abal ka pubdhantsat tin bij kom plek Ja tajat.
49001015	Jaxtm, tam ti nan u chobna neye abal a belltsik ni Ajtik Jess ani a kanidhltsik ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios,
49001016	yab u jill ku pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tam kin lan kal tattsik ta kwenta.
49001017	U kontsal nin Diosil ni Ajtik Jesukristo, an labidh tokat Ttalb abal ti ki pidhatsik ti chalpadhtalb ani anchan, ka ejtotsik ka exla alwa Jaj.
49001018	U kontsal jeye ti ki pidha ti chalab abal ka chobnatsik an aytsixtalb xa kool kom Jaj ti takwymalichtsik. Abal ka chobnatsik jeye xan tin publ nin jalbl an jiltsixtalb xi neech ka pidhan xu dhabalbich kal Jaj.
49001019	Ani ka chobnatsik jeye xan tin publ an chplb xi waw i kool abal u belomich. Jech in xalka kal nin pulek chp.
49001020	Jech an chplb, xalkan ba na Kristo tam ti na Dios in ejdha ti t ani in buxka tin ejt t walki.
49001021	In pidha ms plek ti awiltalb k an ajtiklbtsik, an awiltalbtsik, an chplbtsik, an takixtsik ani ni jun xita yab neech kin bawtsi an ti awiltalb xin kool na Kristo, yab tokot xoki, anl jeye tayl.
49001022	Ejtal xowa waach, na Dios in kwajba bin takixtal na Kristo ani na Kristo, kwajb abal ka kwajay jelti nin k an belomtsik.
49001023	Pos an belomtsik, jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani na Kristo, jaich nin teykm ejtal xowa waach.
49002001	Na Dios ti pidhatsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, maske i kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kal tin kwenta xowa yab alwa a tajl ani an walastalbtsik.
49002002	I kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kom a wewkmtsik an oktsixtalb xi tech ti kayl ani a tajmaltsik xowa in kulbetnl an lej atax xin takyal ejtal an atax ejattalbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Jech an lej atax, jaich kl ti teykmte an iniktsik xi yab in tajl ti kij nin kwintal na Dios.
49002003	Ejtal waw anchanwiik weye tu kwajat ti wel chabki, i wewkm tokot xowa i kulbetnl ani tokot i tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul ani xowa i chalpayal. Jaxtm, in tomnlwiik ki bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin abna na Dios, jelt xi neech kin bachutsik xi yab in tajl ti kij nin kwintal na Dios.
49002004	Por na Dios xi plek tajat in yajnantsixtal in kool, xi tu kanidha tajat kal nin pulek kanidhaxtal,
49002005	tu pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, maske u kwajatwiik jelti max u chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb xi tajl. Pos anchan p, u lowat kal nin alwatal na Dios.
49002006	Na Dios jelti max tu ejdhmalich weye junax kal na Kristo Jess jelt xan ti Jaj ejdh ani tu buxka junax kal na Kristo t walki.
49002007	Jech in taja abal ti ku xalkantsi ms tayl an ti pulek alwatalb xi tu kontsal, kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.
49002008	Pos kal tin alwatalki na Dios i loodhichtsik, kal tin kwentaki abal i belmchtsik. Jech an loeltalb yab a bachmaltsik abal a tajmal jun xata, pos a Dios ti chejwaliyamaltsik.
49002009	Yab xita neech kin ejto kin ta an loeltalb kal xowaki in tajl abal yab kin teka tinb.
49002010	Pos na Dios tu tajmal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess abal ki taja xowa alwa. Na Dios in okox tajmalich jech abal ku kwajay i tajl echeki xowa alwa.
49002011	Anchan p, ka chalpaytsik xan ta kwajatwiik. Yabtsik a kidhtal an judotsik ani jaxtm an judotsik, xin tajtsal ti exl bin tul an iniktsik ani in bijyaltsik tinb abal exlidh, ti utsltsik abal yab i exlidh.
49002012	Tam ti jachan i kij, yabtsik a exll na Kristo. Kom yabtsik i judo, yab a exll an lejkintalb kal tin kwenta xowa in ulmal na Dios neech kin pidhna. Tech ta kwajattsik ban kayl, por yabtsik a kool ni jun i aytsixtalb nibal a exlltsik na Dios.
49002013	Por xo, kom i kwajatich junax kal na Kristo Jess, tattsik xi yabwiik a exlltsik, i pidhnkich xo ka exla kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin watna na Kristo.
49002014	Na Kristo jaich xi tu tajl ku kwajay kijidh. Jaj in taja kal an judotsik ani kal xi yabtsik u judo jn tokot i bitsow, in wixka xowa in tajl ku kwajay kejtsik.
49002015	Na Kristo in wixka kal an cheml xin watna, an chkxtalb kal tin kwenta an takixtalb xin ulal xowa yejat ka tajan. Anchan, in taja abal xi chablam an bitsow ka kwajay jnki tokot, jelti max jnki tokot i inik. Anchan tin taja abal ku kwajay kijidh.
49002016	Ani anchan, kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna ban peltsidh te, na Kristo in kubdha an pjxtalb xi waachwiik kal an judotsik kal xi yabtsik u judo ani in kwajbaichtsik alwa kal na Dios, jilkonich tm jn tokot i bitsow.
49002017	Na Kristo tsch ani in tila an alwa tilab abal ku kwajay kijidh. In tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo xi kwajat jelti max w kal na Dios ani an judotsik xi kwajat jelti max utat kal na Dios.
49002018	Pos kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, ejtal maske u judo o yaba, ku utch ban Ttalb kal an junkax Tokat Ejattalb.
49002019	Jaxtm, tattsik yabich i pl iniktsik, nibal i kwajattsik ba jun i chabl xon ti yab taja i taknal. Tattsik i kidhtalbich xo kal xi tokattsik ani i kidhtalbich kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
49002020	Tattsik a junwal jelti jun i pulek at; i kwajattsik i teykmte kal jun in akan xin kwajbmal an abatwletsik ani an tiltsixtsik. Na Jesukristo, jaich na kwajat ti ultalb tujub kal jachan in akan an at.
49002021	Bin b jachan in akan an pulek at, ke jaich na Kristo, exom ti pubel ms jech an pulek at, lejkidh alwa abal ka kwajay ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
49002022	Anchan jeye tattsik, junini kal na Kristo, i junkunaltsik abal ka bajaw ki kwajay jelti jun i pulek at xon ti na Dios kwajat kal nin Tokat Ejattalki.
49003001	Jaxtm kal jech tin kwenta, nan, xu bij Pablo, in kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess abal tattsik ta alwabl xi yabtsik i judo.
49003002	A chobichtsik xna ke na Dios, kal nin alwatal, tin punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb abal tattsik ta alwabl.
49003003	Pos na Dios tin ltsi an ti chalab xin koolwiik yab tejwa, jelt xan tu dhutsmal w ms okox.
49003004	Tam ka ajaytsik, neech ka chuu abal nan u exllich xowa na Kristo in koolwiik yab tejwa.
49003005	Jech xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa na Kristo, jaich xowa an iniktsik yab pidhnk kin exla asta ti weje; por xo, na Dios in xalkantsmalichtsik nin abatwlejiltsik ani nin tiltsxiltsik kal nin Tokat Ejattalki,
49003006	ke kal tin kwentaki max kin bela an alwa tilab, xi yabtsik u judo neech jeye kin bachu jaychki an chejwalixtalb xi neech kin bachu an judotsik. Jnki tokot i bitsow ti neech ka jin an judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo ani neech jeye kin bachutsik xowa in ulmal neech kin pidhna na Dios kal tin kwenta na Kristo Jess.
49003007	Nan in kwajbadh tin tjontsix kal jech an alwa tilab kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal na Dios, xin pidhan kal Jaj nin chp.
49003008	Nan, xi ms w u jalbl k xi ms chipl xu dhabalbich kal na Dios; in pidhan an ti alwatalb ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin yanl nin alwatal na Kristo xi yabtsik u judo.
49003009	Ani tin punkuntsmal abal tu pidhatsik ka chobna xowa j an chalab xi asta ti weje, tawiik tin kool yab tejwa na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal ejtal xowa waach.
49003010	Anchan ti tmun, abal xo, kal tin kwentaki an belomtsik, ejtal an ajtiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik xi kwajattsik walki kin bajaw kin exlantsi tin publ nin chalpadhtal na Dios.
49003011	Na Dios in taja kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jech xowa in kool chalpadh asta ti weje.
49003012	Ani kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, i ejtowal ku utey ba na Dios abalki i bell na Kristo.
49003013	Jaxtm, tu kontsaltsik abal yab ka jalkuy na chalab kal xowa a chutaltsik exom u tamwal kal tattsik ta kwenta. Pos ejtal jech, u tamwal kal tattsik ta alwabl, jaxtm ti yejat ki kwajaytsik i kulbl.
49003014	Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta, tin tudhlanal tin tamt nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
49003015	Jaj u Ttalb kal ejtal xu kwajltsik chabl ani xu kwajltsik jeye walki.
49003016	U kontsal an Ttalb abal kal nin tokat alwatal, ti ki pidhatsik ti chplb ani ti likattalb ba ejattal, kal nin Tokat Ejattalki,
49003017	ani ke na Kristo, ka kwajay ba na itsch kal tin kwentaki an belomtalb xa kooltsik. Anchan, tam i kwajattsik alwa ani i kanidhaxichtsik tajat,
49003018	neech tm ka ejtch ka exbay kal ejtal an belomtsik xan tin publ nin kanidhaxtal na Kristo.
49003019	Pos u konyal ka exlatsik jech an kanidhaxtalb abal ki kwajaytsik i teykmte tajat kal na Dios. Nin publ jech an kanidhaxtalb, yab in junwal ni jun xata xowa i exll.
49003020	Ani xo, ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios, xin kool an awiltalb abal kin taja yn xata ms k xowa i konyal o i chalpayal. Jech an awiltalb, jaich xi kwajat jeye kal waw.
49003021	Ke na Dios ka pidhan kal an belomtsik ti labidh kaknaxtalb malill i kij kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess. Anchan ka tjan.
49004001	Nan, xin kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb, tu pakabdhltsik abal ki kwajay alwa xan ti yejat ka kwajaytsik xi takudhich kal na Dios.
49004002	Ka chakatsik tab, ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn kal i kanidhaxtalb.
49004003	Ki kwajaytsik echeki junini, kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal ki kwajaytsik echeki kijidh ani junini,
49004004	jelti max jnki tokot ani jnki jeye tokot an Tokat Ejattalb, anchan xan ti na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ki kwajchtsik a kool jn tokot i aytsixtalb.
49004005	Jn jeye tokot i Ajtiklb waach, jn i belomtalb, jn i pujaxtalb,
49004006	jn a Dios waach xi jaich nin Tta ejtalkitsik. Jaj kwajat ultalb kal ejtal, in xalkl nin awiltal kal ejtalki ani kwajat kal ejtalki.
49004007	Por Jaj tu pidhmal juntsik tu b an ti alwatalb, xantiki na Kristo tin lenmal ti ku pidha.
49004008	Jaxtm an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kadhiy walki, tam tin tmich xita kl tu tomnb ani in pidha ti awiltalb an iniktsik.
49004009	Ani janty in l kin ulu ke Jaj “kadhiy?” In l kin ulu ke okox paay asta xon ti ms chaat an chabltsik.
49004010	Xi paay, jaychki jeye xi kadhiy xon ti ms tekat an walki abal ka kwajay putlki.
49004011	Jaj jaich xi tu pidha ti awiltalb juntsik tu b, taltsik in pidha ti awiltalb kin tjontsitsik ti abatwle, xi keet abal ti tiltsix, xi keet abal kin tila an alwa tilab, xi keet abal kin wila an alwa tilab ani xi keet abal ti oktsix.
49004012	Anchan tin taja abal ku oktsin waw xu dhabalbich kal na Dios abal ki ejto ki tjontsi na Dios ani ku belmch ms xu kwajatich jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo,
49004013	asta ki ejto ki bajaw ku kwajay junini kal tin kwenta ni belomtal ani ki exla alwa nin Chakmil na Dios. Anchan neech tm ku kwajch lujat jelt xan ti jeye na Kristo.
49004014	Yabich tm neech ki junu jelti an chakamtsik, xi yab tajat tojlb u jalkuntsb tin chalab, xin bachwaltsik xowakichki i oktsixtalb, tam ka kambiyattsik kal i iniktsik xu kambix. Jechtsik in ynl ejtal xowa yab alwa abal ka kambixin.
49004015	Alwa ms, ki ntsi ki wwna an tsubaxtalb ani tu kndhx abal ku kwajay ms utat kal na Kristo, xi kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik.
49004016	Ani kal tin kwenta na Kristo, ejtal an belomtsik kwajat alwa ani junini kal Jaj, tin kwenta an junaxtalb xin kool an belomtsik. Ani tam an belomtsik kwajat alwa, u yanel ms ani u kanidhaxtsik ms.
49004017	Pos jech jaich tu utsltsik ani tu punkuntsaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb: yabich ki kwajaytsik ms jelt xan tu kwajltsik xi keet xi yab in exlltsik na Dios, xu kwajltsik xantiki kin chalpay kal an chalab xi yab xata in jalbl.
49004018	Nin chalab kwajat jelti max ban jikwaxtalb. Yabtsik in kool an xechintalb xi tl ba na Dios kom yabtsik xata in chob ani kom chapiktsik tajat nin itsch.
49004019	Yabich in achl tidhetl tam in tajl xowa yab alwa ani in tajltsik i ataxtalb xowakichki kin chalpay.
49004020	Por tattsik yab anchan ta oktsinktsik ka taja kal na Kristo,
49004021	max ani lejtal ta axtsmalichtsik ani i oktsidhichtsik kal Jaj xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat ba na Jess.
49004022	Ani kal tin kwenta an weje chalab xan ta kwajattsikwiik, ka jilaich, pos i odhitstsikwiik ta kwajat kal an ataxtalb xa kulbetnltsik.
49004023	Ka jalkchtsik na ejattal ani na chalab.
49004024	Ka bachchtsik an t chalab xi kwajat tajadh xan ti na Dios tin l. Jech an t chalab, u xalkanal tam ku kwajch tsubax, in lujtalki ani tokat.
49004025	Jaxtm, yabich yejat ki kmbxintsik; ki kwintsik tsubax kal na at kidhbtsik abal ejtal ni at kidhbtsik i kidhtal tu kwajat.
49004026	Max ki chakuytsik, yab ka wala ani yab ki kwajaytsik i chakl putl a kts.
49004027	Yab ka walkatsik ti ki ta an lej atax.
49004028	Xu kwwiik, kin jilaich ti kw ani ka tjonich; kin taja kal nin kubak jun i alwa tojlb abal anchan, kin koy xanty kin chejwaliy an chojontltsik.
49004029	Yab ka ulutsik i tilab xi yab alwa, tokot ka ynatsik jun i kwintalb alwa abal anchan, ka tolmintsi ms kin bachu xowa alwa xita kin acha.
49004030	Yab ka tepindhantsi tin Tokat Ejattal na Dios. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, kl ta kwajat i exlidh abal ki xalkantsik ke i dhabalbichtsik kal a Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech ki okonich ta lowb.
49004031	Ka jilaichtsik an tepintalb, an chkub, an chapik kwintalb ani an atax kwintalb.
49004032	Ki tjtsxintsik xowa alwa, ki yjnntsxintsik ani ki pkwlntsxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti na Dios ti pakwlantsitsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo.
49005001	Pos kom i chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios, xi kanidhbtsik tajat, yejat ka tajltsik xowa Jaj in tajl.
49005002	Ki kndhxintsik, jelt xan ti na Kristo tu kanidha ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal waw ti alwabl, jelt tam u chemdhb jun i borrego abal ka pikbantsat na Dios tsikadh ani kin jiktsi tin niwy.
49005003	Kom i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, yabich yejat ka wachin kal tattsik nw xita xu kwajltsik yab exbadh, ni jun xata xowa atax, nibal i chenetalb.
