49005004	Yab ka tilatsik ni jun xata xi yab tsubax, nibal xowa xi yab a exlltsik; yab jeye ki odhbijxin, pos ejtal jech yab alwa. Alwa ms ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.
49005005	Pos a chobichtsik alwa, ke max jun xita u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal o in tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo ani kal na Dios. Xita chene tajat, in junwal jelti max in kaknl i chilabtsik, yab jeye neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo ani kal na Dios.
49005006	Yab ka walkatsik ti ki kambiy ni jun xita kal i ani tilabtsik. Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu tjnal xowa yab alwa ani jaich ti neech ka tsch an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin abna na Dios abal an atiklbtsik xi yab u tajnal kl ti kij na Dios.
49005007	Pos yabtsik ka wwna xowa a chutal in tajltsik.
49005008	Tattsik i kwajatwiik jelti max ban jikwaxtalb kal tin kwenta an walastalb xa tajltsik. Por xo, kom i kwajatichtsik junax kal an Ajtiklb, i kwajatichtsik jelti max ban tajaxtalb. Ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tu kwajl an atiklbtsik xi kwajattsik ban tajaxtalb.
49005009	Pos ban tajaxtalb tu tsiil ejtal an alwatalb, an tsubaxtalb ani an lujattalb.
49005010	Ka tajltsik echeki xowa in l an Ajtiklb.
49005011	Yab ka tajltsik xowa xi yab xata in jalbl jelt xowa in tajl xi yabtsik u belom xi kwajattsik jelti max ban jikwaxtalb; ms alwa ka xalkantsitsik abal kin chuutsik ke yab alwa.
49005012	Pos tidhetl tajat ki tila asta xowa jajtsik in tajl chinat;
49005013	por tam ka xalkantsat ban tajaxtalb ejtal xowa in tajltsik, ejtal u jilkonal tejwa, pos an tajaxtalb in xalkl ejtal.
49005014	Jaxtm tu ulwb ench: Ki ejchich, tat xi kwajat ta wayal; ki chakch xon ta kwajat ban chemlomtsik ani na Kristo neech ti tajbch.
49005015	Jaxtm, ka chuutsik alwa xan ta kwajattsik. Yab ki kwajaytsik jelti xi yab chalpadh, ki kwajaytsik jelti xi chalpadh.
49005016	Ka ynatsik alwa an kij, pos an kij yab echeki alwa.
49005017	Yabtsik ka junu jelti xi yab chalpadh; ka exbaytsik alwa xowa in l ka tajan an Ajtiklb.
49005018	Yab ki uchchtsik, pos jech yab alwa, u jnax ban kibeltalb; ms alwa ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay teykmte tajat kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
49005019	Ka ajatnatsik i ajatlbtsik ani i ajatlbtsik xi ijtsinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Ka ajtintsitsik ani ka kakna kal ejtal na itsch an Ajtiklb.
49005020	Ka pidhltsik echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios an Ttalb kal ejtal xowa a tajltsik, tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
49005021	Ki kknxintsik jn ani jn abal ka xalkan ke yabich a chikat tajltsik na Dios.
49005022	An tomkidh mmlb yab yejat kin chikat tajl nin tomkl, pos jaich in l an Ajtiklb.
49005023	Abal an tomkidh inik, jaich kwajat jelti nin k nin tomtal, anchan jelti na Kristo kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik. Na Kristo jaich jeye nin Loxil an belomtsik ani an belomtsik jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo.
49005024	Pos anchan xan ti an belomtsik yab in chikat tajl na Kristo, anchan jeye an tomkidh mmlbtsik yab yejat kin chikat taja nin tomkl.
49005025	Tomkidh iniktsik, ka kanidha na tomtal, jelt xan ti na Kristo tin kanidha an belomtsik ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal tin alwabl an belomtsik.
49005026	Jech in taja abal kin toko an belomtsik. In toko kal an alwa tilab ani in toko jelti max kal i ja,
49005027	abal kin utu tin tamt Jaj jelti jun i labidh tokat belomtsik, yab choodh, alabl, tokat ani lujat tajat.
49005028	An tomkidh inik, yejat kin kanidhl nin tomtal, jelt xan tin kanidhl tinb. Xita in kanidhl nin tomtal, in kanidhl tinb.
49005029	Pos ni jun xita yab in pojkl tinb, tokot in kapundhl ani in beletnl tinb. Na Kristo, anchan jeye tin tajl kal an belomtsik;
49005030	pos an belomtsik, jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani waw jaych i kidhtal jachan nin putll nin tul na Kristo. U tajadh kal jaych nin tul ani kal jaych nin beklk.
49005031	“Jaxtm, an inik neech kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay kal nin tomtal ani xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
49005032	Jech jaich jun xata plek xi kwajatwiik yab tejwa; por nan in kwajat u till na Kristo ani an belomtsik.
49005033	Por jech in ulal jeye ke juntsik ta b yejat ka kanidha na tomtal jelt xan ta kanidhl tab ani an tomkidh mmlb, yab yejat kin chikat taja nin tomkl.
49006001	Chakamtsik, yab ka chikat tajl na ttatsik abal i belomich, pos jech jaich na lujat.
49006002	An jidhtal takixtalb xin ulal abal neech ki bachu jun xata alwa, in ulal ench: “Ka kakna na tta ani na nna,
49006003	abal ki kwajay alwa ani nakat i kij tech ti kayl.”
49006004	Ani tattsik, ttalbtsik, yab ka chakdhl na chakmiltsik, tokot ka takyaltsik abal kin tajl xowa alwa xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Ajtiklb.
49006005	Jolibtsik, yab ka chikat tajltsik na ajtik xi tech ti kayl, ka exbantsitsik xowa ti ki utsa kal yantam i kaknaxtalb ta itsch ani kal yantam i chaattalb.
49006006	Ka tjontsitsik alwa, yab tokotki tam kwajattsik ti tell abal a l ki utsan ke i alwa tjontsixtsik. Ki tjontsixin jelt in tjontsixil na Kristo, ka tajatsik an tojlb kal yantam i kulbtalb, pos na Dios anchan tin l kin chuu ka tajl.
49006007	Ki tjontsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, jelti max exom a tjontsal an Ajtiklb ani yab i iniktsik.
49006008	Pos a chobichtsik ke maske jn u jolib o yaba, max kin taja xowa alwa, neech jeye ka pidhan xowa alwa kal an Ajtiklb.
49006009	Ani tattsik, ajtiklbtsik, anlki teye ka taja jelti na tojnliltsik, yab ka jikdhatsik. Ka chalpay abal tattsik ani na tojnliltsik a kool jun a Ajtik xi kwajat walki, pos abal Jaj, an atiklbtsik ejtal jaychki in jalbl.
49006010	Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ka likedhatsik tab abal i kwajatichtsik junax kal an Ajtiklb ani kal nin pulek chp xi Jaj in kool.
49006011	Jelt xan ti an soldadotsik in kool kidhat xowa in ynl ti pjx, anchan teye ti ka koytsik xowa in pidhnl na Dios abal ka ejto ki kwajaytsik alwa ani yab ki kambiyattsik kal an lej atax.
49006012	Pos yab exom tu pjx kal i iniktsik, exom tu pjx kal i ajtiklbtsik, kal xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki, kal an takixtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowa yab alwa ani kal in abatwlejiltsik an lej atax xi kwajat al ik.
49006013	Jaxtm, ka ynatsik ejtal xowa in pidhnl na Dios abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy jachan an kij xi yab alwa. Ani tam ka ejtchtsik ka kuxuy, ka koytsik junini na chalab.
49006014	Ka koytsik p junini na chalab, ka ynatsik an tsubaxtalb jelt xan ta ynltsik an t xa wikl kl na tsukul. Ka ynatsik jeye an lujattalb jelti jun i dhabuxtalb, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kin dhabuy kl nin tamt.
49006015	Ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka tila an alwa tilab xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb.
49006016	Ka ynatsik an belomtalb abal ka tamkuy kl ejtal xowa in l ti ki tajtsi an lej atax, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl abal kin tamkuntsi kl tin kwiixtal xita kl tu atnal.
49006017	Ka ynatsik an loeltalb jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kojlb abal kin kojna ani nin kwintal na Dios ka koytsik jelti jun i macht xi ti pidhl an Tokat Ejattalb.
49006018	Ki lantsik echeki, ka pakabdhl ani ka kontsal na Dios kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Yab ka uktsitsiytsik ta l ani ka kontsintsitsik jeye xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
49006019	Ti kin kontsintsitsik neye abal na Dios ti kin pidha ti tilabtsik tam kin kwin ani kin kwin kal ni jun i jkib tam ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xowa na Dios in koolwiik chinat.
49006020	Na Dios tin abmal abal ku tila an alwa tilab ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kwajat tin wiknl. Ti kin kontsintsi abal ku ejto ku tila jech an alwa tilab kal ni jun i jkib, pos anchan ti yejat ku taja.
49006021	Na Tkiko, an kidhblb xi kanidhl tajat, xi jaich jun i alwa tojnal xin tjontsal an Ajtiklb, neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xan tin kwajat neye ani xanty u tajl.
49006022	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu abl tachan xon ta kwajattsik abal ti ki utsatsik xan tu kwajat tech ani ti ki kijidhmdhantsitsik ta itsch.
49006023	Ke na Dios an Ttalb ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, ti ki pidhatsik ti kijidhtalb. Ti ki pidhatsik jeye ti kanidhaxtalb ani ti tolmiytsik ki belmch ms.
49006024	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios ejtal tattsik xa kanidhlich ni Ajtik Jesukristo kal jun i alwa kanidhaxtalb. Anchan ka tjan.
50001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Timoteo, u kwajat i tjontsal na Jesukristo. I dhutsuntsal jech an ti w ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios abal in bellichtsik na Kristo Jess. I dhutsl jeye jech an w abal an oklek belomtsik ani an tolmix belomtsik xu kwajl ban bitsow Filipos.
50001002	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
50001003	Echeki tam tu chalpaytsik, u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil.
50001004	Echeki tam kin lan, tu kontsintsal ejtal tattsik kal i kijidhtalb;
50001005	pos i tolmixnktsik teye abal ka tilan an alwa tilab. Jech a tujutsik ka taja asta tam ta tiltsintsik an ti alwa tilab ani asta xo.
50001006	U chob alwa abal na Dios, xin tujm kin taja an alwa tojlb ba tattsik, neech kin okoy tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka tsch jun na Jesukristo.
50001007	In tomnl tajat ku chalpay anchan kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom tu kanidhltsik tajat. Anl jeye kom a bachwaltsik jaychki an alwatalb xi nan u bachwal kal tin kwenta tam in balidh ban wikaxte ani tam in kwajat tin tamt i awiltalbtsik abal ku ulu ke an alwa tilab, tsubax.
50001008	Na Dios in chob alwa abal tu kanidhltsik tajat kal jun i kanidhaxtalb jelti an kanidhaxtalb xin kool na Jesukristo.
50001009	U kontsal na Dios abal ki kndhxintsik ms, kal yantam i chalpadhtalb ani ka ejto ka exbaytsik xowakichki,
50001010	abal ka witatsik ka exla xowa na ms alwa. Anchan, neech ki xechintsik alwa ani yab neech ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ki walbiyat tam ka tsch jun na Kristo.
50001011	Max a bellichtsik na Jesukristo, neech ka ejtotsik ka taja yn xowa alwa abal tin kaknabl na Dios ani abal kin bachu an labidh tokattalb.
50001012	Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik ke ejtal xowa u tammal, tin tolmiymal abal ku tila ms an alwa tilab.
50001013	Jaxtm, ejtal an soldadotsik xi kwajat ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani ejtal xi ms, in chobtsik abal nan in kwajat tin wiknl abalki u bell a Kristo.
50001014	Ani abal in chutb ke in kwajat tin wiknl, yn an kidhblbtsik in kubmal tinb abal ka xechin kin tila an alwa tilab kal ni jun i jkib.
50001015	Tsubax kejle ke taltsik in till na Kristo abal in chakuntsal o abal in ulaltsik ke yab tsubax xowa u ulwb kal tin kwenta na Kristo, por taltsik, xeech in tilltsik in tsubtalki.
50001016	Taltsik in tilltsik na Kristo, abal in atl ani yab kal i tsubaxtalb. Jech tin tajltsik anchan abal in l kin chuutsik ku watna ms i yajtsiktalb tech ban wikaxte.
50001017	Por xi keettsik, in till na Kristo kom u kanidhaxtsik, pos in chobtsik ke nan in kwajat tin wiknl abal ku ulu ke an alwa tilab, tsubax.
50001018	Por, jant ki yna? Maske alwa o yab alwa, in tilltsik a Kristo ani jech, tin kijidhmdhl. Ani ms neech kin kijidhm,
50001019	kom u chob ke kal ejtal jech xowa exom u tamwal neech kin kale alwa, kal tin kwenta an kontsintsixtalb xa tajltsik ani kal an tolmixtalb xi tin pidhl nin Tokat Ejattal na Jesukristo.
50001020	Pos xowa u aytsal ani xowa u l, jaich ke yab kin tidheb. U l ku ejto kin kwin kal ni jun i jkib, abal anchan jelti xo ani echeki, ka xalkan ms ba nan nin publ na Kristo. U l ka xalkan ba nan nin publ na Kristo, maske in kwajat ejat o in chemnek.
50001021	Pos abal nan, max in kwajat ejat, in ejat abal ku tjontsi a Kristo ani max kin chemech, ms alwa, kom neech kin kalch tin kwajl kal Jaj.
50001022	Pos max techki neye bl in xeech juntam aniki ani alwa ku tjontsi an Ajtiklb, tm, yab u chob xowa ku takuy.
50001023	Tojlb tajat ku takuy xowa ms alwa kal jech chablam: pos u lak max kin chemchich abal kin kalch tin kwajl junax kal na Kristo, pos jech alwa tajat abal nan;
50001024	por u chalpayal abal ms alwa abal tattsik max yabl kin chemech.
50001025	Ani kom u chob abal anchan neech ka tmun, bl neech kin kwajay kal tattsik abal ta alwabl ani abal ki kijidhmtsik kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xa kooltsik.
50001026	Anchan, tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, ki kijidhmtsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo Jess.
50001027	Tokot tu pakabdhltsik abal ki kwajay jelt xan tin ulal nin alwa tilbil na Kristo. Anchan, maske kin kale tu lna o in kwajat w, ku acha ke i kwajajadhtsik alwa, junini a chalab, a tilltsik an alwa tilab abal ka belan
50001028	ani yab ka walka ti ki jikdhatsik xin atl an alwa tilab. Jech xowa tu kontsal ka tajatsik, jaich jun i exl abal kin chuu ke jajtsik neech ban kibeltalb, por jaich jeye jun i exl abal tattsik i loodhich ani jech, ba Dios ti tl.
50001029	Pos kal tin kwenta na Kristo, i takudhtsik abal ki belmch ani yab tokot jechki, anl jeye abal ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo.
50001030	Tattsik ani nan u kwajat i watnl jaychki jech an yajtsiktalb. A chumichtsik xan tu watnmal i yajtsiktalb ms okox ani asta xo, a achltsik abal u ntsal ku watna.
50002001	Jaxtm, max na Kristo ti kijidhmdhl ani ti kanidhl, max nin Tokat Ejattal kwajat kal tattsik, max i kknxtsik ani i kntsxtsik ti yajnantsixtalb,
50002002	ka koytsik junini na chalab, ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn, ki kwajajantsik junini abal ti kin kijidhmdhatsik ms.
50002003	Yab ka tajatsik xata abal ki kwajaytsik ta tmnx, nibal abal ka tekatsik tab. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, ka chakatsik tab ani ka kakna xi keet jelti max jaj ms ultalb k tattsik.
50002004	Yab ka aliytsik xata abal tatkitsik ta alwabl, ka aliytsik xata abal ejtalki tin alwabl.
50002005	Ka koytsik teye jaychki an chalab xin koy na Kristo Jess.
50002006	Pos maske Jajich nu Dios, yab in taja i chplb abal ka exl ke Jaj u Dios.
50002007	In jila ejtal xan ti Jaj jeye ani wenkon ti tjontsix, tam ti wachin tech ti chabl jelt xan tu wachinal ti chakam jun i inik.
50002008	Ani tam ti kwajay jelti inik, in chaka tajat tinb ani in taja xowa utsan kal na Dios tam ti utsan abal yejat ka chemech, maske jaich jun i cheml xi tidhetl tajat, kom neech ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
50002009	Jaxtm na Dios tin kwajba na Jess ms ultalb k ejtal xowa waach ani in kwajbantsi tin bij xi ms uluts k ejtal an bijlbtsik,
50002010	abal tam ka ulwat nin bij na Jess, ejtal xi kwajattsik walki, ban chabl ani alkidh ban chabl, ka tudhlantsik.
50002011	Ani ejtaltsik kin ulu ke na Jesukristo jaich an Ajtiklb abal tin kaknabl na Dios an Ttalb.
50002012	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, anchan xan ta tajmaltsik tajat xowa tu utsmal tam tin kwajat kal tattsik, anlki ti ka tajatsik xo maske in kwajat w kal tattsik. Kom i loodhichtsik, ka tajltsik xowa in l na Dios abal yab ka kibdhatsik an loeltalb.
50002013	Pos na Dios jaich ti pidhltsik ka chalpay xowa alwa ka taja ani ti tolmiyal abal ka tajatsik, xantiki Jaj tin l.
50002014	Ka tajatsik ejtal kal yantam i kulbtalb ani yab kal i itixbltalb,
50002015	abal ni jun xita yab ti ki eltsi ta walab ani anchan, ka xalkan ke i chakmlbichtsik kal a Dios, maske i kwajattsik ban walablom atiklbtsik, yab neech ki kwajay i choodhtsik. Tattsik i kwajat kal jajtsik jelti a t xin tajbayal an kayl,
50002016	abal a tiltsaltsik an ti alwa tilab xi kl ti neech kin exla xan ti neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Ani anchan, tam ka tsch na Kristo, nan neech ku acha i kijidhtalb kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom neech ka xalkan ke yab in xechink tin ani tojnalki.
50002017	Neech kin kulb maske kin chemdh kom neech ku pidhna tub jelti max in pikbaxtalb. Neech ku pidhna tub abal ku kidhbay an pikbantsixtalb xa kwajbantsaltsik na Dios abal i belomichtsik. Jaxtm ti awil ku kulb.
50002018	Ki kulbtsik teye jelt xan ti nan in kulbl.
50002019	Max an Ajtiklb Jess anchan tin l, u chalpayal tu abtsitsik jikat an ta Timoteo abal ti ki lna ani kin kulb tam ku acha xan ta kwajattsik.
50002020	Pos yab waach xita jelti na Timoteo xin chalpayal jelt xan ti nan u chalpayal ani ka kwajay lejtal ti chalpax in tsubtalki kal tattsik ta alwabl.
50002021	Pos ejtaltsik in ayal xowa jajkitsik in l ani yab xowa in l na Kristo Jess.
50002022	Por tattsik a chobichtsik xan ti na Timoteo tin xalkmal xowa in ejtowal kin taja ani xan tin tolmiymal abal kin xechin ku tila an alwa tilab, jelt xan ti jun i chakmlb tin tolmiyal nin tta.
50002023	Ani jaxtm tu chalpayal ku aba ti ki lnatsik, tam ku chobnaich xan ti neech an yejetalb xu kool tech ban wikaxte;
50002024	maske u chob alwa abal an Ajtiklb neech ti kin tolmiy abal kin kale tu lnatsik kunat i kij.
50002025	Por u chutal yejat tu abtsitsik an kidhblb Epafrodito, xi tin tolmiyal ani tin juniknl an tin tojnal. Jech an kidhblb, jaich xi tattsik tin abtsmal abal ti kin tolmiy kal an yejetalbtsik.
50002026	Pos jaj in l tajat ti ki chuu ejtal tattsik ani tepin tajat abal a achmaltsik ke jaj u yaul.
50002027	Yawlmadh kejle ani walmich tajat ka chemech; por kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios. Yab tokot jajki, nan neye. Tmun anchan abal yab ms ku koy i tepintalb k xu koolich.
50002028	Jaxtm tu l ku aba jikat ti ki lnatsik abal ki kulb tam ka chuu jun ani abal yabich neye ms kin lej tepin.
50002029	Ka bachutsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, kom i at kidhbich abal i bell an Ajtiklb ani ka kakna tajat an kidhblbtsik xi jelti Jaj.
50002030	Pos jaj walaich tajat ka chemech kal tin kwentaki ti tjontsix an ta Kristo. Jaj yab in ajay tinb tam ti tsch ti kin tolmiy kal an tojlb xu kool kom tattsik yab a ejto ti kin tolmiy.
50003001	Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ki kulbtsik abal a bellich an Ajtiklb. Pos abal nan yab i itixtalb max tu witskontsitsik tu dhutsuntsi, pos alwa tajat abal tattsik.
50003002	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal an atiklbtsik xu usnal ke in junwal jelti an piko, kal an atiklbtsik xin oktsixnl xowa yab alwa ani kal an atiklbtsik xin l kin chuu ka tajatsik an exl ba na tul.
50003003	Pos xi tsubaxich lejtal exlidh, jaich waw, xi kaknlich na Dios kal i ejattal ani u kulbl abal u dhabalbich kal na Kristo Jess. Yabich i dhl ti kwenta max i kool an exl ba ni tul o yaba.
50003004	Maske nan neye u kool kejle xantki ti ku bela jech. Max jun xita in chalpayal ke yejat kin bela jech, nan ms;
50003005	pos tin waxiklb a kts tin wachink tin chakam in exliyat bu tul kom in israelita neye ani in kidhtalb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn. Nan in ebreo asta tin chakam ani nu ttatsik, u ebreotsik jeye. U tajmal tajat jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss jelt xan tin wwnl an fariseotsik.
50003006	Kom anchan tu wwnmal jech an takixtalb, u atmal tajat xin belltsik na Kristo. U tajmal in lujtalki xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, ke ni jun xita yab in ejtmal ti kin utsa xata.
50003007	Por ejtal jech xin jalbl tajatwiik abal nan, xo u ulal abal yab xata in jalbl, kal tin kwentaki abal u exla na Kristo.
50003008	Ani yab tokot jki jech, anl jeye ejtal xowa ku ejto ku koy, yab u ajyal max in jalbl, ms yn in jalbl abal u bajmalich ku exla nu Ajtik Jesukristo. Kal tin kwentaki na Kristo u tokoy ku jila ejtal ani u ajyal jelti aml abal u l kin dhabalnjich kal na Kristo.
50003009	Anchan, neech kin kwajch junini kal Jaj, yab abalki yab u chikat tajmal an takixtalb, jaich abal u koolich an lujattalb xin pidhl na Dios xita kin belaich na Kristo. Jech jaich jun i lujattalb xi neech ki koy tam ku belmchich.
50003010	Nan u l ku exla na Kristo ani ku acha nin chp na Dios xi kl ti ejdh ti t tam ti chemdh. Ku acha jeye an yajtsiktalb xi Jaj in achmal ani ku watna neye an cheml xi jelti Jaj in watnmal,
50003011	abal ku koy neye an aytsixtalb kin ejdh tam ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik.
50003012	Yab exom u ulal ke u bajmalich ejtal jech, nibal u l ku ulu ke in lujatich tajat; por u ntsal abal ku ejto ku bajaw xantki tin takwymal na Kristo Jess.
50003013	Kidhblbtsik, nan yab exom u ulal ke u bajmich jech; por xowa u tajl, jaich ku uktsch xu jilmich tu kx ani u tajl i chplb abal ku bajaw xowa kwajat tu tamt.
50003014	Anchan, neech tm ku ejto ku bajaw xon ti yejat kin ulich ani ku ta an chejwalixtalb xi tu kanl ki bachu na Dios t walki abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
50003015	Jaxtm, ejtal xu kwajatich lujat, yejat ki chalpay jech; ani max keet xanty a chalpayaltsik, na Dios neech jeye ti ki pidhatsik ka chobna.
50003016	Por asta xon ti bajmalich ki lujku tib, yab ku jilkon tajaki, ki ntsi ki lujku tib ani ki koy junini ni chalab.
50003017	Kidhblbtsik, ka wwna nu oktsixtal ani ka chuutsik jeye xu kwajlichtsik anlki jelt xan tu oktsmaltsik.
50003018	Ynlich tajat tu utsmaltsik ani bl tu witskontsaltsik asta kal jamatsik u wal, ke bl tajat waach yn xita xi yab in l ka tilan ke na Kristo chemdhats pajkidh ban peltsidh te kal tin kwenta ni walastalbil.
50003019	Por tam kin bajaw an pakwenib, jechtsik, neech ka kibdh. Pos jajtsik tokot in bell xowa in kulbetnl ani in tekltsik tinb kal xowa xi yejat ka tidhebtsik kl. Tokot in chalpayaltsik xowa waach tech ti chabl.
50003020	Por waw, ni chablil jaich an walki ani u kwajat i aytsm ke taja ban walki ka tsch jun ni Loxil, xi jaich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
50003021	Jaj neech ti ku jalkuntsi jech an ti tul xu chemel abal ki koy jun i labidh tul xi jelti Jaj in kool. Jech neech kin taja kal jaych an chplb xin kool, xi kl ti neech kin takiy ejtal xowakich.
50004001	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat ani xu l tajat kin kale tu lnatsik, kal tattsik ta kwenta tin kwajat in kijidh ani tatichtsik ni kwajat jelti nu chejwalb. Ka ntsi ka belatsik an Ajtiklb.
50004002	U pakabdhl na Ebodia ani na Sntike abal kin koytsik junini nin chalab kom in bellichtsik an Ajtiklb.
50004003	Ani tat, Ssigo, xi tin juniknmal tajat kal jech an tojlb, tu kontsal abal ka tolmiy jech an kidhblbtsik. Pos jajtsik, na Klemente ani xi keettsik jeye, tjnktsik junax kal nan abal ki tila an alwa tilab. Nin bij xi jechtsik kwajat dhutsadh ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh xin koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
50004004	Ki kwajaytsik echeki i kulbl abal a bellichtsik an Ajtiklb. Tu witskontsaltsik jun: Ki kulbtsik tajat!
50004005	Ke ejtal ti ki exlatsik abal i alwa iniktsik. An Ajtiklb kunat i kij neech ka tsch.
50004006	Yab ki kwajay ta tepinaltsik kal ni jun xata, ka ltsal na Dios ejtal xowa a yntsal. Ka ltsal kal i lb, kal i pakabdhaxtalb ani ka pidhl jeye ti jalbintsixtalb.
50004007	Neech tm ki pidhantsik kal na Dios an ti kijidhtalb, xi jaich jun i kijidhtalb xi plek tajat, ke yab xita in ejtowal kin exbay. Jech an kijidhtalb neech ti ki beletnantsitsik an ta itsch ani neech ka koytsik junini na chalab kom a bellichtsik na Kristo Jess.
50004008	Kidhblbtsik, tin okontal, tu kontsal abal ka chalpaytsik tokotki xowa tsubax, xowa xu kaknb, xowa lujat, xowa tokat ani xowa alwa. Ka chalpaytsik tokotki xowa alwa ani xin tomnl ka kakn.
50004009	Ka tajatsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik, xowa a achmaltsik u ulmal ani xowa a chumaltsik u tajmal. Ki kwajaytsik xan tu takymaltsik ani na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb, neech ka kwajay kal tattsik.
50004010	In kulbl tajat tin bij an Ajtiklb abal tin chalpaymalichtsik jun. Yab exom u ulal ke tin uktsmalichtsik, xowa u ulal, jaich ke yab a kymaltsik xan tin tolmiytsik.
50004011	Yab u ulal jech abal u yntsal tajat xata, pos u witmalich kin kwajay kal xowaki u kool.
50004012	U witl kin kwajay jelti jun i chojontl ani u witl jeye kin kwajay jelti jun xita xin kool kidhat. U witmal ku tametna xowakich i yejetalbtsik, ku watna i kanab o kin kwajay in ajuts, ku koy yn xata o kin kwajay mapats.
50004013	Ejtal u ejtowal ku taja kom na Kristo tin pidhl ti chapiktalb.
50004014	Por tu utsltsik ke alwa tajat xan ta tajl abal tin tolmiyaltsik kal ejtal xowa exom u watnl.
50004015	Jelt xan ta chobich tattsik xi kwajl Filipos, ke tam tin kale Masedonia abal ku tila an alwa tilab, ejtal an belomtsik yab tin tolmiy, tokot tatkitsik. Jech ta tajltsik anchan, jaich abal tu tolmiymaltsik ki belmch.
50004016	Pos tam tin kwajat Tesalnika, ynl tin abtsi ti tolmixtalb abal ku yna kal xowa u yntsal.
50004017	Nan yab in kwajat u chalpm kin chejwaliyat, xowa nan u l, jaich ke tattsik ka koy ms i alwatalb xon tu takix na Dios.
50004018	Pos nan u bachmalich ejtal ani watatsich. Kal xowa tin abtsitsik kal na Epafrodito lejat kl u koolich. Xi tin abtsmaltsik in junwal jelti niwiy ikbaxtalb, jun i pikbantsixtalb xin bachwal na Dios kal yantam i kulbtalb.
50004019	Pos nu Diosil, neech ti ki pidhatsik ejtal xowa a yntsal. Yn i alwa chejwalixtalb in kool ani neech ti ki pidhatsik kom a bellich na Kristo Jess.
50004020	Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy malill i kij ni Tta Dios! Anchan ka tjan.
50004021	Ti kin chapndhantsitsik tin bij na Jesukristo, ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. An kidhblbtsik xi tech kwajat kal nan, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
50004022	Ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xi techtsik u kwajl, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb, xi kwajattsik bin kim an lej pulek takix romano.
50004023	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
51001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lenmal. Nan, junax kal an kidhblb Timoteo, tu chapndhltsik.
51001002	Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl ban bitsow Kolosas, xa bellich tsubax na Kristo ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
51001003	Echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, tam ku lan kal tattsik ta kwenta.
51001004	Pos waw i achmalich xan ta belltsik na Kristo Jess ani xan ti jeye ta kanidhltsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
51001005	Ejtal jech, a tajltsik abal neech ka bachutsik an chejwalixtalb xi ta kwajat tapadh t walki. A bajawtsik ki kwajay a aytsm jech an chejwalixtalb, tam ta achatsik an tsubaxtalb xin lnl an alwa tilab.
51001006	Jech an alwa tilab xi tiltsinktsik, jaich xi exom ti bukel ani exom tajat ti jalkuntsb kl tin chalab an atiklbtsik putlki an kayl, anchan xan ti tmun kal tattsik tam ta tiltsin tin alwatal na Dios ani a chobnatsik ke jech an alwatalb, tsubax lejtal.
51001007	Jech ti oktsmaltsik an kidhblb Epafras xi waw i kanidhl tajat ani xi tjnk jeye junax kal waw. Jaj, jaich jun in alwa tojnlil na Kristo abal tattsik ta alwabl.
51001008	Na Epafras jaich tu tsidhantsmal jech an ti tsubaxtalb ani tu utsa abal i pidhnktsik tajat an ti kanidhaxtalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
51001009	Jaxtm, tokotki ti chobna jech, yab i jilmal tu l kal tattsik ta kwenta. I kontsal na Dios abal ti ki pidhatsik ka chobna alwa kal jun i chalab xi tl ban Tokat Ejattalb xanty in l.
51001010	Anchan neech tm ka ejtch ki kwajaytsik xan ti yejat ka kwajay jun xita xu dhabalbich kal an Ajtiklb, ka tajltsik echeki xowa Jaj in l, ka tajltsik tokot xowa alwa ani ka ntsal ka exla alwa na Dios.
51001011	I kontsal abal Jaj ti ki likedhatsik kal nin tokat labidh chp abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy xowakich kal yantam i chaattalb,
51001012	ani kal i kulbtalb ka pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb an Ttalb xi tu tokedhantsmalich ti ejattal abal ki ejto ki bachu ban tajaxtalb xowa neech ti ku pidha abal Jajich tu dhabal.
51001013	Na Dios tu kldha bin takixtal an lej atax xon tu kwajatwiik ani tu kwajba bin takixtal nin Chakmil xin kanidhl tajat.
51001014	Jech nin Chakmil, jaich xi tu loo kal nin chemtal ani tu pakwlantsi an ti walastalbil.
51001015	Na Kristo, xi jaich nin Chakmil na Dios, tu xalkantsal xan ti jeye na Dios xi yab i ejtowal ki chuu. Jaj kejlejich Ja ta ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal ani Jaj, jaich na ms ultalb kal ejtal xowa.
51001016	Na Dios junax kal nin Chakmil, in taja ejtal xowa waach ban chabl ani ban walki, ejtal xowa xi tejwa ani xi yab tejwa, in jila jeye an pakdha takix, an awiltalbtsik, an ajtiklbtsik ani xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakich, ejtal kal Jaj ti tajadh ani abal Jaj.
51001017	Jech an Chakmlb kejlejich Ja ta ti kwajat tam ti ejtal jech yabl tajadh ani Jaj in teykm ejtal xowa tajadh.
51001018	Ani yab tokot jechki, Jaj jaich ni oklkil waw xu belomich. Jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik ani an belomtsik jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul. Jaich jeye xi tu pidhl an ti xechintalb ani jaich xi okxinkich ka ejech ti t abal ka kwajay ultalb kal ejtalki.
51001019	Pos na Dios in kulbetna abal ban Chakmlb ka xalkan ejtal xan ti jeye Jaj.
51001020	Na Dios in taja ka lejkin kal Jaj ejtal xowa waach ban chabl ani ban walki. Jech an lejkintalb in taja kal tin kwenta nin xichl nin Chakmil xin wakla tam ti chemech ban peltsidh te.
51001021	Tattsik yabwiik i dhabalb kal na Dios ani a pojkltsikwiik ta itsch. A tajltsik an walastalb, por xo, na Dios ti kwajbmalichtsik alwa kal Jaj
51001022	kal tin kwenta an cheml xin bachu na Kristo bin tul. Jech in taja anchan na Dios abal ti ki ututsik i tokat tin tamt, yab i walbidh ani kal ni jun xata xantokl ti ki walbiyattsik.
51001023	Por yejat tajat ka ntsi ta belomtsik kal ejtal na ejattal ani yab ka jilatsik an aytsixtalb xa kool kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab xa achmalichtsik. Jech an alwa tilab, jaich xu tilnal putlki an kayl; ani nan, xu bij Pablo, tin kwajba na Dios abal kin xechin neye tin tolmix ka tilan jech an alwa tilab.
51001024	Xo in kwajat in kulbl abal u achl an yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta alwabl, pos anchan, exom u kidhbayal ba nu tul an yajtsiktalb jelti xin achmal na Kristo kal tin alwabl an belomtsik, ke jaich xi kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul.
51001025	U bajmalich kin kwajay tin tjontsix an ti belomtsik, kal tin kwenta an punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios abal tu tiltsitsik kidhat an ti alwa tilab kal ta alwabltsik.
51001026	Jech an alwa tilab xi na Dios in koolwiik yab tejwa asta ti weje, jaich xi xo in pidhmalich kin exla xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj.
51001027	Na Dios in pidhatsik kin chobna xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj, ke an tokat tsubaxtalb xi ta tin koolwiik yab tejwa, jaich jeye abal xi yabtsik u judo. Ani jachan xowa ta tin koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios, jaich jech: ke na Kristo kwajat ba na itsch ani anchan a chobichtsik alwa abal neech ka bachutsik nin tokat labidhtalbil.
51001028	Waw i till na Kristo, i tawnl ani i oktsal ejtalkitsik kal yantam i chalab abal kin exbaytsik alwa ani ka kwajaytsik alwa juntsik ti b kal na Kristo.
51001029	Nan jaich tin tojnal kal jech tin kwenta, in tojnal kal ejtal an chplb ani an awiltalb xi tin pidhl na Kristo.
51002001	U l ka chobnatsik ke nan u tajl an chplb tu kontsintsi abal ki tolmiyattsik kal na Dios, abal ka tolmiyattsik jeye xu kwajltsik Laodisea ani ejtal xi yabl tin chumaltsik.
51002002	Tu kontsintsaltsik abal ki likedhantsat ta itsch kal na Dios ani ki kwajaytsik junini i kndhx. Anchan neech ka exbaytsik alwa an tsubaxtalb ani neech jeye ka exlatsik xowa xin koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios, ke jaich na Kristo.
51002003	Pos ba na Kristo tu tsiil ejtal an chalab xi alwa ani Jaj, jaich jeye xin pidhnl ka exbayat ejtal xowa alwa.
51002004	Jech xowa tu utsltsik, jaich abal yab ti ki kambiytsik ni jun xita kal i labidh tilabtsik.
51002005	Pos maske nan yab in kwajat kal tattsik, ka tajatsik jelti max tachan in kwajat. In kulbl tajat abal u achl i kwajattsik alwa ani a ntsaltsik ka bela na Kristo.
51002006	Jaxtm, anchan jelt xan ta bachmalichtsik na Jesukristo abal ta Ajtik, anchan ti yejat ki kwajaytsik junini kal Jaj.
51002007	Ka koytsik na ejattal kwajat alwa ba na Jesukristo, ka belatsik Jaj in tsubtalki jelt xan ta oktsidhtsik ani ka pidhltsik echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.
51002008	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta, yab ka exbantsitsik xin l ti ki kambiytsik kal i tilabtsik ani i chalabtsik xi yab tsubax; jajtsik yab ba Kristo tin kldhl xowa in oktsixnltsik, pos tokot in wewkm in oktsixtal i iniktsik ani i chalab xi techki ti kayl.
51002009	Pos ejtal xan ti jeye na Dios, kwajat ba na Kristo.
51002010	Tattsik a koolich ejtal xowa a yntsal abal ki kwajaytsik alwa kal na Dios kom i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo. Jaj jaich na ms ultalb k an ajtiklbtsik ani xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakich.
51002011	Anl jeye, abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo, i exlidhichtsik; por yab kal i exl jelti xu tajtsinaltsik an israelitatsik bin tul. Jech an exl xi na Kristo in pidhnl, jaich ke ti jalkuymalichtsik xan ta xeechtsikwiik.
51002012	Pos tam ta pujantsik, in junu jelti max i jolyatichtsik junax kal na Kristo ani jelti max i ejdhtsik teye ti t junax kal Jaj, abal a belatsik ke kal nin chp na Dios ti ejdh ti t na Kristo.
51002013	Ti wel chabki, i kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb xa kool ani abal yab i exlidh kom yab i judotsik; por xo, na Dios ti ejdhmalichtsik ti t jelt xan tin ejdha na Kristo ani ti pakwlantsmalichtsik ejtal an ta walab.
51002014	Na Dios in paku ni jntsixtal xi koolwiik kal Jaj. Jech an jntsixtalb, jaich ke yab i ejtmal ki taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios ani jech an jntsixtalb, pkun tam ti na Kristo chemech pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
51002015	Tam ti na Kristo chemech ban peltsidh te, in ta an ajtiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik xi teykmte kal an lej atax. In kntsi an tin awiltaltsik ani anchan tin tidhebdha.
51002016	Jaxtm xo, yabich ka tajltsik ti kij xita ti kawyaltsik kal tin kwenta xowa a kapal o kal xowa a uchl, kal tin kwenta i ajibtsik, tam u witsl a ch ani kal tin kwenta jeye xanty yejat ka tajan tam in ktsjil i koyxnich.
51002017	Ejtal jech, jaich jelti jun in chalm xi kwajat kejle neech ka tsch, por xowa nin lejtal, jaich na Kristo.
51002018	Yab ka walkatsik ki kntsin an ti chejwalixtalb xa koolichtsik tadh kal an oktsixtsik xin wynl in chakltsik tajat tinb. Jajtsik in kaknl i tokat abatwletsik, in ulal ke in chumaltsik i xalkantsixtalb ani in tekltsik tajat tinb kal an chalabtsik xi jajkitsik in kldhl.
51002019	Jech an oktsixtsik yab kwajat kal a Kristo. Na Kristo jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik ani waw xu belomich, jaich nu kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul. Na Kristo jaich nin tajl abal ku belmch ms, tu likedhantsal ti ejattal ani in tajl abal ku kwajay junini i chalab, anchan xan ti na Dios in l kin chuu ku kwajay.
51002020	Tattsik i kwajat teye jelti max i chemnekich kal na Kristo, abal a jilmalichtsik an chalab xi yab alwa ani xowa a tajltsikwiik. Pos max anchanich ta kwajattsik, jantki p tm bl ta exbantsaltsik tin takixtal an oktsixtsik
51002021	xin ulaltsik ench: “Yab ka takatsik jachan, yab ka kaputsik jachan, yab ka tynatsik jachan”?
51002022	Ejtal jech xowa in ulaltsik, neech ka taley, pos yab xata in y, in cha oktsixtal i iniktsik.
51002023	Tsubax kejle, ke ejtal jech u xalkanal jelti jun i alwa chalab abal in ulaltsik ke yejat ka wwnl jun i belomtalb, ka koy i chaattalb ani ka yajlombdhl tab. Por ejtal jech, yab xata ti alwa, pos yab neech ka ejto ka kubdhatsik kl xowa in kulbetnl na tul.
51003001	Jaxtm, kom i kwajat teye jelti max i ejdhatsichtsik ti t junax kal na Kristo, ka aliytsik tokot xowa waach walki, xon ti kwajat na Kristo buxl tin ejt na Dios.
51003002	Ka chalpaytsik xowa waach walki ani yab tokot xowa waach ban kayl.
51003003	Pos kom jelti max i chemechtsik junax kal na Kristo, xo a koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal chinat junax kal Jaj ba na Dios.
51003004	Na Kristo jaich xi ti pidhltsik an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Ani tam Jaj ka tsch, neech ka xalkanich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xa koolichtsik ani neech jeye tm ki kwajaytsik junax bin labidh tokt.
51003005	Jaxtm, kom jelti max i chemech ani i ejech ti t junax kal na Kristo, yejatich ka jilatsik ka taja an walastalbtsik xi jelti jech: Yabich ki kwajaytsik yab exbadh, yabich ka taja xowa atax, yabich ka taja xowa a achl in kulbetnl na tul ani nibal xa chalpayal xowa yab alwa. Yabich jeye ki cheneb, pos jech in junwal jelti max a kaknl i chilabtsik.
51003006	Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu tsiil an yajtsiktalb xi tl ba na Dios abal an atiklbtsik xi yab in tajl ti kij an takixtalb;
51003007	ani tattsik jaichwiik a tajl ejtal jech ti wel chabki.
51003008	Por xo, ka jilaichtsik jeye ejtal jech: an chkub, an chkxtalb, an atax chalab, an odhbijixtalb ani an atax tilab xa ulaltsik.
51003009	Yabich ki kmbxintsik jn ani jn kom a jilmalichtsik an weje chalab xi yab alwa ani xowa jeye a tajltsikwiik.
51003010	Pos xo a bachmalichtsik an t chalab xin pidhnl na Dios. Jech an t chalab, a Dios in tajmal ani exom in tmdhl ba tattsik asta ka exla alwa Jaj.
51003011	Yab in dhl ti kwenta max i griego o i judo, max i exlidh o yaba, max i pl inik xu kwajl kunat o i pl inik xu kwajl w, i jolib o i ajtiklb; pos na Kristo jaich na ms ultalb ani Jaj, kwajat bin itsch ejtalki xita kl ti ka bachwat.
51003012	Na Dios ti kanidhltsik ani ti takwymaltsik abal Jaj tiki dhabalna. Jaxtm, ki kwajchtsik i kntsx ti yajnantsixtalb, ti alwatalb ani i chaattalb; ka kuxuy xowakichki ani yabich ki pojkaxmtsik.
51003013	Ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn ani ki pkwlntsxin jn ani jn max ki wltsxin. Anchan jelt xan ti na Kristo ti pakwlantsmaltsik, anchan teye ka tajatsik.
51003014	Ani ki kndhxintsik tajat, pos jech jaich nin tajl ka koytsik junini na chalab kal ejtal xowakichki.
51003015	Ke nin kijidhtalbil na Dios ka kwajay ba na itsch abal ti ki ltsitsik xan ti yejat ki kwajay, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymaltsik na Dios abal ki kwajch jelti max jn tokot. Ani ka pidhltsik tajat ti jalbintsixtalb.
51003016	Ke nin kwintal na Kristo ka koytsik tajat ba na itsch. Ki ktsxintsik ani ki pkbdhxintsik jn ani jn kal yantam i chalab. Ka ajatnatsik i ajatlb ani i ajatlbtsik xi ijtsinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Ka ajtintsitsik na Dios kal yantam i kaknaxtalb xi tl ba na itsch.
51003017	Ani ejtal xowa ka taja o ka ulu, ka tajatsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess, ka pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios an Ttalb tin bij na Jess.
51003018	Tomkidh mmlbtsik, yab ka chikat taja na tomkl, pos jech jaich yejat ka tajatsik kom a bellich an Ajtiklb.
51003019	Tomkidh paylomlbtsik, ka kanidha na tomtal ani yab ka chakuntsi.
51003020	Chakamtsik, ka exbantsi ejtal xowa kin ulu na tta ani na nna, pos jech jaich nin l an Ajtiklb.
51003021	Ttalbtsik, yab ka chakdha na chakmiltsik abal yab kin jilatsik kin taja xowa alwa.
51003022	Tjontsixtsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa kin ulu na ajtik xi tech ti kayl, yab tokotki ki tjon tam kwajat ti telltsik, abal a l ki chutat ke i alwa tojnaltsik. Ki tjontsik kal jun a itsch tsubax abal ka tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.
51003023	Xowakich ka taja, ka tajatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, jelti max i kwajat a tjontsal na Ajtik ani yab i atiklbtsik.
51003024	Pos a chobichtsik ke na Kristo jaich an Ajtiklb xi kwajat a tjontsal ani Jaj neech ti ki pidhatsik an ti chejwalixtalb xa lujyaltsik ka bachu.
51003025	Por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, neech ka pidhan kal na Dios an ti yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal; pos na Dios yab kwajat ti takukl an ti atiklbtsik.
51004001	Ajtiklbtsik, ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani lujat kal na tojnliltsik. Pos yejat ka chalpay abal a kooltsik teye jun a Ajtik xi kwajat walki.
51004002	Ki lantsik echeki, yab ki bemtsik ta l ani ka pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.
51004003	Ti ku kontsintsi weye abal an Ajtiklb ti ku tolmiy ki ela xan ti ki tila an alwa tilab. Anchan, neech tm ki ejto ki pidhna ka chobn xowa kwajatwiik yab tejwa kal tin kwenta na Kristo, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kwajat tin wiknl.
51004004	Ti kin kontsintsi abal ku ejto ku tila tajax jelt xan ti yejat ku taja.
51004005	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal xowa a tajl ani ki kwajaytsik alwa kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom abal ka ejto ka tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab tam waach xan ti ani xontiki ti ka ejto.
51004006	Yejat ki kwintsik kal i chaattalb abal kin acha alwa xita na tolmiyal ti tilom ani yejat ka chobnatsik xan ti neech ka tkoyal jun xita.
51004007	Na Tkiko, an kidhblb xi kanidhl tajat, neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xan tin kwajat neye. Jech an kidhblb, jaich jun i alwa tojnal xin tjontsal an Ajtiklb junax kal nan.
51004008	Jaxtm tu aba tachan xon ta kwajattsik abal ti ki ltsi xan tu kwajat weye ani abal ti ki kijidhmdhantsitsik ta itsch.
51004009	Na Onsimo, an kidhblb xu belom jeye in lujtalki, xi waw i kanidhl tajat, neech jeye kal na Tkiko. Jech na Onsimo, jaich jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal. Jajtsik neech ti ki tiltsi ejtal xowa u tmnal tech.
51004010	Na Aristarko, xi kwajat ban wikaxte junax kal nan, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos, nin chejel kidhb na Bernab. Nan tu utsmalichtsik abal ka bachu alwa na Markos max ka kale ti ki lna.
51004011	Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Jess, xu bijyb jeye ta Justo. Jechtsik, jaich an judotsik xi belmch ani u tojnal junax kal nan abal ki tila xan tu takix na Dios ani tin kijidhmdhltsik tajat.
51004012	Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Epafras, jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal xi kwajat jeye in tjontsal na Kristo. Jaj echeki tajat in tajl an chplb abal ti ki kontsintsitsik ki kwajay tsububudh a itsch ani ki kwajaytsik in lujtalki a tajl tokot xowa in l na Dios.
51004013	Pos nan u chutal xan tu kwajl tajat ti l na Epafras kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta jeye an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl ban bitsowtsik xin bij Laodisea ani Ierpolis.
51004014	Na Lukas, an illix xi waw i kanidhl tajat, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb ani na Demas jeye.
51004015	Ti kin chapndhantsitsik an ti kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Laodisea. Ti kin chapndhantsitsik an ta Ninfas ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim jech an kidhblb.
51004016	Tam ka okchtsik ka ajay jech an dhutsadh w, ka abna Laodisea abal ka ajintsattsik jeye an belomtsik xi taja. Ani an dhutsadh w xu abtsm an belomtsik xi Laodisea, neech jeye ti ki abtsi abal ka ajaytsik.
51004017	Ka utsatsik na Arkipo abal kin taja ejtal an tojlb xi punkuntsidh kal an Ajtiklb.
51004018	Jech an chapndhomtalb, tu dhutsuntsmaltsik kal nan tajat u kubak ani u dhuslbil. Ka chalpaytsik abal nan in kwajat tin wiknl. Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
52001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Silbano ani na Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Tesalnika, xi kwajatichtsik junini kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal an Ajtiklb Jesukristo. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
52001002	Echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani tam ku lan, tu kontsintsaltsik teye.
52001003	I till tajat tin tamt ni Tta Dios xowa alwa a tajltsik abal i belomich. I till jeye an tojlb xa tajltsik kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa kooltsik ani kom i kwajattsik a aytsm ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jaxtm ta kuxyal xowakichki.
52001004	Kidhblbtsik xi kanidhbtsik kal na Dios, i chob abal Jaj ti takwymaltsik.
52001005	Pos tam ti waw i uldha ba tattsik an alwa tilab, yab ulich kal i tilabki, ulich kal yn in chp, kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal yantam i belomtalb kom waw i chobich alwa, ke jech jaich an tsubaxtalb. Pos a chobtsik alwa xan tu kwajinek ba tattsik abal ta knltsik.
52001006	Ani tattsik, a wwna ni xechintal ani nin xechintal an Ajtiklb; a bachutsik an alwa tilab kal jun i kulbtalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb, maske a watnatsik kejle tajat yn i yajtsiktalb.
52001007	Ani anchan a bajawtsik ki kwajay jelti jun i oktsixtalb abal ejtal an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabltsik xi Masedonia ani xi Akaya.
52001008	Pos kal tattsik ti tujey ani xo bukenekich, yab tokotki Masedonia ani Akaya, bukenekich putlki nin alwa tilbil an Ajtiklb. Ani chobte jeye xan ta belltsik na Dios, pos asta waw i chutal ke yabich yejat ki tila xata.
52001009	Pos jajtsik in till xan tu bachwat kal tattsik ani xan ti jeye ta jilatsik ka kakna an chilabtsik abal ka belaichtsik na Dios ani anchan, ka tujchtsik ka tjontsi jech na Dios xi ejat ani tsubax.
52001010	Ani in tilltsik jeye xan ta kwajattsik a aytsm tam ka witsiy jun na Jess xi kwajat walki. Jech na Jess, jaich nin Chakmil na Dios xi chemdh ani na Dios in ejdha ti t. Jaj jaich xi tu lowal abal yab ki bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tsch tayl.
52002001	Kidhblbtsik, pos a chobtsik alwa, ke yab jolatki an lnaxtalb xi taja tachan.
52002002	Pos anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik, tam ti ms okox u kale ban bitsow Filipos. Taja u odhbijyat ani u tajtsin xan ti ku len, por na Dios tu tolmiy abal ki tila ba tattsik nin alwa tilbil kal ni jun i jkib, maske u atnal tajat chapik.
52002003	Pos yab u ukpink tu kwajat tam tu xechin tu tawnax, nibal u tiltsixnk kal i ataxtalb, nibal abal ku kambixin.
52002004	Anchan tu kwin, kom na Dios tu kldha tu alwa ani tu punkuntsmal abal ki tila an alwa tilab. Yab i taja xowa in kulbetnl an atiklbtsik, i taja xowa in l na Dios, xin ejtowal ti ku chutsi an ti itsch.
52002005	Anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik, yab jayki i tawnmal ni jun xita kal i labidh tilabtsik abal ki kambiy, nibal i kambixnmal jun xata abal ki ta i tumn. Na Dios in chob alwa jech.
52002006	Yab jayki i alymal ku kakn kal an atiklbtsik, nibal kal tattsik, nibal kal xi keettsik, maske neech kejlewiik ki ejto ki ulu ku tolmiyat kom tu abatwlejil na Kristo, por yab i taja anchan.
52002007	I koy tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik, jelt xan ti jun i nnalb in tsutsdhl ani in beletnl nin chakmiltsik.
52002008	Tu kanidhltsik, ke i lak max yab tokot jki tu pidhatsik an tin alwa tilbil na Dios, tu pidhatsik jeye an ti ejattal; pos i bajmalich ki koy tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik.
52002009	Kidhblbtsik, tattsik a tlm xan tu tjnk ani tu chekenek abal ki ejto ki watba tib. Akal i kij u tjnk abal yab ki tojliy ni jun xita xi tattsik tam tu xechin ki tila nin alwa tilbil na Dios.
52002010	Tattsik a chob ani na Dios jeye, abal u kwajinek tokat ani lujat kal tattsik xi belomichtsik, abal yab xita kin ejto ti ku walbindha kal ni jun xata.
52002011	Ani a chobtsik jeye xan ti pakabdhmaltsik ani i kijidhmdhmaltsik juntsik ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal, jelt xan tin tajl jun i ttalb kal nin chakmiltsik.
52002012	Tu punkuntsmaltsik abal ki kwajaytsik xan ti yejat ka kwajay xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xi ti takwymalich abal ki kwajaytsik teye ba nin takixtal ani bin labidh tokt.
52002013	Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios; pos tam ti tattsik a acha nin alwa tilbil na Dios, xi waw i tila, yab a bachutsik jelt in kwintal i iniktsik. Jech nin alwa tilbil na Dios, jaich xi ti tajltsik ka jalkch na chalab, tattsik xa bellich.
52002014	Kidhblbtsik, tam ta atan kal na at kidhtaltsik, jaychki teye a tamutsik jelt xan tin tamu an belomtsik xin bellichtsik na Dios xi kwajattsik Judea xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, pos anchan jeye ti atantsik kal nin at kidhtaltsik.
52002015	Jech an judotsik, jaich nin chemdha an Ajtiklb Jess; anchan jelt xan ti ms okox, in chemdhmal an tiltsixtsik ani waw tu aja ku kale. Yab in kaknltsik na Dios ani in atl an atiklbtsik,
52002016	pos tam i l ki tawna xi yabtsik u judo abal ka loeytsik jeye, yab tu walkl ki taja. Anchan, ms u walbinalichtsik. Por xo, exomich in bajwal xowki nin kakadh yajtsiktalbil na Dios neech ka ulchich ba jajtsik.
52002017	Kidhblbtsik, tam ti waw u kale w i kij xon ti tattsik i kwajat, maske yab tu chutaltsik, echeki i kwajattsik ba ni ejattal ani i l tajat ku kale jun tu lnatsik.
52002018	I exmalich ku kale; nan, xu bij Pablo, ynlich u exmal kin kale, por echeki tin tamkuyal an lej atax.
52002019	Pos, jowa j ni aytsixtal, ni kijidhtalbil ani xantki tu kwajat u kulbl ani kijidh? Yabxe jaich tattsik tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo?
52002020	Tsubax, tattsik jaich ni kijidhtalbil ani xantki tu kwajat u kulbl.
52003001	Ani tm, kom yabich ms i ejto ki kuxuy, i chalpay ku jilkon Atenas wawki kwetm
52003002	ani ki aba an kidhblb Timoteo abal ti ki takiytsik ani ti ki pakabdhatsik ka ntsi ta belom. Jech na Timoteo, jaich jeye jun in tjontsixil na Dios xi tjnk junax kal waw abal ka tilan an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Kristo.
52003003	Pos yab i l ki chuu ke ni jun xita kin jila tinb kal tin kwentaki an taktamixtalb xi kin acha. Tattsik a chob alwa ke kool ki watna ejtal jech.
52003004	Pos tam ti tachan bl tu kwajat kal tattsik, i ulu abal neech ki watna i yajtsiktalb ani anchan ti tmun, jelt xan ta chobichtsik.
52003005	Ani jaxtm nan, kom yabich ms u ejto ku kuxuy, u abna ki konyattsik xan ta kwajat kal tin kwenta an belomtalb, pos u chejnl ke an lej atax ti ki jnatsik xon ti yab alwa ani ke ni tojlbil ka kale jelti max yab xata in jalbl.
52003006	Por xo, na Timoteo witsenekich ani tu tsidhantsi ti tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb xa kooltsik. Tu ltsi jeye abal tattsik echeki tu chalpayal kal yantam i kanidhaxtalb ani ke tattsik a lakich tajat max ti ku chuch, anlki jelt xan ti waw i achl.
52003007	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, tam ti chobna ke a ntsaltsik ta belom, i bachu tajat i kijidhtalb maske exom i watnl i yajtsiktalb ani i taktamixtalb.
52003008	Tam ti chobna ke tattsik a ntsal ka bela an Ajtiklb, u likedhantsat tajat an ti ejattal.
52003009	Kidhblbtsik, Janti neech ki ejto ki pidha ms ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an kijidhtalb xi tattsik tu pidhmal tin tamt Jaj?
52003010	Akal i kij i pakabdhl na Dios abal ti ku walka ku kale tachan tu lnatsik ani tu ltsitsik xowa bl u kibel abal ka ejto ki belmchtsik xan ti yejat.
52003011	I l ke ni Tta Dios ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ti ku tolmiy abal ki ejto ku kale tachan tu lnax.
52003012	Ani ke an Ajtiklb ti ki tolmiytsik abal ka koy ms plek an kndhxtalb jn ani jn ani kal ejtalkitsik, jelt xan ti waw ti kool an kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik.
52003013	Ti ki tolmintsitsik jeye an ta itsch abal ki kwajaytsik juniniki, tokat ani yab i walbidh tin tamt ni Tta Dios tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jess kal ejtal xi Jaj in tokmal.
52004001	Ani xo, kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik ani tu punkuntsaltsik jech tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo: anchan xan tu ltsitsik ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios, anchan ka ntsi ka tajatsik echeki.
52004002	Tattsik, a chob xowa j an takixtalb xi tu pidhatsik kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb Jess.
52004003	Xowa na Dios in l, jaich ke tattsik ki kwajch i tokat; ke yabich xita ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal,
52004004	ke an paylomlbtsik kin wita ka kwajay tokat kal nin tomtal ani kin kaknl.
52004005	Yab kin tajtsi xowa yab alwa nin tomtal, jelt xan tin tajl an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll na Dios.
52004006	Ke ni jun xita yab kin kambintsi tin tomtal nin at kidhb, pos xita kin taja anchan, neech ka pidhan plek ti yajtsiktalb kal an Okxlb, jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik ms okox.
52004007	Pos na Dios yab tu takwymal abal ku kwajay kibenek, tu takwym abal ku kwajay tokat.
52004008	Pos anchan p, xita kin chikat taja jech an oktsixtalb, yab exom in chikat tajl jun i ani inik, exom in chikat tajl a Dios, xi tu pidhmal tin Tokat Ejattal.
52004009	Kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb kal na at kidhbtsik, yab yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik, pos na Dios ti oktsmalichtsik abal ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn.
52004010	Ani anchan jeye ta kanidhltsik ejtal an kidhblbtsik xu kwajltsik putl Masedonia. Kidhblbtsik, por tu pakabdhltsik abal bl ka pubdhatsik ms na kanidhaxtal.
52004011	Ki kwajajantsik alwa ani ka ntsi na tojlbiltsik, ki tjontsik kal na kubak jelt xan tu punkuntsmaltsik,
52004012	abal ki kakn kal xi yabtsik u belom ani abal ka koytsik ejtal xowa ka yntsi.
52004013	Kidhblbtsik, i l ki chuu ka chobnatsik xanty neech ka tmun kal an kidhblbtsik xi chemnekich abal yab ki kwajaytsik i tepinal jelti xi keettsik xi yab in kool ni jun i aytsixtalb.
52004014	Anchan xan ti bell ke na Jess chemech ani ejech ti t, anlki jeye ti neech ka ejdh kal na Dios an kidhblbtsik xi chemnekichtsik ani neech ka jn xon ti kwajat na Jess.
52004015	Jech xowa tu utsltsik, jaich xowa tu utsmal an Ajtiklb: ke ejtal waw xu belom, xi ku jilkon ejat asta tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb, yab neech ku jn okox ani tayl xi chemnektsik.
52004016	Pos Jaj tajat an Ajtiklb neech ka paay tuwa walki xon ti kwajat ani kal in chapik tawnaxtal, kal jun i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw in oklkil i tokat abatwletsik ani kal in kornetajil a Dios, neech ti tawnax. Tm, xi chemnekichtsik ani in belmal na Kristo, neech ka ejdhtsik okox.
52004017	Tayl, waw xi bell na Kristo xu jilkonk ejat, neech ku jn junax kal jajtsik ban tokow abal ku lxin taja tekat kal an Ajtiklb. Ani anchan neech tm ku kwajch malill i kij kal an Ajtiklb.
52004018	Jaxtm, yejat ki pbdhntsxintsik ta ejattal jn ani jn kal jech xowa tu tiltsaltsik.
52005001	Kidhblbtsik, por kal tin kwenta an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, yab yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik.
52005002	A chobichtsik alwa, ke tam kin bajaw jachan an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, neech ka tsch jun jiktowle tam yab xita in tlm; neech ka tsch jelt xan tu ulel jun i kw tam akal.
52005003	Tam an atiklbtsik kwajat in ulaltsik ench: “Ejtal kwajat alwa ani kijidh”, tmich ti neech ka ulich jun jiktowle an pakwenib. Jelt xan ti an mmlb xi kwajat kodh in achl jun jiktowle an yajal abal neech kin wachch an chakam, anchan jeye ti neech kin tamu jech an atiklbtsik. Ani yab neech kin ejtotsik kin jeka.
52005004	Kidhblbtsik, por tattsik yab i kwajat ban jikwaxtalb ani yab neech ki yakwantsik ukpidh tam kin bajaw jachan na kts xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb. Yab neech ki yakwantsik ukpidh, jelt xan ti jun i kw u yakwax ukpidhki.
52005005	Pos ejtal tattsik a junwal jelti an tajaxtalb ani jelti tam kij. Yab i junwal jelti an jikwaxtalb nibal jelti tam akal.
52005006	Jaxtm ti yab yejat ku xechin ukpipidh jelti xi keettsik. Ku kwajay echeki tojojodh ani lej inik.
52005007	Xu wayaltsik, tam akal tu wayaltsik ani xu uchaltsik, tam akal tu uchaltsik.
52005008	Por waw, xu kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, yejat ku kwajay echeki lej inik. Ki yna jelti i dhabuxtalb an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynal jun i patl kin dhabuy kl nin tamt. Ani jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kojlb abal kin kojna, anchan ti ki yna an loeltalb xu kwajat i aytsm.
52005009	Pos na Dios yab tu takwymal abal ki bachu i yajtsiktalb, tu takwymal abal ki bachu i loeltalb kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
52005010	Na Jesukristo chemech kal waw ti kwenta abal ki ejtch ku kwajay junax kal Jaj, maske u kwajat ejat o u kwajat chemnek.
52005011	Jaxtm tu utsltsik abal ki pkbdhxintsik ani ki pbdhntsxintsik ta itsch jn ani jn, anchan jelt xan ta tajlichtsik.
52005012	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik abal ka kakna xu tojnaltsik tachan kal tattsik; xi ti belkmtsik ani ti takyaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb.
52005013	Ka kaknatsik ani ka kanidhatsik tajat, kal tin kwenta an tojlb xi exom in tajltsik. Ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
52005014	Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik jeye abal ka tawnatsik xi yab in l ti tojnaltsik, ka pubdhantsi tin ejattal xin jilltsik tinb ani ka tolmiytsik xi yab likdha. Ka koy i chaattalb kal ejtalkitsik.
52005015	Ka koytsik i kwenta kal jech; max jun xita ka tajtsin xata yab alwa kal jun xita, yab kin witsbantsi. Ka tajtsaltsik tokot echeki xowa alwa xi keettsik, ejtalki, yab takudhki.
52005016	Ki kwajaytsik kijidh echeki.
52005017	Ki lantsik putl i kij.
52005018	Ka pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal ejtalki xowakich. Pos jaich jech in l kin chuu na Dios ka tajltsik abal a bellichtsik na Kristo Jess.
52005019	Yab ka tepdhatsik nin kamlil an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ta itsch.
52005020	Yab ka pojkantsi xowa in ulal an tiltsixtsik xu kw ijtsidh kal a Dios.
52005021	Ka chuutsik xowa alwa ani xowa yab alwa ani ka jilatsik ta itsch tokot xowa alwa.
52005022	Ejtal xowa yab alwa, yab ka taja.
52005023	Ke na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ti ki tokedhatsik. Ani ke Jaj ti ki alwa beletnantsi an ta ejattal, an ta xechintal ani na tul, abal yab ki elan i walbidh tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
52005024	Xi ti kanymaltsik, lujat Ja tajat ani anchan neech kin taja jelt xan tin ulmal.
52005025	Kidhblbtsik, ti ku kontsintsi weye tam ki lantsik.
52005026	Ka chapndhatsik ejtal an kidhblbtsik kal jun i tokat kanidhaxtalb.
52005027	Tu punkuntsaltsik, kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb abal ka ajintsattsik jech an ti dhutsadh w ejtal an kidhblbtsik.
52005028	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
53001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Silbano ani na Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Tesalnika, xi kwajatichtsik xo juniniki kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
53001002	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
53001003	Kidhblbtsik, yejat ki pidhl echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom anchan tin tomnl. Abal tsudhl u tajkanal a belltsik ms an Ajtiklb ani exom a kyaltsik ms i kndhxtalb jn ani jn.
53001004	Jaxtm waw i till tajat kal yantam i kulbtalb tin tamt xi keet an belomtsik xan ti teye tattsik. I tiltsal xan ta belomtsik ani xan ti jeye ta kooltsik an chaattalb tam a kuxyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb ani tam i atnal jeye.
53001005	Kal jech, na Dios in xalkl abal ejtal lujat xowa in tajl. Pos Jaj ti chutal ke in tomnl ki kwajaytsik taknl kal Jaj. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti exom a kuxyaltsik an yajtsiktalb.
53001006	In tomnl ka pidhantsik ti yajtsiktalb kal na Dios xi ti atax tajtsaltsik abal kin achatsik jeye an yajtsiktalb.
53001007	Ani tattsik xi exom a watnl an yajtsiktalb, ti ki pidhaich ti kijidhtalb junax kal waw tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb Jess t walki junax chejlidh kal i kamal ani kal nin likdha tokat abatwlejiltsik.
53001008	Neech ka tsch abal kin pidha ti yajtsiktalb xi yab in lenatsik kin exla na Dios ani nibal in tajl ti kij an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
53001009	Na jechtsik, neech ka yajlombdh ban kibeltalb malill i kij. Yab neech ka walk ka kwajay xon ti kwajat an Ajtiklb ani yab jayki neech kin chutsi tin labidh tokat chp.
53001010	Tam an Ajtiklb ka tsch jachan a kts, jaich abal ka kakn kal ejtal, kal tin kwentaki xi Jaj in tokmal ani abal ka chutat kal ejtal an belomtsik, ke labidh; tattsik a belmal kom a belatsik xowa tu ltsi.
53001011	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti waw echeki tu kontsintsaltsik, i kontsal ni Diosil abal ki kwajaytsik xan tin tomnl kom Jaj ti takwymal. I kontsal jeye ke Jaj ti ki tolmiytsik kal in chp, abal ka tajltsik xowakich xi alwa ani an tojlb kal tin kwenta abal i belomichtsik.
53001012	Ani anchan, nin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo neech ka kaknantsat kal tin kwenta na alwa xechintaltsik ani neech teye ki kakntsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal ni Diosil ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
53002001	Ani xo, kidhblbtsik, kal tin kwenta tam neech ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo, tam neech ku lxinich kal Jaj, tu pakabdhltsik
53002002	abal yab ka jalkuytsik junwki an chalab xa kool, nibal ka walkatsik ki jikdh max ki utsan ke wachinkich jun i xalkantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal tsinekich an Ajtiklb. Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik kal i ani tilab nibal maske ki utsan ke waw i dhutsmal abal xo in bajmalich an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb.
53002003	Yab ka walka nwki tajat ki kambiyattsik. Pos jech yabl neech ka tmun, asta ka wachin okox xi neechtsik kin pojka tajat na Dios ani tam ka xalkanich jeye an atax inik xi kwajatich bijtsidh abal neech ban kibeltalb.
53002004	Jachan an atax inik, jaich xi neech kin pojka ejtal xu bijyb ti Dios ani ejtal xowa xu kaknb. Neech ka buxkan ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios jelti max jajich nu Dios ani neech kin kambixna ke jajich nu Dios.
53002005	Yabxe a tlmtsik abal tu utsmalichtsik jech tam tin kwajat tachan kal tattsik?
53002006	Ani xo a chobtsik xantokl tu kubdhb abal yabl ka xalkan, por tam kin bajaw an kij, neech ka xalkan.
53002007	Jech an atax inik tujenekich ti tojnal chinatki ani tam ka wkoyatich xantokl ti kwajat tamkmte, neech tm ka xalkanich.
53002008	Neech tm ka xalkanich jachan an atax inik. Jech an atax inik neech ka chemdh kal nin jajchixtal an Ajtiklb Jess ani neech ka kibdh kal nin tajx an Ajtiklb tam ka tsch.
53002009	Jachan an atax inik neech ka tsch kal tin awiltal an lej atax. Neech kin koy tajat i chplb, neech kin taja i exltsik ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb; por ejtal jech, i kambixtalb.
53002010	Neech kin yna xowakichki i ataxtalb abal kin ejto kin kambiy xi neechtsik ban kibeltalb, pos jajtsik yab in lena kin taja ti kij an tsubaxtalb abal ka ejtowat jeye ka lowat.
53002011	Jaxtm tu walkanal kal na Dios kin belatsik an kambixtalb kal yantam in ejattal
53002012	abal ka jilkontsik walbidh ejtal xi yab in lena kin bela an tsubaxtalb, pos ms in kulbetna kin tajatsik xi yab alwa.
53002013	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat kal an Ajtiklb. Waw kool ki pidha echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta abal ti takwymal ki loey tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an kayl. Xo i loenekichtsik abal a belmalich an tsubaxtalb ani i tokedhantsidhichtsik an ta itsch kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
53002014	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymaltsik na Dios, tam ti waw i tila an alwa tilab ba tattsik abal ka ejto teye ka bajawtsik ka koy an labidh tokattalb jelti xin kool ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
53002015	Kidhblbtsik, jaxtm tu utsl ki kwajajantsik lujat ani yab ka uktsi an oktsixtalb xi tu watbantsmaltsik tam tu oktsi ani tam tu abtsmal jeye dhutsadhki.
53002016	Ke Jaj tajat ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani ni Tta Dios, xi tu kanidhl, xi tu pidhl ti kijidhtalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani tu pidhl jeye jun i aytsixtalb kal nin alwatal,
53002017	ti ki likedhantsitsik ta itsch. I kontsal jeye ti ki tolmiytsik ki kwajay lujat ani ti ki tolmiytsik kal ejtal xowa alwa a ulal ani a tajl.
53003001	Kidhblbtsik, tin okontal tu kontsaltsik abal ti ku kontsintsi weye tam ki lantsik. Ka kontsitsik na Dios abal ka bukey jikat nin alwa tilbil an Ajtiklb ani ka bachwat kal yantam i kaknaxtalb jelt xan ti tmun kal tattsik.
53003002	Ka kontsitsik jeye na Dios abal yab xata ku tajtsin kal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik alwa inik ani ataxtsik, pos yab ejtalki bijidh neech ka belmch.
53003003	Por an Ajtiklb lujat Ja tajat ani in tajl xan tin ulal. Neech ti ki tolmiy abal ka koytsik junini na chalab ani neech ti ki beletna abal yab ki t kal an lej atax.
53003004	Ani i bell tin bij an Ajtiklb, ke tattsik a tajl xowa tu punkuntsmaltsik ani neech ka ntsi ka tajatsik.
53003005	Ke an Ajtiklb ti ki tolmintsitsik ms an ta itsch abal ka exbantsitsik ms an tin kanidhaxtal na Dios ani ka koytsik jeye an chaattalb jelti xin koy na Kristo tam tin kuxuy ejtal an yajtsiktalb.
53003006	Kidhblbtsik, tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo tu utsltsik jech: yab ki junkun kal an kidhblb xi be ani yab in l ka kwajay jelt xan ti oktsmal.
53003007	Pos a chobichtsik xan ti yejat ki kwajay abal ki kwajay jelt xan ta chuu u kwajay. Tam ti waw u kwajay kal tattsik, u tjnk
53003008	ani yab xita i kaptsmal ti kapnl aniki. U tjnk chapik akal i kij abal yab ki tojliy ti kapundhom ni jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal.
53003009	In tomnl kejlewiik ki konoy ke tattsik ti ku tolmiy, por yab i taja anchan kom i l ki chuu ka exbaytsik ni oktsixtal ani ka taja jelt xan ta chuutsik i tajl.
53003010	Pos tam ti waw u kwajay kal tattsik, tu pidhatsik jech an ti takixtalb: max jun xita yab in l ti tojnal, yab jeye ka kapch.
53003011	I achmalich ke taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal xeechki, yabtsik u tojnal; xeechkitsik ti ochom kal xowakich xi yab in kwenta.
53003012	Jachan, xin tajltsik anchan, i utsltsik ani i punkuntsal tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo abal ka tjontsik jeye kal i chaattalb ani anchan kin ejtotsik kin ta xan ti ka kapch.
53003013	Kidhblbtsik, yab ka jila ka taja xowa alwa.
53003014	Max jun xita yab kin taja ti kij xowa i ulal ba jech an dhutsadh w, ka chuutsik alwa xitam j ani yab ki junkuntsik kal jaj abal ka tidheb.
53003015	Por yab ka koytsik jelti jun a atwl, tokot ka takiy jelt xan tu takyb jun i kidhblb.
53003016	Ke Jaj an Ajtiklb xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ti ki pidhatsik echeki ti kijidhtalb xantikichki ti ka yntsi. Ke an Ajtiklb ka kwajay echeki kal ejtal tattsik.
53003017	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti chapndhomtalb kal nan tajat u kubak ani u dhuslbil. Anchan tu dhutsl abal ka exla ke tsubax lejtal nan tu abtsaltsik jech an ti dhutsadh w.
53003018	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
54001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, in abadh kal tin abaxtal na Dios ni Loxil ani kal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jaich xi waw u kwajat i aytsm kin okoy ti ku loo.
54001002	Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xi kool. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
54001003	Anchan xan tu pakabdha tam tin nechich Masedonia, kool ki jilkon ban bitsow xi Efeso abal ka takiy taltsik i atiklbtsik ke yab kin oktsixna i chalabtsik xi yab alwa
54001004	ani yabich ka kwajay kin achamiytsik in ani tilbil i wejlbtsik, nibal kin chalpm xitam j nin weje pakliltsik. Ejtal jech yab xata ti alwa, tokot in tajl i kwlxtalb xi yab xata tu ynal ani yab tu tolmiyal ki taja xowa na Dios tu jiltsmal ki taja, xi jaich kal i belomtalbki. Xo anlki jun tu pakabdhl.
54001005	Yejat ka takyaltsik anchan abal u l ku chuu ka kndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i kndhxtalb xi tl ba jun in alwa ejattal, ba jun in chalab xi alwa ani ba jun i belomtalb xi tsubax.
54001006	Taltsik in jilmalich kin taja anchan abal kin kwlxna xowa yab xata in jalbl.
54001007	In l ti oktsixtsik jelti max in witltsik kin wila nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por nibal jajtsik yab in exbayal xanty in ulal ani xanty in oktsixnltsik kal yantam i belomtalb.
54001008	I chob abal an takixtalb alwa, max jun xita kin yna in lujtalki.
54001009	Yejat ki chobna ke ni jun i takixtalb kwajbadh abal xin tajltsik xowa lujat; an takixtalb kwajbadh abal xu tomnaxtsik ani xi yabtsik u tajax ti kij, abal xi yabtsik in l xata kal a Dios ani xu walablomtsik; abal xi yabtsik in kaknl a Dios ani ni jun i belomtalb, abal xin chemdhltsik nin tta ani nin nna ani abal ejtalki an chemdhaxtsik.
54001010	Kwajbadh jeye abal xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, abal xu junkunaltsik kal in at inik, abal xin yakwltsik jun xita abal kin nuju, abal xu kambixtsik ani abal xin lej tsubax ulal jun xata, por u kambixki. Ani an takixtalb kwajat jeye abal ejtalkitsik xin atl an alwa oktsixtalb.
54001011	Jech an alwa oktsixtalb, anlki jeye tin ulal jelti an labidh tokat alwa tilab xi tin punkuntsmal na Dios xi alwa tajat.
54001012	U pidhl yn ti jalbintsixtalb ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xi tin pidha ti chalpadhtalb abal ku lna an alwa tilab, kom Jaj in chuu abal yab neech ku jila jech an tojlb, jaxtm tin pidha jech an ti punkuntsixtalb.
54001013	Tin tajtsmal ejtal jech maske ti wel chabki u odhbijymal, u atax tajtsmal an belomtsik ani u utsmal ti tilabtsik xi yab alwa. Por na Dios tin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb, abal tam ti jachan i kij, nan yabl in belom ani yab u chob xanty u tajl.
54001014	An alwatalb xi tin pidhm ni Ajtik, plek tajat, anl jeye an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb xi koolich abal u kwajatich junini kal na Kristo Jess.
54001015	Jech tsubax tajat ani ejtaltsik yejat kin bela: ke na Kristo Jess tsch ban kayl abal kin loo an walablomtsik, kal jech an walablomtsik, nanwiik na ms in walbidh.
54001016	Jaxtm na Dios tin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb kal jech tin kwenta, abal ba nan, xi mswiik in walbidh tajat, na Jesukristo kin xalka nin chaattalbil. Anchan ti tmun, abal xi keettsik xi neech kin belatsik na Jesukristo ani kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kin chuutsik xowa na Dios tin tajtsi.
54001017	Ka kakn ani ka pubdhantsat tin bij kal ejtalki malill i kij an Pulek takix xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xi yab jayki neech ka chemech nibal u ejtowb ka chutat, na Dios xi junkax ani chalpadh. Anchan ka tjan.
54001018	Timoteo, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb, tu punkuntsal jech an ti takixtalb abal ka lika anchan xan ta utsan kal an kidhblbtsik xi kwin ijtsidh kal a Dios ani ka ejto ka ta an atax jelti jun in alwa soldadojil an Ajtiklb.
54001019	Por ka kokm an belomtalb ani an alwa chalab. Taltsik xi yab in taja ti kij nin alwa chalbil, in kibdhmalichtsik nin belomtal.
54001020	Anchan tin tamutsik na Imeneo ani na Alejandro, xi nan u pidhnatsik ban lej atax abal ka tajtsin kl xowa yab alwa ani anchan kin witatsik yab kin odhbijiy na Dios kal nin kwintaltsik.
54002001	Tu utsltsik tajat abal yejat ki taja i pakabdhaxtalb, i lb, i kontsintsixtalb ani ki pidha jeye ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.
54002002	Anchan jeye yejat ki taja kal an pakdha takix ani kal ejtal an awiltalbtsik, abal ki ejto ku kwajay alwa ani tsububudh i itsch, tokat tin tamt a Dios ani kaknantl kal ejtalki.
54002003	Ejtal jech alwa ani in kulbetnl na Dios ni Loxil,
54002004	pos Jaj in l, ke ejtaltsik ka loey ani kin bajawtsik kin exla an tsubaxtalb.
54002005	Jn tokot a Dios waach ani jn tokot i kawintsix waach abal ka pakwlantsat an iniktsik kal na Dios: Na Jesukristo, xi wenkonk jeye ti inik.
54002006	Na Jesukristo in pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal anchan kin jalbiy nin jalbl an loeltalb abal ejtalki. Jech xowa in taja na Jesukristo, pidhn ka chobn tam tin bajch an kij.
54002007	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin bijidh tin ltsix ani tin abatwle, abal ku oktsixna an belomtalb ani abal ku pidhatsik kin chobna an tsubaxtalb xi yabtsik u judo. Kom u bellich na Kristo, u ulal an tsubaxtalb ani yab in kambix.
54002008	Jaxtm tu l ke putlki, ka lan an iniktsik, kin dhaya nin kubaktsik abal in chobtsik ke kwajat alwa kal na Dios, yab chakulomtsik nibal in tajltsik i kwlxtalb.
54002009	Ani an mmlbtsik, ka kudhkumlintsik in lujtalki xan ti yejat, yab ka kudhkumlin abalki ka telan kal an atiklbtsik; ka tojojontsik, por yab kin jikpa an tsitsbaxtalb nibal an kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i perlatsik, nibal tokotki kin lena kin yna i kajbidh xeketlbtsik.
54002010	Kin yna jelt in kudhkmil ani tin kwajbaxtal, an alwatalb xin tajltsik, jelt xan ti yejat kin taja an mmlbtsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
54002011	An mmlbtsik yejat kin acha an takixtalb chamamadh, kal yantam i chaattalb.
54002012	Pos an mmlb yab ja u walkl ti oktsix ba jun i junkuntalb, nibal kin koy taknl ni jun i inik, yejat ka kwajay echeki chamamadh.
54002013	Pos na Dios okox tin taja na Adn ani tayl tin taja na Eba;
54002014	ani na Adn yab ja kambidh, kambiyat an mmlb ani tam ti kambiyat, kwajlan ban walastalb.
54002015	Por an mmlbtsik neech ka loey, max kin tajl xowa yejat kin taja jun i nnalb, kin ntsi ti belom, ti kanidhax ani ti tokel kal i chaattalb.
54003001	Jech tsubax tajat: max jun xita in l ti oklek belomtsik, alwa tajat an tojlb xin l kin taja.
54003002	Por an inik xin l ti oklek belomtsik, yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan. Yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki i mmlb. Kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kin chobna xowa in tajl ani kaknantl. Yejat kin bachwal alwa an toneltsik xu ulel tin kim, yejat u awil ti oktsix alwa;
54003003	yab jun i uchl inik nibal i kunux inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa. Yejat kin kaknl xitakichki, kin jna jun i chaattalb ani yab chene.
54003004	Kin chobna ti takix alwa tin kim ani kin chobna jeye kin takiy nin chakmiltsik abal ka kaknaxintsik;
54003005	pos xi yab in ejtowal kin takiytsik xi kwajat tin kim, jan ti neech kin ejto kin takiy xin bellichtsik na Dios?
54003006	Yab yejat ka bijyat ti oklek belomtsik jun i kidhblb xi t bl ti belmmadh, abal yab telab t kin teka tinb jelt xan tin taja an lej atax ani ka tajtsin jeye xan ti tajtsin an lej atax.
54003007	Yejat jeye ka exlomn kal xi yabtsik u belom, ke jaj jaich jun i alwa inik, abal yab ka kwajlan ba jun i tidhetalb ani bin tamkuxtal an lej atax.
54003008	Anl jeye, an tolmix belomtsik yejat ka bijyat xi alwa iniktsik; xi yab in jlkkliyal xowa in ulal, nibal i uchl inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa.
54003009	Yejat ka kwajaytsik jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi twiik tin kool yab tejwa na Dios ani xo i bellich ani in chobm abal kwajat alwa tin tamt na Dios.
54003010	Yejat ka chobn okox max jechtsik lujat ti xeech ani max neech kin tjontsi; ani max yab walbidhtsik, neech tm kin tjontsi an ti tolmix belomtsik.
54003011	Anl jeye, an mmlbtsik yejat xu kaknbtsik, xi yab in janwaltsik i kw, xin tsubtalki ti xeech ani lujattsik kal xowakich.
54003012	An tolmix belomtsik yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki tokot i mmlb, kin chobna kin takiy alwa nin chakmiltsik ani ejtal xi kwajattsik bin kim.
54003013	Abal an tolmix belomtsik xi kin taja alwa nin tojlbil, in tlichtsik jun in tj xi ms kaknantl ani in likedhltsik nin ejattal abal kin tila xan ti jajtsik tin bell na Kristo Jess.
54003014	U l kin kale jikat tu lna; por tu dhutsuntsal jech
54003015	abal max yab kin kale jikat, ka chobna xan ti yejat ki kwajay ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ke jaich xin bellichtsik na Dios xi ejat. Jech an belomtsik, jaich nin lowal ani in tajl abal xi keettsik kin exla jeye ke jaich an tsubaxtalb.
54003016	Tsubax tajat ke plek xowa yab i chobnmal ti weje kal tin kwenta an lujat xechintalb tin tamt na Dios: Na Dios in xalka tinb jelti jun i inik; Jaj ln kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal lujat, chutat kal an tokat abatwletsik. Tilan ba putlki an atiklbtsik, belan putlki an kayl ani bachwat walki kal i labidh tokattalb.
54004001	Por an Tokat Ejattalb tajax tajat tin ulal ke tam in okontalich jech an kij, taltsik neech kin jilatsik an ti belom, neech kin exbantsi i ejattalbtsik xu kambix ani i oktsixtalbtsik xi tl ban atax ejattalbtsik.
54004002	Jech an oktsixtalb, neech ka oktsixn kal i atiklbtsik xi yab in kool i chalab alwa ani u kambixtsik, jyki max tsiktsidhichtsik an tin chalab kal jun i kk patl.
54004003	Jech an atiklbtsik, neech kin ulu ke yab alwa ka tomkin xu belomich, neech jeye kin ulu ke yab alwa ka kapat taltsik i kapnl; maske a Dios in jilmal jech an kapnl abal kin kapu an belomtsik xin exlltsik an tsubaxtalb ani kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.
54004004	Pos ejtal xowa in jilmal na Dios, alwa ani yab yejat ki pojka xata, max ki kapal ani ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb.
54004005	Pos nin kwintal na Dios ani an lb in tokwal.
54004006	Max ka oktsi jech an kidhblbtsik, i kalelich tm abal tat, jaich jun in alwa tjontsixil a Jesukristo, xi pubenek kal an alwa tilab xi tin kwenta an belomtalb ani kal an alwa oktsixtalb xa wewkm.
54004007	Yab ka taja ti kij i ani tilabtsik ani in tilbil i wejlbtsik. Ka taja i chplb abal ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios.
54004008	Ki likedha ni tul kal an ubtnich, alwa kal taltsik xowa; por max ka taja an chplb abal ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios, kal ejtalki ja ti alwa. Pos max ki taja anchan, neech ki bachu xata alwa ba jech an xechintalb ani ban xechintalb jeye xi neech ka tsch tayl.
54004009	Jech tsubax tajat ani ejtal yejat kin bela.
54004010	Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu kwajat tu tojnal ani i achl i odhbijixtalb, abal i kwajbmalich ni aytsixtal ba na Dios xi ejat, xi jaich nin Loxil ejtalki an atiklbtsik ani ms, xu belomichtsik.
54004011	Ejtal jech, jaich ka ulu ka tajan ani jaich ka oktsixna.
54004012	Yab ka walka ki pojk abal tat bl i kwitle; ki kwajay jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an belomtsik, xan ta kw, xan ta kwajat, xan ta kanidhax ani xan ta belom. Ka koy a ejattal jelt xan tin l na Kristo ani ka koy jeye na itsch tokat.
54004013	Lejat kin ulich, ka ntsal ka ajay an Tokat Dhuslab ban junkuntalbtsik, ka takiy ani ka oktsi an kidhblbtsik.
54004014	Yab ka jila ka yna an awiltalb xa kool, xi ti pidhmal na Dios tam ti an pakltsik xin takyal an belomtsik, ijtsin kal na Dios ti ki puntsi tin kubak ta b ani ti utsa abal neech ka koy jech an awiltalb.
54004015	Ka pidhodhoy ta ejattal abal ka taja jech an tojlb, jaichki tokot ka tajl abal kin chuu xi keettsik ke ani lejtal ti exom ms a witl ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios.
54004016	Ka beletna tab ani ka koy i kwenta kal xowa a oktsixnl, yab ka jlkkliy na chalab kal ni jun xata. Max ka taja jech, neech tm ka bajaw an loeltalb xi tin okontal ani xita ti ki axtsi, neech jeye ka loey.
54005001	Yab ka kwiya an yejcheltsik, ka takiy tokot jelti max a tta; ani an kwitltsik, ka taja jelti max a kidhbtsik.
54005002	An slbtsik, ka taja jelti max a nna ani an tsidhantsik, jelti max a ixmtsik, por kal yantam a tokat itsch.
54005003	Ka tolmiy an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm.
54005004	Por max jun i chemtsidh mmlb in kool in chakmiltsik o in momobtsik, jajtsik yejat okox kin exla xanty yejat kin taja kal nin pakliltsik. Anchan, neech tm kin ejto kin jalbintsitsik an ti kanidhaxtalb xi kontsidh kal nin ttatsik, pos jech jaich na alwa ani jaich nin kulbetnl na Dios.
54005005	Por an chemtsidh mmlb xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm ani yab xita in kool, in kwajbl nin aytsixtal ba na Dios ani yab in jill kin pakabdha. U l akal i kij.
54005006	An chemtsidh mmlb xi ka kwajay yab exbadh, kwajat ejat, por jyki jelti max chemnek.
54005007	Ka oktsitsik jeye jech, abal yab ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyantsik.
54005008	Pos max jun xita yab in tajl ti kij nin kidhtaltsik ani ms, xu kwajltsik bin kim, in pojklich an belomtalb ani jech, u kalelich ja ms walbidh k jun xita xi yab u belom.
54005009	Ban w xon ti dhutsadh nin bij an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, tokot yejat ka kwajay dhutsadh xin koolichtsik watats ox inik i tamub ani tokot xi kwajinek alwa kal nin tomkl.
54005010	Yejat ka exlomn kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xin tajmal; jelti tam in pakedhmal i chakamtsik, max in bachmal alwa an toneltsik xi ulnek tin kim, max in tjontsm kal i chaattalb an belomtsik, jelti tam jun xita in taktsal tin akan nin at kidhb, max in tolmiymal xi xeechtsik ti chojontlbl o max in tajmal jeye keet xowakich xi alwa.
54005011	Por yab ka dhutsa an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi bl tajat tsidhan; pos jachantsik, tam kin jalkuytsik nin chalab, u wmdhb kl ba na Kristo ani in lenl jun ka tomkintsik ti t.
54005012	Anchan, u jilkonalich tm walbidhtsik abal yab in ejtowal kin taja xan tin ulmal.
54005013	Tm jun, u xechinaltsik tki tki ban attsik. Anchan, u bemltsik; yab tokotki u bemltsik, u tilmabltsik, u ochomtsik kal xowakich ani u xechinaltsik kin tila xowa yab yejat.
54005014	Pos nan u l ku chuu ke an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi bl tajat tsidhan ka tomkintsik, kin koy i chakamtsik ani kin beletnatsik alwa nin kim. Max kin taja anchan, yab neech ka tilan yab exbadh kal xi yabtsik u belom.
54005015	Taltsik an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, in jilmich kin bela na Kristo ani in wwnmalich an lej atax.
54005016	Max jun i inik o i mmlb xu belomich, in kool jun i chemtsidh mmlb bin kidhtal, yejat kin tolmiy; anchan, yabich tm yejat ka tolmiyat kal an belomtsik. An belomtsik neech tm kin ejto kin tolmiy ms alwa an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm.
54005017	An yejcheltsik xin takyal alwa an belomtsik, yejat kin bachu i kaknaxtalb, i tolmixtalb ani ms, xin willtsik nin takixtal na Dios ani u oktsixtsik.
54005018	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab ka busliy an konl xi exom ti kwdhal.” Ani in ulal jeye: “An tojnal in tomnl kin bachu nin jalbl.”
54005019	Yab ka taja ti kij tam kwajat ti lnb jun i takix belomtsik, max yab waach chb o x xu lnaxtsik.
54005020	Por an takix belomtsik xin ntsal kin wala, ka kwiya tin tamt ejtal an kidhblbtsik abal xi keet an takix belomtsik, kin jikna jeye kin walatsik.
54005021	Tu punkuntsal tin tamt na Dios, tin tamt an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani tin tamt jeye nin tokat abatwlejiltsik xin takwymal abal ka yna jech an takixtalb. Yab ka walbiy ni jun xita tam yabl a chob max walbidh ani ka yna an takixtalb kal ejtalkitsik, yab kal taltsikki.
54005022	Yab ka ani puntsiki ta kubak jun xita abal ka pidha jun i punkuntsixtalb ban belomtsik, abal yab t ki kale teye i walbidh kal nin walastalbil xi keettsik. Yab ka taja xowa yab alwa.
54005023	Kom tyidh i yaulml kal na tsukul ani kal keet jeye an yawlchtsik, yab ka ucha tokotki i ja, ka ucha jeye w i yajtsik uxnl abal ti illki.
54005024	Nin walastalbil xi taltsik, tejwa tajat maske yabl jnadh xon ti neech ti ljundhb; por nin walastalbil xi taltsik, yab u tejwaml asta tam oknkich ti ljundhb.
54005025	Anchan jeye, max ka tajan xowa alwa, tejwa tajat; ani maske yab tejwa, yab neech ka jilkon echeki chinat.
54006001	An jolibtsik, yejat tajat kin kakna nin ajtik abal yab ka odhbijyat na Dios nibal an oktsixtalb.
54006002	Ani an jolibtsik xin kool in ajtik u belom, yejat ms kin kakna abal in at kidhbich kal an belomtalb. Yejat kin tjontsi ms alwa, pos xita exom in tjontsal u belom ani yejat ka kanidh. Jech jaich ka oktsaltsik ani jaich ka utsa kin tajatsik.
54006003	Max jun xita in oktsixnl i chalab xi yab alwa ani yab in junwal an alwa oktsixtalb xin oktsixnmal ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani nibal j an oktsixtalb xi tu oktsal xan ti ku kwajay alwa tin tamt na Dios,
54006004	jachan, jaich jun xita xin tekl tinb ani yab xata in chob. In kulbetnl tajat ti kwlx por nibal in chob xanty in ulal. Jaich kal jech tu tujl an txtalb, an chkxtalb, an odhbjxtalb ani yabich tm u bltsxtsik xata.
54006005	In tajl jeye ka kwajay echeki u pjx an iniktsik abal yabtsik alwa nin chalab, yab in exlltsik an tsubaxtalb ani in chalpayal ke an belomtalb, alwa abal kin ta kl i tumn. Yab ka wwnatsik xi anchan.
