54006006	Tsubax kejle, ke max ku kwajay alwa tin tamt na Dios, in junwal jelti jun xata xi kajbidh in jalbl max ku kwajay u kulbl kal xowaki tokot i kool.
54006007	Pos tam tu ulich tu chakam tech ti kayl, yab xata i tsidhmal ani yab jeye xata neech ki ejto ki jna tam ku chemech;
54006008	por max i kool i kapnl ani i kudhkmil, yab yejat ku kwajay tu chalpax.
54006009	Por xin ltsik ka kwajay tumnladh, yab in ejtowal kin kuxuy jachan an jiklomtalb; anchan, u kwajlanal bin kambixtal an atax ani in ltendhl xowa yab yejat ani yab alwa. Kal jech, u kibdhb kl, u chojontlbdhb ani u jnb ban kibeltalb.
54006010	Pos an lelomtalb kal an tumn, jaich xon tu tujl ejtal xowa yab alwa; waach taltsik, abal in ltendhlki an tumn, in jilmalich ti belom ani in tamu yn xata yajtsik.
54006011	Por tat, xa belmalich na Dios, yab ka taja ni jun xata jelti jech xowa yab alwa. Ka taja xowa lujat, ki kwajay jelt xan tin l na Dios, ka bela na Dios, ki kanidhaxin, ki kaknaxin ani ka kuxuy ejtal xowakich.
54006012	Ka taja an chplb abal ka ntsi ka bela na Dios; ka chobna alwa abal a kool an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymal na Dios ani a lej tsubkmalich tin tamt yn i atiklbtsik abal a belmalich ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
54006013	Xo, tin tamt na Dios, xin tajl abal ka kwajay ejat ejtal xowa waach ani tin tamt jeye na Jesukristo, xin lej tsubka tin tamt na Ponsio Pilato ke Jaj u Chakmlb kal na Dios, tu utsl
54006014	ka taja xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb, yab ka jalkuy abal yab ti ki kawiy ni jun xita, anchan ka tajl asta kin bajaw xowki ti ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
54006015	Neech ka tsch tam kin bajaw xowki tin chalpaymal na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi alwa tajat ani tokot Jajki in kool an awiltalb. Jaj jaich jeye nin Pulek Takxal an pakdha takix ani in Ajtik an ajtiklbtsik.
54006016	Tokot Jaj nin kool an awiltalb kal cheml ani Jaj kwajat ba jun i tajaxtalb xon ti yab xita u utel. Yab jayki chuudh kal ni jun xita ani nibal u ejtowb ka chutat. Tokot Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb ani Jajki kin koy an awiltalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
54006017	An tumnladh iniktsik xi kwajat ba jech an kayl, ka utsatsik abal yab kin teka tinb, nibal kin chalpaytsik ke neech ka lowat kal xowa in kool, pos jachan xowa in kool, yab neech kin ejto kin chapkna. Ms alwa kin kwajbatsik nin aytsixtal ba na Dios xi kwajat ejat, pos Jaj tu pidhl yandha ejtal xowakich abal ti alwabl.
54006018	Ka utsa kin tajatsik xowa alwa, kin tajtsi yn ti alwatalb an chojontltsik ani jaich kin koy jelti an tumnladhtalb. Ka chejwalixintsik ani yab ka cheneb.
54006019	Anchan, in junkuwalich tm yn xata alwa tin tamt na Dios abal tayl, kom in chobichtsik alwa abal in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
54006020	Timoteo, ka taja ejtal xowa tu punkuntsmal. Yab ki kwajay ka achamiy i tilabtsik xu tilnal tech ti kayl xi yab xata in jalbl, nibal ka taja ti kij an tmnxtalb xin tajl taltsik kal tin kwenta xu bijyb ti alwa chalpadhtalb ani yab tsubax;
54006021	pos taltsik xin wwnl jelti jech an chalab, in jilmalichtsik ti belom. Ka bachwal echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
55001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, in abadh abal na Dios anchan tin lena. Anchan xan tin ulmal na Dios ke neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xi xo i koolich abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
55001002	Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios an Ttalb ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
55001003	Echeki tam tu chalpayal bu lbil akal i kij, u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios xin kwajat u tjontsal kal jun u alwa chalab jelt xan tin tajmal nu weje pakliltsik.
55001004	Tam u chalpayal nin jaml na wal, u l tajat tu chuu abal kin kijidhm.
55001005	Pos u chalpayal na tsubax belomtal xa kool. Na pulek, xin bij Loyda ani na nna Ewnise okoxtsik tin bachmal jech an belomtalb ani u chob alwa ke tat anchan teye ta belom.
55001006	Jaxtm tu takyal abal ka ntsi ka yna ms chapik an awiltalb xi ti pidhmal na Dios tam tu kwajbantsi an tu kubak ba na b.
55001007	Pos na Dios yab tu pidhmal jun i ejattal jikelom, tu pidhmal an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ku likey, ku kanidhaxin ani abal ki ejto jeye ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul.
55001008	Yab ka tidhena ka tila an Ajtiklb tin tamt an atiklbtsik, nibal ki tidheb kal nan tu kwenta abal in kwajat tin wiknl kal Jaj tin kwenta. Alwa ms ki xechin ka tila an alwa tilab maske ka bachu i yajtsiktalb jelti xi nan u bachwal, xantiki ti ki pidha ti chplb na Dios.
55001009	Na Dios tu loo ani tu kaniy abal ki jnaich jun i xechintalb tokat, yab abal waw i tajmal jun xata alwa. Tu kaniy abal Jaj anchan tin lena ani kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi tu pidha kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess. Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti alwatalb asta tam ti yabl tujenek jech an kayl.
55001010	Por xo, in xalkmich jech an alwatalb tam tin aba ka tsch ni Loxil Jesukristo, xin tantsi tin chp an cheml. Ani kal an alwa tilabki, tu pidha ki chobna abal neech ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yabich neech ku kachey.
55001011	Jaich kal tin kwenta jech an alwa tilab tin bijymal na Dios tin ltsix, tin abatwle ani abal ku oktsi xi yabtsik u judo.
55001012	Jaxtm ti exom u achl ejtal jech an yajtsiktalb kal jech tin kwenta. Por yab u tidhenl, pos u chobich xita nu belmal ani u chob alwa ke Jaj in kool i awiltalb abal tin beletna asta kin bajaw xowki Jaj ti ka tsch jun.
55001013	Ka ntsi ka yna an alwa oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmal, ka ntsi ta belom ani ta kanidhax abal i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
55001014	Kal nin tolmixtal an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba waw, ka beletna xowa ti punkuntsmal na Dios.
55001015	Jelt xan ta achmalich, ejtal xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia tin jilatsik; kal jajtsik ta ti kwajat na Fijelo ani na Ermjenes.
55001016	Ke an Ajtiklb kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb na Onesforo ani nin kidhtal jeye, abal jaj ynl tajat tin kijidhmdhmal ani yab in tidhena tin lna maske in balidh ban wikaxte.
55001017	Yab in tidhena, xowa in taja tokot tam ti tsch Roma, in ntsi tin aliy, asta tin ela.
55001018	Ke an Ajtiklb kin walka kin ela an yajnantsixtalb tam kin bajaw jachan an kij xowki ti ka tsch jun. Tat a chob alwa xan tin tolmiy tam tin kwajay Efeso.
55002001	Ani tat Timoteo, xi tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil, ka bachu an chplb xi tl ba na Kristo Jess kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi ti pidhmal.
55002002	Xowa xa achmal u ulal tin tamt yn an atiklbtsik, jaich jech ka punkuntsi an paylomlbtsik xi alwa iniktsik, xa chutal ke neech kin tjontsi abal kin oktsi jeye keettsik.
55002003	Por tat xi exom a tjontsal na Jesukristo, ka kuxuy an yajtsiktalb jelti jun i alwa soldado.
55002004	Ni jun i soldado xi kwajat in tjontsal in oklkil in tajl keet i tojlb xi yab ka utsan kal jaj, pos tokot kool kin exbay xowa ka utsan kal nin oklkil.
55002005	Anl jeye, max jun xita kwajat ti ubt, yab neech kin ejto kin ta xowa u tb, max yab ka ubtin xan ti yejat kin taja.
55002006	Xu tojnal ba jun i alelb, jaj okox in tomnl kin bachu xowa in lujyal xanty ka labey ba jachan an alelb.
55002007	Ka chalpay alwa xowa tu utsl ani neech ki pidhan ka exbay ejtil kal an Ajtiklb.
55002008	Ka chalpay na Jesukristo, xi wachin bin kidhtal an weje pulek takix Dabid ani ejech ti t tam ti chemdh. Anchan xan tin ulal an alwa tilab xu till.
55002009	Kal tin kwentaki jech an alwa tilab u achl yn i yajtsiktalb, asta in kyb wikats jelti jun i inik xi atax, por nin kwintal na Dios yab ja kwajat wikats.
55002010	Jaxtm tu kuxyal ejtal jech abal tin alwabl xi takudhichtsik kal na Dios, abal kin bachutsik jeye an labidh tokat looxtalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xi neech ki bachu abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
55002011	Jech tsubax tajat: Max u kwajatich jelti max u chemnek junax kal Jaj, neech jeye tm ku kwajay kal Jaj;
55002012	max ki acha i yajtsiktalb kal Jaj tin kwenta, neech weye tu takix kal Jaj. Max ki ulu ke yab i exll, Jaj neech jeye kin ulu ke yab tu exll.
55002013	Max waw yab ki taja xowa i ulal, Jaj echeki Ja in tajl xowa in ulal, pos Jaj yab jayki u jalkunal xan ti jeye.
55002014	Ka witskontsitsik jech ani ka punkuntsi tin tamt an Ajtiklb abal yab ka kwajay ti kwlxtsik kal tin kwentaki i tilabtsik. Pos jech an kwlxtalb yab xata tu ynal, in ojtsalki tin chalab xin achltsik jech.
55002015	Ka taja alwa na tojlbil, abal ki ulich tin tamt na Dios jelti jun i alwa tjontsix, xi yab in kool ni jun xata xantokl ti ka tidheb, abal in ynl in lujtalki an tsubax oktsixtalb.
55002016	Yab ka taja ti kij i tilabtsik xu tilnal tech ti kayl ani i ani tilabtsik xi yab xata in jalbl. Pos xin tajltsik anchan, yab in ejtowaltsik ka kwajay xan tin l na Dios
55002017	ani nin oktsixtal xi jechtsik, in junwal jelti an kacheltalb xi neech u kachel u kachel ms. Jaich jech in tajltsik na Imeneo ani na Fileto,
55002018	xin jilatsik kin bela an tsubaxtalb abal in ulaltsik ke an ejexnich watenekich ani anchan, exom in ojtsal tin belomtal xi taltsik.
55002019	Por na Dios in kwajbmalich jelti jun i likat akanlb, an lej tsubaxtalb xin kool jun i exl xin ulal ench: “An Ajtiklb in exlltsik xi Jaj in dhabal.” Ani “ejtal xin lantsalichtsik na Jesukristo, yabich yejat kin tajatsik i walastalb.”
55002020	Ba jun i at plek, yab tokotki waach xata xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i plata, waach jeye xata xi tajadh kal i te o kal i kut; taltsik exbadhki xowki tu ynal por taltsik abal ka yn echeki.
55002021	Anchan jeye, abal jun xita ka yn jelti alwa tojnal juniniki abal an Ajtiklb, yejat ka kwajay tokat ani yab yejat kin taja xowa yab alwa; anchan neech tm ka ejtowat ka yn kal xowakichki xi alwa.
55002022	Ka kuxuy jeye xanty in chalpayal yab alwa tam jn bl kwitle, ka ntsi ka taja xowa lujat, ka ntsi ka bela na Jesukristo, ka kanidha xi keettsik ani ki kwajay alwa kal xin lantsaltsik an Ajtiklb kal jun in ejattal tokat.
55002023	Yab ka taja ti kij i kwlxtalb xi yab xata ti alwa nibal xata in jalbl; a chobich abal jachan, in tajl i pjxtalb.
55002024	Pos jun in tojnlil an Ajtiklb yab yejat ka xechin ti pjx, yejat kin kakna ejtalkitsik, u awil ti oktsix ani kin kuxuy xowakich.
55002025	Kin tawna kal jun i chaat ejattalb xu tomnaxtsik abal kin chuu max na Dios, kin pidhaichtsik jeye kin chalpch kin jila ti walablom ani kin exbaytsik an tsubaxtalb,
55002026	abal anchan, kin lamaichtsik nin wal ani ka kalch xon tu kyb wikats kal an lej atax ti tajtsinal kl xan ti ka len.
55003001	Yejat jeye ka chobna ke tam in okontalich jech an kij, neech ka wachin i kijtsik xi yajtsik.
55003002	An atiklbtsik tokot neech kin kanidha jajkitsik tinb, neech ti chenetsik, neech kin tekatsik tinb kal tin kwenta xanty in y ani neech kin pojka xi keettsik. Neech jeye kin odhbijiytsik na Dios ani an iniktsik, yab neech kin taja ti kij nin ttatsik, yabtsik neech kin pidhnl i jalbintsixtalb ani yabtsik neech kin lena kin taja xowa in l na Dios.
55003003	Yab neech kin kanidha nin at kidhbtsik, yab neech ti pakwlantsix nibal neech kin walka ka pakwlantsat, neechtsik ti jnum kw, yab neech kin ejto kin kuxuytsik xowa in lenl, neech ka ataxmtsik tajat ani neech kin pojkatsik ejtal xowa alwa.
55003004	Neech jeye kin chinat lna xowa in utsmal jun xita ke yab neech kin lna, yabtsik neech kin chalpay okox xowa in tajl, neech kin tekatsik tajat tinb, tokot neech kin aliytsik xowaki jajtsik in kulbetnl ani yabtsik neech kin aliy a Dios.
55003005	Neech kin wynatsik ke in tajl xowa in l na Dios, por neech kin pojkantsi tin awiltal. Yab ki junkun nw kal jachan an atiklbtsik.
55003006	Taltsik xi jech in kidhtaltsik, u ochel ban attsik ani in kambiyal an uxumtsik xi walbidhtsik tajat ani xin lenl tajat xowakich xi yab alwa.
55003007	Jech an uxumtsik echeki in l kin witatsik xowa u oktsixnb, por yabtsik in ejtowal kin exbay an tsubaxtalb.
55003008	Ani anchan, jelti an dhimantsik xu bijyb ta Janes ani ta Jambres in tomnatsik na Moiss, anchan jeye jech an iniktsik tin pojkltsik an tsubaxtalb. Jech an iniktsik yab alwa in chalab in kool ani xalktsik kal na Dios abal yab tsubax tu belomtsik.
55003009	Por yab neech kin ejto kin taja xata lej yn, kom neech ka chutattsik kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban kayl ke yabtsik chalpadh, anchan jelt xan tin tamu xi chb an dhimantsik xi tomn kl na Moiss.
55003010	Por tat Timoteo a wwnmal alwa nu oktsixtal, xan ta chutal in kwajl, xowa nu l ka tajan, xan tin belom, xan tu kool an chaattalb, xan tin kanidhax ani xan tu kuxyal xowakich.
55003011	Ani a chob jeye xan tin kajnadh ani xan tu achmal i yajtsiktalb, jelti an yajtsiktalb xu tamu ban bitsowtsik xi Antioka, xi Ikonio ani xi Listra, por an Ajtiklb tin tolmiy ku kuxuy ejtal jech.
55003012	Anl jeye, ejtaltsik xin l ka kwajch jelt xan tin l na Kristo Jess, neech jeye ka atantsik;
55003013	por xi ataxtsik ani u kambixtsik ms ja kibenek xowa neech in tamwal, neech ti kambixtsik ani neech jeye ka kambiyattsik.
55003014	Por tat, ka ntsi ki kwajay jelt xan ta ejtmalich, kom a chobich ke jaich na tsubax ani a chob alwa xita ti oktsmal.
55003015	A exll jeye an Tokat Dhuslab asta ta chipl, xi neech kin ejto ti ki chalpadhmdha abal ka bajaw an loeltalb ke jaich kal tin kwentaki na belomtal xa kool ba na Kristo Jess.
55003016	Ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab, a Dios in chalab ani alwa abal ka oktsixn, abal ka tawnaxn, abal ka kwiyaxn ani abal ka takixn ani anchan, ka jnjich jun i xechintalb lujat,
55003017	pos xitaki xin bellich na Dios, kin chobna kidhat abal kin wita kin taja ejtal xowa alwa.
55004001	Tin tamt na Dios ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, xi neech ka tsch jelti jun i Pulek Takix abal kin ljundha xi chemnektsik ani xi ejattsik, tu punkuntsal tajat
55004002	ka tila an alwa tilab; ka witskontsaltsik tam waach xan ti ani xontiki ti ka ejto. Ki kwiyxin, ki tawnaxin ani ki takxin kal yantam i chaattalb ani i oktsixtalb.
55004003	Pos neech kin bajaw an kij tam an atiklbtsik yab neech kin lena kin achatsik an alwa oktsixtalb, tokot neech kin aliytsik yn i oktsixtsik abal ka oktsin xowa jajkitsik in kulbetnl kin acha.
55004004	Neech kin kuxuknatsik an tsubaxtalb ani neech kin belatsik ms xowakichki in ani tilbil i wejlbtsik.
55004005	Por tat Timoteo, yab ka kibdha ni jayki na alwa chalab, ka kuxuy ejtal an yajtsiktalb, ka ntsi ka tila an alwa tilab ani ka ntsi ka taja alwa nin tojlbil na Dios.
55004006	Pos exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech kin kwajb jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb abal a Dios; exomich in bajwal an ora xowki ti neech kin chemdh.
55004007	U tajmalich alwa an tojlb xowa tin punkuntsmal na Dios, jelt xan tin tajl nin tojlbil jun i alwa soldado; u okymalich ejtal xowa yejat ku taja ani yab u jilmal tin belom.
55004008	Ani xo, tin aytsmich xowa u tmal abal in kwajinek in lujtalki, xi neech kin pidhan tam kin bajaw an kij kal an Ajtiklb xu ljundhom in lujtalki. Ani yab tokot nanki neech ti kin pidha, neech jeye ka pidhantsik ejtal xi kwajattsik in aytsm kal yantam i kanidhaxtalb tam ka tsch jun.
55004009	Ka taja abal ki tsch jikat ti kin lna;
55004010	pos na Demas tin jilmal abal in lena ms xowa waach tech ti kayl ani kale ban bitsow xi Tesalnika. Na Kresente kale ban chabl xi Galasia ani na Tito ban chabl xi Dalmasia.
55004011	Tokot na Lukas tech kwajat kal nan. Ka aliy na Markos ani ka tsidha jeye, abal jaj neech kin ejto ti kin tolmiy kal nin tojlbil na Dios.
55004012	Na Tkiko u aba ban bitsow xi Efeso.
55004013	Tam ki tsch, ti kin tsidhantsi an tu wt xu jilmal Troas bin kim na Karpo; ti kin tsidhantsi jeye an ti dhutsadh wtsik, por u yntsal ms ti kin tsidhantsi an ti ttsik xi dhutsuntsidh.
55004014	Na Alejandro, an lejkix patltsik, tin tajtsmalich tajat yn xata yab alwa; por neech ka pidhan kal an Ajtiklb xowa in lujyal kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
55004015	Ka koy teye tajat i kwenta kal jaj, pos jaj yab tajat in l kin chuu ki tila an tsubaxtalb.
55004016	Tam ti jidhtal in kwajay ku loo tub tin tamt an awiltalbtsik, ni jun xita yab tin tolmiy; ejtaltsik tin jiloloy kwetm. Nan u konyal abal ka pakwlantsattsik kal na Dios abal anchan tin tajatsik.
55004017	Por an Ajtiklb kwajay kal nan ani tin pidha ti chplb abal ku ejto ku okoy ku tila an alwa tilab ani kin achatsik jeye ejtal xi yabtsik u judo. Anchan tin loo an Ajtiklb abal yab xata kin tajtsin kal an atax, maske in kwajay jelti max kunatich tajat bin wi an padhum.
55004018	Ani neech jeye ti kin loo kal ejtal xowa yab alwa ani neech ti kin belkm abal kin kwajay neye walki xon ti neech ti takix. Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy Jajki malill i kij! Anchan ka tajan.
55004019	Ti kin chapndhantsi an ta Priska ani na Akila. Ti kin chapndhantsi jeye ejtal xu kwajltsik bin kim na Onesforo.
55004020	Na Erasto jilkon ban bitsow xi Korinto ani na Trfimo u jila u yaul ban bitsow xi Mileto.
55004021	Ka taja abal ki tsch tam yabl chamay. Ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb na Ewbulo, na Pudente, na Lino, na Klawdia ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik.
55004022	Ke an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ka kwajay kal tat ani ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
56001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin tojnlil na Dios ani tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, abal ku tolmiy ka belmchtsik xi takudh kal na Dios ani kin exlatsik an tsubaxtalb xi neech ka tolmiyattsik kl abal ka kwajchtsik xan tin l na Dios.
56001002	Tam kin belaichtsik ani kin exlaichtsik jech an tsubaxtalb, neech ka tajantsik kl abal kin koy an aytsixtalb kal tin kwenta an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Na Dios xi yab jayki u kambix, in ulmal abal neech ti ku pidha jech an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal asta tam ti yabl tujenek jech an kayl;
56001003	ani tam tin bajch an kij, in pidhna ka chobn nin kwintal kal tin kwenta an tiltsixtalb xi na Dios ni Loxil tin punkuntsi kal Jaj tin abaxtal.
56001004	Tito, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil abal chablam tu b jaich i bell. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo ni Loxil.
56001005	Tam tu jila ban chabl xi Kreta, tu jila abal ka lejkiy xowa bl u kibel ka lejkiyat ani abal ka bijiy i takix belomtsik xi neech ti belkol belomtsik bin bitswiltsik, anchan jelt xan tu punkuntsmal.
56001006	Jun i takix belomtsik yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan, yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki i mmlb, yejat kin koy in chakmiltsik u belom ani ke nin chakmiltsik yab ka exlomn kal tin kwenta xowa kibenek in tajltsik ani abal u tomnaxtsik.
56001007	Pos xi kwajattsik ti oklek belomtsik, xi kwajattsik in belkmtsal xowa in dhabal na Dios, yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan, yab yejat kin tekatsik tinb, nibal u chakulom. Yab jun i uchl inik, yab jun i kunux inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa.
56001008	Jun i oklek belomtsik yejat kin bachwal alwa an toneltsik xu ulel tin kim, kin kulbetnl kin taja xowa alwa, kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kin tajl xowaki xi lujat, ka kwajay juniniki abal a Dios ani yab u tnal kal xowa yab alwa.
56001009	Yejat kin kokm tin itsch nin kwintal na Dios in lujtalki jelt xan ti oktsixnadh, abal kin ejto jeye kin tawna an kidhblbtsik kal an alwa oktsixtalb ani anchan, kin taja jeye abal kin bela an tsubaxtalb xu tomnaxtsik.
56001010	Bl tajat waach xu tomnaxtsik, xin tilltsik xowa yab xata in jalbl ani yab tsubax ani ms, xin ulaltsik ke yejat ka tajtsin an ti exl bin tul an iniktsik.
56001011	Xi jachantsik, yejat ki chamkatsik an ti tilom, pos in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik xontiki ka oktsixin abal in oktsixnltsik xowa yab yejat kin oktsixna. In tajltsik anchan abal kin ta i tumn maske yab tadh alwa.
56001012	Jn ti b xi jajtsik in tiltsxil, in ulu ench: “An atiklbtsik xi Kreta echeki u kambixtsik, in junwal jelti an padhumtsik, kutma ani be.”
56001013	Jech xowa ulwat kal jajtsik tin kwenta, tsubax tajat. Jaxtm ti yejat tajat ka kwiyatsik chapik abal ka belmchtsik in lujtalki
56001014	ani yabich kin tajatsik ti kij in ani tilbiltsik in wejlbil an judotsik, nibal xanty in takixnl ka tajan xin kuxuknltsik an tsubaxtalb.
56001015	Xitatsik in kool in chalab tokat, ejtal xowa kwajat ba jajtsik, tokat; por abal xi yabtsik u belom nibal nin chalab yab tokat, yab waach xata tokat ba jajtsik; pos asta nin chalab ani nin chalpaxtal choodhich kal xi yab alwa.
56001016	In ulaltsik abal in exll a Dios, por kal xowa in tajltsik u xalkanal ke yab ani; pos ataxtsik tajat ani u tomnax. Yabtsik in ejtowal kin taja ni jun xata alwa.
56002001	Por tat Tito, kool ki oktsixin jelt xan tin ulalki an alwa oktsixtalb.
56002002	Ke an yejcheltsik kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kaknantltsik, kin chobna xowa in tajl, ka belmchtsik in tsubtalki, ka kanidhaxintsik ani kin kuxyaltsik xowakichki.
56002003	Anl jeye, an slbtsik ka kwajay xan ti yejat ka kwajay xin bellich na Dios, yab kin janwaltsik i kw, yab ka uchlmtsik. Yejat kin oktsixnatsik ka tajan xowa alwa,
56002004	kin oktsi an tsidhan mmlbtsik kin kanidha nin tomkl ani nin chakmiltsik.
56002005	Kin oktsi jeye abal kin chobnatsik xowa in tajl, ke yab ka junkun kal i keet iniktsik, kin beletnatsik alwa nin kim, ka kaknaxintsik, kin exbantsi xowa in ulal nin tomkl abal anchan, yab ka odhbijyat nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun xita.
56002006	Ka takiy an kwitltsik abal kin chalpaytsik alwa xan ti ka kwajay,
56002007	ka taja tat tajat xowakich xi alwa abal kin chuutsik ani kin tajatsik jeye. Tam ka oktsitsik, ka taja kal yantam i tsubaxtalb,
56002008	ki kwin alwa abal yab ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ki kawyat. Anchan neech tm ka tidheb xita xin lenl ti ki tomna ani yab neech kin ela ni jun xata yab alwa abal ti ki tila kal jech tin kwenta.
56002009	Ka takiy an jolibtsik abal kin exbantsitsik ejtal xowa u usnal kal nin ajtiktsik; kin taja ejtal xowa u usnal ani yab ti tokokltsik.
56002010	Yab kin kwey nin ajtik, ka kwajaytsik alwa ani lujat kal ejtalki xowa, abal anchan, ka chutattsik kal xi ms ani ka exl jeye ke an oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Dios ni Loxil, labidh tajat.
56002011	Pos na Dios tu xalkantsmich an tin alwatal, abal kal jaich, kin ejto ka loey ejtalki an atiklbtsik.
56002012	Jachan nin alwatal na Dios tu oktsal abal ki jilaich ki taja xowa yab alwa, ki jilaich an chalabtsik xi yab alwa ani ki jnaich ba jech an kayl jun i alwa xechintalb, in lujtalki ani tokot xan tin l na Dios.
56002013	Tu oktsal jeye abal ku kwajay i aytsm kin bajaw jachan an kij xi kijidh xowki neech ka tsch jun kal ejtal nin labidh tokt ni pulek Diosil ani Loxil Jesukristo,
56002014	xin pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal wawki ti kwenta abal ti ku loo kal ejtal xowa yab alwa ani ti ku dhabalnaich, abal ku kwajch i l tajat ki tajl echeki xowa alwa.
56002015	Jech jaich ka tila, jaich ka ulu ka tajan ani ki tawnaxin kal yantam i awiltalb. Yab ka walka ki pojk kal ni jun xita.
56003001	Ka witskontsaltsik abal yejat kin exbantsi xowa in ulal an pakdha awiltalb ani xi keet jeye an awiltalbtsik, yab kin chikat tajatsik ani ka kwajaytsik echeki in lenl kin taja xowa alwa.
56003002	Ke yabtsik kin jantsal ti kw ni jun xita, yab ka pjexintsik, ka kaknaxintsik, kin koytsik i chaattalb kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.
56003003	Pos waw, anl weyewiik yab u chalpadh ani yabwiik i tajl ti kij na Dios; kibchonkwiik tu xeech ani u kybwiik taknl kal ejtal xowa in kulbetnl ni tul ani kal xowakich i lelomtalb. I atax tajtsalwiik xitakichki ani i atl xitakich kal tin kwentaki xowa i chutal in kool; u pojkantlwiik tajat ani u pjkx jeye jn ani jn.
56003004	Por tam ti na Dios ni Loxil in xalka nin alwatal ani nin kanidhaxtal abal an atiklbtsik,
56003005	tu loo, yab abal i tajmal jun xata lujat; in taja anchan, abal tu kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb. Na Dios tu loo tam tu pakwlantsi an ti walastalbil jelti max tu tajtsi jun i tokedhaxtalb ani tu pidha jun i t xechintalb kal nin Tokat Ejattal.
56003006	Kal tin kwentaki ni Loxil Jesukristo, na Dios tu pidhm yn tajat an ti Tokat Ejattalb,
56003007	abal kal nin alwatalki ti ku bachu ani anchan ki bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xu kwajat i aytsm.
56003008	Jech tsubax tajat ani jaich u l tajat ka lna, abal xin bellichtsik na Dios, kin ntsi kin tajatsik xowa alwa. Ejtal jech alwa ani alwa tajat abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.
56003009	Por yab ka taja ti kij i kwlxtalb xi yab xata in jalbl, nibal an kwlxtalb kal tin kwenta an weje pakltsik, nibal an kwlxtalb ani an pjxtalb xi kal tin kwenta nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Pos ejtal jech yab xata in jalbl ani yab xata tu ynal.
56003010	Max jun xita in tajl i kxtalb ban belomtsik, ka tawna jnl o chbl ani max yab ti ki taja ti kij, yabich ka walka ka junkun kal an belomtsik.
56003011	Pos kal jachan, a exlaich abal in kibdhmalich an alwa bl ani u walablomich abal in tajl xowa in chob ke yab alwa.
56003012	Tam tu abtsi an ta Artemas o na Tkiko, ka taja abal ki tsch jikat ti kin lna ban bitsow xi Nikpolis, pos u ulmalich abal taja neech ku watna nin chamy.
56003013	Ka tolmiy kal ejtal xowa ka ejto na Senas, an oktsix xin will an takixtalb ani na Apolos jeye, abal tam kin ntsitsik an bl, yab xata kin yntsitsik.
56003014	Ani ke an kidhblbtsik kin wita jeye kin tajatsik an alwatalb ani ka tolmixintsik max waach i yejetalb abal ka yan jeye nin xechintalbiltsik.
56003015	Ejtal xi kwajattsik kal nan ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb. Ka chapndhatsik ejtal ni jabtsik xi tu kanidhl abal u belomichtsik jeye. Ke nin alwatal na Dios ka bachwal ejtal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.
57001001	Nan, xu bij Pablo, xin kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess, u dhutsl jech an w junax kal an kidhblb Timoteo. I dhutsl jech an w abal tat Filemn, xi tu tolmiymal teye kal jech an tojlb.
57001002	Abal an belomtsik jeye xu junkunal ta kim, abal an kidhblb Apia xi kanidhl tajat ani abal an kidhblb Arkipo xi tu tolmiyal jeye kal jech an tojlb.
57001003	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
57001004	U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil ani tu kontsintsal teye echeki tam in l.
57001005	Pos u achmalich xan ta kanidhl ani xan ta bell ni Ajtik Jess ani xan ti jeye ta kanidhltsik xu dhabalbich kal na Dios.
57001006	U kontsal na Dios ke tat xi belom teye jelti waw, ka bajaw ka exla alwa an lbtajaxtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Kristo Jess.
57001007	Pos in kwajat kijidh tajat ani in kulbl kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa kool. Kidhblb, kal tatki ta kwenta, an belomtsik kijidhmenekichtsik ms.
57001008	Jaxtm, maske u kool i awiltalb tu utsa xowa ka taja abal tin abatwlejil na Kristo, yab neech ku taja anchan.
57001009	Tokot tu pakabdhl kal jun i alwatalb ench: Nan, xu bij Pablo, xin yejchelich ani in kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess,
57001010	tu kontsal jun i alwatalb abal na Onsimo, xi tech jeye balidh ban wikaxte junax kal Nan. U tolmintsi abal kin bela jeye na Kristo ani xo in bajmalich ka kwajay jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb.
57001011	Ti wel chabki, yab xata ta ejtmal ka yna; por xo, yejat tajat abal tat ani abal nan.
57001012	J xo tu abtsal ti t ani tu kontsal ka bachu jelti max nan exom tin bachwal.
57001013	U lak max ka jilkon tech kal nan ban wikaxte abal ti kin tolmiy ku lna an alwa tilab jelt xan ti tat tin tolmiymal.
57001014	Por yab u lena ku taja xata max tat yab ka chobna okox abal an alwatalb xowa ti kin tajtsi, yab u l ti kin tajtsi kal i chplb, u l ka taja kal tatki tajat a kulbtal.
57001015	Pos nan u chalpayal abal jaich ti plmenek w i kij na Onsimo abal tayl ka witsiy ti kwajl echekijich kal tat.
57001016	Yabich jelti jun i jolib, ka koy jelti jun i kidhblb xa kanidhl tajat. Nan u kanidhl tajat, por tat yejat ms ka kanidha, yab jelti jun i ani inikki, ka kanidha jelti jun i kidhblb.
57001017	Anchan p, max tin exll abal tu jab, ka bachu jelti max nan tin bachwal.
57001018	Max ti waltsmal kal jun xata, o max ti jntsal jun xata, nan neech kin lejkin kal tat.
57001019	Nan, xu bij Pablo, u dhutsl jech kal nan tajat u kubak, nan neech kin lejkin kal tat; maske neech ku ejto tu chalpantsi ke tat tin jntsal teye, pos nan tu ltsi an tin kwintal na Dios abal ki loey teye.
57001020	Kidhblb, ti kin tajtsi jech an ti alwatalb kom waw i bellich an Ajtiklb; ti kin kijidhmdha, kom i bellich an Ajtiklb.
57001021	Tu dhutsuntsal abal u chob alwa ke anchan neech ka taja ani u chob abal ms neech ka taja k xowa tu kontsal.
57001022	Anl jeye tu kontsal abal ti kin tojojontsi jun i alt xon ti neech kin koych; pos u chob alwa ke na Dios neech kin tkoy an kontsintsixtalb xa tajltsik ani neech ti kin walka kin kale jun tu lnatsik.
57001023	I abtsinal ti chapndhomtalb kal na Epafras, xi junax tu kwajat tu wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.
57001024	Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos, na Aristarko, na Demas ani na Lukas, xi tin tolmiyaltsik kal nin tojlbil an Ajtiklb.
57001025	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
58001001	Ti wejeich, na Dios in tawnmal ynl ni weje pakliltsik ani keetich keetich xan tin tawnmal kal nin tiltsxiltsik.
58001002	Xo, tin okontal jech a kij, tu tawnl kal nin Chakmil. Na Dios in taja an kayltsik kal tin kwenta jech nin Chakmil ani Jaj in jiltsmal xowakich xi waach.
58001003	Na Jess jaich nin tajax labidh tokt na Dios ani tu xalkantsalich xan ti jeye na Dios. Jaj, jaich nin teykm ejtal xowa waach kal nin chp nin kwintal. Tam ti okon ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil, buxkan tin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios t walki.
58001004	Nin Chakmil na Dios in bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb k an tokat abatwletsik; pos Jaj, kom u Chakmlb kal a Dios, in bachmal jun i awiltalb ms plek k an tokat abatwletsik.
58001005	Na Dios yab jayki in utsmal ni jun i tokat abatwle xan tin utsa na Kristo ench: Tat tu Chakmil; Nan tu utsmalich xo abal tu Chakmil;  nibal in ulmal jayki ench kal tin kwenta jun i tokat abatwle: Nan neech kin kwajay tin Ttalb abal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay ti chakmlb kal Nan.
58001006	Por tam ti na Dios in xalka nin okox Chakmil ban kayl, in ulu ench: Ka kakn kal ejtal nu tokat abatwlejiltsik.
58001007	Kal tin kwenta an tokat abatwletsik, na Dios in ulu ench: U tajl ke nu tokat abatwlejiltsik, ka wenkon jelti ik ani nu tjontsixiltsik, ka wenkon jelti kamal.
58001008	Por kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil, in ulal ench: Dios, Tat neech ta takix malill i kij; ani Tat in lujtalki i takix.
58001009	A kanidhmal xi lujat ani a pojkmal xi yab alwa; jaxtm na Dios, na Diosil ti takwymal Tat ani ti pidhmal ta ms ti kijidhtalb k na juniktsik.
58001010	In ulal jeye ench: Tat Okxlb, tam ti tujey ejtal, a kwajba nin tujtal an chabl ani kal na kubak ta taja ejtal an walki.
58001011	Jechtsik neech ka okon, por Tat neech ki jilkon malill i kij. Ejtal jechtsik, neech ka kejm jelti kudhkum;
58001012	neech ka paka ani neech ka jalkuy jelti jun i xeketlb. Por Tat, malill i kij yab i jalkunal ani yab jayki neech ka koy a okontal.
58001013	Na Dios, yab jayki in utsmal ni jun i tokat abatwle xan tin utsa na Kristo ench: Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.
58001014	Ejtal an tokat abatwle, i ejattalbkitsik, xi kwajat ti tjontsix ta Dios, abadh abal kin tolmiytsik xi neech kin bachu an loeltalb.
58002001	Jaxtm ti yejat tajat ki exbay xowa i achmalich abal yab ki kibdha an bl.
58002002	Nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios xi tiladh ti weje kal an tokat abatwletsik, jaich jun i pulek takixtalb. Xi walbintsik ani in chikat taja jech an takixtalb, pidhantsik ti yajtsiktalb xan tin tomnl kin bachu.
58002003	Pos jan ti neech ki ejto ki jeka an yajtsiktalb max yab ki beletna jech an pulek loeltalb? Pos Jaj an Okxlb in okox tilmal jech an loeltalb ani tayl, xin achatsik jech an tsubaxtalb, in exbaytsik ani tu watbantsi weye.
58002004	Anl jeye, na Dios in lej tsubkmal kal i exltsik, kal i labidhtalbtsik, kal yn i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani kal xowa an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhmal keetich keetich, jelt xan ti Jaj in lena.
58002005	Na Dios yab in kwajbmal bin takixtal i tokat abatwletsik jachan an kayl xi neech ka wachin tayl, xi xo in kwajat u till.
58002006	Por jun xita in ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Dios, janty in y an inik abal ki kwajay ta chalpax kal jaj tin kwenta? Janty in y an inik xu chemel, abal a beletnl?
58002007	A kwajbmal w i kij ms chaat k an tokat abatwletsik, por a pidha an ti labidh tokattalb, an ti kaknaxtalb ani an ti awiltalb ba ejtal xowa a tajmal.
58002008	Ejtal a kwajba ba jaj in takixtal.  Jaxtm, tam ti kwajb ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal an inik, na Dios yab in jila ni jun xata xi yab neech ka kwajay taknl kal an inik. Por blki i chutal abal kal yab ejtalki tu tajnal ti kij.
58002009	Por i chutal na Jess, xi na Dios in kwajba w i kij ms chaat k an tokat abatwletsik. Na Dios, kal nin kanidhaxtal, in walka ka chemech abal ejtaltsik tin alwabl; ani xo, in koolich an labidh tokattalb ani an kaknaxtalb kal tin kwenta an cheml xin tamu.
58002010	Ejtal xowa waach, kwajat abal a Dios ani abal Jajki tin kwenta. Na Dios in l ke ejtal nin chakmiltsik, ka kwajay jeye ba nin tokat labidhtalbil. Jaxtm na Dios ti kool kin tojojoy, kal an yajtsiktalb xin bachu na Jesukristo xi jajtsik nin Loxil.
58002011	Abal xu tokwbtsik ani xu tokox, jaychki tu dhabalb kal jachan an Ttalb. Jaxtm nin Chakmil na Dios yab u tidhenal kin bijiy tin at kidhbtsik,
58002012	tam in ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: Neech tu tila ba nu at kidhbtsik ani neech tu ajatnantsi ti ajatlb ban junkuntalb.
58002013	In ulal jeye ench: Nan neech ku ntsi ku bela na Dios.  Ani in witskowal kin ulu ench: Tech in kwajat, kal an chakamtsik xi tin pidhmal na Dios.
58002014	Xu chakmlbtsik ba jun i kidhtalb, jununl ani nin tul ani nin xichl; anchan jeye na Jess, nin tul ani nin xichl jyki jelti waw abal kin ejto ka chemech ani anchan, kin kibdha jachan xin kool an awiltalb ti chemdhax, xi jaich an lej atax.
58002015	Anchan tin loo xu kybtsik jelti jolib kal an lej atax abal in jiknltsik an cheml.
58002016	Pos tsubax, Jaj yab tsinek abal kin tolmiy i tokat abatwletsik, tsinek abal kin tolmiy nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham.
58002017	Ani abal kin taja jachan, yejat kin junu jelti nin kidhbtsik abal kin bajaw ka kwajay jelti jun i lujat ani i yajnantsix oklek pletsik tin tamt na Dios ani abal kin wkontsi ti walastalb an atiklbtsik, kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin tamu.
58002018	Ani anchan jelt xan ti Jaj in acha i yajtsiktalb ani taktamiyat, xo in kool i awiltalb abal kin tolmiy ejtal xu taktamiybtsik jeye.
58003001	Kidhblbtsik xi tokodhich, kom tattsik jaich xi kanidhich kal na Dios abal ki dhabalnjich kal Jaj, ka exla alwa na Kristo Jess, an abatwle ani an lej oklek ple kal ni belomtalbil.
58003002	Pos na Jess yab jayki in chikat tajmal na Dios, xi kl ti bijidh abal kin taja jech an tojlb, jelt xan ti na Moiss kwajay jeye ti tjontsix in lujtalki ba putl nin kim na Dios.
58003003	Na Jess yejat ms ka kakn k na Moiss, jelt xan ti jun i kbal at in bachwal ms i kaknaxtalb k an at xin kubl.
58003004	Ejtal an attsik yejat ka kwajay kubadh kal jun xita; por na Dios jaich nin tajmal ejtal xowa waach.
58003005	Anchan p, na Moiss kwajay ti tjontsix in lujtalki ba putl nin kim na Dios; nin tojlbil, jaich kin tila ejtal xowa na Dios neech kin ulu ms tayl.
58003006	Por na Kristo, kwajat lujat jelti an chakmlb ba jachan nin kim na Dios. Jech nin kim na Dios, jaich wawich, xu kwajat jelti jachan an at, max ki ntsch ku kwajay in lujtalki ani ki bela asta tin okontal ani u kulbl kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xi kool.
58003007	Jaxtm, xan tin ulal ench an Tokat Ejattalb ban Tokat Dhuslab: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios,
58003008	yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal jelt xan tin tajmaltsik xi tomnaxnk ani in taktamiymal na Dios ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
58003009	Taja, tin taktamiytsik na weje pakliltsik, maske tin nakl chab inik i tamub in chuu xowakich xi Nan u taja.
58003010	Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jachan an atiklbtsik ani u ulu ench: “Echeki xeechtsik kibchonk nin ejattal ani yab in lenmal ti kin exlantsi an tu blil.”
58003011	Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jajtsik ani u lej utsatsik tsubax, ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.
58003012	Kidhblbtsik, ka koy tajat i kwenta abal ni jun xita xi tattsik, yab kin koy in ejattal yab alwa ani yab u belom xi ka plmdh kl ba na Dios xi ejat.
58003013	Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka tamu anchan, ki twnxintsik jn ani jn tsudhey ka tsudhey, lejat u kwajat jech an kij, abal ni jun xita xi tattsik, yab ka kambiyat kal an walastalb ani ka pojkaxm nin ejattal.
58003014	Pos max ki ntsi ku kwajay junini ni chalab asta tin okontal, kal an belomtalb xi kym asta tin tujtal, neech tm ki koy weye xowa in kool na Kristo.
58003015	Ench tu ulwb: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios, yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal jelt xan tin tajmaltsik xi tomnaxin.
58003016	Jita p xin axtsitsik tin kwintal na Dios ani tayl tomnaxintsik? Jaich jachan ejtal xi kldhtsik kal na Moiss ban chabl xi Ejipto.
58003017	Ani kal jita kl ti kwajay na Dios u chakl chab inik i tamub? Jaich kal xin walatsik; xi chemechtsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
58003018	Ani jita na Dios in lej utsa tsubax ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych junax kal Jaj? Jaich xi yabtsik tajxin ti kij.
58003019	Pos i chutal ke yabtsik in ejto ka ochich abal ka koych kal na Dios kom yabtsik belmch.
58004001	Jaxtm, lejat xo bl i kool xowa in ulmal na Dios abal ku ochich tu koyol kal Jaj, yejat ki koy i kwenta abal yab telab t yab kin ejto ka ochich taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal.
58004002	Pos waw, u tiltsidhich weye an ti tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an loeltalb jelti jajtsik; por jajtsik yab xata tin yna tam tin acha jachan an tsubaxtalb, abal in achatsik ani yab in bela.
58004003	Por waw xi belmalich, jaich xi exomich tu ochel ba jachan an koyxnich. Por kal tin kwenta xi yabtsik in bela na Dios, in ulmal ench: Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jajtsik ani u lej tsubax utsa, ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.  Por na Dios kejle in okymalich nin tojlbil asta tam tin tajmal an kayl;
58004004	pos ta kwajat ban Tokat Dhuslab xon tin ulal ench kal tin kwenta in ktsjil an koyxnich: Na Dios koych tin bklb a kts, kal ejtal an tojlb xin taja.
58004005	Ani in ulal jun an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.
58004006	Por bl u kibel taltsik ka ochich ba jachan an koyxnich; ani xi jidhtal in achmaltsik jech an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an loeltalb, yab ochich abal in chikat tajatsik.
58004007	Jaxtm, na Dios tin bijymal jun jun i kij: jaich jechich i kij. Pos na Dios tu tawnl kal xowa in ulu na Dabid ms taylich, ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios, yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal.
58004008	Max pidhnkak an israelitatsik jachan an ti koyxnich kal na Josu, na Dios yabichak in witskmal kin bijiy keet i kij.
58004009	Anchan p, bl waach jun i tokat koyxnich abal xin bellichtsik na Dios;
58004010	pos xu ochelich ti koyol kal na Dios, u koyolich kal nin tojlbil jelt xan ti na Dios ti koych kal nin tojlbil.
58004011	Yejat p ki taja an chplb ku ochich ba jachan an koyxnich, pos yab telab t kin wwna jun xita xowa in tajmal xi yabtsik belmch.
58004012	Pos nin kwintal na Dios ejat ani in kool i awiltalb. Ms ja chupidh k jun i macht xi tamatki ti wiidh; u ochel asta ms alkidh ba ni itsch ani ba ni ejattal. Tu exlantsal xowa i chalpayal ani xowa i lenl ki taja ti itsch.
58004013	Yab waach ni jun xata xowa xi tajadh kal a Dios, xi neech ka ejtowat ka chinkontsat kl; ejtal kwajat tejwa ani in tell jachan xi neech ti ku ljundha tayl.
58004014	Na Jess, nin Chakmil na Dios, jaich ni lej oklek pleil xi ochenekich tin tamt na Dios. Jaxtm ti yejat ki ntsi ku kwajay juniniki kal ni belomtal.
58004015	Pos ni lej oklek pleil, in ejtowal ti ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal waw yab u lej likat, pos Jaj jeye tajat, in achmal xowakich i taktamixtalb jelti waw, por yab Ja walbin.
58004016	Jaxtm, ki kontsch p kal yantam i belomtalb ni Diosil xu kanidhax tajat abal ti ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ani ti ku tolmiy kal nin alwatal, xowakichki i kij ti ki yntsi.
58005001	Jun i lej oklek ple, u takwyb ban iniktsik ani u bijyb abal ka kwajay ti oklek atiklbtsik tin tamt na Dios ani abal kin pidhna an pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta an walastalbtsik.
58005002	Kom an lej oklek ple u tb jeye kal an taktamixtalb, in kyal i chaattalb kal xi yabtsik lej chalpadh ani kal xi kibchonktsik ti xeech;
58005003	ani kal tin kwenta abal jaj u walbinal jeye, kool kin pidhna i pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil ani kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
58005004	Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin bijiy tinb ti lej oklek ple; tokot kal a Dios ti neech ka ejtowat ka takwyat ani ka pidhan jech an ti punkuntsixtalb jelt xan ti tmun kal na Arn.
58005005	Anchan jeye u tmnal kal na Kristo; yab Jajki tin kwetm chalab tin bijymal tinb ti lej oklek ple, kal a Dios ti pidhan jachan an ti punkuntsixtalb, jelt xan ti usnk ench: Tat tu Chakmil ani Nan tu pidhmal xo ti xechintalb.
58005006	Jelt xan tin utsmal jeye tyki ban Tokat Dhuslab ench: Tat i ple malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
58005007	Tam ti na Kristo kwajay tech ti kayl, in tajtsi ti konoxtalb ani ti pakabdhaxtalb na Dios, kal kawidh i kwintalb ani kal yantam in jaml in wal. Jech xita in tajtsi an ti konoxtalb ani an ti pakabdhaxtalb, jaich xin kool i awiltalb abal ka lowat kal an cheml xi kwajatich neech kin tamu. Axtsin an tin kwintal kal na Dios, kom Jaj tokot in tajl xowa in l na Dios.
58005008	Ani anchan, maske Jaj u Chakmlb kal a Dios, in wita kin taja xowa utsan kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki an yajtsiktalb xin watna.
58005009	Ani kom anchan ti tajadh lujat tajat, in bajaw ka kwajay ultalb kal an loeltalb xi malill i kij abal kal ejtalki xita kl ti ka exbantsat xowa Jaj in ulal.
58005010	Pos bijyat kal na Dios ti lej oklek ple anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
58005011	U kool tajat yn xata ku tila kal jech tin kwenta, por tojlb tajat ku wila abal kaymtsik tajat ta exbayal.
58005012	Kal tin naklki an kij xi watenekich, in tomnlichak max i oktsixichtsik; por bl a yntsaltsik ki wiltsin ti t xowa yab lej tojlb nin kwintal na Dios. A junwaltsik bl jelti tele xi tokot in uchltsik i leche, tam yejatich ka kaputsik i kapnl xi yab tumax.
58005013	Ani xi tokot in uchltsik i leche, in junwal jelti tele, pos yabl in bajmaltsik kin exbay xanty in y an lujat xechintalb.
58005014	Por an kapnl xi yab tumax, jaich abal xi pakdhaichtsik. Anchan jeye in junwal xin witlichtsik kin chuu xowa alwa ani xowa yab alwa abal in witlichtsik kin exbay.
58006001	Anchan p, ki ntsi ki taja an chplb abal ki lujku tib, ki jilaich an jidhtal oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo. Yabich ki till an jidhtal oktsixtalb, jelti tam i ntsal ki tila abal ki jilaich tu walablom xi neech ti ku jna ban kibeltalb ani kal an belomtalb tin kwenta na Dios.
58006002	Anl jeye, jelti an oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta an pujaxtalb, an kwajbantsixtalb an ti kubaklek bin k an belomtsik, kal tin kwenta tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik ani kal tin kwenta an ljundhaxtalb xi neech ka tsch tayl.
58006003	Pos neech ki ntsi ki taja an chplb ki lujku tib, max na Dios anchan tin l.
58006004	Waach xin bachmalichtsik an tajaxtalb jun i kij ani in exllich xowa na Dios in pidhnl. In bachmalich jeye an Tokat Ejattalb,
58006005	in exlmalich nin alwa tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani nin awiltal an kayl xi neech ka tsch tayl.
58006006	Max ka kuxkulchtsik, yabich neech ka ejtowat ka tajan jun kin jila ti walablom; pos max kin taja anchan, u kalelich tm jelti max jajtsik tajat exom in pajkiyal ti t ban peltsidh te nin Chakmil na Dios ani in labdhnl tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
58006007	In junwalich tm jelti an chabl xin dhikedhl an ja echeki tam u ulel an b: max jachan an chabl in labedhantsal an ti tayablb xu tojnaltsik taja, lbtajadh ti kwajat kal na Dios;
58006008	por max tokot in labedhl i kdh o i ani chojltsik, yab xata ti alwa; yabich neech ka lbtajan kal na Dios ani tayl neech ka tsikan.
58006009	Kidhblbtsik, por maske nan anchan in kw, u chob alwa ke tattsik a tajl xowa alwa kom i loodhichtsik.
58006010	Pos na Dios, lujat Ja tajat ani yab neech kin uktsi xanty a tajmaltsik kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa xalkantsitsik na Dios tam ta tolmiy an belomtsik, jaich xi xo bl i kwajat a tajltsik.
58006011	Por nan u l ku chuu ke ejtal tattsik, ka ntsi ka taja anchan kal yantam i ikaxtalb asta tin okontal abal ka tjan kidhat xowa i kwajat a aytsmtsik.
58006012	Yab u l ku chuu ki bemtsik, ms alwa ka ntsi ka wwnantsi tin oktsixtal xi kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal ani nin chaattalbil, exom in bachwaltsik an jiltsixtalb xi usnktsik neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
58006013	Tam ti na Abraham utsan kal na Dios abal neech ka pidhan jun i jiltsixtalb, na Dios in lej tsubax ulu kal Jaj tinb kom yab waach ni jun xita ms plek k Jaj xi neech kin ejto kin ynantsi tin bij abal kin lej tsubax ulu kl.
58006014	Ench tin ulu: “Tsubax ti neech tajat tu lbtaja ani neech tu pidha yn ta kidhtaltsik.”
58006015	Na Abraham in aytsi kal i kaymtalb ani anchan tin bachu xowa usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
58006016	Tam kin lej tsubax ulu jun xata an iniktsik, in lej tsubax ulal kal in bij jun xita xi ms plek k jaj ani tam kin lej tsubax ulu jun xata kal jun i lej tsubkaxtalb, yabich ms yejat xata kin kwlxna.
58006017	Jaxtm na Dios tin tsubka kal i lej tsubax uluxtalb xowa in ulal ke neech kin pidhna. In taja anchan abal in lena kin xalkantsi tajax tajat xi neechtsik kin bachu xowa Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna. Ani ke Jaj, yab neech ka kuxkulch ani yab neech kin jalkuy ni jun xata xowa in ulmal.
58006018	Anchan p, waach chb xata xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka jalkuyat, xon ti na Dios yab neech kin ejto ka kambixin; ani kal jachantsik, na Dios tu pidhl jun i lujat kijidhmdhaxtalb, waw xi ayal nin beletnaxtal ani i belmalich an aytsixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhmal.
58006019	Jech an aytsixtalb, tu kontsal in lujtalki ani in tsubtalki an ti ejattal, jelti an patltsik xu paltsinal an tan abal ka kyat kubat juniniki. Jech an aytsixtalb xi kool, xi jaich jelti an patl kubdhaxtalb, kwajat wikadh alwa tin kx in dhabl an Lej Tokat Alt xi kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios t walki,
58006020	xon ti ochich na Jess kal waw ti kwenta abal ti ku japtsi an ti bl. Anchan, na Jess in bajmalich ka kwajay malill i kij ti lej oklek ple, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
58007001	Jech na Melkisedek, kwajinek ti takix ban bitsow xi Salem ani ti ple abal na Dios xi plek tajat. Tam ti na Abraham witsch an ti pjx xon tin ta an pakdha takix, kale ti bachwb kal na Melkisedek ani lbtajan.
58007002	Pidhan w na Melkisedek xowa na Abraham in ta ban pjxtalb. An bijlb Melkisedek, in l kin ulu okox “lujat pulek takix”; ani kom u pulek takix Salem, xin l kin ulu “kijidhtalb”, in ulalich tm, “kijidh pulek takix.”
58007003	Yab u xalkanal max ttalidh ani max nnalidh, nibal u xalkanal max in kool in weje pakliltsik. Yab u tilnal xowki tu chakam nibal xowki ti chemech. Anchan, u xalkanalich jelti max u Chakmlb kal na Dios, jun i ple, xi kwajat malill i kij.
58007004	Pos alwaich, ka exlantsitsik xo tin publ na Melkisedek, pos ni weje paklil Abraham in pidha w xowa in kntsmal an pakdha takix ban pjxtalb.
58007005	Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal ench: an pletsik xu kidhtalb kal na Leb in kool i awiltalb kin kontsi an atiklbtsik wetsik ejtal xowakich, maske in jab, pos u kidhtalbtsik jeye kal na Abraham jelti jajtsik.
58007006	Por na Melkisedek, maske yab u kidhtalb kal na Leb, in bachkuntsi xi w na Abraham. Jech na Abraham, jaich xi usnk ke neech ka pidhan jun xata kal na Dios. Anchan ti lbtajan na Abraham kal na Melkisedek;
58007007	ani yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke xu lbtajax, ms ja chipl k xu lbtajnal.
58007008	Wawki tech, xin bachwaltsik xi jech wetsik, jaich i iniktsik xu chemel; por kal tin kwenta na Melkisedek, an Tokat Dhuslab in till jelti jun xita xi bl ta kwajat ejat.
58007009	Ani neech ki ejto ki ulu ke na Leb ani ejtal an pletsik xu kidhtalb kal jaj, xi xo in bachwaltsik jech wetsik, in pidhmaltsik jeye wetsik na Melkisedek tmki jachan tam ti na Abraham in pidhna;
58007010	abal tam ti tm, bl taja ti kitmtetsik bin tul na Abraham tam ti na Abraham kale ti bachwb kal na Melkisedek.
58007011	An atiklbtsik xi Israel, in bachu an takixtalb tin kubak an lebitatsik xu ple, xu kidhtalbtsik kal na Arn. Por xo, max jechtsik tsubax lejtal tin tajmaltsik ka lujkun xin wwnltsik jech an takixtalb, tm, yabichakwiik yntsidh ka wachin t i ple xi jyki na Arn, tokot xi jyki na Melkisedek.
58007012	Pos tam ka jalkuyat an pletsik, yejat jeye ka jalkuyat an takixtalb;
58007013	ani ni Ajtik, xin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench kal Jaj tin kwenta: keet jeye i kidhtalb xi tl tyki ba na Israel, xon ti yab jayki kalnek ni jun i ple.
58007014	Abal chobte alwa, ke ni Ajtik tl bin kidhtal na Jud; ani na Moiss, yab in tila ni jun xata kal tin kwenta jech an kidhtalb tam tin tila an pletsik.
58007015	Ani jech, ms tejwaich tajat tam ti an t ple xi xalkan, in junwal jelti na Melkisedek.
58007016	Yab in bajmal ti ple abalki an takixtalb in ulmal ke yejat ka tsch ba jun i kidhtalb, in bajmal ti ple, kal tin chp jun i xechintalb xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka kibdh.
58007017	Pos jech, jaich xowa in ulal na Dios kal Jaj tin kwenta: Tat jaich jun i ple xi neech ki kwajay malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
58007018	Jaxtm, an jidhtal takixtalb wkoyat abal yab tajat likat ani yab xata ti alwa;
58007019	pos an takixtalb xin jila dhutsadh na Moiss yab xata in lujku. Ani xo, tin kuxl, i kool jun i aytsixtalb ms alwa, xi kl tu utelich weye ba na Dios.
58007020	Na Dios, jaich in taja jech kal jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb.
58007021	Xi keet an pletsik, yab bijidh kal ni jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb, por kal tin kwenta jech an ple, bijyat kal jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb; pos ban Tokat Dhuslab u usnal ench: An Okxlb in lej tsubax ulmal ani yab neech kin jalkuy: “Tat jaich jun i ple xi neech ki kwajay malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.”
58007022	Jaxtm, na Jess jaich nin lej tsubkl jun i lejkintalb ms alwa k xi okox.
58007023	Xi keet an pletsik, yaneytsik tajat; kom u chemeltsik, jaxtm ti yab in ejtowal kin ntsi.
58007024	Por kom na Jess yab Ja u chemel, yab in watbantsal keet an ti pletalb.
58007025	Jaxtm tin ejtowal kin loch abal malill i kij, xu utelichtsik ba na Dios kal Jajki tin kwenta. Pos Jaj, kwajat ejat malill i kij abal kin pakabdhl na Dios kal tin kwenta xu utelichtsik kal Jaj.
58007026	Anchan p, na Jess jaich an lej oklek ple xi kejle i yntsal tu kwajat. Jaj tokat Ja tajat, yab in kool ni jun xata xowa yab alwa nibal walbidh, wkodh ban walablomtsik ani kadhbats ms tekat k an walki.
58007027	Yab in junwal jelti xi keet an oklek pletsik, xi kool kin chemdha i konltsik ani kin pikba tsudhey ka tsudhey, okox kal tin kwenta jaj nin walabtsik ani tayl, kal tin kwenta nin walab an atiklbtsik. Na Jess yab Ja anchan tin taja, tam tin pidhna tinb abal ka chemdh, in kwajbaich an pikbantsixtalb jnlki tokot abal ejtalichkitsik.
58007028	An takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in bijyal ti oklek pletsik i iniktsik xi yabtsik lujat; por nin lej tsubax uluxtalbil na Dios, xi ulich ms tayl k jech an takixtalb, in bijiy ti lej oklek ple nin Chakmil, xi tajadh lujat abal malill i kij.
58008001	Xowa xi ms uluts xi xo in kwajat u till, jaich abal ni lej oklek pleil anchan Ja ani buxkank bin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios t walki.
58008002	Kwajat ti lej oklek ple bin lej tokat altjil na Dios, xi tajadh kal an Okxlb ani yab kal i iniktsik.
58008003	Ejtal an oklek pletsik u bijyb abal kin kwajba i chejwalixtalb ani i pikbantsixtalb; jaxtm na Jesukristo, yejat jeye kin koy xata xowa kin pikba.
58008004	Max Jaj techak kwajat chabl, nibalak ela u ple; abal tech, bl waach i pletsik xin pidhnl i pikbantsixtalb jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
58008005	Por jech an pletsik, kwajat ti tjontsix kal xowa xi jelt in chilbil ani in chalm xowa waach t walki. I chob abal i chilabki, pos tam ti na Moiss nechich kin tajtsi tin tokat altjil na Dios, utsan ench kal na Dios: “Ka chuu alwa ani ka taja anchan jelt xan tu ltsi t ban chn.”
58008006	Por ni lej oklek pleil in bajmal ka kwajay ti kontsintsix ba jun i tjontsixtalb xi ms alwa, pos Jaj kwajat ti kawintsix ba jun i lejkintalb xi ms alwa, xi kldhats ban chalabtsik xi ms alwa.
58008007	Abal max an jidhtal lejkintalb yabichak xata in kibdhl, yabichak yntsidh t i lejkintalb.
58008008	Por na Dios in chuu abal yab kwajat alwa jachan an atiklbtsik, jelt xan tin ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab kal jajtsik tin kwenta: Neech kin bajaw i kijtsik xowki neech ku taja t i lejkintalb kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel ani xi Jud.
58008009	Yab jelti an lejkintalb xu tajmal kal nin weje pakliltsik tam tu lotoknatsik abal ku kldha ban chabl xi Ejipto; pos in chikat tajatsik jachan an lejkintalb ani jaxtm tu walbatsik, ench tin ulu an Okxlb.
58008010	An lejkintalb xi neech ku taja kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel tam ka watch jachan an kijtsik, ench ti neech ka tjan, in ulu an Okxlb: Neech ku kwajba nu takixtal ba jajtsik nin chalab ani neech ku dhutsa bin itsch. Nanich tm tin Diosiltsik, ani jajtsik jachich tm nu bitswil.
58008011	Ni jun xita yab yejat kin oktsi xata xi keet; nibal nin junik, nibal nin kidhb abal kin exla an Okxlb, pos ejtal neech ti kin exlatsik, asta xi ms chipl ani asta xi ms plek xi jajtsik.
58008012	Neech ku pakwlantsi xowa yab alwa in tajmaltsik ani yab jayki neech kin witsiy ku chalpay nin walastalbiltsik.
58008013	Tam na Dios in till jun i t lejkintalb, jaich abal in ulalich ke kejmch xi jidhtal an lejkintalb. Ani xi ka kejmch ani yabich xata ti alwa, kunatich i kij neech ka wixk.
58009001	Pos alwaich, an jidhtal lejkintalb in kymal an takixtalb xan ti yejat ka tajan an kaknaxtalb ba jun in tokat altjil na Dios xi tech ti kayl.
58009002	Nin tokat altjil na Dios ench ti kwajat tajadh: ban ultalb alt xu bijyb ti Tokat Alt, taja ti kwajat in kb an bla ani an mesa kal an tokat pan. Ba jachan nin tokat altjil na Dios, utat tin tamt in chabtal an dhabuxtalb, ta jeye ti kwajat xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb xi tajadh kal i mapal oro abal ka tsikan taja an ikob. Tin kx jachan an dhabuxtalb, taja ti kwajat na jn an alt xu bijyb ti Lej Tokat Alt. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i kajn bolidh putlki kal i mapal oro xon tu tapb an lejkintalb. Alkidh ba jachan an kajn, ta ti kwajat jun i mul xi tajadh kal i oro baltsidh ti man ani ta jeye ti kwajat nin kwayab na Arn xi pudhnk ani an tujubtsik xon ti dhutsadh an tilabtsik kal tin kwenta an lejkintalb.
58009005	Tin b jachan an kajn, ta ti kwajat chb in chilbil i tokat abatwletsik xi sutsutslidh xu belkol, xin l kin ulu ke taja ti kwajat na Dios. Jech an abatwletsik, in dhabyal kal nin sutsts xon tu wadhyb kal an xich abal ka pakwlantsat an walastalbtsik. Por xo, yab ms neech ku ejto ku ntsi ku tila ejtal jech.
58009006	Tam tojojodhich anchan ejtal jech, an pletsik u ochel tyidh bin jidhtal altjil nin tokat altjil na Dios abal kin tajatsik an kaknaxtalb.
58009007	Por bin chabtal an alt, tokot u ochel an lej oklek ple jnl ti tamub; ani tam u ochel, kool kin jna in xichl i konltsik abal kin pikba kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil ani nin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
58009008	Kal jech, an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhl ki exbay, ke lejat nin jidhtal altjil nin tokat altjil na Dios u ynal abal ka tajan an kaknaxtalb, an bl abal ban Lej Tokat Alt, yabl japidh.
58009009	Ejtal jech jaich jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an kij xi xo; pos an chejwalixtalb ani an pikbantsixtalb xi taja u pidhnal na Dios, yab u ejtowb ka lujkuntsat kl tin chalab xu ocheltsik ti kaknax anchan.
58009010	Pos ejtal jech, jaich i takixtalbtsik xi techki ti kayl, ke jaich tokot i kapnltsik, i uxnltsik ani xowakitsik in ujnmal in tajl abal ka tokeytsik. Jech, jaich tokot xi neech ka yan asta tam na Dios kin jalkch ejtal.
58009011	Por tsinekich na Kristo ani xo, Jajich nu lej oklek ple kal ejtal xowa alwa xi tsinek. Nin tokat altjil na Dios xon ti na Kristo kwajat ti ple, alwa ja tajat, ms ja lujat ani yab tajnk kal i iniktsik; yab jaich in tokat altjil na Dios xi tech ti kayl.
58009012	Na Kristo ochenekich ban Lej Tokat Alt, yabich abal kin pikba in xichl i borrego o i beserro. Ochenek abal kin pikba Jaj tajat nin xichl; anchan ti ochenek jnlki abal ejtalich ani tu bawtsmalich an ti loeltalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal.
58009013	Tsubax kejle ke nin xichl an toro ani an chibo ani nin kwixx an baka xu tal xon tu tajnal an pikbaxtalb, xu wadhybtsik kl xi kwajattsik yab tokat, in kool i awiltalb ka tokedhaxin, por eblidhki.
58009014	Por max anchan, awxe yab in kool ms i awiltalb nin xichl na Kristo? Pos kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat malill i kij, na Kristo in pikba tinb abal a Dios jelti jun i pikbaxtalb xi yab choodh ani kal nin xichl, tu wixkintsal an ti chalab xi tu jnl ban cheml abal ki ejto ki tjontsi na Dios xi ejat.
58009015	Jaxtm, na Jesukristo jaich ni kawintsxil ban t lejkintalb o jiltsixtalb. Nin chemtal na Kristo, tjan abal ka pakwlantsat an walastalbtsik xi tjnk bin takixtal an jidhtal lejkintalb ani abal xi kanidhtsik kal na Dios kin ejto kin bachu an jiltsixtalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xi Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna.
58009016	Tam waach jun i bijtsixtalb, yejat ka chobn okox max chemnekich xin tajmal jachan an bijtsixtalb abal ka tujch ti ynal jachan an bijtsixtalb.
58009017	Pos jachan an bijtsixtalb, yabl in jalbl max bl kwajat ejat xin tajmal; tokot neech kin jalblna, tam chemnekich an tojom.
58009018	Jaxtm, wakl jeye i xich tam ti tjan an jidhtal lejkintalb.
58009019	Na Moiss in tiltsi ejtal an atiklbtsik ejtal xowa in ulal jachan an takixtalb. Tayl, in tyna an lana xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani jun kwelek i chojl xin bij isopo, in axdha bin xichl an beserro ani an chibo xukudh kal i ja, in wadhiy an dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh an takixtalb ani in wadhiy jeye ejtal an atiklbtsik.
58009020	In utsatsik ench: “Jech jaich an xich xin tsubkl an lejkintalb xi na Dios in pidhnmal abal tattsik.”
58009021	In wadhiy jeye na Moiss nin tokat altjil na Dios kal an xich ani ejtal xowakich xu ynal abal an kaknaxtalb.
58009022	An takixtalb in ulal ke ejtal kool ka tokedh kal i xich ani yab waach i pakwlantsixtalb max yab ka wakl i xich.
58009023	Anchan p, yntsink ejtal jech an pikbantsixtalb abal ka tokedh ejtal jachan xowakich xi jaich in chilbil xowa waach walki; por ejtal jachan xowa waach walki, in yntsal ms alwa i pikbantsixtalb k xi jechtsik.
58009024	Pos na Kristo yab ochich ba jachan nin tokat altjil na Dios xi tajadh kal an iniktsik, xi jaich tokot jun in chilbil nin lej tokat altjil na Dios. Na Kristo ochich ban walki tajat, xon ti kwajat xo tin tamt na Dios abal ti ku kawintsi.
58009025	An lej oklek ple, u ochel ban Lej Tokat Alt jnl ti tamub abal kin pikba i xich xi yab jaj in xichl; por na Kristo yab in pikba tinb ynl.
58009026	Pos max anchanak, yejat tmwiik ka chemech ynl asta ti tujenek an kayl. Por xowa u tmnal xo, tam exomich ti kidhel an kijtsik, na Kristo xalkan jnl tokot abal ejtalichki ani in pikba tinb abal kin wkoy an walastalbtsik.
58009027	Anchan, jelt xan ti ejtal kool ka chemechtsik jnl ani tayl, tl an ljundhaxtalb,
58009028	anchan jeye na Kristo ti pikb jnlki abal kin wkontsi yn xita tin walastalbiltsik. Tayl neech jun ka xalkan tin chabtsl, yabich abal kin wkoy i walastalbtsik, tl abal kin lootsik xi kl ti kwajat aytsmte.
58010001	Abal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss jaich tokot jelti jun in chalm xi xowakich alwa neech ka tsch ani yab jaich xin lejtalich. Jaxtm, jachan an takixtalb yab jayki neech kin lujku xu uteltsik ba na Dios kal tin kwentaki jachan an pikbantsixtalb xu tajnal tamub ti tamub.
58010002	Pos max an takixtalb u lujkuxak, jachan an pikbantsixtalb neech ka jilan ti tajnal; pos xin tajltsik, tam ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbil, yabich neech kin acha ke walbidh u jilkonaltsik.
58010003	Por xo, jech an pikbantsixtalbtsik xin tajltsik, u tajnal kin chalpay kl nin walastalbiltsik tamub ti tamub,
58010004	pos nin xichl an toro ani an chibo yab jayki neech kin ejto kin wkoy an walastalb.
58010005	Jaxtm na Kristo, tam ti ulich tech ti kayl, in utsa ench na Dios: Yabich a l i pikbantsixtalb nibal ki pikbantsat ti konltsik, jaxtm tin tojojontsmal jun u tul.
58010006	Yabich a l ki pikbantsat an ti tsikadh konltsik, nibal an pikbantsixtalbtsik xu tajnal abal ka wkoyat an walastalbtsik.
58010007	U ulu tm ench: “Dios, jetm in kwajat abal ku taja xowa Tat a le, anchan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta ban dhutsadh w.”
58010008	Jidhtal, na Kristo in ulu ke na Dios yabich in l nibal in kulbetnl ka chemdhantsat ani ka pikbantsat ti konltsik; nibal i tsikadh konltsik nibal i pikbantsixtalbtsik abal kin wixka i walastalb, maske jech jaich xowa in ulal ka tjan an takixtalb.
58010009	Ani tayl in ulal jeye ench: “Dios, jetm in kwajat abal ku taja xowa a l.” Jech jaich in ulal ke na Dios in wkch jachan an weje pikbantsixtalbtsik ani in kwajbaich jech keet an pikbantsixtalb.
58010010	Na Dios tu tokmal abal na Jesukristo in taja xowa na Dios in lena tam tin pikba Jaj tajat nin tul jnlki abal echekijich.
58010011	Ejtal xu pletsik, u kubl tsudhey ka tsudhey ani in ntsal kin taja ynl jaychki an pikbantsixtalbtsik, maske jech an pikbantsixtalbtsik yab jayki neech kin ejto kin wixka an walastalbtsik.
58010012	Por na Jesukristo jn tokot an pikbantsixtalb in taja abal kin wixka an walastalb abal echekijich ani tayl buxkan tin ejt na Dios.
58010013	Taja kwajat in aytsm asta ka tantsat xita kl tu atnal,
58010014	abal kal jnki tokot i pikbantsixtalb xin pikbantsi na Dios, in lujkuwalichtsik abal echekijich xi Jajich in dhabal.
58010015	Ani an Tokat Ejattalb, jaychki jech tu utsl abal jidhtal in ulal ench:
58010016	An lejkintalb xi neech ku taja kal jajtsik tam ka watch jachan an kij, ench ti neech ka tjan, in ulal an Okxlb: Neech ku kwajba nu takixtal ba nin itsch ani neech ku dhutsa ba nin chalabtsik.
58010017	Ani tayl in ulal jeye: Yab ms jayki neech ku chalpay nin walastalbiltsik nibal xowa yab alwa in tajmaltsik.
58010018	Anchan p, tam an walastalbtsik pakwlantsidhich, yabich ms yejat i pikbantsixtalb abal an walastalbtsik.
58010019	Kidhblbtsik, jaxtm xo ti ejtowalich ku ochich ban Lej Tokat Alt kal ni jun i jikltalb kal tin kwentaki nin xichl na Jesukristo,
58010020	tokot ki ntsi an t bl, an bl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xi kwajatwiik dhabudh ani tu japtsi kal Jaj nin tul. Jelti max u watelich xo bin dhabl an Lej Tokat Alt xi kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
58010021	Na Jess jaich ni pulek pleil bin kim na Dios;
58010022	jaxtm, ku utch ba na Dios kal jun i ejattal lujat ani kal jun i belomtal plek. Pos Jaj tu tokedhantsmalich an ti ejattal abal yabich ki acha u walbidh kal an walastalbtsik ani ni tul takadhich kal i ja xi alwa.
58010023	Ki ntsi ki koy junini ni chalab ban aytsixtalb xi till ba ni belomtal, yab ki jlkkliy ni chalab, pos na Dios neech kin taja jelt xan tu utsmal.
58010024	Ani yejat ki aliy xan ti ku tlmxin jn ani jn, abal anchan, ku kndhxin ms ani ki tajl xowa alwa.
58010025	Yab yejat ki wwnantsi tin oktsixtal xin ujnmaltsik yab u kalel xon ti tajl an junkuntalb. Yejat ku pkbdhxin jn ani jn ani xo ms, kom i chutal ke exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb.
58010026	Pos max ki ntsal ki taja an walastalb abalki i jila ki bela jech an tsubaxtalb maske i exllich, yabich waach ms i pikbantsixtalb xowa ka pikb abal ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil.
58010027	Tokotich tm u jilkonal ki aytsm an kakadhtalb tam ka tsch an ljundhaxtalb ani an kamal xi kwajat jomoml xon ti neech ka petn xin tomnltsik na Dios.
58010028	Tam jun xita kin chikat taja an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani waach chb o x i lnaxtsik xin ulal abal ani, u pidhnb abal ka chemdh jachan an walablom kal ni jun i yajnantsixtalb.
58010029	Pos, yabxe a chalpayaltsik ke ms plek i yajtsiktalb in tomnl kin bachutsik xita in chikat tajtsal tin Chakmil na Dios, in pojkantsal tin xichl ani in odhbijtsal tin Tokat Ejattal na Dios xu kanidhbtsik kl? Jachan an xich, jaich nin tsubkl an lejkintalb ani xi kl ti tokedhatstsik.
58010030	I chob abal an Okxlb in ulmal ench: “Nan u lujyal ku pidhatsik an ti yajtsiktalb; Nan neech ku jalbiytsik.” Ani in ulu jeye ench: “An Okxlb jaich neech kin ljundha an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal.”
58010031	Kakadh tajat ku kwajlan kal i walastalb tin kubak na Dios xi kwajat ejat!
58010032	Por ka chalpaytsik an kij xi watenekich, tam ti tm tajat ta bachutsik an tajaxtalb ani a kuxuy kal yantam i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb tam ta pojktsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo.
58010033	Taltsik xi tattsik, odhbijyat ani tajtsin xan ti ka len tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani taltsik, in bachu jeye an yajtsiktalb abal in tolmiy xi tajtsinktsik anchan.
58010034	Taltsik a kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xi kwajattsik ban wikaxte ani asta kal i kulbtalb ta kuxymaltsik ki kntsin xowa tattsik a dhabal abal a chobtsik ke t walki a kool jun xata xi ms alwa ani yab jayki u tall.
58010035	Pos yabtsik p ka kibdha jachan na belomtal, abal kal jachan an belomtalb, neech ki tsidhantsat jun i pulek chejwalixtalb.
58010036	Yejat ka koytsik i chaattalb abal ka taja xowa in l na Dios ani tayl, ka bachu xowa Jaj in ulmal neech kin pidhna.
58010037	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kunatich tajat i kij, neech ka tsch xi bijidh neech ka tsch ani yabich neech ka owey.
58010038	Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech; por max ka kuxkulch, neech kin chakuy kal jaj.
58010039	Por waw yab jaich i kidhtal jelti xu kuxkultsik ani u kibdhbtsik, waw i kidhtal xu belomtsik ani anchan, i belkmich ni ejattal.
58011001	Pos max u belomich, i chobich tm alwa ke neech ki bachu xowa nu kwajat i aytsm ani ki bela lejtal ke jun xata xowa yab i chutal, jaich an tsubaxtalb.
58011002	Ni weje pakliltsik kldh ti alwa abal belmchtsik.
58011003	Kal ni belomtal, i chob abal na Dios in tajmal kal nin kwintalki an kayl ani ejtal xowa waach. Jaxtm, xi xo i chutal, yab tajnk kal jun xata xi kwajat kejle tejwa.
58011004	Kal nin belomtal, na Abel in pikbantsi na Dios jun i pikbantsixtalb ms alwa k xin pidhna na Kan. Jaxtm ti bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik ani bachkuntsat an tin pikbantsixtal. Ani jaxtm, maske na Abel chemnekich, in ntsal ti kw kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xin koy.
58011005	Kal nin belomtal, na Enok ejat ti jn ban t xechintalb ani yabich chemech. Yabich jayki elan kom jn kal na Dios. Ani an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal, ke tam ti bl tech ti xeech ti kayl, na Enok kulbetn tajat kal na Dios.
58011006	Por na Dios yab in kulbetnl max waw yab i bell, pos abal ku utey ba na Dios, yejat ki bela ke na Dios ta kwajat ani ke Jaj, in chejwaliyaltsik xu alyb kl.
58011007	Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na No ltsin kal na Dios abal neech ka watey xatakich xi tam ti jachan yab tejwa, in exbantsi xowa in ulu na Dios ani in taja an pulek tan at abal kin loo nin kidhtaltsik. Kal nin belomtalki, in xalkantsi abal u walablom xi yabtsik u belom ani na No kldh ti alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
58011008	Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Abraham kanyat kal na Dios, in exbantsi ani kale abal ka kale ban chabl xi utsan neech ka chejwaliyat kal na Dios. Kale bin chablil maske yab in chob xon ti neech.
58011009	Kom u belom, na Abraham kwajay ban chabl xi usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios, jelti jun i pl chabl xi yab jaj in dhabal. Kwajay ba attsik xin tajl kal i kudhkumki ani anlki jeye tin tajatsik na Isk ani na Jakob, xi usnktsik jeye kal na Dios jelt xan ti usnk na Abraham.
58011010	Pos na Abraham kwajat in aytsm jachan an bitsow xin kool kubat alwa nin akantsik. Jech, jaich xi tajadh ani kubadh kal na Dios.
58011011	Kal nin belomtal, anl jeye na Sara, maske uxkweich tajat ani yab u knal, in bachu i chplb abal kin koy i chakam; pos in wachiy jun in chakmil abal in bela ke na Dios neech kin taja xowa in ulmal.
58011012	Jaxtm na Abraham, maske u kunelich tajat an kij xowki ti neech ka chemech, in koy in kidhtaltsik yn tajat jelti na ttsik xi waach walki ani jelti an kidhib xi waach tin waltsik an pujal, xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka ajyat.
58011013	Ejtal jech an atiklbtsik, chemech maske yab in bachutsik xowa usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios; por kom u belomtsik, in chob alwa abal neech kin bachutsik tayl ani in aytsitsik kal yantam i kulbtalb maske in w telaki. Anchan, in xalklichtsik ke u watelkitsik tech ti kayl ani yab techtsik;
58011014	pos xu kwtsik anchan, in xalkltsik tajat ke xeech bl in ayaltsik jun in chablil.
58011015	Max in chalpmaktsik tokot nin chablil xon ti kalnek, neech kin ejto ka witsiytsik tyki.
58011016	Por in ltsik jun i chabl ms alwa, jaich ki ulu, an chabl xi walki. Jaxtm na Dios yab in tidhenl ka utsan ke Jaj nu Dios kal jajtsik, pos in koolich tojojontsidh jun i bitsow.
58011017	Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Abraham taktamiyat kal na Dios, in jna na Isk abal kin pikba. Jaj yab kwajay ti chalpax, tokot in ulu abal neech kin pikba nin junkax chakmil maske usnk kal na Dios ench:
58011018	“Kal tin kwentaki na Isk neech ka koy yn a kidhtaltsik.”
58011019	Jaich abal na Abraham in chob alwa ke na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal asta kin ejdha i chemlomtsik; pos na Abraham, in bachu jun nin chakmil ani anchan, jilkon jelti max chemech ani ejdhantsat ti t.
58011020	Kal nin belomtal, na Isk in lbtaja na Jakob ani na Esa kal tin kwenta xan ti neech ka kaletsik tayl.
58011021	Ani kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Jakob nechich ka chemech, in lbtaja juntsik ti juntsik nin chakmiltsik na Jos ani in kakna na Dios, in liklm bin tsm nin kwayab.
58011022	Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Jos nechich ka chemech, in ulu abal an israelitatsik neech ka kale ms tayl ba jachan an chabl xi Ejipto ani in jila uludh xanty ka tjan kal nin beklk.
58011023	Kal nin belomtal nin ttatsik, tam ti wachin ti chakam na Moiss, chinan kal jajtsik x a ch, abal in chuutsik ke jaich jun i chakam xi alabl tajat. Yab in jiknatsik an takixtalb xin pidhnmal an pulek takix ke yejat ka chemdh an tsitsik kwitl.
58011024	Ani kal nin belomtal, tam ti inikbch na Moiss, yab in lena ka bijyat ke jaj u chakmlb kal nin tsidhnil an pulek takix xi Ejipto,
58011025	ms in kulbetna ka tajtsin xan ti ka len junax kal an atiklbtsik xin bell na Dios ani yab in lena ka kwajay kijidh w i kij ban walastalb.
58011026	In acha abal ms alwa kin bachu i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo k ka kwajay Ejipto ban tumnladhtalb; pos jaj tokot in lenl kin bachu an chejwalixtalb xi neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
58011027	Kal nin belomtal, na Moiss kale ban chabl xi Ejipto, yab abal in jiknantsi tin chkub an pulek takix, pos in ntsi kin taja xowa in chalpaymal jelti max in teltm na Dios xi yab tejwa.
58011028	Kal nin belomtal, na Moiss in tuju kin taja an ajib paskwa ani in abna ka wadhyat an wilebtsik kal i xich, abal an tokat abatwle xi pidhnk ti awiltalb ti chemdhax, yab kin taktsi tin jidhtal chakmil an israelitatsik.
58011029	Ani kal in belomtal, an israelitatsik watey ban Chak Pujal jelti max i waynek chabl; ani tam ti an atiklbtsik xi Ejipto in lena kin taja anlki, lupuntsik.
58011030	Kal nin belomtal an israelitatsik, julpan nin mapl an bitsow xi Jerik, tam ti jajtsik okon kin wilintsi taal bk a kts.
58011031	Ani kal nin belomtal, na Rb, an junkux inik uxum, yab chemech junax kal xin chikat tajatsik an takixtalb kom jaj in bachm alwa an kwchixtsik xi Israel.
58011032	Janty ms neech ku ulu? Nibal neech ka kidhey an kij abal ku tila na Jeden, na Barak, na Sansn, na Jeft, na Dabid, na Samuel ani an tiltsixtsik.
58011033	Kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal, jechtsik in kniymal i pakdha bitsow, takxinktsik in lujtalki ani in bachutsik an tolmixtalb xi usnktsik neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios. In paxkintsmal tin wi an padhumtsik,
58011034	in tepdhmal i pakdha kamal, in jekmaltsik tam ti neechwiik ka chemdh kal i macht. Xi yabtsik likdha, likeytsik; awilmtsik tajat ban pjxtalb ani in tatsik xin tolmiy.
58011035	Wachink i mmlbtsik xi ejdhantsidh ti t tin chakmiltsik. Taltsik, chemech kal i yajtsiktalb ani yab in tokoytsik ka walk, abal anchan, kin ejto kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
58011036	Keet, in watnmaltsik i labdhnaxtalb ani kwadhnktsik. Asta balidhtsik al wikaxte ani wikadhtsik kal i patl.
58011037	Taltsik chemdhats kwiidh kal i tujub, kotbadh junax chejel, taktamidhtsik, chemdhats kal i macht. Xechintsik tki tki bolidhki tokot kal in otl i borrego ani kal in otl i chibo; chojontltsik, u tepinal ani u yajlom.
58011038	Jech an alwa iniktsik, xin tomnlakwiik ka kwajaytsik xon ti alwa ani yab ba jech an walbidh kayl, xechinktsik ti belal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ban chnlom, ban cholax chntsik ani bin choltltsik an chabl.
58011039	Ejtal jajtsik, maske kldhats ti alwa abal u belomtsik, yab in bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna;
58011040	pos na Dios tu tojojontsmalich jun xata ms alwa, abal jajtsik tokot ka lujkuwattsik jeye, tam waw ki bachch weye xowa in ulmal neech kin pidhna na Dios.
58012001	Jaxtm waw, kom u kwajat wilidh kal an atiklbtsik xin xalkmalich nin belomtal, ki jilaich xowa tu tamkuyal abal ku belmch. Ki jilaich an walastalb xi tu dhumkuyal ani ki ntsi kal i kaymtalb an belch xi yejat ki taja.
58012002	Ki chalpm echeki na Jess, xon ti tl ni belomtal, pos Jaj, jaich xita tu tujtsi ani tu lujkuntsi an ti belomtal. Na Jess in acha an yajtsiktalb ban peltsidh te ani yab in dha ti kwenta an tidhetalb xin kool jachan an cheml. Pos in chob alwa ke tam kin watnaich jachan an yajtsiktalb, neech kin koy i kulbtalb, i kijidhtalb ani neech ka buxkan tin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios.
58012003	Ka chalpaytsik nin oktsixtalbil na Jess, xi yantam yajtsiktalb in bachu tin kubak an walablomtsik; jaxtm, yab ki chekeytsik nibal ka jilatsik tab.
58012004	Pos tattsik yabl a bajmal ka bachu i cheml abalki yabich a l ka tajatsik i walastalb.
58012005	A uktsmalichtsikxe an takixtalb xi ti pidhl na Dios abal ti chutal jelti max ti chakmiltsik? Ench tin ulal ban Tokat Dhuslab: Chakam, yab ka pojka an yajtsiktalb xi ti pidhl an Okxlb abal ka lejkiy tab, nibal ka walba tab tam ti ki kwiya.
58012006	Pos an Okxlb in takyal xin kanidhl ani in pidhl ti yajtsiktalb abal kin lujku xi Jaj in bachwal jelt in chakmil.
58012007	Ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb kom na Dios ti kooltsik jelti max ti chakmil. Awxe waach jun i ttalb xi yab in takyal in chakmil?
58012008	Por max na Dios yab ti ki takiytsik, tm, yab i lej chakmlb kal Jaj, i ani chakmlbki.
58012009	Pos anl jeye, ni ttatsik xi tech ti kayl, tu takyal ani i exbantsal xowa ti ku utsa. Pos ms alwa ki exbantsi ni Tta xi walki abal anchan, ki kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
58012010	Ni ttatsik xi tech ti kayl, tu takyal abal ki ejto ku kwajay alwa tech ti kayl xan ti jajtsik tin chutal alwa; por na Dios, tu takyal kal waw ti alwabl abal ti ku toko jelt xan ti Jaj tokat.
58012011	Tsubax kejle ke ni jun i yajtsiktalb yab neech ki kulbetna tam ki bachuki, tokot neech ki yajna; por xin lejkiyaltsik tinb kal tin kwentaki an yajtsiktalb xin bachwal, tayl in kyalichtsik tm jun i xechintalb lujat ani kijidh.
58012012	Anchan p, ka likedhatsik ti t na kubak xi chekenekich, na akan xi palmenekich
58012013	ani ka aliytsik an bl xi lujat. Neech tm ka jeley na akan xu kweche ani yabich ms neech ka tawkin.
58012014	Ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal ejtalkitsik, ka jnatsik jun i tokat xechintalb; pos max yab ka tokedhatsik tab, yab neech ka ejtotsik ka chuu an Okxlb.
58012015	Ka koytsik i kwenta abal ni jun xita yab kin jila kin bachu an tolmixtalb xin pidhnl na Dios; ke ni jun xita yab kin junu jelti jun i tsaik tayablb, xin tajl yab alwa ani yn u tnal kl.
58012016	Ke ni jun xita xi tattsik ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal, nibal kin pojka xowa tokat; pos jech jaich in taja na Esa, ke kal jn tokot i kapnl, in nuju an awiltalb xin kool jun i okox chakmlb.
58012017	Ani tattsik a chob ke tayl, tam ti na Esa in lena kin bachu nin lbtajaxtal nin tta, pojk; ani maske ukin tajat, yabich in ela xan ti kin uwa abal kin jalkuy xowa in tajmal.
58012018	Tattsik, yab i utenek jelti an israelitatsik, ba jachan an chn xi kwajat jomoml jelti kamal ani u taknal, xon ti waach i jikwaxtalb ani i ikladh b.
58012019	Yab a achmaltsik ti jutsyb an korneta nibal nin tawnaxtal na Dios xi kl ti tawnadh an israelitatsik. Xin achmaltsik jachan an tawnaxtalb, in pakabdhatsik abal yabich ka tawntsik ms.
58012020	Jachan tin tajatsik anchan, jaich abal yabich in kuxyal xan ti kwajat ti usnaltsik ench: “Max jun i konl o jun xita kin kuba nin akan ba jech an chn, yejat ka chemdh tujbadhki o kal i chupidh patl.”
58012021	Jikentl tajat xi t ti tejwa, ke asta na Moiss in ulu ench: “In wipipl tin kwajat kal i jkib.”
58012022	Por tattsik i utenek ban chn xi Sin ani bin bitswil na Dios xi ejat, jaich ki ulu, an Jerusaln xi walki. I utenekichtsik xon ti kwajat yn i tokat abatwletsik
58012023	junkunk abal kin kaknatsik na Dios ani bin junkuntal nin chakmiltsik na Dios xi kwajattsik dhutsadh nin bij t walki. I utenekichtsik ba na Dios, nin Ljundhaxil ejtalki ani bin ejattal an iniktsik xi alwa, abal lujkudhichtsik kal na Dios.
58012024	U utenekich jeye ba na Jess, an kawintsix ban t lejkintalb ani ba nin xichl xin wakla xi kl tu tokmalich. Jech tu tawnl ms alwa k nin xichl na Abel.
58012025	Jaxtm, ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka pojka xi tu tawnl. Pos yabtsik loey xin pojka na Dios tam ti tawntsik tech ti kayl; ani waw ms yab neech ki ejto ku loey, max yab ki exbantsi xi tu tawnl t walki.
58012026	Nin tawnaxtal na Dios, in taja ka yoyon an chabl tam ti jachan an kij; por xo in ulal: “Neech jun ku taja ka yoyon ani yab tokotki an chabl, an walki jeye.”
58012027	Tam tin ulu “neech jun”, i exbayal jelti max in ulal abal neech kin wkoy ejtal xowa xu yoynal xin tajmal na Dios abal ka jilkon tokotki xi yab u ejtowb ka yoywat.
58012028	Nin takixtal na Dios xi tu pidhl, yab neech ka ejtowat ka yoywat. Pos ki pidha ti jalbintsixtalb kal jech tin kwenta ani ki kakna na Dios kal yantam i tokattalb ani i chaattalb xi Jaj in kulbetnl;
58012029	pos ni Diosil, in junwal jelti kamal xu kibdhax.
58013001	Yab ka jilatsik ta kndhx jn ani jn jelti a kidhbtsik.
58013002	Yab ka uktsitsik ka bachu alwa xu uleltsik ta kim, pos taltsik xin tajl anchan, in koydhmaltsik i tokat abatwletsik maske yab in chob.
58013003	Ka yajnantsi jeye xi kwajattsik ti wiknl, jelti max tattsik i kwajat teye ta wiknl junax kal jajtsik. Ka yajnantsi jeye xi atax tajtsidhtsik, pos neech teye ki ejtowat ki atax tajtsintsik anlki.
58013004	Ke ejtal xi tomkidhtsik ka kakn kal ejtalki; pos na Dios neech kin ljundha xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal ani xu walbinaltsik kal i uxmbetalb.
58013005	Yab ki chenebtsik; ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal xowaki a kool, pos na Dios in ulmal ench: “Yab jayki neech tu jila nibal neech tu walba.”
58013006	Jaxtm ti neech ki ejto ki ulu ench kal yantam i belomtalb: An Okxlb jaich xi tin tolmiyal; yab neech ku jikna xowa neech kin ejto ti kin tajtsi jun xita.
58013007	Ka chalpaytsik na oklkiltsik xi ti tiltsmal an tin kwintal na Dios; ka chalpaytsik xan ti xechin ani ka ntsi ka wwnantsi an tin belomtal.
58013008	Na Jesukristo yab u jalkunal malill i kij.
58013009	Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik kal i keet oktsixtalb xi yab i oktsink kal na oklkiltsik. Ms alwa ke ni ejattal kin bachu i chapiktalb xi tl bin kanidhaxtal na Dios k i takixtalb kal tin kwenta i kapnltsik; pos yab jayki kldhats xata alwa ba jech an oktsixtalb xin wwnltsik.
58013010	Waw i kool xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb; taja, yab in tomnl ka kapch xu pletsik bin weje tokat altjil na Dios.
58013011	Pos xu lej oklek ple, in dhl in xichl an konltsik ban Lej Tokat Alt ti pikbantsixtalb abal kin wixka an walastalb; por nin tul jachan an konltsik, yab u tsiknal xon tu kwajl an israelitatsik. U kldhb elb abal ka tsikan.
58013012	Anchan jeye, na Jess kldh ban bitsow abal ka chemdh ani anchan, kin toko an atiklbtsik kal tin kwentaki nin xichl.
58013013	Wanch p ba na Jess, tyki elb abal ku atan weye jelt xan ti Jaj in tamu.
58013014	Pos tech ti kayl yab i kool ni jun i bitsow xi neech kin ejto ka kwajay malill i kij, tokot exom i ayal an bitsow xi neech ka tsch tayl.
58013015	Jaxtm ti yejat echeki ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an ajtintsixtalb, jaich an pikbantsixtalb xi yejat ki pidhna. Ki ajtintsch p an Okxlb!
58013016	Ani yab ka uktsi ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani ka chejwaliyal jeye xowa a kool xi keettsik; pos jech, jaich an pikbantsixtalb xin kulbetnl na Dios.
58013017	Yab ka chikat taja xi ti oktsaltsik ani ka exbantsi xowa jajtsik in ulal; pos jajtsik ti belkmtsal ta ejattal ani in chob abal neech ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios.
