Ka tolmiytsik abal tam ka ljunhd kal na Dios kin achatsik i kijidhtalb ani yab i tepintalb, pos max yab ka tajatsik anchan, yab xata ti neech ka yna xowa ti oktsaltsik.
58013018	Ti ku kontsintsi weye, i chalpayal ke u kwajat alwa abal i l ki taja ejtal alwa xan ti yejat.
58013019	Tu lej pakabdhltsik ki lan kal nan tu kwenta abal na Dios ti kin walka kin witsiy jikat kal tattsik.
58013020	Na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb, jaich nin ejdha ti t ni Ajtik Jesukristo, an pulek Belkol borregotsik xin lej tsubka kal nin xichl an lejkintalb xi malill i kij.
58013021	Ke Jaj ti ki tajatsik ki lujkun ani ki alwamtsik kal ejtal xowakich abal ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa Jaj in l. Ani ke Jaj, kin taja kal ejtal waw xowa Jaj kin lena, kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo. Ke na Kristo kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
58013022	Kidhblbtsik, tu kontsal abal ka koy i chaattalb kal jech an takixtalb xi tu utsltsik, pos yab lej plek an dhutsadh w xi jech tu dhutsuntsmaltsik.
58013023	Ka chobnatsik abal an kidhblb Timoteo, walkadhich; max ka ulich jikat, neech jeye ku jna kal nan tam kin kale tu lnatsik.
58013024	Ka chapndha ejtal na oklkiltsik ani ejtal an belomtsik. Ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb xu kwajltsik Italia.
58013025	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
59001001	Nan, xu bij Santiago, xin kwajat u tjontsal na Dios ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, u chapndhl nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel xi kwajattsik tki tki ban kayl.
59001002	Kidhblbtsik, yejat ki kulbtsik tajat tam exom a watnltsik xowakichki i yajtsiktalb.
59001003	Pos a chobichtsik, ke tam a watnltsik i yajtsiktalb abal ki chutat max tsubax lejtal ta belom, neech ka ejtotsik ka koy ms an chaattalb.
59001004	Por in tsubtalki lejtal ti ka koytsik jachan an chaattalb; anchan, neech tm ka likey ms na ejattal abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy xowakichki i taktamixtalb.
59001005	Max jun xita xi tattsik u kibel i chalab, kin kontsi na Dios, pos Jaj in pidhnl xowakichki ka kontsin. In pidhl ejtalkitsik yandha an ti chalab ani yab xata kwajat in utsl xita kl ti ka kontsin.
59001006	Por yejat kin konoy kal yantam i belomtalb ani yab yejat kin jlkkliy nin chalab; pos xita in tajl anchan, in junwal jelti an ja xu mlk xu jnb tki tki kal an ik.
59001007	Xita xin jlkkliyal nin chalab, yab yejat kin chalpay ke neech ka pidhan xata kal an Ajtiklb.
59001008	Xita xi xo in l jun xata ani kalm keet, yab in kool lujat nin chalab.
59001009	An kidhblb xi chojontl, yejat ka kulb tam kin chalpay ke plek tin tamt na Dios,
59001010	ani xi tumnladh, yejat jeye ka kulb tam kin chalpay ke yab xata in y nin tumnladhtal tin tamt na Dios. Abal xi tumnladh tajat, in junwal jelt in wichl an chojltsik, xi yab u lej owel.
59001011	Tam ka eblin na kts ani ka yajb tajat an kakal, u wayl an chojl, u chujkanal nin wichl ani u tall nin labdh. Anchan jeye ti neech ka okon an tumnladh inik lejat in ntsal ti tojnal.
59001012	Kijidh tajat xita xin kuxyal kal i chaattalb, an yajtsiktalb; abal tam kin kuxch jachan an yajtsiktalb, neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech jaich xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidha xi kl tu kaknb.
59001013	Tam jun xita kin acha u taktamiyb, yab yejat kin chalpay ke kal a Dios tu taktamiyb; pos na Dios yab u taktamiyb kal xowa yab alwa, nibal in taktamiyal ni jun xita.
59001014	U kwajlanal ban taktamixtalb jun xita, tam ka kambiyat kal xowa yab alwa xi jajki in kulbetnl.
59001015	Tam kin taja jech xowa yab alwa in kulbetnl, tmich tu walbinal. Ani kal tin kwentaki jech an walastalb, u jnb ban kibeltalb.
59001016	Kidhblbtsik xi nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka kambiytsik tab.
59001017	Ejtal xowa alwa ani lujat xi bachwal, tl tekat ba ni Tta Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal an tajbaxtalbtsik xi waach walki. Malill i kij na Dios jaychki Ja, Jaj yab jayki u jalkunal jelti an tajbaxtalbtsik xi waach walki.
59001018	Tu pidha ti t xechintalb kal tin kwentaki tam ti bela an alwa tilab. Anchan tin taja abal ki junu jelti an okox wallb xu pikbantsb na Dios, pos Jaj anchan tin lenmal.
59001019	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka achatsik nin kwintal na Dios; por yejat ka koy i chaattalb abal ki kwin ani yab ki chaklml jikatki.
59001020	Abal tam jun xita u chakl, yab neech kin ejto kin taja xowa lujat tin tamt na Dios.
59001021	Pos anchan p, ka jilaichtsik ejtal xowa yab alwa ani ejtal an ataxtalb xi waach tajat. Ka bachutsik kal i chaattalb an alwa tilab xi kwajbantsidh ba na itsch; pos jech an alwa tilab, in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki lotsi ta ejattal.
59001022	Por ka tajatsik xan tin ulal an alwa tilab, yab ka achakitsik, pos max ka achakitsik, tatkitsik a kambiyal tab.
59001023	Xita xin achlki an alwa tilab ani yab in tajl ti kij, in junwal jelti jun xita xin tell tinb ba jun i lam.
59001024	In chutal tinb xan ti jeye jaj ani tam ka wixkinich ban lam, in uktsal xan ti jeye jaj.
59001025	Por xita yab in uktsal kin taja xan tin ulal an takixtalb; an takixtalb xi lujat ani in pidhnl an walkadhtalb, tokot kwajat lujtalki in tajl xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay kijidh kal ejtal xowa in tajl.
59001026	Max jun xita in chalpayal ke u belom tajat, por yab in ejtowal kin kubdha ti kw yab alwa, jajki in kambiyal tinb ani nin belomtal yab xata in jalbl.
59001027	An belomtalb xi alwa, xi na Dios an Ttalb in chutal abal tokat, jaich jech: ki tolmiy an chemtsiwletsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik kal an yajtsiktalb xin watnltsik ani yab ku chon kal an walastalb xi waach ban kayl.
59002001	Kidhblbtsik, kom a bellichtsik ni tokat labidh Ajtik Jesukristo, yab takudhki xita yejat ka kaknltsik.
59002002	Max ka ochich xon ta junkunaltsik jun i inik xin kwajbm jun i aniyo xi tajadh kal i oro ani in kwajbm i alwa kudhkum; ani ka ochich jeye jun i chojontl xi xeketlidh kal i kej kudhkum,
59002003	ani ka bachutsik alwa xi xeketlidh kal an alwa kudhkum ani ka utsa: “Ki buxkan tech ban alwa koytalb”, por an chojontl ka utsa: “Tat n ki kale ta kubl, o ki buxkan tech chabl”,
59002004	yabxe exomichki a takwyal xita ka kaknl? Max anchan ka tajltsik, yab lujat na chalab.
59002005	Kidhblbtsik xi nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, ka achatsik jech: Na Dios in takwymal xi chojontltsik tech ti kayl abal ka belmchtsik ani abal kin bachutsik jelti jun i jiltsixtalb xowa Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhatsik xi kl tu kaknb.
59002006	Por tattsik a tidhebdhl an chojontltsik. Yabxe jaich an tumnladh iniktsik xi ti tajtsaltsik yab alwa ani ti utwaltsik ban awiltalbtsik?
59002007	Yabxe jajtsik nin atax till na Jesukristo xa bachmaltsik ani xo a kool ta itsch?
59002008	Max a tajlaktsik lejtal jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Ajtiklb Jess xin ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab”, alwaich ta tajl.
59002009	Por max takudhki xita a kaknl, i walbinalichtsik tm ani nin takixtal na Dios, ti xalklichtsik abal yab a tajltsik xan tin ulal.
59002010	Max jun xita in tajl ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, por yab kin taja jn xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb, u kalel jelti max in chikat tajl ejtal.
59002011	Pos na Dios xin ulu ench: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal”, in ulu jeye: “Yab ki chemdhaxin.” Jaxtm, max jun xita yab u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal por u chemdhax, in chikat tajlich an takixtalb.
59002012	Ka chobnatsik ke neech ki ljundh kal an takixtalb xi ti tajl ki kwajay walkadh, jaxtm ti yejat ka tilltsik ani ka tajltsik xowa alwa.
59002013	Pos xita xi yab in kontsm ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik, yab jeye neech ka kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb; por xin kontsm ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik, neech jeye ka kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.
59002014	Kidhblbtsik, jant ti alwa max jun xita kin ulu ke u belom ani yab in tajl ni jun xata xi alwa? Awxe neech ka ejtowat ka lowat kal jachan an belomtalb xin kool?
59002015	Ka chalpaytsik ench: Max jun i kidhblb i inik o i mmlb yab in kool in kudhkmil nibal i kapnl xan ti kin watna jachan a kts,
59002016	ani ke jn ti b xi tattsik kin utsa ench: “Ka watna alwa na kts, ki wtin ani ki kapch”, por yab kin pidha xowa in yntsal nin tul, jant ti alwa xowa in utsa?
59002017	Anchan u tmnal kal an belomtalb; max jun xita yab kin xalka nin belomtal kal xowa alwa in tajl, yab tsubax tu belom.
59002018	Por max jun xita kin ulu ench: “Tat i belom ani nan u tajl xowa alwa.” Pos ti kin xalkantsi p plki an ti belomtalb xa kool ani yab junax kal xowa alwa a tajl; ani nan neech tu xalkantsi abal in belom junax kal xowa alwa u tajl.
59002019	Tat a bell ke jn tokot a Dios waach ani anchan alwaich ta tajl. Anchan jeye tin bell an atax ejattalbtsik ani u wipipltsik kal i jkib.
59002020	Por yejat ka chobna, inik xi yab i chalpadh, ke max an belomtalb xi jun xita in kool yab kin xalka kal an alwatalb xowa xin tajl, yab xata in jalbl nin belomtal.
59002021	Ni weje paklil Abraham bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik kal xowa in taja tam tin pikba nin chakmil Isk.
59002022	A chutalich ke nin belomtal na Abraham, in xalka kal xowa xin taja ani anchan, in xalka ke tsubax lejtal tu belom.
59002023	Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtal, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.” Ani bijyat tin jab a Dios.
59002024	Pos a chutalichtsik, ke na Dios in bachwal jeye jun xita ti lujat inik kal xowa alwa in tajl abal u belom ani yab tokot, abal u belomki.
59002025	Anlki jeye tmun kal na Rb, an junkux inik uxum; bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat mmlb kal xowa alwa in taja tam tin chinat bachu tin kim nin abatwlejiltsik na Josu ani tayl in tolmiy abal ka kale pl bl.
59002026	Pos anchan jelti ni tul max yab in kool an ejattalb, chemnek ti kwajat ani yabich xata ti alwa, anchan jeye, yab xata ti alwa max tokot u belom ani yab i tajl xowa alwa.
59003001	Kidhblbtsik, yab yejat ka wachin ba tattsik yn xita xin lenl kin oktsixna nin kwintal na Dios, pos a chobichtsik ke nan ani xi ms xu oktsixtsik jeye, ms chapik ti neech tu ljundhb.
59003002	Ejtal i tajl xowa yab alwa. Max jun xita yab in ulal xowa yab alwa, jachan jaich jun i lujat inik, xi neech jeye kin ejto kin kubdha nin tul tam in l kin taja jun xata xi yab alwa.
59003003	Tam ki kwajbantsi ti freno bin wi an bitsim, neech tm ki ejto ki jna xon ti ki lena.
59003004	Anchan jeye an pakdha tan, maske pakdhatsik tajat ani chapik tajat tu wawyb kal an ik, an beldhom, in ejtowal kin jna xon ti jaj kin lena kal jun in chakam chawtsl.
59003005	Anlki jeye u tmnal kal ni wi; jaich jun peje in putll ni tul, por u tjnal xowakich pakdha kal tin kwentaki xowa ki ulu. Jelti w i kamal in tsikl i pakdha telom, anchan jeye u tmnal kal ni wi.
59003006	Ani ni wi, in junwal jelti jun i kamal. Ni wi, kwajat bin putll ni tul ani tu choyal tam ki ulu xowa yab alwa. In junwal jelti an ataxtalb xu tjnal ban kayl. An lej atax, jaich xi tu tajl ki ulu xowa yab alwa ani anchan, i choyalich ejtal xowa i tajl ba ni xechintal.
59003007	An inik in ejtowal kin mxubdha xowakichki i padhumtsik, i chichintsik, i chantsik ani i konltsik xi waach ban pujal;
59003008	por yab xita in ejtmal kin taja ke nin wi kin ulu tokot xowa alwa. Jech jaich jun i ataxtalb xi yab in walkl tinb ka kubdh kal ni jun xita; in junwal jelti itlab xu chemdhax.
59003009	Kal jaych jech ni wi, i kaknl na Dios an Ttalb ani kal jaychki jeye ti odhbijyal an iniktsik, xin tajmal na Dios jyki jelti Jaj.
59003010	Ba ni wi u kalel i kaknaxtalb ani tyki u kalel i odhbijixtalb. Kidhblbtsik, yab yejat ki taja anchan.
59003011	Awxe ba jun in kalemtal i ja neech ka kale i ja xi alwa ani i ja xi tsaik? Yaba!
59003012	Kidhblbtsik, awxe jun in akan i lanx neech kin koy i itadh, o jun in akan i uj kin koy i lanx? Pos ba jun in kalemtal i ja yab jeye neech ka kale i ja xi chapu ani xi alwa.
59003013	Max kal tattsik ta kwajat jun xita xi chalpadh ani in exbayal xowakich, kin xalka kal xowa alwa in tajl ani kal an chaattalb xin kool kal tin kwenta jachan an chalpadhtalb.
59003014	Por max tattsik a chakuntsal jun xita kal tin kwenta xowa in kool ani a pjxnl abal ka bajaw ki kwajay ms plek, yab yejat ka tekatsik tab kal jachan an chalab xa kooltsik, pos anchan, i kambixichki ani yab a ynltsik an tsubaxtalb.
59003015	Pos jech yab jaich an chalpadhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, jech an chalpadhtalb jaich xi techki ti kayl. Yab j xi tl ban Tokat Ejattalb, jech an chalpadhtalb tl ban atax ejattalbtsik.
59003016	Pos xon ti waachtsik xita xin chakuntsal xi keet kal tin kwentaki xowa in kool ani in pjxnltsik abal kin bajaw ka kwajay ms plek, taja waach xowa xi yab exbadh ani xowakichki i ataxtalb.
59003017	Pos xin kooltsik an chalpadhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, jachan in kooltsik jun i xechintalb tokat. Yabtsik pojkax, alwa iniktsik, in exbayaltsik xowakich. In yajnantsal jeye nin at kidhbtsik ani in tajltsik xowa alwa; yab exbadhki xita in kaknltsik ani yab u kambixtsik.
59003018	Xita in ayal an kijidhtalb, in tajl abal ka wachin i kijidhtalb ban atiklbtsik ani anchan, neech kin bachutsik an lujattalb.
59004001	Jn tu tsiil an pjxtalb ani an knxtalb xi tattsik a kyal? Yabxe taja tu tsiil ban lelomtalb xi kwajat in tajl i chplb alkidh ba na ejattal?
59004002	A ltendhltsik xata ani yab a ejto ka koytsik. I chemdhaxtsik abal a ltsik ka koy xowa a chutal in kooltsik xi keet ani kom yab a ejtowal ka koytsik, tmich ta pjxtsik. Yab a ejtowal ka koytsik xowa a l, kom yab a kontsaltsik na Dios.
59004003	Ani max a kontsaltsik, yab i pidhnal kom yab alwa ta konyaltsik; pos a konyaltsik abal ka yna kal xowaki in kulbetnl na tul.
59004004	Tattsik a jilmal na Dios jelt xan ti jun i mmlb in jill nin tomkl abal ka junkun kal i keet inik. Yabxe a chobtsik ke max ka kanidha xowa waach yab alwa tech ban kayl a pojklich na Dios? Max jun xita kin kanidha xowa waach yab alwa tech ban kayl, u kalelich in pojkl a Dios.
59004005	O a chalpayaltsik ke an Tokat Dhuslab in ani ulalki ench: “An Tokat Ejattalb xi tu kwajbantsmal na Dios ba ni ejattal tu kanidhl tajat ani in l kin chuu ke tokotki ki kanidha na Dios”?
59004006	Por na Dios tu tolmiyal ms kal nin alwatal; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Dios in pojkl xin tekltsik tinb, por in tolmiyal kal nin alwatal xin chakltsik tinb.”
59004007	Pos ka walkaichtsik p ki takyattsik kal na Dios. Yab ka walka ti ki tantsi an ta chalab an lej atax. Pos max yab ka walka ti ki tatsik an lej atax, an lej atax neech ka wkon kal tattsik.
59004008	Ki utchtsik ba na Dios ani Jaj neech ka utey kal tattsik. Max i walbinal, ka jilaichtsik an walastalb; ani tattsik xa lenl ka kakna na Dios ani a kanidhl jeye xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, yabich ka tajatsik anchan. Ka kaknatsik tokot na Dios ani anchan, neech ka tokedhatsik na ejattal.
59004009	Ki tepintsik, ki ukintsik ani ka yajnantsitsik tab. Ka jalkuytsik an tenich kal i ukil ani an kijidhtalb kal i tepintalb.
59004010	Ka chakatsik tab tin tamt an Okxlb ani Jaj neech ti ki tekbatsik.
59004011	Kidhblbtsik, yab ki tlxintsik yab alwa jn ani jn. Xita in till yab alwa jun in at belom, o kin teltsal xowa in tajl, u kalelich tm jelti max exom in till yab alwa an takixtalb ani in ulalich abal yab xata ti alwa. Por max tat a ulal ke yab xata ti alwa an takixtalb, u kalelich tm jelti max tat ms a kool i awiltalb ka ulu xowa yejat ka tajan k an takixtalb.
59004012	Na Dios jaich nin pidhnmal an takixtalb ani tokot Jaj neech kin ejto ti loox o ti kibdhax. Por tat, janty a y abal ki kwajay ka teltsal xowa in tajl jun xita?
59004013	Xo ka achatsik jech, xa ulaltsik ench: “Xo o kalm neech ku kale ba tuwa o ba jech i bitsow; ani taja neech ku kwajay jun i tamub, neech ki taja i limtal ani neech ki ta yn i tumn”,
59004014	por nibal ela a chobtsik xanty neech ka tmun kalm. Pos janty in y nin xechintal jun xita? In junwal jelti an jl xu xalkanal junwki ani junwki u pakwel.
59004015	Xowa yejat ka ulutsik jaich jech: “Max an Okxlb anchan tin l, neech ku kwajay ejat ani neech ki taja jech o jachan.”
59004016	Por tattsik a inikbdhltsik tajat tab ani anlki jeye i kwtsik; ejtal jech an iniktalb, yab alwa.
59004017	Xita xin chob kin taja xowa alwa ani yab kin taja, u walbinalich.
59005001	Ka achatsik jech, neech ku tila an tumnladhtsik xi yab u belom. Ka ukintsik ani ka dhjantsik kal tin kwenta an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin achatsik tayl.
59005002	Nin tumnal kachenekich ani nin alwa kudhkmil, exomich ti kapnal kal an takl.
59005003	Nin orojil ani nin platajil exomich ti bokmanal ani jachan nin bokom, jaich neech ka kwajay jelti jun i lnax kal jajtsik ani neech ka tsikantsik kl jelt xan tu tsikax an kamal. Yn i tumn in junkmal jech tin okontalich an kij.
59005004	An jalbixtalb xi jajtsik yab in kidhat pidhm an tojnaltsik xi tjnk ti junkux tin wall an tayablbtsik, exom in kwnltsik xo ani an Okxlb xin takyal ejtal an tokat abatwletsik, in achmich xanty in kwnl jachan an tojnaltsik.
59005005	Tech ti kayl in kymaltsik jun i xechintalb xan ti jajtsik in lenmal, kotsenektsik jelti an konltsik xi neech ti chemdhb; ani xo, exomich in bajwal xowki neech kin jalbiytsik nin walab.
59005006	Jajtsik in walbiymaltsik ani in chemdhmaltsik xi yab xata in walmal ani yab tomnadhtsik.
59005007	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, yejat ka koytsik i aytsixtalb asta ka tsch an Ajtiklb, jelt xan ti an tojnal xin l kin junkuntsi yn tin wall an tayablb kool kin koy i aytsixtalb asta ka ulich an jidhtal b ani xi tayl.
59005008	Ka koytsik teye i aytsixtalb jelti jech an tojnal ani yabtsik ka jila tab, pos exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech ka tsch jun an Ajtiklb.
59005009	Kidhblbtsik, yab ki kwajay ta chkxtsik jn ani jn abal yab ki elan i walbidh tam ki ljundh; pos an Ljundhom, kunatich i kij neech ka tsch.
59005010	Ka ynatsik jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an yajtsiktalb ani an chaattalb, an tiltsixtsik xi xechinktsik ti tiltsix kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.
59005011	Pos i chob abal kijidh neech kin acha xita kin ejto kin kuxuy i yajtsiktalb kal i chaattalb. A achmaltsik xan ti na Jb tin kuxymal kal i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb xin watna ani a achmaltsik jeye xan ti lbtajan kal an Okxlb ms tayl; pos an Okxlb u kontsix tajat ti yajnantsixtalb ani u kanidhax.
59005012	Kidhblbtsik, ka exbaytsik alwa jech xowa neech tu utsa: Yab ka yna an walki, nibal an chabl ani ni jun xata abal ki beltsintsik xowa a ulal. Tam ka ulutsik ke “Ani”, anchan ti ka ulu max anchan ti yejat; ani tam ka ulutsik ke “Yaba”, anchan ti ka ulu max anchan ti yejat, abal yab ki kwajlan tayl kal i walastalb.
59005013	Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal kwajat kal jun i yajtsiktalb, yejat ka lan. Max jun xita kwajat u kulbl, kin ajatnantsi ti ajatlbtsik na Dios.
59005014	Max jun xita kwajat u yaul, yejat ka kantsin an ti takix belomtsik abal ka kontsintsat jachan an yaul ani ka majuyat kal i asyte tin bij an Ajtiklb.
59005015	Ani tam ka tajatsik i kontsintsixtalb kal yantam i belomtalb, an yaul neech ka jeley abal neech ka jeldh kal an Ajtiklb; ani max in tajmal i walastalb, neech ka pakwlantsat.
59005016	Jaxtm, ki ltsxintsik an ti walastalb xa kooltsik jn ani jn ani ki kntsntsxintsik jn ani jn abal ki jeldhtsik. Nin chapik kontsintsixtal jun i lujat inik in kool tajat i awiltalb.
59005017	An tiltsix Elas jaich jun i inik jelti waw; ani tam ti lan chapik abal yab ka ulich i b, yab ulich i b ban kayl x i tamub kal chejel.
59005018	Ani tayl, lan jun abal ka ulich an b ani ulich. Ani an chabl in labedha jun an kapnl.
59005019	Kidhblbtsik, max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal kin jila kin bela an tsubaxtalb ani ka tolmiyat kal jun xita abal kin bela jun,
59005020	ka chobnatsik ke xita kin taja kin jila ti walablom jun xita, neech kin lotsi tin ejattal jachan an walablom abal yab ka kale ban kibeltalb ani neech kin taja abal ka pakwlantsat yn tin walastalbil. Anchan ka tjan.
60001001	Nan, xu bij Pedro, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo. U dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an judotsik xu belomich, xi ajnktsik ani kale ti kwajltsik ban chabl xi Ponto, xi Galasia, xi Kapadosia, xi Asia ani xi Bitinia.
60001002	Jechtsik, takudh kal na Dios an Ttalb anchan xan tin kool kejle chalpadh tam ti yabl tujenek an kayl. Takudhtsik kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal kin exbantsitsik an tin takixtal ani abal ka tokedhtsik kal nin xichl na Kristo. Ka bachwaltsik yn i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb.
60001003	Ki kakna na Dios nin tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Na Dios, kal nin pulek yajnantsixtal, tu jalkuntsmal an ti chalab tam tin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo. Kom ejech ti t na Jesukristo, jaxtm ti chobich abal neech ku kwajay walki kal na Dios.
60001004	Jech an aytsixtalb, neech ti ki tajatsik ka bachu an jiltsixtalb xi na Dios ti kontsaltsik tapadh t walki. An jiltsixtalb, jaich jun xata xi yab u kachel, yab choodh ani yab u batel jelti an wich.
60001005	Ani kom a bellichtsik na Dios, Jaj ti beletnltsik kal nin chp abal ka bajawtsik an loeltalb xin kool tojojodh xi neech kin pidhna ka chobn tin okontal an kij.
60001006	Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ta kwajattsik i kulbl, maske yejat xna kejle ka watna i yajtsiktalb w i kij.
60001007	Pos an belomtalb xa kooltsik in junwal jelti an oro: yejat ka kwajb ban kamal abal ka chutat max jaich xi alwa. Tam jun xita ka taktamiyat ani yab kin jila ti belom, nin belomtal ms in jalbl k an oro, pos an oro u tall ja. Jaxtm, tam ki taktamiyatichtsik ani yab ka jilatsik ta belom, neech tm ki kldhjichtsik ta alwa ani in tomnlich tm ka bachutsik an labidh tokattalb ani an kaknaxtalb tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
60001008	Tattsik a kaknl na Jesukristo maske yab a chumal ani a belltsik, maske xo yabl a chumal. Jaxtm ta kulbltsik kal jun i kulbtalb plek ani labidh, ke yab neech ka ejto ka ulu kal i tilabki.
60001009	Ani kal tin kwentaki abal a belmichtsik na Jesukristo, i lotsidhichtsik an ta ejattal ani a bachwalichtsik xowa a lujyal ka bachu.
60001010	Ti wejeich, an tiltsixtsik in alimaymal ani in chobnmaltsik kal tin kwenta an loeltalb ani in tilmaltsik xowa na Dios in ulmal neech ti ki pidhatsik kal nin alwatalki.
60001011	An tiltsixtsik u pidhnal kin chobna kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Kristo, ke na Kristo neech kin watna i yajtsiktalb ani ke tayl neech ka tsch an labidh tokattalb. Jajtsik in alimay abal kin chobna xitam j ani xowki ti neech ka tsch xu ltsinal kal jachan an ejattalb xi ta ti kwajat kal jajtsik.
60001012	Por pidhan kin chobnatsik kal na Dios abal an tojlb xi kwajattsik in tajl, yab abal jajtsik tin alwabl, jachan an tojlb xin tajatsik, jaich abal waw ti alwabl. Pos xo, jaich jech xowa i tiltsidhichtsik kal jajyki xi ti tiltsmaltsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, tl walki. Ejtal jech in lenmal jeye kin chuu an tokat abatwletsik.
60001013	Jaxtm, ka chalpaytsik alwa xanty neech ka taja ani ka ynatsik na alwa chalab. Ka kwajbatsik na aytsixtal kal xowa na Dios neech ti ki pidha kal nin alwatal, tam ka tsch na Jesukristo.
60001014	Kom i chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios, yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ta kwajatwiik tam ti yabl a exlmaltsik na Dios.
60001015	Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ta kwajatwiik, ki kwajaytsik alwa ani tokat; pos na Dios, xi ti takwymaltsik, tokat Ja tajat.
60001016	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ki kwajaytsik tokat, anchan xan ti Nan in tokat.”
60001017	Max tattsik a bijyal “Tta” na Dios, xin ejtowal kin chuu alwa jun xita ani yab u takukl an ti atiklbtsik, yejat ki jikna echeki, lejat tech u xeech ti kayl.
60001018	Pos na Dios ti kldhmalichtsik ban xechintalb xi yab alwa, xi ti jiltsmal na weje pakliltsik ani a chobtsik alwa ke nin jalbl jachan an looxtalb, yab jaich jun xata xu kachel jelti an oro o an plata,
60001019	jalbidh kal nin labidh xichl na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, kwajb ti pikbaxtalb jelti jun i borrego xi tokat.
60001020	Tam ti yabl tajadh an kayl, na Dios in bijymalich ke neech kin aba na Kristo abal ka chemdh kal tin kwenta ni walab. Por yab tsch ms okox, tsch xoichki jech i kij abal tattsik ta knl.
60001021	Kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, a belltsik na Dios. Na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo tam ti chemdh ani in kwajbmal abal ka kakn. Jaxtm tattsik, a kwajbmalichtsik na belomtal ani na aytsixtal ba na Dios.
60001022	Ani xo tattsik, kom a tajlichtsik xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb, a tokchtsik na ejattal abal ka kanidha in tsubtalki na at kidhbtsik. Jaxtm ti yejat ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn kal ejtal na tokat itsch.
60001023	Tattsik i jalkuntsidhichtsik an ta chalab jelti max i wachinkichtsik ti t, por yabich jelt xan tu wachinal xu chemeltsik, i jalkuntsidhichtsik an ta chalab kal nin kwintal na Dios. Jech nin kwintal na Dios, yab jayki neech ka okon.
60001024	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ejtal an atiklbtsik in junwal jelti an chojltsik, ani nin labdh, in junwal jelti nin wichl an chojl. An chojl u wayl ani an wich u chujkanal;
60001025	por nin kwintal an Okxlb, yab jayki neech ka okon.  Ani jech nin kwintal an Okxlb, jaich an alwa tilab xi tiltsidhichtsik.
60002001	Jaxtm, ka jilaichtsik ejtal xowa yab alwa, yabich ki kambixintsik ani yabich ka taja xata eb itschki. Yabich yejat ka chakuntsi ni jun xita kal tin kwentaki xowa in kool ani yabich ka tila yab alwa ni jun xita.
60002002	Anchan jelt xan ti jun i chakam xi t ti wachink ti chakam, in l tajat i leche, anchan teye ti ka lenatsik nin kwintal na Dios abal ka exlatsik ms na Dios ani ki loeytsik.
60002003	Ka tajatsik anchan, max ani lejtal ta bajmalichtsik ka exlantsi tin alwatal an Okxlb.
60002004	Pos ki utchtsik p ban Ajtiklb, jelti max exomtsik ta utel ba jun i tujub xi ejat. An iniktsik in pojka, por abal na Dios, jaich jun i tujub xi takudh ani kajbidh in jalbl.
60002005	Tattsik teye, xa junwaltsik jelti an tujub xi ejat, ka walkatsik ti ki yna na Dios abal kin taja kal tattsik jun i pulek at xon ti Jaj u kaknb. Abal ti ki kwajbatsik jeye ta ple xu dhabalbich kal Jaj, xin kwajbantsal ti pikbantsixtalb na Dios xi tl bin ejattal. Jech in tajltsik kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.
60002006	Ani jaxtm an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech ku kwajba Sin jun xita xin junwal jelti an ultalb tujub xi kl ti tajadh an at, jun i tujub xi takudh ani kajbidh in jalbl; xita kl ti ka belan, yab neech ka tidhebdh.
60002007	Abal tattsik xi belomich, jech an tujub kajbidh tajat in jalbl; por abal xi yabtsik u belom, u tmnalich jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb.
60002008	Ani u tmnalich jeye jelt xan tin ulal ench: Jun i tujub xu tadhkux ani u kwajlax. Pos jajtsik jelti max u tadhkunalichtsik abal yabtsik in tajl ti kij an tsubaxtalb.  Pos jaich abal jech ti takudhtsik.
60002009	Tattsik i takudh kal na Dios, i kwajattsik ta ple abal ka tjontsi an Pulek Takix, i kidhtalbichtsik xi tokat ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. I takudhtsik kal na Dios abal ka tila xowa labidh xin tajl na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi ti kldhatsik ban jikwaxtalb xon ta kwajattsikwiik ani ti kwajbatsik bin labidh tajx.
60002010	Tattsik yabwiik i exlbtsik kal na Dios, por xo, i dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj. Yabwiik a chobtsik max i kontsinal ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios, por xo, a chobichtsik.
60002011	Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, tattsik a junwal jelti atiklbtsik xu watelki ani kwajat ba jun i chabl xi yab jajtsik in dhabal. Tu pakabdhltsik abal yab ka walka ki ttsik kal xowa xin kulbetnl na tul, xi kwajat jelti max u pjx kal na ejattal.
60002012	Ki kwajaytsik echeki alwa kal xi yabtsik in exll na Dios. Anchan, maske xo ti tilltsik jelti max i atax iniktsik, tayl neech kin chuu an alwatalb xa tajltsik ani neech kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech ti ljundhbtsik.
60002013	Kom i kanidhbichtsik kal an Okxlb, yabich ka chikat tajatsik ni jun i awiltalb xi tech ti kayl. Yab ka chikat tajatsik an pulek takix, kom plek in tj in kool tech ti kayl.
60002014	Yab jeye ka chikat tajatsik an pakdha awiltalb xu takyb kal an pulek takix abal kin yajlombdha xi atax iniktsik ani abal kin taja ka kakn xin tajltsik xowa alwa.
60002015	Pos na Dios in l kin chuu ka tajatsik xowa alwa abal yab ti ki tilatsik yab alwa xi yabtsik xata in chob ani yabtsik chalpadh.
60002016	Ki kwajaytsik jelti atiklbtsik xi walkadh, por yab ka ynatsik an walkadhtalb abal ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, tokot ka tjontsaltsik na Dios.
60002017	Ka kaknatsik xitakichki, ka kanidha na at kidhbtsik, ka jiknatsik na Dios ani ka kaknatsik an pulek takix.
60002018	Tjontsixtsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa kin ulu na ajtiktsik, yab tokotki xi alwa iniktsik ani u chalpantsix. Ka exbantsitsik jeye xi yabtsik alwa inik.
60002019	Pos alwa tajat max jun xita kin kuxuy i yajtsiktalb maske yab in walmal, kal tin kwentaki abal in kaknlich na Dios.
60002020	Pos max ka tajatsik jun xata yab alwa ani ki yajlombdhtsik kal jachan tin kwenta, jantom alwatalb neech ka bachutsik maske ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb? Por max ki yajlombdhtsik abal a tajmal jun xata alwa, jech alwa tajat tin tamt na Dios max ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb.
60002021	Na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ki xechintsik teye xan ti xechink na Kristo, pos na Kristo in watna i yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta kwenta. Kal jech, ti pidhatsik jun i oktsixtalb abal jaich ka wwnatsik.
60002022	Jaj yab in tajm ni jun i walastalb nibal in kambiymal ni jun xita;
60002023	tam ti odhbijyat, yab tkon kal i odhbijixtalb; tam ti yajlombdh, yab tomnaxin, tokot in kwajba nin ejattal ba na Dios, xu ljundhom kal i lujattalb.
60002024	Na Kristo in jna ni walab tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te abal ku kwajch jelti max chemnek abal an walastalb ani ku kwajch lujat. Jaj in watna i yajtsiktalb abal ki wkontsatichtsik an ta walab.
60002025	Pos tattsik i xeechwiik jelti borregotsik xi kibchonk, por xo, i utenekichtsik ba na Kristo xi ti belkmichtsik jelt xan tu belkol jun i belkol borrego ani ti belkmtsaltsik jeye ta ejattaltsik.
60003001	Anchan teye tomkidh mmlbtsik, yab ka chikat tajatsik na tomkl. Yab ka chikat tajatsik maske yab in bell an tsubaxtalb, yab telab ka belmch jeye tam kin chuu xan ta kwajltsik maske yab ka tiltsitsik.
60003002	Neech ka belmchtsik tam kin chuu ke i kwajattsik tokat ani xitakichki a kaknltsik.
60003003	Yab tokotki ka eblidh tojojoy tab kal i alwa tsitsbaxtalb, kal i kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i kajbidh xeketlb abal ki chutat i alabl.
60003004	Yab ka tajatsik anchan. Ka koytsik ta itsch jelti jun i kwajbaxtalb xi yab jayki u kachel, an chaattalb ani an kaknaxtalb. Jech, jaich xowa in jalbl tin tamt na Dios.
60003005	Pos anchan jeye ti xechink ti wel chabki an mmlbtsik xi takudh kal na Dios; in beltsmaltsik na Dios ani yab in chikat tajmaltsik nin tomkl.
60003006	Anchan tin taja na Sara, yab in chikat taja nin tomkl Abraham ani in bijiy tin ajtik. Neechtsik teye ka bajaw ki kwajay jelti jaj max ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani yab ki kwajaytsik ta jikl.
60003007	Tomkidh paylomlbtsik, ki kwajaytsik kal na tomtal xan ti yejat ani in tsubtalki; ka kaknatsik na tomtal, yab tokotki abal jajtsik yab likdha. Ka kaknatsik abal jaychki jeye nin ejattaltsik in kool jelti xi tattsik ti pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatalbil. Anchan ka tajatsik abal yab xata ti ki tamkuytsik tam ki kwajay ka kontsi jun xata na Dios.
60003008	Ki kwajaytsik kijidh ani ki kknxintsik jn ani jn; ki kndhxintsik jelti max a kidhbkitsik. Ki kndhxintsik ani ka koytsik i chaattalb.
60003009	Max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi; max jun xita ti ki odhbijiy, yab ka witsbantsi. Yab ka witsbantsal, tokot ka lbtajltsik, pos na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ka bachu i lbtajaxtalb.
60003010	Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Xita in kanidhl nin xechintal ani in l ka kwajay kijidh, yejat kin exbay xan ti ka kwin ani yab ka kambixin.
60003011	Yejat kin jila kin taja xowa yab alwa ani kin tajaich xowa alwa, kin aliy an kijidhtalb ani jaich kin wwna.
60003012	Pos an Okxlb in beletnl xi lujattsik ani in axtsal tam ka kontsin jun xata, por in pojkl xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
60003013	Jita neech kin ejto ti ki atax tajtsitsik, max tokot a tajltsik xowa alwa?
60003014	Por maske a watnltsik i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta abal a tajlichtsik xowa lujat, kijidh neech ki kwajaytsik. Yab xita ka jiknatsik, nibal ki jikeytsik,
60003015	tokot ka kaknatsik an Ajtiklb Jesukristo kal ejtal na itsch. Ki kwajaytsik echeki tojojodh abal ka tkoytsik xitakichki tam ki konyat kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xa kool kal na Kristo, por ka tajatsik kal yantam i chaattalb ani i kaknaxtalb.
60003016	Ki kwajajantsik alwa ani tsububudh a ejattal. Anchan, xi xeechtsik ti atax till kal tin kwenta xowa alwa a tajl abal a bellichtsik na Kristo, ka tidhebdh kal xowa in ulaltsik.
60003017	Max na Dios anchan tin l, ms alwa ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb abal a tajltsik xowa alwa k abal a tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
60003018	Pos na Kristo chemdh kal tin kwenta ni walab, jnlki abal malillich i kij. Jaj, jaich jun i lujat inik, por in watna i yajtsiktalb kal waw ti kwenta xi yab u alwa inik. In watna jech abal ti ku jna ba na Dios. Chemdh, por ejech ti t nin ejattal.
60003019	Nin ejattal kale jeye kin tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an ejattalbtsik xi kwajat ti wiknl.
60003020	Jechtsik jaich xin chikat tajmaltsik na Dios ti weje, tam ti xechin na No. Na Dios in koy nakat i aytsixtalb, lejat kwajat ti tajnal an tan at, xon ti loey chb x an atiklbtsik. Waxik xi lowat abal yab ka lupun tam ti juchuwat putl an chabl.
60003021	Jajtsik lowat kal an ja ani xo, waw u lowb kal tin kwentaki abal na Dios in ejdha ti t na Jesukristo. Kal an pujaxtalb, u xalkanal abal u loodhich ani u tokedhantsidhich ti itsch. An pujaxtalb yab jaich abal ti ku tokedhantsi ti tul, jaich abal ki kontsi na Dios ku kwajay kijidh ti ejattal.
60003022	Na Jesukristo kadhiy walki ani xo kwajat buxl tin ejt na Dios; ani kl tu takybtsik xo an tokat abatwletsik, an awiltalbtsik ani an pakdha chplb.
60004001	Jaxtm, anchan xan ti na Kristo in watna i yajtsiktalb bin tul, anchan teye ti yejat ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka watna i yajtsiktalb. Pos xin bachmalich i yajtsiktalb bin tul, in jilmalich an walastalb
60004002	abal ka kwajch xan tin l na Dios ani yabich xan tin kulbetnl nin tul.
60004003	Yabich ms ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa xa tajltsikwiik xin kulbetnl tajat xi yabtsik in exll na Dios. Tam ti jachan i kij, i kwajinek xan ta lenmaltsik, a kymaltsik i chalab xi yab alwa, i uchmadhtsik ani a kymaltsik i ajib xi yab alwa, a watpiymaltsik ta uchl ani a kaknmaltsik i chilab.
60004004	Jajtsik u labnal abal in chutal xo ke yabich a tajltsik xowa yab alwa xi jajtsik in kulbetnl tajat kin taja, jaxtm xo ti atax tilltsik.
60004005	Por jajtsik neech kin pidhna nin walab ba na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi neech kin ljundha xi ejattsik ani xi chemnektsik.
60004006	Pos xi kwajattsik chemnek, tiltsidhtsik jech an ti alwa tilab abal ka kwajay ejat nin ejattal jelt xan ti na Dios kwajat ejat, maske neechwiik ka ejtowat ka ljundh ba tech an kayl jelti ejtal an iniktsik xi kwajat ejat.
60004007	An pakwenib exomich ti kunel. Jaxtm, ki kwajaytsik alwa ani ka ntsitsik ta l.
60004008	Ki kndhxintsik tajat jn ani jn, pos xita xu kanidhax, in pakwlantsal xowakichki yab alwa ka tajtsin.
60004009	Ki bchxintsik alwa ta kim jn ani jn.
60004010	Ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn xantiki ti pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb na Dios, jelti jun i alwa inik xin ynl alwa ejtal nin pakdha alwatal na Dios.
60004011	Max jun xita ka kwin, kin ulu xowaki u pidhnal kin ulu kal na Dios. Max jun xita ka tjontsixin, ka tjontsixin kal an chplb xu pidhnal kal na Dios. Ejtal xowa ka taja, ka taja tin bij na Jesukristo abal tin kaknabl na Dios xu takix malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
60004012	Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka lbnatsik an pakdha taktamixtalb xa achltsik, jelti max exom a tamwaltsik jun xata xi yab a exbayal.
60004013	Yab ka lbnatsik, tokot ki kulbtsik abal exom teye a watnltsik an yajtsiktalb xin watnmal na Kristo; abal ki kulbtsik jeye tajat, tam ka chutsitsik an tin labidh tokt tam tl.
60004014	Max ki atax tilantsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo, kijidhtsik tajat abal tattsik; pos nin labidh Tokat Ejattal na Dios kwajat kal tattsik. Jajtsik in odhbijyal a Dios, por tattsik a kaknl.
60004015	Jaxtm, ke ni jun xita xi tattsik kin watna i yajtsiktalb, abal u chemdhax, abal u kw, abal atax o abal xeech ti ochom kal xowa yab in kwenta.
60004016	Por max jun xita kin watna i yajtsiktalb abal in wwnl na Kristo, yab yejat ka tidheb, yejat tokot kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios kal jachan tin kwenta.
60004017	Pos in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhb nin chakmiltsik na Dios. Ani max an ljundhaxtalb okox u tujl kal waw, ms ja neech tajat ti ljundhb xi yabtsik in tajl ti kij nin alwa tilbil na Dios.
60004018	Ani max xi lujattsik, tojlb ti neech ka loey, janty neech ka tmun kal xi ataxtsik ani u walablom?
60004019	Jaxtm, xi watnl i yajtsiktalb abal na Dios anchan tin l, yejat ki ntsi ki taja xowa alwa ani ki kwajba ni ejattal tin kubak na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu tajmal ani Jaj, lujat Ja tajat.
60005001	Kom nan in takix belom neye, neech tu pidhatsik chb x ti tsubaxtalb xi kwajattsik teye ta takix belomtsik. Anchan jelt xan ta lnltsik ke na Kristo in watnmal i yajtsiktalb, anchan neye tu lnl kom u chumal. Ani neech neye ku bachu junax kal tattsik, an labidh tokattalb xi neech ka xalkan tayl.
60005002	Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka beletna alwa an belomtsik xa takyal; ka taja kal yantam i kulbtalb jelt xan ti na Dios in l. Yab ka tajatsik kal i chplb nibal abal a ltsik ka ta i tumn. Ka tajatsik jech kal yantam i kulbtalb,
60005003	yab jelti max tattsik a dhabal xi kwajat a belkmtsik, tokot ki kwajaytsik jelti oktsixtalb abal an belomtsik.
60005004	Anchan, tam ka witsiy na Jesukristo, xi jaich nin Takxal an takix belomtsik, neech ka bachutsik jun i tokat labidh chejwalixtalb xi yab in junwal jelti an kwetsotsl dhipadh chojl xu kachel.
60005005	Anl teye kwitltsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa ti ki utsa an takix belomtsik. Ejtal yejat ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn, ka chakatsik tab, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Na Dios yab in kulbetnl xin tekltsik tinb, por in tolmiyal kal nin alwatal, xin chakltsik tinb.
60005006	Ka chakatsik tab tin tamt na Dios, xin koolich ejtal tin chapni kubak abal Jaj ti ki tekbatsik, tam kin bajaw an kij.
60005007	Ka kwajbatsik tin kubak na Dios ejtal xowa a yntsal, pos Jaj ti kanidhltsik tajat.
60005008	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta ani yab ki kwajaytsik ukpidh; pos an lej atax xeech jelti jun i kailom padhum in ayal xita kin kapu.
60005009	Ka kuxyaltsik ani yab ka jilatsik ka bela na Dios. Pos a chobichtsik ke na at kidhbtsik xi kwajat putlki an kayl, jaychki jeye in watnltsik.
60005010	Por tam tattsik ka watnaich w an yajtsiktalb, na Dios neech ti ki lujkutsik, neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal yab ka jila ta belom, neech ti ki likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal ani neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal ki kwajay tsububudh a itsch. Jech na Dios, xi plek tajat in awiltal in kool, tu kanymal abal ki bachu weye tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, an labidh tokattalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
60005011	Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb ani Jaj ka takxin malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
60005012	Nan, junax kal na Silbano, xu exll abal jaich jun i kidhblb xi lujat tajat, tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jech an ti w abal tu takiytsik ani abal tu tiltsitsik ke jech xa bachmalichtsik, jaich nin tsubax alwatal na Dios. Ani jaich ka ntsitsik ka bela.
60005013	An belomtsik xi kwajat Babilonia, xi takudh jeye kal na Dios jelti tattsik, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos nu chakmil.
60005014	Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb abal ka xalkan ke i kndhxtsik. Ki kwajaytsik kijidh ejtal tattsik xi kwajatich kal na Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
61001001	Nan, xu bij Simn Pedro, tin tojnlil ani tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, tattsik xa bajmalichtsik ka koy jun i belomtalb xi labidh tajat jelti xi waw i kool kom ni Diosil ani ni Loxil Jesukristo, lujattsik Ja tajat.
61001002	Ka bachwaltsik yn i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb kal tin kwenta abal a exlmalichtsik na Dios ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
61001003	Na Dios tu pidhmalich kal nin chp, ejtal xowa i yntsal, abal ku kwajay alwa ani abal ki kakna Jaj. U pidhnkich jech, kal tin kwenta abal tu tajmalich ki exla xi tu kanymal kal nin publ ani kal nin labidh tokt.
61001004	Kal tin kwentaki jech, u usnkich xanty neech ku pidhan, pakdha tajat ani labidh. Abal kal tin kwentaki xanty u usnk neech ku pidhan, ki bajaw ku kwajay jelti na Dios, tam i ejtmalich ki jila xowa yab alwa xi waach tech ti kayl xin kulbetnl ni tul.
61001005	Jaxtm, kom u belomich, ki taja an chplb abal ku xechin alwa; tam u xechich alwa, ki taja an chplb abal ki exla ms na Dios.
61001006	Tam i exllich ms na Dios, yejat ki taja an chplb abal ki ejto ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul; tam i ejtowalich ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul, ki koy an chaattalb; tam i koolich an chaattalb, ki kaknl na Dios.
61001007	Tam i kaknlich na Dios, ku kndhxin jn ani jn kal ni at kidhbtsik ani tam u kndhxich, ki kanidha jeye xitakichki.
61001008	Max i koolich ejtal jech ani jaich i tajl tajat, yab neech ku jilan ku kwajay aniki. Ani neech ka xalkan an alwatalb xi tajl kal tin kwenta abal i exllich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
61001009	Por xi yab in kool ejtal jech, in junwal jelti jun i jokol o jelti jun xita xi yab u chuux owdha; in uktsmalich abal wkontsidhich tin weje walastalbiltsik.
61001010	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, kom na Dios ti kanymalichtsik ani ti takwymalichtsik, ka tajatsik an chplb abal ki kwajajantsik anchan. Max ka tajatsik anchan, yab jayki neech ka jilatsik ta belom.
61001011	Anchan yabich tm neech ka koytsik ni jun i tamkuntalb abal ki ochichtsik xon tu takix ni Ajtik ani Loxil Jesukristo.
61001012	Jaxtm, yab neech ku jila tu witskontsitsik jech, maske a chobichtsik ani a bellichtsik an tsubaxtalb xi xo a kool.
61001013	Nan u chalpayal abal alwa, ke lejat xo bl in kwajat ejat, tu pidhatsik jech an ti tawnaxtalb,
61001014	pos ni Ajtik Jesukristo tin ltsmalich ke kunat i kij neech ku jila jech an kayl.
61001015	Por neech ku aliy xan ti ku uwa, abal maske in chemnekich, blki ka chalpayaltsik echeki ejtal jech.
61001016	An oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik kal tin kwenta nin chp ani xan ti neech ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo, yab i ani tilabki xi wawki i chalpaymal, pos waw tajat i chumal kal ni wal nin labidh tokt an Ajtiklb.
61001017	I chumal tam ti na Dios an Ttalb in pidha ti kaknaxtalb ani ti labidh tokattalb; ani i axtsmal tin tokat kwintal na Dios tam tin ulu ench: “Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat ani in kwajat in kulbl tajat kal Jaj.”
61001018	Waw i achmal jachan an kwintalb xi tl walki, pos junax tu kwajat kal an Ajtiklb ban tokat chn.
61001019	I kool jeye jun xata xi ms tsubax, jaich xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik. Alwaich ta tajltsik abal a kulbetnl ka acha jech. Jech xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik, in junwal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb xi kwajat ban jikwaxtalb, asta kin bajaw an kij tam jelti max nechich ka tsudhch, kom an Ajtiklb xi kwajat jelti na pulek t, neech ti ku tajbantsch ti itsch.
61001020	Por ka exbaytsik okox alwa jech: Ke ni jun i tilab xin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, yab neech kin ejto kin wila jun xita kal jajki tin kwetm chalab.
61001021	Pos an tiltsixtsik yab jayki kwnktsik kal tin kwetm chalab. Kom u dhabalbtsik kal na Dios, in lnmalichtsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
61002001	Por anchan xan ti wachink i kambix tiltsixtsik ban atiklbtsik xi Israel, anchan jeye ti neech ka wachin kal tattsik i oktsixtsik xu kambix. Jech an oktsixtsik, neech kin chinat oktsixna jaluts xowa in ulal na Dios, asta neech kin kuxukna an Ajtiklb xi kl ti loodhtsik; ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti jikat neech ka kibdhtsik.
61002002	Kal yn ti neech ka wwnantsat an tin oktsixtaltsik ani kal jajkitsik tin kwenta, neech ka atax tilan an tsubaxtalb.
61002003	Kom jiklomtsik tajat kal an tumn, neech ti ki oktsitsik xowa yab lujat abal kin ejto ti ki kweytsik. Por jajtsik aytsmtejichtsik tajat kal an kibeltalb, kom bijtsidhich abal tajatsik neech.
61002004	Na Dios yab in pakwlantsi an tokat abatwletsik xin wala, in petnatsik ban kibeltalb ani in baliy ti wiknl ban jikwaxtalb. Taja kwajattsik in aytsm kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.
61002005	Yab jeye in pakwlantsi an atiklbtsik xi ti weje, tokot in abtsi an ti chapik bal kij abal ka lupundh jachan an atax iniktsik. Tokot in loo na No kl xi bk nin kidhtaltsik. Jech na No, jaich xi xechin kin tila an lujat xechintalb.
61002006	Na Dios yab jeye in pakwlantsi an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek ban bitsowtsik xi Sodoma ani Gomorra. In tsika asta ti jilkon mapal jltey. Jech in taja anchan, abal ka jilkon jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an atiklbtsik xin kulbetnl kin taja xowa yab alwa xi neech ka kwajaytsik tayl.
61002007	Por in loo na Lot, jun i lujat inik xi kwajat u tepinal tajat abal in chutal an walastalbtsik xin tajl jachan an atiklbtsik.
61002008	Tsudhey ka tsudhey jech an lujat inik, xi taja jeye ti kwajat kal jajtsik, u tepinal tin ejattal tam in chutal ani in achl an ataxtalb xin tajl jech an atax iniktsik.
61002009	An Okxlb in ejtowal kin loo an atiklbtsik xi kl tu kaknb abal yab kin watna i taktamixtalb; por an atiklbtsik xi atax, u kybichtsik tojojodh abal ka kale ban kibeltalb tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.
61002010	Na Dios, ms neech kin pidhatsik ti yajtsiktalb ejtal xin tajltsik tokot xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, xin tajltsik xowa atax ani in pojkantsal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb. Tanchutsik tajat ani yabtsik tajat tidhelom; yabtsik in jiknl kin odhbijiy an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki.
61002011	Ms an tokat abatwletsik, maske in kool ms i chplb ani i awiltalb, yabtsik in odhbijyal tin tamt an Okxlb an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki.
61002012	Por jech an atax iniktsik, in junwal jelti konltsik xi yab chalpadh, xi kwajat ani ejatkitsik ani u wachinal abal ka yakwan ani ka chemdhtsik. Jech an atax iniktsik in till yab exbadh xowa nibal jajtsik yab in exbayal, por neech ka chemechtsik jelt xan tu chemel an konltsik.
61002013	Neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios xowa in lujyal, kal tin kwenta xowa yab lujat in tajmaltsik. In chalpayal ke kijidh ti kwajattsik kal xowa in tajltsik. Jajtsik jaich jun i tidhetalb ani i itixbdhomtalb tam ttsik jeye kwajat xon ta junkunaltsik ta kapul kom a bellichtsik an Ajtiklb, kom jajtsik in kulbetnl kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul.
61002014	Yab neech kin ejto kin chuu jun i mmlb max yab kin lena; yab in jilltsik ti walablom. In kambiyal xi yabtsik bl u lej belom, in kulbetnltsik tajat ti chene ani ataxtsik tajat.
61002015	Kibchonktsik tajat ti xeech abal in jilmaltsik an alwa bl. In wwnantsmaltsik tin oktsixtal an tiltsix xin bij Balm, xu chakmlb kal na Beor. Jech na Balm, in lena kin taja xowa yab alwa abal kin ta i tumn; ani kwiyan kal jun i uxum burru xi m, abal jaj neech kin taja xowa yab alwa.
61002016	Tawn kal jech an konl jelt xan tu kw jun i inik ani yab walk kin taja xowa in chalpaymal.
61002017	Jech an atax iniktsik, in junwal jelti mom xi yab in kool i ja ani jelti tokow xu jnb kal i ik; jajtsik bijtsidhich abal neech ka kwajay malill i kij ban jikwaxtalb xi tunuy tajat.
61002018	Kal an tilabtsik xi yab alwa ani yab xata tu ynal, kal tin kwentaki xowa in ujnmalich kin taja ani xowa in kulbetnltsik nin tul, in kambiyal xi belmmadhichtsik ani in jilmalich ti walablom.
61002019	In utsltsik abal neech ka kwajay alwa xita kin wwna xowa in oktsixnltsik, por nibal jajtsik yab kwajat alwa, kom u kybtsik jelti max u jolib kal an walastalb. Pos an iniktsik u kyb jelti jolib kal xantokl ti ka t.
61002020	Por xita in exlmalich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo xi jaich ni Loxil ani in jilmalich an walastalb xi waach ban kayl, por tayl kin walka jun ka kambiyat kal an walastalb ani ka tantsat an tin chalab kal jech, u jilkonalich ms kibenek k tam ti kwajatwiik.
61002021	Pos msakwiik alwa abal jajtsik max yabak in exlmal an lujat bl k abal in exla ani tayl in jila kin taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
61002022	Pos tmunich kal jajtsik jelt xan tin ulal jun i tilab ench: “An piko u witsl kin chab kapu nin x ani an olom, tam ka okonich ti atsim, u tlk jun ban kut.”
61003001	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, jech jaich in chabtal an dhutsadh w xi tu abtsaltsik. Kal chablam an dhutsadh w, tu takyaltsik abal ka koy alwa na chalab.
61003002	Ka chalpaytsik xowa in ulmal ms okox an tokat tiltsixtsik ani xowa ti oktsmal an abatwletsik kal tin kwenta nin takixtal an Ajtiklb xi jaich ni Loxil.
61003003	Ka exbchtsik okox alwa, ke tam exomich in bajwal xowki ti neech ka tsch jun an Ajtiklb, neech ka wachin i atiklbtsik xi neech ti labdhnax, xi neech ka xechin xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnl
61003004	ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Janty tmun kal xowa xin ulu na Kristo, ke Jaj neech jun ka tsch? Pos asta ti chemnek ni weje pakliltsik, yab xowa jalkunk, bl ani asta ti tajadh an kayl.”
61003005	Jech tin ulaltsik anchan, jaich abal yab in l kin exbaytsik ke an walki kejlejich ja kwajat asta ti weje ani kal tin kwintalki na Dios, eblin an chabl ban ja ani jilkon junax chejel.
61003006	Anl jeye, an ja xi kl ti luychiyat putl an chabl ani lupundh an atiklbtsik xi ti weje, tyki jeye ti tl ban ja.
61003007	Por an walki ani an kayl xi xo kwajat, bijtsidhich abal neech ka tsikan kal an kamal, kal tin kwintalki jeye na Dios. Kal jachan an kamal, kl ti neech ka tsikan an walki ani an kayl tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam an atiklbtsik xi atax neech ka kibdhtsik.
61003008	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ka chobnatsik ke abal an Okxlb, xi jun a kts, abal Jaj, jyki max mil i tamub; ani xi mil i tamub, abal Jaj, jyki max jun a kts.
61003009	An Okxlb yab exom in owedhl xowa in ulmal neech kin taja, jelt xan ti taltsik in chalpayal. In owedhl, kom tu kontsal ti yajnantsixtalb; pos Jaj yab in l kin chuu ke ni jun xita ka kale ban kibeltalb, in l kin chuu ke ejtal kin jila ti walablom.
61003010	Por an Ajtiklb neech ka tsch tam yab xita in tlm, jelt xan tu ulel jun i kw tam akal. Neech tm ka pakchun an walki kal jun i kakadh kawidhtalb ani ejtal xowa waach, neech ka taay. Neech jeye ka taay an chabl ani ejtal xowa waach taja.
61003011	Kom i chobich abal ejtal neech ka taay, yejat ku kwajay tokat ani ki tajl xowa in l na Dios.
61003012	Lejat u kwajat i aytsm an kij xowki na Dios neech kin taja ejtal jech, ku kwajch alwa abal kin bajaw jikat jech an kij. Tam kin bajaw jech an kij, an walki neech ka tsikan ani ejtal xowa waach, neech ka mukan kal an kamal;
61003013	por waw u kwajat i aytsm an t walki ani an t chabl xi na Dios in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Taja, tokot waach xowa lujat.
61003014	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, lejat i kwajattsik a aytsm ejtal jech, ka ntsitsik ka taja xowa alwa abal na Dios ti ki elatsik tsububudh a itsch ani yab i walbidh.
61003015	Ka exbaytsik ke an aytsixtalb xi tu kontsal an Ajtiklb, jaich abal waw ku loey. Anchan jeye ti dhutsuntsmaltsik na Pablo, an kidhblb xi waw i kanidhl tajat. Ti dhutsuntsmaltsik xantiki ti pidhnk ti chalpadhtalb kal na Dios.
61003016	Ba nin dhutsadh wiltsik, ti tiltsmaltsik jaychki jech, maske taltsik tojlb tajat ka exbayat; jaxtm, taltsik xi yab u witom ani xi yabtsik u lej belom, in janwal an tsubaxtalb xin dhutsmal na Pablo, anchan jelt xan tin janwal jeye an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti neechtsik ban kibeltalb.
61003017	Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, kom a okox chobnmalich ejtal jech, ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ki kambiyat kal xi ataxtsik ani anchan, ka jilatsik ta belom.
61003018	Yab ka walkatsik ki kambiyat, tokot ka aliytsik xan ti ka bachu ms an alwatalb ani xan ti ka exla ms ni Ajtik ani Loxil Jesukristo. Ke Jajki kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
62001001	U dhutsl jech an dhutsadh w abal ka chobn ke jachan xu bijyb tin kwintal na Dios kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti yabl tajadh an chabl ani an walki. I axtsmal an tin kwintal, i chumal kal waw tajat i wal ani i takmal kal waw tajat i kubak. Jaj, jaich xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62001002	Jech xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xalk. Waw i chumal ani i lnmal, ke jech xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kwajatwiik kal an Ttalb ani u xalkantsat.
62001003	I lnlich xo xowa i chumal ani i achmal abal ki kwajaytsik junini kal waw, jelt xan ti waw u kwajatich lejtal junini kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal nin Chakmil Jesukristo.
62001004	Anchan p, tu dhutsuntsaltsik ejtal jech abal ki kwajay echeki i kulbltsik.
62001005	Jech jaich an tsubaxtalb xi tu oktsi na Jesukristo ani xo tu oktsaltsik teye: ke na Dios jaich na kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb ani yab waach ni w i jikwaxtalb ba Jaj.
62001006	Max ki ulu ke u kwajatich kal Jaj, por blki i tajl xowa yab alwa, u kambixichki tm ani yab tsubax xowa i tajl ani xowa i ulal.
62001007	Por max u kwajatich ban tajaxtalb jelt xan ti na Dios kwajat ban tajaxtalb, tsubax tm u kwajatich junini jn ani jn ani nin xichl nin Chakmil Jesukristo, tu wkontsal ejtal an ti walastalb.
62001008	Max ki ulu ke yab u walbidh, wawki i kambiyal tib, yab tsubax xowa i tajl ani xowa i ulal.
62001009	Por max ki ltsi na Dios ni walastalbil, neech ti ku pakwlantsi ani neech ti ku wkontsi ejtal an ti walastalb. Jaj in tajl Ja xowa kin ulu ani lujat Ja tajat.
62001010	Max ki ulu ke yab i walmal, i tajlich tm na Dios jelti max u kambix ani yabich i tajl jelt xan tin ulal nin kwintal.
62002001	Tsitsik chakmil, tu dhutsuntsal jech abal yab ka walatsik. Por max jun xita kin wala, i kool jun i kawintsxil tin tamt an Ttalb, jaich na Jesukristo, xi lujat Ja tajat.
62002002	Na Jesukristo, jaich an pikbantsixtalb abal ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil ani yab tokot xi wawki ni walastalbil, nin walabtsik jeye ejtal xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
62002003	Max i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, tsubaxich tm ti exllich.
62002004	Por max jun xita in ulal: “Nan u exllich”, por yab in tajl xan tin ulal an takixtalb, u kambixki ani yab tsubax xowa in tajl ani xowa in ulal.
62002005	Por max i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, i bajmalich kin kakna na Dios in lujtalki; kal jech, i chobnl ke u kwajatich junini kal Jaj.
62002006	Xita in ulal ke kwajatich junini kal na Jess, yejat ka kwajay jelt xan ti Jaj xechin.
62002007	Kidhblbtsik, yab exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik jun i t takixtalb; tu dhutsuntsaltsik jaychki an takixtalb xa achmal tam ta tuju ka belatsik na Kristo. Jech an weje takixtalb, jaychki an takixtalb xa achmalichtsik tam ta tuju ta belom.
62002008	Por blki tu dhutsuntsaltsik jun i t takixtalb, xi tsubax abal na Kristo ani abal tattsik, pos an jikwaxtalb exomich ti wkwnal ani exomich ti tajkanal an tsubax tajaxtalb.
62002009	Xita in ulal ke kwajatich ban tajaxtalb, por in atl nin at kidhb, bl kwajat ban jikwaxtalb.
62002010	Xita in kanidhl nin at kidhb, kwajatich ban tajaxtalb ani yabich waach ni jun xata xantokl ti ka walbindh.
62002011	Por xin atl nin at kidhb, kwajat ani xeech ban jikwaxtalb ani yab in chob xon ti neech abal jokolbdhatsich kal an jikwaxtalb.
62002012	Tsitsik chakam, tu dhutsuntsal abal na Dios ti pakwlantsmalichtsik an ta walastalbil kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.
62002013	Ttalbtsik, tu dhutsuntsal abal a exllichtsik xi kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal. Kwitltsik ani tsidhantsik, tu dhutsuntsal abal a tmalichtsik an lej atax. Tsitsik chakam, tu dhutsuntsal abal a bajmalichtsik ka exla an Ttalb.
62002014	Ttalbtsik, tu dhutsuntsmal abal a bajmalichtsik ka exla xi kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal. Kwitltsik ani tsidhantsik, tu dhutsuntsmal abal i likdhatsik ani a bachmalichtsik ta itsch nin kwintal na Dios ani abal a tmalichtsik an lej atax.
62002015	Yab ka kanidhltsik xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, nibal ka ltendha xowa waach taja. Max jun xita in kanidhl xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, yabich tm u kalel in kaknl na Dios an Ttalb;
62002016	pos ejtal xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, jelti xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, xowa i ltendhl ani xin tekltsik tinb, yab tl ban Ttalb, tl techki ban kayl.
62002017	An kayl neech ka okon kl ejtal an atax chalab xi waach taja; por xita in tajl xowa in l na Dios, neech ka kwajay malill i kij.
62002018	Tsitsik chakam, exomich in bajwal xowki neech ka witsiy na Jesukristo. A achmaltsik abal neech ka tsch jun xita xu atnal kl na Kristo; pos kom xo wachich yn xita kl tu atnal na Kristo, i chob abal exomich in bajwal xowki neech ka witsiy na Jesukristo.
62002019	Jajtsik ba waw i kidhtal ti kalnek, por yab tsubax waw i kidhtal; pos max wawak i kidhtal, in ntsmalak jeye kin belatsik na Kristo jelti waw. Por yab anchan ti tmun abal ka xalkan ke yab ejtalki waw i kidhtal.
62002020	Por tattsik i takudh abal ka bachu an Tokat Ejattalb ani a chobichtsik ejtal xowakich.
62002021	Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik abal a exllich an tsubaxtalb, yab abal yabtsik a exll ani a chobtsik, ke ni jun i kambixtalb u kalel ban tsubaxtalb.
62002022	Xu kambix, jaich xin ulal ke na Jess yab j an Kristo. Jech jaich xita kl tu atnal na Kristo, pos xi yab in bell an Ttalb yab jeye in bell an Chakmlb.
62002023	Ejtal xita yab in bell an Chakmlb, yab jeye in bell an Ttalb; por xita in bell an Chakmlb, in bell jeye an Ttalb.
62002024	Jaxtm, yab ka jilatsik an tsubaxtalb xa achmal tam ta tujutsik ta belom. Max yab ka jilatsik an tsubaxtalb xa achmal tam ta tujutsik ta belom, neech tm ki kwajaytsik teye echeki kal an Chakmlb ani kal an Ttalb.
62002025	Ani na Jesukristo in ulmal abal neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62002026	Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jech abal ka koy i kwenta kal xu kambixtsik.
62002027	Por tattsik a bachmalich an Tokat Ejattalb xi ti pidhmal na Jesukristo ani kwajat kal tattsik. Jaxtm ti yabich yejat ke ni jun xita ti ki oktsitsik; pos ejtal xowakich, Jaj an Tokat Ejattalb neech ti ki oktsi ani ejtal xowa in oktsixnl, tsubax, yab i kambixtalb. Pos ka ntsi ki kwajaytsik kal na Kristo jelt xan ti oktsal an Tokat Ejattalb.
62002028	Pos xo tsitsik chakam, ka ntsi ki kwajay kal na Kristo abal yab ku jikey tam Jaj ka xalkan ani yab ku tidheb tam ka tsch jun.
62002029	Ani max a chobichtsik ke na Jesukristo lujat Ja tajat, yejat jeye ka chobnatsik ke ejtal xita xin tajl xowa lujat, u chakmlbtsik kal a Dios.
62003001	Ka chuutsik xan tu kanidhb kal an Ttalb, ke asta u bijyb tu chakmlb kal Jaj. Jaxtm, xi yabtsik u belom, yab tu exll; pos yabtsik bl in exlmal na Dios.
62003002	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, waw u chakmlbich kal na Dios ani yabl u xalkantsidh xan ti neech ku kale tayl. Por i chobich ke tam na Jesukristo ka xalkan, neech weye ki junu jelti Jaj, pos neech ki chuu xan ti jeye Jaj tajat.
62003003	Ejtal xita nin kool jech an aytsixtalb ba na Kristo, exomich in tokwal tinb, anchan xan ti Jaj tokat.
62003004	Ejtal xita in wall, in chikat tajtsalich tin takixtal na Dios, pos max ki wala, i chikat tajlich an takixtalb.
62003005	A chobichtsik ke na Jesukristo tsinek ban kayl abal ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil ani Jaj yab in kool ni jun i walastalb.
62003006	Ejtal xi kwajatichtsik kal na Jesukristo, yabich in tajl an walastalb; por ejtal xin tajltsik an walastalb, yabl in chumal nibal in exlmal.
62003007	Tsitsik chakam, yab ka walka xita ti ki kambiy; xita in tajl xowa lujat, lujat jeye jaj, jelt xan ti na Jesukristo lujat.
62003008	Por xita in tajl i walastalb, jachan jaich xi teykmte kal an lej atax, pos an lej atax, jaich jun i walablom asta tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajm. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti tsch nin Chakmil na Dios abal kin pakwtsi xowa in tajmal an lej atax.
62003009	Ejtal xu chakmlbich kal a Dios, yabich in tajl i walastalb, pos xu kidhtalbich kal na Dios, kwajatich kal Jaj. Yabich yejat kin tajl i walastalb kom u chakmlbich kal na Dios.
62003010	Tejwa xita j nu chakmlb kal na Dios ani tejwa jeye xita j nu chakmlb kal an lej atax; ejtal xita yab in tajl xowa lujat o yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb, yab u chakmlb kal a Dios.
62003011	An tsubaxtalb xa achmaltsik tam ta tujutsik ta belom, jaich jech: ku kndhxin jn ani jn.
62003012	Yab yejat ki taja jelti na Kan, xu kidhtalb kal an lej atax ani in chemdha nin kidhb. Ani jantki tin chemdha? Pos jaich abal xowa in tajl na Kan, yab alwa ani xowa in tajl nin kidhb, lujat.
62003013	Kidhblbtsik, yab ki laban max i atnal kal xi yab u belom.
62003014	Waw i chobich abal i jilmalich ti kx an cheml ani i bajmalich ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, pos i kanidhlich ni at kidhbtsik. Xita yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb, kwajat jelti max chemnek.
62003015	Ejtal xin atltsik nin at kidhb, in junwal jelti jun i chemdhax; ani a chobtsik ke ni jun i chemdhax, yab neech kin ejto kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62003016	Kal jech ti exll an kanidhaxtalb xi tu kontsal na Kristo, pos Jaj in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal waw ti kwenta; anchan weye waw, yejat ki pidhna tib ku chemdh kal tin kwenta ni at kidhbtsik.
62003017	Por xita in kool xowa yejat tech ti kayl ani kin chuu nin at kidhb in yntsal xata ani yab kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb, jan ti neech kin xalka ke tsubax lejtal tu kanidhax jelt xan tu kanidhax na Dios?
62003018	Tsitsik chakmiltsik, max u kanidhax, yab yejat ki uluki; yejat ku kndhxin in tsubtalki ani ki xalka kal xowa i tajl.
62003019	Ench ti exll abal u kwajatich lejtal ban tsubaxtalb ani i chobich abal u kwajat kal na Dios.
62003020	Pos max i achl ti itsch ke yab u kwajat alwa, na Dios ms Ja plek ke ni itsch ani Jaj, in chob ejtal.
62003021	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, max i achl ti itsch abal u kwajat alwa, ki chobna abal u kwajat alwa kal na Dios.
62003022	Jaj neech ti ku pidha ejtal xowa ki kontsi kom i tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal ani abal i tajl jeye xowa Jaj in l.
62003023	Jech jaich xowa Jaj tu utsl ki taja: Ki bela nin Chakmil Jesukristo ani ku kndhxin jn ani jn jelt xan ti Jaj tu utsmal.
62003024	Xita in tajl xan tin ulal nin takixtal, kwajat kal na Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj. I chob ke na Dios kwajat kal waw abal nin Tokat Ejattal xi tu pidhmal, kwajat kal waw.
62004001	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, yab ka beltsitsik xitakichki xin ulal ke u kw ijtsidh kal a Dios, ka exlatsik okox alwa max ba Dios ti tl xowa in ulal o yaba. Pos exomich tajat ti wachinal ban kayl i kambix tiltsixtsik, xin ulal ke u kwtsik ijtsidh kal a Dios.
62004002	Ench ti neech ka ejtotsik ka exla xin kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios: ejtal xin ulal ke na Jesukristo tsinek tech ti kayl jelti jun i inik, jaich xin kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
62004003	Por xin ulaltsik ke na Jesukristo yab tsinek jelti jun i inik, yab in kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios; jech jaich xi kl tu atnal na Kristo. A achmaltsik abal neech ka tsch ani xo kwajatichtsik ban kayl.
62004004	Tsitsik chakam, tattsik kal a Dios ta dhabalb ani a tmalichtsik jachan an kambixtsik; pos an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba tattsik, ms ja plek i awiltalb in kool k an ejattalb xi kwajat ban kambixtsik.
62004005	Jajtsik ban kayl tu kidhtalb, jaxtm ti tokot in tilltsik xowa waach ban kayl ani u axtsinaltsik kal xu kwajltsik ban kayl.
62004006	Por waw kal a Dios tu dhabalb. Xin exll na Dios, tu axtsal; por xi yab u kidhtalbtsik kal a Dios, yab tu axtsal. Kal jech ti neech ki ejto ki exla xita nin kool an Tokat Ejattalb ani xita nu kambix.
62004007	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, yejat ku kndhxin jn ani jn; pos an kanidhaxtalb, ba Dios tu tsiil. Ejtal xu kanidhaxtsik, kal a Dios tu chakmlb ani in exll na Dios.
62004008	Xita yab u kanidhax, yabl in exlmal na Dios, pos na Dios, i kanidhax.
62004009	Na Dios in xalka abal tu kanidhl. Pos in aba nin junkax Chakmil ban kayl, abal kal tin kwenta nin junkax Chakmil, ki ejto ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62004010	An kanidhaxtalb ench ti kwajat: yab waw i kanidhmal na Dios, Jaj tu kanidhmal ani in aba nin Chakmil ti pikbaxtalb abal anchan ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil.
62004011	Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, max na Dios tu kanidhmal anchan, yejat weye ku kndhxin jn ani jn.
62004012	Na Dios yab jayki chuudh kal ni jun xita; por max ku kndhxin jn ani jn, na Dios kwajatich kal waw ani Jaj, jaich tu tolmiyal abal ku kndhxin ms.
62004013	I chob abal u kwajatich kal na Dios ani Jaj, kwajat kal waw abal tu pidhmalich an tin Tokat Ejattal.
62004014	Waw i chumal ani i ulal ke an Ttalb in aba nin Chakmil abal kin loo xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
62004015	Ejtal xita kin ulu ke na Jess jaich in Chakmil na Dios, kwajat kal na Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj.
62004016	Anchan, i bajmalich ki exla ani ki bela ke na Dios tu kanidhl. Na Dios u kanidhax ani xita u kanidhax, kwajat kal a Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj.
62004017	I bajmalich tajat ku kanidhaxin, jaxtm ti yabich u kwajat tu chalpax kal tin kwenta tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb; pos waw u kwajat tech ban kayl jelt xan ti jeye na Jesukristo.
62004018	Xon ti waach i kanidhaxtalb, yab waach i jkib. An kanidhaxtalb, in wixkiyal an jkib ba ni ejattal; pos an jkib, i yajtsiktalb. Jaxtm, max jun xita u jikl, jaich abal yabl in bajmal ti kanidhax xan ti yejat.
62004019	Waw i kanidhl na Dios abal Jaj tu kanidhmal okox.
62004020	Por max jun xita kin ulu: “Nan u kanidhl na Dios”, por in atl nin at kidhb; jachan, jaich jun i kambix. Pos max jun xita yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb xin chutal, jan ti neech kin ejto kin kanidha a Dios xi yab in chutal?
62004021	Jaj tu pidhmal jech an ti takixtalb: Xita in kanidhl na Dios, yejat jeye kin kanidha nin at kidhb.
62005001	Ejtal xita in bell ke na Jess jaich an Kristo, u chakmlb kal a Dios ani max in kanidhl an Ttalb, neech jeye kin kanidhantsi tin Chakmil.
62005002	Max i kanidhl na Dios ani ki tajl xowa Jaj tu utsl ki taja, i chobich tm abal i kanidhl xu chakmlbtsik kal Jaj.
62005003	Pos max i kanidhl na Dios, yejat ki axtsi an tin takixtal ani yab lej tojlb xowa tu utsl ki taja.
62005004	Ejtal xu chakmlbich kal na Dios, yab u tb kal xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl; nin belomtal jaich kl tu tolmiyb abal yab ka t kal xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl.
62005005	Xita in bell ke na Jess u Chakmlb kal a Dios, jaich nin ejtowal kin ta xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl.
62005006	Na Jesukristo jaich na tsch tech ti chabl ani pujan. In wakla jeye nin xichl ban peltsidh te. Yab tokotki pujan, in wakla nin xichl tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Anchan tu xalkb kal an Tokat Ejattalb, pos an Tokat Ejattalb echeki in xalkl xowa tsubax.
62005007	Waach x t walki xin xalkl ejtal jech: an Ttalb, xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios ani an Tokat Ejattalb; jech oxlam, jn tokot tu ynal.
62005008	Ani x jeye waach ban chabl xin xalkl jech: an Tokat Ejattalb, an pujaxtalb xin bachu na Jesukristo ani an cheml xin watna; jech oxlam, in lnl abal na Jesukristo u Chakmlb kal a Dios.
62005009	Max i beltsal xowa in ulal an iniktsik, ms ja yejat ki beltsi xowa in ulal na Dios, pos jech xowa in ulal na Dios, jaich kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil.
62005010	Xita in bell nin Chakmil na Dios, in beltsal xowa in ulal na Dios. Xita yab in beltsal na Dios, in tajlich ka xalkan jelti max u kambix abal yab in bell xowa na Dios in ulal kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil.
62005011	Jech jaich xowa in ulal na Dios: Ke Jaj tu pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kwajat ba nin Chakmil.
62005012	Xita in bachmalich nin Chakmil na Dios, in koolich jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por xita yabl in bachmal nin Chakmil na Dios, yab in kool jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62005013	Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech xa bellichtsik nin Chakmil na Dios abal ka chobna ke a koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62005014	I chobich abal u kwajatich kal na Dios, pos max ki kontsi xata xan ti Jajki tin kulbetnl, tu axtsal.
62005015	Ani max i chobich ke na Dios tu axtsal tam ki kontsi xata, i chobich jeye ke neech ti ku pidha xowa ni kontsmal.
62005016	Max jun xita kin chuu ke nin at kidhb exom in wall, por yab lej plek an walastalb xi exom in tajl, yejat kin kontsintsi abal ka pakwlantsat kal na Dios. Na Dios neech kin pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal jech an kidhblb, max jaich jun i walastalb xi yab lej plek. Waach i walastalb xu jnax ban kibeltalb, kal jech an walastalb, yab exom u ulal ka kontsin na Dios abal kin pakwlantsi xita in tajl jelti jech an walastalb.
62005017	Ejtal xowa yab alwa, i walastalb; por waach i walastalb xi yab u jnax ban kibeltalb.
62005018	I chobich ke xita xin kool na Dios jelt in Tta, yabich in tajl an walastalb; pos belkmtejich kal nin Chakmil na Dios ani yabich u taknal kal an lej atax.
62005019	I chobich ke waw u dhabalbich kal a Dios ani ejtal xita yabtsik u belom, teykmtetsik kal an lej atax.
62005020	I chobich ke nin Chakmil na Dios tsinek ani tu pidhmal ti chalab abal ki exla na Dios xi tsubax. Ani xo u kwajatich kal na Dios xi tsubax, kal tin kwentaki nin Chakmil Jesukristo. Jech jaich na Dios xi tsubax ani Jaj jaich nin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
62005021	Tsitsik chakam, yab ka belltsik an chilabtsik. Anchan ka tjan.
63001001	Nan, xin pulektalbich tajat, u dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an mmlb xi takudh kal na Dios ani nin chakmiltsik jeye. Jaich xi tsubax lejtal tu kanidhltsik tajat. Yab nanki, u kanidhb jeye kal ejtal xin exlmalichtsik an tsubaxtalb.
63001002	Tu kanidhltsik kal tin kwenta an tsubaxtalb xi koolich ani neech ka kwajay kal waw malill i kij.
63001003	Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xin pidhnl kal i tsubaxtalb ani kal i kanidhaxtalb na Dios an Ttalb ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xu Chakmlb kal an Ttalb.
63001004	In kulb tajat abal u ela taltsik na chakmiltsik kwajajadh xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb, jelt xan ti na Dios an Ttalb tu utsl ku kwajay.
63001005	Ani xo mmlb, tu lej kontsal abal ku kndhxin jn ani jn. Jech xowa tu dhutsuntsal yab i t takixtalb, jaychki an takixtalb xu pidhnk asta tam ti tujuki tu belom.
63001006	U xalkanal abal u kanidhaxich tam ku kwajch xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios. An takixtalb jaich xi achmalich kejle asta tam ti tujuki tu belom, ke yejat ku kwajay u kndhx.
63001007	Yn waach ban kayl i kambixtsik, xin ulal ke na Jesukristo yab tsinek ban kayl jelti jun i inik. Xin ulal anchan, jaich an kambix ani jech, jaich xu atnal kl na Kristo.
63001008	Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ka kibdhatsik an tojlb xa tajmal ani ka bachutsik kidhat na chejwalb.
63001009	Xita xu okxinal kal an chalab abal in chalpayal ke ms in chob ani yab in wwnantsal tin oktsixtal na Kristo, yab kwajat kal a Dios; por xita xin wewkm nin oktsixtal na Kristo, kwajat kal an Ttalb ani kal an Chakmlb jeye.
63001010	Max jun xita ka ulich ti ki lnatsik ani yab in oktsixnl nin oktsixtal na Kristo, yab ka bachutsik nibal ka chapndhatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb;
63001011	por xita kin bachu ani kin chapndha kal yantam i kulbtalb, u kalelich jeye tm in tajl xowa yab alwa.
63001012	U kool tajat yn xata xowa u l tu utsatsik, por yab u l tu utsa dhutsadhki ba jun i w; pos u chalpayal kin kale tu lnatsik abal ku tilololch junax kal tattsik ani anchan, ms plek an kijidhtalb ki acha.
63001013	Nin chakmiltsik an mmlb xu belomich, xi takudh kal na Dios, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Anchan ka tjan.
64001001	Nan, xin pulektalbich tajat, u dhutsuntsal jech an ti w nu jab xin bij Gayo, xi tsubax lejtal u kanidhl tajat.
64001002	Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, u kontsal na Dios abal ti ki tolmiy kal ejtal xowa a tajl ani ki kwajay juntam aniki, anchan xan ti na ejattal kwajatich alwa abal i belmmadhich.
64001003	Pos in kulb tajat tam ti ulich an kidhblbtsik ani tin tiltsitsik abal i kwajat in lujtalki jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb.
64001004	Yab waach ni jun xata ms xowa tin kijidhmdhl, tokot tam ku acha ke an belomtsik xi kwajat jelti u chakmiltsik kwajajadhtsik in lujtalki jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb.
64001005	Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, lujat tajat xan ta tajl tam a tjontsal an kidhblbtsik, ms xi pltsik ti tl.
64001006	Jajtsik in tilmal tin tamt an kidhblbtsik xan ta kanidhltsik. Ani alwa tajat ka tolmiytsik kal xowa in yntsaltsik abal kin ejtotsik kin ntsi an bl, pos jech jaich nin kulbetnl na Dios.
64001007	Pos jajtsik kalnek abal kin tjontsitsik na Jesukristo ani yab in bachkuntsmaltsik ni jun i tolmixtalb xi yabtsik u judo.
64001008	Jaxtm ti yejat ki tolmiy jelti jech an kidhblbtsik abal kin ntsi ka xechintsik kin tila an alwa tilab.
64001009	Nan u abtsitsik jun i dhutsadh w an belomtsik, por na Ditrefes, xin kulbetnl ka kwajay ti oklek kal an belomtsik, yab in tajl ti kij an awiltalb xi tu pidhmal an Ajtiklb.
64001010	Jaxtm, max kin kale tu lnatsik, neech ku tawna na Ditrefes abal in ulal i januts kw kal waw ti kwenta. Ani yab tokot jki in tajl, anl jeye yab in bachwal an kidhblbtsik xu ulel ti tonel tin kim. Ani an kidhblbtsik xin lenl kin bachu an toneltsik, in taxkantsal ani yabich tm in walkl ka ochich xon tu junkunal an belomtsik.
64001011	Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, yab ka wwna i oktsixtalb xi yab alwa, tokot ka wwna xi alwa. Xita in tajl xowa alwa, kal a Dios tu dhabalb; por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, yab in exll a Dios.
64001012	Kal ejtalki tu tilnal alwa na Demetrio, abal tokotki in tajl xowa in ulal an tsubaxtalb. Waw i chumalich weye jech ani a chobichtsik abal tsubax xowa i ulal.
64001013	Jab Gayo, u kool tajat yn xata xowa u lwiik tu utsa, por yab u l tu utsa dhutsadhki;
64001014	pos u chalpayal kin kale tu lna jikat ani tm neech tu tiloll.
64001015	U l ki kwajay kijidh. An jaublbtsik xi tech u kwajl ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Tu kontsal ti alwatalb, abal ka chapndha juntsik ti juntsik ejtal ni jabtsik xi tachan u kwajl.
65001001	Nan, xu bij Judas, nin kidhb na Jakobo, in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w tattsik xi takudhich kal na Dios an Ttalb ani i dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj. Ti beletnltsik alwa abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Jesukristo.
65001002	Ka bachwaltsik yn i yajnantsixtalb, i kijidhtalb ani i kanidhaxtalb.
65001003	Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhl tajat, u lenmal tajat tu dhutsuntsi kal tin kwenta an loeltalb xi nan ani tattsik i kool. Por xo u chutal ke yejat tajat tu dhutsuntsi abal tu utsatsik ke yab ka walka ki tantsat nw an ta belomtal xi pidhnktsik abal echekijich, kom i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
65001004	Pos taltsik i atiklbtsik xin wynl u belom, ochenektsik kal an kidhblbtsik xi tsubax lejtal tu belom. Jech jaich xu tilnaltsik asta ti weje ke neech ka kale ban kibeltalb. Jajtsik yab alwa iniktsik, in ynl nin alwatal na Dios abal kin taja xowa yab alwa; in pojkltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo xi Jaj tu dhabal ani na Dios jeye xi junkax Jajki in kool an awiltalb.
65001005	U l tu chalpantsi maske a chobnmalichtsik ke an Okxlb in kldha Ejipto an atiklbtsik xi Israel, por tayl in kibdhatsik xi yab belmch.
65001006	Ka chobnatsik jeye ke an tokat abatwletsik xin chikat taja xant in y ti tajadhtsik ani yab kwajaytsik xon ti bijtsin, xo u kyb ti wiknl kal na Dios ban jikwaxtalb xi yab in kool in okontal, in aytsm kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundaxtalb.
65001007	Anl jeye an bitsowtsik xi Sodoma ani Gomorra ani an bitsowtsik xi taja kunat, in walatsik jeye jelti jech an tokat abatwletsik. U junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, u junkunaltsik i inik kal in at inik ani i mmlb kal in at mmlb; ani xo kwajattsik ban yajtsiktalb. Dhutsadh xowa tajtsinktsik kal na Dios abal yab ki taja weye anlki.
65001008	Anchan jeye, jech an iniktsik xin oktsixnl xowa jajkitsik in chalpayal, in choyalich nin tul kal xowa atax in tajl. In pojkantsal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb ani in odhbijtsal tin y an tokat abatwletsik.
65001009	Pos nibal an oklek tokat abatwle Miguel, tam ti kwajat ti pjx kal an lej atax in kntsxnl nin tul na Moiss, yab in utsa ti odhbijixtalb an lej atax, tokot in utsa ench: “Ke an Okxlb ti ki kwiya.”
65001010	Por jech an iniktsik, in odhbijyal xowa jajtsik nibal ela in exll. In junwal jelti konltsik xi tokot in tajl xowa in kulbetnl in tul ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kibdhltsik tinb.
65001011	Chojontl in chubltsik! abal in wwnmal xowa in taja na Kan. Kom in ltsik kin ta i tumn, in taja jeye jelt xan tin taja na Balm. Kibeytsik jelt xan ti kibdh na Kor; pos jech na Kor, jaich jun i tomnax inik.
65001012	Xi jechtsik, u tidhebdhomtsik tajat tam ka ulich xon ta kwajattsik ta kapul junini abal a kaknlichtsik an Ajtiklb. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ti okox kapultsik abal ka ajw ani yab in dhltsik ti kwenta max waach keet xu kaltsik ani in l jeye ti kapul. In junwal jelti an tokow xi yab in kool i ja xu beldhb kal an ik; in junwal jeye jelti an tetsik xi yab u walim, xu kwajlb puudh asta bin ibl ani u wayl.
65001013	In junwal jelt in dhujl an ja xin xalkl tam u mlk chapik ban pujal. Anchan jeye tu xalkanal an ataxtalb xin tajl jech an iniktsik. In junwal jelti a ttsik xin kibdhmal in blil; kom kibchonkichtsik tajat, neech ka kwajaytsik xon ti lej jikwaxich tajat malill i kij.
65001014	Na Enok, an inik xin bklb ms tayl k na Adn, in tila jechtsik ijtsidh kal a Dios tam tin ulu ench: “U chuu an Ajtiklb tam ti tl kal yn i mil i tokat abatwletsik
65001015	abal kin ljundha ejtalkitsik ani kin abna ban kibeltalb an atax iniktsik kal tin kwenta xowa yab alwa in tajmal. Jechtsik, jaich an walablomtsik xin tomnmal ani in odhbijymal na Dios.”
65001016	Jechtsik u tilax ani u itixbltsik kal xowakich, tokot xeech xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnl. In till ke jajtsik ulutstsik tajat ani in till alwa taltsik an atiklbtsik abal in l kin chuu xanty kin ejto kin jixtsi.
65001017	Por tattsik, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ka chalpay ke nin abatwlejiltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ti okox utsmalichtsik ench:
65001018	“Tam u kunelich an pakwenib, neech ka wachin i atiklbtsik xi neech ti labdhnax ani neech kin taja tokot xowa jajkitsik in kulbetnl.”
65001019	Jechtsik, jaich nin tajltsik an kxtalb; tokot in tajltsik xowa in l nin tul ani yab in kool tin itsch nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
65001020	Por tattsik, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ki kwajajantsik lujat kal an tokat belomtalb xa kool ani ki lantsik kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
65001021	Anchan neech tm ka ejto ki kwajajantsik bin kanidhaxtal na Dios, a aytsm kin bajaw xowki ni Ajtik Jesukristo, kal nin yajnantsixtal, neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
65001022	Ka tolmiytsik kin exbay xita yabtsik in lej bell.
65001023	Xi keettsik, ka tolmiy ka loey abal yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb. Ani ka kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik; por ka koy i kwenta abal yab ki chon kal an walastalb xin tajltsik.
65001024	Na Dios in kool an awiltalb ti ku beletna abal yab ku kwajlan ban walastalb ani ti ku utu u tokat ani u kijidh bin labidh tokt. Jaj jaich nu junkax Dios ani chalpadh tajat. Jaich xi tu lom kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Ke jech na Dios, kin koy an labidh tokattalb, an takixtalb, an awiltalb ani Jajki ka kwajay echeki ultalb malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
66001001	Jech jaich xowa na Dios in xalkantsi na Jesukristo abal kin pidha kin chobna nin tjontsixiltsik xowa neech ka tmun kunat i kij. Na Jesukristo in aba nin tokat abatwlejil abal ka xalkantsat na Juan jech an ti xalkantsixtalb.
66001002	Jech na Juan, nin tjontsixil na Jesukristo, jaich xin tilmalich nin kwintal na Dios, in lnmal xowa in tajmal na Jesukristo ani ejtal xowa in chumal.
66001003	Kijidh tajat abal xita kin ajay, kin exbay jech an tiltsixtalb ani kin taja xowa jech kwajat dhutsadh, pos an kij exomich ti kunel.
66001004	Nan, xu bij Juan, u dhutsuntsal an belomtsik xi kwajattsik ba bk i bitsow xu taknaltsik ban chabl xi Asia. Ka bachutsik i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij ani xi tl jeye ba bk an ejattalbtsik xi kwajat tin tamt nin tokat kwajtal na Dios.
66001005	Ka bachutsik jeye i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Jesukristo an lujat ltsix, xi okxink ka ejech ti t abal yabich jayki ka chemech ani xin kool i awiltalb kin takiy i pakdha takix xi tech ti kayl. Na Jesukristo tu kanidhl, tu wixkintsmalich an ti walastalbil kal nin xichl,
66001006	ani tu tajmalich tu pakdha takix ani tu ple abal ki tjontsi nin Tta Dios. Ke an labidh tokattalb ani an awiltalb kin koy Jajki malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
66001007	Ka achatsik, na Kristo neech ka tsch ban tokow! Kal ejtal ti neech ka chutat, asta kal xi kl ti chojbdhats. Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ban kayl neech ka ukintsik tam kin chuu. Ani anchan neech ka tmun.
66001008	“Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal”, anchan tin ulal an Ajtiklb xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.
66001009	Nan, xu bij Juan, tu at kidhbtsik neye ani exom u watnl an yajtsiktalb jelti tattsik. In taknlich neye kal na Dios ani exom u watnl xowakichki kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo.
