In kwajat tin wiknl ban chakam chabl xin bij Patmos xi kwajat ban ja. In kwajat tin wiknl abal u till an alwa tilab ani abal u till jeye xowa in tajmal na Jesukristo.
66001010	Jun i domingo, xi jaychki jelti na kts tam ti ejech ti t an Ajtiklb, in jilkon teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u acha tu kx jun i kawidh kwintalb, jelt xan tu jsnal i korneta,
66001011	xu kw tin utsa ench: —Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal. Ka dhutsa ba jun i w xowa exom a chutal ani ka abtsi an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow xu taknaltsik ban chabl xi Asia. An bitsowtsik xi Efeso, xi Esmirna, xi Prgamo, xi Tiatira, xi Sardis, xi Filadelfia ani xi Laodisea.
66001012	In chawkin abal ku chuu xitam j tin tawnl ani tam tin chawkin, u chuu bk in kb i bla xi tajadh kal i oro.
66001013	Junax chejel ba jachan bk in kb an bla, u chuu jun i inik xeketlidh kal jun i xeketlb xi bodhl asta bin akan ani in wkm bin itsch jun i wikaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.
66001014	Nin xil dhakni tajat jelt in dhak xil i borrego o jelti an chm ani nin wal jelti i kamal.
66001015	Nin akan chaxixl jelti i bdhits patl xin bij bronse, xi xokadh ba jun i jorna; ani nin kwintal, kawidh jelti tam u bososl yn i ja.
66001016	Bin ejt kubak in kool bk a ttsik ani bin wi u kalel jun i chupidh macht xi tamatki ti wiidh. Putl nin wal in junwal jelti na kts tam tajax tajat.
66001017	Tam tu chuu, in kwajlan bin akan jelti max in chemnek. Por Jaj tin puntsi an tin ejt kubak ani tin utsa ench: —Yab ki jikey, Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal.
66001018	Nanich xin kwajat ejat, in chemdh, por xo in kwajatich ejat abal malill i kij. Nan u tantsmalich tin awiltal an cheml ani xon tu kalel an chemlomtsik.
66001019	Ka dhutsa xowa a chumal, xowa a chutal ani xowa neech ka chuu tayl.
66001020	Jech jaich xowa kwajat yab tejwa ba xi bk na t xa chuu bu ejt kubak ani xi bk in kb an bla xi tajadh kal i oro: xi bk na t, in l kin ulu i ltsixtsik abal an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow; ani xi bk in kb an bla, in l kin ulu an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow.
66002001	Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Efeso: “Ench tin ulal xin kool bk na ttsik bin ejt kubak ani xi xeech junax chejel ba xi bk in kb an bla xi tajadh kal i oro:
66002002	Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u chob abal chapik tajat tin tjontsal, a kuxyal xowakichki ani yab tajat a kulbetnl xi yabtsik alwa inik. A chumalich ke xin ulaltsik u abatwle, yab tsubax ani u kambixtsik.
66002003	A watnmal i yajtsiktalb, a kuxymal xowakichki, i tjnkich tajat kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab i chekenek.
66002004	Por u chutal jun xata yab alwa xowa a tajm: yabich tin kaknl jelt tam ti jidhtal.
66002005	Jaxtm, ka chalpay xowa yab alwa a tajl, ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa ani ka tajaich jun xowa a tajlwiik tin jidhtal. Pos max yab ka jila ka taja xowa yab alwa, neech kin kale jikat tu chuu ani neech ku wkoy nin kb na blajil xon ti kwajat.
66002006	Por a kool jun xata alwa, a pojkl xowa in tajl an nikolatas, xi Nan u pojkl neye.
66002007	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha kin kaptsi tin wall an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech an te, kwajat xon tu takix na Dios.”
66002008	Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Esmirna: “Ench tin ulal xi Jajich nin tujtal ani in okontal, xi chemech ani ejech ti t:
66002009	Nan u chob xowa a tajl; u chob an yajtsiktalb xa watnl ani abal i chojontl, por yab i chojontl. U chob xan ti odhbijyal xin ulaltsik ke u judo, por yabtsik u judo, in atiklbil i lej atax.
66002010	Yab ka jikna an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka watna. An lej atax neech kin taja ka balyat ban wikaxte taltsik xi tattsik abal ki chutattsik max tsubax lejtal tin belltsik ani neech ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb tin nakl lju a kts. Por yab ka jalkuy na chalab, ka ntsi ti kin bela maske ki chemdh ani Nan, neech tu pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
66002011	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, yabich neech kin chuu an cheml xin chabtal.”
66002012	Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Prgamo: “Ench tin ulal xin kool an chupidh macht xi tamatki ti wiidh:
66002013	Nan u chob xowa a tajl ani u chob abal i kwajl xon tu takix an lej atax, por blki a ntsal ti kin bela. Yab a jilmal ti kin bela, nibal tam ti xechin na Antipas nu lujat tjontsixil. Jech na Antipas, chemdh xon ta kwajltsik, tachan xon tu takix an lej atax.
66002014	Por u chutal taltsik xowa yab alwa a tajl: a kool tachan Prgamo chb x xi yab in l kin jilatsik nin oktsixtal na Balm. Jech na Balm, jaich xin oktsi na Balak abal kin taja kin wala an israelitatsik, in utsa kin kaputsik xowakich xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik ani ka kwajaytsik yab exbadh.
66002015	T jeye a kool tachan xi yabtsik in l kin jila nin oktsixtal an nikolatas, xi Nan u pojkl.
66002016	Jaxtm, ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa, pos max yab ka taja anchan, neech kin kale jikat tu lna ani neech ku pjeytsik kal an macht xu kalel ba nu wi.
66002017	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha kin kapu an kapnl xi painek walki xi kwajat chinat ani neech ku pidha jun i chakam dhak tujub. Ba jech an chakam tujub, neech ka kwajay dhutsadh jun i t bijlb xi yab xita in exll, tokot xita kin bachu.”
66002018	Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Tiatira: “Ench in ulal nin Chakmil na Dios, xin kool in wal jelti kamal ani nin akan jelti i bdhits patl xin bij bronse:
66002019	Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u exll xan ta kanidhax, xan ta belom, xan ta tjontsix, xan ta kool i chaattalb ani abal xo ms exomich a tajl xowa alwa k tam tin jidhtal.
66002020	Por u chutal jun xata yab alwa xowa a tajl: a walkl kin taja xowa yab alwa jachan an uxum xin bij Jesabel, xin ulal ke jaj in tiltsxil a Dios. Jaj in kambiyal ani in oktsal nu tjontsixiltsik abal ka kwajaytsik yab exbadh ani kin kaputsik xowa u pikbantsb an chilabtsik.
66002021	Nan u aytsmalich tajat jachan an mmlb abal kin jilaich ti kwajl yab exbadh, por yab in l kin jila.
66002022	Jaxtm, neech ku yaundha jachan an mmlb ani neech ku taja kin watnatsik i yajtsiktalb xin wwnantsal tin oktsixtal max yab kin jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa u oktsinal.
66002023	Neech ku walka ka chemdh xita junaxtsik kal jech an mmlb. Anchan, ejtal an belomtsik neech kin chobna ke Nan u exlantsal xowa in chalpayal ani xowa in achl tin itsch jun xita. Juntsik ta b neech tu pidha xowa a lujyaltsik ka bachu kal tin kwenta xowa a tajmal.
66002024	Por xi ms na kidhtaltsik xi kwajattsik jeye Tiatira, xi yabtsik in wwnmal jachan an oktsixtalb nibal in exlmaltsik xi jajtsik in bijyal tin tekat chalpadhtal an lej atax, u utsltsik abal yab ms xata u punkuntsal.
66002025	Por ka ntsi ka bela xowa Nan tu oktsmaltsik, asta kin bajaw xowki neech kin tsch jun.
66002026	Xita kin ntsi kin taja xowa Nan u tajl asta kin bajaw an pakwenib, neech ku pidha ti awiltalb ti takix ban atiklbtsik.
66002027	Anchan jelt xan ti nu Tta tin pidhmal ti awiltalb tin takix, anchan jeye neech ti takixtsik. Neech kin koy tajat i awiltalb ti takix ani xita kl ti ka tomn, neech kin muu jelt xan tu mwb jun i pats xi tajadh kal i kut.
66002028	Neech jeye kin koy xowa Nan u kool xin kwajat jelti na pulek t xu kalel tam dhajaw.
66002029	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”
66003001	Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Sardis: “Ench tin ulal xin kool xi bk nin ejattal na Dios ani bk a t: Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u tilnal abal tin belltsik ani a kooltsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, por yab tsubax, pos i kwajattsik jelti max i chemnek.
66003002	Ka chalpch jun ti t ani ka tajaich in tsubtal xowa a tajl abal a Dios, pos jech xowa a tajl, kwajat jelti max nechich ka chemech. U chumalich ke xowa a tajl, yab lej lujat tin tamt na Dios.
66003003	Ka chalpay ani ka ntsi ka wwna an tsubaxtalb xan ta oktsink. Ka ntsi ka wwna an tsubaxtalb ani ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa, pos max yab ka taja anchan, neech kin kale jelti jun i kw xon ta kwajat ani yab neech ka chobna xowa i ora.
66003004	Por waach taltsik tachan Sardis i atiklbtsik xi yab in tajmaltsik xowa yab alwa, jajtsik neech ka xechin kal Nan xeketlidhtsik kal dhakni, pos anchan tin tomnltsik ka xechin.
66003005	Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ka xeketliyattsik kal dhakni ani yab neech ku pakwtsitsik tin bij ban w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Neech ku lnantsitsik tin bij tin tamt nu Tta ani tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik.
66003006	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”
66003007	Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Filadelfia: “Ench tin ulal xi Tokat ani Tsubax, xin kool an awiltalb jelti xin kymal an pulek takix Dabid, xi tam kin japiy an wileb, ni jun xita yab in ejtowal kin mapuy ani tam kin mapuy, ni jun xita yab in ejtowal kin japiy:
66003008	U chob xowa a tajl. Jaxtm tu kwajbmal ta tamt, jun i wileb japidh xi yab xita neech kin ejto kin mapuy; pos maske yab yn ta b, yab a chikat tajmal nu kwintal ani yab a tidhenmal ti kin tila.
66003009	Waach xin wwnltsik an lej atax, xin ulaltsik ke u judo, por yab tsubax. Neech ku utu kal tattsik ani neech ku taja ka tudhlantsik ta tamt abal kin chobna ke tu kanidhltsik.
66003010	Kom a kuxymal ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta, jaxtm ti neech tu tolmiy abal yab ka watna an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tsch abal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ba putl an kayl. Jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka tsch abal ka chutat kal na Dios xan ti kwajat ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti chabl.
66003011	Kunat i kij neech kin tsch. Yab ka jila ti kin bela abal yab xita ti ki kntsi xowa neech ka ta.
66003012	Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku kwajba jelti jun i akanlb ban at xon tu kwajl nu Diosil ani yab ms jayki neech ka kale taja. Neech ku dhutsa ba jaj nin bij nu Diosil ani nin bij nin bitswil nu Diosil. Jech an bitsow, jaich an t Jerusaln xi tl walki xu dhabalb kal nu Diosil. Neech jeye ku dhutsa ba jaj nu t bij.
66003013	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”
66003014	Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Laodisea: “Ench tin ulal xin lnl xowa tsubax ani lujat, xin tajmal junax kal na Dios ejtal xowa waach:
66003015	Nan u chob xowa a tajl. U chob abal yab a lej pojkl xi yab alwa nibal a lej tajl an chplb abal ka taja xowa alwa, jelti jun xata xi yab kk nibal chamay. U lak max i kk o i chamayak!
66003016	Por kom yab i chamay nibal i kk, neech tu xaa.
66003017	Tat a ulal ke i tumnladh tajat, ke i kwajatich alwa ani ke yab xata a yntsal; por yab a chob ke i kwajat jelti max i chojontl, jelti max yab xata a kool, jelti max i jokol ani jelti max i chilim.
66003018	Jaxtm, tu takyal abal ti kin chaytsi an ti oro xi tajadh alwa ban kamal abal ki kwajay lejtal i tumnladh. Ti kin chaytsi an ti dhak kudhkum abal ki xeketlin ani ti kin chaytsi an ti ill abal ka kwajbantsi na wal ani anchan ka ejto ki chuxin.
66003019	Nan u tawnl ani u kwiyl ejtal xu kanidhltsik. Pos ka tajaich i chplb abal ka taja xowa alwa ani ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa.
66003020	Ka acha, Nan in kwajat jelti jun xita xi kwajat ti tawnax ban wileb, max jun xita ti kin axtsi an tu kwintal ani tin walka ki ochich bin itsch jelti tam jun xita u japtsinal an ti wileb, neech kin kwajay kal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay kal Nan.
66003021	Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku walka ka buxkan junax kal Nan bu tokat kwajtal, jelt xan ti Nan u tmalich ejtal xowakich ani in buxkank kal nu Tta bin tokat kwajtal.
66003022	Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”
66004001	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, u tela ani u chuu walki jebl jun i wileb. Jachan an kwintalb xin junwal jelt xan tu jsnal jun i korneta xi tin tawnmal jidhtal, tin utsa ench: —Ki kadhiy tech ani neech tu ltsi ejtal xowa neech ka tmun tam ka tmunich jech.
66004002	Tmki jachan, tam tin kwajat teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, u chuu jun i tokat kwajtalb xi kwajbadh walki ani ban tokat kwajtalb ta ti buxl jun xita.
66004003	Xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, in junwal jelti jun i chaxixl tujub xu bijyb jaspe ani jelti tujub xu bijyb kornalina. Malill ban tokat kwajtalb ta ti kwajat jun i pichal chaxixl jelti jun i tujub xu bijyb esmeralda.
66004004	Malill ban tokat kwajtalb u chuu jeye jun inik ch i tokat kwajtalbtsik ani ba jachan an tokat kwajtalbtsik, ta ti buxutsik jun inik ch i yejcheltsik xeketlidh kal dhakni ani in kojmtsik jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.
66004005	Ban tokat kwajtalb u lamkil i ly, u achatml xata ani u julull. Tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, ta ti letotl bk i tajbaxtalb, xi jaich xi bk nin ejattal na Dios.
66004006	Tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, ta jeye ti kwajat jun xata xin junwal jelti pujal xi tumax tajat. Junax chejel ani malill ban tokat kwajtalb, ta ti kwajat ch xata ejat xin kool in wal putlki, tin kx ani tin tamt.
66004007	In jidhtal jech xi ejattsik, in junwal jelti padhum; nin chabtal, in junwal jelti toro; nin oxtal, in kool in wal jelti inik ani nin chetal, in junwal jelti tw u jumuml.
66004008	Chelam jech xi ejattsik in kool akak in sutsts juntsik ti b, in kooltsik tajat in wal eblidh ani alkidh ani akal i kij yab in kubdhltsik kin ulu ench: Tokat, tokat, tokat, Okxlb Dios, xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, i kwajat ejat malill i kij.
66004009	Echeki tam xi jechtsik ch in pidhl ti labidh tokattalb, ti kaknaxtalb ani ti jalbintsixtalb xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij,
66004010	xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, u tudhlanal tin tamt xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani in kaknltsik xi kwajat ejat malill i kij. In kwachbltsik nin kwetsotsl kwajbaxtal tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani in ulaltsik ench:
66004011	Okxlb ani Diosil, Tat nin tomnl ka koy echeki an labidh tokattalb, an kaknaxtalb ani an chplb; pos Tat a tajmal ejtal xowa waach ani kom Tat anchan ta lenmal, jaxtm ti waach ani jaxtm ti tajadh.
66005001	Bin ejt kubak xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, u chuu jun i dhutsadh w tulilidh, dhutsuntsidh alkidh ani eblidh ani pajkidh kal bk i pajkixtalb.
66005002	Ani u chuu jun i likat tokat abatwle xi kwajat in ulal kawidh tajat ench: —Jita in tomnl kin wela an dhutsadh w ani kin wkontsi an tin pajkl?
66005003	Por nibal walki, nibal chabl, nibal alkidh ban chabl, yab waach ni jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin wela an dhutsadh w, nibal ela kin tela.
66005004	Nan in ukin tajat abal yab elan ni jun xita xin tomnl kin wela ani kin ajay an dhutsadh w, nibal ela kin tela.
66005005	In utsan tm ench kal jn ti b an yejcheltsik: —Yabich ms ki ukin, pos xu kidhtalb kal na Jud ani u kidhtalb jeye kal an pulek takix Dabid, in tmalich ani neech kin ejto kin wela an dhutsadh w ani kin wkontsi xi bk an tin pajkl. Jech an kidhtalb, in kool in chp ani in awiltal jelti an padhum, jaxtm tu bijyb ti padhum.
66005006	U tela tm jun ani u chuu ke junax chejel ban tokat kwajtalb, ba xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani junax chejel ban yejcheltsik ta ti kubl an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, por kwajat jelti max chemdhats. Jech xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in kool bk in ichm ani bk in wal. Nin ichmtsik ani nin wal, jaich xi bk nin ejattal na Dios xi kwajat putlki an kayl.
66005007	Jech xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, kale ani in bachu an dhutsadh w xi ta tin kool bin ejt kubak xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb.
66005008	Tam tin tyna an dhutsadh w, xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, tudhlan tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios. Ejtaltsik in teykm juntsik i sn ani in teykmtsik jeye i lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal i ikob. Jech an ikob, jaich jelti nin lbil xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
66005009	Ani in ajatnltsik jech an t ajatlb: Tat nin tomnl ka tyna an dhutsadh w ani ka wkontsi an tin pajkl; pos Tat i chemdh ani kal na xichl tu chaymal abal ku dhabalnjich kal na Dios, ejtalki an kidhtalbtsik, an kwintalb ani an atiklbtsik.
66005010	Tu pidhmalich ti awiltalb abal ku kwajay tu pakdha takix ani tu ple abal ni Diosil, ani neech tu takix ban chabl.
66005011	Tayl u tela jun ani u axtsi tin kwintal yn i tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kwajattsik malill ban tokat kwajtalb, ba xi ch jeye xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani ba xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik,
66005012	ani in ulaltsik kawidh ench: An Ajtiklb xi chemdh, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in tomnl kin koy an chplb, kin dhabalna ejtal xowa waach, kin koy an chalpadhtalb ani an chapnitalb. Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb ani Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb.
66005013	U acha jeye ejtal xowa tajadh kal na Dios, xi kwajat walki, xi kwajat chabl, xi kwajat alkidh ban chabl, xi kwajat ban pujal ani ejtal xowa xi waachtsik taja in ulaltsik ench: Kin bachu an kaknaxtalb, kin koy an labidh tokattalb ani an awiltalb malill i kij, xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66005014	Xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, in ulal ench: —Anchan ka tjan!  Ani xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik tudhlan kututsik asta chabl ani in kaknatsik xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.
66006001	U chuu tm ke an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios in wkoy an jidhtal pajkixtalb ani u acha tin ulu jn ti b xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, kal jun i kwintalb xin junwal jelti junkil: —Jala ani ka tela!
66006002	U tela ani u chuu jun i dhak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, in teykm jun i kwiixtalb. Pidhan jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani kale abal ti tax.
66006003	Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin chblb an pajkixtalb, u acha jeye tin ulu ench xi chabtal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela!
66006004	Kale tm jun jun i chak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, pidhan ti awiltalb abal kin wkoy an kijidhtalb ban kayl ani abal kin taja ka chmdhxin an iniktsik jn ani jn. Pidhan jun i nakat macht.
66006005	Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin xlb an pajkixtalb, u acha tin ulu ench xi oxtal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela! U tela ani u chuu jun i tunuy bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, in teykm jun i lejbaxtalb.
66006006	U acha jun i kwintalb junax chejel xon ti kwajat xi ch ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani xu kw in ulu ench: —Jun i denario in jalbl xi jun kilo i trigo ani anlki jeye in jalbl xi ox kilo i sebada; por yab ka odhna an asyte nibal an yajtsik uxnl.
66006007	Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin chlb an pajkixtalb, u acha tin ulu ench xin chetal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela!
66006008	U tela ani u chuu jun i mn bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, u bijyb ti Cheml ani tin kx ta ti tl xu bijyb tin kubtal an chemlomtsik. Pidhan ti awiltalb ba jun peje an chabl abal kin chemdha an atiklbtsik kal i pjxtalb, kal i kanab, kal i yawlchtsik ani kal i padhumtsik xi waach ban chabl.
66006009	Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin blb an pajkixtalb, u chuu tin l xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, nin ejattal xi chemdhatstsik kal tin kwenta nin kwintal na Dios ani abal in lnltsik ke na Kristo jaich nu loox.
66006010	Jechtsik in ulal kawidh ench: —Tokat Okxlb ani tsubax, asta jowki neech ka ljundha ani ka tajatsik kin jalbiy xita tu chemdhmal, xi kwajattsik ban chabl?
66006011	Pidhantsik tm tin dhak xekt ani utsantsik abal ka koychtsik bl w i kij, asta ka kidhey nin yanl an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat in tjontsal na Kristo xi neechtsik jeye ka chemdh jelti jajtsik.
66006012	Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin akaklb an pajkixtalb, lwkin an chabl. Na kts tunkan jelti tunuy kudhkum, na ch wenkon jelti xich
66006013	ani na ttsik xi kwajat walki, kwajlan chabl jelt xan tu kwajlanal nin tej wall jun i te tam u wawyb kal i chapik ik.
66006014	An walki kibchon jelti tam u tlnal jun i w ani ejtal an chntsik ani an chabltsik xi kwajat ban pujal, plmdhtsik.
66006015	An pakdha takix xi ban kayl, chinkontsik ban cholax chn ani ban pakdha tujub xi waach ban chn, junax kal an ultalb iniktsik, kal xi tumnladhtsik, kal an oklek soldadotsik, kal ejtal an jolibtsik ani kal xi yab u jolibtsik;
66006016	ani in utsltsik ench an chntsik ani an pakdha tujub: —Ti ku tuchiy ani ti ku china abal yab ti ku chuu xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani abal ki jeka an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna an Ajtiklb, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66006017	Pos in bajmalich xowki ti neech kin pidhna an pulek yajtsiktalb, ani jita neech kin ejto kin kuxuy?
66007001	Ms tayl u chuu ch i tokat abatwletsik kubutsik ban chabl. Jn ebl, jn all, jn xon tu kalel na kts ani jun xon tu ochel na kts. Jech an tokat abatwletsik, kwajat in tamkm an ik abal yab ka waun n w ban chabl, nibal ban pujal ani nibal ban tetsik.
66007002	U chuu jeye jun i tokat abatwle xi tl xon tu kalel na kts ani in kool nin exlixtal na Dios xi ejat. Jech an tokat abatwle in dhjay kawidh ench xi ch an tokat abatwletsik xi pidhnktsik ti awiltalb abal kin atax tajtsitsik an chabl ani an pujal:
66007003	—Yab ka atax tajtsi an chabl, nibal an pujal, nibal an tetsik, asta ki exliy okox bin pkib nin tjontsixiltsik ni Diosil.
66007004	Ani u acha xy nin yanl xi exlidhtsik: buk inik che mil in kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
66007005	Lajuchab mil xi exlidh nin kidhtaltsik na Jud, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Rubn, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Gad,
66007006	lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Aser, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Neftal, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Manass,
66007007	lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Simen, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Leb, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Isakar,
66007008	lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Sabuln, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Jos ani lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn.
66007009	Tam ti watch jech, u tela ani u chuu yn i atiklbtsik. Jechtsik, tl ba putlki an atiklbtsik, ba putlki an kidhtalbtsik, ba putlki an bitsowtsik ani ba ejtalki an kwintalb. Kwajat kubutsik tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios; yn tajat an atiklbtsik ke nibal xita neech kin ejto kin ajay. Xeketlidhtsik kal dhakni ani in teykmtsik i apach.
66007010	Ejtal in ulaltsik kawidh ench: An loeltalb tl ba ni Diosil, xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani ban Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66007011	Ani ejtal an tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kubutsik malill ban tokat kwajtalb ani malill ban yejcheltsik ani ba xi ch jeye xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, tudhlan kututsik asta chabl tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani in kaknatsik na Dios,
66007012	ench tin ulutsik: Anchan ka tjan! Kin bachu an ajtintsixtalb, an jalbintsixtalb ani an kaknaxtalb malill i kij ni Diosil; ani Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb, an chalpadhtalb ani an chplb malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
66007013	Tin konoy tm ench jn ti b an yejcheltsik: —Jitam jtsik p jeye xi j kwajattsik xeketlidh kal dhakni ani jn ti tltsik?
66007014	Nan u utsa ench: —Paylomlb, tat a chob. Ani jaj tin utsa ench: —Jechtsik jaich xin watnmalichtsik an pulek yajtsiktalb, xi tokedhatsichtsik kal tin kwenta tam ti chemdh na Kristo pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Tokedhatsichtsik, jelti jun i tokat dhak kudhkum.
66007015	Jaxtm ti kwajattsik tin tamt nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani in tjontsaltsik akal i kij ban at xon ti Jaj kwajat; neech ka beletntsik kal xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb kom Jaj kwajat kal jajtsik.
66007016	Yabichtsik neech ti kal nibal neech ti tsikl, yabich neech kin achatsik nin yjtsk na kts nibal neech kin achatsik i kitsowtalb,
66007017	pos neech ka beletntsik kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, xi kwajat tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb. Neech ka beletntsik kl jelt xan tu beletnb an borregotsik. Neech ka jntsik kl bin kalemtal i ja xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani neech ka kwitsintsik tin jaml nin wal kal na Dios.
66008001	Tam ti an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in wkoy xin bklb an pajkixtalb, chamkan ejtal t walki. Chejel ora xna chamkan.
66008002	U chuu tm ti pidhan juntsik juntsik ti korneta xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kubutsik tin tamt na Dios.
66008003	Ms tayl, ulich jun i tokat abatwle, in tsidhl jun i ikbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani kubey tin tamt xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jech an tokat abatwle, pidhan yn ti ikob abal kin ikbaxna tam u l ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Jech xon tu l xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, jaich xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb xi tajadh kal i oro, xi ta ti kwajat tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb.
66008004	An paw xu kalel ban ikbaxtalb xin teykm an tokat abatwle, tekey asta xon ti kwajat na Dios junax kal nin lbil xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
66008005	An tokat abatwle in tyna tm an ikbaxtalb, in tsutsiy kal i kalul xi ta ti kwajat xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb ani in petna ban chabl. Tam ti an tokat abatwle in taja jech, tujey ti lamkil an ly an ti pknal an junkil. Julululch ani lwkin an chabl.
66008006	Xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta tin kool juntsik juntsik i korneta, tojojontsik tm abal kin jutsuy.
66008007	Tam ti nin jidhtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, ulich i idhidh b ani kwajlan i kamal xukudh kal i xich xi petn ban chabl. Taay wich junax chejel an chabl junax kal wich jeye junax chejel an tetsik ani ejtal an yax chojltsik.
66008008	Tam ti nin chabtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, petn ban pujal jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i yejche chn jomoml ani wenkon ti xich wich junax chejel an pujal.
66008009	Ani chemech wich junax chejel ejtal xowa waach ban pujal. Pakwat jeye wich junax chejel an pakdha tan.
66008010	Tam ti nin oxtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, kwajlan jun a yejche t jomoml jelti jun i tajbaxtalb. Kwajlan ba wich junax chejel an waljatsik ani ba wich junax chejel xon tu kaleltsik i ja.
66008011	Jech na t in bij Ajenjo, (ti kwintalb tnek, Ajenjo in l kin ulu, tsaiktalb). Kal jech tin kwenta, wich junax chejel an jatsik tsaikm ani yn i atiklbtsik chemech kal tin kwenta abal tsaikm an ja.
66008012	Tam ti nin chetal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, odhyat wich junax chejel na kts, na ch ani na ttsik jeye. Jaxtm ti wich junax chejel na kts yab tajbaxin ani wich junax chejel na ch ani na ttsik yab jeye tajbaxin.
66008013	Tayl u tela ani u acha jun i tokat abatwle ti jumuml junax chejel an walki ani in ulal kawidh ench: —Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl kal tin kwenta an kornetatsik xi neech kin jutsuy xi x an tokat abatwletsik!
66009001	Tam ti nin botal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, u chuu jun a t xi kwajlank chabl. Jachan na t, pidhan tin japb an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk.
66009002	In japiy tm an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk ani kale taja i paw jelt xan tu kalel ba jun i yejche jorna. An paw xu kalel ban owtsiktalb, in jikwchiy na kts ani an kij.
66009003	Ba jachan an paw kale i pichichtsik xu jumuml ban chabl. Jachan an pichichtsik pidhan ti awiltalb jelti an awiltalb xin kool an dhiniytsik.
66009004	Utsantsik abal yab xata kin tajtsi an chojltsik xi waach ban chabl, ni jun xata xowa yaxni nibal an tetsik; tokot an atiklbtsik xi yab exlidh bin pkib kal nin exlixtal na Dios.
66009005	Por yab walkantsik kin chemdha an atiklbtsik, tokot kin yajlombdha tin nakl b a ch. An yajal xin jill tam ka chikxin jachan an pichich, in junwal jelti an yajal xin achl jun xita tam ka chikan kal jun i dhiniy.
66009006	Jachan i kij, an atiklbtsik neech kin lena ka chemech, por yab neech ka chemech; ani maske in ltsik tajat ka chemech, yab neech ka chemech.
66009007	An pichichtsik in junwal jelti bitsimtsik xi kwajatich tojojodh abal an pjxtalb; bin k in kooltsik jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani nin wal in junwal jelt in wal i iniktsik.
66009008	In kooltsik in xil jelt in xil i mmlb ani nin kamab in junwal jelt in kamab i padhum.
66009009	Nin putll nin tul bolidh kal jun i bolixtalb xi jelti i patl ani nin kawdh nin sutsts in junwal jelt in kawdh yn i karrotsik xu kinoknb kal i bitsim tam neechtsik adhik abal ti pjx.
66009010	In kool in ww jelt in ww i dhiniy ani in kool jeye in chikaxtal. Taja ba nin ww, in kooltsik i awiltalb kin yajlombdha an atiklbtsik tin nakl b a ch.
66009011	An pichichtsik in kool jun in oklkil xi jaich an abatwle xi tl ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Jech an abatwle, ti kwintalb ebreo u bijyb, Abadn ani ti kwintalb griego u bijyb, Apolin.
66009012	An jidhtal yajtsiktalb watch, por bl u kibel ka watey chb.
66009013	Tam ti nin akaklb an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, u acha jun i kwintalb xi kale ba chelam xon ti jiltsidh chupitsik xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jech xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb, tajadh kal i oro ani kwajat tin tamt na Dios.
66009014	Ani utsan ench nin akaklb an tokat abatwle xin kool an korneta kal jachan an kwintalb: —Ka walka chelam an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat wikats bin wl an pulek walja xin bij Eufrates.
66009015	Walk tm xi ch an tokat abatwletsik abal kin chemdha wich junax chejel an atiklbtsik, pos jaich ti tojojodh abal jachan i ora, jachan a kts, jachan a ch ani jachan i tamub.
66009016	Ani u acha abal lju inik i miyn nin yanl an soldadojiltsik xi punutsik kal i bitsim.
66009017	Anchan tu chuu ban xalkantsixtalb an bitsimtsik ani xi punattsik taja. An bitsimtsik ani xi punattsik taja, in kool tin tamt jun i dhabuxtalb chakni, asul ani mn. An bitsimtsik in kool in k jelti padhum ani bin wi, u kalel i kamal, i paw ani i asufre.
66009018	Wich junax chejel an atiklbtsik chemdh kal jech x an yajtsiktalb xu kalel bin wi an bitsimtsik: an kamal, an paw ani i asufre.
66009019	Abal nin awiltal jech an bitsimtsik in kool bin wi ani bin ww; pos nin ww jech an bitsimtsik, in kool in k jelti chan ani kl tu yajlombdhaxtsik.
66009020	Por xi jilkon an atiklbtsik, xi yab chemech kal jechtsik an yajtsiktalb, yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. Yab in jilatsik kin kakna an atax ejattalbtsik, an chilabtsik xi tajadh kal i oro, kal i plata, kal i bronse, kal i tujub ani kal i okcha. Jech an chilabtsik, yab u chuux, yab u ochox, nibal u belal.
66009021	Yab jeye in jilatsik ti chemdhax, nibal ti dhimkax, nibal ti kw, nibal ti junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal.
66010001	U chuu tm ti pal walki ba jun i tokow jun i likat tokat abatwle ani b in k, in kool jun i pichal. Nin wal chaxixl jelt a kts ani nin akantsik in junwal jelti kamal.
66010002	In teykm jun i chakam dhutsadh w weladh, in kuba nin ejt akan ban pujal ani nin kwatab akan ban chabl.
66010003	Dhjan tm kawidh jelt xan tu dhajnal jun i padhum ani tam ti dhjan, pkan bkl an junkil.
66010004	Tam ti pknkich bkl an junkil, nechich ku dhutsa xowa u acha in ulu, por u acha jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xi tin utsa ench: —Ka tapa chinat xowa in ulu xi bk an pknaltalb ani yab ka dhutsa.
66010005	An tokat abatwle xu chuu kubat ban pujal ani ban chabl, in dhaya tm tekat nin ejt kubak
66010006	ani in lej tsubax ulu tin bij xi kwajat ejat malill i kij, xin tajm an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach taja, in ulu ench: —Yabich ms neech ka owey;
66010007	pos tam kin bajaw xowki nin bklb an tokat abatwle kin tuju kin jutsuy an korneta, neech tm ka tjanich xowa yab tejwa xin kool chalpadh na Dios, jelt xan ti Jaj tin utsmal nin tiltsxiltsik xi kl tu tjontsb.
66010008	An kwintalb xi tl walki xi nan u achmal, tin tawna jun ani tin utsa ench: —Ki kale ani ka tyna an chakam dhutsadh w xi weladh, xin teykm an tokat abatwle xi kwajat kubat ban chabl ani ban pujal.
66010009	In kale tm ban tokat abatwle ani u kontsi an ti chakam dhutsadh w. Jaj tin utsa ench: —J kwajat ani ka kapu. Ba na wi chiik neech ka acha jelti an chiik, por alkidh ba na tsukul neech ka tsaikm.
66010010	U bachkuntsi tm an tokat abatwle an ti chakam dhutsadh w ani u kapu. Ba nu wi, u acha chiik jelti an chiik, por tam tu kapmalich, tsaikm alkidh ba nu tsukul.
66010011	Tin utsa tm ench: —Yejat ki kale jun ka tiltsi xowa in ulal na Dios, yn i bitsowtsik ani i atiklbtsik. Ejtalki xan tu kw an atiklbtsik ani ka tiltsi jeye an pakdha takix.
66011001	In pidhan tm jun i lejbaxtalb xin junwal jelti jun i te xu lejbaxnb ani in utsan ench: —Ki kale ka lejbay an at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb ani ka ajay xy xu kaknaxtsik taja.
66011002	Por yab ka lejbantsi tin elbil an at xon tu kwajl na Dios, pos jachan, pidhnkich an pl iniktsik. Jech an iniktsik, neech kin odhbijiy an tokat bitsow tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
66011003	Neech ku aba chb u tiltsxil abal ti kin tila tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel, xeketlidhtsik kal i kodhow kudhkum.
66011004	Jech chb an tiltsixtsik, jaich xi chb an olibo ani xi chb in kb an bla xi kwajat tin tamt na Dios xin dhabal an chabl.
66011005	Max u lenb ka atax tajtsintsik kal jun xita, jajtsik in kldhl i kamal bin wi ani in tsikl kl xu tomnaxtsik, pos anchan kool ka chemech xitakichki xi kl tu lenb ka atax tajtsintsik.
66011006	Jech an tiltsixtsik, in kool i awiltalb abal kin taja ke yab ka ulich i b tam ka xechin ti tiltsixtsik. In kooltsik jeye i awiltalb abal kin wenko an ja ti xich ani kin wachindha xowakichki i yajtsiktalb tech ti chabl xyl kin lenatsik.
66011007	Por tam kin okch ti tiltsix jech an tiltsixtsik, neech ka pjeyat kal an atax xi kale ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Neech ka t ani neech ka chemdh an tiltsixtsik.
66011008	Nin tul an tiltsixtsik, neech ka jilkon kwachatsik junax chejel an yejche bitsow. Jech an yejche bitsow, jaich jelti an bitsow xi Sodoma ani xi Ejipto. Ba jech an yejche bitsow, jaich jeye xon ti chemdh ni Ajtik pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
66011009	Tin nakl x a kts kal chejel, neech ka chutsintsik kwachatsik an tin tul kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik xi tech ti chabl ani yab neech kin walkatsik ka jolyat.
66011010	Xu kwajltsik tech ti chabl, neech ka kulbtsik tajat abal in chuu chemdh jech an tiltsixtsik. Neech ka kulbtsik tajat, ke asta neech ti chjwlixtsik jn ani jn; pos abal jajtsik, jachan chb an tiltsixtsik, in junwal jelti max i yajbdhomtalb.
66011011	Por tam ti kidhch x a kts kal chejel, ejdhtsik kal na Dios. Chakaytsik ani jikeytsik tajat ejtal xi kl ti chutattsik.
66011012	Xi jech chb an tiltsixtsik in acha tm jun i kawidh kwintalb t walki xu usnal kl ench: —Ki kadhiytsik tech. Kadhiytsik tm walki ba jun i tokow ani chutattsik xita kl ti tomnadh.
66011013	Tmki jachan, lwkin chapik an chabl, julpan jun peje an bitsow ani chemech buk mil i atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta abal lwkin an chabl. An atiklbtsik xi jilkon, jikeytsik tajat ani in kaknatsik na Dios xi kwajat walki.
66011014	Nin chabtal an yajtsiktalb, watch, por kunat i kij neech ka tujey nin oxtal.
66011015	Tam ti nin bklb an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, achatm i kawidh kwintalbtsik tu walki xin ulal ench: Xo in bajch xowki an Okxlb ani an Kristo neech ti takixich ban chabl xon tu takix an iniktsik; ani Jaj neech ti takix malill i kij.
66011016	Xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, xi ta ti buxutsik bin tokat kwajtaltsik tin tamt na Dios, tudhlan kututsik asta chabl, in kaknatsik na Dios,
66011017	ani in ulutsik ench: Tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb, Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij, pos a xalkmalich na pulek chp ani a tujmalich ta takix.
66011018	Ejtal an atiklbtsik chakunek, por in bajmalich an kij xowki Tat neech ka pidhna an ti yajtsiktalb, xowki jeye neech ka ljundha an chemlomtsik ani xowki neech ka pidha na tiltsxiltsik xowa in tmal abal ti tjontsmaltsik. Xowki jeye neech ka pidha xowa in tmal xu dhabalbichtsik kal Tat ani xita ti kaknantsal an ta bij, tsitsik ani pakdha. In bajmalich jeye an kij xowki neech ka kibdhatsik xin atax tajtsaltsik an chabl.
66011019	Japyat tm t walki an at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani xalkan nin tapb nin lejkintalbil xi ta ti kwajat ban at xon ti Jaj u kwajl. Lamkin tm i ly, pkan i junkil, achatm i kwintalbtsik, lwkin an chabl ani ulich jun i chapik idhidh b.
66012001	Xalkan tm walki jun i exl plek: jun i mmlb xin kool in xekt jelt a kts, kubat ba na ch, in kojm jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani jachan an kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb, in kool lajuchb a t.
66012002	Jech an mmlb, kwajat kodh ani u dhajnal abal in achlich i chukuxtalb, kom nechich kin wachiy an chakam.
66012003	Xalkan tm jun walki t i exl: jun i yejche aknidh chan xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn xin kool bk in k, lju in ichm ani in kojm juntsik i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ba juntsik nin k.
66012004	In bodhoy kal nin ww wich junax chejel na ttsik xi kwajat walki ani in petna ban chabl. Jech an yejche aknidh chan, kubey tin tamt an mmlb xi wich kin wachiy an chakam. In taja anchan abal in l kin kaptsi an tin chakmil tokot kin wachiy.
66012005	An mmlb in wachiy jun i chakam kwitl, xi neech kin chapik takiy ejtal an atiklbtsik. Tayl, kntsin an tin chakmil ani jntsin ba na Dios xon ti buxl bin tokat kwajtal;
66012006	ani an mmlb jlch abal ka kale ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, xon ti tojojontsidh kal na Dios abal ka beletn taja tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
66012007	Wachin tm jun i pjxtalb t walki, xon ti an oklek tokat abatwle Miguel ani nin tokat abatwlejiltsik kwajay ti pjx kal an yejche aknidh chan. An yejche aknidh chan ani nin tjontsixiltsik pjexin,
66012008	por yab in ejtotsik kin ta an pjxtalb ani nibalich wachin ejtidh t walki abal jajtsik.
66012009	Petn tm elb an yejche aknidh chan. Jech jaich an weje yejche chan xu bijyb ti lej atax ani ta Satans, xin kambiyal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Jaj ani nin tjontsixiltsik, petntsik ban chabl.
66012010	U acha tm jun i kwintalb kawidh t walki, xu kw in ulal ench: —Xo in bajch xowki na Dios neech kin xalka ke Jaj nu loox, Jaj nu takix ani in kool in chp abal kin taja xowakich. In xalkmalich jeye ke na Kristo in kool i awiltalb. Pos petnadhich elb an lej atax, xi kl tu walbindhb ni at kidhbtsik akal i kij tin tamt ni Diosil.
66012011	tadhich kal ni at kidhbtsik kal tin kwentaki nin xichl an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios ani kal tin kwentaki jeye an tsubaxtalb xin tilmaltsik. Yab in ajymaltsik tinb maske ka chemdh tam ti xechintsik kin tila jech an tsubaxtalb.
66012012	Jaxtm, ki kulbtsik ejtal xi kwajat walki. Por chojontl a chubltsik xi kwajat ban chabl ani ban pujal! Pos an lej atax petnadh asta xon ta kwajattsik ani u chakl tajat kom in chob abal yabich nakat i kij neech ka kwajay.
66012013	Tam ti an yejche aknidh chan in chuu abal petn chabl, in kajna an mmlb xin wachiymal an chakam kwitl.
66012014	Por an mmlb pidhan chb tin pakdha sutsts jelti nin sutsts i tw abal kin ejto ka jumun ani ka kale asta ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, xon ti yab ka bajwat kal an yejche aknidh chan. Taja neech ka beletn tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
66012015	In kldha tm i ja bin wi an yejche aknidh chan abal kin taja jun i walja ani ka jn kl an mmlb;
66012016	por tolmiyat an mmlb kal an chabl, pos jakpin an chabl ani in kutu an walja xin kldhmal bin wi an yejche aknidh chan.
66012017	Tam ti an yejche aknidh chan in chuu anchan, in chakuntsi tajat an mmlb ani kale kin pjey nin kidhtal an mmlb. Jech nin kidhtaltsik an mmlb, jaich xin tajltsik xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios ani in wewkmtsik an tsubaxtalb xin tilmal na Jesukristo.
66013001	In kubey bin wl an pujal ani u chuu ti kalel ban pujal jun i atax xin kool bk in k ani lju in ichm. Ba juntsik in ichm in kool juntsik i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani bin ktsik in kool jun i odhbijixtalb abal a Dios.
66013002	Jech an atax xu chuu, in junwal jelti padhum ani nin akan, in junwal jelt in akan i oso. An yejche aknidh chan, in watbantsi jech an atax ti chplb ani ti kwajtalb xi jajwiik in kool. In pidha jeye ti awiltalb plek.
66013003	Ba jun in k jachan an atax, in kool jun i chojbdhaxtalb xi jelti max neech ka chemdh kl; por jachan an chojbdhaxtalb jeldhantsat ani ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl, labantsik ani in wwna an atax.
66013004	Kakn an yejche aknidh chan xin pidhmal ti awiltalb jachan an atax ani kakn jeye an atax. Ench tin ulutsik: —Jita waach in junwal jelti jech an atax ani jita neech kin ejto kin tomna?
66013005	Walk jeye kin ulu an atax ejtal xowa yab alwa ani i odhbijixtalb abal a Dios ani kin koy i awiltalb tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
66013006	Anchan tin taja, in odhbijiy na Dios, in odhbijtsi xon tu kwajl na Dios ani in odhbijiy jeye ejtal xi kwajattsik walki.
66013007	Walk kin pjey xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani kin tatsik. Pidhan ti awiltalb abal kin takiy ejtal an kidhtalbtsik, an bitsowtsik ani an atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalb in kooltsik.
66013008	Jachan an atax, kakn kal ejtalki xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi yabtsik kwajat dhutsadh nin bij asta ti tujenek an kayl bin dhutsadh wil an Ajtiklb. Jech an Ajtiklb, jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios ani jaich jeye xi chemdh.
66013009	Max jun xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay.
66013010	Xita in nedhl keet ti wiknl, neech jeye ti wiknl. Ani xita u chemdhax kal i macht, kal i macht jeye neech ka chemdh. Techich ti neech ka xalkan max tsubax lejtal tu belom ani max neech kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
66013011	Tayl u chuu jun t i atax xi kwajat ti kalel ban chabl. Jech an atax, in kool chb in ichm jelt in ichm i borrego, por u kw jelti jun i yejche aknidh chan.
66013012	In kool jeye ejtal an awiltalb jelti xin kool xi jidhtal an atax ani in tajl ka kakn an jidhtal atax kal ejtal xu kwajltsik ban chabl. Jech an jidhtal atax, jaich xi jeley kal an chojbdhaxtalb xin koolwiik.
66013013	In tajl jeye i pakdha labidh exl tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani asta in tajl ka kwajlan chabl i kamal xi tl walki.
66013014	Kal jech an exltsik xu walkb kin taja tin tamt xi jidhtal an atax, in kambiyal xu kwajltsik ban chabl ani in utsl kin tajtsi jun in chilbil jachan an atax xin koolwiik jun i chojbdhaxtalb bin k ani jeley.
66013015	Nin chabtal an atax, pidhan ti awiltalb kin ejdhantsi tin chilbil an jidhtal atax abal ka kwin ani kin taja ka chemdh ejtal xi yab u kaknb kl.
66013016	Ani yab tokot jki jech in taja, in taja jeye ke ejtalki, tsitsik ani pakdha, xi tumnladhtsik ani xi chojontltsik, xu jolibtsik ani xi yaba, ka kwajbantsattsik jun i exl bin ejt kubak o bin pkib.
66013017	Ani ke yab xita kin ejto ti chaum nibal ti njul max yab in kool an exl o nin bij an atax o nin ajumtal nin bij.
66013018	Jech in l tajat i chalpadhtalb; xita xin exbayal, kin exbantsi tin ajumtal nin bij an atax. Nin ajumtal nin bij, jaychki an ajumtalb xin ynl an iniktsik. Nin ajumtal jaich jech: akak i bo inik kal ox inik akak.
66014001	Tayl u tela jun ani u chuu kubl ban chn xu bijyb Sin an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios. T ti kwajat kal Jaj buk inik che mil i atiklbtsik xin kool dhutsadh bin pkib nin bij an Ajtiklb ani nin bij nin Tta.
66014002	Tayl u acha jun i kwintalb xi tl walki, xin junwal jelt xan tu bososl yn i walja ani jelt xan tu julull kawidh i junkil. In junwal jelti tam yn xita in tenyal i sn.
66014003	In ajatnltsik jun i t ajatlb tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, tin tamt xi ta ti kwajat ch ejattsik ani tin tamt an yejcheltsik. Yab xita in ejtowal kin wita jech an t ajatlb, tokot xi buk inik che mil xi kwajattsikwiik jeye ban chabl ani xo loodhich.
66014004	Jech jaich xi yabtsik in kaknmal i chilabtsik, tokattsik ani in wwnltsik an Ajtiklb xontiki ka kale. Loodhichtsik ban atiklbtsik abal ka kwajay jelti jidhtal wallb abal ka dhabalnjichtsik kal na Dios ani kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66014005	Yabtsik eltsin ni jun i kambixtalb, tokattsik tin tamt na Dios.
66014006	U chuu tm jun i tokat abatwle ti jumuml chejel walki ani ta tin kool an alwa tilab xi yab in kool in okontal abal kin ltsi xu kwajltsik ban chabl, ejtal an kidhtalbtsik, an bitsowtsik ani an atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalbtsik in kool.
66014007	Ani kawidh in ulal ench: —Ka jiknatsik na Dios ani ka kakna, pos in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhax. Ka kaknatsik xin tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani xon tu kaleltsik an ja.
66014008	Tin kuxmats, tsch jun t i tokat abatwle xin ulu ench: —Kwajlanich, kwajlanich an yejche bitsow xin bij Babilonia abal junkunk kal ejtal an atiklbtsik abal kin taja xowakich xi yab alwa.
66014009	Tayl kwin jun jun i tokat abatwle xi jaich in oxtal ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Max jun xita kin kakna an atax, kin kaknantsi an tin chilbil ani kin walka ka kwajbantsat an ti exl bin pkib o bin kubak,
66014010	kool kin acha an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna na Dios, xin koolich tojojodh. Neech ka yajlombdhtsik kal i kamal ani i asufre tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios ani tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66014011	An paw xu kalel xon ti neech ka yajlombdhtsik, yab jayki neech kin koy in okontal. Akal i kij yab jayki neech ka koych kin achatsik an yajtsiktalb xin kaknltsik an atax ani nin chilbil o xin kooltsik nin exlixtal an atax.
66014012	Techich ti neech ka xalkan max tsubax lejtal ti neech kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich, xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xi yabtsik in chikat tajtsal tin takixtal ani xin belltsik na Jess.
66014013	U acha tm jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xi tin utsl ench: —Ka dhutsa jech: “Kijidh tajat xi xo ani tayl ka chemechtsik in bell an Ajtiklb.” An Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Ani, pos neech ka koychich kin tjontsi na Dios tech ti chabl ani ejtal xowa in tajmaltsik abal na Dios, neech kin chuutsik.
66014014	U tela tm ani u chuu jun i dhak tokow; bin b an dhak tokow, ta ti buxl jun i inik. Jech an inik, in kojm jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani in teykm jun i kuchl wiidh patl.
66014015	Kale tm jun i tokat abatwle ban at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani in utsa kawidh ench xi ta ti buxl bin b an tokow: —Ka ynaich an kuchl wiidh patl ani ka kotsch tin wall an tayablb; pos in bajch an kij ani an wallb xi waach ban chabl, yejnekich. An atiklbtsik xin belmal na Jesukristo, jaich jelti an wallb xi neech ka junkuwat.
66014016	Xi ta ti buxl bin b an tokow, in yna tm nin kuchl wiidh patlil ani in junku nin wall an tayablb xi waach ban chabl.
66014017	Kale tm jun t i tokat abatwle t walki ban at xon tu kwajl na Dios in teykm jeye jun i kuchl wiidh patl.
66014018	Kale jeye keet i tokat abatwle xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, xin kool i awiltalb kal i kamal. Jech an tokat abatwle, in utsa kawidh ench xin teykm an kuchl wiidh patl: —Ka ynaich an kuchl wiidh patl ani ka kotsch tin wall an uba xi waach ban chabl, pos an wallb wejnekich.
66014019	An tokat abatwle in yna an kuchl wiidh patl, in kotsi tin wall an uba xi waach ban chabl ani in baliy ba jun i yejche balixtalb abal ka watyat. Anchan jelt xan ti neech ka tajtsin an atiklbtsik kal na Dios tam ka abtsin an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb.
66014020	An uba yab watyat taja ban bitsow, elb bitsow ti watyat. Ban yejche balixtalb kale i xich, nin wtsk an xich in bajaw asta bin wi an bitsim ani nin chikwl, x i bo inik i kilmetro.
66015001	U chuu jun walki jun i exl plek ani labidh: u chuu bk i tokat abatwletsik xin tsidhl xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tin okontal, pos kal jachan, kl tu oknalich nin chkub na Dios.
66015002	U chuu jeye jun xata xin junwal jelti pujal xi jyki i lam xukudh kal i kamal. Tin wl jech, ta ti kubutsik in teykm i sn xi pidhnktsik kal na Dios, xi yabtsik in kaknmal an atax, yab in kaknantsmal tin chilbil nibal in walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin ajumtal nin bij an atax.
66015003	Ani in ajatnltsik nin ajatlbil na Moiss nin tjontsixil na Dios ani nin ajatlbil jeye an Ajtiklb xin ulal ench: Pakdha ani labidh tajat xowa a tajmal, Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja; lujat ani tsubax ejtal xowa a tajl, Pulek Takxal an atiklbtsik.
66015004	Jita yab neech ti ki jikna, Okxlb? Jita yab neech ti ki kaknantsi an ta bij? Pos tokot Tat ni tokat, neech ka tsch ejtal an atiklbtsik ani neech ti ki kakna, pos xalkankich abal ejtal xowa a tajmal, lujat tajat.
66015005	Tam ti watch jech, u tela ani u chuu t walki ti japyat an alt xon ti kwajat tapadh an lemdha tujub xon ti dhutsadh an takixtalb.
66015006	Ba jech an alt, taja ti kale xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xin tsidhltsik xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb. Jech an tokat abatwletsik, xeketlidhtsik kal i alwa tokat kudhkum xi chaxixl ani in wkmtsik tin tamt i wikaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.
66015007	Jn ti b xi ch ta ti kwajattsik ejat, in pidha tm xi bk an tokat abatwletsik juntsik ti lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna na Dios xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.
66015008	An alt xon ti kaletsik xi bk an tokat abatwle, tsutsich kal i paw xi tl bin labidh tokt ani bin chp na Dios. Yab xita in ejtowal ka ochich ba jech an alt, asta ka okon okox xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi ta tin kool xi bk an tokat abatwletsik.
66016001	U acha tm jun i kwintalb kawidh xi kale ban alt xon ti kalnek xi bk an tokat abatwletsik ani utsan ench xi jech bk an tokat abatwle: —Ki kaletsik ani ka jolo ban chabl an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi kwajat balidh ba xi bk an lejab. Jech an kakadh yajtsiktalb, jaich xi tl ba na Dios.
66016002	Kale xi jidhtal an tokat abatwle ani in jolo an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi ta ti kwajat balidh ban lejab. Tam ti an tokat abatwle in taja jech, ejtal an atiklbtsik xin kool nin exlixtal an atax ani in kaknantsal an tin chilbil, in koytsik i atax tt xi yab u jell ani yajtsik.
66016003	Xin chblb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban pujal xowa ta ti balidh ban lejab ani an ja wenkon ti xich jelt in xichl i chemlom. Ejtal xowakich xi ta ti kwajat ejat ban ja, chemechtsik.
66016004	Xin xlb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban waljatsik ani xon tu kaleltsik an ja xowa ta ti balidh ban lejab ani an jatsik xi waach taja wenkon ti xich.
66016005	U acha tm tin ulu ench an tokat abatwle xin belkm an ja: —Okxlb, i lujat tajat abal anchan ta taja, tokat Okxlb, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.
66016006	Kom in chemdhmaltsik xu dhabalbich kal Tat ani na tiltsxiltsik jeye, xo a tajmalichtsik kin ucha i xich, pos anchan tin tomnl ka tajtsintsik.
66016007	U acha jeye ti kwin jun xita asta xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb xin ulu ench: —Aniich Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, Tat i ljundhax in tsubtalki ani in lujtalki.
66016008	Xin chlb an tokat abatwle in jolo ba na kts xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani pidhan ti awiltalb na kts kin tsika an atiklbtsik kal i kamal.
66016009	Ejtal an atiklbtsik tsikantsik tajat, por yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. Yabtsik in kakna na Dios xin kool i awiltalb ba jech an kakadh yajtsiktalbtsik, in odhbijiy tokot.
66016010	Xin blb an tokat abatwle in jolo bin kwajtal an atax xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani jikwchin xon tu takix an atax. An atiklbtsik in katwaltsik nin lekb kal i yajal,
66016011	por nibal anchan yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. In odhbijiytsik tokot na Dios xi kwajat walki kal tin kwenta an yajal xin achltsik ani kal an tt xin kooltsik.
66016012	Nin akaklb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban yejche walja Eufrates xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani an ja xi ta ti kwajat taja, dhikey abal ka tjan jun i bl ani ka watey taja an pakdha takix xi tl in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts.
66016013	U chuu tm ti kalel bin wi an yejche aknidh chan, bin wi an atax ani bin wi an kambix tiltsix, x i atax ejattalbtsik xin junwal jelti kwa.
66016014	Jech jaich in ejattal i ataxtsik xin ejtowal kin taja i labidh exltsik. Ani kaletsik kin junku ejtal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl abal ti pjxtsik tam kin bajaw an kij kal na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
66016015	“Ka achatsik, Nan neech kin tsch jun jiktowle jelti jun i kw. Kijidh tajat abal xita ku ela tin bell ani tokat nin ejattal, pos yab neech ku ela jelti max chilim ani yab neech ka tidheb.”
66016016	Ani junkuwat an pakdha takix ban chn xu bijyb Armajedn.
66016017	Nin bklb an tokat abatwle in jolo al ik xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani achatm jun i kawidh kwintalb ban at xon ti kwajat nin tokat kwajtal na Dios xin ulu ench: —Okonich ti tjnal.
66016018	Tujey tm ti lamkil i ly, achatm i kwintalbtsik, pkan i junkil ani lwkin chapik an chabl jelt xan ti yab jayki lwknk asta ti wachink an atiklbtsik ban chabl.
66016019	An yejche bitsow pejkan ti x i peje ani an bitsowtsik xi ban kayl, julpan. Na Dios in chalpay an yejche bitsow xin bij Babilonia abal kin taja kin watna ejtal an kakadh yajtsiktalb xin abtsi kal nin chkub.
66016020	Ejtal an tsitsik chabl xi kwajat ba ja, kibchon ani an chntsik, yab elan.
66016021	Ulich jeye i pakdha idhidh b xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik. Nin lm juntsik an idhidh b, chab inik xna i kilo. An atiklbtsik in odhbijiy na Dios kal tin kwenta an kakadh idhidh b, pos jech, jaich jun i yejche kakadh yajtsiktalb.
66017001	Tsch tm jn ti b xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta tin kooltsik xi bk an lejab ani tin utsa ench: —Jala ani neech tu ltsi an ti yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an yejche bitsow Babilonia. Jech an bitsow, in junwal jelti jun i junkux inik uxum, xi buxl tin b yn i ja.
66017002	Jelti jun i junkux inik uxum, anchan jeye ti junkunk jech an bitsow kal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl abal kin tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Ani an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl ukpindhtsik jeye kal an walastalb xin tajltsik jech an bitsow ani an pakdha takix.
66017003	Ban xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidha ku chuu an Tokat Ejattalb, in jn kal an tokat abatwle ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Taja, u chuu jun i uxum punat ba jun i atax xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Jech an atax, in kool bk in k, lju in ichm ani in kool dhutsadh ba putlki in tul i odhbijixtalbtsik abal a Dios.
66017004	Jech an uxum xeketlidh kal i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani in kool in kwajbaxtal xi tajadh kal i oro, xi tajadh kal i labidh tujubtsik ani kal i perlatsik. In teykm jun i lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal xowa in atl na Dios ani kal an ataxtalb xin tajmal an uxum.
66017005	In kool jeye dhutsadh bin pkib jun i bijlb xi yab tajat exbantl: “An yejche bitsow Babilonia, xi kwajat jelti nin nna an junkux inik uxumtsik ani xowa atax tech ti chabl.”
66017006	Tayl u chuu abal jachan an uxum jelti max u itel kal nin xichl xi chemdhatstsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani xin tilmaltsik na Jess. Tam tu chuu jech, in laban tajat.
66017007	Tin utsa tm ench an tokat abatwle: —Jantki ta labnk? Neech tu ltsi xanty in l kin ulu jech an uxum ani an atax xin pnm, xin kool bk in k ani lju in ichm.
66017008	An atax xa chuu, jaich jn xi ejatwiik, por xo yabich; por blki neech ka kale ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk abal ka petnjich ban kibeltalb. Xu kwajltsik ban chabl, xi yabtsik kwajat dhutsadh nin bij ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi neechtsik kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, neech ka labantsik tam kin chuu jachan an atax xi ejatwiik ani xo yabich ejat, por ejech jun. Jech an atiklbtsik, yab kwajat dhutsadh nin bij ban dhutsadh w, asta tam ti tujenek an kayl.
66017009	Jech kwajat jun xata abal xita kin ejto kin exbay: Xi bk in k an atax, in l kin ulu bk i chn xon ti buxl jachan an uxum;
66017010	ani in l jeye kin ulu bk i pakdha takix. B xi jachan an pakdha takix oknkich ti takix, jn, jaich xi xo kwajat ti takix ani xi jn, yabl in bajmal an kij xowki neech ti takix. Por tam ka takxinich xi bl u kibel, yab neech ti takix nakat i kij.
66017011	An atax xi ejatwiik ani xo yabich, jaich in waxiklb an pakdha takix; ani jaich jeye jn ti b xi bk an takixtsik xi neech ka petn ban kibeltalb.
66017012	Xi lju in ichm an atax xa chumal, in l kin ulu lju i pakdha takix xi yabl in tujmal ti takix; por neech ka pidhan ti awiltalb abal ti takix jun ora, jelt xan tu takix an pakdha takix. Neech ti takixtsik junax kal an atax.
66017013	Jech lju an pakdha takix, junini tin kooltsik nin chalab ani neech kin watbantsitsik an atax an ti chplb ani an ti awiltalb xi jajtsik in kool.
66017014	Neech ti pjxtsik kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, por neech ka ttsik kal an Ajtiklb; pos Jaj, jaich in Ajtik an ajtiklbtsik ani in Pulek Takxal an pakdha takix. Xi kwajattsik kal an Ajtiklb, kanidhtsik ani takudhtsik kal a Dios ani lujattsik.
66017015	Tin utsa jeye ench an tokat abatwle: —An ja xa chumal, xon ti buxl jachan an uxum, i bitsowtsik, yn i atiklbtsik ani i atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalbtsik in kool.
66017016	Xi lju an ichamtsik xa chuu ani an atax, neech ka pojk kl jachan an uxum ani neech ka jilan walbadh ani chilim. Neech ka kaptsin an tin tul ani neech ka tsikan.
66017017	Kwajbantsidhtsik bin ejattal kal na Dios abal kin tajatsik xowa Jaj in l. In tajmtsik i kw abal kin pidha ti awiltalb an atax ka takxin asta ka tjan xowa in ulmal na Dios.
66017018	An uxum xa chuu, jaich an yejche bitsow xin takyal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl.
66018001	Tam ti watch jech, u chuu jun jun i tokat abatwle ti pal walki kal yantam i awiltalb ani in tajbay an chabl kal nin tajx.
66018002	Ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Pakwatich, pakwatich, an yejche bitsow Babilonia, xi wenkodhich tin kim i atax ejattalbtsik, tin chinkontal xowakich i atax ejattalbtsik ani tin pkw i chichintsik xi atax.
66018003	Abal ejtal an atiklbtsik, ukpindhats kal an walastalb xin tajl; an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl, in wwnmaltsik xowa yab alwa in tajl ani an njultsik xi kwajat ban chabl tumnladhnktsik kal xowa in pakwal yab exbadh jachan an yejche bitsow.
66018004	U acha tm jun jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xin ulal ench: —Ki kaletsik ba jachan an bitsow, tattsik xi Nan tu dhabal, abal yab ki walbintsik kal nin walab nibal ka bachutsik an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachutsik.
66018005	Pos nin walabtsik jachan an yejche bitsow, yanenekich tajat ani in bajmalich asta walki. Jaxtm na Dios ti neech kin pidha ti kakadh yajtsiktalb abal yanenekich tajat ni walab.
66018006	Ka tajtsi jachan an yejche bitsow anlki xan tin tajtsmal xi keettsik ani chbl ti ka tajtsi xowa in tajmal. Chbl ti ka tajtsin an ti yajtsiktalb xowa in tajtsmaltsik keet.
66018007	Kom jaj in tekmal tajat tinb ani kwajinek xan ti jaj in lenmal, ka pidhan ti yajtsiktalb ani ka ukindh, pos jaj in ulal ench tin itsch: “Tech in buxl jelti jun i pulek takix mmlb, yab in chemtsidh nibal neech ku acha i tepintalb.”
66018008	Jaxtm, junki a kts ti neech kin chuu ejtal jech an kakadh yajtsiktalb: an cheml, an tepintalb ani an kanab. Neech ka tsikan, pos ejtal in ejtowal kin taja na Dios an Okxlb, xi kl ti bijtsidh xowa neech kin tamu jech an yejche bitsow.
66018009	An pakdha takix xin wwnmaltsik xowa yab alwa in tajl jachan an bitsow ani kwajinektsik xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnmal, neech kin ukintsi ani neech kin tepintsi tam kin chutsi an tin pawil tam exom ti tal.
66018010	Neech kin w telaki abal in jiknltsik an yajtsiktalb xi exom in tamwal jech an yejche bitsow ani neech kin ulutsik ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow Babilonia xi likat tajat! Pos jnki a kts ti pidhan ejtal xowa bijtsidh neech kin tamu.
66018011	An njultsik xi kwajat ban chabl, neech kin ukintsi ani kin tepintsi jech an bitsow abal yabich neech ka wachin xita kl ti ka chaytsintsik an tin nujwl.
66018012	Xowa in nujwaltsik, jaich an oro, an plata, an labidh tujubtsik, an perla, an alwa kudhkumtsik xi biliy, an kudhkum xi tajadh kal i seda, xi chakni ani xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Ejtal jeye an tetsik xi niwiy, ejtal xowa tajadh kal i marfl, xowa tajadh kal i tetsik xi labidh. Xowa tajadh jeye kal i patl xin bij bronse ani kal i tujub xin bij mrmol.
66018013	In nujwaltsik jeye i kanela, xowakich i chojltsik xi niwiy, i ikob, i mirra, i niwiytalbtsik, i yajtsik uxnl, i asyte, i trigo xi cheedh ani xi putdha. In nujwaltsik jeye i konltsik xu kitandhb, i borregotsik, i bitsim, i karreta ani in nujwaltsik jeye i iniktsik abal ti jolib.
66018014	Neech kin utsatsik ench jachan an yejche bitsow: —Ejtal xowa a kulbetnl, xo yabich a kool ani ejtal xowa alwa ani labidh xa kymal, xo yabich ms jayki neech ka koy.
66018015	An njultsik xin nujmal ejtal jech ani tumnladhnktsik abal njlmadhtsik ba jech an yejche bitsow, neech kin w telaki abal in jiknltsik an yajtsiktalb xi exom in tamwal jech an yejche bitsow, neechtsik kin ukintsi ani kin tepintsi.
66018016	Neech kin ulutsik ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow! Xin junwalwiik jelti jun i mmlb xi xeketlidh kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy ani chakni, ani xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Xin kool jeye i kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro, kal i labidh tujubtsik ani kal i perla;
66018017	abal jnki a kts ti kibchon ejtal xowa kajbidh in jalbl xin koolwiik! Ejtal xu beldhomtsik an ti pakdha tan, an bitswlomtsik xi neech ban tan, xu tojnaltsik ban tan ani ejtal xu tojnaltsik ban pujal, wmtsik.
66018018	Tam tin chutsitsik an tin pawil jech an yejche bitsow tam ti exom ti tal, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jowa bitsow waach xi neech kin junu jelti jech an yejche bitsow?
66018019	In mujtsitsik ti pojodh in k abal kin xalka ke u tepinaltsik, ukintsik, tepintsik ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow! Pos kal an tumn xi waachwiik taja, tumnladhnktsik xin kool an pakdha tan ban pujal. Ani jnki a kts ti pakwat jech an yejche bitsow!
66018020	Por tattsik xi kwajat walki, xi dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, abatwletsik ani tiltsixtsik, ki kulbtsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tamu jech an yejche bitsow, pos na Dios in tajaich kin jalbiy xowa ti tajtsmaltsik jech an yejche bitsow.
66018021	Jun i likat tokat abatwle in dhaya tm jun i tujub, xin junwal jelti jun i yejche cha tujub, in petna ban pujal ani in ulu ench: —Anchan jeye ti neech ka petn an yejche bitsow Babilonia ani yab ms jayki neech ka witsiy ka chutat.
66018022	Yab ms jayki neech ka achatm ba jech an yejche bitsow ti tenyb an sn, ti jutsyb an chl ani an kornetatsik. Nibal ms neech ka wachin ba jech an yejche bitsow i tojnaltsik, nibal neech ka achatm an cha tujub ti chenb.
66018023	Yabich neech ka tajkan i kamal ba jech an yejche bitsow, nibal ms neech ka achatm ti tajnal i ajib jelti xu tajnal tam waach i tomkixtalb. Pos an njultsik xi njlmadhtsik tachan, jaichwiik xi ms tumnladhtsik tajat xi waach ban kayl ani a kambiymal ejtal an atiklbtsik kal na kambixtal.
66018024	Ba jech an yejche bitsow chemdhats xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, i tiltsixtsik ani ejtal xi chemdhatstsik ban kayl.
66019001	Tam ti watch ejtal jech, u acha t walki jun i kawidh kwintalb jelt in kwintal yn i atiklbtsik xin ulal ench: Aleluya! An loeltalb, an labidh tokattalb ani an chplb, ni Diosil in dhabal,
66019002	pos Jaj in lujtalki tu ljundhax ani in tsubtalki. In pidha xowa in lujyal kin bachu an yejche bitsow Babilonia xin junwal jelti jun i yejche junkux inik uxum. Jech an yejche bitsow, in walbindhm an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl kal an walastalb xi jaj in tajmal. Tajan kin jalbiy kal ni Diosil jech an yejche bitsow, nin chemtal nin tjontsixiltsik na Dios.
66019003	In ulutsik jeye ench: —Aleluya! An paw xu bolill tam exom ti tal jech an yejche bitsow, yab jayki neech ka kublan ti bolill.
66019004	Xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik ani xi ch jeye ta ti kwajattsik ejat, tudhlan tm kututsik asta chabl, in kaknatsik na Dios xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani in ulaltsik ench: —Aleluya! Anchan ka tjan!
66019005	Achatm tm jun i kwintalb xi kale ban tokat kwajtalb xin ulu ench: Ka kaknatsik ni Diosil, ejtal tattsik xa tjontsal ani xa jiknltsik, tsitsik ani pakdha.
66019006	U acha jeye jelt in kwintal yn i atiklbtsik, jelt xan tu bososl yn i waljatsik ani jelti tam u pknal kawidh i junkil xin ulaltsik ench: Aleluya! In tujch ti takix an Okxlb, ni Diosil xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
66019007	Ku kulbch xo, ku kijidhmch ani ki kakna an Okxlb, pos in bajmalich an kij xowki an Ajtiklb ti neech kin utch kal Jaj an belomtsik jelt xan ti jun i kwitl u tomkinalich kal jun i tsidhan. An belomtsik, kwajatich tojojodh abal ka kwajay kal an Ajtiklb;
66019008	ani pidhnkich ka xeketlin kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy, tokat ani chaxixl.  Pos an alwa kudhkum xi biliy, in l kin ulu nin lujat xechintal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
66019009	Tin utsa tm ench an tokat abatwle: —Ka dhutsa ench: “Kijidh tajat abal xita xi kanidhtsik ban ajib tam an Ajtiklb kin utch an belomtsik abal ka kwajch kal Jaj.” Ani tin utsa jeye ench: —Jech jaich tsubax in kwintal a Dios.
66019010	In tudhlan tin tamt an tokat abatwle abal ku kakna, por jaj tin utsa ench: —Yab ka taja anchan; pos nan u tjontsalki neye na Dios jelti tat ani na at kidhbtsik xin belltsik xowa in lnmal na Jess. Tokotki na Dios ka kakna. Jachan an tsubaxtalb xowa in lnmal na Jess, jaich kl tu ijtsinal an tiltsixtsik.
66019011	U chuu tm jebl an walki ani xalkan jun i dhak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat taja, in bij Lujat ani Tsubax, kom Jaj in lujtalki tu ljundhom ani tu pjx.
66019012	Nin wal chaxixl tajat jelti an kamal, yn i kwetsotsik kwajbaxtalb in kwajbm bin k ani ta tin kool dhutsadh jun i bijlb xi tokotki Jaj in exll.
66019013	Xeketlidh kal jun i xeketlb xi choodh tajat kal i xich ani u bijyb tin Kwintal a Dios.
66019014	Wewkmte kal yn i soldadotsik xi tl walki, xeketlidhtsik kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy, dhakni ani tokat ani punutsik kal i dhak bitsim.
66019015	Bin wi u kalel jun i wiidh macht abal kin takiy kl an atiklbtsik xi kl tu tomnb ani neech ti chapik takix. Jaj neech kin ljundhatsik jelt xan tin tajl an wtil uba xin watyal kal in akan ani neech kin taja kin watnatsik an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tl bin chkub na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
66019016	Ani bin eblidh kudhkumil ani bin chejet, in nedhl dhutsadh jech an bijlb: “In Pulek Takxal i pakdha takix ani in Ajtik i ajtiklbtsik.”
66019017	U chuu tm jun jun i tokat abatwle xi ta ti kubat ba kts ani in utsa kawidh ench ejtal an chichintsik xi xeech ti jumuml: —Jala ani ki junkuntsik abal ta kapul ban kapxnich xi neech kin taja na Dios.
66019018	Abal ka kaptsitsik tin tul i pakdha takix, i oklek soldadotsik ani i likdha iniktsik. Abal ka kaptsitsik jeye tin tul i bitsim ani xi punattsik taja. Nin tul jeye i jolibtsik ani xi yaba; xi tsitsik ani xi pakdha.
66019019	U chuu tm an atax ani an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl kl nin soldadojiltsik, xi junkunktsik abal kin pjey xin pnm an dhak bitsim ani nin soldadojiltsik.
66019020	Yakwan an atax junax kal jachan an kambix tiltsix xin tajmal i labidh exltsik tin tamt jech an atax. Kal tin kwenta an exltsik xin tajm, an kambix tiltsix in kambiymal xin walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin exlixtal an atax ani in kaknantsmal tin chilbil. An atax ani an kambix tiltsix, petntsik ejat ban kamal xi kwajat jomoml xukudh kal i asufre.
66019021	Xi ms, chemdhtsik kal an macht xu kalel bin wi xin pnm an dhak bitsim ani ejtal an chichintsik, ajw kal nin tul xi chemdhtsik.
66020001	Tayl u chuu ti pal walki jun i tokat abatwle xin tsidhl an japixtalb abal kin japiy an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk ani in teykm jun i yejche patl.
66020002	Jech an tokat abatwle in yakwa an yejche aknidh chan, xi jaich an weje chan xu bijyb ti lej atax ani ta Satans ani in wika kal an patl tin nakl mil i tamub.
66020003	An tokat abatwle in petna an yejche aknidh chan ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Taja tin mapuy ani in pajkintsi an ti wileb abal yabich ms kin kambiy an atiklbtsik asta ka watey xi mil i tamub. Tayl, tam ka watch xi mil i tamub, neech ka walk w i kij.
66020004	U chuu jeye i tokat kwajtalbtsik ani buxkan taja xi pidhantsik ti awiltalb ti ljundhom. U chuu jeye nin ejattaltsik xi kotsidhtsik tin k kal tin kwentaki abal in belltsik xowa in lnmal na Jess. Jajtsik yab in kaknmal an atax, nibal in kaknantsmal an tin chilbil, nibal in walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin exlixtal an atax bin pkib o bin kubak. U chuu ke ejechtsik ti t ani takxin tin nakl mil i tamub junax kal na Kristo.
66020005	Jech jaich tin jidhtal ti ejech ti t an chemlomtsik. Por xi keet an chemlomtsik yab ja ejechtsik ti t, asta tam ka watch xi mil i tamub.
66020006	Kijidh tajat ani tokodhich kal na Dios, xi neech ka ejech tam ka ejdh tin jidhtal an chemlomtsik! Jechtsik, yabich ja neech ka chemech tin chabtal. Jajtsik neech ti ple abal na Dios ani abal na Kristo ani neech ka kwajaytsik ti takix kal na Kristo tin nakl mil i tamub.
66020007	Tam ka watch xi mil i tamub, an lej atax neech ka walk xon tu kyb balidh,
66020008	ani neech ka kale kin kambiy ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Neech kin kambiy na Gog ani na Magog, neech kin junku an soldadotsik abal ti pjx. Nin yanl, in junwal jelti an kidhib xi waach ban pujal.
66020009	Kaletsik putl in chikwl an chabl, in wiliytsik xon ti kwajat xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani an bitsow xu kanidhb tajat kal na Dios. Por petnantsattsik ti kamal kal na Dios ani ejtal taaytsik.
66020010	Ani an lej atax, xi kl ti kambidhtsik, petn ban kamal xi xukudh kal i asufre, xon ti petnadhtsik an atax ani an kambix tiltsix. Taja neech ti yajlombdhbtsik akal i kij malill i kij.
66020011	U chuu tm jun i yejche dhak tokat kwajtalb ani xi ta ti buxl taja. Tin tamt Jaj, wixkin an chabl ani an walki ani yab elan n w xon ti ka kwajb an chabl ani an walki.
66020012	U chuu an chemlomtsik, tsitsik ani pakdha, kubutsik tin tamt na Dios. Welan tm an dhutsadh wtsik ani welan jeye jn xi jaich xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. An chemlomtsik, ljundh kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmaltsik, xantiki ti kwajat dhutsadh ba jachan an dhutsadh wtsik.
66020013	An pujal in pidhna an chemlomtsik xi taja tin kool, an cheml ani xon tu ulel an chemlomtsik, in pidhnatsik jeye xi taja tin kool. Ejtal an chemlomtsik, ljundh juntsik ti juntsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
66020014	An cheml ani xon tu ulel an chemlomtsik, petn ban kamal. Jech, jaich nin chabtal an cheml.
66020015	Taja jeye ti petn xi yabtsik eltsin dhutsadh tin bij xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bijtsik xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
66021001	U chuu tm jun i t walki ani jun i t chabl; pos an jidhtal walki ani an jidhtal chabl, wixkin ani yabich wachin an pujal.
66021002	Nan, xu bij Juan, u chuu an tokat bitsow ti pal walki tojojodh tajat, jelti jun i tsidhan xi kwajat tojojodh abal neech ti tomkinal. Jech an bitsow, jaich an t Jerusaln xi abnadh kal na Dios.
66021003	Ani u acha jun i kawidh kwintalb xi tl walki xin ulu ench: —Ka tela, na Dios kwajatich xo kal an iniktsik. An iniktsik neech ka kwajay tin bitswil na Dios ani Jaj, neech ka kwajay tin Diosil.
66021004	Neech ka kwitsintsik tin jaml nin wal kal na Dios ani yabich neech ka wachin i cheml, nibal i ukil, nibal i tepintalb, nibal i yajal; pos ejtal xowa xi waachwiik, watch.
66021005	In ulu tm ench xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb: —Nan u tajl ti t ejtal xowakich. In ulu jeye ench: —Ka dhutsa, pos ejtal jech xowa u ulal, tsubax ani awil ka belan.
66021006	Tayl tin utsa ench: —Tajadhich ti kwajat. Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal, xi okox ani tayl. Xita u tsikl, neech ku pidha an ti ja xu kalel xon tu kalel an ja xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech kin jalbiy ni jun xata.
66021007	Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha ejtal xowa u kool; neech kin kwajay tin Dios kal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay tu chakmil.
66021008	Por xi jikelomtsik, xi yabtsik u belom, xi pojkantltsik, xu chemdhaxtsik, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xu dhimantsik, xin kaknltsik i chilab ani ejtal xu kambixtsik, neech ka kaletsik ban kamal xi kwajat jomoml xukudh kal i asufre. Jech jaich an cheml xin chabtal.
66021009	Tsch tm xon tin kwajat jn ti b xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi twiik tin teykm jn xi bk an lejab tsutsat kal jn xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tin okontal ani tin utsa ench: —Jala ani neech tu ltsi xi neech kin tomikna an Ajtiklb. Jech an Ajtiklb, jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
66021010	Ban xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidha ku chuu an Tokat Ejattalb, an tokat abatwle tin jna ba jun i yejche tekat chn ani tin xalkantsi an ti yejche tokat bitsow Jerusaln xi kwajat ti pal walki xi tl ba na Dios.
66021011	Jachan an bitsow, chaxixl kal nin tajx na Dios ani nin chaxixltal in junwal jelti jun i labidh tujub xu bijyb ti jaspe, tajujl jelti lam.
66021012	Malill jachan an bitsow, mapudh kal jun i mapuxtalb plek ani tekat. In kool lajuchb i wileb ani ba juntsik an wileb, kubutsik juntsik i tokat abatwle. Ba juntsik an wileb, dhutsadh juntsik i bijlb, xi jaich xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
66021013	x i wileb kwajat in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts, x jeye ebl, x all ani x, in lujtal xon tu ochel na kts.
66021014	Nin mapl an bitsow aknidh kal lajuchb i tujubtsik ani ban tujubtsik, kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi lajuchb nin abatwlejiltsik an Ajtiklb.
66021015	An tokat abatwle xi kwajat ti tilom kal nan, in teykm jun i lejbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro abal kin lejbay an bitsow, nin wilbiltsik ani nin mapl.
66021016	An bitsow, ch in waltsik in kool, nin nakl ani nin chikwl junax aniki. An tokat abatwle in lejbay an bitsow kal an lejbaxtalb ani chab mil lju inik i kilmetro ti lejban; nin nakl, nin tekl ani nin chikwl, junax aniki.
66021017	Tayl in lejbantsi jeye an tin mapl, ox inik ch i metro ti lejban. Jech an lejbaxtalb xin yna an tokat abatwle, jaich an lejbaxtalb xin ynl an iniktsik.
66021018	An mapuxtalb, tajadh kal i tujub xu bijyb jaspe ani an bitsow, kal i mapal oro ti tajadh, in junwal jelti jun i lam xi tokat.
66021019	Nin akan an mapuxtalb, labidhmdhats kal xowakich i labidh tujubtsik: nin jidhtal, kal i jaspe; nin chabtal, kal i safiro; nin oxtal, kal i gata; nin chetal, kal i esmeralda;
66021020	nin botal, kal i nise; nin akaklb, kal i kornalina; nin bklb, kal i krislito; nin waxiklb, kal i berilo; nin beljulb, kal i topasio; nin ljutal, kal i krisoprasa; nin lajujuntal, kal i jasinto ani nin lajuchabtal, kal i amatista.
66021021	Xi lajuchb an wileb, i labidh tujubtsik xu bijyb ti perla; juntsik an wileb, kal juntsik i perla ti tajadh. Ani an pulek bl xi kwajat ba jachan an bitsow, tajadh kal i mapal oro jelti lam xi tajujl.
66021022	Ba jachan an bitsow, yab u chuu ni jun i pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, pos an Okxlb, na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, Jajich na kwajat jelti an at xon ti Jaj u kaknb ani an Ajtiklb jeye.
66021023	An bitsow yab in yntsal ka tajbayat kal a kts nibal kal a ch, pos u tajbayb kal nin tajx na Dios ani an Ajtiklb, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, jaich nu tajaxtalb.
66021024	An atiklbtsik xi loodhich, neech ka xechintsik bin tajx jachan an bitsow ani an pakdha takix xi ban kayl, neech kin jnatsik taja i chejwalixtalb ani neech kin kaknatsik na Dios.
66021025	Nin wilbiltsik yab jayki neech ka mapyat, pos taja yab neech ka jikwchin.
66021026	Ejtal an atiklbtsik, neech kin jna taja i alwa chejwalixtalb ani neech kin kaknatsik na Dios.
66021027	Yab jayki neech ka ochich taja xowa yab alwa, xowa atax nibal xu kambixtsik. Tokot neech ka ochichtsik taja xi kwajat dhutsadh nin bij bin dhutsadh wil an Ajtiklb. Jech an dhutsadh w, jaich xon ti dhutsadh xi neech kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
66022001	An tokat abatwle tin ltsi tm jun i alabl walja ani an ja xi waach taja, jaich xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech an ja, tajujl jelti lam ani u kalel bin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani ban Ajtiklb.
66022002	Junax chejel ban pulek bl xi kwajat ba jachan an bitsow ani jun pake jun pake tin waltsik an walja, taja ti kubat an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xu walim lajuchbl ti tamub. ch ta ch u walim ani nin xekltsik alwa abal ka jeldh kl an atiklbtsik.
66022003	Yabich neech ka wachin xata xi bijidh ke neech ka kale ban kibeltalb. Nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani an Ajtiklb, taja neech ka kwajay ba jachan an bitsow ani neech ka kakn kal nin tjontsixiltsik.
66022004	Neech ka chutat kal nin tjontsixiltsik ani neech kin kontsitsik an tin bij ba nin pkib.
66022005	Taja yab neech ka jikwchin. Xi neech ka kwajaytsik taja, yab neech kin yntsitsik i tajbaxtalb, nibal nin tajx na kts. Pos neech ka tajbayattsik kal na Dios, an Okxlb ani neech ti takixtsik malill i kij.
66022006	Tin utsa jeye ench an tokat abatwle: —Ejtal jech xowa u ulal, tsubax ani awil ka belan. An Okxlb, na Dios xin ijtsal an tiltsixtsik, in abnmal nin tokat abatwlejil abal kin xalkantsi nin tjontsixiltsik xowa neech ka tmun kunat i kij.
66022007	—Kunat i kij neech kin tsch! Kijidh abal xita xin tajl xowa in ulal nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios xi kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w!
66022008	Nan, xu bij Juan, u acha ani u chuu ejtal jech. Tam tu achmalich ani u chumalich, in tudhlan tin tamt an tokat abatwle xi tin xalkantsmal jech abal ku kakna.
66022009	Por jaj tin utsa ench: —Yab ka taja anchan, pos nan u tjontsalki neye na Dios jelti tat ani na at kidhbtsik an tiltsix ani ejtal xin tajltsik xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w. Tokotki na Dios ka kakna.
66022010	Tin utsa jeye ench: —Yab ka china xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, pos kunatich xowki neech ka tmun jech.
66022011	Xita xin tajltsik xowa yab lujat, jila kin ntsi kin tajatsik xowa yab lujat; xi ataxtsik, jila kin ntsi kin taja xowa atax. Por xi lujattsik, kin ntsi kin taja xowa lujat ani xi tokodhichtsik kal na Dios, kin ntsi kin toko tinb.
66022012	—Kunat i kij neech kin tsch ani neech ku tsidha an chejwalixtalb xi neech tu pidha juntsik ta b, kal tin kwenta xowaki a tajmaltsik.
66022013	Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal, xi okox ani xi tayl.
66022014	Kijidh xita exomtsik in tokwal tinb abal kin ejtotsik ka utey xon ti kwajat an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani abal kin ejtotsik ka ochich bin wilbil an bitsow.
66022015	Por xi ataxtsik, xu dhimantsik, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xu chemdhaxtsik, xin kaknltsik i chilab ani ejtal xin kulbetnltsik ti kambix, elb neech ka jilkon.
66022016	—Nan, xu bij Jess, u abmal nu tokat abatwlejil abal kin ltsi jech ejtal an belomtsik. Nanich nin tujtal ani nin kidhtal an pulek takix Dabid. Nanich nin kwajat jelti na pulek t xu kalel tam dhajaw.
66022017	An Tokat Ejattalb ani an belomtsik, in ulaltsik ench: —Jala. Xita kin acha, kin ulu jeye: —Jala. Xita u tsikl, ka tsch ani kin ucha an ja xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech kin jalbiy ni jun xata.
66022018	Ejtaltsik xin achl xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, u utsltsik ench: Max jun xita kin puntsiy xowa j kwajat dhutsadh, neech jeye tm ka pidhan kal na Dios an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb xi kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w.
66022019	Ani max jun xita kin wkoy jun xata xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, neech jeye ka wkontsat tin bij kal na Dios ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bijtsik xi neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Yab neech ka walk ka ochich ban tokat bitsow xi kwajat in till jech an dhutsadh w.
66022020	An Ajtiklb, xin lnl jech, in ulal ench: —Tsubax u ulal abal kunat i kij neech kin tsch. Anchan ka tjan. Ki tsch, Ajtiklb Jess!
66022021	Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
